title: Brazil: Kuvuguruzanya na Perezida kubera Covid-19 kwirukanishije Minisitiri
article_text:
Brazil: Kuvuguruzanya na Perezida kubera Covid-19 kwirukanishije Minisitiri

 Perezida wa Brazil, Jair Bolsonaro kuri uyu wa 16 Mata 2020 yirukanye Minisitiri w’Ubuzima bari bamaze ibyumweru bitatu batumvikana ku ngamba zo gukumira ikwirakwira ry’indwara y’icyorezo ya Covid-19. Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Luiz Henrique Mandetta yategetse abaturage bo muri iki gihugu ko bahagarika ibikorwa, bakaguma mu rugo kugira ngo iki cyorezo gikumirwe. Yabasabye kandi kubahiriza intera ya metero hagati y’umuntu n’undi. Perezida Bolsonaro byaramurakaje, na we ategeka abaturage gusubira mu mirimo yabo, areba ku bukungu bw’igihugu kuruta ubuzima bw’abaturage. Ibyo yarabishimangiye nk’uko bigaragara mu nkuru ya The Guardian aho uyu Mukuru w’Igihugu yavuze ko :"Aho kugira ngo ubukungu buhungabane, ubuzima bwabigenderamo." Minisitiri Mandetta n’abaguverineri ba leta 27 bamaganye itegeko rya Perezida Bolsonaro bitewe n’uko ryongerera akaga Brazil, impaka no kutumvikana bikaba bimaze ibyumweru bitatu. Brazil imaze kugaragaramo abanduye Covid-19 barenga 30,425, abamaze gupfa barenga 1,924 kandi imibare igaragaza kuzamuka cyane kw’abandura n’abapfa bikaba biteye impungenge ku buzima bw’abatuye igihugu.

title: Operasiyo El Dorado Canyon: Col. Kadhafi yohererejwe indege 45 zo kumurimburana n’abe, zibundikira ubusa
article_text:
Operasiyo El Dorado Canyon: Col. Kadhafi yohererejwe indege 45 zo kumurimburana n’abe, zibundikira ubusa

 Tariki ya 15 Mata 1986 ni bwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika zakoze Operasiyo yari kwitwa simusiga ku ibwiriza rya Ronald Reagan wari Umukuru w’Igihugu, zohereza indege 45 muri Libya ngo zirimbure Col. Muammar Kadhafi n’umuryango we ariko zibundikira ubusa.
 Col. Kadhafi yari yarafashwe nk’icyigomeke ku bihugu bikomeye ku Isi, rimwe na rimwe ashinjwa kohereza ibyihebe kugaba ibitero mu bihugu by’i Burayi, agendekeye ku matwara akaze y’idini rya Isilamu no kuba yari umwanzi ukomeye wa Israël, washyigikiraga Palestine; ibintu byarakaje cyane Amerika. Bettino Caraxi wari Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Butaliyani yari aherutse kwihanangiriza uyu musirikare nyuma yari amaze gushinjwa uruhare mu gitero cyagabwe mu kabyiniro ka ‘La Belle’ i Berlin mu Budage tariki ya 5 Mata 1986, abantu babiri barimo Umunyamerika bakahapfira, abarenga 200 barakomereka. Uburyo Operasiyo El Dorado Canyon yari yubakitse Ibirindiro by’ingabo n’urugo rwe byari muri Bab al Azizia muri Tripoli ( umurwa mukuru) ni byo byari bigambiriwe cyane kuko byakekwaga ko Col. Kadhafi ari byo arimo. Byoherejwemo indege z’intambara zo mu bwoko bwa F-111F zigera mu icyenda zari zihetse misile 36 zo mu bwoko bwa GBU-10. Ibirindiro bya Murat Sidi Bilal nabyo byoherejwemo indege za F-111F eshatu zihetse misile 12 zo mu bwoko bwa GBU-10. Ku birindiro bikuru bya gisirikare muri Tripoli na Benghazi hoherejwe indege 6 za A-7E n’izindi 6 za F/VFA-131/131 zari zikoreye amabombe 12 yo mu bwoko bwa AGM-45 Shrike n’andi 36 ya AGM-88 HARM. Ikibuga cy’indege z’intambara cya Tripoli (umurwa mukuru wa Libya) cyoherejwemo indege za F-111F esheshatu zihetse amabombe 72 yo mu bwoko bwa Mk82. Ikibuga cya Benina muri Benghazi cyoherejwemo indege 8 zo mu bwoko bwa A-6E zari zikoreye amabombe 24 yo mu bwoko bwa Mk82 n’andi yo mu bwoko bwa Mk20 agera kuri 82. Ikibuga cy’indege cya Jamahiriyah kiri muri Benghazi cyoherejwemo indege zo mu bwoko bwa A-6E zari zikoreye amabombe yo mu bwoko bwa Mk82 zigera kuri 84. Ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya operasiyo Mbere y’uko izi ndege zijya kurasa muri Libya, zabanje kugwa mu Bwongereza bwari bwemeye kuzakira, nyuma zitera zinyuze mu nyanja ya Mediterane ziciye mu kigobe cya Gibraltar kiyihuza na Atlantic. Indege zose zoherejwe n’Amerika ni 45 ndetse zari zikoreye misile 48 n’amabombe (misile ntoya) 300. Muri rusange harashwe ibisasu 35, kimwe kirayoba, ibindi umunani ingabo za Libya zabirasiye mu kirere, mu gitero cyatwaye iminota itarenze 12. Indege imwe y’Amerika yo mu bwoko bwa F-111F ni yo yarashwe ndetse n’abapilote bayo babiri baricwa. The New York Times mu nkuru yakoze tariki ya 22 Gashyantare 1987 yitwa ‘Target Kadhafi’ yatangaje ko iyi ndege yarashwe n’iya Amerika habayeho kwibeshya. Izi ndege kandi zahushije Col. Qaddafi kuko ahantu hose zari zoherejwe atari ahari. We n’umuryango we bari bamaze guhungira kure y’urugo rwe rwari muri Bab al Azizia. Gusa umukobwa we yari yarareze witwaga Hana Qaddafi ngo ashobora kuba yaraharasiwe (The Guardian mu nkuru yasohotse tariki ya 26 Kanama 2011 yavuze ko ashobora kuba yararusimbutse, akaba akiriho mu ibanga) n’abandi bakozi bo muri urwo rugo bagera kuri 44. Col. Muammar Qaddafi wasimbutse urwo mu 1986, yishwe n’ingabo z’umuryango wa NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization) urimo ibihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika. tariki ya 20 Ukwakira 2011 muri Sirte ku ivuko rye. Kwicwa kwe kwatewe byatewe no kuba abaturage bamwe bakoraga imyigaragambyo igamije kumweguza ariko we arabyanga ahubwo yiyemeza guhangana nabo kugeza apfuye.

title: Bimwe mu byorezo 10 biteye ubwoba Isi imaze guhura nabyo
article_text:
Bimwe mu byorezo 10 biteye ubwoba Isi imaze guhura nabyo 

 Muri iki gihe ikiremwamuntu gihanganye  n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 giteye ubwoba kandi kibangamiye ubuzima rusange, ariko iki nk’uko tugiye kubirebera hamwe ntabwo ari cyo cya mbere Isi yaba ihuye nacyo, ndetse aka kanya nta n’uwakwemeza ko ari cyo kizaba gihitanye abantu benshi kurusha ibindi kuko hari n’icyabayeho bikekwa ko cyahitanye abantu bari hagati ya Miliyoni 75 na 200.  Icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyagaragaye bwa mbere mu Ntara ya Wuhan mu Bushinwa mu mpera z’umwaka ushize wa 2019. Ibimenyetso by’iki cyorezo ni umuriro mwinshi, gukorora no guhumeka n’umusonga. Gikwirakwira vuba ni nayo mpamvu kimaze gukwirakwira mu bihugu 213 ku Isi. Ubu twandika iyi nkuru, kimaze gufata abantu 1,812,734, kimaze guhitana abagera ku 113,675, mu gihe abagikize ari 453,289 nk’uko imibare y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, OMS, ibigaragaza. 
 Nyamara ariko, ugereranyije n’ibindi byorezo byandura byakibanjirije, icyorezo cya Coronavirus, urugero rw’abo kica mu bacyanduye rwari rugeze kuri  3.4% muri Werurwe, nta nubwo kibyegereye mu bukana no guhitana abantu benshi nk’uko tubikesha urubuga Foreigner.fi. Bavuga ko ’icyorezo’ nka ’epidemic’ari igihe indwara yandura yibasira igihugu cyangwa akarere kamwe naho ’icyorezo’ nka ’pandemic’ akaba ari igihe indwara yandura yambuka imipaka ikagira ingaruka ku bihugu cyangwa uturere. Akenshi abahanga ntibavuga rumwe kuri bisobanuro nk’ibi ariko ibi byemeranijweho na bose: amagambo asobanura gukwirakwira kw’indwara yandura yaduka mu karere runaka, kandi umubare w’abanduye ukarenga urugero rwari rwitezwe. 
 Indwara nka Malariya, Igituntu, ubushita, ibicurane, SARS cyangwa Ebola zagize uruhare mu mateka ya muntu mu myaka ya vuba, virusi ya SARS na Ebola, nk’urugero, zikaba zarishe ndetse zigafata abantu benshi, iyo bigeze ku byorezo byambukiranyije imipaka urutonde rukurikira ni bimwe mu byorezo bibi byagize ingaruka ku mubumbe dutuyeho mu myaka 2000 ishize, mu buryo bukurikirana: 1. Icyorezo cya ANTONINE mu mwaka w’165 Iki cyorezo cyarangwaga n’ibimenyetso nk’umuriro, kubyimba no kubabara mu muhogo no gukorora.  Abahanga mu by’amateka bavuga ko iki cyahitanye abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 5 mu turere cyagezemo muri Aziya , Misiri, u Bugereki n’u Butaliyani. Abahanga batekereza ko bishobora kuba byaratewe n’indwara y’ibihara cyangwa iseru ariko impamvu nyirizina ikaba itaramenyekana. 2. Icyorezo cya JUSTINIAN (541-542) Iki cyahawe iri zina biturutse ku Mwami w’Abami Justinian wa I w’Ubwami bugari bwa Byzantine aho cyagaragaye bwa mbere, ibimenyetso byacyo byari nk’umutwe, umuriro, gukonja, gangrene, kubyimba n’ibindi. Bivugwa ko cyahitanye abantu hagati ya miliyoni 25 na 50. 3. Icyorezo cya BUBONI (Bubonic) cyangwa Urupfu rw’Umukara (1330-1353) Iki cyorezo kibasiye cyane cyane u Burayi na Aziya, aho bikekwa ko cyaturutse, ibimenyetso byacyo bikaba byari ibibyimba byirabura, kuruka, umuriro, gukonja, impiswi n’ububabare. 
 Bikekwa ko cyahitanye kimwe cya gatatu cy’abatuye isi muri kiriya gihe (abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 75 na 200) , ni icyorezo bivugwa ko agakoko kacyo kitwa ’Yersinia pestis’ kakwirakwijwe n’imbeba zirabura zagendaga mu mato y’abacuruzi. 4. Icyorezo cya Gatatu cya CHOLERA (1852-1860) Icyo gihe kimwe mu birindwi byanduye Cholera ku isi mu mateka, bikekwa ko byaturutse mu Buhinde kandi bikwirakwira muri Aziya yose, Uburayi, Amerika y’Amajyaruguru na Afurika. Icyorezo cya Cholera ni kimwe mu byorezo bifatwa nk’ibibi mu byorezo byose, ibimenyetso byacyo birimo impiswi, kuruka, kurwara imitsi hamwe no kugira uruhu rukonje. Yahitanye abantu barenga miliyoni 1 kwisi yose. Icyorezo cya gatatu cya cholera (1846–60) cyari kibaye ku nshuro ya gatatu (ari yo mpamvu kiswe gutya), cyaturutse mu Buhinde mu kinyejana cya cumi n’icyenda kigera kure cyane y’imbibi z’iki gihugu. Abashakashatsi bemeza ko gishobora kuba cyaratangiye mu 1837 kikaba kikageza mu 1863. 5. Icyorezo cy’Ibicurane (FLU PANDEMIC) (1889-1890) Cyatangiye kitwa ibicurane by’u Burusiya kuko ari ho cyagaragaye bwa mbere, ariko mu mezi ane cyari kimaze kugera ku isi yose kubera ubwiyongere bw’abaturage bwari ku muvuduko ukabije mu kinyejana cya 19. Ni icyorezo bivugwa ko cyaba cyaratewe na virusi ya A H3N8 kigahitana abantu barenga miliyoni kandi ibimenyetso byayo nyamukuru ni umuriro, kubabara umutwe no gukonja. 6. Icyorezo cya Gatandatu cya CHOLERA (1910-1911) Iki cyorezo na none cyaturutse mu Buhinde vuba vuba kiba kigeze muri Afurika y’Amajyaruguru, mu Burasirazuba bwo hagati, mu Burusiya, Uburasirazuba bw’u Burayi kirangira gihitanye abantu bagera muri miliyoni. Iki cyorezo ni nacyo cyabaye intandaro y’ikindi cya Cholera cyahise cyaduka muri Amerika muri icyo gihe. 7. Icyorezo cy’Ibicurane byo muri Espagne "THE SPANISH FLU" (1918) Iki cyarangwaga n’inkorora yumye, umuriro, umunaniro n’ingorane zo guhumeka. Abantu miliyoni 500 ku Isi banduye iki cyorezo, abagera kuri miliyoni 25 kirabahitana mu byumweru byacyo 25 bya mbere honyine, muri rusange bikavugwa ko cyahitanye hagati ya miliyoni 50 na miliyoni 100 z’abantu. 
 Nubwo byaketswe ko ibi bicurane byaturutse mu Bushinwa kubera virusi ya grippe ikomoka ku nyoni, yitwa ibicurane byo muri Esipanye kubera amakuru  y’ibicurane byadutse mu mpeshyi yo mu 1918, i Madrid. 8. Icyorezo cy’Ibicurane byo muri Aziya, "ASIAN FLU" (1956-1958) Iki cyatewe na grippe A ya virusi ya H2N2 kiza gifite ibimenyetso  nk’ububabare bw’umubiri, umuriro, intege nke, gukonja, inkorora no kubura ubushake bwo kurya. Bikekwa ko cyaturutse mu Bushinwa bikica abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 1 na 2, bose hamwe. 9. Icyorezo cy’Ibicurane "FLU PANDEMIC" (1968) Iki cyorezo cyaranzwe n’ibimenyetso bisa n’ibyorezo by’ibicurane byabanje, byatangiriye muri Hong Kong bidatinze kigera mu bihugu nka Singapore, Vietnam, Ubuhinde, Filipine, Australia, cyageze no mu bihugu byinshi by’i Burayi na Amerika, gihitana abantu barenga miliyoni. 10. Icyorezo cya VIH / SIDA (Kuva mu 1980/81) Yizera ko yanduye virusi ya chimpanzee muri Afurika y’Iburengerazuba mu myaka ya za 1920, yagaragaye bwa mbere muri Haiti mu myaka ya za 1960 na New York na San Francisco mu mpera za 1970 / mu ntangiriro ya za 1980. 
 Virus ya Sida izwi nka VIH bivugwa ko yatangiye kubaho bwa mbere mu nguge zo muri Afurika y’uburengerazuba mu myaka y’1920, ariko ikaba yaragaragaye bwa mbere muri Haiti mu myaka ya za 60 no muri New York na San Fransisco mu mpera z’imyaka ya 70 ugana mu ntangiriro z’ 1980. Ibimenyetso byayo byarangwaga n’umuriro, gutakaza ibiro vuba, impiswi, umusonga no kubabara mu muhogo kandi kuva icyo gihe imaze guhitana abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 32 ku Isi, mu gihe abagera kuri miliyoni 37.9  babanaga na virusi itera SIDA mu mpera za 2018 nk’uko imibare ya OMS ibigaragaza.

title: Tariki 14 Mata 1994: Umunsi Abatutsi bagera mu 35,000 biciwe kuri Kiliziya ya Nyarubuye
article_text:
Tariki 14 Mata 1994: Umunsi Abatutsi bagera mu 35,000 biciwe kuri Kiliziya ya Nyarubuye

 Kuri uyu wa 13 Mata nibwo hasozjwe icyumweru cy’icyunamo gikurikirwa n’iminsi 100 yo gukomeza kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994. Ku itariki nk’iyi mu gihe cya jenoside hibukwa Abatutsi basaga 35,000 , biciwe kuri Kiliziya ya Nyarubuye. Icyo gihe, impunzi z’Abatutsi zisaga 35,000 zaturutse muri za Komini Rukira, Rusumo, Birenga, Kigarama na Rukara no ku musozi wa Nyarubuye, ziciwe kuri Kiliziya ya Nyarubuye n’Interahamwe ziyobowe na Burugumesitiri Sylvestre Gacumbitsi (wakatiwe igifungo cya burundu na ICTR) afatanyije na Evariste Rubanguka wari umucamaza kuri komini n’abajandarume bo mu kigo cya Nasho. Uwo munsi Abatutsi 18 gusa ni bo barokotse ubwo bwicanyi. Tariki ya 14 Mata 1994, saa cyenda z’igicamunsi, ngo nibwo abicanyi bakoresheje gerenade batangiye gutera muri Paruwasi ya Kiliziya Gatolika ya Nyarubuye. Icyo gihe kandi hari indi nterahamwe yakomokaga mu cyahoze ari Komini Birenga yiyitaga Cyasa wakatiwe burundu, akaba afungiye muri gereza ya Rwamagana i Nsinda. Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zimaze gufata Nyarubuye nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri , zahasanze imirambo imwe yarariwe n’imbwa, zicukura imva rusange imbere ya kiliziya zirabashyingura. Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Nyarubuye rushyinguyemo imibiri y’Abatutsi 58,551. Ku itariki ya 14 Mata 2019 hashyiguwe indi mibiri 20 yabonetse hirya no hino mu mirenge igize Akarere ka Kirehe. Hagati y’itariki ya 14-15 Mata 1994, Interahamwe zishe Abatutsi bose bari bahungiye ku Kiliziya ya Cyahinda, ubu ni mu Karere ka Nyaruguru. I Kamembe hishwe Abatutsi bo muri Kadasomwa bicirwa kuri Paruwasi Katedarali ya Cyangugu. Hishwe Abatutsi bo ku Mubuga muri Gihombo bicirwa ahitwa ku Muhombori. Kuva ku itariki ya 14-15 Mata 1994, Abatutsi bo mu yahoze ari Komini Taba biciwe ahitwa mu Kiryamo cy’Inzovu. Ingabo za FPR Inkotanyi zageze Kiziguro, zibasha kurokora Abatutsi 11 bari batawe mu cyobo ariko batarapfa. Na none Kuva ku itariki ya 14-15 Mata 1994, Abatutsi bari bahungiye kuri Komini Rukondo (Mbazi), ubu habarizwa mu Karere ka Nyamagabe, bose barishwe.

title: Bamwe mu banyapolitiki bashyinguye i Rebero n’uko bagiye bicwa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi
article_text:
Bamwe mu banyapolitiki bashyinguye i Rebero n’uko bagiye bicwa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi

 Agathe uwilingiyimana, Joseph Kavaruganda,  Ndasingwa Landouard, Faustin Rucogoza, ni bamwe mu banyapolitiki bibukwa buri tariki 13 Mata, bishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi baranzwe n’ubutwari budasanzwe bwo kudashyigikira politiki icamo ibice Abanyarwanda bakemera no gutanga n’ubuzima bwabo aho gufatanya n’ingengabitekerezo y’amacakubiri. Abanyapolitiki bishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bibukwa buri tariki ya 13 Mata, bakaba bashyinguye i Rebero barimo; Joseph Kavaruganda, Landouard Ndasingwa, Kameya Andre, Kabageni Venantie, Charles Kayiranga, Jean de la Croix Rutaremara, Augustin Rwayitare, Aloys Niyoyita n’abandi. Bimwe mu byaranze bamwe muri bo n’uko bishwe Agathe Uwilingiyimana Agathe Uwilingiyimana yavutse mu 1953 avukira i Nyaruhengeri nko mu birometero 140 ugana mu majyepfo y’iburasirazuba bwa Kigali. Yakuriye i Butare , aba umwarimu w’imibare. Yashakanye na Ignace Barahira, baturukaga mu mudugudu umwe, babyarana abana batanu. Yize muri Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda. Kuva mu 1985 yigisha ubutabire mu ishuri i Butare. Agathe Uwilingiyimana yagizwe Minisitiri w’uburezi mu 1992 mbere yo kuba Minisitiri w’Intebe wa mbere w’umugore w’u Rwanda nyuma y’imishyikirano ya Arusha. Yarwanyije ruswa mu bizamini by’amashuri yo mu 1992. Yashyizeho igenzura rya polisi mu bizamini, bigira ingaruka zo kugabanya cyane gutsinda bitakorewe kw’abana b’Abahutu bakomoka mu majyaruguru y’igihugu. Nyuma y’ibyumweru bike yaje kwibasirwa, ariko ibihumbi by’abagore bo mu Rwanda banze iterabwoba ry’Interahamwe bagaragaza ku mugaragaro ko bamushyigikiye mu mpeshyi yo mu 1992. Nka Minisitiri w’intebe Agathe Uwilingiyimana yagaragaraga ko afite igitekerezo cyo hejuru cy’ubwenegihugu yashyiraga imbere y’ibitandukanya abanyagihugu. Abahutu bashyira mu gaciro, rimwe na rimwe barwanyije ku mugaragaro Perezida wa Repubulika. Perezida Juvénal Habyarimana, yarasiwe mu ndege ye ku ya 6 Mata 1994, Uwilingiyimana akiri Minisitiri w’Intebe. Iyicwa rya Agathe Uwilingiyimana Mu ijoro ryo ku ya 6 kugeza ku ya 7 Mata, Ubuyobozi bukuru bw’ingabo na Jandarumori, buyobowe na Colonel Bagosora, bwateranye amagambo na Jenerali Roméo Dallaire, wari uyoboye MINUAR, na Jacques-Roger Booh- Booh, wari intumwa idasanzwe y’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni, bibutsaga ububasha bwemewe bwa Minisitiri w’intebe, nk’umwe mu basimbura mu mategeko ba Perezida wa Repubulika kugira ngo akemure ikibazo cyari kivutse mu gihugu. Col Bagosora ariko yanze cyane guha imbaraga Uwilingiyimana. Jenerali Roméo Dallaire yahisemo guha Agathe Uwilingiyimana abasirikare ba MINUAR kugira ngo bamurinde bamuherekeze kuri radio atange ubutumwa buhamagarira rubanda gutuza mu gitondo. Ariko mu gitondo cyo ku ya 7 Mata, ijambo Uwilingiyimana yagombaga kuvuga ntiyabashije kurivuga kuko atemerewe kugera kuri Radio y’igihugu. Ahagana mu ma saa mbiri, inzu ya Minisitiri w’intebe yari yamaze kugotwa n’abari bashinzwe kurinda Habyarimana bazwi nka GP (Garde Presidentiel). Agathe Uwilingiyimana n’umugabo we bagerageje guhungira ku muturanyi, umukozi w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, ariko amaherezo barababona bombi baricwa. Icumi mu basirikare cumi na batanu ba MINUAR, bakomoka mu Bubiligi, Gen. Roméo Dallaire, yari yohereje kurinda Uwilingiyimana, baguye mu maboko y’abicanyi baricwa nyuma yo kwirwanaho bakabura ubufasha. Abana ba Uwilingiyimana babashije kurokoka bigoranye babifashijwemo n’umusirikare wo muri Senegal , Mbaye Diagne, wari muri MINUAR, bajyanwa i Burayi muri Mata 1994. Joseph Kavaruganda yavutse ku ya 8 Gicurasi 1935 i Tare, Ruanda-Urundi. Yize amashuri abanza i Tare, hanyuma yitabira Seminari ya Kigali Junior mbere yo kwiga amategeko mu Bubiligi, ahabwa impamyabumenyi ya Dogiteri wa Filozofiya mu 1966. Yagarutse mu Rwanda mu 1967, atangira akazi nka perezida wa Caisse d’Epargne, inguzanyo kandi ikigo cyo kuzigama. Mu 1974, Kavaruganda yagizwe umushinjacyaha mukuru w’u Rwanda. Kavaruganda yarwanyaga cyane ingengabitekerezo ya Hutu Power, yari azwiho kutubahwa na bamwe mu bagize ubutegetsi bwa MRND. [2] Ku ya 4 Kanama 1993, guverinoma y’u Rwanda na Front Rwanda Patriotic Front (FPR) bashyize umukono ku masezerano ya Arusha yo guhagarika intambara  mu Rwanda. Nk’umucamanza mukuru, Kavaruganda yari ashinzwe kurahiza perezida w’agateganyo na guverinoma y’inzibacyuho, nk’uko biteganywa n’amasezerano. Muri icyo gitondo, Juvénal Habyarimana yarahiriye kuba Perezida ku nyubako y’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, ariko nyuma yahise agenda mbere yo guhamagarira minisitiri w’intebe n’abagize guverinoma ngo itangire imirimo ku mugaragaro. Nyuma yo gutungurwa no kugira urujijo Kavaruganda nawe yahise agenda. Habyarimana yagarutse kuri icyo gicamunsi afite urutonde rw’abaminisitiri bashya bazarahira mu mashyaka y’intagondwa z’Abahutu zitari zumvikanyweho mu masezerano ya Arusha. Kubera ko Kavaruganda atatumiwe mu muhango wa kabiri, ntiyitabye kandi abaminisitiri basabwe ntibarahiye. Habyarimana yararakaye, nyuma yaho we na bagenzi be ba politiki bafata Kavaruganda nk’inshuti ya FPR. Kavaruganda yaje kwicwa bamaze igihe bamugera amajanja Mu ntangiriro za Gashyantare 1994, Interahamwe zagabye igitero ku modoka ya Kavaruganda. Bukeye binjira mu nyubako y’Urukiko Rushinzwe Kurinda Itegeko Nshinga, ariko Kavaruganda na bagenzi be baratoroka banyuze mu idirishya ry’ibiro bye. Ku ya 17 Gashyantare 1994, umuyobozi wa MINUAR, Gen. Roméo Dallaire, yakiriye amakuru y’umugambi wo guhitana Kavaruganda na  Ndasingwa Landouard (Lando). Dallaire mu gitabo cye "Shake Hands with the Devil", avuga ko yabamenyesheje uyu mugambi, kandi nta n’umwe watunguwe. MINUAR yohereje abasirikare batanu bakomoka muri Ghana kugira ngo barinde inzu ya Kavaruganda. Ku itariki ya 7 Mata, abasirikare bari bashinzwe kurinda Perezida Habyarimana bageze ku muryango w’urugo rwe, bavuga ko bashaka kumujyana ahantu hari umutekano. Umugore wa Kavaruganda, Annonciata Kavaruganda, avuga ko yari azi ko ari amayeri, ariko aremera ajyana na bo kuko nta yandi mahitamo yari ahari. Kavaruganda yaje kwicwa nyuma kuri uwo munsi. Nk’uko Annonciata Kavaruganda abitangaza ngo abo basirikare bava muri Ghana bari bafitanye ubucuti n’abasirikare bo mu Rwanda bari bagiye kwa Kavaruganda, kuko ngo basekaga banasangira inzoga  kandi banywa hamwe mu gihe abasirikare ba leta bamukubitaga n’abana be. Ndasingwa Landouard Landouard ’Lando’ Ndasingwa (yapfuye ku ya 7 Mata 1994) yari umunyapolitiki akaba n’umucuruzi mu Rwanda wari ufite Hotel Chez Lando. Yishwe ku munsi wa mbere jenoside itangira. Ndasingwa yashinze hoteri Chez Lando mu myaka ya za 1980 afatanyije n’umugore we ukomoka muri Canada witwa Hélène. Nyuma y’urupfu rwa Ndasingwa, hoteri yasigaranywe na mushiki we Anne-Marie Kantengwa. Lando yari yarize muri Collège Saint-André ya Kigali, akomereza muri kaminuza y’u Rwanda , ajya muri Kaminuza ya Laval muri Quebec, Canada, yiga muri Kaminuza ya Mcgill ndetse no muri kaminuza ya Montréal. Byumvikane ko yari umuntu ujijutse kuko yanigishije muri kaminuza y’u Rwanda. Nk’umunyapolitiki, Lando yari umuyobozi na visi perezida w’ishyaka riharanira kwishyira ukizana (Parti Libéral) kandi yahawe inshingano za minisitiri w’umurimo n’imibereho myiza muri guverinoma y’inzibacyuho ya Habyarimana yashyizweho nyuma y’amasezerano ya Arusha. Niwe Mututsi wenyine wari muri guverinoma yinzibacyuho. Nk’uko twabivuze haruguru, Ku ya 17 Gashyantare 1994, umuyobozi wa MINUAR, Gen. Roméo Dallaire yabwiye Ndasingwa na kavaruganda ko hari umugambi wo kubahitana ariko ntibyabatungura. Nk’umuntu wamamaye kandi uzwi cyane, Ndasingwa yakunze kwibasirwa kuri Radio RTLM yamenyekanyeho kubiba urwango rushingiye ku moko. Ku itariki ya 7 Mata, nyuma y’urupfu rwa Habyarimana, Ndasingwa n’umugore we Hélène Pinski, bombi barangije muri Université de Montréal, bashimuswe n’ingabo zari zishinzwe kurinda habyarimana zibakuye mu rugo rwabo hamwe n’abana babo bombi, Malaika na Patrick (imyaka 17 na 15), na nyina wa Ndasingwa, nubwo bari barinzwe n’ingabo za MINUAR, bose baricwa. Umwe muri bashiki be, Louise Mushikiwabo, mu Ukuboza 2009 Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga n’ubutwererane muri guverinoma y’u Rwanda, hanyuma mu Ukwakira 2018 atorerwa kuba Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’ibihugu bikoresha Ururimi rw’Igifaransa (OIF). Faustin Rucogoza Faustin Rucogoza nawe ni umwe mu banyapolitiki bishwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bibukwa ku itariki 13 Mata. Faustin Rucogoza (yapfuye ku ya 7 Mata 1994) yari umunyapolitiki wo mu Rwanda akaba na Minisitiri w’itangazamakuru muri guverinoma y’inzibacyuho yagutse hagati ya 1993 na Mata 1994. Yishwe mu ntangiriro ya jenoside yo mu Rwanda. Yari Umuhutu. Mu Gushyingo 1993 na none ku ya 10 Gashyantare 1994, Rucogoza yaburiye Radio Rutwitsi RTLM ayisaba kwirinda gutangaza amakuru ashobora gukurura urwango rushingiye ku moko. Ibi byakurikiranye n’ibyari byasabwe na Minisitiri w’intebe Agathe Uwilingiyimana mu Gushyingo 1993. Habyarimana amaze gupfa, Rucogoza n’umugore we bajyanywe gufungwa n’ingabo maze bafungirwa muri Camp GP, ahabaga ingabo  zarindaga Perezida. Mu gitondo cyo ku ya 7 Mata, umuyobozi w’izi ngabo, Major Protais Mpiranya, yabwiwe ko Rucogoza n’umugore we bari mu kigo, abaza impamvu bakibabitse, nyuma bahita bicwa. Abandi Felicien Ngango : Yari Visi Perezida w’Ishyaka PSD. Yishwe azira gushyigikira ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda buzira urwango rushingiye ku moko. Yari ku rutonde rw’abanyapolitiki bagombaga gushyirwa muri Guverinoma hakurikijwe amasezerano ya Arusha. Augustin Rwayitare : yari umurwanashyaka w’Ishyaka rya PL. Yishwe muri Jenoside azira kutihanganira leta yabibaga urwango. Jean Baptiste Mushimiyimana:  Yari umunyamuryango wa PSD. Yishwe azira kutavuga rumwe na Leta ya Habyarimana. Kameya Andre:  Yabaye umunyamakuru wa ORINFOR, aba umunyapolitiki, umwe mu bashinze ishyaka PL, ndetse yanashinje Ikinyamakuru Rwanda Rushya numero ya mbere ya Rwanda Rushya yari ifite umutwe ugira uti ” Ninde uzitoragurira Abatutsi “. Yabaye  umwe mu bayobozi bakuru mu ishyaka PL, aho yaje no kuribera umunyamabanga mukuru, yishwe mi ijoro ry’ itariki ya 15-16 Kamena 1994 yiciwe muri St Famille i Kigali aho yari yarahungiye. Umugore we n’umwana we nabo bishwe kuya 19 Mata 1994. Jean de La Croix Rutaremara : Yari umunyapolitiki warwanyaga ibitekerezo bya leta ya Habyarimana byo kwimika urwango n’amacakubiri. Venantie Kabageni : Yari mu ishyaka PL. Yishwe ku ikubitiro rya Jenoside kuko yari azwiho kurwanya imikorere y’ubutegetsi bwa Habyarimana. Aloys Niyoyita : Yari umunyapolitiki wo mu Ishyaka rya PL. Nk’abandi barwanyaga ubutegetsi bwa Habyarimana, byamuviriyemo kwicwa. Charles Kayiranga : Yari Umunyapolitiki wabarizwaga mu ishyaka rya PL, yishwe muri Jenoside azira guteza imbere ubuyobozi bushingiye kuri demokarasi. Frederic Nzamurambaho : Yari Perezida w’Ishyaka rya PSD akaba na Minisitiri w’ubuhinzi. Ku italiki ya 7 Mata 94, yarasiwe imbere y’umuryango we n’ingabo zarindaga Umukuru w’Igihugu. Aba rero ni abantu Abanyarwanda badashobora kwibagirwa bagaragaje umutima wo gushyira igihugu imbere mbere y’ibindi byose, baranzwe no kutikunda no gushyira inyungu zabo imbere, ahubwo bakemera gupfa baharanira ejo hazaza heza h’abazabakomokaho n’igihugu muri rusange.

title: Kwibuka26: Bimwe mu bigaragaza ko Amerika yari izi ibyabaga mu Rwanda ikinumira
article_text:
Kwibuka26: Bimwe mu bigaragaza ko Amerika yari izi ibyabaga mu Rwanda ikinumira

 Muri iki cyumweru haribukwa ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994, yahitanye inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni. Mu gihe iyi jenoside yakozwe amahanga arebera, nyinshi muri guverinoma z’ibihugu by’ibihangange zagiye zireguza ko zitari zizi ibyabaga, ariko ibimenyetso byagiye bishyirwa ahagaragara, bigaragaza ibitandukanye nk’amakuru yagendaga ahererekanywa aturutse mu badipolomate bakoreraga mu Rwanda ndetse na bamwe mu banyamahanga bari mu Rwanda. Bamwe bemeza ko kubura ubushake bwa politiki aho kubura amakuru, ari byo byabujije Isi kugira icyo ikora ngo ihagarike ubwicanyi. Inkuru y’Ikinyamakuru The Washington Post yo mu 2015 ifite umutwe ugira uti : “What did the Clinton administration know about Rwanda?” ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda ni nko kuvuga: “Ni iki ubuyobozi bwa Clinton bwari buzi ku Rwanda?” igaragaramo ubuhamya bw’Umunyamerika , Timothy Longman, wari mu Rwanda mbere gato ya jenoside, aho yagaragaje bimwe mu bintu byagaragaza ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku moko bwashoboraga kwibasira igice kimwe cy’Abanyarwanda bitewe n’umwuka wari mu banyapolitiki b’abahezanguni icyo gihe. Timothy Longman yari Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’inyigo kuri Afurika (African Studies Center) akaba n’umwarimu w’Ubumenyi bwa politiki n’imibanire mpuzamahanga muri Kaminuza ya Boston. Avuga ko agera mu Rwanda muri Gicurasi 1992, umwuka wa politiki wari mu Rwanda watangaga icyizere. Ubutegetsi bwa Habyarimana bwari bumaze kwemera amashyaka atavuga rumwe na we mu mwaka wabanje ku gitutu cyavaga mu gihugu imbere cy’amahuriro yaharaniraga demokarasi ndetse no ku gitutu cy’amahanga. Imyigaragambyo y’abaturage yatangiye mu mpera z’1991, ni yo yasunikiye Habyarimana gutera indi ntambwe ashyiraho guverinoma ihuriweho n’amashyaka menshi , iyobowe na Minisitiri w’Intebe uva mu ruhande rutavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi muri Mata 1992. Icyagaragaraga icyo gihe ariko, nuko iyo hagira amatora aba akaba mu bwisanzure Habyarimana yashoboraga kwisanga hanze. Longman avuga ko mu mezi 12 yakurikiye, ari bwo yagiye abona u Rwanda ruyerera rugwa mu bugizi bwa nabi. Ati: “Ubwo nakoraga imirimo yo kwandika igitabo cyanjye ku idini na politiki (nyuma cyaje gutangazwa nk’Ubukirisitu na Jenoside mu Rwanda (Christianity and Genocide in Rwanda)), nasanze amakimbirane ashingiye ku moko na politiki yiyongera cyane, mu gihe ubwoba bw’ejo hazaza h’igihugu bwakwirakwiraga vuba”. Akomeza agira ati: “Nubwo Habyarimana yashyizeho ivugurura rya politiki kugira ngo ashimishe abamunegura, ni nako we n’abamushyigikiye bakoraga kugira ngo bahungabanye ingaruka z’ibyari bimaze kugerwaho”. Uyu mugabo avuga ko kubera ko amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi yari amaze kwinjizwa muri guverinoma, Habyarimana noneho yabashaga kuyagerekaho uruhare mu gutuma ubukungu, bwari bwifashe nabi, burushaho kurindimuka n’ihungabana ry’umutekano. Ubwo kandi niko ayo mashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi na yo yitotombaga avuga ko nta bubasha mu by’ukuri afite kuko ishyaka rya MRND ryari ku butegetsi ryari ryaragumanye ububasha bwo gufata ibyemezo. Muri iki gihe, ngo abari bashyigikiye Habyarimana, bo, bagerageje kongera gufata ingamba za politiki mu guteza amakimbirane ashingiye ku moko. Biyerekanaga nk’abarwanirira inyungu z’icyo bitaga rubanda nyamwishi (Abahutu) mu gihugu, kandi bagashushanya abanyapolitiki batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi nk’inshuti za ba nyamucye b’Abatutsi bashinjaga gutoteza Abahutu mu gihe cyabakoloni. RPF imaze kugaba igitero ku Rwanda, nk’umutwe wari wiganjemo Abatutsi bari bamaze imyaka isaga 30 mu buhungiro, ndetse itangiye kugaragaza ingufu ku rugamba, abanyapolitiki nk’aba b’abahezanguni bakomeje kumvisha rubanda ko Abatutsi bagarutse kubakoloniza. Mu gihugu hatangiye ibitero bya hato na hato ku Batutsi ariko bigategurwa mu buryo bugaragara ko ari abaturage babyibwirije, ariko ubutumwa mpuzamahanga bw’uburenganzira bwa muntu bwari buyobowe na Human Rights Wacth mu ntangiriro za 93 bwagaragaje ko ibyo bitero byabaga byateguwe n’abayobozi muri Guverinoma bagamije kurushaho kuzana umwuka mubi hagati y’amoko. Timothy Longman avuga ko abantu yabashije kuvugana na bo mu Rwanda, bagiye bagaragaza ko n’abo bitwa ko batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi ntaho bari bataniye n’ubutegetsi kandi benshi bakagaragaza ubwoba bari bafitiye iyo demokarasi yagaragaraga nk’igiye kuzanwa mu gihugu. Avuga ko Abatutsi bari batangiye kugaragaza impungenge z’umutekano wabo. Igitero cya RPF cyo muri Gashyantare 1993 cyagarukiye mu marembo ya Kigali cyarushijeho guteza ubwoba mu baturage. Ati: “Navuye mu Rwanda muri Mata 1993 mfite ubwoba ko ubugizi bwa nabi bushingiye ku moko na politiki bwari nta gisibya”. Imyifatire ya Amerika n’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga muri icyo gihe The Washington Post ivuga ko inyandiko zashyizwe ahagaragara n’Inzu Ndangamurage ya Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika , zagaragaje ko imiburo y’ubwoba bw’ubugizi bwa nabi bushingiye ku moko mu Rwanda yagezwaga i Washington muri icyo gihe n’abadipolomate. Longman akomoza kuri raporo yaturutse kuri Ambasaderi wungirije wa Amerika i Kigali muri Kanama 1992 yagaragazaga impungenge z’ubwicanyi bushingiye ku moko bwatutumbaga mu Rwanda. Agaruka kandi kuri raporo HRW yagizemo uruhare mu bushakashatsi no kuyandika yiswe “Leave none to Tell the Story”, ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda ni nko kuvuga, “Ntihazagire nusigara wo kubara inkuru”, aho ngo harimo “chapitre” yose yahariwe gutanga impuruza ku kuntu hagati y’Ugushyingo 1993 na Mata 1994 jenoside yashoboraga kuba, ikintu kinyomoza ibyagiye bivugwa n’abadipolomate benshi ko batari bazi ibyabaga mu Rwanda. Aya makuru yerekanye ko iyi mpuruza yabanje kumenywa n’ubuyobozi bwa George H. W. Bush, u Rwanda rukaba rwaragombaga kuba muri gahunda y’ibihugu byagombaga gukurikiranirwa hafi n’ubuyobozi bwa Bill Clinton bwatangiye muri Mutarama 1993. Ubwo Clinton yasuraga u Rwanda mu 1998, yavuze gusa ko Atari azi ibyaberaga mu Rwanda. Longman we akagira ati:  “Ubu dufite ibimenyetso ko ibyo Clinton yavuze bitari byo. Ntabwo ari uko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zitari zizi ibyaberaga mu Rwanda. Ukuri nuko tutigeze tubyitaho.” Urubuga The Christian Science Monitor, mu nkuru yarwo yo mu 2009 ifite umutwe ugira uti : “Why the US didn’t intervene in the Rwandan genocide” ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda ni nko kuvuga ngo: “Kuki Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zitigeze zitabara muri Jenoside yo mu Rwanda” (Jenoside yo mu Rwanda, imvugo nayo yakunze kutavugwaho rumwe kuko ari Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi), havugwamo ko ubuyobozi bwa Clinton bwarebereye ibyaberaga mu Rwanda  mu gihe bamwe babusabaga gutabara. Uru rubuga ruvuga ko Amerika yari imaze gukura ingabo zayo mu 1993 mu butumwa butagenze neza bwo kubungabunga amahoro muri Somaliya, nyuma byaje kumenyekana mu gitabo "Black Hawk Down".  Bivugwa ko Amerika yari yarahiriye kutazasubira mu makimbirane idashobora kumva, hagati y’imiryango n’amoko itigeze imenya, no mu gihugu Amerika idafitemo inyungu. Bivugwa ko kuva muri za ambasade, n’amahoteli atandukanye muri Kigali, abadipolomate n’abakozi b’imiryango y’ubutabazi batangaga buri munsi amakuru y’umubare w’abantu bishwe biganjemo Abatutsi na bamwe mu Bahutu batari bashyigikiye ubutegetsi. Amakuru yatangirwaga ku gihe, benshi mu nzobere bagashimangira ko Amerika n’ibihugu byo mu burengerazuba muri rusange byananiwe kugira icyo bikora. Twari tubizi mbere, biba na nyuma  “Mu Ntambara ya Kabiri y’Isi Yose, amenshi mu mahano yuzuye ya jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi yamenyekanaga nyuma y’ibyabaye. Ariko mu Rwanda, twari tubizi mbere, mu gihe  yabaga, na nyuma”, uyu ni Ted Dagne, wari umushakashatsi  wa Serivisi y’ubushakashatsi y’Inteko nshinga amategeko ya Amerika wari warageze no mu Rwanda mu bushakashatsi. Ati: “Twari tubizi, ariko ntitwashatse kugira icyo dukora.” Mu ibaruwa yanditswe guhera ku ya 19 Kamena 1994, umunyamabanga mukuru w’umuryango w’abibumbye icyo gihe, Boutros Boutros-Ghali, yerekanye ko arakajwe n’umubare w’ingabo z’amahoro ibihugu bigize uyu muryango byari byiteguye gutanga. Boutros yagaragazaga ko ibihugu birimo kugenda biguru ntege mu gutanga ibyari bikenewe ku buryo byari gufata amezi atatu kugirango ubumwa bwagutse bwa MINUAR burimo no gutabara bube bwashoboka. Mu kwezi kumwe gusa, nibwo ingabo za RPF zari zimaze gufata igihugu no guhagarika jenoside amahanga akibaza icyo yakora. Biragaragara ko, kunanirwa kw’ibihugu bigize uyu muryango gutanga bidatinze ibikoresho bikenewe kugira ngo ishyirwa mu bikorwa rya manda yagutse, UNAMIR (Umuryango w’abibumbye ishinzwe ubufasha mu Rwanda) ntishobora kuba mu mwanya, mu gihe cy’amezi atatu, kugira ngo ikore neza. imirimo yashinzwe. " Ubufasha bwa Amerika bw’ingabo zitabara byihuse Dagne wakoranaga n’inteko ishinga amategeko ya Amerika icyo gihe avuga ko iyo ubuyobozi bwa Clinton busaba inteko kohereza ingabo zo gutabara byihuse mu Rwanda inteko iba yaramushyigikiye. Ibi byemezwa n’amabaruwa yaturutse mu matsinda abiri ya Kongere. "Twanditse kugira ngo tugaragaze ko dushyigikiye cyane uruhare rwa Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika mu gufasha gukemura ibibazo biri mu Rwanda,” ibi ni ibyanditswe n’Umurepubulikani Bob Torricelli wari uhagarariye New Jersey mu ibaruwa yo kuwa 20 Mata 1994, ikaba yarashyizweho umukono n’Abarepubulikani ndetse n’Abademokarate. Muri iyi baruwa bakomezaga bagira bati: “Urebye ko abantu bagera ku 20.000 bamaze gupfa kugeza ubu mu makimbirane ababaje, ni ngombwa ko Amerika yihatira guhagarika kumena amaraso no kugeza impande zombi ku meza y’ibiganiro.” The Christian Science Monitor ikavuga ko ariko kenshi na kenshi Perezida Clinton yasubizaga asaba guverinoma ndetse n’inyeshyamba guhagarika ubugizi bwa nabi ubwabo, agasaba ko ubutumwa bw’amahoro bw’umuryango w’abibumbye mu Rwanda , butari bufite ibikoresho buhagije , bwari bwo buryo bwiza bwo kuyobora inzira y’amahoro. "Ku ya 22 Mata ... White House yasohoye itangazo rikomeye risaba ko ingabo z’u Rwanda na RPF bikora ibishoboka byose mu bushobozi bwabo mu guhagarika ubugizi bwa nabi byihuse ," ibi n’ibyo Bill Clinton yandikiye Depite Harry Johnston (D) wo muri Floride. Bivugwa ko icyo gihe Inteko sihinga amategeko ya Amerika yahangaga amaso perezida, White House nay o igahanga amaso Umuryango w’Abibumbye, bikarangira nta kintu gikozwe ahubwo jenoside igakomeza. Dagne avuga ko ku musozo w’ubuyobozi bwa Clinton, bwakoze raporo u Rwanda rukaza ku mwanya wa mbere w’ibibazo byabunaniye, kikaba ari ikimenyetso cy’uko babyemera ubwabo. Uyu avuga ko niba hari isomo ryavuye ku Rwanda, ari uko umuryango mpuzamahanga ugomba kwirinda kwirinda kwizeza ko ufite ubushake cyangwa ushoboye gutabara abaturage mu makimbirane. Asanga icya ngombwa ari ukubaka ubushobozi bw’abantu ubwabo kugira ngo bazirinde ubwabo ko bazatabarwa n’abandi bavuye hanze. Iri kandi akaba ari isomo ku Banyarwanda n’Abanyafurika muri rusange ryashimangiwe na RPF ubwo yafataga iya mbere akaba ari yo ihagarika jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi mu gihe amahanga yari akirimo aribaza ku nyito yaha ubwo bwicanyi bwakorwaga, ndetse n’icyakorwa kuko iyo itahaba wa mugani nta n’uwo kubara inkuru wari gusigara.

title: Itariki 10 Mata 1994: Umwe mu minsi itazibagirana aho Abatutsi 7,564 biciwe muri Kiliziya ya Gahanga
article_text:
Itariki 10 Mata 1994: Umwe mu minsi itazibagirana aho Abatutsi 7,564 biciwe muri Kiliziya ya Gahanga

 Itariki ya 10 Mata 1994 ni imwe mu matariki yabayeho ubwicanyi bukomeye mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu uhereye muri Kigali nk’aho Abatutsi basaga 7,000 biciwe muri Kiliziya ya Gahanga, Abahoze barinda perezida habyarimana nabo ntibatinye kurasa ku Bitaro bya Faisal, muri rusange kuri uyu munsi imirambo igera mu 10,000 ikaba yarabaruwe y’abantu bishwe kuri uyu munsi muri Kigali gusa. Mu bice bitandukanye kuri iyi tariki ya 10 Mata mu 1994  Abatutsi bishwe mu buryo butagira ingano. Icyo gihe nibwo abasirikare barindaga Perezida Habyarimana barashe ibisasu bikomeye ku Bitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faisal, bica abarwayi 29, abandi bagera kuri 70 barakomereka. Uyu munsi kandi Abatutsi babarirwa mu 7564 biciwe kuri Kiliziya Gatolika ya Gahanga mu yahoze ari Komini Kanombe, abarenga 2522 bicirwa i Karembure, muri Gahanga. Komisiyo y’Igihugu ishinzwe Kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG, ivuga ko ibitero byabishe byabaga biyobowe n’uwungirije Burugumestri muri Komini Kanombe n’abapolisi ba Komini, hiyongeyeho uwari Konseye wa Gahanga akaba yarahoze mu gisirikare ndetse n’abandi bantu bavuye mu gisirikare aribo Zirarushya, Kimonyo François, wongeyeho abasirikare bari barinze ikiraro cya Kanzenze n’abari ku musozi wa Rebero barindaga RADAR bose bahurira i Gahanga. Abatutsi bari bahungiye ku biro bya Komini Gashora no mu kigo cya ISAR Karama (ubu ni mu Murenge wa Riririma), icyo gihe nabo barishwe bose. Uhereye kuri iyi tariki ya 10 kugeza ku ya 15 Mata 1994, Abatutsi bajyanwaga kwicwa n’abasirikare muri Camp GP ku Kimihurura. Abari bahungiye ku Bitaro bya Kiziguro (ubu ni mu karere ka Gatsibo), nabo nibwo bishwe. Mu mujyi wa Kigali kandi Abatutsi bari bahungiye ku Bigega bya Gatsata, barishwe. Uvuye muri Kigali, muri Komini Ngororero na Giciye ku Gisenyi, interahamwe zaho zishe Abatutsi bagera mu 14 500 bari bahungiye ku Ngoro ya Muvoma (MRND Palace) harokoka abantu babiri gusa. Abatutsi bari bahungiye ku ishuri ribanza rya Gikumba muri Bumbogo, nabo barishwe kuri iyi tariki. Uyu munsi nibwo Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu Rwanda, yafunze imiryango yayo maze Ambasaderi Rawson hamwe n’Abanyamerika 250 barahungishwa. Kuri iyi tariki kandi nibwo Archbishop Giuseppe Bertello, wari ushinzwe ibijyanye na dipolomasi muri Kiliziya Gaturika yavuye mu Rwanda asubira iwabo mu Butaliyani. Yari yarageze mu Rwanda ku itariki 12 Mutarama 1991 yoherejwe guhagararira ibijyanye na dipolomasi muri Kiliziya Gaturika, ahegera asanga ibijyanye n’amoko byarimitwe mu gihugu kubera ubutegetsi bwari buriho. Imibiri ivangavanze n’inkomere igera ku 10,000 yatoraguwe mu mihanda ya Kigali maze ijyanwa mu bitaro binyuranye ngo harebwe ko harimo abazima bashobora kuvurwa. Kuri Kiliziya Gatulika ya Ruhuha no mu nkengero zayo muri Komini Ngenda, muri Bugesera; kuri iyi tariki hiciwe Abatutsi bagera ku 10,000. Abatutsi bagera ku 10,000 bari bahungiye kuri Komini Gashora no ku kiyaga cya Rumira na Kidogo muri Bugesera nabo bishwe n’Impuzamugambi zifatanyije n’Interahamwe kuri uyu munsi. Kuri iyi tariki kandi hibukwa ko ari bwo izindi ngabo z’Inkotanyi zari ziturutse i Byumba zageze muri CND zije gufasha izindi zari zihasanzwe zari zatangiye ibikorwa byo kurokora bamwe mu bicwaga muri Kigali. Mu Bitaro bya Kigali (Byitwaga CHK) naho hiciwe abarwayi bagera ku 100 bishwe n’ingabo za leta, mu gihe i Cyangugu Abatutsi b’i Kangazi muri Nkanka bari barimo kurohwa mu Kiyaga cya Kivu. Muri iki gihe rero u Rwanda n’Isi byibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ku nshuro ya 26, iyi tariki ya 10 Mata ikaba ari imwe mu matariki adashobora kwibagirana cyane cyane ku bantu bagiye barokokera mu bice twavuze haruguru.

title: 1959: Amataragiti abiba urwango ku Batutsi
article_text:
1959: Amataragiti abiba urwango ku Batutsi

 Amataragiti (ibipapuro bidafite umukono) abiba urwango ku Batutsi yadutse muri Gicurasi 1959. Aya mataragiti bitazwi abayandikaga, yandikwaga n’abantu byagaragara ko bari mu Ishyaka rya APROSOMA (Association pour La Promotion de la Masse). Umwanditsi Antoine Mugesera mu gitabo cye IMIBEREHO Y’ABATUTSI KURI REPUBULIKA YA MBERE N’IYA KABIRI (2004), avuga ko umuporosoma icyo gihe byabaga bivuze "Umwanzi w’umwami". Ni ingingo isunikira usomye itaragiti ko nta kabuza Abatutsi bashyigikiye umwami ari bo bayanditse. Imwe muri taragiti yahamagariraga abantu intambara yo kurwanya APROSOMA yagiraga iti "  Aprosoma irwanya Kalinga izatsindwa n’imbaga y’inyabutatu. Aprosoma yanga u Rwanda n’umwami warwo izatsindwa. Taragiti zahamagariraga Abahutu kwanga Abatutsi Muri izi taragiti nk’uko iki gitabo gikomeza kivuga, hari iyabonetse ku Ndiza muri Nzeri 1959. Iyi kandi yanabonetse mu Ruhengeri no ku Gisenyi yitirirwa ko yanditswe n’Abatutsi. Mugesera avuga ko  izi taragiti zari zaranditswe n’abaparmmehutu bagamije " Gushyushya imitwe y’Abahutu ngo bakunde bange Abatutsi." Taragiti y’ i Nyanza kuwa 25 Ukwakira 1959 yitirwe Abarunar maze ishyira hanze abo yitaga " Abanzi b’u Rwanda". Aba barimo: P. Bwanakweri, L. Ndazaro, Muhikira Aloys, B. Murangwa, A. Makuza n’abandi. Iyi taragiti yavugaga ko aba banga umwami kandi ko bagomba gushakirwa hasi kubura hejuru. Kuwa 17 Ukwakira 1960, taragiti yabonetse ku isoko ry’i Rwamagana. Iyi yamagananaga umucuruzi witwa Munyabuhoro, isaba ko abantu batazongera kugurira mu iduka rye kuko ari umwanzi w’umwami. Ibi ngo byose byandikwaga bigamije kubiba urwango ku batutsi. Bitanga ubutumwa ko bafite umugambi wo kwibasira Abahutu bitwaga abanzi b’Umwami. Uku kuvuga ko hari abahigwa bukware, ko hari abatazongera kugurirwa ibicuruzwa ni ikintu cyatuma Abahutu banga Abatutsi. Muri iki gitabo, Antoine Mugesera abigarukaho (P.27) avuga ko Parmehutu na Aprosoma banditse amataragiti bakayanyanyagiza ahantu byari bzwi ko hatuwe cyane muri iyo myaka. Atanga urugero rw’ahantu taragiti zatanzwe bitewe n’uko habaga abantu besnhi. Harimo: Kabgayi, Kigali, Ruhengeri na Gisenyi kandi hose bikitwa ko zanditwe n’Abatutsi. Taragiti muri rusange n’ubwo bigoye kwemeza abazandikaga, bizwi nka bumwe mu buryo bwakoreshejwe mu kugeza ubutumwa ku bantu benshi, hagamijwe guhembera urwango ku Batutsi.

title: 1972: Shyogwe na Byimana Abatutsi barakubiswe ngo baratoneshwa
article_text:
1972: Shyogwe na Byimana Abatutsi barakubiswe ngo baratoneshwa

 Mu Mvururu zabaye mu 1972 kugeza mu 1973, Abatutsi bari mu bigo by’amashuri nk’ i Shyogwe, i Nyamasheke, i Save na Byimana bakubiswe n’abanyeshuri b’abahutu babashinjaga ko batoneshejwe.
 Umwanditsi Antoine Mugesera mu gitabo cye IMIBEREHO Y’ABATUTSI KURI REPUBULIKA YA MBERE N’IYA KABIRI (2004) avuga ko Abatutsi bakubiswe baziraga ko batonnye ku bayobozi b’ibigo by’amashuri bigamo. Shyogwe i Gitarama (Muhanga) mu kwezi kwa Gicurasi nk’uko iki gitabo kibivuga, Diregiteri witwaga E. Sisley, abarimu na pasiteri Cyinyanza ntibishimiwe n’abanyeshuri b’Abahutu bavugaga ko batonesha bagenzi babo b’Abatutsi. Icyo gihe, abanyeshuri b’Abatutsi barakubiswe mu kwezi kwa Mata na Gicurasi mu 1972. Ibi byabaviriyemo guhitamo gutaha bareka ishuri. Mu Byimana kuwa 15 Ukuboza 1972, abanyeshuri bo mu Byimana bigaga mu ishuri ry’abarimu nabo barigaragambije. Aba banze Diregiteri Alvarus n’abarimu bose bahereye ku Batutsi ndetse bangiza n’imitungo y’abaturage. Save  mu Kuboza 1972 , abanyeshuri b’Abahutu barigaragambije bakomeretsa Diregiteri wabo witwaga Frere Richard. Bakomerekeje umuyobozi wabo Nsengimana Evase n’ubwo yari umuhutu kuko ngo yari adashyigikiye ko bakubita bagenzi babo b’Abatutsi Si muri ayo mashuri gusa arondorwa muri iki gitabo gusa yabayemo gukubita Abatutsi. Byarabaye i Nyamasheke mu Gushyingo 1972 ku ishuri ryitwa St Cyprien. Abanyeshuri ngo bakoze igisa n’imigumuko bavuga ko batishimiye ubuyobozi burimo Abatutsi. Iri shuri ryarafunze kubera ako kaduruvayo. Mu banyeshuri b’Abatutsi bikomwe harimo: Barore Bernabe, Nogeyabahizi Jean Nepo, Kayiranga Prudence, Polisi Athanase n’abandi benshi Antoine Mugesera agarukaho muri iki gitabo. Amazina y’aba bose yasohotse kuri taragiti yo kuwa 12 Ukuboza 1972 yari ifite umutwe ugira uti " Abahutu baracyarengana i Nyamsheke." Ibi byose bigaragaza umuco wo kudahana wari umaze kwimakazwa mu migiririre y’abantu. Abanyeshuri bagakora amakosa ariko ntibahanwe n’ubutegetsi. Umuco wo kudahana nawo kuri ubu ufatwa nk’uwagize uruhare mu gutuma no gushyigikira ishyirwa mu bikorwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994.

title: Muyaga: Imvugo yakoreshejwe mu kugabanya uburemere ku imeneshwa ry’Abatutsi
article_text:
Muyaga: Imvugo yakoreshejwe mu kugabanya uburemere ku imeneshwa ry’Abatutsi

 Inyito "Muyaga" yatangiye gukoreshwa mu Gushyingo 1959 ubwo hatangiraga imvururu zo gutwikira Abatutsi mu Rwanda. Nkuko umwanditsi Antoine Mugesera mu gitabo cye  IMIBEREHO Y’ABATUTSI KURI REPUBULIKA YA MBERE N’IYA KABIRI (2004)  avuga, izi mvururu zabanje kwitwa “ Muyaga”. Uyu mwanditsi avuga ko iyi mvugo ari yo yaje guhindurwamo icyiswe revolusiyo (impinduramatwara) yo mu 1959 na n’ubu itavugwaho rumwe. Mugesera avuga ko  Muyaga yazanwe na politiki y’amacakubiri, iza ishingiye ku cyo yise uburozi bw’abazungu, batamitse abagiye kwiga mu mashuri n’amadini yabo. Agaragaza ko Muyaga itatangijwe n’uko Sushefu Mbonyumutwa akubitiwe urushyi mu Byimana kuwa 1 Ugushyingo 1959. Ibi abishingira ku kuba na mbere ye hari abandi basushefu bagiye bakubitwa. Muri Muyaga, hatwitswe amazu yAbatutsi ahantu hatandukanye mu Rwanda. Harimo: Ku ndiza; aho Abatutsi badafite aho bahuriye n’ikubitwa rya Mbonyumutwa cyangwa n’urundi rugomo rwakorewe abandi bantu. Kuwa 3 Ugushyingo, nk’uko iki gitabo gikomeza kivuga, igitero cyibasiye kwa Shefu Gashagaza watwaraga Ndiza, bica Abatutsi bane, abandi barakomereka. Hagabwe kandi igitero muri Gitarama cyane muri Komini Nyamabuye. Hanashenywe kandi ingoro y’Umugabekazi Kankazi muri icyo gihe cya Muyaga. Iki gitabo kirondora ahantu henshi hatwitswe icyo gihe, bitashoboka  ko hagarukwaho mu nkuru. Gukoresha ijambo "Muyaga" ni ukoroshya uburemere bw’ibyakorwaga
 Umwe mu basomyi b’iki gitabo, umusaza Gahutu Augustin avuga ko asanga inyito “Muyaga” yakoreshejwe mu rwego rwo kugabanya ubukana bw’ibibi byakorerwaga Abatutsi. Birazwi ko umuyaga ari ikintu kiza, kigahita. Kwita ibikorwa by’urugomo, gutwika no  gusahura “ Muyaga” ni ugushaka kumvikanisha ko ibyabaga ari ibintu bidakarishye, ari ibihita by’igihe gito. Ibi bikorwa byiswe Muyaga nyuma byiswe revolusiyo ndetse bisiga Abatutsi benshi bahungiye mu bihugu bituranye n’u Rwanda. Ibikorwa biswe ko ari ibihita ntibyakabaye byarabaye impamvu yo guhunga kw’Abatutsi cyangwa se ngo n’urundi ruhande rubihereho ruvuga ko rwakoze revolusiyo. Iyo koko biba ari ibyoroshye, ntihakabaye haritabajwe ingabo zo guhangana n’abatwika  ziturutse i Nyanza no mu bindi bice mu gihe Ababiligi bo bareberaga. Nta gushidikanya ko gukoresha imvugo “ Muyaga" byari bigamije kumvikanisha ko ari ikintu kigiye kuza ariko kigahita kigenda, bityo ko nta we ukwiriye kugiha uburemere.

title: Byinshi kuri Bashar al-Assad ukomeje ubutegetsi bumaze imyaka 50 mu muryango
article_text:
Byinshi kuri Bashar al-Assad ukomeje ubutegetsi bumaze imyaka 50 mu muryango

 Yize neza, ajya ku butegetsi ku myaka 34 aburazwe na se, aba perezida atarigeze atekereza kuba umunyapolitiki, abumazeho imyaka 20. Nta wundi ni Perezida Bashar al-Assad wa Syria, uhanganye n’abarambiwe ubutegetsi bwe kuva mu 2011, tugiye kugarukaho n’umuryango we umaranye ubutegetsi imyaka 50 twifashishije amavomo atandukanye nka Wikipedia, Biography.com, Insideover.com, The guardian n’andi. Bashar al-Assad ni muntu ki? 

Akiri umusore Yavutse ku itariki 11 Nzeri mu 1965, ariko ntiyigeze agira igitekerezo cyo kwinjira mu buzima bwa politiki cyangwa kuzaba Perezida wa Syria. Urupfu rwa mukuru we na se wari ufite imibare myinshi byatumye yisanga ku butegetsi. Nubwo yari yitezweho kuzazana impinduka mu gihugu akinjiza Syria mu kinyejana cya 21 nk’igihugu gitandukanye n’icyo yarazwe, yaje gutera ikirenge mu cya se bituma benshi bifuza impinduka ndetse bijyana igihugu mu ntambara hagati y’abaturage. 
 Ubuzima bwe Amazina ye yose ni bashar Hafez al-Assad, akaba umuhungu wa kabiri w’uwahoze ari pererezida wa Syria, Hafez al-Assad n’umugore we, Anisa, Hafez  yari yaragiye akusanya imbaraga binyuze mu gisirikare no mu ishyaka rya ba nyamucye bo mu bwoko bwa Alawite ryari ku butegetsi kuva mu 1963. Urubuga insideover.com ruvuga ko Hafez yagiye aba umuntu w’ingenzi muri iri shyaka ryitwa "Ba’ath", maze ku itariki 13 Ugushyingo 1970 agategura ihirika ry’ubutegetsi akaba ari we ubufata. Guverinoma ya Hafez yabanje gushyira imbere igihugu irushaho no kwiyegereza Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyete. Hafez yagiye ku butegetsi abifashijwemo n’abasirikare bo mu bwoko bwe bwa Alawite, afata ubutegetsi bwa gisivili abuhindura ubwa gisirikare, arangije ayoboza igihugu inkoni y’icyuma imyaka 30 nk’uko bitangazwa na Biography.com ndetse na Wikipedia. Bivugwa ko Bashar al-Assad yakuze ari umuntu ucecetse kandi wizigama, agakurira mu gicucu cya mukuru we, Bassel wagombaga kuzasimbura se iyo ataza gupfa azize impanuka. 

Umurwa Mukuru Damasiko ibice bimwe byawo bitaribasirwa ’intambara Bashar yize amashuri yisumbuye mu ishuri rivanze ry’Abarabu n’Abafaransa rya al-Hurriya School muri Damasiko (Damascus), aho yigiye kuvuga neza Igifaransa n’Icyongereza akarangiza mu 1982 mbere yo kujya muri Kaminuza ya Damasiko aho yize ubuganga akarangiza amasomo ye mu 1988. Yahise ajya kwihugurira mu bijyanye n’ubuvuzi bw’amaso ku Bitaro bya Gisirikare bya Tishreen hanze ya Damasiko, nyuma yerekeza mu Bwongereza gukarishya muri Western Eye Hospital muri London mu 1992. 

Bashar al-Assad akiri muto Muri iki gihe, Bashar yari abayeho nk’umunyeshuri mu by’ubuganga, nta gitekerezo aragira cyo kwinjira mu buzima bwa politiki. Ise, Hafez al-Assad, yari yaratangiye gutegura umuhungu we mukuru Bassel nka Perezida utaha wa Syria. Ariko, mu 1994, Bassel yaje kugwa mu mpanuka y’imodoka, bihita biba ngombwa ko Bashar asabwa gutaha agasubira i Damasiko, aho ubuzima bwe bwahise butangira guhinduka bugafata ikindi cyerekezo, se agatangira kumutegurira byihuse kandi bucece kuzamusimbura. 
 Umuryango wa Al-Assad mu 1993. Imbere abicaye ni ise, Hafez n’umugore we Anisa. Inyuma uhereye ibumoso: Maher, Bashar, Bassel, Majd na Bushra Ikintu cya mbere yakoze, ni ukumwohereza mu Ishuri rya Gisirikare rya Homs, mu majyaruguru ya Damasiko, ahita atangira kugenda azamurwa mu ntera mu myaka itanu aba ageze ku ipeti rya colonel. Muri iki gihe, yabaye umujyanama wa se, akajya yumva ibirego by’abaturage, ndetse ayobora ubukangurambaga bwo kurwanya ruswa bwamufashije kwikiza benshi mu bataramwiyumvagamo. Bashar al-Assad ku butegetsi Hafez al-Assad yaje gupfa ku itariki 10 Kamena mu 2000. mu minsi yakurikiye urupfu rwe, Inteko ishinga Amategeko ya Syria yahise itora kugabanya imyaka umukuru w’igihugu agomba kuba yujuje iva kuri 40 igera kuri 34 kugirango Bashar abashe kwemererwa kuyobora. Nyuma y’iminsi 10 ise apfuye, Bashar yahise atangira manda ye y’imyaka 7, aho mu matora yitabiriye wenyine yagize amajwi 97%. Yanagizwe umuyobozi w’ishyaka Ba’ath ndetse aba n’Umugaba Mukuru w’Ikirenga w’ingabo z’igihugu. Bashar niwe muyobozi w’igihugu cy’abarabu wari muto muri icyo gihe. Benshi bumvaga azazana impinduka mu gihugu cya Syria cyari kimaze igihe kiyoboreshejwe igitugu. Bashingiraga ku kuba yarize neza, bakumva azabasha guhindura ubutegetsi bw’inkoni y’icyuma bwa se akagira Syria igihugu kigezweho. 
 Ku ikubitiro kandi yasaga nk’uzazana impinduramatwara ishingiye ku muco muri Syria. Yari yabanje gutangaza ko "Demokarasi ari igikoresho kiganisha ku buzima bwiza", ariko anongeraho ko idashobora kwinjizwa huti huti muri Syria. Mu mwaka we wa mbere ku butegetsi, yijeje kuzarandura ruswa muri guverinoma, ndetse no kujyana Syria mu ikoranabuhanga rya mudasobwa, internet na telephone ngendanwa biranga ikinyejana cya 21. Ubwo Bashar yafataga ubutegetsi, ubukungu bw’igihugu bwari bugeze aharindimuka. Ahanini byari byaratewe n’isenyuka rya Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyete mu 1991, zari zimaze imyaka zitera inkunga iki gihugu. Ihungabana rikomeye hagati muri za 90 ariko ryongerewe na Siriya isesagura amafaranga yinjizaga avuye muri peteroli yayo, iyashora ku gisirikare. Ariko, muri za 2001, Syria yeretse benshi ibimenyetso by’umuryango ujyanye n’igihe, hagaragaramo za telephone ngendanwa, televiziyo za satellite, amaresitora ajyanye n’igihe ndetse na za internet cafes. 
 Nubwo bimeze bityo ariko, ivugurura ry’ubukungu ryagaragaye ko bigoye kugerwaho mu gihe leta igenzura inzego zose z’ubukungu. Nyuma y’umwaka wa mbere ari perezida, menshi mu mavugurura mu bukungu Bashar yari yarasezeranyije ntabwo yabaye. ruswa nyinshi mu nzego za guverinoma yatumye abikorera babura uko bazamuka, kandi Bashar yasaga nk’udashoboye gukora impinduka zikenewe zahindura Syria n’abaturage bayo miliyoni 17 zibinjiza mu kinyejana cya 21. Mu bibazo mpuzamahanga, Bashar yahuye n’ibibazo byinshi se yahuye nabyo: umubano uhindagurika na Isiraheli, ibikorwa bya gisirikare muri Libani, amakimbirane na Turukiya ku burenganzira bw’amazi, ndetse no kumva adatekanye bitewe no kumva nta jambo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati. Abasesenguzi benshi bavuga ko Bashar yakomeje politiki y’ububanyi n’amahanga ya se, atanga inkunga itaziguye ku mitwe yitwara gisirikare nka Hamas, Hezbollah na Jihad ya Kisilamu, nubwo Siriya yagiye ibihakana  ku mugaragaro. 
 Nubwo kuva muri Libani buhoro buhoro byatangiye mu 2000, byihutishijwe nyuma yuko Siriya ishinjwe kugira uruhare mu iyicwa ry’uwahoze ari Minisitiri w’intebe wa Libani, Rafik Hariri. Ibyo birego byatumye muri Libani haba imyigaragambyo, ndetse n’igitutu mpuzamahanga cyo gukurayo ingabo zose. Kuva icyo gihe, umubano n’ibihugu by’iburengerazuba ndetse n’ibihugu byinshi by’Abarabu wagiye urushaho kumera nabi. Nubwo yari yarasezeranyije kandi amavugurura mu bijyanye n’uburenganzira bwa muntu, ntacyahindutse cyane kuva Bashar al-Assad yajya ku butegetsi. Mu mwaka wa 2006, Siriya yaguye ikoreshwa ry’ibihano by’ingendo ku batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, ibuza benshi kwinjira cyangwa kuva mu gihugu. Mu 2007, Inteko ishinga amategeko ya Syria yemeje itegeko risaba ibisobanuro ku bintu byose bivugirwa mu ruhame. Muri 2008, na none no muri 2011, imbuga nkoranyambaga nka YouTube na Facebook zarahagaritswe. Imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu yatangaje ko abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwa Bashar al-Assad bakorerwa iyicarubozo, bagafungwa kandi bakicwa. Intambara hagati y’abaturage Nyuma y’ihinduka ry’ubutegetsi ryagenze neza muri Tuniziya, Misiri na Libiya, mu cyiswe "Arab Spring" imyigaragambyo yatangiye muri Syria ku ya 26 Mutarama 2011, isaba ko habaho amavugurura muri politiki, kugarura uburenganzira bw’abaturage no guhagarika ibihe bidasanzwe (state of emergency) byariho kuva mu 1963. Barakajwe no kutagira icyo ikora kwa guverinoma imyigaragambyo yarakwirakwiriye kandi yitabirwa n’abantu benshi. Muri Gicurasi 2011, ingabo za Syria zakoresheje imbaraga z’umurengera mu gucubya iyo myigaragambyo mu mujyi wa Homs no mu nkengero za Damasiko. Muri Kamena, Bashar yasezeranyije inama y’umushyikirano n’amatora mashya y’abadepite, ariko nta mpinduka zabaye imyigaragambyo irakomeza. Muri uko kwezi, abarwanashyaka batavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bashyizeho "Inama y’igihugu" yo kuyobora Impinduramatwara ya Siriya. 
 Mu mpeshyi ya 2011, ibihugu byinshi byari biri gusaba Perezida Bashar al-Assad kwegura kandi Umuryango w’Abarabu uhagarika Syria, bituma leta ya Syria yemera ko indorerezi z’Abarabu zinjira muri icyo gihugu. Muri Mutarama 2012, ibiro ntaramakuru by’Abongereza, Reuters, byatangaje ko abaturage barenga 5.000 bishwe n’umutwe witwara gisirikare ushyigikiwe na Syria (Shabeeha), kandi ko abantu 1.000 bishwe n’ingabo zirwanya ubutegetsi. Muri Werurwe, Umuryango w’Abibumbye wemeje gahunda y’amahoro yateguwe n’uwahoze ari Umunyamabanga wa Loni, Kofi Annan, ariko ntibyahagaritse ubugizi bwa nabi. 
 Muri Kamena 2012, Umuyobozi w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yavuze ko iyo myigaragambyo yahindutse intambara hagati y’abaturage. Amakimbirane yarakomeje, buri munsi hakumvikana amakuru y’iyicwa ry’abasivili benshi bicwa n’ingabo za leta, ndetse n’ibirego bivuguruzanya by’ubutegetsi bwa al-Assad buhakana ibyo birego. Muri Kanama 2013, al-Assad yamaganwe n’abayobozi ku Isi, barimo uwari Perezida wa Amerika, Barack Obama na Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza, David Cameron, ashinjwa gukoresha intwaro z’ubumara ku baturage. Icyakora, Bashar yabashije guhagarika ibikorwa by’amahanga yafashaga abamurwanya abifashijwemo na Perezida w’u Burusiya, Vladimir Putin, wemeye gufasha mu gukuraho ububiko bwa Syria bw’intwaro z’ubumara. 
 Perezida Bashar al-Assad yongeye gutorwa muri Kamena 2014 akomeza urugamba rwo kurwanya abamwigometseho ari nako yamagana amahanga yamusabaga kuva ku butegetsi. Yarushijeho kwizera kuguma ku butegetsi muri Nzeri muri uyu mwaka ubwo u Burusiya bwemeraga kumuha inkunga ya gisirikare yose yifuza. Muri Gashyantare 2016, amakimbirane yo muri Syria yari amaze kugwamo abantu 470,000, ndetse havuka ibiganiro mpuzamahanga ku kuntu impunzi zibarirwa mu mamiliyoni z’Abanya-Syria zizitabwaho. Muri Mata 2017, nyuma y’amakuru y’izindi ntwaro z’ubumara zakoreshejwe ku baturage, Perezida mushya w’Amerika, Donald Trump, yategetse ibitero by’indege ku birindiro bya Syria , byamaganwa cyane na al-Assad n’inshuti ze nk’u Burusiya na Irani. 
 Nyuma y’umwaka umwe, muri Mata 2018, hagaragaye andi amashusho menshi agaragaza Abanyasiriya bapfuye cyangwa bababaye mu gihe havugwaga ko al-Assad yongeye gukoresha intwaro z’ubumara. Nk’uko imitwe yitwara gisirikare yo muri ako karere yavuagaga, kajugujugu zari zasutse ingungurunza bombe zuzuyemo ibyuka by’ubumara ku mujyi wa Douma, umujyi wa nyuma wari usigaye mu maboko y’abarwanya ubutegetsi mu burasirazuba bwa Ghouta abantu byibuze basaga 40. gusa igenzura ryigenga kuri uko kwicisha abaturage ibyuka bihumanya ryarabuze, Syria n’u Burusiya nabyo bihakana ibyo bitero bavuga ko byagabwe n’inyeshyamba z’Abanyasyria. Atitaye kuri ibyo bisobanuro, Perezida Trump we yararakaye yita al-Assad "inyamaswa" ndetse anenga Putin ku mugaragaro, ibintu bidakunze kuba, amushinja kurinda umuyobozi wa Syria. Mu gitondo cya kare cyo ku ya 14 Mata, Ingabo z’Abanyamerika, Abongereza n’Abafaransa zagabye ibitero kuri Syria, byibasira ahantu habiri hatunganyirizwa intwaro z’ubumara n’Ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi mu bya siyansi. Hagati aho, raporo y’umuryango w’abibumbye yasanze Koreya ya Ruguru yarohereje muri Syria inshuro zigera kuri 40 ibikoresho byo gukora intwaro z’ubumara hagati hagati ya 2012 na 2017. Muri Kamena 2018, ibiro ntaramakuru bya Koreya ya Ruguru, KCNA byo byatangaje ko al-Assad yiteguraga uruzinduko rw’akazi muri Koreya ya Ruguru ateganya guhura na Kim Jong-un. 
 Mu gusoza, ushobora kwibaza uti ko intambara ikomeje kurimbura igihugu cye akaba ari umusirikare kuki Assad adakunze kugaragara mu mpuzankano ya gisirikare mu ruhame. Urubuga Insideover ruvuga ko impamvu nta yindi nari uko ari umuhanga mu gukoresha isura ye akaba ataba ashaka kugaragara nk’abanyagitugu b’Abarabu benewabo nka Saddam Hussein na Muammar Kadhafi. Uyu akunze kugaragara iteka yambaye ikoti, ndetse rimwe na rimwe yambaye umupira usanzwe bya gisivili.

title: Bimwe mu byaranze ubuzima bwa Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II watabarutse kuwa 02 Mata 2005
article_text:
Bimwe mu byaranze ubuzima bwa Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II watabarutse kuwa 02 Mata 2005

 Umwe mu bayobozi mu mateka y’Isi bakoze ingendo nyinshi, ni we muyobozi wa mbere ku Isi wemeje ko ubwicanyi bwakorwaga mu Rwanda mu 1994 ari jenoside, ndetse ni we muyobozi wa Kiliziya Gaturika rukumbi wasuye u Rwanda. Nta wundi ni Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II watabarutse ku itariki ya 02 Mata mu 2005. Umushumba wa Kiliziya Gaturika, Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II yari umwe mu bayobozi bayoboye isi mu mateka bakoze ingendo nyinshi kuko  yasuye ibihugu 129 mu gihe cy’ubupapa bwe birimo n’u Rwanda yasuye ku itariki 07 Nzeri 1990. Ari mu Rwanda hagati y’itariki ya 7 n’iya 9 Nzeri 1990,  yasuye ibice bitandukanye atanga ubutumwa bwiza, hari ibimenyetso yahakoreye, ndetse hari n’amasakaramentu yahatangiye ku buryo uyu munsi hakiri byinshi Abanyarwanda bamwibukiraho. Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II wavukiye muri Pologne ku itariki 18 Gicurasi 1920, amazina ye ari Karol Józef Wojtyła, niwe muyobozi ku Isi wemeje ko ubwicanyi bwakorerwaga Abatutsi mu Rwanda kuva mu 1990 bwagejeje ku bwicanyi karundura bwo mu 1994 bwari jenoside. Yasabye ko imirwano yahagarara mu Rwanda, yamagana ubwicanyi bwakozwe ku itariki ya 10 mata na 15 Gicurasi mu 1990. Mu 1995, ubwo yari mu gihugu cya Kenya, yari asuye ku nshuro ya gatatu, imbere y’imbaga y’abantu babarirwa mu 300,000 yasabye ko amakimbirane mu Rwanda no mu Burundi yarangira, hakabaho kubabarirana no kwiyunga nk’igisubizo cya jenoside yabaye. Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II niwe mupapa wa kabiri wayoboye Kiliziya gaturika igihe kirekire inyuma ya Papa Pius IX, ndetse aba na Papa wa mbere udakomoka mu Butaliyani kuva mu kinyejana cya 16. Yatorewe kuba Papa ku itariki 16 Ukwakira 1978, asimbura Papa Yohani Pawulo wa I wari watowe muri kanama muri uyu mwaka asimbura Papa Paul VI, wamaze iminsi 33 yonyine ku buyobozi. Nyuma y’imyaka micye atangiye kuyobora Kiliziya gaturika, ku itariki ya 13 Gicurasi 1981, ubwo yinjiraga ku rubuga rwitiriwe Mutagatifu Ptero, Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II yararashwe arakomereka bikomeye arashwe n’uwitwa Ali Ağca ukomoka muri Turkiya wabarizwaga mu mutwe w’intagondwa witwa "Grey Wolves". Uyu mwicanyi yakoresheje imbunda yo mu bwoko bwa pistol, arasa Papa mu nda, ahita ajyanwa ku bitaro byitwaga Gemelli Hospital, ariko mu nzira ajyanwa kwa muganga arazimira bitewe n’uko yari yatakaje amaraso menshi. abaganga bamumazeho amasaha atanu bamuvura ibikomere kubw’amahirwe babasha gutabara ubuzima bwe. Uyu mwicanyi Ağca wamurashe, Wikipedia ivuga ko amaze kumurasa yacakiwe n’umubikira akamugumana kugeza abapolisi bahageze bamuta muri yombi aza gukatirwa igihano cyo gufungwa burundu. Ubwo hari hashize iminsi ibiri habaye Noheri yo mu 1983, Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II yasuye Ağca muri gereza, baganira bonyine iminota igera kuri 20. Bamaze kuvugana, Papa yagize ati: "Ibyo twavuganyeho bizaba ngombwa ko bikomeza kuba ibanga hagati ye nanjye. Namuvugishije nk’umuvandimwe nababariye kandi nizeye byuzuye." Papa Yohani Pawulo wa II ni umwe mu bayoboye kiliziya gaturika bafite amateka maremare kandi utazibagirana kubera uruhare yagiye agira mu guharanira amahoro ku Isi nk’aho yari umwe mu bantu barwanyaga Ivanguraruhu ryo muri Afurika y’Epfo ku mugaragaro.

title: Amateka: Intambara hagati y’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani yahitanye abantu bari muri miliyoni 10
article_text:
Amateka: Intambara hagati y’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani yahitanye abantu bari muri miliyoni 10

 Joseph Staline wigeze kuyobora u Burusiya bukiri Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyete yigeze kugira ati: “Urupfu rw’umuntu ni amakuba. Urupfu rwa miliyoni ni imibare.” Ikibabaje, amateka asa nk’ayagaragaje ko ibyo uyu munyagitugu yavugaga yari mu kuri. Hari intambara zagiye zitwara miliyoni z’abantu nk’iyo tugiye kugarukaho hagati y’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani ariko usanga abantu baribagiwe. Ahari ibyo Staline yavuze ngo bishobora kuba bifite ukuri kuko ubwenge bw’abantu kenshi butabasha gupfa kwiyumvisha impfu z’abantu bagera kuri miliyoni cyangwa abarenze. 
 Urubuga Warhistoryonline dukesha iyi nkuru ruvuga ko Joseph Stalin yari umugabo uzi iby’impfu kuko yateje izibarirwa muri miliyoni ubwe kandi igihugu cye cyapfushije abantu babarirwa muri miliyoni 20 n’imisago ubwo cyarwanaga n’u Budage bwa Hitler. Nubwo abantu benshi mu burengerazuba bw’isi babizi, ngo Intambara y’Ubutita ifite ukuntu yoroheje ingaruka mbi z’intambara y’Isi cyangwa igasubiza inyuma urwego izo ngaruka zari gufatwamo. Uyu munsi, mu gihe uburengerazuba n’u Burusiya bisa nk’ibiri mu Ntambara nshya y’Ubutita, abantu benshi bafite amakuru bazi ko Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyete zapfushije abantu benshi kurusha ikindi gihugu icyo ari cyo cyose mu Ntambara ya II y’Isi. Gusa, ngo igitangaje n’uko abandi bantu benshi bitwa ko bafite amakuru batazi ko intambara hagati y’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani mu Ntambara ya Kabiri y’Isi, yahitanye byibuze abantu miliyoni 10. Nyuma gato y’Intambara ya II y’Isi, Ishyaka ry’Abakomunisiti mu Bushinwa rimaze kujya ku butegetsi, u Bushinwa bukarekeraho kuba inshuti y’Abanyaburengerazuba ahubwo bugahinduka umwanzi, ubwo buzima bw’abantu bishwe busa nk’ubutarahawe agaciro by’umwihariko mu burengerazuba. Kimwe no muri Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyete, no mu Bushinwa abapfuye cyane ni abasivili. Itsinda ry’impuguke ku myitwarire n’ibibera mu makimbirane “Oxford Companion to WWII”, ryavuze ko Abashinwa bishwe muri iyo ntambara bagera kuri miliyoni ebyiri. Iyi mibare ariko irakemangwa nubwo ari yo yatangajwe n’ubuyobozi ariko hatarimo iy’abantu bagiye baburirwa irengero n’abandi imirambo itagiye igaragara. Impamvu ngo Abashinwa ntibarwanaga n’Abayapani gusa, ahubwo nabo ubwabo bari mu ntambara hagati y’abaturage yahereye mu 1927 ikagera mu 1950. Ni mu gihe batangiye kurwana n’Abayapani mu 1937. Bivugwa ko hakozwe ubushakashatsi butandukanye ku mpfu zabereye mu Bushinwa icyo gihe, ariko abashakashatsi bakajya bahura n’imbogamizi zitandukanye nko kutabona imibare ibitse cyangwa yarabitswe nabi kubera icyaro, impamvu za politiki, igitutu n’ibindi. Gusa ngo ikizwi, nuko intambara mu Bushinwa yari iteye ubwoba kurusha uko abantu babyizera. Intambara hagati y’abaturage kenshi ziba ziteye ubwoba, ariko hiyongereyeho no guhangana n’Abayapani. 
 Guverinoma y’u Buyapani n’igisirikare muri icyo gihe byari byarateje imbere igitekerezo cyo kumvikanisha ko umuco n’ubwoko by’Abayapani biruta iby’abandi. Nubwo uko kwishyira hejuru kwakoreshwaga ku banzi b’u Buyapani bose haba mu Burayi cyangwa muri Aziya, mu Bushinwa ho byari umwihariko. Iyi myumvire ngo yabayeho ubwo u Buyapani mu ntangiriro z’1870 bwari bumaze kwiyubaka mu bukungu bukava ku bwami butarangwagamo uruganda na rumwe bumaze kuba kimwe mu bihugu by’ibihangange ku Isi. Mu 1896, u Buyapani bwakubise inshuro u Bushinwa ku rugamba. Kuva icyo gihe nabwo bwigarurira intara zabwo kimwe n’ibindi bihugu byo mu Burayi na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bitewe n’ukuntu Guverinoma z’u Bushinwa zari inyantege nke icyo gihe. Mu 1904 kugeza mu 1905, u Buyapani bwatsinze u Burusiya buhita buba igihugu cy’igihangange mu majyaruguru y’uburasirazuba bwa Aziya. Izo ntsinzi z’igisirikare cy’u Buyapani n’impinduka mu bukungu bwari bumaze kugeraho, byagiye birushaho kuzamura ayo marangamutima yo kwishyira hejuru yari amaze ibinyejana. 
 Mu 1931, Abayapani bateye Intara y’ u Bushinwa yigengaga bicagase yitwa Manchuria, bayigarurira bitabagoye kuko Abashinwa batabashije gushikama ngo barwane ku ntara yabo. Mu 1937, u Buyapani bwateye u Bushinwa nyirizina, aho abakurikiranye aya mateka bazi ikiswe “Rape of Nanjing”, ubwicanyi no gufata ku ngufu bikabije by’Abayapani byabaye kugeza mu 1938, bikarangira abantu 300,000 bahasize ubuzima. Iyi nkuru ya Nanjing ni imwe mu bintu byabaye hirya no hino ku nkombe zo mu burengerazuba bw’u Bushinwa mu Ntambara ya II y’Isi. Iri zina ryatewe n’uko uko gufata ku ngufu kenshi ngo kwakurikirwaga no kwica. Habaye ibintu biteye ubwoba birimo nk’ikiswe imyitozo ya bayoneti (Bayonet Practice) aho iyo myitozo yo gukoresha icyuma yakorerwaga ku bantu bazima, hagakorwa imisozi y’imirambo n’uduhanga tw’abantu, inkota z’abasirikare bakuru b’Abayapani zigahora zijojoba amaraso y’abagabo, abagore n’abana, n’andi mabi menshi yakozwe. 
 Bivugwa ko ibintu Abayapani bagiye bakora mu bice bitandukanye by’u Bushinwa babaga bagenzura nubwo amateka atabigarukaho cyane, byabaga biteye ubwoba bimeze nka filimi z’ikikango (Horror movies). Byarushijeho kuba bibi ubwo Igisirikare cy’u Buyapani cyatangizaga politiki izwi nka “The Three Alls” yashakaga kuvuga ngo “Bice bose, Twika byose, Sahura byose”. Nubwo iteka umuntu ashidikanya ku kugereranya ibyo byaha bya kinyamanswa, Abadage bagerageje guhisha jenoside bakoze. Abayapani bo ngo ntacyo bari bitayeho. “Three Alls” ngo yari amabwiriza igisirikare cyahawe. Nubwo kandi Abayapani batigeze bubaka ibigo byo kwiciramo nk’Abanazi, mu buryo bwinshi, ubwicanyi yari politiki izwi yemewe y’u Buyapani. 
 Bivugwa ko Abayapani bakoresheje intwaro z’ubumara nka ‘mustard gas’ n’izindi zagiye zikoreshwa n’Abayapani ku rugamba ndetse zikajya zigeragerezwa ku bantu. Kubera ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zashakaga kugira u Buyapani inshuti yo kwifashisha mu guhangana n’umuvuduko w’Abasoviyete muri Aziya benshi mu bakoze ibyo byaha ngo bacitse ubutabera ntibabihanirwa. U Bushinwa bumaze kuyoboka Komunizime mu 1949 bukitandukanya na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Buyapani nk’inshuti yazo, amabi yakozwe mu Bushinwa mu Ntambara ya II y’Isi yashyizwe mu mapaji y’inyuma mu bitabo by’amateka ariko mu Bushinwa bakomeje kubizirikana. Umuntu ashaka kumenya impamvu imibanire y’u Bushinwa n’u Buyapani itajya imera neza na gato bikaba byamusaba gusubira inyuma akareba uko byabanye hagati y’1931 kugeza mu 1945.

title: Liberia: Perezida Samuel Doe yakaswe ubugabo azira igitugu n’ubugome yakoze mu myaka 10 ku butegetsi
article_text:
Liberia: Perezida Samuel Doe yakaswe ubugabo azira igitugu n’ubugome yakoze mu myaka 10 ku butegetsi

 Samuel Kanyon Doe  wabaye perezida wa Liberia kuva mu 1980 kugeza mu 1990 ni umwe mu bategetsi bakoze ibikorwa bya kinyamanswa mu gikorwa cyo guhirika ubutegetsi yakoze muri Mata 1980, aho muri iki gikorwa Perezida William Tolbert n’abari bagize ubuyobozi bw’ishyaka “True Whig Party “ bose bahise bicwa, Doe wari Sergeant icyo gihe agahita ashyiraho akanama kamufasha kuyobora ndetse agahita yiha ipeti rya General, ariko birangira nawe urwo yishe Tolbert ari rwo yishwe akaswe ubugabo n’indi myanya yo kumubiri we kugeza apfuye. Akigera ku butegetsi, Doe yatesheje agaciro itegeko nshinga ryari rihari, amara imyaka itanu ayoboye igihugu gisirikare, bigeze mu 1985 ategeka ko habaho amatora arayatsinda aba ku mugaragaro perezida wa 21 wa Liberia. Aya matora ntiyavuzweho rumwe kuko yagaragayemo ibimenyetso byinshi by’uburiganya bwakozwe, ariko Doe akaba yari ashyigikiwe na Amerika kuko atacanaga uwaka n’Abasoviyete. Samuel Doe niwe Munya Liberia wa mbere wavukiye muri iki gihugu wabaye perezida mu mateka yacyo. Yakomokaga mu bwoko bwa Krahn, bugizwe ahanini n’abanyacyaro, mbere yo guhirika ubutegetsi mu 1980, aba bakaba bari baragiye bahezwa n’Abanya-Liberia bakomoka ku babyeyi baturutse muri Amerika. Aba Banyamerika babaga batakiri abacakara batangiye kwimuka basubira muri Afurika mu myaka y’1820, nibo bayoboye igihugu nyuma yo kubona ubwigenge mu 1847. 
 Akigera ku butegetsi yafunguriye ibyambu bya Liberia amato y’ibihugu bya Canada, u Bushinwa n’u Burayi, birushaho kuzana ishoramari ry’amahanga mu gihugu, ariko binatuma Liberia iba igihugu cyo gukweperamo imisoro. Doe yagerageje guha agaciro ubutegetsi bwe ashyiraho itegeko nshinga rishya mu 1984, mu mwaka wakurikiyeho, 1985, haba amatora arayatsinda, ariko abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwe nabo barushaho kwiyongera. Aya matora indorerezi z’amahanga nyinshi zayakurikiranye zemeje ko yabayemo uburiganya, ariko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zikomeza kumuba inyuma. Mu mpera z’imyaka ya 80, nyuma y’uko kominizime yagendaga icika intege ari ko ubutegetsi bwa Doe bugenda burushaho kumungwa na ruswa, Amerika yatangiye kugenda imwitaza ndetse itangira kugira uruhare mu kumuhagarikira inkunga z’amahanga, bikiyongeraho n’urwango rw’abaturage bamushinjaga gushyira imbere abantu bo mu bwoko bwe. Byatumye mu Ukuboza 1989 hubura intambara hagati y’abaturage, ubwo Liberia yaterwaga n’inyeshyamba ziturutse muri Cote d’Ivoire zishaka gufata Doe. Yaje gufatwa ku itariki 09 Nzeri 1990. Yakorewe iyicarubozo nyuma aricwa yishwe n’ingabo za Prince Johnson , wari ufatanyije na Charles Taylor mu kumurwanya. Samuel Doe ubundi yari muntu ki? Yavutse ku itariki 06 Gicurasi 1951, avukira ahitwa Tuzon, mu giturage gito  giherereye mu ntara ya Grand Gedeh. Ku myaka 16 nibwo Doe yarangije amashuri abanza yinjira mu mashuri yisumbuye ku Ishuri ry’Ababatisita riri ahitwa Zwedru.
Nyuma y’imyaka ibiri, yahise yiyandikisha mu gisirikare cya Liberia (AFL), yiteze ko azahabonera bourse izamujyana mu Ishuri ryisumbuye ryo muri Kakata, aho kuyimuha atangira guhabwa inshingano za gisirikare. Mu myaka icumi yakurikiyeho yagiye ahabwa imirimo itandukanye mu gisirikare  irimo kwigisha, kuyobora za gereza zo muri Monrovia n’indi. Amaherezo ariko Doe yabashije kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye yiga mu buryo bw’”Iyakure”, ahita ahabwa ipeti rya Master Sergeant ku itariki 11 Ukwakira 1979, ndetse ahabwa ubuyobozi bwa Batayo ya gatatu yakoreraga mu murwa mukuru ,Monrovia, umwanya yabayeho amezi 11. Kuwa 12 Mata 1980, M/Sergeant Samuel Doe yayoboye agatsiko k’abasirikare bakomoka mu bwoko bwe, batangira igikorwa cyo guhirika ubutegetsi bahereye ku kugaba igitero ku ngoro ya Perezida William R. Tolbert Jr baramwica. Ingabo ze zishe abandi bayobozi 26 bari bashyigikiye Perezida Tolbert muri iyo mirwano. Abaminisitiri 13 bari bagize Guverinoma bahise bicirwa ku karubanda mu minsi 10 yakurikiyeho nyuma yo kubanza kwerekana ingufu ze no kubatesha agaciro. Bivugwa ko nyuma yo guhirika ubutegetsi abahoze ari ba minisitiri muri guverinoma ya Tolbert bazengurukijwe imihanda ya Monrovia bambaye ubusa, mbere yo kubarasira hafi y’inyanja. Abandi bakozi ba guverinoma babarirwa muri Magana bahunze igihugu abandi barafungwa. Amaze guhirika ubutegetsi, Doe yahise afata ipeti rya General ashyiraho akanama kiswe “People’s Redemption Council” (PRC), kari kagizwe nawe n’abandi basirikare bo hasi bagera kuri 14, ngo kayobore igihugu. Iminsi ya mbere y’ubutegetsi bwe yaranzwe no kwica abahoze muri leta yahiritse, ategeka ifungurwa ry’abanyapolitiki bagera kuri 50 batavugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bo mu ishyaka “Progressive People’s Party” bari barafunzwe na Tolbert kubera imyigaragambyo ishingiye ku muceri yari imaze ukwezi ibaye. 
 Uruhare rwa Amerika mu guhirika Tolbert ku butegetsi Muri kanama 2008, imbere ya Komisiyo y’ukuri n’ubwiyunge I Monrovia, uwahoze ari minisitiri w’ubutabera n’umujyanama wa Samuel Doe witwa Chea Cheapoo, wanahatanye mu matora yo mu 2011, yahishuye ko Ikigo cy’ubutasi cya Amerika, CIA ari cyo cyatanze ikarita y’ingoro ya Perezida Tolbert inyeshyamba za Doe zifashishije zibasha kuhinjira, ndetse avuga ko ari umuzungu w’Umunyamerika ukorera CIA warashe Perezida Tolbert akamwica. Ku munsi wakurikiye ariko muri iyi komisiyo na none, undi wahoze ari minisitiri muri leta ya Samuel Doe, Dr Boima Fahnbulleh yatanze ubuhamya ahakana ko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zafashije Doe mu guhirika Tolbert ku butegetsi. 
 Ibimenyetso bimwe byo mu 1980 bikomeza gushingira ku musirikare utaramenyekanye bivugwa ko yari umucanshuro w’umuzungu waba warateguye ihirikwa rya Tolbert. Mu gitabo cy’ubuzima bwe, Victoria, umugore wa Tolbert avuga ko yiboneye umugabo wahishe ku maso ufite ikiganza cy’umuzungu atera icyuma umugabo we. Urupfu rwa Samuel Doe Charles Taylor wari warahoze ari inshuti ya Samuel Doe, yinjiye muri Liberia aturutse muri Cote d’Ivoire kuwa 24 Ukuboza 1989 atangiza intambara yo gukuraho Doe. Taylor yari amaze gutoroka gereza yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho yari ategerereje koherezwa muri Liberia yari imukurikiranyeho ibyaha byo kunyereza umutungo. Intambara yahise ikomera ku buryo hagati mu 1990 Taylor yari amaze kwigarurira igice hafi ya cyose cy’igihugu. Samuel Doe yaje gufatirwa I Monrovia kuwa 09 Nzeri 1990, afashwe na Prince Y Johnson, wari uyoboye umutwe wa INPFL, wari witandukanyije n’umutwe wa Taylor, NPFL. Gen Quinoo, wayoboraga ingabo z’Umuryango w’ubukungu w’ibihugu byo muri Afurika y’Uburengerazuba ( ECOMOG) yari yatumiye Doe ku cyicaro mu nama ndetse yamwijeje ko umutekano we uba urinzwe. Mu gitondo cyo ku itariki 09 Nzeri 1990, Doe yahageze mu gihe hari igikorwa cyo gusimbuza ingabo za Nigeria zari zifite ibikoresho bihagije zisimbuzwa ingabo za Gambia ngo zari zifite intege nke. Ingabo za Nigeria ngo zari zamaze kuhava ubwo Doe n’abasirikare bacye bari bamurinze bahageraga kandi bumvaga nta kibazo cyari kuvuka. Doe yaraherekejwe agezwa ku biro bya Gen Quinoo mu gihe abari bamurinze bari bategereje hanze. 
 Prince Johnson wivuganye Samuel Doe Inyeshyamba za Johnson zagize gutya ziratungurana zihita zigera aho hantu zitatumiwe kandi zitwaje ibikoresho biremereye zihita zitangira kwaka intwaro  ingabo zose za Doe, zirangije zitangira kurasa mwe kuri umwe mu bari baherekeje Samuel Doe nyuma zibarasira mu kivunge. Doe yumvise urusaku rw’amasasu hanze ahita arebana na Gen Quinoo wamwijeje ko ibintu bimeze neza, arangije amusaba akanya ngo ajye kureba uko ibintu bimeze hanze akurikirwa na Capt. Coker wo muri Gambia amuherekeje. Bakimara kurungurka no kubona uko ibintu bimeze, aba ngo nabo bahise bihisha. Ingabo za Johnson zahise zinjira imbere zirangiza abari bari kumwe na Samuel Doe bose mbere yo kumurasa mu kaguru zirangije zimutwara ari muzima. Ubwo ngo iyo mirwano yarangiraga, ngo hasi ku butaka hari abasirikare bagera kuri 80 ba Samuel Doe bishwe. Capt Coker yasobanuye ibyabaye avuga ko Atari imirwano ahubwo ari ubwicanyi bukabije. 
 Nyuma yo gufatwa, mu rwego ngo rwo kugaragaza ko Samuel Doe atari arinzwe n’imbaraga za maji nk’uko yajyaga avuga, bamuciye amatwi, bamuca n’intoki zimwe n’amano nyuma y’amasaha 12 akorerwa iyicarubozo, nyuma aza kwicwa umurambo we uzengurutswa mu mihanda y’I Monrovia barangije baramushyingura, mbere yo kuwutaburura bakongera kuwushyingura. Iyicarubozo Samuel yakorewe icyo gihe ryafashwe amashusho akwirakwizwa hirya no hino ku Isi, berekana Johnson arimo kunywa agatama bari guca amatwi Doe.
