title: Bimwe mu bitero byaryoheye ingabo z’Inkotanyi
article_text:
Bimwe mu bitero byaryoheye ingabo z’Inkotanyi 

 Niba hari ikintu gishimisha umusirikari ku rugamba ni ukubona umwanzi ( adui) ayabangiye ingata mu gihe wamugabyeho igitero. Biba akarusho iyo ubibonye uri umusirikari ukirangiza amafunzo ( amahugurwa) bakunze kwita " ikurutu" cyangwa se " recruited soldier". Uyu musirikari mushya mu gitero cye cya mbere abonye adui yiruka, biramushimisha bikamujya mu maraso, akarinda apfa azi ngo ni ko bizahora. Apfa cyangwa akarokoka intambara ari umusirikari wuzuye (wakamilitse) utarangwa n’ubwoba. Habaho kandi undi musirikari iyo akirangiza amahugurwa yisanga na bagenzi birukanka, bahunga igitero bagabweho, akarebesha amaso ye inkomere n’imirambo ya bagenzi be baguye ku rugamba. Iyo shusho yo guhunga imuhoramo kugeza apfuye cyangwa arokotse intambara. Bene uwo musirikari mushya ahora ari umusirikari mubi, wa wundi uhorana ubwoba ku buryo aba muri ba bandi birwaza, batinya kujya ku rugamba cyangwa bakirasa ahoroheje bityo bakibera mu bitaro. Mu bikorwa by’ ingenzi by’Inkotanyi bitazibagirana byabaryoheye n’ubwo bidakunze kuvugwaho, kuba barabigezeho birashoboka nta gushidikanya ko byaba bifite inkomoko ku bunararibonye bw’icyo gisirikari n’amahugurwa ariko cyane cyane ibitero byagiye bigabwa bitsimbura umwanzi, ibitero byarimo abasirikari bashya n’abakuze, babona umwanzi abahunga buri gihe iyo hagabwe igitero. Nta byinshi nzi ku gisirikari kuko ntagikoze, si ndi n’impuguke muri uwo mwuga, usibye gusoma amateka y’intambara no kuba naragiye ngirana ibiganiro na bamwe mu bagikoze. Bishobora kutaba byuzuye ariko hari ibintu bitatu by’ingenzi n’ubwo bishoboka ko birenze, kubera impamvu imwe rukumbi bihuriyeho ari iyo "kurokora ubuzima bw’abantu benshi ". Ubuzima burahenze kandi burakomeye. Uwakurokoye kubo byabayeho, usanga bikurenze ku buryo utabasha kubona ikiguzi cyangwa igihembo wamuha. Ibyo bikorwa by’ibitero byarokoye abantu ( raids), ni icyo muri St. Paul i Kigali, icyo muri St Esprit i Goma muri Congo, n’ikindi cyabereye mu gihugu cy’Angola. Aho hose harokokeye ubuzima bw’Abanyarwanda ibihumbi. Muri St Paul Aha ni mu mujyi wa Kigali rwagati hafi ya Paroisse Sainte Famille. Hari 2000 by’abantu bari bahahungiye mu gihe jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi. Abantu bahungiraga mu bigo bitandukanye by’abihaye Imana kubera kuhizera umutekano. Mu gihe ahandi muri ibyo bigo, imiborogo yari yose, RPA mu gihe cy’imirwano ikaze yari muri Kigali, yamenye amakuru ko hari abantu bihishe muri St Paul, bashoboraga kwicwa igihe icyo ari cyo cyose, maze icengera mu birindiro by’ingabo FAR n’ interahamwe zikora ibirometero hagati ya 5-15 ugereranyije, maze itsinda ry’abakomando ba RPA babasha kurokora abantu bose  uko bari bihishe muri St Paul tariki ya 16 Kamena 1994, bajyanwa kwitabwaho mu bice bagenzuraga. Muri St Esprit i Goma Iyi Paroisse Gaturika iherereye mu mujyi wa Goma nko ku kilomeyero kimwe uvuye ku mupaka uhuza umujyi wa Goma muri DRC n’uwa Gisenyi mu Rwanda. Icyo gihe hari ibibazo bitandukanye byari bishingiye ku mutekano wari muke cyane muri Congo, cyane cyane mu burasirazuba bw’icyo gihugu, ubwo hari impunzi nyinshi z’Abanyarwanda zari zarahungiyeyo zirimo ( Ex FAR n’Interahamwe). Abavuga ururimi rw’ Ikinyarwanda bari batangiye guhohoterwa n’izo mpunzi. Abenshi muri bo bahungiye muri iyo paruwasi kugira ngo barindirwe umutekano. Byaje kumenyekana ko impunzi z’Abanyarwanda zari zacuze umugambi wo gutera abari muri iyo paruwasi ngo bicwe, maze itsinda ry’abakomando rirokora ababarirwa hagati ya 700 n’1000, bazanwa mu Rwanda. Muri Angola Ingabo z’ u Rwanda arizo zahoze ari (RPA-Inkotanyi) zafashe agace muri Angola karimo n’ikibuga cy’indege cyitwa Maquela de Zombo, aha hagenzurwaga na UNITA ingabo za Savimbi, zivuye mu nkengero z’ umurwa mukuru Kinshasa mu ntambara ya kabiri nyuma ya AFDL, aho ishyaka RCD rishyigikiwe n’ u Rwanda ryashakaga  guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Laurent Désiré Kabila. Nyuma yo gufata umujyi wa Kitona mu buryo butangaje kubera guturuka muri Kivu hakoreshejwe indege za gisivili, imirwano ikaze yari hafi gutuma Kinshasa ifatwa, baza gukomwa mu nkokora n’Angola bivugwa ko yabateye ibaturutse inyuma bishingiye ku mwanzuro w’ inama ya SADC yari imaze guterana. Amakuru avuga ko abarwanyi baturutse muri uwo murwa mukuru no mu nkengero zawo bamanuka ibirometero bisaga ibihumbi binjira muri Angola maze bifatira ikibuga cy’indege cyaho ( raid), indege akaba ariho zaje kubatwara zibagarura mu Rwanda. Aho naho harokokera umubare w’Abanyarwanda benshi. Mu mateka y’Inkotanyi ntizijya zikunda kwigamba ibikorwa nk’ibyo bikomeye ziba zakoze, mu gihe abatari bake baba babifitiye amatsiko kuko burya hari abakunda ibikorwa bya gisirikari nk’ibyo, n’ubwo batakunda kukijyamo. Bene abo usanga bakunda no gukurikirana amafilimi ya ‘action’ arimo n’ ay’ intambara. Ugasanga ibikorwa bikomeye nk’ibi biba bikenewe kwandikwaho ibitabo bivuga kuri ayo mateka ku buryo bitazibagirana. Nubwo ibyavuzwe hejuru byaba atari ukuri kuzuye ariko birajya  kukwegera kuko hari ibidashidikanywaho nko kuba hari abasoma iyi nkuru, bararokokeye mu butabazi bw’izo ngabo, bashobora guhamya igikorwa cyiza zabakoreye, uyu munsi bakaba bakiriho bahumeka.

title: Abanyarwanda bari bafungiwe muri Uganda bazakorerwa ibizamini by’ubuzima
article_text:
Abanyarwanda bari bafungiwe muri Uganda bazakorerwa ibizamini by’ubuzima

 Abanyarwanda icyenda baherutse kurekurwa na Uganda ngo bazakorerwa ibizamini by’ubuzima ngo hamenyekane uko bihagaze. Kuwa 8 Mutarama 2020, Uganda ni bwo yarekuye  aba Banyarwanda barimo: Rene Rutagungira, Etienne Nsanzabahizi, Nelson Mugabe, Emmanuel Rwamucyo, Claude Iyakaremye, Augustine Rutayisire, Herman Nzeyimana, Adrien Munyangabe na Gilbert Urayeneza. Aba bose bari bafungiwe muri Uganda bashinjwa gutunga imbunda binyuranye n’amategeko n’ubutasi. Ni ibyaha batahwemye guhakana ndetse na Leta yabo ivuga ko barengana. Uganda yo si ko ibibona, ikavuga  ko barekuwe ku bw’umutima mwiza. http://bwiza.com/?Abanyarwanda-barekuwe-si-uko-bari-abere-Minisitiri-Kutesa Ubwo bageraga ku Mupaka wa Gatuna, uhuza u Rwanda na Uganda mu Karere ka Gicumbi, saa sita z’ijoro kuri uyu wa 9 Mutarama bavuze ko bari bamaze igihe bafunzwe ndetse bagahuriza ku mabi bakorewe ubwo bari muri gereza. Umwe muri bo avuga ko yari " Amaze igihe afunzwe kandi ko ibyumweru bibiri ari byo byonyine yari amaze abona izuba, ngo ubundi baramuteruraga kubera inkoni yakubiswe." Radiyo y’igihugu itangaza ko aba bagabo " bazakorerwa ibizamini ngo hasuzumwe uko ubuzima bwabo buhagaze." Ibi nanone byagarutsweho na Minisiteri y’ Ubuzima (MINISANTE) ibinyujije ku rukuta rwayo rwa Twitter aho yavuze ko aba Banyarwanda bazakorerwa ibizamini by’ubuzima. Bamwe mu Banyarwanda bagiye bafatirwa muri Uganda bakorewe iyicarubozo ku buryo bamwe muri bo basigiwe ubumuga. Uretse abo, hari n’umwe bizwi ko yapfuye bitewe n’ingaruka z’inkoni yakubitiwe muri gereza zo muri Uganda. Hari n’abavuga ko bafatwaga bagaterwa inshinge batamenye ubwoko bwazo, ingingo yatumaga bagira impungenge z’uko ubuzima bwabo buhagaze. Aba ni bo Banyarwanda bafunguwe bwa mbere ku mugararagaro na Uganda mu rwego rwo kubahiriza amasezerano ya Luanda. U Rwanda rwifuza ko n’abandi benshi bagifunzwe mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko barekurwa. Aba Banyarwanda barekuwe bahuriza ku gushima Leta y’u Rwanda yakomeje kubakurikirana kuva bafungwa, kugeza bafunguwe. Byagaragara ko basa neza ariko nta byinshi bafite byo gutangaza.

title: Ifungurwa rya Kitona TC (CEKI), uruganda rwa ba Para-Komando muri RDC
article_text:
Ifungurwa rya Kitona TC (CEKI), uruganda rwa ba Para-Komando muri RDC

 Hari ku munsi nk’uyu tariki ya 9 Mutarama 1965, ubwo Perezida wa mbere Kasa Vubu wayoboye kuva mu 1960 kugeza mu 1965, Minisitiri Tsombe na Gen. Mobutu wari umugaba w’ingabo bafunguraga ku mugaragaro ikigo cya Kitona kugira ngo kireme abarwanyi kabuhariwe bo mu kirere no ku butaka (Para-Komando). Iki gihugu cyari kimaze kubona ubwigenge, kivuye mu bukoloni bw’Ububiligi, aba bayobozi biyemeza kurema igisirikare kitajegajega. Ububiligi na bwo bwiyemeje kubafasha kubaka ikigo cya Kitona, maze bwohereza Lt. Gaston Bebronne n’itsinda ry’aba Para-Komando ngo bafashe ingabo za Congo kubona ubumenyi buhambaye. Komanda wari uhagarariye ingabo za Congo yari Eliuki Monga Aundu. Ikigo cyari gifite ibikoresho byose bikenewe nk’indege z’intambara, ibimodoka, imitaka yo mu kirere (parachute), ndetse n’ahantu ho kwitoreza (imihanda izamuka),  n’ibindi byose bituma bakora imyitozo mu buryo bugoranye, bibababaza. Umusirikare wese wageraga muri iki kigo, yahabwaga imyitozo y’ubwoko bubiri; Para na Komando. Mu 1966 ni bwo Batayo (abasirikare barenga 300) ya mbere ya ba Para-Komando batorejwe muri Kitona, yasohotse muri iki kigo , itangira akazi, ikigo gikomeza gutanga iyi myitozo kugeza mu 1990, ubwo Ububiligi bwahagarikaga ubufasha. CEKI yabuze imyitozo yahabwaga n’Ububiligi ku bwa Mobutu Sese Seko wategetse kuva mu 1965 kugeza mu 1997, gusa yakomeje kuba kimwe mu bigo bya gisirikare bikomeye muri iki gihugu kugeza ku bwa Laurent Desire Kabila. Ubundi Kitona ni umugi uri mu majyepfo y’uburengerazuba bwa RD Congo, hafi n’inyanja ya Atlantique, mu bilometero birenga gato 305 uvuye mu murwa wa Kinshasa. Ni ahantu hatazibagirana mu mateka y’u Rwanda, ingabo z’u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda kuko ubwo zari ziyobowe na Gen. James Kabarebe zahakoreye Operasiyo y’Akataraboneka (Kitona), zihafata mu minota mike, Laurent Kabila n’amahanga barakangarana. Amateka ya Operasiyo Kitona mwayasoma aha ngaha: 
http://bwiza.com/?kitona-imwe-muri-operasiyo-kabuhariwe-y-ingabo-z-u-rwanda-ku-butaka-bwa-congo-na-angola Ifoto: Kamina Air Base, ibirindiro by’ingabo z’Ububiligi zirwanira mu kirere zashinze muri RD Congo nyuma y’Intambara ya II y’isi, muri icyo gihe zifasha n’ingabo za Congo kubaka ibirindiro muri Kitona

title: RDC: Perezida Tshisekedi yaba atizeye abashinzwe umutekano we yasigiwe na Kabila
article_text:
RDC: Perezida Tshisekedi yaba atizeye abashinzwe umutekano we yasigiwe na Kabila

 Perezida wa Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Felix Tshisekedi yatangije amavugurura yimbitse mu bashinzwe umutekano we, agamije kwisubiza ububasha kuri izi serivisi ziyobowe n’abizerwa ba Joseph Kabila, yasimbuye ku butegetsi kuva mu pera z’umwaka ushize. Benshi mu bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Congo bakomeje kwemeza kuva Tshisekedi yajya ku butegetsi, ko azakomeza gukorera mu kwaha kwa Kabila ndetse bigashimangirwa no kuba uruhande rwa politiki rushyigikiye Kabila rugifite ijambo muri Guverinoma rufitemo intebe nyinshi kurusha uruhande rwa Tshisekedi. Ibi bikaba bivuze ko hari ibyemezo bimwe na bimwe Perezida ashobora gufata bikabura ubwiganze muri guverinoma bubishyigikira bigateshwa agaciro, ariko kugirango ahangane n’iki kibazo Tshisekedi akaba ashaka kubanza kwizera umutekano  we akesha abahoze bahembwa n’uwo yasimbuye. Amakuru yizewe aturuka muri Perezidansi agera kuri Jeune Afrique aravuga ko mu by’ukuri Perezida Tshisekedi arimo gutekereza kuvugurura serivisi zishinzwe umutekano we ndetse n’umuryango we, zigizwe n’abashinzwe kurinda ahantu h’ingenzi, nk’ibibuga by’indege, radiyo na televiziyo by’igihugu n’ahandi.. Bikavugwa ko igihe Tshisekedi azizera umutekano we ari bwo ashobora gutangira guhangana n’ibisigisigi bya Kabila biri mu butegetsi. Garde Républicaine ya Congo yaba ikigenzurwa na Kabila? Wikipedia ivuga ko Umutwe ushinzwe kurinda perezida wa Congo uzwi nka ‘Groupe Spécial de Sécurité Présidentielle, GSSP’ ugikorera munsi ya Joseph Kabila ndetse abayobozi b’Igisirikare cya Congo, bavuga ko ‘Groupe Spécial de Sécurité Présidentielle’ itagenzurwa na FARDC ahubwo igenzurwa n’umukuru  w’igihugu.
Ingingo y’140 y’itegeko rigenga igisirikare n’ubwirinzi yo ivuga ko nta tegeko ririmo riteganya Garde Républicaine nk’indi mitwe igize igisirikare cya Congo. Muri Gashyantare 2005 nibwo Joseph Kabila yashyizeho itegeko rigena Umugaba mukuru wa Garde Républicaine (GR), akuraho andi yose avuguruza iryo rye. GR igizwe n’abasirikare babarirwa hagati y’ibihumbi 10 na 15, ndetse yabanje kuba igizwe na Brigades eshatu, Brigade ya 10 ikorera Kinshasa, iya 15 n’iya 16 zikorera i Lubumbashi, ariko nyuma iza kuvugururwa. 
 Bivugwa ko abayigize bahembwa neza, bakorera mu mwuka mwiza, ariko bakanarangwa no gukora ibyaha byinshi mu nkengero z’ibigo byabo harimo n’ibyo bakorera abakozi b’Umuryango w’Abibumbye. Bivugwa kandi ko mu nzu ya gisirikare ya Kabila (izwi nka Maison Militaire), ariho hakorera serivisi zishinzwe umutekano w’igihugu, ndetse zagiye zikoreshwa mu guhangana n’abataravugaga rumwe na Kabila. Garde Républicaine yagiye ishinjwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Loni, n’imiryango itandukanye iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu, kubangamira inzira ya demokarasi mu gihugu, itoteza abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, yibasira amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, guhohotera abanyamakuru, gufunga binyuranyije n’amategeko, kwica abasivili no kubuza abantu guteranira mu ruhame. 
 Amateka ya Garde Républicaine ya RDC Uyu mutwe wa Garde Républicaine wasimbuye uwari usanzweho ku bwa perezida Mobutu wari uzwi nka DSP (Division spéciale présidentielle). Wikipedia yibutsa ko uyu mutwe utandukanye na FARDC kandi abawugize bambara impuzankano bihariye itandukanye n’iya FARDC. 
 Kugeza mu 2007, bambaraga imyambaro yirabura, kuri ubu bambara ingofero zitukura zibatandukanya n’abasirikare basanzwe ba FARDC. General Burenda Padiri mu 2007 yigeze kuvuga ko Garde Républicaine ari igisirikare cyigenga mu kindi kandi ko abakirimo hafi ya bose bakomoka mu Ntara ya Katanga, Kabila akomokamo. Kuwa 23 kugeza kuwa 24 Werurwe 2013, bamwe mu ba komando bagize umutwe ushinzwe kurinda perezida boherejwe ku rugamba guhangana n’igitero cya Mai-mai mu Ntara ya Katanga. Umutwe wa Mai-Mai Kata Katanga icyo gihe wifuzaga ko intara ya Katanga iba igihugu cyigenga. Bivugwa ko aha hantu abo basirikare ba GR bahakoreye amarorerwa bayakorera abaturage ndetse n’abakozi b’Umuryango w’Abibumbye. Naho mu gitero cy’i Kinshasa mu Ukuboza 2013, aba basirikare bagize uruhare mu guhangana n’umutwe w’intagondwa zigendera ku mahame y’iyobokamana. Byigeze kuvugwa ko kandi Garde Républicaine ya Congo yigeze kohereza muri Centrafrica abakomando 300 hagati ya 2012 na 2013 kujya gufasha Guverinoma ya Perezida Francois Bozize, yari igeze aharindimuka. Mu 2007 Brigadier General Dieudonne Banze Lubundji niwe wari Komanda wa Garde Républicaine. Mu 2003 kugeza mu 2006 yari Umugaba mukuru wungirije wa FARDC ushinzwe ibikorwa. Mu 2014 yazamuwe mu ntera agirwa Major General agirwa Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo zirwanira ku butaka. Uwari wamubanjirije ku buyobozi bwa GR ni Jean-Claude Kifwa, waje kugirwa Komanda w’akarere ka 9 ka gisirikare muri Ntara y’uburasirazuba. Komanda wa GR muri iki gihe kuva mu Ugushyingo 2014 ni Gen. de Brigade Ilunga Kampate, wanashyiriweho ibihano nUbumwe bw’u Burayi kubera ibyaha yakoze ku butegetsi bwa Kabila.

title: Umunsi nk’uyu 25 Ugushyingo 1997, Gen James Kabarebe yagizwe umugaba mukuru w’ingabo za Congo
article_text:
Umunsi nk’uyu 25 Ugushyingo 1997, Gen James Kabarebe yagizwe umugaba mukuru w’ingabo za Congo

 Kuva ku itariki ya 25 Ugushyingo 1997 kugeza ku ya 25 Ugushyingo 2019, imyaka 22 irashize Gen. Kabarebe James agizwe Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo za Congo, n’uwari Perezida, Laurent Désiré Kabila ( Mzee, akabyiniriro bakundaga kumwita). Ibyo byabaye nyuma y’amezi atandatu gusa nyuma y’ifatwa ry’umurwa mukuru Kinshasa n’ingabo zari iza AFDL. Kuri iyo tariki, kubera ubwumvikane buke n’amakimbirane yari yaratangiye kugaragara muri iryo shyaka rya politiki n’igisirikare cya AFDL, Perezida Laurent Désiré Kabila yafashe icyemezo n’umwanzuro byo kwikiza no guhigika uwo bafatanyije urugamba, Anselme Masasu Nindaga wari umugaba mukuru w’ingabo za AFDL, ni ukuvuga ingabo za Congo, ahita amujugunya mu buroko amuhora kugira ibikorwa ngo bidafututse byatumye amusimbuza kuri uwo mwanya Gen. Kabarebe James, umujenerali  w’Umunyarwanda. Uyu mwanya ariko Gen. Kabarebe nawe ntiyaje kuwutindaho kuko yawumazeho gusa amezi 8 kugeza nko hagati mu kwezi kwa karindwi 1998, aho yamusimbuje Jenerali Célestin Kufwa ( bivugwa ko yari mwene wabo wa Kabila, ukomoka mu ntara ya Katanga), bityo ku wa 27 Nyakanga 1998, Kabila atangaza iherezo ry’abanyarwanda bamufashije kubohora igihugu cya Congo. Ibintu bitashimishije u Rwanda na gato!  Ubwo ibintu byaje kuzamba no gukomera kuko nyuma y’iminsi ibiri gusa (ni ukuvuga kuri 29), ingabo zirenga 600 z’abanyarwanda zahise zitaha ariko ku matariki 2-3 Kanama 1998 mu migi inyuranye y’Iburasirazuba bwa Congo hatangiye imirwano n’isubiranamo kw’ingabo. Uku gusubiranamo n’ibikorwa by’urugomo byageze no mu murwa mukuru Kinshasa, biza kuvamo ivuka ry’umutwe wa RCD- Goma waje gufata igice cy’Iburasirazuba bwa Congo mu gihe kigera ku myaka itanu. 

Desire Kabira m’urugamba rwo gukura Mobutu k’ubutegetsi Bimwe mu byo wamenya kuri Gen.  James Kabarebe
 Gen. James Kabarebe yavutse muri 1959, akaba yarakuriye mu gihugu cya Uganda nk’impunzi y’umunyarwanda. Yabaye inshuti magara ya Jenerali Salim Saleh, murumuna wa Prezida wa Uganda Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, yabaye kandi umwe mu basirikare bakuru b’iki gihugu). Nyuma yo kurwana urugamba afatanyije n’abandi bari bungirije banashyigikiye Museveni mu guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Obote. Yakuriye abashinzwe kurinda Gen. Paul Kagame igihe hari ingabo za APR, umutwe wari uw’ingabo za FPR- Inkotanyi. Hafatwa umugi wa Kigali, Kabarebe yayoboraga ubuyobozi bukuru bw’igisirikare ( High command) ku Murindi, yayoboye ibikorwa n’ingamba byatumye Kigali ifatwa. Mu 1996, nibwo yoherejwe guhuza ibikorwa bya gisirikare bya AFDL muri Congo, kugeza Kinshasa ifashwe muri Gicurasi 1997. Asubiye mu Rwanda mu 1997, yagizwe umugaba mukuru w’ ingabo z’u Rwanda muri 2002, nyuma agirwa Minisitiri w’Ingabo kuva mu 2010 kugeza muri Nzeri 2018.  Ubu ni umujyanama mukuru wa Prezida Kagame mu by’umutekano. KITONA: Imwe muri operasiyo kabuhariwe y’ingabo z’u Rwanda ku butaka bwa Congo na Angolahttp://bwiza.com/?kitona-imwe-muri-... Gen. James Kabarebe kubera ubwo burambe mu bya gisirikare, avugwaho cyane kuba umuhanga mu kuyobora urugamba. Yibukirwa cyane mu gikorwa bakoze i Kitona ubwo Angola yaburizagamo urugamba rwa RCD yashakaga gufata umurwa mukuru Kinshasa, ikabatera ibaturutse inyuma, bityo abari abasirikari ba RCD bagasubira inyuma binjira muri Angola, igice cyari cyarafashwe na Savimbi. Icyo gihe ingabo zayoborwaga na Gen. Kabarebe bivugwa ko zambuye ikibuga cy’indege Gen. Savimbi bityo haza indege zicyura abasirikare bose mu Rwanda. Izo ngabo zakoze ibyo ni na zo zakoze ibikorwa bindi bitazibagirana nko gukura abantu bari bahungiye muri Saint Paul  i Kigali bakajyanwa ahari umutekano ndetse n’abari barahungiye muri Saint Esprit i Goma zikabazana mu Rwanda. Tugarutse kuri iyi sabukuru twatangiye tuvugaho, ni uko n’ubwo hari amakimbirane yari muri AFDL, Kabila atari yarebye kure ntiyanashishoza nk’uko bivugwa n’abasesenguzi ba politiki ya Congo. Gufata umusirikare mukuru w’ikindi gihugu ukamugira umugaba mukuru  w’ingabo z’igihugu cyawe byari nk’umutego yari ateze Kabarebe cyangwa u Rwanda. Ni yo mpamvu umuzungu umwe nyuma y’iyo ntambara yavuze ko habaye ikosa rikomeye kuko umunyamahanga atashoboraga kwihanganirwa kuyobora ingabo z’Abakongomani. Yagize ati " byari gukunda ko bashyiraho muri uwo mwanya umusirikari mukuru wabaye muri APR uvuga neza Igifaransa, i Lingala cyangwa Igiswahili; indimi Abakongomani bumva kugira ngo icyo cy’ubunyamahanga kiveho". Amakuru akaba yarakomeje kugenda avuga ko byari ubwa mbere mu mateka y’isi ( niba ari byo) umunyamahanga ayobora ruriya rwego rw’umugagaba mukuru w’ingabo z’ikindi gihugu. Afande James Kabarebe akaba ari umwe mu bantu bafite amateka yo kuba mu myanya ibiri ikomeye yo kuba umugaba mukuru w’ingabo z’ibihugu bitandukanye. 

Gen. James Kabarebe  ubanza ibumoso , umwe mubafite amateka yihariye kandi akomeye kuri iyi isi

title: Imibanire ya Khadafi n’abayoboye Uganda n’uko umusigiti yateye inkunga wubatswe ku mayeri
article_text:
Imibanire ya Khadafi n’abayoboye Uganda n’uko umusigiti yateye inkunga wubatswe ku mayeri

 Kuwa 31 Ukwakira 1976, Perezida Idi Amin Dada yagiye mu kigo cya gisirikare cya ‘Masaka Suicide Revolutionary Mechanised Specialist Reconnaissance Regiment’ agiye kwizihiza isabukuru y’Intumwa Muhammad. Yari aherekejwe n’umugore we, Sarah Kyolaba, n’abahungu be, Aliga na Mwanga. Bageze kuri iki kigo cya gisirikare bakiriwe n’uwari komanda w’agateganyo wacyo, Maj. Nasur Ezaga. Hari kandi Gen. Mustafa Adrisi (wari minisitiri w’ingabo), Abdel nasser (wari minisitiri w’itangazamakuru), Sheikh Suleiman Matovu (wari Mufti), Col. Ibrahim (wari komanda wa marines), Lt. Col. Khamis Safi (wari ukuriye ishami rishinzwe iby’iyobokamana mu gisirikare), Cyprian Bwanika (wari Meya wa Masaka), Lt Col Abdul Kisuule (wayoboraga regiment ya Masindi) na Lt. Col. Adek (Wayoboraga Simba Mechanised Regiment). Mu ijambo rye, Amin wari warakaye yitotombeye kuba nta mufuka n’umwe wa sima wari bwagezwe ku gasozi ka Old Kampala ahateganywaga kubakwa Umusigiti mukuru w’igihugu, kandi amafaranga yari yaramaze gusohorwa atanzwe n’Abagande ndetse na guverinoma z’amahanga zirimo iya Libya, Arabia Saoudite, Centrafrica, Qatar, Irak na Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu(UAE). Amin yavuze ko nyuma yo kumenya ko abayobozi bamwe mu Nama Nkuru ya Kisilamu muri Uganda banyereje amafaranga yagombaga gukoreshwa mu bwubatsi bw’Umusigiti wa Old Kampala, yafashe icyemezo cyo guhagarika miliyoni 70 z’amashilingi Umwami wa Arabia Saoudite yari yatanze. Yanahishuye ko yumvise ikimwaro imbere y’umuyobozi wa Libya, Col. Muammar Khadafi kubera amafaranga yari yageneye imishinga y’abasilamu muri Uganda, ariko nayo akanyerezwa n’abagize inama nkuru yabo. Ikinyamakuru New Vision kikaba cyibutsa ko umubano wa Amin na Khadafi watangiye muri Gashyantare 1972 nyuma y’aho Guverinoma y’u Budage bw’u Burengerazuba bwitambitse inama yabo ya mbere I Tripoli muri Libya. Ni mu gihe ubwo Amin yafataga ubutegetsi kuwa 25 Mutarama 1971, ahiritse Milton Obote, Khadafi ngo atabyishimiye kubera ko ngo yari ahuje na Obote ingengabitekerezo ya socialism nubwo batari inshuti by’umwihariko. Ubwo bageragezaga kubaka umubano wabo, Khadafi yahaye ikibanza Uganda i Tripoli cyo kubakamo ambasade yayo. Kubera iyi mpamvu, Amin yasuye Libya ajyana n’itsinda ry’abantu yizeraga bagiye gutangiza ambasade ya Uganda i Tripoli. Mu bamuherekeje, harimo uwitwa Amin Mutyaba ari nawe wavugaga icyarabu neza ndetse na Hajj Habib Kagimu nawe wavugaga Icyarabu neza kuko yize muri Libya muri za 60. Uyu ni nawe wabaye umusemuzi icyo gihe. 
 Akazi ke nk’umusemuzi, bivugwa ko katumye Khadafi amwiyumvamo cyane ndetse ngo nta gushidikanya ko ari we wahuje ibikorwa byo gushinga ambasade ya Uganda muri Libya nyuma y’aho umutekamutwe wo muri Algeria yibiye 23,000$ Amin yari yabanje gutanga yo gushinga ambasade. Muri Werurwe 1976, Amin yagize Mutyaba charge d’affaires muri Libya, nyuma arazamurwa agirwa ambasaderi. Inkunga nini ya mbere Khadafi yateye Abasilamu bo muri Uganda n’iyo mu Ukuboza 1972 ubwo yatangaga miliyoni 21 z’amashilingi azihaye Inama Nkuru y’Abasilamu. Sheki yashyikirijwe Sheikh Abdulzaak Matovu ayihawe na minisitiri w’ibibazo by’imbere mu gihugu wa Libya, Maj. Himed Khiwildi. Kubera inkunga nk’izo zakomezaga kwinjira, Amin nibwo yagize igitekerezo cyo kubaka Umusigiti w’akataraboneka w’igihugu ndetse n’Icyicaro gikuru cy’Inama Nkuru ya Kisilamu muri Old Kampala. Gusa, amafaranga menshi muri miliyoni 77 z’amashilingi yari yakusanyijwe yaranyerejwe bituma hubakwa umusigiti utari wifujwe. Nyuma y’ubutegetsi bwa Amin Perezida Idi Amin amaze kuvanwa ku butegetsi kuwa 11 Mata 1979, Khadafi na Guverinoma ya Arabia Saoudite babonye nta nyungu bagifite muri Uganda kubera ko batashoboraga kuba inshuti za Guverinoma nshya ya UNLF yari ishyigikiwe na Perezida Julius Nyerere. Khadafi na Arabia Saoudite kandi bari bazi urwango bamwe mu bayobozi ba UNLF bari bafitiye idini ya Islam. Urugero, ngo umuntu umwe, kuri ubu w’umujyanama wa perezida, Dr Andrew Kayiira, yigeze kugira inama Perezida Yusuf Lule mu 1979 ngo uwo musigiti wa Old Kampala uhindurwemo hotel, Lule, wari warigeze kuba Umusilamu arabyanga. By’umwihariko, Guverinoma ya Arabia Saoudite ngo yababajwe n’igikorwa cy’Igisirikare cya Tanzania, aho ubwo Amin yahirikwaga ngo cyasutse ibisasu kuri ambasade yabo muri Kololo. Ngo niyo mpamvu mu 1981 ubwo Uganda yari ishyigikiwe na Tanzania yoherezaga ambasaderi wayo, Sheikh Ali Ssenyonga, Umwami Khalid wa Arabia Saoudite, yamwanze. Kubera iyi mpamvu, ku butegetsi bwa kabiri bwa Obote, Ambasade ya Uganda i Riyadh yabayeho nta ambasaderi yari ifite, ahubwo uwitwa Abubakari Nadduli, ayibera Charge d’affaires ari we mukuru kugeza muri Werurwe 1986. Nyuma nibwo umwami Fahad yemeye Prof. Badru Kateregga, Museveni yari amaze koherezayo, nka Ambasaderi wa Uganda muri icyo gihugu. Ubwo yashakaga kongera kuvugurura inyungu zayo muri Uganda mu 1986, Arabia Saoudite mu ibanga yateye inkunga kwiyamamaza kwa Sheikh Rajab Kakooza, ubwo yiyamamazaga ahatanira na Sheikh Saad Ibrahim Luwemba, kuba Mufti wa Uganda. Ku rundi ruhande, Khadafi nawe akaba yarateye inkunga Luwemba, ikintu kigaragaza ko Khadafi na Arabia Saoudite batari inshuti. Bitunguranye, umukandida Khadafi ndetse n’ishyaka NRM bari bari inyuma, yatsinze amatora. Iyo ntsinzi ariko ntiyanyuze Arabia Saoudite itera inkunga urugamba Kakooza yakomereje mu rukiko arega Luwemba kumwiba amajwi ariko aratsindwa Luwemba aba Mufti kugeza mu 1997. Iyubakwa ry’umusigiti mushya Kuwa 11 Gicurasi 2001, Khadafi yasuye Uganda ku butumire bwa Perezida Yoweri Museveni mu birori by’irahira rye, kubera ko bivugwa ko Khadafi yari yateye inkunga ibikorwa byo kwiyamamaza bya NRM yari ihanganye na gahunda y’amavugurura ya Kiiza Besigye. Khadafi agera muri Uganda, Guverinoma ya Libya yari yakodesheje akayabo inzu y’umunyemari, Charles Mbire, aba ari yo yakirirwamo. Amaze kuhagera, Khadafi yasabye inshuti ye ya kera, Kagimu, kumutegurira urugendo rwo kuzenguruka Kampala ninjoro. Khadafi yabwiye Kagimu ko adashaka abashinzwe umutekano ba Uganda iruhande rwe bamucungiye umutekano muri urwo rugendo bambaye impuzankano za gisirikare. Ni nako byagenze, kuko ubwo Khadafi yatangiraga urwo rugendo muri Mercedes Benz ye mu masaha akuze y’ijoro, abashinzwe kurinda umukuru w’igihugu muri Uganda bubahirije amabwiriza ye. Bivugwa ko bavuye mu rugo rwa Mbire, Khadafi yasuye agasozi ka Kaminuza ya Makerere , ubwo bari bakariho, Kagimu akamwereka umunara w’umusigiti ushaje wa Old Kampala, akamusobanurira ukuntu Amin yari yakusanyije amafaranga menshi yo kubaka umusigiti mwiza ariko akanyerezwa bigatuma hubakwa umusigiti batifuzaga, aboneraho kumusaba ko inkunga nziza yaha Abasilamu muri Uganda ari ukububakira umusigiti w’akataraboneka w’igihugu. Ku itariki 12 Gicurasi, Khadafi yitabiriye irahira rya Museveni, ibirori biri kugera ku musozo, Khadafi yambika umuhungu wa Museveni, Muhoozi Kainerugaba, ipeti rya Major avuye kuri 2nd lieutenant. Icyo gihe Muhoozi yari ashinzwe imyiteguro y’imirwano n’ibikorwa mu mutwe ushinzwe kurinda umukuru w’igihugu. Mbere y’uko Khadafi asoza uruzinduko rwe, Kagimu yateguye inama hagati ye n’abayobozi muri Islam ibera ku rugo rwa Mbire, aho Khadafi yari acumbitse. Mbere y’uko Khadafi ahura n’abo bayobozi, ngo Kagimu akaba yarabanje kubatoza uko basaba inkunga Khadafi yo kubaka umusigiti mwiza wa Old Kampala. Khadafi  akaba yaratangajwe n’amagambo ngo aba bahisemo gukoresha ubwo basabaga inkunga. Hagati aho, uyu mugabo Kagimu wari umushabitsi ukomeye, yanegereye Museveni amwumvisha ko nawe yakwandikira ibaruwa Khadafi nawe asaba iyo nkunga yo kubaka umusigiti kugirango ubusabe bwabo burusheho kugira uburemere Museveni arabikora. Nyuma, Kadhafi yohereje imwe mu ndege ze ku Kibuga cy’Indege cya Entebbe, itwara itsinda ry’abayobozi mu idini rya islam muri Uganda ibajyana I Sirte, muri Libya. Aha Kadhafi yaberetse Muhammad Ahmad al-Sharif, wari Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’ihuriro ry’abasilamu ku isi ryitwaga ‘World Islamic Call Society’ ryashinzwe mu 1972. 
 Khadafi yahaye amabwiriza Sharif yo gukora ibishoboka, World Islamic Call Society igatera inkunga iyubakwa ry’umusigiti w’akataraboneka muri Uganda. Kadhafi ngo yongeyeho ko ibyo nibidakorwa, ku munsi w’urubanza Allah azamuhanira (Sharif) kuba utarubatswe kandi yarabisabwe n’umuntu utari Umusilamu (Museveni). 
 Kera kabaye, umusigiti mwiza ufite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu 15,000 warubatswe wuzura mu 2006. Ubwo Khadafi yerekwaga amafoto na video y’imirimo yo kuwubaka, yarishimye asezeranya ko azitabira igikorwa cyo kuwufungura ku mugaragaro. 
 Uyu musigiti watashywe ku mugaragaro Kadhafi ahari muri Werurwe 2008 witwa ‘Khadafi National Mosque’ ari nawo cyicaro cy’Inama Nkuru y’Idini ya Islam muri Uganda. Nyuma y’iyicwa rya Kadhafi mu 2011, uhindurirwa izina witwa ‘Uganda National Mosque’ kugirango bazakomeze kubona inkunga yo kuwubungabunga y’ubutegetsi bushya bwa Libya.

title: Perezida Nkurunziza yacitse ate igihano cy’urupfu yari yarakatiwe?
article_text:
Perezida Nkurunziza yacitse ate igihano cy’urupfu yari yarakatiwe?

 Perezida Nkurunziza Pierre yavutse ku wa 18 Ukuboza mu murwa mukuru wa Bujumbura mu Burundi, avuka kuri se witwaga Eustache Ngabisha wabaye mu nteko ishingamategeko mu 1965, akaba n’umuyobozi w’intara ebyiri. Yize amashuri abanza mu ntara ya Ngozi ari na ho yakuriye, amashuri yisumbuye ayiga ku ishuri rya AthÃ©nÃ©e riherereye muri Gitega. Yize muri Kaminuza y’u Burundi, ahakura impamyabumenyi mu 1990. Nkurunziza yarangije kaminuza ajya kwigisha muri LycÃ©e de Muramvya mu 1991, mu 1992 ajya kwigisha muri Kaminuza y’u Burundi. Mu 1993, iyi kaminuza yagabweho igitero cyaturutse ku makimbirane hagati y’ubwoko bw’Abahutu n’Abatutsi, Nkurunziza yararokotse mu gihe abagera kuri 200 bishwe. Aya makimbirane ni yo se Ngabisha yazize ubwo yicwaga mu 1972. Amakuru ya Encyclopedia Britannica avuga ko Perezida Nkurunziza yinjiye mu mutwe wa FDD (Force pour Defence de Democratie) wari ishami ry’umutwe w’Abahutu bari mu buhungiro, CNDD ( Conseil National pour Defence de Democratie), ubu rikaba ari ryo shyaka abarizwamo, rikitwa CNDD-FDD. Mu 1998, ubwo yari mu buhungiro, urukiko rwamukatiye igihano cy’urupfu ku bw’ibikorwa byo kwigomeka n’ibyaha by’intambara bivugwa ko byakozwe n’uyu mutwe wa CNDD-FDD . Hagati ya 1998, 2000, CNDD-FDD ryacitsemo ibice bitandukanye maze Nkurunziza ayobora igice kimwe. Mu bubasha yari abonye, nk’uhagarariye CNDD-FDD yagiranye amasezerano y’amahoro na Perezida Ndayizeye mu 2003. Muri aya masezerano, Perezida Nkurunziza yahawe ubudahangarwa bwatumye aba ’ndakorwaho’ n’ubwo yari yakatiwe gupfa.Ku ngoma ya Ndayizeye, Nkurunziza yabaye Minisitiri w’Imiyoborere myiza mu 2004. Mu 2005, CNDD-FDD ni bwo yabaye ishyaka rya politiki ryemewe n’amategeko maze Pierre Nkurunziza arihagararira mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu yegukanye ku wa 19 Kanama, arahira ku wa 25.

title: Mobutu, umutware w’igitugu, ubugambanyi no kwigwizaho ubutunzi
article_text:
Mobutu, umutware w’igitugu, ubugambanyi no kwigwizaho ubutunzi

 Joseph Desire Mobutu, Marshal Mobutu cyangwa se Mobutu Sese Seko...yari umukuru w’igihugu wihaye ububasha bwo guhindura izina ry’igihugu, Congo akita Zaire, ategeka abaturage bose kwivanaho amazina y’amazungu ndetse akaba avugwaho kwigwizaho imitungo no kwimika abo ashaka ko bayobora. Yavukiye ku butaka bwa Lisala mu cyahoze ari Congo Mbiligi ku wa 10 Ukwakira 1930, yinjira mu gisirikare mu 1949 aho yakuye ipeti rya Sergeant Major, apfira mu mugi wa Rabbat muri Marroc ku wa 7 Nzeri 1997. Yafashe ubutegetsi mu 1965 nyuma yo guhirika Perezida Joseph Kasavubu wamugize umuyobozi w’igisirikare cya Congo. Yayoboye imyaka 32, akurwaho na we ahiritswe mu 1997. Ku wa 30 Kamena 1960 ubwo Congo yabonaga ubwigenge, Perezida Joseph Kasavubu na Patrice Lumumba wari Minisitiri w’Intebe bagize Mobutu Umunyamabanga wa Leta mu bya gisirikare. Mu 1960 Lumumba yashatse kuvanaho ubutegetsi bwa Kasavubu ariko Mobutu aramushyigikira. Mobutu yasigaranye ububasha maze yambura ububasha abanyapolitiki bose. Mu 1961, Mobutu yasubije ububasha Kasavubu maze na we amugira umuyobozi w’ingabo za Congo. Bizwi ko Mobutu ari we wishe Patrice Lumumba nyuma yo gufungwa n’ingabo ze, nyuma agahungira muri Katanga; aha ni na ho bivugwa ko ingabo za Congo na Katanga zamutsinze. Nyuma y’amahari yari hagati ya Perezida Kasavubu wabaye uwa mbere wa Congo na Moise Tshombe wari Minisitiri, Mobutu yarahindukiye aramuhigika maze afata umwaka w’Umukuru w’Igihugu. Mu Kwakira 1971, Mobutu yahinduye izina rya Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo, ayita Repubulika ya Zaire ariko umurwa mukuru ukomeza kuba Kinshasa. Mu 1972 yahinduye amazina ye (yakuyeho Joseph Desire) maze yiyita Mobutu Sese Seko Koko Ngbendu Wa Za Banga (Ubusobanuro bugenekereje: Umurwanyi w’umunyembaraga wihangana kandi ufite ubushake bw’insinzi, aratsinda akongera agatsinda, agasiga umuriro aho ahagurutse), ategeka buri muturage wa Zaire kuvanaho izina yabonaga ko ari irya gikoloni (irifaransa cyangwa iry’Icyongereza), ateganya n’ibihano ku mupadiri uzabatiza umuturage wa Zaire. Ku ngoma ya Mobutu hari ishyaka rya politiki rimwe ryemewe n’itegeko kugeza mu 1990, ryitwaga Mouvement Populaire de la Revolution (MPR) ari na ryo yabarizwagamo. Abataravugaga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bwa Mobutu bari abahunze igihugu, bumwe mu bwoko bwavugaga rikumvikana ku ngomba zatambutse, abanyeshuri ba kaminuza. Kaminuza ya Britannica dukesha aya makuru ivuga ko hari umutwe waturutse muri Katanga wabaga muri Angola wakundaga kwibasira iyi ntara Mobutu yahaye izina rya Shaba (intara ya Katanga). Mobutu yishingikirizaga cyane inkunga zaturukaga mu bihugu byo mu burengerazuba bw’isi gusa mu myaka y’1990 zarahagaze. Mbere muu 1977, Mobutu yasabye ingabo z’Ubufaransa kumufasha guhangana n’imitwe yarwanyaga ubutegetsi bwe harimo n’uyu wavaga muri Angola. Mu 1970 no mu 1997 yongeye gutorerwa umwanya wa Perezida nta wundi bahatanye. Mobutu yayoboye Zaire ndetse afatwa nk’umutegetsi utinyitse ariko ngo ntiyigeze ageza iki gihugu ku iterambere, ubutegetsi bwe bwaranzwe na ruswa, gukoresha nabi umutungo n’amafaranga, kutubaka ibikorwaremezo kugeza ubwo yahiritswe na Laurent Desire Kabila mu 1997, apfira mu buhungiro nyuma y’igihe gito.

title: Perezida Habyarimana ku rutonde rw’abaperezida bo muri Afurika bishwe n’u Bufaransa
article_text:
Perezida Habyarimana ku rutonde rw’abaperezida bo muri Afurika bishwe n’u Bufaransa

 Abayobozi bo muri Afurika bagiye bahagarara bagashaka kurangiza imigambi yo gukomeza gukoloniza ibihugu byabo kw’ibihugu byahoze bibikoloniza ngo byagiye bibaviramo kwicwa. Aho urutonde rwashyizwe ahagaragara rw’abishwe n’u Bufaransa hagaragaraho na Habyarimana Juvenal wayoboye u Rwanda. Igihugu cy’u Bufaransa ngo kikaba kitararebeye izuba umuperezida wese washakaga kubangamira imigambi yacyo, aho ngo cyagiye gishuka cyangwa kigafatanya n’ibindi bihugu by’ibihangange mu kwica abakuru b’ibihugu muri Afurika babonaga nk’ikibazo. Inzego eshatu z’ubutasi z’u Bufaransa; SDECE (Service de Documentation ExtÃ©rieure et de Contre-Espionnage), DGSE (direction gÃ©nÃ©rale de la SÃ©curitÃ© extÃ©rieure) na DST (Direction de la Surveillance du Territoire ) ni zimwe mu zagiye zikoreshwa mu mirimo y’umwanda yagiye ishyira mu bikorwa ihirika ry’ubutegeteis n’ubwicanyi bitandukanye. Ibyaha byinshi u Bufaransa bwagiye bukora muri Afurika byagerwagaho binyuze mu gutanga amakuru y’ibinyoma agamije kuyobya rubanda, kugenzura abakuru b’ibihugu babaga ari nk’ibikoresho (puppet presidents) no muri poropaganda za gisirikare. U Bufaransa ngo bwakoze ibishoboka kugirango ibihugu bwakolonije bigume mu kwaha kwabwo. Ibi bikaba bisobanura ikoreshwa ry’ifaranga ry’iri CFA ryasizwe n’abakoloni bivugwa ko rikomeje kubuza ibihugu rikoreshwamo kugera ku bwigenge mu by’ubukungu. Abaperezida nka Thomas Sankara banze gukomeza gukorera mu kwaha kw’u Bufaransa barishwe kandi u Bufaransa bubigizemo uruhare rukomeye. Urubuga Africanexponent dukesha iyi nkuru rukaba rugaragaza urutonde rw’abakuru b’ibihugu byo muri Afurika, barimo Habyarimana Juvenal wayoboye u Rwanda, bishwe n’u Bufaransa.  Reba hano hasi urutonde rw’abaperezida u Bufaransa bushinjwa uruhare mu mfu zabo Mu 1963: Hishwe Perezida Sylvanus Olympio wa Togo Mu 1966: Hishwe John-Aguiyi Ironsi wa Nigeria Mu 1969 hishwe Abdirachid Ali Shermake wa Somalia Mu 1972: Abeid Amani Karume wa Zanzibar Mu 1975: Richard Ratsimandrava wa Madagascar Mu 1975: Francois Ngarta Tombalbaye wa Tchad Mu 1976: Murtala Ramat Mohammed wa Nigeria Mu 1977: Marien Ngouabi wa Congo Brazzaville Mu 1977: Teferi Bante wa Ethiopia Mu 1981: Anouar El-Sadate wa Misiri Mu 1981: William Richard Tolbert wa Liberia Mu 1987: Thomas Sankara wa Burkina Faso Mu 1989: Ahmed Abdallah wa Comores Mu 1989: Samuel Kanyon Doe wa Liberia Mu 1992: Mohammed Boudiaf wa Algeria Mu 1993: Melchior Ndadaye w’u Burundi Mu 1994: Cyprien Ntaryamira w’u Burundi Mu 1994: Juvenal Habyarimana w’u Rwanda Mu 1999: Ibrahim Barre Mainassara wa Niger Mu 2001: Laurent Desire Kabila wa Repubulika iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo Mu 2009: Joao Bernardo Vieira wa Guinea Bissau Mu 2011: Muammar Khadafi wa Libya

title: Ubushakashatsi: Abanyagitugu bagereranywa n' abarwayi bo mu mutwe
article_text:
Ubushakashatsi: Abanyagitugu bagereranywa n' abarwayi bo mu mutwe

  Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na Patrick Lemoine bugaragaza ko abategetsi b’ abanyagitugu bahuriza ku myitwarire imwe irangwa no kwikubira bikabije ndetse no kumva ko ibyo batekereza byagenderwaho babyanga bakaba banahasiga ubuzima, ibyo uyu mushakashatsi abifata nk’ indwara yo mu mutwe.  Inzobere mu bijyanye no gusesengura indwara zo mu mutwe zituruka ku myitwarire , Patrick Lemoine yakoze inyigo iziguye ashingiye ku mikorere y’ abategetsi b’ ibyamamare ariko baranzwe n’ ubunyagitugu nka Alexandre le Grand wo mu Bugiriki, Churchill wo mu Bwongereza anyuze kuri Louis XIV wo mu Bufaransa na Adolph Hitler w’ u Budage. Lemoine yemeza ko ubunyambaraga, Ubutwari ndetse rimwe na rimwe n’ ubunyamaswa ni bimwe mu bintu byagiye biranga abo abanyagitugu banditse amateka akomeye ku isi. Ibi Lemoine yabishimangiye cyane mu gitabo aherutse gusohora yise  “ La SantÃ© psychique de ceux qui ont fait le monde”, bisobanura mu Kinyarwanda ubuzima bwo mu mutwe bw’ ibihangange byakoze amateka y’ isi. Yibajije niba koko abantu bagiye bayobora isi ndetse banasiga amateka niba ari beza bose bituma agerageza kubatandukanya agendeye ku bikorwa n’ amateka byabaranze. Lemoine agereranya Hitler, Staline na Satani bitewe nibyo yita isi bifuzaga kubamo no kurema ndetse ngo n’ uburyo babishakaga batitaye ku burenganzira bw’ ikiremwamuntu. Agira ati” Hitler yari afite uburwayi bwo mu mutwe bushingiye mu kwifuza ibimurenze (idÃ©aliste passionnÃ©) bigatuma atatinyaga gufata ibyemezo bikomeye ndetse bishobora no kuzamo kumena amaraso by’ ahato n’ ahato”. Kuri Stalline ,Lemoine asanga ubunyagitugu bwe bwagiraga aho bugarukira kuko yageragaho akitekerezaho ndetse akanatinya iherezo rye yibaza cyane ku rupfu rwe. Umwongereza Churchill n’ Umufaransa de Gaulle yabashyize mu rwego rw’ intwari zagiye ziharanira ko sosiyete zabo zarushaho kwigenga no gutera imbere. Naho NapolÃ©on, Catherine II , Louis XIV, Jules CÃ©sar, Alexandre le Grand yabashyize mu rwego rw’ abanyagitugu bifuza kwica abantu badahuje imitekereze. Jeanne d’Arc, Bouddha ndetse na Yezu yabashyize ku rwego rw’ abatagatifu bitewe n’ ibikorwa byaranze ubuzima bwabo bitarimo guharanira inyungu y’ ibintu ahubwo ngo bashaka gukiza ubugingo.

article_text:
Tariki 21 Kamena: Umunsi mukuru w’igitunguru mu Bufaransa

   Nubwo tariki 21 Kamena yitiriwe umunsi mukuru w’ igitunguru mu Bufaransa nta muntu urasobanura impamvu yabyo, gusa iki gihingwa kirubashwe kuko gikoreshwa nk’ imboga cyangwa deseri .  Tariki 21 Kamena yabarwaga nk’ umunsi wa gatatu w’ ukwezi kwitiriwe Messidor kuri kalendari y’ Abarepubulikani (calendrier rÃ©publicain) mu Bufransa bakawita umunsi w’ igitunguru (le jour  de  l’oignon) mu rwego rw’ igihugu. Tariki 21 Kamena, ni umunsi w’ i 172 w’ umwaka tugendeye kuri kalendari ya Geregwari (calendrier grÃ©gorien) byumvikane ko hasigaye iminsi 193 kugira ngo umwaka urangire. Ubusanzwe mu bumenyi bw’ isi(geography) ni umunsi w’ inzibacyuho w’ ibihe , aho ubushuhe bwiganza mu Merekezo y’ Amajyaruguru(Hemisphere Nord ) ndetse n’ ubukonje bukarushaho kuba bwinshi mu Merekezo y’ Amajyepfo(Hemisphere Sud), bityo impeshye nyayo igatangira.

title: Mont Kigali: Urutare rwa Semafigi rugiye guturitswa
article_text:
Mont Kigali: Urutare rwa Semafigi rugiye guturitswa

  Amasosiyete NPD/COTRACO na China Road amaze igihe ari kubaka umuhanda wa Nyamirambo- Karama uzahuza ibi bice bya Giti cy’ Inyoni, mu rwego rwo kurushaho kwihutisha imirimo yiyemeje kumena urutare rwa Semafigi rwatumye imirimo y’umuhanda isa nk’ikomwa mu nkokora .  Nyuma yo kumenyeshwa ko uru rutare ruzaturitswa kuwa 13 Kamena 2019 ,abaturage baruturiye batangiye kugira impungenge bavuga ko bishobora kuzabagiraho ingaruka ku buryo batinya ko amazu yabo ashobora gusenyuka. Mu kiganiro Bwiza.com yagiranye n’ Umukuru w’ Umudugudu wa Ruhango ya I, Kanyarutoki Dieudonne yahumurije abaturage batuye hafi yaho iki gikorwa kigiye gukorerwa, avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’ Umujyi wa Kigali bwakoze ibarura ryihuse ryo kwandika amazu n’ iyindi mitungo itimukanywa ishobora kwangiraka muri metero 300. Ati" Ntacyo mugomba abaturage kwikanga kuko icyo ubuyobozi bushyize imbere ni inyungu rusange ahubwo twanasabye ko saa ine za mugitondo abaturage bose bagomba kujya kure y’ikilometero kimwe kugira ngo bataza gukomereka. Uru rutare rwakomeje kuba imbogamizi ikomeye kuko hakoreshejwe imashini kabuhariwe mu gukora imihanda ariko zirananirwa noneho hakaba hagiye gukoresha ubundi buhanga gakondo bwitwa guturitsa intambi (dynamite). Abakurikiranira hafi amateka y’aka gace kitwa Ruhango rwa Nangingare bavuga ko uru rutare runini kandi rugoye kumena , rwitiriwe Semafigi wo mu bwoko bw’ Abasinga bahoze ari abakinnyi b’ ibwami. 
Bamwe mu batuye mu Ruhango kuva kera baganiriye na Bwiza.com bemeza ko uyu Semafigi ya Gafurufuru yabayeho ku ngoma ya Kigeli IV Rwabugiri. Umunsi umwe ubwo uwo mwami yasuraga ingabo ze zari zikambitse i Mwurire yasabye Semafigi ko yamubyinira maze uwo mukannyi abyinira kuri urwo rutare ashimishe abantu bari aho. Aho Semafigi yaje kunanirwa cyane biba ngombwa ko asaba agahushya ko agiye kuzana murumuna we ngo nawe wari uzi kubyina agenda uko ntiyagaruka.

title: KU MUNSI NK'UYU: Mu 1968, Martin Luther King yaratabarutse.
article_text:
KU MUNSI NK'UYU: Mu 1968, Martin Luther King yaratabarutse.

    Mbahaye ikaze mu cyegeranyo gishingiye ku mateka, KU MUNSI NK’UYU. Uyu munsi ni tariki ya 4 Mata. Ese ni iki cyawuranze kuva mu myaka yo ha mbere? 1841: Umukuru wa leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika wa 9, William Henry Harrison yatabarukiye mu ngoro ya White House. 1865: Umukuru wa USA, Abraham Lincoln yarose yapfuye, nyuma y’iminsi 10 biba impamo. Mu makuru yatanzwe n’uwari inshuti ye, Ward Hill Lamon yavuze ko mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Mata, 1865, Abraham yarose   inzozi z’umurambo wari uryamye mu ngoro ya White House.Yabajije umwe mu bamurinda umuntu wapfuye, amusubiza ko ari Perezida.  Tariki ya 11 Mata, 1865 yabwiye Lamon ko inzozi yarose zamuteye ikibazo. Nyuma y’iminsi 10 arose, Lincoln yararashwe arapfa. 1949 : Amasezerano yo gutangiza NATO( North Atlantic Treaty Organization) yasinyiwe i Washington D.C. 1968: Impirimbanyi mu kurwanirira uburenganzira bw’ikiremwamuntu muri Amerika, Martin Luther King Jr. yiciwe i Memphis muri Tennessee. 1973: Inyubako ndende y’ubucuruzi ya World Trade Center yafunguye umuryango. Mu 2001, iyi nyubako yagabweho igitero y’indege, irasenyuka. 1975: Imwe mu makompanyi akomeye mu ikoranabuhanga, Microsoft yarafunguwe ku bufatanye hagati y’umuherwe Bill Gates na Paul Allen

title: Ibintu 10 Gandhi yemeraga ko byahindura Isi
article_text:
Ibintu 10 Gandhi yemeraga ko byahindura Isi

  Mahatma Gandhi ubarwa mu ntwali zabayeho ku Isi yakunze kugira ati “ Nta muntu ukwiriye gutakaza icyizere cy’ ubumuntu ngo kuko ubuzima bugereranywa n’ inyanja aho amazi amwe ashobora kuba yanduye ariko bitavuga ko yose yanduye’’.  Yakomeje kandi yerekana ko itandukaniro hagati y’ icyo turi cyo n’icyo dushoboye gukora bihagije kugira ngo duhindure Isi.  Zimwe mu ndangagaciro Mahatma Gandhi yagenderagaho  1. Gushishikariza abantu kubanza guhinduka ubwabo Gandhi yashishikarizaga abantu ko bagomba kubanza kubera abandi urugero muri sosiyete kugira nayo ibe nk’ uko bayifuza. Kuri iyi ngingo, Gandhi agira ati “Mu gihe cyose sosiyete yawe izagutanga guhinduka birumvikana ko wowe uzasigara uri wa wundi ndetse uhore uri mu bibazo byawe.”   Uyu muhanga yashimangiye ko nta muntu wakagombye kumukomeretsa atabimuhereye uburenganzira busesuye. Ati “N’ubwo bimeze bityo iyo umuntu aguhemukiye mbere yo kumusubiza ugomba kwitonda kugira ngo udahubuka ugasa na we.”  3. Kubarira no kwibagirwa ibibi byagukorewe Gandhi yitwazaga umugani ugira uti “Nta munyantege nkeya ubabarira ngo kubabarira ni ikimenyetso cy’imbaraga.”   Mu buzima bwe, Gandhi yari yarimye umwanya amagambo kuko yari azi neza ko byoroshe kuvuga kuruta gukora. Aho yagiraga ati “Igitabo gishobora kuguha ubumenyi ari utashyize mu bikorwa ibyo wasomye bigomba kukubera impfabusa.”   Umuntu wese ushaka kugira icyerekezo ntakwiriye kwibanda kuri ejo hazaza ahubwo agomba gukora uyu munsi(the future depends on what we do in the present). Kuri iyo ngingo Gandhi asaba umuntu wese guca bugufi no kumenya ko azapfa no kumenya gusaba umuturanyi we imbabazi mu gihe biri ngombwa. Ati “Ni byiza cyane kutishyira hejuru ahubwo ukamenya neza aho ufite amakosa bityo ukikubita agashi.” Aha ibanga ni ukwigaya nyuma kwiseka ,kwirwanya ahasigaye ukitsinda. Ibyo ntibikuraho ko umuntu nyawe agomba kutabura izima (persistence) cyane cyane ku bantu bakurwanya. Iyi niyo mpamvu Gandhi na bagenzi be babashije kugera ku ntego yabo ya politiki kandi batamenbye amaraso(method of non-violence). Ni byiza cyane kureba ibyiza by’abandi ahubwo ukareba ibibi byawe ukanigaya. Iyo ubigenjeje utyo bituma uha abantu amahirwe ndetse nabo bakakwizera kugeza igihe ushobora no kubabera umuyobozi. Umunezero ni igihe ibyo uvuga ibyo utekereza ndetse nibyo ukora bijyana ndetse binahura neza. Kuri Gandhi asanga iyo amagambo yuzuzanyije n’ ibitekerezo bigaragaza ukuri. Ati “Iyo ibikorwa byawe bitajyanye n’ ibyo uvuga nabwo bishobora kugufasha gutangira kwigaya bityo ukikosora mu maguru mashya.”  10. Gukomeza gukura no gutera imbere Gukomeza gutera imbere ni itegeko rihoraho ry’ ubuzima ndetse n’ umuntu uhora ashaka kuguma aho ari agaragara nk’ umunebwe cyangwa umupfapfa.  Gaston Rwaka/Bwiza.com

title: U Bufaransa: Intambara y’ igitangazamakuru n’ ubutabera k’ ubwicanyi bwo mu Bisesero
article_text:
U Bufaransa: Intambara y’ igitangazamakuru n’ ubutabera k’ ubwicanyi bwo mu Bisesero

 Abajenerari batatu b’ U Bufaransa baregwa kugira uruhare ubwicanyi bwakorewe mu Bisesero muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994, bareze ikinyamakuru Mediartpart kwiba inyandiko zibashinja. Aba bajenerari Jean-Claude Lafourcade, Marin Gillier na Jacques Rosier bashinjwa kugira uruhare mu bwicanyi bwakorewe Abatutsi mu misozi ya Bisesero ku itariki 27 na 30 Kamena 1994 aho ingabo z’ U Bufaransa zari zishinzwe kurinda. Kuva mu mwaka w’ I 2005, mu Bufaransa hatangijwe iperereza rigamije kumenya niba koko ingabo zabo zagize uruhare mu bwicanyi bwabereye mu Bisesero bwahiyanye inzirakarengane zisaga ibihumbi 50. Kuwa 25 Nzeri 2018, igitangazamakuru Mediapart gikorera kuri internet cyahishuye ko abacamanza bitwaje ububasha bafite nta murimo ukozwe , ntawe bagishije inama banzuye ko nta ruhare ingabo z’ u Bufaransa zagize muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda. Aho niho Mediartpart yahereye ivuga ko nta perereza ryakozwe ishaka gusobanura ko nta gaciro ubutabera bwahaye iyo dosiye ingabo zayo ziregwa kugira uruhare muri jenoside yabereye mu Rwanda. Ku ruhande rw’ abaregwa, umwunganizi wa Gen.Marin Gillier,Me. Christophe Barthelemy yavuze ko iki kinyamakuru cyatangaje ingingo ziri muri dosiye kititaye ku maperereza yaba yarakozwe. Ati “ Ntabwo byumvikana kuko itangazamakuru ryihutira kuvuga ibintu ritazi neza na none nabasaga gutuza kuko urubanza ruracyakomeje haracyari kare gufata imyanzuro”. Umunyamakuru wanditse iyi nkuru , Fabrice Arfi nawe yahise atangaza ko nta muntu yatunze agatoki ngo kuko yakoze akazi ke nk’ uko biteganyije, nk’ uko tubikesha RFI. Ati” Nsanze tutazira uburyo twanditse inkuru y’ ukuri ahubwo turazira uburyo twabikoze neza , nk’ uko twakusanyije amakuru yagiye aturuka mu iperereza ryakozwe n’ ubutabera k’ ubwicanyi bwabereye mu Bisesero”. Umunyamakuru Arfi, wagize uruhare mu nkuru zikomeye za Bettencourt, Karachi, Kadhafi na Cahuzac avuga ko atitaye ku byo aregwa bijyanye no gutanga amakuru kuri dosiye zikiri mu nkiko ngo abikora ku nyungu rusange ndetse afite n’ ibimenyetso zimusiga. title: Rwanda: Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , imbuto y’ ubukoloni
article_text:
Rwanda: Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi , imbuto y’ ubukoloni

 Mu gihe abantu badahuza ku nkomoko ya jenoside 3 zimaze kuba ku isi, ubushakashatsi butandukanye bushingiye ku bitabo byagiye byandikwa kuri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda bwemeje ko iyi mbuto yabibwe n’ abakoloni ku nyungu zabo bwite. Mu mwaka w’ I 1994, nibwo Ingabo z’ u Bufaransa zageze kumugaragaro ku butaka bw’ u Rwanda mu gikorwa cyise” Operation Turquoise” yari iyobowe na Gen. Jean-Claude Lafourcade. Izi ngabo z’ u Bufaransa 2500 zaje mu Rwanda muri icyo gihe zafashijwe n’ izindi ngabo 500 zituruka mu bihugu bitandkanye bya Afurika. Icyo gihe u Rwanda rwari rushegeshejwe na jenoside yaje guhitana inzirakarengane zisaga miliyoni imwe. Hashize amezi macye, Guillaume Ancel umwe mu basirikare b’ Abafaransa bari muri Operation Turquoise yatanze ubuhamya bwerekana ko u Bufaransa bwabeshyaga amahanga ko bwaje kuzimya umuriro mu Rwanda. Guillaume Ancel agira ati” Imyaka ishize ari myinshi ariko mu by’ ukuri nk’ umuntu wari uhibereye nakwemeza ko twari dushinzwe gucanira umuriro kugira ngo umututsi yicwe , nk’ uko ubuyobozi bwacu bwabidukanguriraga”. Ubu buryo imbuto mbi ya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda yaje kubibwa n’ umukoloni bigaragara neza mu gitabo ’Le GÃ©nocide conte les Batutsi du Rwanda” un “racisme importÃ© des sciences coloniales”, cya Florent Piton. Florent Piton yanditse iki gitabo yifashishije inyandiko yakuye mu bubiko bwo mu duce tw’ amajyaruguru y’ U Rwanda. Uyu mwanditsi yemeza ko jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda ifite inkomoko y’ imizi y’ ubumenyingiro bushamikiye ku mateka y’ ubukoloni . Florent Piton, asanga muri ibyo by’ ubukoloni aribwo imbuto y’ ivanguramoko yatangiye kwigishwa ndetse bamwe mu banyapolitiki bari barize mu Burayi bahise batangira gushishikariza rubandanyamwinshi kwanga rubandanyamuke. Mu ncamake u Bubiligi n’ u Bufaransa babibye imbuto ya jenoside ndetse banayuhira kugeza ikuze ndetse inakwirakwizwa ibyo bikaba bigomba gutuma bitinde bitebuke ibi bihugu bizemera ko byagize uruhare rukomeye muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ndetse no mu yandi makimbirane yayogoje ibihugu byinshi byo ku mugabane wa Afurika. title: Rwanda—Urundi-Congo-Belge: Abaperezida bakwiriye guhangana n’ ibisigisigi by’ Ubukoloni
article_text:
Rwanda—Urundi-Congo-Belge: Abaperezida bakwiriye guhangana n’ ibisigisigi by’ Ubukoloni

 Kuva mu bihe by’ ukoloni amateka ya politiki yagiye yerekana ko ibihugu bikomeye byaharaniraga imitungo kamere y’ ibihugu bifite intege nkeya mu rwego rwo kurushaho kubaka ubukungu n’ imbaraga za gisirikare. Iyo myimvure ntiyigeze ihinduka kuko no mu ntambara zombi z’ Isi nabwo ibyo bihangange byarushijeho gukoresha ibihugu bikennye ndetse no gusahura imitungo y’ ibihugu byari byatsinzwe. Ni muri urwo rwego Afurika muri rusange n’ Ibihugu b’ Ibiyaga Bigali by’ umwihariko byakomeje gufatwa nk’ isoko y’ ibicuruzwa bikorerwa mu bihugu biteye imbere bituruka muri Afurika nk’ amabuye y’ agaciro, imbaho n’ ibindi byinshi tutarondora.  Congo-Kinshasa : Iki gihugu cyibasiwe cyane n’ ubukoloni bw’ Ababiligi aho bari bagerageje kugisahura babanjije guteza umwiryane mu baturage. Amateka agaragaza ko inyungu zayo bwite u Bubiligi bwari bushyigikiye Congo-Kinshasa iguma igizwe n’ ibice byitwaga Empire Lunda, Empire Kuba, Empire Luba. Inararibonye zemeza ko igihugu cy’ u Bubiligi cyubatswe n’ ubutunzi bwa Congo-Kinshasa cyane cyane amabuye y’ agaciro bakuye mu Ntara ya Katanga. Ubu butunzi buracyahari kuko mu gihe aba bakoloni birukanwaga basize bahishe amabanga menshi ku buryo magingo aya , abana babo baracyaza muri aka Karere gufata imitungo basigiwe n’ ababyeyi babo. Mu gihe, ababiligi bari barasahuye Congo ku buryo bwose bushoboka ,Kugeza mu mwaka wa 1960 nta munyekongo n’ umwe wari warize wahawe amahirwe yo kwiga kaminuza mu Burarayi. Congo-Kinshasa iracyarangwamo n’ icuraburindi bitewe n’ imbuto umukoloni yasize ahateye aho bikomeye kugira ngo abantu bavuge rumwe ahubwo usanga ubutegetsi burwanira inyungu zabwo bwite.  Rwanda-Urundi:  Ibihugu 14 biyobowe n’u Budage ndetse n’u Bubiligi bamaze kwitegereza ubutwari bw’ Abanyafurika no kubona ko badashobora kubayobora uko bishakiye bahise bayigabanyamo ibice mu biganiro bya Berlin byabaye kuva ku ya 15 Ubushyingo 1884 kugeza ya 26 Gashyantare 1885. U Burundi n’ u Rwanda bimaze kwamburwa uduce twinshi ntibyari bihagije kuko byasigiwe umurage w’ ivanguramoko n’ amacakubiri ku buryo kugeza magingo aya byagiye biteza ibibazo by’ ingutu bitazibagirana nka jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda muri 1994 n’ ubundi bwicanyi ndengakamere bugenda bubera hirya no hino mu karere. Mu mbwirwaruhe z’abayobozi batandukanye b’u Burundi, bagaruka ku kuba Ababiligi aribo bakomeza gusubira inyuma bakabiba urwango hagamijwa kwangisha ubuyobozi abaturage, Leta ikaba yarakomeje gubishimangira nyuma y’imvururu zabaye mu 2015, zakurikiwe n’igerageza ry’ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi. Nk’ibihugu byagiye bigirwaho ingaruka n’ubukoloni cyane cyane nk’u Rwanda rwari rusohotse muri jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, imbaraga rwakoresheje mu kwimakaza ubumwe n’ubwiyunge ubu rukaba rukataje no mu iterambere, n’ibindi bihugu byarwigiraho dore ko ba gashakabuhake ahanini bagera ku nyungu zabo neza babanje guteza umutekano muke mu gihugu, ibi akaba aribyo bimaze imyaka n’imyaka biranga Congo Kinshasa. U Rwanda n’u Burundi byaboneye ubwigenge umunsi umwe wo ku wa 1 Nyakanga 1962, mu gihe Zaire (Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo) yari imaze imyaka ibiri ibuhawe.   Gaston Rwaka/Bwiza.com

title: Prince Harry uherutse gukora ubukwe bwahuruje isi, ni muntu ki?
article_text:
Prince Harry uherutse gukora ubukwe bwahuruje isi, ni muntu ki?

  Ku wa Gatandatu tariki 19 Gicurasi 2018, nibwo Isi yose yari ihanze amaso mu Bwongereza ahaberaga ubukwe bw’igikomangoma Harry n’   umukinnyi wa filimi,    Meghan Markle.  Prince Henry amazina ye yose ni Henry Charles Albert David. yavutse tariki 15 Nzeri 1984 avukira mu bitaro bya St Mary muri Pendindton i London mu Bwongereza, akaba umuvandimwe wa wa Prince William ise ubabyara ni Prince Charles na Princess Dianna Spencer.  Ubuzima bw’ishuri Prince Harry yize amashuri abanza ahitwa Ludgrove aho na mukuru we yize, akomereza ayisumbuye muri Eton College aho yarangirije muri 2003 agahita yerekeza muri Austraria, aho gukomeza kaminuza Harry yahise ayoboka Sandhurst–Britain’s leading military academy ahabwa imyitozo yagisirikare aha hari mu 2005 maze mu mwaka umwe gusa agirwa comiseri mugisirikare cy’ubwongereza aho yakomeje kujya kurutonde rwabarazwe ingoma y’ubutwari y’ubwongereza. [caption id="attachment_105480" align="alignnone" width="1100"] Ubuzima bwe nk’umusirikare  [/caption] Mu 2007 byatangajwe ko itsinda ry’abasirikare barimo Harry bagomba kujya kurwana muri IraQ gusa abashinzwe ubujyanama mu gisirikare cy’ubwongereza bemeje ko Harry atagomba kujya kurwana muri IraQ kuko byashoboraga gushyira abasirikare bari kumwe nawe mu kaga bitewe n’uko abanzi bari kuba bamushaka cyane nk’igikomangoma. Ntibyarangiriye aha kuko mu kuboza 2007 we nitsinda ry’abasirikare bagiye muri Afganistan mu gikorwa cyo kuzenguruka iki gihugu mu rwego rw’ubutasi iki gikorwa cyarangiye muri gashyantare 2008 Kuva 2012 kugeza 2013 yatwaraga indege zintambara (helicopter) zijyaga mu Afganistan mu bikorwa byo kugarura amahoro muri icyo gihugu.Harry wari ufite ipeti rya Kapiteni(captain) yasoje imirimo y’igisirikare muri 2015  Ibikorwa bya muranze, n’ibyo akunda gukora mubuzima bwe bwaburi munsi Prince Harry yagiye agaragara mu mirimo itandukanye aho yakoze ibikorwa bijyanye no kubungabunga ibinyabuzima ku mugabane w’Afurika ndetse no mubikorwa by’urukundo no mubukangura mbaga bwo kwirinda ubwandu bwagakoko gatera Sida. Muri 2017 yahuraga n’umunyarwandakazi Yvette Twagiramariya ukozi wa Radiyo mpuzamahanga yabongereza (BBC) bagahurira i Hackney mu Mujyi wa London nabwo mu gikorwa cy’ubukangurambaga ku kwirinda Virusi itera Sida. Mu 2006 yabashinze umuryango wita kubana mu gihugu cya Lesotho nyuma yibyo byose Harry yashyizeho amarushanwa yihariye yise Invictus Games ukubiyemo imikino myinshi nko gusiganwa kumaguru,umukino wintoki, kunaga imihunda, Rugby, gutwara moto nini ndetse no koga mu mazi menshi iyi mikino yose ikaba iterwa inkunga na Leta y’ubwongereza ibinyujije mu mushinga wayo witwa LIBOR(London Interbank Offered Rate) iyi mikino ikaba iba buri mwaka.  Ibijyanye n’ubuzima bw’urukundo Tariki 08 Ugushyingo 2016 nibwo byasakaye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga no mubinyamakuru ko Prince Harry ari murukundo n’umukinnyi wamafilime Meghan markle ari nabwo bwambere bagaragaye barikumwe ibintu byatangaje besnhi. Tariki 19 Gicurasi 2018 Harry na Meghan ubukwe bwabo bwabaye ubwagahebuzo ku isi dore ko bwatashywe n’ibihumbi byabantu bari buzuye imihanda yose . title: Uko amoko 19 y’Abanyarwanda yasangiraga ubutegetsi
article_text:
Uko amoko 19 y’Abanyarwanda yasangiraga ubutegetsi

 Nubwo Abanyarwanda batari basangiye ubwoko bw’imiryango migari cyangwa se ubw’inzu,ntibyababujije kubana neza no gusangira ubutegetsi.Kuko n’ubundi wasangaga bakomoka mu muryango umwe wa Gihanga cyahanze u Rwanda. Ibyo byatumaga ufite icyo arusha undi akimuha ,ugaragaje ubutwari mu butegetsi akabuhabwa ,uw’intwari ku rugamba agahabwa impeta y’umudende cyangwa se impotore, uwacanye uruti akagabirwa amashyo y’inka ,imisozi n’abagaragu,uwaheze mu bworo agahabwa inka y’umuriro agatangira korora, nawe akagwiza ubutunzi,maze bose bagahuriza ku ntego imwe yo kurinda ubusugire bw’igihugu,kucyagura no kwita k’ uburumuke b’Abantu n’amatungo. Uwitwa PADIRI LEON DELMAS yakoze ubushakashatsi ku moko y’abatware b’u Rwanda mu mwaka w’1948 (Abashefu 52 n’Abasushefu 625) yagaragaje imibare ikurikira ijyanye no gusangira ubutegetsi kw’Abanyarwanda:    15.ABONGERA 1 Bose hamwe = 677 Iyi mibare igaragaza ko amoko yasangiraga ubutegetsi bitewe nuko umubare wabo ungana n’amaboko bafite mu gihugu.Ibi kandi ntibyadutangaza kuko no mu gihe bita icya Demokarasi ishingiye ku mashyaka menshi, Ishyaka rifite abayoboke benshi, niryo rigira amajwi, bityo rikegukana imyanya myinshi mu butegtsi.Aha bikaba bigaragara ko mu kugabana ubutegetsi bagiye bafata n’amoko bazanyweho iminyago (Abashi bagenganga Ingoma yo ku Ijwi) batibagiwe n’amoko y’inzu (Abasyete n’Abashigatwa). Ikindi kigaragara hano, nuko Abanyiginya aribo bari benshi kuko n’ubusanzwe aribo bari basanganywe ingoma, Abega bakabakurikira kuko aribo basangiraga ubutegetsi bakavamo Abagabekazi, Abatsobe nabo bazagamo mu bafite imyanya myinshi kuko aribo bakundaga kuvamo Abiru , akaba aribo bari bafite n’uburenganzira bwo gutanga abatabazi “Bamenaga amaraso yabo “ kugirango u Rwanda rwigarurire amahanga. Gakondo yabo niyo yabazwaga umuganura n’abahinzi bawo. Ikindi Abanyarwanda bakunze gutsitsuraniraho, ni ikibazo kijyanye n’ubuhake. Ubuhake niko kari akazi ko ha mbere, kandi ntabwo bwari bwihariwe n’abantu bamwe nkuko babivuga, ahubwo uwabaga atunze wese yashakaga abakozi bo kumufasha mu mirimo ye iyi n’iyi ibyo akaba aribyo bitaga “UBUHAKE”. Umuhutu wihuturaga akava mu buhutu akajya mu bututsi akaba umutunzi nk’abandi ,nawe yarahakaga.Umutwa wamenyaga ubwenge akajyana n’abandi mu iterambere rijyanye n’igihe ,nawe yaratungaga akareka kuba insuzugurwa ,nawe agatanga ubuhake (urugero ni nka Busyete). Umututsi wacungaga nabi ibyo yagabiwe ,cyangwa se akanyagwa kubera makosa ye ,nawe yarakenaga akajya guhakwa nk’abandi bose.Iki kikaba ari ikigaragaza ko Abanyarwanda basaranganyaga ubutunzi bafite uko bwanganaga kose.Ukize akazamura umukene akoresheje inzira twakwita iyo kumuha akazi yitwa” ubuhake”, kandi ntawimwaga akazi k’ubuhake ,uwashakaga guhakirwa ubutunzi wese (Inka n’imyaka ) yabonaga aho ahakwa kandi agahakwa ku wo ashaka , yaba umwami, yaba umutware cyangwa se izindi Mfura ziri mu Gihugu.

title: Ibikorwa 10 bya Special Forces byagenze uko bitateguwe bikagira ingaruka - Igice cya 2
article_text:
Ibikorwa 10 bya Special Forces byagenze uko bitateguwe bikagira ingaruka - Igice cya 2

 Nyuma y’aho mu cyumweru gishize tubagejejeho igice cya mbere cy’Ibikorwa 10 bya gisirikare byagenze uko bitari byateguwe bikaza guteza ingaruka, isomere ibindi bikorwa bitanu byari bisigaye nk’uko dukomeza tubikesha urubuga rwa Wonderlist. Igihugu cya Israel cyagiye cyibasirwa n’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba kuva cyashingwa mu 1948. Ibi byatumye iki gihugu umutwe w’ingabo zidasanzwe ushinzwe guhangana n’ibibazo nk’ibi byaturuka hanze cyangwa imbere mu gihugu. Uyu mutwe ukaba wariswe “Sayeret Matkal”. Mu bikorwa bya mbere uyu mutwe wakoze, harimo icyari kigamije kubohoza imbohe zari zifungiye mu majyaruguru ya Israel ahitwa Ma’a lot. Icyo gihe ibyihebe by’Abanyapalestina byafashe bugwate abantu 115 bisaba Israel kurekura imfungwa z’Abanyapalestina yari ifite.
 Nyuma yo gupanga neza mu bwitonzi, Abakomando ba Sayaret Matkal bigabanyijemo amatsinda abiri batera inyubako yari irimo izo mbohe. Kubw’ibyago ariko, abasirikare bo mu itsinda rya mbere bananije irindi tsinda ryagombaga kwita ku muyobozi w’ibyihebe. Nubwo ibi byihebe byose byarasiwe mu guhererekanya amasasu kwabaye, umuyobozi wabyo we yabashije kwica imbohe nyinshi zari zafashwe akoresheje grenade n’imbunda ya machine gun yari afite mbere y’uko yicwa.
[xyz-ihs snippet="google-pub"] Mu mbohe zose zari zafashwe, izigera kuri 25 zaguye muri icyo gikorwa kongeraho ibyihebe bitatu. Nyuma yahoo, Israel yagize umujinya ijya kwihorera  irasa ku bigo ibyihebe byitorezagamo muri Liban. Iki gikorwa kandi cyatumye Hashingwa umutwe ushinzwe kurwanya iterabwoba mu gipolisi cya Israel ngo uzajye ukumira ibitero by’iterabwoba. Imitwe y’ingabo zidasanzwe (Special Forces) ikunze kwitabazwa mu bihe bikomeye mu bihugu bikunze kurangwamo amakimbirane imbere. Urugero rutangwa ni urw’umutwe wa Special Forces wo muri Philippines uzwi nka Special Action Force wakunze kwigaragaza uhangana n’abakomunisiti n’intagondwa z’Abayisilamu bakunze guhangayikisha igihugu. Uyu mutwe rero waje kwamamara ku isi yose ubwo watakazaga abakomando 44 bose mu gikorwa bari batumwemo. Nyuma nibwo haje gutangazwa ko aba baguye mu gico cy’abarwanyi ubusanzwe bari bashyigikiye leta.
 Bivugwa ko icyabiteye ari ukunanirwa guhuza ibikorwa ndetse ngo no kwivanga k’umupolisi wari wirukanwe muri iki gikorwa bigatuma guverinoma ibura abasirikare kabuhariwe igihugu cyari gifite. Nyuma y’iminsi micye, ibyihebe byari bigiye guterwa icyo gihe, n’ubundi byishwe n’abagize uyu mutwe bahorera bagenzi babo.
  Iki gikorwa cyateguwe kigashyirwa mu bikorwa n’umutwe udasanzwe w’abakomando ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika uzwi nka Navy Seals, burya ngo ntabwo cyagenze nk’uko benshi babyibwira. Ibanga rikomeye iki gikorwa cyakozwemo ngo naryo riri mu byatumye kiba kibi. Bivugwa ko aba Navy Seals 24 begereye aho Bin laden yari yihishe baturutse muri Afghanistan bari muri kajugujugu 2 zo mu bwoko bwa Blackhawk ariko zari zahinduwe ku buryo moteri zazo zidasohora urusaku ndetse na radars ntizibe zabasha kuzibona. Ariko ubwo izi kajugujugu zari zegereye iyi nyubako Bin Laden yari arimo, imwe muri zo yagize itya ikora impanuka pilote yananiwe kuyigenzura igwa mu gipangu ariko nta musirikare wayiguyemo.
 Aba basirikare rero ngo bahise bakora icyari cyabajyanye bica Osama Bin Laden ndetse babona inyandiko zitandukanye zirebana na Al Qaida, ariko ya ndege yaguye izana ibindi bibazo bibiri by’ingenzi bitari byateguwe. Icya mbere nuko indi kajugujugu yagombaga kwitabazwa bibaye ngombwa, yo itari yahinduwe nk’ebyiri za mbere ku buryo urusaku rwayo rwashoboraga kumvikana, icya kabiri kikaba ko iyo ndege yaguye yagombaga gusenywa kugirango hatazagira amabanga y’ubu butumwa bazayikuramo, ibintu kandi ngo bitari gushoboka ko bikorwa bucece kandi byashoboraga gutuma ikigo cya gisirikare cyari hafi aho kitari bwamenye icyabaye kibimenya. Nubwo bimeze gutyo, ngo ukuntu iki gikorwa cyakozwe vuba vuba na none cyatumye ingabo za Pakistan zitinda gutabara. Ngo mbere y’uko indege y’intambara yo mu bwoko bwa F-16 y’igisirikare cya Pakistan ihagera, kajugujugu zari zicyuye Abanyamerika zitwaye n’umurambo wa Bin Laden zari zigeze kure zisubira muri Afghanistan.
 2.Imbohe zari zafatiwe mu ikinamico muri Moscow (Moscow Theater Hostage Crisis) Gushaka kuba mpatsibihugu ku bihugu byahoze bibarizwa muri Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe z’Abasoviyeti kw’u Burusiya ngo kwatumye iki gihugu mu myaka yashize kibasirwa n’ibitero by’iterabwoba bya hato na hato. Kimwe muri ibi bitero kandi cyaguyemo abantu benshi cyabaye mu 2002 ubwo itsinda ry’Abanya-Chechnya bitwaje ibirwanisho bigaruriraga icyumba cy’ikinamico cya Dubrovka mu mujyi wa Moscow bagafata bugwate abantu 850 barangiza bagasaba u Burusiya kuva muri Chechnya. Perezida Vradimir nk’uko azwi, yanze ubusabe bw’ibyihebe, ahubwo ategeka umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo uzwi nka Spetsnaz ndetse n’Ibiro bishinzwe ubugenzacyaha bizwi nka FSB wagereranya na FBI yo muri Amerika, kugaba igitero muri iyi nyubako bifashishije imyuka ya gaz.
 Iki cyemezo cya Putin cyagize ingaruka zikomeye kuko cyaguyemo imbohe zigera ku 130 zose zizize iyi myuka ubundi byari byapanzwe ko iri buce integer ba rushimusi. Nyuma y’ibi, guverinoma byabaye ngombwa ko itanga ibisobanuro yihagararaho kuri iki cyemezo ivuga ko yabitewe nuko yari yatangiye kwakira amakuru y’uko imbohe zatangiye kwicwa.   Muri Israel ngo si ibanga ko benshi mu banyapolitiki b’ingenzi muri iki gihugu baciye mu gisirikare, ngo bikaba bitanatangaje kuba benshi muri ba minisitiri b’intebe iki gihugu cyagize nabo bagiye banyura muri wa mutwe w’ingabo zidasanzwe uzwi nka Sayeret Matkal. Uyu mutwe rero wagiye ugira uruhare mu bikorwa bya gisirikare mu mateka ya Israel, muri ibyo hakaba harimo n’igikorwa cyo kubohoza imbohe z’Abanya-Israel zari zashimutiwe ku Kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe muri Uganda ubwo abagenzi 248 bari mu ndege ya Air France bashimutwaga n’ibyihebe indege bikayijyana ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe.
 Umutwe ugizwe n’abakomando 100 ba Israel waregeranyijwe ngo ujye kubohoza imbohe bivugwa ko zari zisigaye ari imbohe 106 nyuma y’uko nyinshi muri izi mbohe zo zitaturukaga muri Israel zo zari zarekuwe. Aba bakomando bigiriye inama yo kugera kuri iki kibuga cy’indege bifashishije Benz Mercedes y’umukara yasaga nk’iya Idi Amin bashaka kujijisha abari barinze ikibuga, ariko aba bari barinze ikibuga bari bazi ko Idi Amin yahinduye asigaye akoresha Benz y’umweru barasa kuri iyi benz yari izanywe n’abanya-Israel babonye ko bavumbuwe bakomeza birukira aho imbohe zari ziherereye. Mu kurasana kwakurikiyeho abari bafashe imbohe batatu barishwe, ariko n’uwari uyoboye aba bakomando ba Israel, Yonatan Netanyahu, umuvandimwe wa Minisitiri w’Intebe Netanyahu nawe yicwa bari kuva ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe. Nubwo byagenze gutyo ariko iri tsinda ry’abasirikare ryabashije kubohoza imbohe zose zari zisigaye rizisubiza muri Israel. Mu myaka yakurikiye iki gikorwa, cyaje no kujya kitwa Operation Yonatan mu rwego rwo guha icyubahiro uyu mukomando wakiguyemo.

title: Ibikorwa 10 bya Special Forces byagenze uko bitateguwe bikagira ingaruka
article_text:
Ibikorwa 10 bya Special Forces byagenze uko bitateguwe bikagira ingaruka

 Mu bihugu bitandukanye hari imitwe kabuhariwe ya gisirikare ikora akazi gateye ubwoba kadapfa gukorwa n’abandi basirikare basanzwe kandi bakagakora neza. Ku rundi ruhande ariko wirengagije uko iyi mitwe iba yaratojwe hari igihe igira gutya ikisanga mu bintu idashobora kugenzura bigatuma ubutumwa yahawe budasohozwa. Dore ibikorwa bitanu mu uhereye inyuma mu icumi tuzabagezaho bitagenze uko byari byateguwe. Mu 2014, umutwe wa Navy Seals wo mu gisirikare cya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika wagerageje igikorwa cyo kubohoza imbohe zari zarafungiwe muri Yemen na Al Qaida. Iki gihugu nubwo cyari kirimo ibirindiro by’ingabo za Amerika ntibyabujije ko kiza no kuba indiri y’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba.  Mu bantu bari bafashwe bugwate, harimo uwahoze ari umunyamakuru w’Umunyamerika, Luke Somers. Uyu mugabo wavukiye mu Bwongereza, yabaga muri Yemen ubwo yashimutwaga mu 2013. Umutwe wa Seals wabashije kubohoza imbohe 8 ndetse yivugana ibyihebe 7. Nyamara ariko, Somers n’izindi mbohe 4 bari bimuwe aho bari bafungiye mbere y’igitero cyo kujya kumubohoza. Nyuma hakurikiyeho ibikorwa byo kumubohoza na bagenzi be. [xyz-ihs snippet="google-pub"] Kubw’amahirwe macye ariko, ubwo hageragezwaga kumubohoza bwa kabiri, Somers n’indi mbohe barakomeretse bikabije abashinzwe ubutabazi bagerageza kubavura ariko ntibyagira icyo bitanga. Iyo mbohe yindi yaje gupfira mu ndege yari ibacyuye, mu gihe Somers we yaje gupfa nyuma gato bageze aho bari bajyanywe ku bwato bwa gisirikare butwara indege. Nyuma y’iki gikorwa, igisirikare cyanenzwe kunanirwa gutabara Somers nubwo izindi mbohe hafi ya zose zari zabohojwe, ndetse hongerwaho ko n’ubundi izo mbohe zo zendaga no kurekurwa. Umutwe wa SAS (Special Air Service) wo mu Bwongereza, ufatwa nk’umutwe w’ingabo zidasanzwe wa mbere ku Isi kugeza ubu. Nyamara ariko, n’abasirikare batojwe neza ngo bashobora gutungurirwa ku rugamba. Ibi ni nabyo byabaye kuri uyu mutwe mbere gato y’Intambara yo mu Kigobe. Kugeza n’uyu munsi, ngo hakomeje kugaragara ubuhamya buvuguruzanya ku byabaye mu by’ukuri icyo gihe. Nk’uko byatangajwe n’umwe mu bari bahawe ubutumwa, ngo bari bahawe inshingano zo kwegeranya amakuru no gutegura aho bazajya bagenzurira ibikorwa byabo mbere y’uko ingabo zo ku butaka zitangiza ibitero. Ku rundi ruhande, undi bari kumwe we avuga ko bari batumwe gusenya imbunda zarasaga missiles za Scud za Irak baharurira ingabo ziteguraga gutera Irak.  Icyabaye ni iki? Mbere yo gusoza ibyo bari batumwe, ahantu aba bakomando bari bakambitse haramenyekanye bituma bagabwaho igitero n’ingabo za Irak. Byabaye ngombwa rero ko SAS ihamagara isaba ko baza kuyikura aho hantu, ariko havuka ikibazo cyo kutumvikana neza kuri radio, birangira iri tsinda ry’abakomando kabuhariwe ritatanyirijwe inyuma y’imirongo y’umwanzi. Nyuma yo gutatana, bamwe mu bari mu itsinda rya SAS ryari ryoherejwe bagiye bicwa umwe kuri umwe, abandi barafatwa, umwe aba ari we wenyine ubasha gucikira muri Syria nyuma yo gukora urugendo rw’ibirometero 180. Abandi basigaye bafashwe baje kurekurwa nyuma y’ibyumweru byinshi barakorewe iyicarubozo rikabije. Imyaka micye nyuma y’iki gikorwa kitagenze uko cyari cyateguwe, abari bakirimo bagiye bashinjanya kuba umwe ari we nyirabayazana wo kuba ubu butumwa butaragezweho ndetse n’urupfu rwa bagenzi babo. Bivugwa ko uyu mutwe wari wahawe izina ry’ibanga rya Bravo-Two-Zero na n’ubu ukomeje kwandikwaho ibintu byinshi mu byaranze Operation Desert Storm ndetse unakorwaho filimi n’imikino izwi nka video games.  Umubano wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’igihugu cya Iran mu myaka isaga mirongo ine ishize ntiwigeze wifata neza na gato. Abayobozi b’iki gihugu bakunze gushinjwa gutegekesha igitugu no kubangamira ubwisanzure. Ariko, ubwo habagaho Impinduramatwara muri iki Gihugu nibwo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’ubukaka bwazo zakojejwe isoni. Iki gikorwa cyiswe Eagle Craw nicyo nyirabayazana kw’uku gukozwa isoni kwa Amerika. Ni igikorwa cyari cyateguwe ku bufatanye bwa CIA, umutwe kabuhariwe wa gisirikare wa Delta Forces ndetse n’umutwe wa Rangers hagamijwe na none kubohoza imbohe zari zifungiye muri Iran. Byarangiye rero izi mbohe zitabohojwe ndetse bituma na perezida Jimmy carter atakaza akazi ke.  Bivugwa ko imitegurire mibi n’ibikoresho bitameze neza byatumye ubu butumwa busubikwa abari babutumwemo bageze aho bagombaga gukorera. Ariko, ubwo aba biteguraga kuva aha ngo basubire iwabo, ikosa rya kimuntu ryatumye kajugujugu ikora impanuka igonga indege yagombaga gukoreshwa mu kubatwara abantu bari bayirimo bose barapfa. Mu gushaka kuhava rero n’ubwoba bwinshi, byabaye ngombwa ko hasigara kajugujugu 5 zose zimeze neza harimo 2 zahise zinjizwa mu bikoresho by’igisirikare cyo mu kirere cya Iran. Nyuma yahoo, imbohe zendaga kubohozwa zahise zimurirwa ahandi hantu hatandukanye amahirwe yari ahari yo kuzibohoza arayoyoka. Izi mbohe ariko nyuma zaje kurekurwa nyuma yo gusinya amasezerano ya Alger bivugwa ko na n’ubu akigira uruhare rukomeye mu mubano wa Iran na Amerika. Iki gikorwa cyagizwemo uruhare na SEALS ndetse n’umutwe uzwiho kugaba ibitero by’indege wiswe SOAR (  Special Operations Aviation Regiment   ), cyateguwe hagamijwe gushyira hasi abatalibani bo mu misozi yo muri Afghanistan. Umutwe umwe ugizwe n’iyi mitwe yombi waregeranyijwe, umutwe ugizwe n’abakomando bane ba Seals ubanza koherezwa gutata. Kubw’ibyago, aba bakomando bane baguye mu gaco k’Abataliban habaho kurasana abagera kuri batatu bahasiga ubuzima harokoka umwe.  Hahise hoherezwa byihuse abagombaga gutabara, bakirizwa za RPG n’amasasu y’imbunda nto. Indege imwe ya kajugujugu (Blackhawks) yarashwe igisasu cya RPG irahanuka abakomando 16 bari bayirimo bahita bapfa. Ibi nabyo ngo bikaba byaratewe no kutumvikana neza ku itumanaho. Nyuma yaho, uwarokotse muri ba ba Seals bane witwa Luttrell nawe watabawe n’abaturage, yaje kwandika igitabo cy’ibintu yabonye icyo gihe gihita kinashingirwaho hakorwa film yiswe Lone Survivor. Uru rugamba ni rumwe muzo Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zitazibagirwa zarwaniye muri Afurika mu 1993. Ni urugamba Amerika yaburiyemo abasirikare bagera kuri 18 ndetse rukorwaho film yiswe Black Hawk Down.  Icyari kigamijwe muri iki gikorwa kwari uguta muri yombi ba komanda b’uwari umuyobozi w’inyeshyamba kandi biteganyijwe ko igikorwa kitagomba kurenza isaha. Nyamara, nyuma y’uko imwe muri kajugujugu yari iri gucungira umutekano abari baciye ku butaka ihanuwe, ubutumwa bwo gufata abayobozi b’inyeshyamba bwahise buhinduka ubwo gukiza amagara ku bari batumwe. Ibintu byahise bikomera byihuse amagana y’Abasomali agotera ingabo za Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika muri Mogadishu, ziza kuhava nabwo bigoranye zifashijwe n’imodoka z’imitamenwa za division ya 10 y’ingabo za Amerika yari mu misozi zifatanyije n’ingabo za Loni. Nyuma yo gupfuba kw’iki gikorwa, ingabo zo mu mutwe udasanzwe za Amerika zose zahise zikurwa muri Somalia zirataha.  Reka dusubikire aha ubutaha tuzabagezaho ibindi bikorwa bitanu bya gisirikare bisigaye bitagenze uko byari byateguwe bikagira ingaruka ku basirikare babaga batumwe.
