title: Intambara zahitanye abantu benshi kurusha izindi mu mateka y’Isi
article_text:
Intambara zahitanye abantu benshi kurusha izindi mu mateka y’Isi

 Ubusanzwe buri muntu wese avukana uburenganzira bwo kubaho ariko rimwe na rimwe abandi bantu bima bagenzi babo b’inzirakarengane ubu burenganzira bakabica (Jenoside, abanyagitugu batagira umutima, intambara hagati y’abaturage, ubwicanyi bukorewe abantu benshi). Kenshi iyo ibintu nk’ibi bibaye, ibihugu bifite imbaraga biratera bigahagarika abanyagitugu cyangwa ubutegetsi bukorera abaturage babyo ubugizi bwa nabi. Kimwe mu bintu byakunze kuranga ikiremwamuntu kuva cyagera ku Isi ni ukurwana hagati yacyo. Rimwe narimwe guhangana birenga imbibi bikagera no ku bantu b’inzirakarengane. Niyo mpamvu twabateguriye urutonde rw’intambara cyangwa amakimbirane yagiye ahitana abantu benshi n’aho ubwicanyi bwagiye bubera. [xyz-ihs snippet="google-pub"]  01. Intambara ya II y’Isi  Intambara ya Kabiri y’Isi ni intambara yahuje isi yose yatangiye  mu 1939 irangira mu 1945. Iyi ntambara yagiyemo ibihugu hafi ya byose byo ku isi birimo n’ibyibihangange kurusha ibindi haza kuvuka impande 2 zari zihanganye. Iyi niyo ntambara yamamaye kurusha izindi ku Isi yahuriyemo abasirikare babarirwa muri miliyoni 100. Iyi ntambara yashyizwemo imbaraga zose zari zihari, yaguyemo abaturage b’abasivili benshi cyane, ibamo jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi, ikoreshwamo intwaro za kirimbuzi ku buryo yahitanye abantu babarirwa hagati ya miliyoni 40 na miliyoni 70.  02. Imyivumbagatanyo ya Taiping (Taiping Rebellion)  Imyivumbagatanyo ya Taiping isobanurwa nk’intambara hagati y’abaturage yabereye mu majyepfo y’u Bushinwa kuva mu 1850 kugeza mu 1864, yari iyobowe na Hong Xiuquan wari umaze igihe gito abaye umukirisitu, ngo wari wabonekewe agakomeza kwemeza ko ari murumuna wa Yesu Kirisitu, akaba yararwanyaga ubutegetsi bwa Manchu bwari buyobowe n’umuryango wa Qing. Bivugwa ko iyi myivumbagatanyo yaguyemo abantu bagera kuri miliyoni 20 kuzamura biganjemo abasivili. Aya akaba ari amwe mu makimbirane yaguyemo abantu benshi mu mateka y’Isi.  03. Intambara ya I y’Isi  Intambara ya Mbere y’Isi ni intambara ngari yibanze mu Burayi ikaba yaratangiye mu 1914 ikarangira mu Ugushyingo 1918. Iyi ntambara nayo yahuriyemo ibihugu by’ibihangange byo ku Isi nabwo ihuza impande 2. Miliyoni 70 z’abantu zinjiye mu gisirikare harimo Abanyaburayi miliyoni 60. Abarwanyi bagera kuri miliyoni 9 barishwe ahanini bitewe n’aho iterambere mu ikoranabuhanga ryari rigeze mu bijyanye no gukora intwaro. Iyi ntambara nayo yaguyemo abantu babarirwa muri miliyoni 15 kuzamura.  04. Intambara ya Mongol  Ubwami bw’abami bwa Mongol bwabanje kwitwa Leta Ikomeye ya Mongol, bwari ubwami bugari mu kinyejana cya 13 n’icya 14 aho bwavaga muri Aziya yo hagati bukagenda bukagera mu Burayi bw’uburasirazuba ku Nyanka y’u Buyapani bukanyura muri Siberia mu majyaruguru bukagenda bukanafata no muri Aziya y’amajyepfo ashyira uburasirazuba. Ubu bwami bwigeze kuba ubwami bw’abami bunini mu mateka y’isi bungana na kilometero kare 33,000,000 (22% by’ubuso bwose bw’isi) n’abaturage babarirwa muri miliyoni 100. Iyi ntambara yahabaye kuva mu 1207 kugeza mu 1472 yaguyemo abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 30,000,000 na 60.  05. Imyivumbagatanyo ya An Lushan  Iyi ntambara yabereye mu Bushinwa mu gihe cy’ingoma y’aba Tang guhera kuwa 16 Ukuboza 755 kugeza kuwa 17 Gashyantare 763. An Lushan wateje iyi ntambara aba yarahoze ari umujenerali wa Tang, akaza kwiyita Umwami w’Abami ndetse agashinga ubwami bwe mu majyaruguru y’u Bushinwa. Uku kwigomeka kwabayeho ku bwami butatu bwa Tang mbere y’uko Lushan akubitwa inshuro bidasubirwaho. Abantu baguye muri iyi myivumbagatanyo babarirwa hagati ya miliyoni 13 na miliyoni 36.  06. Intambara hagati y’aba Qing n’aba Ming  Umuryango w’aba Qing uzwi no ku izina rya Manchu, niwo wanyuma wayoboye ubwami mu Bushinwa wayoboye kuva mu 1644 kugeza mu 1912. Wari warabanjirijwe n’umuryango wa Ming ndetse wakurikiwe na Repubulika y’u Bushinwa. Intambara hagati y’iyi miryango ibiri yavagamo abami yabaye kuva mu 1616 kugeza mu 1662 yaguyemo abantu babarirwa muri miliyoni 25.  07. Intambara ya Timur -e-Lang  Timur yari umuntu mu buzima bwe wakunze kutavugwaho rumwe ndetse na n’ubu akaba ariko akimeze. Yashatse kongera gusubiranya ubwami bw’abami bwa Mongol ariko aza guhura n’imbogamizi ikomeye ageze mu bwami bwa tatar Golden Horde bwari bumaze kuyoboka Isilamu. Yarwanye intambara nyinshi zagiye zikora kuri leta za kisilamu zimwe nko mu Bwami bw’Abami bwa Ottoman (Turkiya y’ubu). Intambara yagiye ashoza zaguyemo abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 15 na 20.  08. Imyivumbagatanyo ya Dungan  Iyi myivumbagatanyo yaguyemo ababarirwa muri miyoni 8 yabaye kuva mu 1862 kugeza mu 1877, yaranzwe no guhangana hagati y’udutsiko tw’amabandi n’abasirikare ariko ngo bose nta kintu barwanira gifatika nta n’intego bashaka kurwana gusa. Benshi bafashe ko iyi myivumbagatanyo yari igamije gukuraho ubwami bwa Qing ariko nta kimenyetso cyagaragaje ko hariho gahunda yo kugaba ibitero ku murwa mukuru Beijing. Iyo myivumbagatanyo irangiye, abaturage bo muri ubu bwoko bwa Dungan bimukiye ku bwinshi mu Burusiya, Kazakhstan no muri Kyrgyzstan.  09. Intambara hagati y’abaturage mu Burusiya  Intambara hagati y’abaturage mu Burusiya yabaye kuva mu 1917 kugeza mu 1921 yaguyemo abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 5 na miliyoni 9. Ni intambara yahuje impande nyinshi zitandukanye mu cyahoze ari ubwami bw’abami bw’Abarusiya, nyuma y’aho guverinoma y’u Burusiya yari iriho iviriyeho igasimbuzwa iy’Abasoviyete yari iyobowe n’ishyaka rya Bolshevik. Ingabo z’Abasoviyete zabanje kwigarurira Petrograd hanyuma zigarurira u Burusiya bwose.  10. Intambara zo kurwanya Napoleon  Izi ntambara zaranzwe n’ibitero bitandukanye byagabwe n’abantu bishyiraga hamwe ku bwami bw’abami bw’Abafaransa bwari buyobowe na Napoleon. Nyuma y’intambara zatewe n’Impinduramatwara y’Abafaransa mu 1789, imbaraga z’u Bufaransa zagiye zizamuka cyane mu gihe ingabo za Napoleon zabaga zigarurira igice kinini cy’u Burayi, ariko izi mbaraga ziza gucika bigaragara nyuma yo gutera u Burusiya mu 1812. Nyuma y’aha, Ubwami bwa Napoleon bwaje gutsindwa bidasubirwaho busiga hapfuye abantu babarirwa hagati ya miliyoni 3,5 na miliyoni 7. article_text:
Abavuga ko bateye imbere batazi ibiranga umuco ntacyo bibitseho,bari mu busa(Vide)-Ntagwabira

  Umwe mubakora mu nzu ndangamurage y’u Rwanda iherereye mu Karere ka Huye avuga ko umuntu wirata iterambere atazi amateka y’igihugu cye nayaranze abakurambere ntacyo yibitseho ahubwo ari mu busa (Vide).  
[caption id="attachment_53812" align="alignnone" width="800"]  Andre Ntagwabira Umushakashatsi mu izu Ndangamurage z’u Rwanda  [/caption]
Andre Ntagwabira ni umushakashatsi mu nzu ndangamurage z’u Rwanda avuga ko nta muntu ukwiye kubaho atazi amateka n’ibigwi byaranze igihugu cye n’abakurambere kuko bigoye kuba wakwirata ko uri iki niki nyamara ukiyitiranya.Ngo kuko biba bigoye kuba umuntu yakwiyita umunyabwenge cyangwa umukire nyamara atarajya kureba ahashyinguye umurage we.
[xyz-ihs snippet="google-pub"]
Ntagwabira akomeza avuga ko abanyarwanda bagifite ikintu cyo kudashaka kumenya bimwe mubiranga amateka yabo aho usanga bamwe muri bo baba baturiye ahantu nyaburanga badatinya kubyangiza nyamara aribyo birango by’amateka y’ahantu cyangwa umuco wabo.
Uyu mushakashatsi avuga ko iki ari ikibazo gikomeye inzu ndangamurage zifite cyo kuba bamwe mu Banyarwanda batumva ibijyanye n’umurage wabo ngo babashe kubirinda no kuba nta bakozi benshi ngo bakwire kuri utwo duce turiho ibintu nyaburanga.Kuba ubushobozi budahagije ngo babashe kugura ahari ibintu nyaburanga biherereye mu mirima y’abaturage no kuba nta tegeko ryari ririho ryarindaga ibyo bikorwa.
Eileen Oliver uturuka mu gihugu cya Amerika waje gusura u Rwanda aganira na bwiza.com yavuze ko yaje gusura inzu ndangamurage y’Urwanda i Huye aratiwe na mu genzi wayisuye amukangurira kutazava mu Rwanda atayisuye.
[caption id="attachment_53813" align="alignnone" width="800"]  Eileen Oliver yishimiye inzu Ndangamurage y’u Rwanda ya Huye  [/caption]
Eileen avuga ko yishimiye inzu ndangamurage y’u Rwanda iherereye mu Karere ka Huye kuko yakunze uburyo inyubako zayo ziteye,uburyo ari ntoya kandi ukabona buri kimwe uko bikurikirana,uburyo imbere iri kuri gahunda ,n’uko hasa ndetse no kuba yaramenye amateka n’umuco by’Abanyarwanda.
[xyz-ihs snippet="google-pub"]
Mu Rwanda ubu harabarirwa amasite afite ubutumwa atanga ku umuco w’abanyarwanda agera kuri 550,afite ibimenyetso biyaranga arenze 150.Nta kindi cyatuma umuntu abasha kumenya ibyerekeye umuco n’amateka usibye gusura inzu ndangamurage kuko iyo uri Umunyarwanda woroherezwa kuhasura.

title: Umwaka w’imikino ushobora kurangira Suarez atongeye gukinira FC Barcelona
article_text:
Umwaka w’imikino ushobora kurangira Suarez atongeye gukinira FC Barcelona

 Abaganga b’ikipe ya FC Barcelona bagaragaje ko Umunya-Uruguay Luis Suarez agomba kumara amezi ane hanze y’ikibuga, nyuma y’imvune yagiriye mu mukino ikipe ye iheruka gutsindwamo na Atlertico Madrid ibitego 3-2. Ku wa gatanu w’iki cyumweru ni bwo aya makipe yombi yari yahuye, mu mukino wa Super Cup ya Espagne wabereye muri Arabie Saoudite. Suarez yakinnye iminota yose y’uyu mukino, gusa nyuma yawo biza kugaragara ko yagize ikibazo mu ivi ry’iburyo. Kuri iki cyumweru ni bwo uyu mugabo w’imyaka 32 y’amavuko yabazwe n’umuganga w’inzobere mu kubaga imvune witwa Ramon Cugat ukomoka muri Espagne. Kuba Suarez agomba kumara amezi ane hanze y’ikibuga, bisobanuye ko uyu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/2020 ushobora kurangira atongeye kugaragara mu kibuga, dore ko imikino y’amarushanwa atandukanye yo ku mugabane w’Uburayi izarangirana n’ukwezi kwa Gicurasi uyu mwaka. Kubura Suarez ni icyuho gikomeye cyane ku ruhande rwa FC Barcelona kuko ari mu bayifatiye runini. Avunitse mu gihe iyi kipe ikomeje urugamba rwo guhanganira na Real Madrid igikombe cya shampiyona ya Espagne, ndetse ikaba inakiri mu irushanwa rya UEFA Champions league na Copa Del Rey.

title: Abakinnyi batanu ba Eritrea bageze muri Uganda baburirwa irengero
article_text:
Abakinnyi batanu ba Eritrea bageze muri Uganda baburirwa irengero

  Abakinnyi batanu b’ikipe y’igihugu ya Eritrea y’abatarengeje imyaka 20 bavuye muri hoteli bari bacumbitsemo muri Uganda ntibongera kuboneka.  Bamwe mu bakurikirana iyi kipe babwiye BBC ko aba bakinnyi bacitse ndetse ubu bakaba bari gusaba ubuhungiro muri Uganda. Ikipe ya Eritrea yagiye muri Uganda mu mikino ya CECAFA y’abatarengeje imyaka 20 ubu igeze mu mikino ya nyuma. Bwana Aimable Habimana umuyobozi ushinzwe iri rushanwa yabwiye ibinyamakuru muri Uganda ko aba bakinnyi koko babuze. Avuga ko baburiye muri Speke Apartments aho bari bacumbitse. Bwana Habimana yabwiye ikinyamakuru Monitor ati: "Ubu twashyize abashinzwe umutekano aho bacumbitse no hafi y’iyi kipe kugira ngo irushanwa rizarangire neza". Iyi kipe ya Eritrea yari yitwaye neza kuko ubu igeze muri kimwe cya kabiri cy’irangiza (demi-finale) aho ikina na Kenya uyu munsi kuwa gatatu. Ntabwo ingaruka zo kubura kw’aba bakinnyi zizwi neza ku musaruro w’iyi kipe uyu munsi. Umutoza ubu asigaranye abakinnyi 14, gusa yavuze ko abatorotse bari banarwaye. Mu 2015 abakinnyi 10 b’ikipe y’igihugu nkuru ya Eritrea banze gusubira mu gihugu cyabo nyuma yo gukina umukino muri Botswana. Mu 2013 abakinnyi icyenda (9) ba Eritrea n’umutoza wabo batorokeye muri Kenya Imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu ivuga ko urubyiruko ibihumbi amagana rwa Eritrea rwahunze kubera ibikorwa bibi rukorerwa birimo n’imirimo ya gisirikare y’itegeko.

title: Wema Sepetu na Hamisa Mobetto mu rugamba rwo guhozanya nyuma yo gutandukana na Diamond
article_text:
Wema Sepetu na Hamisa Mobetto mu rugamba rwo guhozanya nyuma yo gutandukana na Diamond

 Abanya-Tanzaniyakazi, Hamisa Mobetto na Wema Sepetu bose bahuriye ku kuba barahoze ari abakunzi b’umuhanzi Diamond Platnumz batangiye inzira yo kubaka ubucuti birengagije kuba abantu babafata nk’abakeba. Wema Sepetu yavuze ko atifuza gukomeza kugirana umwiryane na mukeba we Mobetto kandi nyamara barahoze baziranye mbere y’uko bahinduka abakeba, avuga ko nyuma y’ibyababayeho bakwiye kuba inshuti ubuzima bugakomeza. Ibi yabivuze nyuma yo kwereka abamukurikira ku rubuga rwa Instagram umwambaro mwiza yavuze ko yambitswe n’iduka ricuruza imyenda rya Hamisa Mobetto rizwi nka ‘Mobetto Style’ arangije amushimira kuba yamwambitse. Wema Sepetu wanabaye Nyampinga w’iki gihugu muri 2006 ndetse akanagihagararira mu irushanwa ry’ubwiza ku rwego rw’Isi, ubwo itangazamakuru ryamubazaga uko abona Mobetto  yagize ati “Hamisa ndamuzi kuva kera. Muzi atari yanahura na Diamond, muzi kuva mu bwana.”  "Twese twahuye n’ibibazo ariko muzi neza ko ubuzima bugomba gukomeza. Sinkiri kumwe na Diamond na we ntibari kumwe. Rero simbona impamvu tugomba kugirana urwangano.” Abajijwe niba na mugenzi wabo w’umunya-Kenya Tanasha Donna na we yiteguye ko baba inshuti we yanze kugira icyo avuga ahubwo araseka cyane. Aba bombi babarirwa mu bakobwa beza mu gihugu cya Tanzania ndetse bombi bakaba abanyamideri. Ni bamwe mu bakobwa bane bakundanye na Diamond Platnumz ariko bose bakaba baratandukanye na we. Wema Sepetu na Diamond bagiranye ibihe byiza mu rukundo ku buryo benshi babonaga ko ari na we bagomba gushyingiranwa ariko baza gutungurwa n’uburyo batandukanye, uyu muhanzi agahita amusimbuza mugenzi we Hamisa Mobetto.

title: Abapasiteri babiri bakaswe imitwe bahorwa ukwemera kwabo
article_text:
Abapasiteri babiri bakaswe imitwe bahorwa ukwemera kwabo 

  Ubwo abakiristu bakorerwaga urugomo mu mujyi wa Addis-Abeba muri Ethiopie abapasiteri babiri baciwe imitwe bahorwa uku kwemera kwabo.  Ikigega "Barnabas Fund" gitangaza ko abakirisito batari borohewe ubwo aba bapasiteri bacibwaga imitwe, by’umwihariko n’insengero nyinshi ngo zikaba zaratwitswe uyu mwaka. Amakuru atangazwa n’ikinyamakuru ichretien avuga ko abakirisito benshi bagenda bahunga umujyi wa Ginir ubarizwamo abasilamu benshi, ubarizwa mu Bilometero 483 uvuye mu Majyepfo y’umurwa mukuru w’iki gihugu. Igisirikare muri iki gihugu ngo kikaba cyarahagurukiye ubu bwicanyi nyuma yaho mu gace ka Oromia, kari mu Mujyi wa Addis-Abeba abantu 67 bari bamaze kwicwa abandi 213 barakomereka.

title: Urugomo mu Madini — Igice cya Kane
article_text:
Urugomo mu Madini — Igice cya Kane

 3.2. Urugomo (violence) : Gusesengura violence duhereye mu byahishuwe (rÃ©vÃ©lation) Ibyahishuwe ni amagambo azwi nk’ava ku Mana. Muri uwo murongo nta cyava ku Mana cyagombye kurangwamo urugomo cg ibisa narwo kuko bivuye ku Mana y’Ukuri, ikunda Ukuri kandi y’Urukundo. Mu nyandiko nyinshi zitandukanye ndetse mu bitabo byitwa bitagatifu harangwamo imvugo z’urugomo rweruye. Aha havuka ibibazo bibiri : 1/Ese koko ibyo twita ibitabo bitagatifu byahishuwe byavuye ku Mana ? 2/ Imana nziza y’Amahoro yashyigikira urugomo ? Mu kugerageza gusubiza ibi bibazo turareba imiterere y’ibyitwa ijambo ry’Imana. Nkuko nabivuze hejuru ijambo ry’Imana haba mu myumvire ya kisilamu cg iya gikristu, Ijambo ry’Imana kenshi riza rije gusobanura igikorwa abantu bakoze hagati yabo, noneho Imana ikazana urumuri kuri cyo cg se igisobanuro, icyerekezo. Dufashe urugero kw’ivanjiri ya Yezu. Yohani 6:1-16 Yezu atubura imigati. Ikigaragara ni uko icyitwa ijambo ry’Imana gihera ku bantu baje basanga Yezu ahantu ku Kiyaga cya TibÃ©riade. Si Imana itangiye ivuga,ahubwo ni igikorwa kibaye noneho Imana ihatangira ubutumwa. Ibi rero bivuze ko iyo dusanze urugomo mu byahishuwe, biba ari Imana ivuga urugomo ruri mu Bantu noneho ikaza kubabwira uko babyitwaramo. Ibyo kandi bishobora no gushingira k’uburyo iyo mbaga (Oumat cg nation) ibayeho, niba urogomo ari rwo rurangiza ibibazo hagati y’abantu, Imana yaruvugaho nk’ibibutsa uko basanzwe bacyemura ibibazo byabo, noneho nyuma ikazabagarura ku nzira yo kurwirinda. Bishobora no kuba kandi mu mvugo isa n’itinyisha nk’ubwira Umwana ati ni wongera ndaguca amatwi nyamara utayamuca. Aha biza gutera ikibazo kuko inyandiko dufite uyu munsi zamanutse mu buryo bw’imvugo nyamara twe tukaba tubitunze nk’ibyanditse. (diffÃ©rence entre l’oral et l’Ã©crit). Urugero rwa Coran 9:5 ; cg 9:29 , Bibiliya Marc 9:42. Ubisoma mu gitabo uyu munsi abifata nk’itegeko nyamara mu gihe cy’ihishurwa byari mu rurimi gusa nko guca intege (dissuasion) uyu munsi tukabifata nk’ihame kuko tutiha umwanya wo kubisesengura bya nyabyo twitwaje ihame ry’uko ibivuye ku Mana bidasuzumwa, bifatwa uko bije n’uko byumvikanye byumvikanishijwe n’abiyise abahagararizi b’ubwo butumwa. (mÃ©diateurs) Kuri iyi violence hiyongeraho violence ivugwa izaranga Umunsi w’Imperuka, aho Imana ivuga uko izagenza abayigometseho mu buzima bwabo bwo mw’isi. 3.2.1. Gusesengura violence duhereye mu buryo abantu bagennye imyemerere (conceptualisation thÃ©ologique) guerre juste : St Augustin, St Thomas D’Aquin, Jihad : Intambara ntagatifu mu bayisilamu. Uretse ko violence iboneka mu bitabo byitwa bitagatifu, tunayisanga mu nyigisho zakozwe n’abayobozi b’amadini zizwi nka theologiya cg sciences z’idini (ulum diin). Nta warondora ibice bikubiyemo izo nyigisho ngo azirangize. Tugiye kurebera hamwe ibihe bikomeye byaranze iyo myigishirize. Mu bukristu uwitwa Mutagatifu Augustini (354-430) yatangije ihame ryitwa Intambara ikwiye (la guerre juste) uwitwa St Thomas d’Aquin(1225-1274) mu k’umwunganira abyita intambara ntagatifu (guerre sainte). Ubusanzwe ihame ry’amadini rivuga ko amadini akomora ibyo avuga kw’Ijambo ry’Imana. Nyamara iyo witegereje imikorere yayo usanga ahubwo ibyo yita Ijambo ry’Imana rimara Umuhango wo kuyabera ishingiro (lÃ©gitimitÃ©) bamara kuyifata bakisubirira mu byabo twakwita gakondo (tradition). Uwitwa Frank Bourgeois avuga kw’inyigisho za Saint Augustin azivana kuri Platon, akanyura kuri Aristote agakomeza no kwa CicÃ©ron mu buryo bemezaga Intambara batezaga mu bo bitaga aba « Barbares ». Ikigaragara ni uko Saint Augustin n’abandi bitwa pÃ¨res latins de l’Eglise basimbutse Yezu bavuga ko bakurikira ndetse banakorera bajya gushaka kure mu mico (y’abagiliki ba mbere). Frank Bourgeois yibaza ikibazo n’undi wese yakwibaza agira ati : [···] : ni ryari ibitekerezo by’aba philosophes b’abapagani byinjiye bikanashyirwa mu myigishirize ya Gikristu kugeza ubwo byinjijwe mu mategeko ya Kiliziya (droit canon) ? Iki kibazo kijyanye n’Intambara Amadini(ndaza kubyerekana no mu buyisilamu kuko hose bisa) yita ntagatifu gihabanye n’Ijambo ry’Imana. Yesu mu nyingisho ze ntarwanya gusa Urugomo, ntaruteza ntanarushyigikira ahubwo ajya kure guhashya impamvu shingiro ziruteza. Mw’Ivanjiri ya Mat 5 : 43-44 agaragaza uburyo bwo kurenga kure impamvu z’ururgomo aho agaragaza ko nta mwanzi, ukwiye kubaho n’iyo we yaba abishaka, Paulo mu rwandiko ku Baroma 12 : 17-18 agaragaza imvugo isa n’iyo dusanga muri coran nzavugaho nyuma ko nta mpamvu yo kubaho kw’uwo twakwita Umwanzi. Bityo tugatsindira urugomo mw’ikubitiro (Ã l’origine) aho gushaka kurunesha twamaze kuruteza. St Augustin na bagenzi be uko nabavuze hejuru, bashyira imbere uburyo bwo kururwanya nyamara bagize uruhare m’ukuruteza igihe babona bagenzi babo mu yindi shusho y’abandi (les autres). Ibi bitandukanye n’inyigisho za Yezu kuko atugaragariza isoko yo kugira Roho y’Imana (nafsi) muri twe bityo, undi akatubera indorerwamo yacu muri we aho kuba undi duhindura Umwanzi ngo kuko tutumva ibintu kimwe. Ibi byagaragaye aho Kiliziya yarwanyije inatwika abitwa Abatannye (hÃ©rÃ©sie) ; mu ntambara zizwi kw’izina ry’abanyamisaraba (croisades), inquisitions, tutibagiwe uburyo yahembereye urwango ku Bayahudi bikabaviramo gÃ©nocide. Uwitwa Henri Tincq mu nyandiko ye yo ku wa 09/09/015 yise Violence et sacrÃ© yaribajije Ati : Bishoboka bite kw’idini yakorewe urugomo yamara gutsinda nayo ikarukorera abandi ? (religion persÃ©cutÃ©e devient persÃ©cutrice) Henri akomeza avuga ko Kiliziya ibwira abayoboke bayo ko uretse n’uko barwana intambara ntagagatifu, iyo ntambara inabaha ubutagatifu bo ubwabo, bityo uguye k’urugamba nka ruriya ahinduka igitambo (martyr) : (uko niko na Daesh yigisha) N’ubwo Abapadiri ba mbere (les pÃ¨res de l’Ã©glise) barimo Tertullien, OrigÃ¨ne, babanje kwanga ko abakristu barwana, OrigÃ¨ne yokejwe igitutu na Celse w’Umupagani wabaregaga ko babaho nk’indorerezi, yageze aho yemera ko bikwiye kw’abakirisitu barwana barengera Ingoma yabo (y’Abaromani) barwanya abo bitaga aba « barabares ». Uwitwa Ambroise wa Millan, akaba n’umuyoboke wa CicÃ©ron arerura avuka ko kurwanya aba barbare bihwanye n’ivanjiri ya Yezu maze abishishikariza abapadiri yayoboraga . Nibutse k’uyu Ambroise ari m’ubo St Augustin akomoraho inyigisho ze. Ashingiye kuri izo nyigisho, uwitwa Saint Bernard de Clervaux (1090-1153) ahimbiraho inyandiko yamamaye yiswe Eloge de la nouvelle milice yahamagariraga abeza mu bakristu kwica aba Sarasins (abasilamu). Ibi birakwereka ubukana, urukundo rwo kwica no gupfa mu cyizere cyo kubona ijuru ry’Imana. Iyi mivugire y’aba banyedini ba gikristu irasa neza neza n’iy’abasilamu bakora ibikorwa nka biriya mw’izina ry’idini mu cyiswe Jihad.

title: Rwamagana: Umukilisitu yatunguye benshi yitanga Telefoni ihita inagurishirizwa mu Kiliziya
article_text:
Rwamagana: Umukilisitu yatunguye benshi yitanga Telefoni ihita inagurishirizwa mu Kiliziya

  Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 15 Nzeri 2019, ubwo Abakirisitu bakoraga igikorwa cyo gutanga amafaranga azakoreshwa mu munsi mukuru wa Yubile y’imyaka 100 paruwasi ya Rwamagana imaze ishinzwe, umukirisitu yatunguye bagenzi be atanga telefoni igendanwa igurishirizwa mu kiliziya bisabwe n’abakirisitu.  Hari mu misa ya Gatatu yasomwe na padiri mukuru, Jean Marie Theophile Ingabire, muri buri misa yabereye kuri iyo paruwasi ku cyumweru, komisiyo ishinzwe gutegura yubile ya Paruwasi yasabye abakirisitu kwitanga kugira ngo haboneke amafaranga agera kuri miliyoni zirindwi zizifashijwa mu birori bizaba ku wa Gatandatu. Misa ya Gatatu umukirisitu yaratunguranye avuga ko nta mafaranga afite yo gutanga ariko ko icyo afite yatanga ari telefoni . Yagize ati "Ndashimira Imana ibyo yankoreye nkaba ntaze iyi telefoni yanjye, amafaranga azayigura azavamo inkunga ntanze ya Yubile ya paruwasi". Uwo mukirisitukazi akimara kuva imbere y’imbaga y’abakirisitu bamwe mu bakirisitu basabye ko bagura iyo telefone, batangira kuyigeraga yishyurwa amafaranga ibihumbi cumi na bitanu y’u Rwanda. Ubwitange bw’uwo mukirisitu bwatumye abakirisitu bitabira gutanga inkunga yo gutegura Yubile harimo n’umugabo wavuze ko atanze ibitoki bibiri n’inkoko. Padiri mukuru wa Paruwasi ya Rwamagana, Jean Marie Theophile Ingabire yashimiye abakirisitu ayoboye uburyo bitanzemo bakavugurura kiriziya yabo. Mu gihe kitagera ku mezi 6 batanze amafaranga yo kuvugura kiliziya arenga miliyoni 60 ndetse banatanze inkunga yagenewe ibirori bya Yubile ya Paruwasi yabo ku buryo hateganyijwe ko bazakoresha amafaranga asaga miliyoni zirindwi. Yubile y’imyaka ijana Paruwasi ya Rwamagana imaze ishinzwe izizihizwa ku wa Gatandatu tariki 21 Nzeri 2019, ibirori byo kuyizihiza bikazabera mu mbuga yubatswe ku nkunga ya Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame.     Ngabonziza Justin/ Bwiza.com

title: Rwamagana: Abakirisitu gaturika barashima Perezida Kagame wabateye inkunga
article_text:
Rwamagana: Abakirisitu gaturika barashima Perezida Kagame wabateye inkunga

  Abakirisitu gaturika bo muri Paruwasi ya Rwamagana, barishimira ko Perezida wa Repubulika, Paul Kagame yabateye inkungu yo kububakira imbuga ya Kiliziya, ubu bakaba bagiye kuyikoreramo ibirori byo kwizihiza yubile y’imyaka 100.      Ku wa 25 Ukuboza 2009 nibwo Perezida Kagame yifatanyije n’abakirisitu mu gitambo cya Misa cyatuwe n’uwari umushumba wa Diyoseze ya Kibungo, Musenyeri Kizito Bahujimihigo, amaze kubona ko imbuga ya kiliziya yarimo umukungugu wabangamiraga abakirisitu bagiye mu misa, yemereye paruwasi kuyibubakira hakoreshejwe amabuye ‘amapave’ . Mukarutegesha Cecile ni umukirisitu wa Paruwasi ya Rwamagana, yemeza ko Perezida wa Repulika yatumye nabo bagira urukundo rwo kwiyemeza kuvugurura kiliziya yabo. Yagize ati “Abakirisitu ba Rwamagana turishimira imyaka 100 kiliziya yacu imaze ishinzwe, tunishimira ibyo twagezeho muri iyo myaka yose, twagejejweho amashuri, amavuriro ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa byinshi byafashije abaturage mu iterambere tukaba tunashimira umukuru w’igihugu cyacu, Paul Kagame ku nkunga yaduteye akatwubakira iyi mbuga ya Kiliziya yari ibangamiye abakirisitu”. Umuyobozi wa Santarari ya Rwamagana, Sekamandwa Anatole, ati “Muri iyi myaka turishimira ko tugiye kwizihiza Yubile tumaze kuvugurura iyi ngoro yacu ariko kandi turashimira Perezida wa Repulika Paul Kagame wadufashije akadutera inkunga, murabizi ko mu minsi ishize amadini yasabwe gukora isuku imbere ya za Kiriziya n’insengero ariko twagize amahirwe kuko Perezida wacu yari yaradufashije ikubakwaho amapave, ndahamya ko iyo bidakorwa mbere byari kutugora kuko ntitwari kubifatanya no gusana kiliziya kugira ngo twizihize Yubile mu ngoro ivuguruye”. Padiri mukuru wa Paruwasi ya Rwamagana, Jean Marie Theophile Ingabire, na we arashimira perezida wa Repulika akanasaba abakirisitu ayobora kugandukira Imana. Aragira ati ”Ndashimira Nyakubahwa perezida wa Repulika uburyo yaduteye inkunga kuko iriya mbuga mubona ni nini cyane kandi mbere hari umukungugu mwinshi iyo imvura yagwaga hahindukaga nk’ikiyaga ugasanga abakirisitu binjira mu kiliziya n’ibyondo byinshi ariko ku nkunga ya Perezida wa Repulika imbuga yarakozwe ndetse hakorwa n’uruzitiro ku buryo iriya mbuga tuyifashisha iyo abakirisitu babaye benshi tuyisomeraho misa bitewe n’uko mu kiriziya abakiritu barenga 1500 batahakwirwa”. Padiri Jean Marie Theophile Arakomeza asaba abakirisitu ayoboye kuzizihiza  Yubile babohotse imbere y’Imana, barangwa n’ubumwe n’urukundo. Kiliziya ya Rwamagana yubatswe mu mwaka wa 1933 itahwa ku mugaragaro mu 1934, Abakirisitu bagize uruhare mu kuyubaka bavuga ko uwari umutware w’Ubuganza, Francois Rwabutogo yagize uruhare rukomeye mu kuyubaka. Yubile y’imyaka ijana Paruwasi ya Rwamagana imaze ishinzwe izizihizwa ku wa Gatandatu tariki 21 Nzeri 2019, ibirori byo kuyizihiza bikazabera muri iyi mbuga yubatswe ku nkunga ya Perezida wa Repubulika.   Ngabonziza Justin/Bwiza.com

title: Muri Afurika niho abanyagaturika bari kwiyongera kurusha ahandi ku Isi
article_text:
Muri Afurika niho abanyagaturika bari kwiyongera kurusha ahandi ku Isi

  Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 4 Nzeri 2019, nibwo Papa Francis aratangira uruzinduko mu bihugu bitatu bya Afurika, ruraba ari uruzinduko rwe rwa kane kuva yagirwa umushumba wa kiliziya gatolika ku isi mu 2013.  Uwo yasimbuye, Benedict XVI, yasuye Afurika kabiri. Akamaro uyu mugabane ufitiye kiliziya Gatorika kahinirwa mu ijambo rimwe - kwiyongera. Afurika ni ho hantu abagatolika bari kwiyongera kurusha ahandi ku isi, mu gihe aho iri dini rikomoka mu Burayi barushaho kugabanuka nk’uko ubushakashatsi bw’ikigo Pew Research Center cyo muri Amerika bubyerekana. I Burayi, abenshi mu bavuga ko ari abakiristu gatolika ngo ntibitabira ibikorwa by’idini ryabo. Ikiriho ariko kandi, abakiristu no mu yandi madini bari kwiyongera cyane muri Afurika. Pew Research Center iteganya ko mu 2050 abantu barenga bane mu 10 b’abakiristu ku isi bazaba bari muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara. Ubushakashatsi bwatangajwe na Center for Applied Research yo muri Amerika bwerekanye ko hagati ya 1980 na 2012 umubare w’abagatolika ku isi wiyongereye ku kigero cya 57% bakagera kuri miliyari 1,2. Uku kwiyongera ariko ngo kwari guto i Burayi kuko kwari ku kigero cya 6% mu gihe muri Afurika kwari ku kigero cya 283%. Ubu bushakashatsi bwavuze ko icyo gihe abagatolika muri Afurika bari hafi miliyoni 200. Nicolette Manglos-Weber, umwalimu w’iyobokamana na sosiyete mu ishuri rya tewolojiya kuri kaminuza ya Boston, agira ati: "Ntekereza ko Afurika ari yo ejo rwose [ha kiliziya gatolika]". Kwiyongera kw’abo muri iri dini muri Afurika mu gice kimwe bisobanurwa no kwiyongera kw’abatuye uyu mugabane kuko biyongera kurusha abandi ku isi. Gusa hari izindi mpamvu nkuko Madamu Nicolette abivuga, kuba muri kiliziya gatolika bisobanuye kandi "kuba mu idini ritanga ubufasha bukomeye mu bihugu imibereho igoye". Ati: "Kiliziya itanga ibitaro, amashuri n’izindi serivisi zinyuranye ubutegetsi bunyuranye nyuma y’ubukoloni butabashaga guhita butanga". Uyu mwalimu avuga ko kugeza ubu n’andi madini y’abaporotestanti na Islam ataragera ku rwego rwo gutanga izi serivisi. Papa Francis amaze gusura ibihugu bya Afurika bitanu - Kenya, Centrafrique, Misiri, Maroc na Uganda. Muri uru rugendo rwe rushya azasura Mozambique n’ibirwa bya Madagascar na Mauritius, ariko akaba yaranze kuzarara muri Hoteli zihenze.

title: Menya ibyo umuntu akora bikagaragaza ko atinya Imana - Rev. / Ev. Eustache
article_text:
Menya ibyo umuntu akora bikagaragaza ko atinya Imana - Rev. / Ev. Eustache

 Umukozi w’Imana Rev. / Ev. Eustache Nibintije, abinyujije muri Minisiteri ye y’ivugabutumwa yise “ Nibintije Evangelical Ministries” asigaye adufasha mu kugabura ijambo ry’Imana nkuko yamuhaye umuhamagaro ikamwuzuza ubwenge bwo kugira ngo agirire abantu benshi umumaro mu gihe gisa n’iki. Soma Umubwiriza 12:13-14 Gutinya Imana ntabwo bisobanura kuyigirira ubwoba. Bivuga kuyubaha kandi ukaba ufite imibereho ishyira mu ibikorwa uko ibona ibintu, amabwiriza ye ndetse n’imigambi ye. Igihe cyose ibyo wubaha cyangwa abo wubaha baza ku mwanya w’imbere n’aho ibyo utubaha cyangwa abo utubaha baza inyuma. Imana igihe cyose ikunda umuntu uyubaha kandi muri uko kuyubaha akabigaragariza mu gukora ibyo imusaba, biboneka mu ijambo ryayo, ari byo: Gushyira mu ibikorwa ibyo ijambo ryayo rimaze ku kwigisha , Kumvira Ababyeyi wawe, Gukunda no kubaha umugore wawe/ umugabo wawe ndetse ni umwana wawe. title: Abapasiteri ba ADEPR barakekwaho kurya inkunga y’umugore wahishirije abana 2 mu nzu- Arasaba ubufasha
article_text:
Abapasiteri ba ADEPR barakekwaho kurya inkunga y’umugore wahishirije abana 2 mu nzu- Arasaba ubufasha

   Mu 2015 nibwo umubyeyi witwa Kampire Violette, yayishirije abana 2 mu nzu barapfa , icyo gihe itorero rya Adepr Kicukiro Shelli biyemeza gutumira abantu batandukanye ubwo basozaga ikiliyo cyabo bana, maze bakoresha igiterane cyo gushaka ubufasha burimo n’amafaranga hagamijwe kuremera uyu mubyeyi ndetse no kumfata mu mugongo. Gusa siko byaje kugenda kuko uyu mubyeyi n’abandi bari bitabiriye iki giterane bavuga ko amafaranga yavuyemo yaburiwe irengero bikavugwa ko yaba yaraburiye mu bapasitoro bari bayoboye iki gikorwa banayoboye Kicukiro Sheli. Kugeza ubu uwari gufashwa nubu akomeje kubura aho kuba, ubuzima bukaba bukimukomereye ndetse akaba asaba ubufasha kuwashobora kumurengera. Mu giterane cyakozwe hagamije kuremera uyu mubyeyi bwiza.com yari yanatumiwemo ndetse itanga inkunga yo kucyamamaza mu 2015 , hakusanyijwe amafaranga y’u Rwanda angana na 2.500.000 , abaraho batanze igitekerezo cyo gukomeza gukusanya ubushobozi kugira ngo Kampire Violette azave mu buzima bwo gukodesha icumbi , ahubwo agurirwe inzu yo kubamo. Gusa kugeza nuyu munsi uyu mubyeyi ntaho afite ho kuba.  Inkuru yakozwe igiterane kirangiye mu 2015, Kanda hasi uyisome Ubwo bwiza.com ubwo yasuraga uyu mubyeyi aho yari acumbitse mu murenge wa Niboyi munsi ya Alpha Place , naho yamaze kuvakugeza ubu, mu ubuhamya bwe yatangaje ko ubwo igiterane cyarangiraga abayobozi b’itorero bamwishyuriye inzu mu gihe cy’amezi 3 kwa Pasitoro Salton , bamwizeza ko barimo bamushakira aho bagura inzu cyangwa bakamwubakira. Gusa nyuma yuko amezi bishyuye ashizemo yahise yirukanwa mu nzu ajya gushakisha ahandi ho kuba. Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko yababajwe no kuba ubuyobozi bw’umurenge wa Niboyi bwari bwemeye kumwubakira maze itorero rya ADEPR rikabyanga rivuga ko rizabikora kuko ari umuntu wabo, none n’amafaranga yatanzwe tariki ya 5 Nyakanga 2015 ngo yubakirwe atazi uko byagenze. Ati: “ Mu byukuri mfite agahinda kenshi , ubwo namaraga kugira ibyago , abana banjye bamaze guhira mu nzu ari babiri bakanapfa , ubuyobozi bw’umurenge wa Niboyi bwari bwemeye kumfasha maze itorero rirabyanga ngo rizabikora, maze mu gukura ikiriyo bakoresha igiterane , kibonekamo amafaranga ari muri Miliyoni hafi eshatu , banyizeza ko bagiye kunyubakira , aho kubikora bankodeshereza inzu amezi ane bishyura ibihumbi 200 nayo yaje gushiramo baranyirukana njya gushaka ahandi nacumbika. “  Video y’ikiganiro yagiranye na Bwiza Tv https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-iDtQhruFE&feature=youtu.be Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko yagiye yibutsa abayobozi b’itorero na bamwe mu bateguye igiterane , aho babanje kumubwira ko babirimo kugeza igihe bamwe bamuteye ubwoba bamubwira ko ashaka kwiteranya n’itorero . Avuga ko kandi yageze k’umuvugizi w’itorero rya ADEPR maze akamusaba kwandika ibaruwa nayo yajyanye k’umunyamanga w’umuvugizi yanga kuyakira amubwira ko ibintu bye bidasobanutse. Bwiza.com yavuganye n’uwahoze ari umuyobozi wa Paruwasi ya Kicukiro Sheli Rev. Mutabazi kuko ubwo iyi nkunga yashakwaga ariwe wahayoboraga. Ku umurongo wa telephone umunyamakuru yaramubajije niba ari umushumba wa Kicukiro Sheli abanza kwemera, amaze kumva ikibazo asubiza umunyamakuru ko yahimutse, ubu asigaye akorera mu Bibare ndetse amubwira ko yazabaza abahayobora ubu, ahita akupa telephone. Nyuma y’iminota itanu yahamagaye umunyamakuru amwemerera ko ikibazo akizi ho ndetse ko ayo mafaranga yatanzwe ariko atazi neza umubare wayo , maze umunyamakuru amubwira ko mu giterane babaraga 2.500.000 zitanzwe , ahita avuga ko atazi neza niba koko niba yaba yarabonetse yose , niko kubwira umunyamakuru ko yabwira uyu mubyeyi kujya kubaza abashumba be, maze umunyamakuru nawe amubwira ko bitari mushingano ze nk’umunyamakuru ahubwo we yakabikurikirana nkuwari uhari na cyane ko uyu ari imwe mu ntama ze ashinzwe. Bwiza.com kandi yavuganye n’umuvugizi w’itorero rya ADEPR mu Rwanda Rev. Karuranga Efrem , maze avuga ko iki kibazo akizi. Yabanje kubaza umunyamakuru impamvu uyu mubyeyi yasabye ubuvugizi mu itangazamakuru aho kwegera ubuyozi bwo hasi , maze umunyamakuru amubwira ko yafite amakuru ko uyu mubyeyi yabikoze ndetse ko yahageze no k’umuvugizi mukuru , niko gusubiza ati “Icyo kibazo ndakizi, uwo mugore arabeshya narabikurikiranye.” Nyirabagenzi Belinadette, usengera mu Adepr Bibare , avuga ko uyu mubyeyi amuzi ndetse nawe yitabiriye igiterane kiswe icyo gukura ikiriyo ariko cyari kigamije kubakira Kampire Violette no kumuremera ubuzima nyuma yibyago yagize. Gusa uyu avuga ko yatunguwe no kumva ko nyuma y’igiterane uyu mubyeyi atigeze ahabwa ibyitanzwe n’abantu bamufashije bamuremera. Ati : " Uyu mubyeyi ariho mu ubuzima bugoye , kuko abaho ntahantu ho kuba , nta nicyo kurya usibye guhura nanjye nkamuha nka 500 cyanwa nawe yagera ahantu bafura akabakorera isuku bakaba bamuha ibyo kurya. " Uyu avuga ko yifuza kuba inzego za Leta zari zikwiye kumuba hafi , kandi arasaba ubuyobozi bwa ADEPR kuba bwafasha uyu mubyeyi akava mu bwigunge kuko aribo babyeyi afite. Undi mukirisito wo mu itorero rya ADEPR utarashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa yabwiye bwiza.com kobibabaje kuba itorero rya ADEPR ryarananiwe kubakira indushyi nkiyi , nyamara ryirirwa ryigaragaza rifasha abandi batishoboye aho guhera kuw’imbere byongeye wari wafashijwe n’abakirisito bikarangira ibyo bamufashije biburiwe irengero. Ati : Ni igisebo ku itorero , iki giterane kiba nari ,mpari twese twaritanze tubabaye kubera ibyago byuyu mugore yagize, none byaburiwe irengero , ariko ko se kombora itorero ryigaragaza rikora ibikorwa byo gufasha ryahereye kuri uyu, byasaba iki itorero kugirango uyu mubye yo kugumya guhangayika gurya kandi twirirwa twigishwa gukora ibyiza.”   Incamake k’ubuzima bwa Kampire Violette  Mu ijoro ryo ku wa kabiri rishyira ku wa Gatatu tariki ya 27 Gicurasi 2015 nibwo kampire yagize ibyago bikomeye ubwo inzu ye yafatwaga n’ inkongi y’ umuriro igakongoka ikaza gutwara ubuzima bw’ abana be babiri. Ubwo yiteguraga kujya gusenga, ku mugoroba wo kuri uwo wa kabiri, Kampire bakundaga Mama Eric yateguriye ibyangombwa byose abana nk’uko yari asanzwe abigenza , hanyuma arabasiga ajya gusenga . Hashize amasaha make ageze aho yasengeraga nibwo yahamagawe kuri telefoni bamubwira ko inzu acumbitsemo iri gushya . Abantu bari hafi bagerageje gutabara bazimya umuriro biranga dore ko iyo nzu itari yubatse nk’ inzu zisanzwe kuko yari akazu gato kagayitse kubakishijwe amabati . Amaze guhuruzwa yihutiye kuhagera , asanga inzu yakongotse ndetse n’abana bahiramo. Gusa muri ako kanya ubutabazi bw’ ibanze bwarahageze ,bakuramo abana bajyanwa kwa muganga ari intere. Bakigezwa kwa muganga , umwana w’ umuhererezi witwa Uwamahoro Olive w’ imyaka 8 y’ amavuko yahise yitaba Imana , musaza we Nzabonimana Eric w’ imyaka 14 akomeza kurwana n’ ubuzima , tariki ya 28 Gicurasi 2015 , nibwo Eric nawe yitabye Imana. Bitewe n’uko uyu mubyeyi nta bushobozi cyangwa umuryango wa hafi uzwi yari afite, ubuyobozi bw’itorero bufatanije n’ abakirisitu bari hafi , bariyegeranyije, bamufasha gushyingura abo bana. Umuhango wo gushyingura wabaye iminsi ibiri ikurikirana (nyuma ya buri rupfu) mu irimbi ryo mu Busanza mu karere ka Kicukiro. Nyuma yuko iki gikorwa gikozwe hagakusanyijwe amafaranga y’u Rwanda angana na 2.500.000 , abaraho batanze igitekerezo cyo gukomeza gukusanya ubushobozi kugirango KAMPIRE Violette azave m’ubuzima bwo gukodesha icumbi , ahubwo agurirwe inzu yo kubamo.  Amafoto yuko igiterane cyo mu 2015 cyagenze ubwo uyu mugore yashakirwaga inkunga harimo n’abayobozi bakuru ba ADEPR

title: Hagarika gushidikanya mu gihe wizeye, kuko bikubuza umugisha wawe
article_text:
Hagarika gushidikanya mu gihe wizeye, kuko bikubuza umugisha wawe

 Yakobo 1:8 “ Kuko umuntu w’ Imitima ibiri anamuka mu inzira ze zose” Bigenda gute mu igihe ushidikanyije mu gukora ikintu Imana yakubwiye gukora? Uwo muhanganye ahita atera intambwe ya mbere. bisobanura ko Satani ahita agusimbukiraho ako kanya. Niba ushaka kubaho mu ukwizera menya ko, gushidikanya ari umuco mubi kandi wagobye gukura mu inzira yawe. Gushidikanya kuza mu igihe utabashije gufata umwanzuro ( Decision) kubyo Imana yakubwiye cyangwa ibya gufashije muri izi nyigisho uba uri gusoma. Bibliya itubwira ko umuntu umeze gutyo aba ari umuntu utagira umusimamo. Iyo uri umuntu ugira ibitekerezo bibiri ( Gushidikanya no kwizera) ku ikintu kimwe, no mu mwanya umwe, umwanzuro ufata nawo “UCIKAMO KABIRI “ Uba ushaka kubaho mu kwizera mu igihe nabwo uba ushaka nabwo kurengera ubwoba uba ufite kuri ibyo bibazo byawe. YEGO Mu urundi ruhande nk’ umuntu uba ubona ntayindi nzira isigaye kugira ngo utabarwe kuko uba waragerageje mu inzira zishobaka zose nk’ umwana w’ umuntu. Ariko “MENYA KO IMANA IGIRA INZIRA NYINSHI “ Wizera ko Icyo Imana ikuvuzeho mu uwundi mwanya ubwoba nabwo bukaza bukabigukuramo. Kubera ibyo ntaho ushobora kugera bityo bikarangira nta gutabarwa kw’ Imana ubonye kandi byari “BIRI MU INZIRA BIZA “ Uyu munsi urasabwa gutera ishoti n’ ingufu nyinshi uko gushidikanya ufite cyangwa ujya ugira nkuko umukinnyi w’ imupira wa amagura awamurura hanze mu gihe ikipe ye yatsinze atashaka ko babishyura igitego babatsinze. Nawe watsinze igitego satani, kuko Imana yavuganye nawe, kubwi inyigisho Imana yakoherereje kugira ngo umenye umugambi wayo kuri wowe ko ari uwo “KUGUTABARA”. Tangira gufata umwanzuro mwiza wo kwizera Imana yawe kandi utangire gushyira mu ibikorwa ibyo ijambo ry’ Imana riri kugusaba gukora. Kandi unakomeze kubibika muri wowe kuko n’ ejo uzabikenera. Mu Igihe wumvise uko gushidikanya kwongeye kugaruka uhite ukoresha nabwo rya izina kuko ni icyo kibazo. rira “GISHOBOYE”  WITA UMWNYA KUKO UWO MUHANGANYE ARI URUHANDE RWAWE. Zamukira muri uko ukwizera ukomeze iyo nzira...kuko uri KURUSHA Uwo muhanganye ( Satani)INTAMBWE ijya imbere akaba ubu yasigaye INYUMA yawe, kubera uko KWIZERA ugize . Imana iguhe Umugisha...! Ushobora kohereza iyi nyigisho ku inshuti zawe kugira ngo nazo zibone ayo mahirwe yo kugerwaho n’ Ijambo ry’ Imana mu iminsi itari ku cyumweru. title: Menya icyo iryo izina rishobora gukora
article_text:
Menya icyo iryo izina rishobora gukora

 Abafilipi 2:9-10 “Nicyo cyatumye Imana imushyira hejuru cyane...ikamuha izina risumba andi mazina yose kugira ngo amavi yose apfukame mu izina rya Yesu, ari ay’ ibyi juru, cyangwa iby’ ibyo mu isi, cyangwa ar’ ibyo munsi y’ isi.” Igihe cyose ushyize mu ibitekerezo byawe amategeko y’ Imana maze ugatangira kwemerera ijambo ry’ Imana gukorera muri wowe mu izina rya Yesu. Iryo jambo ritangira kugira imbaraga zikora ibitangaza. Ibi ndi kuvuga biruta kuba ari ijambo ry’ Imana gusa kuko icyo gihe zirekura imbaraga zidasanzwe zizatuma ibyo bibazo byose ufite, n’ abo badayimoni bishaka guhagarara mu inzira yawe bibasha guca bugufi, bikagupfukamira maze bikumva itegeko ryawe. Ndagira ngo aho mpasubiremo, ibyo bibazo bizagupfukamira wowe, ndetse n’ abo badayimoni nabo bagupfukamire maze byumvikanE ibyo uri kubitegeka mu izina rya Yesu. Izina rya Yesu ririmo imbaraga zidasanzwe, zikomeye ziruta uzi umuntu wakwiringira ko yagufasha, Imbaraga ziruta iza abapfumu, imbaraga ziruta iza Doctor wakubwiye ko indwara yawe cyangwa indwara y’uwo ukunda ko idashobora gukira, imbaraga zikomeye zinjira muri business yawe iri gucumbagira, imbaraga ziruta iz’ abadayimoni bashaka gusenya urugo rwawe, imbaraga ziruta izaba kuvuma cyangwa ku kuroga kugira ngo ntuzagire icyo wimarira mu ubuzima, imbaraga zibanziriza application yawe yawe kugira ngo ubone akazi, harimo n’ imbaraga zituma ukora neza inshingano yawe ku kazi kawe maze bigatuma boss wawe aguha promotion. Hari imbaraga zikushyiraho igikundiro umusore/ umukobwa ukubonye akumva mwarwubakana, hari imbaraga zitanga ( umugisha)wicyo ukeneye cyose mu ubuzima. Ukwizera kwawe kuzerekeza ku izina rya “Yesu “ bityo ubushobozi n’ imbaraga byiwe maze bimanuke bikore icyo WAVUZE. Izina rya Yesu rikoreshwa mu igihe uba uri kurivuga nk’ umukristo kandi uri imukristo nyawe utavangavaga.( birakwiriye ko tuba abakristo nyabo. (Please!!!!!!) Ibyahishuwe 19:13 aho ijambo ry’ Imana rivuga ko Yesu ari “IJAMBO RY’ IMANA “ Niyo mpamvu iyo umwanzi agerageje kuzana uburwayi, ubukene, azanye intambara mu Umuryango, intambara mu umurimo w’ Imana, intambara ku kazi, mu ibibazo bitandukanye. Nta gihangange imbere y’Imana, nawe yakumenera ibanga

 2 korinto 2: 9-10 “Ariko nkuko byanditswe ngo ibyo ijisho ritigeze kubona n’ ibyo ugutwi kutigeze kumva, ibitigeze kwinjira mu mutima w’ umuntu, ibyo byose Imana yabiteguriye abayikunda.” Mu mwaka 1997, byabaye ngombwa ko abashinzwe umutekano banjyana kuri Police Station kuko hari ibyo nagombaga gusobanura. Nkigerayo ntabwo nabashize kubonana nukuriye aho kuko yahamagawe kujya mu inama yihutirwa. Ubwo byabaye ngombwa banshyira mu kasho mu kurindira ko azaboneka. Nkimaramo iminsi itanu, umukurikiye mu ubuyobozi ahita angira umukuru wabafunze. Nk’ umuyobozi mushya ubwo nahise mpindura zimwe muri gahunda zaho. Kubera ko basenga cyane bakanaririmba cyane kuri njye nabonaga ari akajagari bikubitiyeho ko ibintu by’ Imana bitari bindimo ndetse muri icyo gihe ni wari kubinteramo n’urushinge bitari gukunda. Ubwo gahunda zose zijyanye no gusenga narazihagaritse I cyakora nemerera abayislamu bo gukomeza gusenga, Kubera ko bibwiye ko bitashoboka Bibliya n’ ibitabo by’ Indirimbo nahise mbibaka. Ubwo babonye ko ntamikino irimo bahise batangira gusenga buhoro buhoro mu uturwi. Muri ayo masengesho yabo numvaga bari kuvuga bati ” Mana na Sawuli wamuhinduye Pawulo uyu ntiyakunanira maze umurimo wawe ukomeze. Ubwo hashize icyumweru kimwe gusa ni ijoro ryamye ngiye kubona mbona indege zibiri z’intambara mu kirere imwe iri kwiruka kuyi irimbere kugirango iyi gonge, Ubwo nahise niruka njya kwihisha, nkigera aho nihisha nahise numva ijwi rimbaza riti” Mwana w’ umuntu we ni ibihe byaha urihana? Nahise nsubiza ko ari ikunywa inzoga kuko nakunda inzoga cyane kuburyo nanaraga no mu kabari. Ubwo nasubijwe muri ay’amagambo “ inzoga gusa? ako kanya nahise nsubiza nti” Niki ushaka ngo ngikore? ” ijwi rirongera rirambwira riti ” nsaba icyo ushaka cyose ndakiguha? ” ubwo ntabwo namenye aho ijambo riturutse ubwo mba nsabye kuba “PASTOR “. Nahise numva ukuboko nkumfashe mu maso ni ijwi rimbwira ngo” NDABIGUHAYE”. Ubwo natagiye gutigita nubwoba bwinshi cyane, sinamenye uko nazamuye amaboko ntangira gusenga ntabizi, kuko na Dawe uri mu ijuru ntayo narinzi. Nubwo nari ndi mu inzozi urusaku rwanjye abandi bararwumvaga, ubwo babanyamasengesho bahise babaduka baba bangezeho , kubera ko nari ndi gukubita amaboko n’amaguru byabaye ngombwa ko baryamisha maze bicara ku maguru na amaboko byanjye maze batangira gusenga ariko uko bansengeraga niko narushagaho gusakuza cyane. Ubwo abashinzwe umutekano baraje ariko ntibafungura maze babaza uko byagenze bababwira ko ari kiongozi ( umuyobozi) wabo wabonekewe n’ Imana bakibyumva barasetse batangangara nibwo bababwiye ngo” Ntabwo byashoboka cyangwa mwibagiwe ibyo abakorera” ahubwo reka tuzane imigozi tumubohe. Bakomeje gusenga ngeraho ndatuza ubwo bagarutse natuje biba birarangiye. Nongeye kuryama ndasinzira muri iryo joro nabwo naje kumva nuzuye imbaraga kandi muri izo mbaraga nza kumva ijwi ribwira riti Mwana w’ Umuntu uyu munsi ugomba kujya uhamagara abantu, umwe umwe ukabasaba imbabazi kandi babanyamasengesho ubabwire bagusabire impano.” Ubwo bwahise bucya, ntangira gukora uwo murimo narangije ni mugoroba, maze kumenya gusenga, nararuhutse ariko bigeze nka saa moya nibwo numvise za mbaraga zigarutse ntangira kuvuga ibyaha byose nakoze mvuga nti ” oya Mwami wanjye dore umudayimo w’ ubusambanyi, umudayimoni w’ubusinzi n’ ibindi byaha byose.” Ubwo nzakurangiza ndi kuvuga nti” Nagushimiye Mwami wanjye Yesu Kristo kuko umpaye amahoro ntari mfite, ko umpaye umunezero ntarimfite kandi ko umvanye mu ibyaha nari ndimo Amen.” Ubwo muri njye hayise hatobokamo ijwi ribwira icyo ngomba gukora cyangwa kimpishurira ikintu kigiye kumbaho cyangwa kigiye kuba. Naje kwibaza ukuntu nasabye kuba Pastor kandi bitari mubitekerezo byanjye. Ariko kuko nkirangiza kwihana muri njye hahise habamo ijwi ribwira icyo ngomba gukora n’ ibyo ntagomba gukora ubwo ryambwiye ko ari ubushake bw’ Imana kandi wari umugambi w’ Imana wo gufungwa. Nagumye aho ibyo kumva nshaka gutaha bimvamo numva nshaka kuba nakora umurimo aho. Ubwo nafatanyije n’abandi umurimo, mvuga ubutumwa , hari nigihe nategekwaga kubuvuga mu Giswahili cyane ndi kubwiriza Abasilamu bari aho, French nabaza nkasubizwa ko nzavuga ubutumwa ahantu hatandukanye no mu bantu bavuga indimi zitandukanye. Muri uko kujya nganira n’umwuka wera ku kintu cyose kuko iyo nashaka kurya nk’inyama napfaga kubitekereza gusa umwuka wera wahitaga abwira ati “ inyama barazikuzanira ariko ntabwo ziva iwawe, ntiziva iwanyu urazizanirwa n’ undi muntu uzi ariko utatekerezaga. Saa sita zikaba zingezeho. Ariko nubwo nasabye kuba Pastor nongeye ndavuga nti nibwo nabisabye ariko singomba kuba Pastor byibura ntafite Diplome yo muri University kandi nto ari Bachelor degree. Ubwo nabivuga mu ibiganiro kuko yari nk’umuntu undimo imbere tuganira nkuko umuntu aganira na mugenzi we yishyiraho. Nabaye aho ngeraho nsaba ko basimbuza undi muntu akaba umuyobozi. Ndumva barabikoze ariko ntabwo nkibyibuka. Nakoze umurimo w’Imana aho, mvuga ubutumwa kandi n’ abandi babaga bazanye gufungwa iyo bageragamo nahita mbabwira igitumye babfunga nkagerageza kubagira inama kandi nkanababwira n’igihe bazabafungurira kubera impano z’Imana zari zindimo. Ubwo umwaka ugiye gushira ryamye nibwo nagiye kumva numva umuntu andiye urwara hagati y amano abiri ubwo ndashiguka ngiye kureba nsanga ari Yesu Kristo ubwo amfata ukuboka ansohora hanze, ariko muri uko gusohoka mbona n’abandi bari gusohoka ariko bagera aho abarinzi bari bari baka basubiza munzu ariko njye mbageze ubwo Yesu yari amfashe ukuboko umwe ashaka kumfata ukuboko ngo ansubizemo, undi ahita aramubwira ati “ oya oya... Uwo ari kumwe na Yesu mwihorere. ” Ubwo twakomeje kugendana nawe nduteye intambwe nkazine tuvuye aho abo barinzi bari, nahise nkanguka. Ubwo mba nshimye Imana kuko umwuka wera yahise ansobanurira ibigiye kumbaho. Hashize iminsi nki itatu ni mugoroba haje abayobozi batandukanye b’abasirikare, Police icyo gihe yari Gendarmerie abacamanza, abakonseye n’ abandi ntamenye. Nibwo bagiye bahamagara ari aho uvuga ibyawe usohoka, ubwo barangije barongera baraduhamagara maze basoma abantu bemerewe gutaha. barasomye njye nabaye uwanyuma basomye, barangije gusoma izina ryanjye nibwo umwe ndibuka yari umukuru wa Police aravuga ati ” no..no...no... Uwungirije Police aravuga ati ” Afandi mumwihorere atahe ntakibazo kuri we. nawe aramusubiza ati” Ok. Naratashye kuko abazaga gufungwa bagafungurwa nasanze barantangiye ubuhamya mu by’ umyumweru bike nari maze kubatizwa no gushyingirwa kuko ntari ntarashyingiwe. Mu mezi make Rev.Pastor wanjye yahise ashyira mu abantu bagomba kujya kwiga ETD yari gahunda ya ADEPR yo kwigisha Abapastori abavugabutumwa Bibiya. Narize ariko umuyobozi waryo yitegereje uko nimugoroba nasobanuriraga abandi amasomo yarampamagaye ambaza amashuri nize uko angana mubwira ko ari ane ansaba kujya kurangiza high School kugira ngo nzajye kwiga University. Ubwo nahise nahise nseka kuko ibyo nari nabisabye Imana kandi na rya jwi ryari ryarangije kumbwira icyo agiye kumbwira. Ubwo narangije imyaka ibiri. Mpita njya kurangiza high school ntabwo nagiye mu mwaka wa kane nahise njya mu mwaka wa gatandatu. Narize ariko icyo nakoze nasabye Abanyeshuri amakayi yo kuva muwa kane ubwo icyo nakoze kwari gukora resume kugirango nitegure ikizami cya leta kuko numvaga mfite ugomba kunyobora mu gutegura ibyo bibazo ntakibazo nari mfite kandi no mu ishuri iyo twajyaga gukora ibibazo ni ko nabigenzaga nateguraga ubibazo muri ibyo bibazo 80% muri test nibyo babazaga. Maze kwiga ibyo bibazo nahise nsaba gutaha kugirango njye gufasha madamu nawe mwigishe kuri ibyo bibazo maze azakore “candida lible” narabikoze igihe kiragera tujya gukora ibizami ubwo madame azakugira ibibazo biba ngombwa ko mbanza kugira icyo nabikoraho kuko numvaga njyewe ntakibazo iby’ingenzi ari ibya madame. Ubwo kubera ibyo bibazo byatumye mburaho amanota make kugirango mbone diplome kuko ntamwanya uhagije wo kwiga ibyo bibazo n’umutima utari hamwe. Ariko Madamu yarayibonye nanjye umwaka utaha nkora “candida lible” diplome ndayibona. Ubwo twese twabaye abarimu mu mashuri abanza nigishije imyaka ibiri muri 2004 bitewe ni uko hari program ya leta yari yanyemereye kundihira amafranga y’ishuri nahise njya ku ishuri nakerewe nabwo aho bita Kicukiro/Kigali nkihagera babanza kumbaza byinshi harimo urupapuro rwa Pastor wanjye ni’ibindi kandi ntabyo nari mfite, ubwo muri ako kanya aho nyine bari kubimbariza uwitwa Pastor Karisimbi aba arahageze kuko yari umwarimu aho kandi akaba ari nawe wari umuyobozi warya shuri rya Bibliya nabanjemo akangira inama yo kujyakurangiza secondaire yahise abwira uwari uri kumbaza ibyo bibazo kunyihorera nkajya mu ishuri . Ambajije ikibazo cy’amafranga y’ishuri mubwira ko agomba kumpa compter y’ ishuri ko hari commission runaka izohereza ayo mafranga. yahise ambwira ko ejo nzaza kwiga ariko ko natize bizangora. Naramusubije ngo byihorore ndi umuntu w’ umugabo ntabwo ndi umwana icyizanye ndakizi. Bukeye nageze mu ishuri ndebye anbanyeshuri tugiye kwigana nsaga n’ inararibonye gusa benshi ari abayobozi bo mu itorero ryanjye kandi atari hasi ahubwo bo mu rwego rw’ igihugu. Mu mutima nti “ Mana ibi n’ ibiki? Ubwo turaramukanya bambaza aho paruwasi yanjye iri nti ni Bugarama ufite urupapuro rwa Reverend wawe nanjye nti “ Mushumba wanjye iyi nicyo bita “Emergency “ nzaba nkimwaka. Sawa karibu hashize iminsi itatu dufite test y’ ikigereki nta kibazo, ubwo imunsi urageze batanze impapuro mwarimu ashaka kuntaruka ndamubwira mpa urupapuro ngerageze ararumpa ndakora. Atanze urupapuro nsanga nabonye 80% bose bati ntibishoboka nanjye nti “ ijambo ry’ Ijambo rivuga ko Hamwe nayo ntakitashoboka. Nkomeje kwiga umwaka urangiye. Ndabwirwa ngo nitegure uzayarangiriza mu mahanga nanjye nti “ Thank you Umwami wanjye. Reka tugaruke ku nyigisho yacu. mu mbabarire narondogoye ariko ntabwo ari njye. Ni bande ujya ubwira amabanga yawe? Ubusanzwe abantu benshi babwira amabanga yabo babitse mu mitima yabo abantu b’inshuti zabo, abantu bizeye .Waba uzi ko Imana ibwira amabanga yayo abantu? Ibuka ijambo ry’Imana riravuga ko abizera bose Umwuka wera w’ Imana uba muri bo imbere. Imana ishaka ko umenya ibyo utekereza kuri wowe, Imana ishaka ko umenya imigambi yayo kuri wowe, itorero ryawe ndetse no ku igihugu cyawe. Imana ishaka ku kwereka ko utari wigera ubona, wumva ndetse n’ ibintu utarigera utekereza. Uri umwana w’Imana kandi uri inshuti yayo. Ishaka ko mugendana kandi Inakubwire amakuru agiye atandukanye ariho ndetse nazaza nkuko inshuti yawe isanzwe igenda iyakubwira mbega ukuntu Imana yacu ari Imana nziza, kandi itangaje... Nshuti yanjye fungura umutima wawe maze wakire iyo mpano maze itangire kukumenera imenera amabanga yayo.    Iri ni Ijambo ry’Imana n’ubuhamya mubigezwaho n’Umukozi w’Imana, Rev./Ev. title: Hamagara izina rya Yesu — Rev. /Ev. Eustache Nibintije
article_text:
Hamagara izina rya Yesu — Rev. /Ev. Eustache Nibintije

 1 Korinto 6:11 “Kandi bamwe muri mwe mwari nka bo ariko mwaruhagiwe mwarejejwe, mwatsindishirijwe n’Umwuka w’Imana yacu mu izina ry’Umwami Yesu Kristo”. Hari ikintu kimanuka mu mubiri wacu gifite imbaraga zikora ibitangaza iyo duhamagaye izina rya Yesu Kristo. Cyera nkiri umwana twavaga kwiga twagera murugo ababyeyi bamaze kutugaburira, bakundaga kumbwira kujya kuragira amatungo yacu. Muri icyo gihe nakunze kwitegereza uko amatungo yarishaga yihuta, ariko byagera aho ari atuje ndetse twanageze imuhira najya kubona nkabona ari gukanjakanja. Byansabye kubaza ababyeyi impamvu, bambwira ko aba arimo kuza ibyo yarishije maze akabikanja neza bikabona gukora umurimo wabyo mu mubiri w’ayo matungo. Nabonye ari ubwenge Imana yahaye amatungo. Iyo usomye ijambo ry’Imana cyangwa inyigisho z’Imana, maze ukongera ugafata umwanya witonze ukongera ukaritekerezaho neza ntakikurangaza, nta majwi wumva y’ibikoresho bya muzika, nta bantu barimo ku kurangaza rya Jambo ukongera ukarimira nk’uko umuhanuzi Ezekiyeli yariye umuzingo w’ijambo ry’Imana, rya Jambo ry’Imana niho ritanga ubufasha bwo mu rwego rwo hejuru mu buzima bwawe. Hari ibintu Bibiliya itubwira ariko ntitubashe kubyumva neza kuko tuba dufite ibindi biba biturangaza, ariko bitavuze ko tutaryumvise. Bibiliya itubwira ko Imana yakoze mu mibiri yacu inzu yayo, cyangwa se office-Ibiro yayo ( mu mitima yacu) ni umwuka wera. Usibye n’ibyo gusa, ariko iyo uhamagaye mu izina ryayo uba uhamagaye ikintu ifite cyose, bishaka kuvuga ubuhamagaye ubuzima bwiza ari hano ku isi ndetse n’ubuzima bw’ejo. Uba uhamagaye amahoro yayo kuza muri wowe, uba uhamagaye imbaraga zayo zikora ibitangaza, uba uhamagaye ibyiringiro byayo ndetse n’umunezero wayo, uba uhamagaye gukiza kwayo, uba uhamagaye kubohora kwayo muri wowe kandi uba uhamagaye kubabarira kwayo muri wowe ndetse n’ibindi. Biba bimeze nko kwakira urufunguzo rw’inzu yuzuye ubutunzi kandi bugahita buba ubwawe. Ushobora kubona urwo rufunguzo mu ntoki zawe, ushobora kubwira bagenzi bawe ibijyanye n’urwo rufunguzo, kandi ugomba kumenya ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kurukoresha igihe cyose ndetse n’ahantu hose uri. Yaba ugiye kuryama, yaba igihe uri muri office (ibiro) yawe aho uri gukorera, ndetse ushobora kurukoresha ufungurira umuntu runaka mutari kumwe munzu imwe, mu gihugu kimwe cyangwa ku mugabane umwe. Ushobora kurukoresha ku muntu uzi cyangwa utazi igihe cyose ushaka, ariko bigusaba gutera intambwe maze ukarukoresha ufungura umuryango mbere y’uko ubona iyo migisha iri muri wowe imbere. Biradusaba gufata umwanzuro mu gihe wumva hari icyo Umwuka w”Imana arimo ku kubwira mu gihe uba urimo gusoma ijambo ijambo ry’Imana cyangwa wumva ijambo ry’Imana Ugomba kwinjira mu migisha y’Imana mu guhamagara izina rya Yesu Kristo. Hamagara izina rye kandi uhite winjirana n’ukwizera maze usingire icyo uyishakaho. Ufite urufunguzo, kubera ibyo akira ubuzima bwiza buturuka muri we, akira imbabazi z’Imana, akira agakiza k’Imana, akira amahoro y’Imana n’umunezero wayo, akira ibisubizo by’ibibazo byawe, Halleluya!!!! Niba ubyizeye vuga ngo Amen! ndabyakiriye. Ubu butumwa si umwihariko wa intyoza.com, ni inyigisho zikomoka mu ijambo ry’Imana utegurirwa kandi ukagezwaho na Rev. / Ev. title: Abantu 13 basengaga bitegura pasika bapfuye nyuma yo kugwirwa n’igikuta cy’urusengero
article_text:
Abantu 13 basengaga bitegura pasika bapfuye nyuma yo kugwirwa n’igikuta cy’urusengero

  Abantu 13 bapfiriye mu mpanuka y’igikuta cya Kiliziya cyagwiriye abasengaga bitegura pasika, muri Afurika y’Epfo.  Ni impanuka yabaye ku wa 19 Mata, ubwo hari ku wa Kane Mutagatifi. Bitangazwa ko abantu 29 bakomerekejwe n’icyo gikuta cya kiliziya cyahanutse ubwo imvura nyinshi yagwaga. Abakomeretse bavuriwe mu bitaro bikuru by’Intara ya KwaZulu-Natal, 13 bahita bahasiga ubuzima. Umuvugizi w’ibi bitaro, Robert McKenzie yagize ati “Hariho imvura nyinshi ubwo byabaga, gusa ntabwo tuzi icyaba cyateye uru rukuta guhanuka mu gihe tugitegereje ibizava mu iperereza polisi irimo gukora”. Uru rusengero rwahanutse ni urw’itorero ‘Pentecostal Holiness’ rwahanutse ku wa Kane mutagatifu, ku munsi wakurikiyeho hakorwa amasengesho yihariye yakorewe mu ihema ryatewe hafi y’urusengero. Nk’uko bitangazwa n’ikinyamakuru SDE, ngo umwaka ushize Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo, Cyril Ramaphosa, yasuye iri torero abarisengeramo bamusaba inkunga yo kubaka urusengero rushya, impanuka ikaba ibaye ntacyo yari yabafasha.

title: Ni uha satani umwanya wo kukuganiriza araguheka ku mugongo
article_text:
Ni uha satani umwanya wo kukuganiriza araguheka ku mugongo

 Uwo mugore arayisubiza ati “Imbuto z’ibiti byo muri iyi ngobyi twemererwa kuzirya, keretse imbuto z’igiti kiri hagati y’ingobyi ni zo Imana yatubwiye iti ‘Ntimuzazirye, ntimuzazikoreho, mutazapfa.’ ” Iyo nzoka ibwira umugore, iti “Gupfa ntimuzapfa,kuko Imana izi yuko ku munsi mwaziriyeho, amaso yanyu azahweza mugahindurwa nk’Imana, mukamenya icyiza n’ikibi.” 

Uwo mugore abonye yuko icyo giti gifite ibyokurya byiza, kandi ko ari icy’igikundiro, kandi ko ari icyo kwifuriza kumenyesha umuntu ubwenge, asoroma ku mbuto zacyo, arazirya, ahaho n’umugabo we wari kumwe na we, arazirya. Itangiriro 3.2-6
Kenshi abantu bagushwa mu byaha no gufata umwanya wo kungurana ibitekerezo n’umubi. Ntabwo satani yitwa se w’ibinyoma cyangwa w’indyarya ku busa. Azi neza umurimo we azi n’inzira zose yanyuramo kugirango akugushe.
Akenshi imitego ugwamo ushobora gusanga yaturutse kuguhereza Satani umwanya ngo muganire. Umwe niwe wavuze ngo Satani akubohesha imigozi agusanganye. Adamu na Eva ntago bari baravukiye mu cyaha ugereranije nuko twe tuvuka, ntacyari gutuma bagwa mu cyaha.
Babaga bishimye, kandi banyuzwe, mu buryo bw’imibereho no muburyo bw’umwuka bari baguwe neza ariko akantu gato gusa « Guha umwanya Satani ngo baganire» kabiciye amahirwe y’ubuzima gatuma bava mu masezerano y’Imana, kugeza ubu natwe tuba mu ngaruka z’ibyo.
Mubyukuri ntacyo bari babaye ariko hamaze kubaho kiriya kiganiro Eva abonako koko hari icyo babura nawe atangira kwifuza kumera nk’Imana yemera ibyo satani amusabye byose iyo mbuto igera no ku mugabo nuko birakaza Imana irabahana.
Nusenga ujye uhora usaba Imana kukurinda umubi, ikindi kandi n’umenya ko yaje umwirinde, wowe ubwawe n’imbaraga zawe biragoye kumunesha, icya mbere cyo ntabwo ari wowe wenyine yaba ashutse, amaze kugusha umubare munini w’abantu bari bafite imbaraga zirenze izawe, niyo mpamvu tugomba kumva gusa icyo Imana idusaba tukagikora ubundi tukirinda ibindi biganiro bituruka ku mubi kuko burya nawe ntabwo ari umuswa aza yakubaze, iyo umuhaye umwanya rero uba wikozeho.
Dore icyo ijambo ry’Imana rivuga « Nuko rero mugandukire Imana ariko murwanye Satani, nawe azabahunga Yakobo 4.7
Bibiliya iduhana kutabererekera satani, umwanya muto Eva yahaye satani ngo bagirane ikiganiro cyazaniye isi yose icyago, none ba maso, wirinde guha satani umwanya kuko niwo azagutegeramo. Imana idufashe mu izina rya Yesu. Amen.

title: Nyamasheke: Ababyeyi bagabiye inka umuyobozi w’ishuri utarirengagije impfubyi zamuganaga
article_text:
Nyamasheke: Ababyeyi bagabiye inka umuyobozi w’ishuri utarirengagije impfubyi zamuganaga

 Ababyeyi barerera mu ishuri ryisumbuye rya Tyazo riri mu murenge wa Kanjongo mu karere ka Nyamasheke bavuga ko umuyobozi waryo Ngezahayo Abidan umaze imyaka 20 ariyobora yarigejejeho n’uburyo yitaye ku bana bazaga bafite ibibazo byihariye barimo n’imfpfubyi, bamugenera inka y’ishimwe ngo izabere urugero n’abazamusimbura. Mu kiganiro na Bwiza.com nyuma yo kumushyikiriza iyi nka, bamwe mu bahize mu myaka ya 1999 na 2000 kuzamura bakaba kuri ubu bari mu myanya ikomeye y’imirimo mu gihugu kandi icyo gihe bamwe barigaga ntabushobozi bafite, bavuze ko hari ibyo umuntu akora abandi bakabona bisanzwe ariko hari n’ibiba bidasanzwe buri wese yazibukira ku wabikoze mu bindi bihe. Aho bamwe banemeza ko uretse kongera mu buryo budasanzwe inyubako z’ishuri, yitaye bidasanzwe ku mfubyi zahageraga zirimo nyinshi za Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi n’izindi zabaga bidafite shinge na rugero akazihumuriza,ubu zikaba zaravuyemo abagabo n’abagore bakorera igihugu,zifitiye icyizere cy’ejo hazaza. [caption id="attachment_144984" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Nyiransabimana Bernadette avuga ko yaje kwiga hano ari imfubyi itagira ababyeyi bombi,yarihebye ahumurizwa n’uyu muyobozi yigaruramo icyizere cyo kubaho. [/caption] Nyiransabimana Bernadette w’imyaka 38, wahageze mu 1999 aje kwiga mu wa 4 akaharangiriza muri 2001, avuga ko yari imfubyi ku babyeyi bombi , atigeze amenya nyina na se n’uwo bari bavukanye yapfuye akiri muto, atavuga ko na we yamumenye neza akarerwa na nyinawabo utari wishoboye, avuga ko yakuranye agahinda kenshi ku mutima ku buryo aho yigaga yari akeneye umuyobozi w’ishuri udasanzwe na bagenzi be badasanzwe ngo bamube hafi bamuhumurize, kuko ngo no kugira ngo abone isabune cyangwa imyenda y’ishuri byari ingorabahizi ariko uyu muyobozi amwitaho bidasanzwe kimwe n’izindi mfubyi zose kugeza bigejejeho aho bumva ubuzima bushoboka. Ati’’ cyari igihe kibi cyane nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, impfubyi ari nyinshi n’ibikomere ari byinshi cyane mu mitima y’abana benshi, na bamwe mu bafite ababyeyi barahunze batazi aho bari, abandi ababyeyi babo bafunze kwiga bigoye, dukeneye abaduhumuriza bihariye, atwitaho mu buryo n’ubu twibaza aho yakuye uwo mutima,kuko tutiyumvishaga ko tuzavamo abantu bazima bumva bafite icyanga cy’ubuzima, kwiheba ari kwinshi, araduhumuriza,atuba hafi none twavuyemo abagabo n’abagore bashobora kwigirira akamaro bakakagirira n’igihugu cyacu.’’ Avuga ko kugira ngo bishoboke, uyu muyobozi yashyizeho uburyo bw’ubufatanye bw’abana bose,aho nk’abazanye ibikoresho byinshi by’ishuri babishyiraga hamwe ku bushake bwabo n’umutima mwiza bagasaranganya n’abatabifite, abatagira imyenda y’ishuri akayibagurira, abana bakangurirwa gusenga nk’uburyo bubafasha kugira ihumure ry’umutima, byanatumye baba inshuti zidasanzwe ubwabo, ku buryo ngo hari imiryango 9 y’abahize nyuma bagashimana bakabana, na bo bakaba bubatse ingo zigera ikirenge mu cye. [caption id="attachment_144983" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Manirafasha Samuel Blaise yishimira aho ageze mu mibereho nyuma y’ibihe bigoye yaciyemo yiga agahumurizwa n’uyu muyobozi w’ishuri. [/caption] Pasiteri Mazimpaka Daniel umuyobozi wa komite y’ababyeyi baharerera yavuze ko uretse uku gukunda abana, uyu muyobozi yanazamuye iri shuri bidasanzwe. Ati’’ yahageze nta mudasobwa n’imwe ishuri rifite, ubu rifite izirenga 135, yasanze hari ibyumba 4 gusa by’amashuri, bimwe babyigiramo abahungu bakabisasamo nyuma y’amasomo bakabiraramo kuko nta handi bagiraga barara, ubu hari ibyumba 16,hari ibyumba 6 by’inyubako y’igorofa, hari amacumbi y’abarezi n’abayobozi, ibiro, aho abana barara heza, ishuri rirazitiye ryose, ubuso bwaryo yarabwongereye cyane, n’ibindi byinshi byatumye ababyeyi twicara hamwe dusanga iyi nka ayikwiye.’’ Ngezahayo Abidan w’imyaka 63, avuga ko byose yabishobojwe n’ubuyobozi bwiza bw’igihugu n’ubw’itorero ADEPR nyir’ishuri bwamubaye hafi, ababyeyi n’abana bamwumviye, kuko yasanze ryarangijwe na Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ararisana, byose bigakorwa mu bufatanye, akishimira ko ibyakorwaga babihaye agaciro bakabimushimira n’abana bagakomeza kubizirikana, asaba aba bahize aho bari hose kugira umutima w’urukundo kugira ngo na bo bite ku bari mu bibazo uyu munsi. [caption id="attachment_144978" align="alignnone" width="1024"] Abarangije muri iri shuri bari kumwe n’uyu ari umuyobozi wabo Ngezahayo Abidan n’ababyeyi baharerera. title: Abanyarwanda biga muri Congo bamaze ukwezi batajya ku ishuri
article_text:
Abanyarwanda biga muri Congo bamaze ukwezi batajya ku ishuri 

  Abanyeshuri b’Abanyarwanda bigaga muri Congo- Kinshasa cyane mu Mujyi wa Goma bamaze ukwezi batajya ku ishuri ku bwo kubuzwa kwambuka.  Umwaka w’amashuri muri Congo aho biga mu Gifaransa hagiye gushira ukwezi utangiye, Abanyarwanda bigayo bataha n’ubu ntibaremerwa kwambuka uko bisanzwe. Aba banyeshuri biganjemo abava mu mujyi wa Gisenyi mu Rwanda, biga mu mashuri kuva ku y’incuke kugeza muri za kaminuza i Goma kuko bavuga ko bihendutse ku miryango yabo. Kubera indwara ya Ebola yabonetse mu mujyi wa Goma, hagiye gushira iminsi 60, ku mupaka wa Goma na Gisenyi urujya n’uruza rwaragabanyijwe bigaragara. Mu babujijwe kwambuka nk’uko babikoraga buri munsi harimo abanyeshuri. Bamwe muri bo babwiye BBC ko ubu bamaze ukwezi batiga, kwiyongera ku kiruhuko kinini bari barangije bitegura gutangira umwaka mu ntangiriro y’uku kwezi. Abandi babishoboye biga muri za kaminuza n’ay’isumbuye bagiye kuba cyangwa gucumbika i Goma kugira ngo bakomeze amasomo. Ã‰zÃ©chiel Rwibasira ni umubyeyi wo ku Gisenyi ufite abana babiri biga i Goma, yabwiye BBC ko ubu yabacumbikishirije mu muryango w’inshuti i Goma kugira ngo babashe gukomeza kwiga. Ati: "Biragoye cyane, urumva byabaye ingo ebyiri, ngomba kugira icyo ntanga mu muryango wabacumbikiye. Biratuvunnye cyane." Isaac Munyakazi, umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe amashuri y’incuke, abanza n’ayisumbuye, kuwa 24 Nzeri ari ku Gisenyi yabajijwe ikibazo cy’aba banyeshuri avuga ko leta izabafasha. Avuga ko batasubira muri Congo ku mapmvu zo kurinda ubuzima bwabo. Bwana Munyakazi yagize ati: "Abo bana tugomba kubashakira amashuri bakiga mu Rwanda." "Twemera ko porogaramu z’ibihugu byombi zitandukanye ariko iyo habaye impinduka hari uburyo umwana afashwa kwinjira mu yindi porogaramu kandi agakomeza ibyo yigaga." Muri uku kwezi bamwe muri aba banyeshuri babwiye BBC impungenge zabo zo kubona amashuri ajyanye n’ubshobozi bwabo, kwiga mu rundi rurimi hamwe n’amashami baziga. Bwana Munyakazi avuga ko mu Rwanda hari amashami afitanye isano n’ayo bigaga muri Congo. Mu gihe mu Rwanda bari mu gihembwe cya nyuma gisoza umwaka, Bwana Munyakazi avuga ko mbere y’uko batangirana umwaka n’abandi mu kwezi kwa mbere bazabanza kubafasha. Ati: "Tugiye kubaha amasomo yihariye mu Cyongereza, abafite ibyo bigaga hariya tugiye kubihuza n’ibyo mu Rwanda". "Kuko umwaka wacu utangira mu kwa mbere, ni ukuvuga ngo icyo gihe bazatangirana n’abandi kuko ntibakwinjira muri porogaramu umwaka uri kurangira." [penci_related_posts dis_pview="no" dis_pdate="no" title="Izindi nkuru wasoma" background="" border="" thumbright="no" number="4" style="list" align="none" withids="" displayby="recent_posts" orderby="rand"] Muri DR Congo ababyeyi boherezayo abana babo kuko bahabona amashuri ku giciro gito ugereranyije n’ayo mu Rwanda nk’uko ubushize babibwiye BBC. Ni naho n’ubu bifuza. Abbyeyi barasaba ko Leta yaca inkoni izamba kuko ngo bigaragara ko Ebola itakiri mu Mujyi wa Goma.  Inkuru ya BBC

title: Kirehe: Abiga ubutabire n'ubugenge banezezwa no kuba ibyo biga babibyaza umusaruro
article_text:
Kirehe: Abiga ubutabire n'ubugenge banezezwa no kuba ibyo biga babibyaza umusaruro

  Abanyeshuri n’abarimu bigisha ku rwunge rw’amashuri rwa Gacuba mu Murenge wa Musaza, mu Karere ka Kirehe baremeza ko integanyigisho nshya kuyishyira mu bikorwa byabaye intwaro bifashisha mu gukundisha abana ishuri no kubarinda guterwa inda bakiri bato.  Abanyeshuri bavuga ko gushyira mu bikorwa ibyo biga mu masomo y’ubutabire n’ubugende ndetse n’ibinyabuzima byatumye barushaho kumenya akamaro ko kwiga no kubyaza umusaruro amasomo biga. Uwase Deborah ni umwe muri aba banyeshuri bemeza bamaze kumenya akamaro ko kwiga ndetse ko nta mwana uzongera guta ishuri. Yagize ati "Twiga amasomo ariko ikidushimisha kurushaho ni uko ibyo twize ubu tubasha no kubishyira mu bikorwa ku buryo byatumye tumenya akamaro ko kwiga ,twatangiye gukora ingendoshuri no kujya gushyira ibyo twiga mu mikoro ngira, ababyeyi batwishyurira amafaranga tukajya kuri Rusumo high School muri laboratwari kandi byatumye twibumbira mu matsinda dutangira gukora ibyo twize tukabyaza umusaruro ibihingwa bihingwa hano dukora nk’inyama muri soya, dukora imitobe mu nanasi ndetse tugakora ibiribwa byitwa Merci Madamu gituma turwanya imirire mibi miryango yacu, hari abakora amasabune na siraje ku buryo nta mwana wiga ku kigo cyacu ngo agire umwanda". Uwase arakomeza avuga ko abana b’abakobwa ibikorwa bakorera ku kigo cyabo bizabafasha no kwirinda guterwa inda bakiri mu ishuri. Yagize ati "Nkatwe abakobwa nta muntu wadushuka ku buryo twaterwa inda kubera irari, ibyo ababyeyi bacu badashobora kuduha tubasha kubyigurira kubera ibikorwa dukorera hano ku ishuri bituma tubona amafaranga dukemuza ibibazo dufite". Mutabaruka Jean Claude yishimira kuba ibyo biga babibyaza umusaruro bigatuma bakunda ishuri ndetse bakiga biteza imbere. Yagize ati "Uburyo batwigishamo bwatumye tubona ko ibyo twiga bifite akamaro kuko iyo ubona ko hari ibintu wivumburiye bitewe no kwiga bituma ukunda kwiga cyane, ubundi twigaga nka Chemestry na Biology ntitubyumve neza ariko iyo ubona ushobora gukora siraje cya amasabune yo kumesa ndetse n’ayo gukora isuku bituma twumva ko twakora ibirenze ibyo dukora". Havugimana Philippe umwe mu barimu bafasha abo banyeshuri, yemeza ko ubushakashatsi akora bufasha abanyeshuri kuvumbura no guhanga udushya bigatuma bitegura kuzahangana n’ubushomeri bihangira imirimo. Umuyobozi wa G.s Gacuba, Habimana Modeste yemeza ko gushyira mu bikorwa integanyanyigisho byababereye intwaro yo gukundisha abana ishuri no kubafasha kwiga bafite intumbere. Ati "Minisiteri y’uburezi imaze guhindura integanyanyigisho ya mbere yari ishingiye ku bumenyi inshya iza ishingiye ku bushobozi, aho umwana ibyo yize agomba kubishyira mu ngiro,hashize imyaka ibiri tujyana abanyeshuri ku kigo cya Rusumo High School kandi byatanze umusaruro kuko abana ubu bakunda kwiga bitewe n’uko batangiye kujya bifashisha ibyo biga bakakoramo ibikorwa byabateza imbere". Avuga ko babibonamo amafaranga abafasha no kuzigama, nibura buri shuri ngo rizigama amafaranga ibihumbi magana atatu kandi iyo hashize umwaka baragabana bakiteza imbere, bamwe bakaguramo amatungo ku buryo ngo nta mwana wabura ibikoresho by’ishuri. title: Ababyeyi bafite abana biga i Goma ntibakozwa ibyo kubashyira mu mashuri yo mu Rwanda
article_text:
Ababyeyi bafite abana biga i Goma ntibakozwa ibyo kubashyira mu mashuri yo mu Rwanda

  Abanyeshuri amagana bo mu mashuri y’incuke kugeza muri kaminuza bambuka umupaka buri munsi bava ku Gisenyi mu Rwanda bajya kwiga hakurya i Goma ubu ntibabyemerewe kuva umwaka w’amashuri mushya muri DR Congo watangira ku wa mbere Tariki 2 Nzeri 2019.   Impamvu aba banyeshuri babuza kujya muri Congo, ni ubwoba bw’ikwirakwira ry’indwara ya Ebola iheruka kuboneka mu mujyi wa Goma mu minsi irenga 30 ishize. Ababyeyi bavuga ko bidashoboka ko abana babo biga mu Rwanda mu gihe bavuga ko imyigishirize itandukanye kandi n’amafaranga y’ishuri akaba atari amawe. Ababyeyi bavuga ko bohereza abana babo kwiga i Goma kuko amashuri mu Rwanda ahenda, ko abana babo biga mu Gifaransa kandi hari amashami biga atari mu Rwanda. Umwe mu babyeyi yabwiye BBC dukesha iyi nkuru, ati: "Nk’abana biga ikiganga [ubuvuzi], mu Rwanda nta kiganga gihari mu mashuri yisumbuye, kiri muri kaminuza kandi naho kirahenze. Niba umwana yari ageze mu wa kane w’ayisumbuye yiga ikiganga arajya mu rihe shami rindi kandi amenyereye ikiganga?" Uyu mubyeyi avuga ko abayobozi babijeje kubashakira ibigo abana babo bakwigiramo ariko avuga ko bidashoboka ko babona ibigo muri aka kanya. Undi agita ati: "Nibatureke tujyane abana ahangana n’ubushobozi bwacu, niba muri Congo njyanayo umwana ku mwaka wose nkishyura $80, mu Rwanda ikigo gihari cya macyeya ari 70,000 buri gihembwe! Urumva nzabigenza nte? Undi mubyeyi umwe yagize ati: "None se twakora iki ko turi munsi y’itegeko, abana turabicaza mu rugo nta handi dufite twabajyana".  Bige Icyongereza, bige mu Rwanda’ Nyuma y’inama bagiranye n’ababyeyi bafite abana biga muri DR Congo, Uwampayizina Marie GrÃ¢ce wari umuyobozi w’akarere ka Rubavu wungirije ushinzwe imibereho y’abaturage yabwiye abanyamakuru ko Leta itagomba gushyira abana mu kaga bubohereza ahari Ebola. Uyu muyobozi weguye ku mirimo ye ku wa gatatu w’iki cyumweru- icyo gihe yagize ati: "Ikigomba kurebwa mbere ni ubuzima bw’abana. Twashyizeho komite y’ababyeyi yo kureba uko twafasha aba bana." Yavuze ko mu Rwanda hari amashuri aba banyeshuri bakwigamo nubwo ari ayo mu Cyongereza aho kujya i Goma. Madamu Uwampayizina yagize ati: "Muri aya mezi asigaye [kugeza mu kwa mbere] abo bana baba bategurirwa kuzatangira umwaka utaha bazaba baramenye Icyongereza kibemerera kwiga mu Rwanda." [penci_related_posts dis_pview="no" dis_pdate="no" title="Izindi nkuru wasoma" background="" border="" thumbright="no" number="4" style="list" align="none" withids="" displayby="recent_posts" orderby="rand"] Nyuma y’inama ba Minisitiri b’ubuzima b’u Rwanda na Congo bemeje ubufatanye mu kurwanya Ebola ariko hatabangamiwe urujya n’uruza rw’ubucuruzi n’imibereho y’abantu ku mipaka. Gusa Minisiteri y’uburezi mu Rwanda ikaba ntacyo yari yatangaza igiye gufasha aba banyeshuri.

title: Ngoma: Abanyeshuri bigumuye banga gukora ikizamini
article_text:
Ngoma: Abanyeshuri bigumuye banga gukora ikizamini

  Abanyeshuri biga mu mwaka wa Gatandatu mu ishami ry’indimi mu rwunge rw’amashuri rwa Bare, mu Murenge wa Mutenderi, ku wa Mbere tariki ya 8 Nyakanga 2019, banze gukora ikizamini cy’igiswahili mu gihe bashinjaga mugenzi wabo kugikopezwa.  Aba banyeshuri bigumuye bavuga ko ibibazo n’ibisubizo by’ikizamini byateguwe n’ishami ry’uburezi mu karere ka Ngoma, umwarimu yabihaye umunyeshuri mugenzi wabo. Bavuga ko icyo babikoreye ari ukugira ngo ingeso yo gukopera icike, no kugaragaza ko bishobora kuzagira ingaruka kuri barumuna babo. Mukankusi Dative bita Scovia uvugwaho guhabwa ikizamini n’ ibisubizo byacyo, ashinja umukozi w’ikigo nderabuzima cya Mutenderi kumuha icyo kizamini akavuga ko amaze kukimuha yagiye mu rugo iwabo agafashwa na se kubona ibisubizo. Yemeza ko kugira ngo abandi banyeshuri bakibone, byatewe na mugenzi we yasigiye ikaye yari irimo ibisubizo byacyo agarutse asanga bagenzi be bagifite . Umukozi w’ikigo nderabuzima cya Mutenderi aganira na Radiyo izuba dukesha iyi nkuru yahakanye ibimuvugwaho, akavuga ko uyu munyeshuri w’umukobwa yamuzaniye furashi yari iriho indirimbo ndetse n’icyo kizamini amusaba ko yamusohorera impapuro, ko aho cyavuye bizwi na Mukankusi Dative. Ubuyobozi bw’ishuri bwemeza ko abanyeshuri banze gukora ikizamini cy’igiswahili biturutse ku munyeshuri wagihaye bagenzi be mbere y’uko gitangwa, nk’uko byemezwa n’umuyobozi w’iri shuri, Uwimana Dative unemeza ko basabye Akarere kari kateguye icyo kizamini gutegura ikindi kizamini.

title: Nyamasheke: Abanyeshuri b’abakobwa bo muri G.S FAK baryama mu buryo buteye inkenke
article_text:
Nyamasheke: Abanyeshuri b’abakobwa bo muri G.S FAK baryama mu buryo buteye inkenke

  Abakobwa 280 biga mu rwunge rw’amashuri rwitiriwe Frank Adamson rwa Kibogora ( G.S FAK) mu karere ka Nyamasheke bavuga ko nyuma y’uko inyubako (Dortoir) bararagamo ihiye igakongoka, ubu barara mu buryo buteye inkeke.   Aba banyeshuri b’abakobwa bararana ari batatu kuri Matela, bose basasa hasi mu byumba bitari byarabugenewe. Ababyeyi baharerera n’ubuyobozi bw’ishuri mu nteko rusange yabaye ku wa 10 Gicurasi 2019, bakaba baremeranijwe ko isanwa vuba abana babo bakarara neza kugira ngo banabashe kwiga batekanye. Nk’uko umuyobozi mushya w’iri shuri, Ukizebaraza LÃ©on Emmanuel yabisobanuriye ababyeyi baharerera, ngo inyubako zirimo n’iyi zahiye inshuro 4 zose biba amayobera kuko yahiye ubwa mbere ku wa 20 Mutarama uyu mwaka, hashya icyumba cyararagamo abakobwa 19, nyuma y’iminsi 3 gusa ku wa 23 Mutarama irashya yose irakongoka, biba ngombwa ko abakobwa 280 bayiraragamo bose bashakirwa aho baryama. Bamwe bashyizwe mu cyumba cy’amasengesho, abandi mu nyubako yari igenewe kuvurirwamo abanyeshuri n’izindi nyubako zitari zaragenewe kuraramo abanyeshuri. Akomeza avuga ko ubwo aba bakobwa bararaga n’ubundi mu buryo budashobotse, ku wa 6 Gashyantare cya cyumba cy’amasengesho na cyo cyarahiye abakiraragamo barimurwa, ku wa 10 Werurwe ikindi cyumba cyarahiye ,aho hose nta kintu na kimwe bakuragamo, abana basigaye iheruheru, bagobokwa n’itorero MÃ©thodiste Libre mu Rwanda nyirishuri,akarere,Minisiteri ifite kurwanya Ibiza mu nshingano n’abandi bagiraneza ngo babashe gukomeza kwiga. Uyu muyobozi akomeza avuga ko izi nkongi z’umuriro zabaye amayobera ari ko n’iperereza rikorwa,haza gutabwa muri yombi abanyeshuri 4 barimo umukobwa wakekwaga uku gutwika hakurikijwe ibimenyetso bavuga ko byamufataga n’abandi bahungu 3 ngo babaga mu itsinda ryiyise amaniga bakekwaga ubufatanyacyaha,icyakora ngo kuva batabwa muri yombi ntihongeye gushya, na bo ngo baraburana bari hanze biga mu yandi mashuri bashakiwe,uretse uyu mukobwa ngo utarabona ahandi yiga. Nyuma yo kugezwaho uko imiryamire y’abana ihagaze ubu, bagasanga ari mibi kandi kugira ngo bige neza ari uko baba banaryamye neza,ababyeyi biyemeje gufasha mu isanwa ry’iyi nyubako ngo nibura umwaka utaha uzatangire biga neza. Mukamwiza ConsolÃ©e umwe mu baharerera yabwiye Bwiza.com ati’’ nyuma yo kutubwira uburemere bw’ikibazo kandi abana ari abacu,binavugwa ko bamwe muri bo ari bo bakekwaho kuyitwika, twiyemeje kugira uruhare mu kuyisana aho buri mubyeyi yiyemeje gutanga amafaranga 5.000 mu gihembwe gitaha kandi ntituzahagararira aho kuko uko barara twese nk’ababyeyi biduteye impungenge.’’ Pasiteri Mushimiyimana SimÃ©on, umubwiriza wa Conference ya Kibogora mu itorero MÃ©thodiste Libre mu Rwanda,yabwiye Bwiza.com ko habaruwe ibikoresho by’abana byahiriyemo bifite agaciro k’amafaranga hafi miliyoni 12, bakaba barashakiwe iby’ibanze by’agera kuri miliyoni 8 ngo babashe kwiga,gusana inyubako bikazatwara arenga miliyoni 38 agomba kuboneka vuba ngo imirimo itangire. Ati’’ twkoze ibishoboka byose ngo abana bakomeze bige nubwo barara mu buryo butameze neza,ariko ku bufatanye n’ababyeyi n’abandi bireba bose twiyemeje gukemura iki kibazo byihutirwa uko tuzashobozwa.’’ Ku bavuga ko ishuri rikwiye kuriha ibikoresho by’abana byose byangiritse,avuga ko ritabikora kuko atari ryo ryabitwitse,icyakora ko mu bufatanye abana bazagenda babona iby’ibanze bibafasha kwiga. Umuyobozi w’aka karere Kamari AimÃ© Fabien na we avuga ko bahangayikishijwe n’imiryamire y’aba bana, bakaba bakomeje gushakisha aya mafaranga ku bufatanye bw’abo bireba bose,akizeza ababyeyi ko bikurikiranwa kandi igisubizo kitazatinda kuboneka kuko iki ngo ari ikibazo bafatana uburemere bukomeye cyane.
