title: Uburyo 5 ushobora gusomanamo n’umukunzi wawe, akajya ahora akwibuka buri munsi...
article_text:
Uburyo 5 ushobora gusomanamo n’umukunzi wawe, akajya ahora akwibuka buri munsi...

 Abakobwa kimwe n’abahungu bakunda gusomana, ariko wari uzi ko abakobwa bakunda uburyo bwo gusomana bumwe kurusha ubundi? Si uguhuza iminwa gusa ahubwo hari amwe mu mabanga yo gusomana buri mukobwa arota ijoro n’amanywa kuba byibuze umunsi umwe yasomwa muri ubwo buryo.  . Uburyo wasomamo umukunzi wawe akanezerwa bidasanzwe
. Nusoma umukobwa mukundana muri ubu buryo ntazigera akwibagirwa
. Ubu buryo bwatuma wigarurira umutima w’umukunzi wawe akajya ahora agutekereza Ariyo mpamvu hano kuri iwaculive.com twabateguriye bumwe mu buryo 5 bwo gusomana buri mukobwa yifuza kuzakorerwa byibuze rimwe mu buzima bwe. Kumusoma mu mvura: Imvura itangiye kugwa, aho kugira ngo utwikire umukobwa yere kunyagirwa, zamura umutwe we, umurebe mu maso maze umusome byimbitse. Uko muri gusomana, gerageza kumutsa imisatsi ye n’ikiganza kimwe, ikindi kiganza kimufashe mu manyungunyungu, ugerageza kumuterura. Buri mukobwa yifuza ibintu nk’ibi kandi Nubimukorera azumva ameze nk’uwageze mu ijuru kandi ari mu biganza byawe.  2. Kumusoma umwegetse ku rukuta: Abakobwa bakunda gukora imibonano iyo harimo akantu k’ingufu, no gusomana nuko. Uburyo bwo gusomana, muterure umwegeke ku rukuta n’imbaraga maze umusome byimbitse, ariko ukomeza kumutsindagira ku rukuta, amaguru ye atandukanye winjijemo ayawe ariko acyambaye imyenda, ukomeze kumusoma. Ibi ni ibintu atazibagirwa mu buzima bwe. 3. Kumusoma murimo gutongana: Murimo gutongana ku bintu bitagenze neza, yakurakariye cyane. mwegere ufate ibiganza bye, azagerageza ku kurwanya cyangwa ku guhunga yibwira ko ugiye kumugirira nabi. Mufate umwiyegereze maze umusome, ubukana yari afite buzahita bucururuka bube zero kubera kumusoma, komeza umusome nk’iminota igera ku icumi mbere y’uko umuryamisha ku gitanda. nubikora neza azamara imyaka 5 atongeye kugutonganya. 4. Kumusoma uturutse inyuma: Mwegere uturutse inyuma mu gihe atatekerezaga ko waba uhari. Musome ku ijisi, ku matama mbere yuko ahindukira ngo akubone neza. Abakobwa benshi bakunda gusomana bitunguranye, ariko bikore neza utazatungurwa mbere. Ibi byakorwa neza mu gihe umutunguye arimo gutekereza cyane, ukamusoma uturutse inyuma umufashe mu manyungunyungu. ku musoma gutyo bizamushimisha, amaboko yawe amufashe azatuma yumva nta cyamuhungabanya igihe cyose muri kumwe.  5. Kumusoma mu ruhame/imbere y’inshuti zawe: Uburyo bwo gusomana mu ruhame nti bivuze mu nsengero cyangwa amahuriro ayo ariyo yose, ahubwo ni ahantu abandi bantu bashobora kubabona. haba mwasohotse muri resitora cyangwa se ahantu hari abantu benshi. Mubwire ahaguruke mbere yuka amenya ko ugiye kumusoma imbere y’imbaga y’abantu. Birushaho kuba byiza inshuti zawe zihari cyangwa bamwe mu muryango wawe. Bizatuma yumva ashyigikiwe, ejo hazaza hameze neza igihe cyose muzaba muri kumwe.

title: Ingeso ukwiye kwirinda mugihe ugiye kujya murukundo
article_text:
Ingeso ukwiye kwirinda mugihe ugiye kujya murukundo

 Hari bamwe mu bahungu usanga batagira impano yo guhirwa no gukundwa n’abakobwa ndetse n’uwo bagerageje gukundana ntibarambane kubera imyitwarire itari myiza bagira imbere y’abakobwa.  Kumufata nkabandi mwatandukanye: Umukobwa wese ntakunda umuntu umugereranya n’abandi bakobwa iyo muri kumwe cyangwa mu biganiro mugirana. Aba ashaka ko umwereka ko ari we ukunda gusa kandi abaruta bose. Igihe hari undi ubonye wenda amuruta mu bwiza, ntukamurangarire muri kumwe cyangwa ngo ugire icyo ubivugaho mukiri kumwe kuko bituma abona ko ufite imitima myinshi. Umujinya ukabije: hari abakobwa bazirana n’umuhungu urakazwa n’ubusa cyangwa bagira umujinya ukabije. Iyo uteye gutyo,umukobwa ahita abona ko no mu rugo umugore uzashaka uzajya uhora umushihura,agahitamo ko mutandukana urukundo rutarakomera. Kugira isuku nke: iki ni kimwe mu bintu bituma abakobwa batandukana n’inshuti zabo. Aha umuntu yavuga nko kunuka mu kanwa biturutse ku isuku nke cyangwa kugira impumuro mbi y’icyuya kuko udakunda kwiyuhagira. Kutava aho uri mu mitekerereze: imitekerereze iri hasi bituma umukunzi wawe agutakariza ikizere bityo akagenda akuvamo buhorobuhoro iteka umukobwa aba yumva umukunzi we yaba umuntu ukunda umurimo kandi akagira ibitekerezo byubaka kuko bigaragaza ko azavamo umugabo nya mugabo. Igihe cyose ufite umukunzi ujye wirinda kuba wakora ikintu cyose cyatuma uta ibaba imbere ye ahubwo ugaharanira ko waba umugabo wikizere kuri we.

title: College Sainte Marie Reine batangije igikorwa cyo gufasha abanyeshuri batishoboye

College Sainte Marie Reine batangije igikorwa cyo gufasha abanyeshuri batishoboye

 Abanyeshuri n’ubuyobozi bwa College Sainte Marie Reine I Kabgayi kuri uyu wa 3 Ugushyingo 2019 bakoreye igitaramo mu mujyi wa Kigari ahazwi nko kuri Maison de Jeunnes Kimisagara(inzu cg ikigo cy’urubyiruko). Ni muri gahunda batangije yo kwishakamo ibisubizo mu gufasha bagenzi babo hirya no hino batagira amikoro yo kurya ku bigo bigaho. Padiri MUVUNYI Innocent, umuyobozi wa College Sainte Marie Reine y’I Kabgayi avuga ko iki ari igikorwa cyatekerejwe n’abanyeshuri b’iri shuri abereye umuyobozi. Ko ari igikorwa gitsitse mu bintu byinshi, kikaba igitaramo gikubiyemo impano zinyuranye ziherekeza ubuzima bwabo bwo kwiga ku ishuri, aho basohoka bakereka ababyeyi babo, abavandimwe n’inshuti impano zabo nyuma y’amasomo biga. Bakabikora bagambiriye gusaba ko abitabiriye bagira icyo bigomwa kigafasha abana b’abanyeshuri batishoboye biga bataha ariko bagaburirwa ku ishuri hirya no hino. Padiri MUVUNYI, akomeza avuga ko iki gikorwa kibaye ku nshuro ya mbere bifuza ko kizakomeza cyane ko abanyeshuri bifuje ko no mu ntangiriro z’umwaka bazajya buri wese agira icyo azana ku ishuri bagashaka kimwe mu bigo by’I Muhanga kirimo abanyeshuri bakeneye gufashwa. Kuri iyi nshuro, ubufasha bwakusanijwe buzatangwa ku kigo batoranije bafatanije n’ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Muhanga. Ni ishuri rya GS Horezo ribarizwamo abana b’abakene bo mucyiciro cya mbere cy’ubudehe bagorwa no gufungura ku ishuri. Uwiringiyimana Yohani Claude, umwe mubabyeyi witabiriye iki gitaramo yabwiye intyoza.com ko iki ari igikorwa cyiza kandi cy’urukundo cyateguwe n’abana babo bafatanije n’ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo. Kukitabira ngo biri mu rwego rwo kubatera ingabo mu bitugu ku bibazo bakeneye gukemura by’abandi bana batagira amikoro, ko kandi bakoze ikintu cyiza cyo gukoresha ubuhanzi mu gukemura ikibazo ariko kandi n’abantu bakishima. Akomeza anenga ababyeyi badaha agaciro ibikorwa nk’ibi abana babo baba bifuje ko bahuriramo bakabereka impano zabo ariko bakanafatanya mu gukemura ikibazo runaka.  Musenyeri Smaragde Mbonyintege witabiriye iki gikorwa avuga ko icyo abana bakoze gikubiyemo inyigisho ikomeye yo kuva mu bibazo byawe bwite ukamenya no kwitangira abandi. Ko ibi biri mu ndangagaciro za Kinyarwanda ndetse n’iza Gikirisito. Smaragde, akomeza kuri iki gikorwa cy’aba banyeshuri ati“ Kuba abana baragize iki gitekerezo kandi bakaba bakifitemo, tubifata nk’irembo ry’icyizere rifunguye kuburere abana bahabwa muri College Marie Reine”. Akomeza avuga ko nyuma y’uburezi gatolika, banigisha abana kumenya kwitanga, Kwitangira abandi, kwitangira Igihugu, kwitangira abavandimwe bawe n’urugo rwawe aho kwireba ngo ugwe mu kwikunda.   Muri iki gikorwa cya College Sainte Marie Reine y’I Kabgayi kigamije gufasha abanyeshuri b’abakene badafite uko barya ku ishuri nk’abandi, abanyeshuri biyerekanye mu mpano zitandukanye bataramira ababyeyi babo, inshuti n’abavandimwe mu mbyino Gakondo, imivugo, indirimo zinyuranye, imyiyerekano itandukanye n’ibindi byafashije abitabiriye gususuruka banabona ko uretse amasomo asanzwe yajyanye abana babo hari n’ibindi bungukiye ku ishuri kandi bifite akamaro.     Munyaneza Theogene / intyoza.com

title: Hitezwe igihombo cya Miliyari n’Amamiliyoni y’Amadolari yavaga mu bukerarugendo-Perezida Museveni
article_text:
Hitezwe igihombo cya Miliyari n’Amamiliyoni y’Amadolari yavaga mu bukerarugendo-Perezida Museveni

 Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, Perezida w’Igihugu cya Uganda, kuri uyu wa 01 Kamena 2020 yatangaje ko igihugu ayoboye kizahomba Miliyari imwe na Miliyoni magana atandatu y’amadolari ya Amerika babonekaga avuye mu bukerarugendo. Ibi ngo ni ingaruka z’icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Ubukerarugendo ni hamwe mu hantu hinjiriza iki gihugu akayabo k’Amadolari. Ba mukerarugendo, baza mu Gihugu cya Uganda kureba inyamaswa z’ubwoko butandukanye harimo nk’Intare, giraffe, imbogo hamwe n’izindi nyamaswa zitandukanye. Hari kandi ba Mukerarugendo bandi baza kureba inguge nini zitwa, “Gorilles”mu rurimi rw’igifransa cyangwa se Ingagi(mu Kinyarwanda) mw’ishamba/Pariki riri mu majyepfo ashyira uburengerazuba bw’iki gihugu. Ni ku rubibe na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo n’u Rwanda. Igihugu cya Uganda, nkuko ijwi rya Amerika ribitangaza, cyabonye Miliyari 2 y’Amadolari ya Amerika kiyakuye mu bukerarugendo mu mwaka w’i 2017. Iki gihugu kandi cyari kinjije Miliyari imwe na Miliyoni magana arindwi mu mwaka w’imbere yaho. Ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI cyatangaje mu kwezi gushize kwa Gicurasi 2020 ko byari byitezwe ko amafaranga Uganda ikura mu bukerarugendo agabanuka ibice 54 kw’ijana hagati y’umwaka w’i 2019 n’umwaka w’i 2020. Munyaneza Theogene / intyoza.com

title: PTS-Gishari: 39 barimo abapolisi 29 basoje amahugurwa ku kurengera ibidukikije
article_text:
PTS-Gishari: 39 barimo abapolisi 29 basoje amahugurwa ku kurengera ibidukikije

 Abapolisi b’u Rwanda 29 bari kumwe n’abandi bakozi 10 bashinzwe kurinda za pariki z’igihugu basoje amahugurwa ajyanye no kubungabunga ibidukikije; ni amahugurwa bari bamazemo ibyumweru bitatu, yaberaga mu ishuri rya Polisi riherereye mu karere ka Rwamagana mu murenge wa Gishari (PTS-Gishari).  Aya mahugurwa ari muri gahunda y’ubufatanye hagati ya Polisi y’u Rwanda na Polisi yo mu gihugu cy’Ubutaliyani (Carabinieri). Ayasojwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki ya 07 Gashyantare 2020 ni icyiciro cya kabiri. Ubwo yasozaga aya mahugurwa umuyobozi w’ishuri rya PTS-Gishari, Commissioner of Police (CP) Vianney Nshimiyimana yavuze ko kurinda no kurengera ibidukikije ari imwe mu nshingano za Polisi y’u Rwanda. Yagize ati: “Aya mahugurwa agamije gukomeza kubaka ubushobozi mu bijyanye no kurwanya ba rushimusi bakunze kujya kwica inyamanswa muri za Pariki no mu bindi byanya bikomye. Aba barushimusi kandi usanga bakoresha amayeri ajya kumera nk’aya gisirikare. Aya mahugurwa ni ingenzi kuri Polisi y’u Rwanda, kuko muri ibi bihe twibasiwe n’ibiza bituruka ku bikorwa bya muntu”. Muri iki gihe cy’ibyumeru bitatu abitabiriye amahugurwa bahuguwe ku bintu bitandukanye birimo kurwanya ba rushimusi, ubugenzacyaha ku bidukikije, kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, gukusanya ibimenyetso ndetse no kugera ahabereye icyaha. Si ibyo gusa kuko banahuguwe ku bijyanye n’ibibazo bikunze kuba hagati y’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ndetse n’ikiremwa muntu, amategeko ajyanye n’urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima mu Rwanda, ubutabazi bw’ibanze, gukoresha amakarita(Carthography), gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu kumenya ibyerekezo by’ahantu n’ibindi bitandukanye. CP Nshimiyimana yibukije abahuguwe ko bagomba kuzakoresha neza ubumenyi bahawe, abasaba guhora biteguye gukora kinyamwuga no guterwa ishema n’akazi bakora. Yanashimiye Polisi y’ubutaliyani ku bufatanye bakomeje kugaragaza by’umwihariko mu gutanga amahugurwa. Si ubwa mbere muri PTS-Gushari habera amahugurwa nk’aya kuko mu Ukwakira 2017 abakozi bashinzwe kurinda za Pariki barenga 250 basoje amahugurwa asa nk’ayasojwe kuri uyu wa 07 Gashyantare 2020. intyoza.com

title: Kamonyi/Ibiza: Abahinzi b’Umuceri mu gihombo gikomeye, Hegitari 150 ku Mukunguri zaratwawe
article_text:
Kamonyi/Ibiza: Abahinzi b’Umuceri mu gihombo gikomeye, Hegitari 150 ku Mukunguri zaratwawe

 Abahinzi b’Umuceri mu kibaya cya Mukunguri gihuza Akarere ka kamonyi na Ruhango, barataka igihombo gikomeye batewe n’ibiza by’imvura iheruka. Aho bateganyaga gusarura Toni 1500 ngo no kubona 500 bizagorana. Ibikorwa remezo nabyo byarangiritse, igihembwe cy’ihinga gitaha nta musaruro biteze niba badatabawe. Mugenzi Ignace, Perezida wa Koperative Coproriz Abahuzabikorwa ikorera mu gishanga cya Mukunguri yabwiye intyoza.com ko umuhigo bari bihaye wo gusarura nibura Toni 1500 z’Umuceri muri iki gihembwe cy’ihinga bitazakunda bitewe n’ibiza. Yagize ati“ Twatewe n’ibiza by’imvura, amazi aza ari menshi ku rwego rwo hejuru aturutse mu bice bya Muhanga na Ruhango kuko twe nta mvura yari yaguye. Yashenye ibikorwa remezo, atwara umusaruro w’abanyamuryango aho aba mbere bari batangiye gusarura. Nibura ibisaga 80% by’umusaruro w’abanyamuryango byagiye”. Akomeza ati“ Twari twiteze Toni zitari munsi y’1500 ariko ubu turabara Toni zisaga 1000 zagiye. Ibyabaye birenze ubushobozi bw’abanyamuryango ubwabo, birenze ubushobozi bwa Koperative. Turasaba inzego zitandukanye kutuba hafi kuko n’igihembwe cy’ihinga gikurikira dushobora kutagihinga kuko ibikorwa remezo byasenyutse kandi no kubisana bishobora gufata igihe”. Karengera Boniface, umuhinzi w’Umuceri akaba n’umunyamuryango wa Koperative avuga ko yakozweho n’ibiza ku buryo bukomeye. Ati“.….(yabanje kwimyoza), umva kubwanjye nagendesheje Buroke enye aho nabaraga nibura hejuru ya Toni imwe ariko ubu sinzi ko nzabona n’imifuka itatu muri 12 nateganyaga gusarura”. Samvura Andereya, umuhinzi akaba n’umuyobozi wa Zone y’abahinzi bari bahize nibura gusarura Toni 120, avuga ko umukunguri wacitse Zone yose ikagenda ku buryo nta musaruro biteze. Asaba ubuyobozi kubitaho hakagira igikorwa ariko kandi akanasaba ikigo cy’ubwishingizi bagiranye amasezerano kubagoboka byihuse. Uwimana Esperence, yari yiteze umusaruro ariko ngo ubu ni amarira gusa kuko atewe n’ibiza yari ageze igihe cy’isarura. Ati“ Nagendesheje, kuko ubushize nari nabonye ibiro bisaga 800 ariko ubu noneho utwasigaye nta n’ibiro 100 nzikuriramo”. Akomeza asaba abashinzwe gutunganya igishanga kugikora neza ku buryo gikomera ku rwego rwo guhangana n’ibiza. Ndakengerwa Eugene, ashinzwe ibikorwaremezo bijya kuhira mu gishanga gihingwamo umuceri cya Mukunguri. Avuga ko imvura yaguye yangije ingomero ntoya zifata amazi ajyanwa mu mirima y’abahinzi. Ingomero enye zari mu gishanga zarangiritse ku buryo zidashobora gufata amazi ngo ayoborwe mu mirima y’umuceri. Akomeza avuga ko nubwo atabasha guhamya agaciro nyirizina k’ibyangiritse mu mafaranga, ku makuru afite ni uko ibi bikorwa remezo byasenyutse byari byatwaye agera kuri Miliyari ebyiri z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda (2,000,000,000Frws) hatabariwemo ayagiye yongerwamo nyuma. Niyongira Uzziel, Umuyobozi w’uruganda rw’umuceri rwa Mukunguri ari narwo rugurira abahinzi b’umuceri umusaruro bejeje, yabwiye intyoza.com ko 98% by’umusaruro utunganywa n’uruganda uva muri iki gishanga. Avuga ko bitagishobotse ko babona umusaruro utunganywa n’uruganda muri iki gihembwe cy’ihinga. Agira kandi ati “ Turabonamo igihombo gikomeye kuko ntabwo dushobora gukingura imiryango mu gihe Ibiza nk’ibi ngibi byamaze kwangiza umusaruro. Umusaruro wose nitwe twawuguraga, turahombye, tubuze icyo dukora, abahinzi nabo barawubuze, Koperative nayo imirimo yayo irahagaze”. Niyongira, avuga ko igikomeye ari uko batabuze gusa umusaruro muri iki gihembwe cy’ihinga cya 2020 B, ahubwo ngo iki gihombo batewe n’ibiza barakigumamo ndetse bishoboke ko bagitindamo bitewe n’iyangirika ry’ibikorwaremezo. Asaba ubufatanye bw’inzego zose bireba kugira igikorwa mu maguru mashya igishanga kikongera gukoreshwa. Dr Karangwa Patrick, Umuyobozi mukuru w’Ikigo gishinzwe iterambere ry’Ubuhinzi n’ubworozi mu Rwanda(RAB) yabwiye ikinyamakuru intyoza.com ko ikibazo cya Mukunguri n’ibiza byibasiye iki gishanga birimo gushakirwa icyakorwa nubwo ngo hari n’ahandi. Ati“ Ni ikibazo kitihariye kuri Mukunguri gusa. Dufite henshi hari ibibazo biri kuba by’imyuzure, ikirimo gukorwa ni ukureba ibishobora gukorwa kuko byose bitari ku rwego rumwe rw’ubutabazi. Mu bihe nk’ibi ngibi iyo amazi amaze gukamuka tureba ubufasha bwaba bwihuse bwakwifashishwa, ibyakorwa mu gihe cya vuba kugira ngo abantu badahera mugihirahiro, ibisaba ubushobozi buri hejuru kugira ngo bizakorwe mu gihe kirekire. Ni ubugenzuzi burimo bukorwa mu kureba ibyashoboka. Turimo turabarura ngo turebe ibyangiritse n’ibyihutirwa kurusha”. Dr Karangwa, avuga ko mu gihugu hose ibyo bamaze kubarura byangijwe n’ibiza biri ku buso busaga Hegitari 3800. Avuga ko mu nama baha abahinzi ari uko nk’aho amazi agikamuka bashobora kureba ikindi bahinga kitangiza igihembwe cy’ihinga. Munyaneza Theogene / intyoza.com

title: RSB yaburiye abakora ubucuruzi bw’amata batita ku buziranenge
article_text:
RSB yaburiye abakora ubucuruzi bw’amata batita ku buziranenge  

 Abacuruzi bâamata bakura ku nganda ziyatunganya bamurikiwe igenzure ikigo gitsura ubuziranenge (RSB) cyabakoreye, bukaba bwagaragaje ko abenshi babikora mu buryo butanoze. RSB yavuze ko yakoreye ubu bugenzuzi mu makusanyirizo y’amata (milk zones) angana na 75% ariko abatagera kuri 30% bakaba ari bo bafite ubuziranenge mu mikorere yabo. Abenshi basanze bakoresha abakozi badafite ubumenyi  mu bijyanye nâamata ku buryo 85% byâabakozi bize amashuri abanza nâayisumbuye gusa. Ikindi beretswe kitagenda neza ni ukudasuzumisha indwara abakozi babo kandi bashobora kwanduza abakiriya babagana. Bongeye kwerekwa ko nta ngamba zihamye bafite zo kubungabunga ubuziranenge bwâamata bacuruza aho iri genzura ryasanze abangana na 90% batabwitaho. Murenzi Raymond uyobora RSB yavuze ko bagomba kubanza kubigisha, abatisubiyeho bakazahanwa, yagize ati âHari abo twasanze amata bayongeramo ifu, ifarini cyangwa se amazi yewe bamwe banayavanga nâamaze igiheâ. 

Murenzi Raymond, umuyobozi wa RSB Abafite aya magurishirizo bavuze ko ibyo basabwa ari byiza kandi bagiye gukora uko bashoboye bagatanga amata meza ndetse no mu buryo bwiza. Ariko banagarutse ku bibakoma mu nkokora bikababuza kuzuza ibisabwa. Bagarutse ku kuba bakirwanira isoko nâabandi bacuruza amata azanwa nâamagare, ndetse nâamazu ahenze kandi basabwa gukorera ahantu hanini kuko baba bafite ibyuma binini baterekamo amata. RSB yijeje aba bacuruzi ko igiye kuzabafasha ikabaha abakozi bo kuberekera uburyo bikorwa babyize ariko inabasaba kwigenzura mbere aho kurindira ibihano.

title: Karama: Abagore bihaye inshingano mu kubungabunga ibikorwaremezo
article_text:
Karama: Abagore bihaye inshingano mu kubungabunga ibikorwaremezo  

 Abagore batuye mu mudugudu wâIcyitegererezo wa Karama mu karere ka Nyarugenge bo bavuga ko kubungabunga ibikorwaremwzo bagejejweho babigize inshingano zabo kuko byabagiriye akamaro bakavuga ko ahanini aribo babihomberagamo kuko nk’ahubatswe umuhanda mbere utarahaza bahabategerega bakabambura. Mukamana Console yagize ati: âTwebwe nka hano dutuye mu mudugudu wa Karama twihaye intego yo gukora umuganda buri wa Gatandatu, tugakora amasuku mu muhanda, tukavomera indabo zihateye n’ibindi byinshi ku buryo ibikorwa byose twegerejwe tubifata neza". Uwiragiye Mediatrice yagize ati, âNi byiza ko tumenya akamaro ko kwita ku bikorwaremezo kuko n’iyo amatara yapfuye usanga ari twebwe tubihomberamo, baradutega bakatwambura amasakoshi cyangwa bakaba batwambura amafaranga kuko ari twe banyantege nkeya, ni byiza rero ko dukwiye gufata iyambere mu kubyitaho". Umuyobozi wâAkarere ka Nyarugenge, Nzaramba Kayisime avuga ko ibikorwaremezo bigirira akamaro buri wese ariko by’umwihariko abagore, yagize ati, âAbantu bose bibagirira akamaro ariko cyane abagore kuko usanga aribo banyantege nkeya, ahangiritse imihanda nibo bahagwa cyane, ahatari amatara nibo bahamburirwa, ibyo byose rero bituma bagakwiye kubibungabunga cyane kurusha abandi bantu
bose". Ubwo Perezida Paul Kagame yatahaga umudugudu wa karama kuri 03 Nyakanga 2019, yasabye abawugenewemo amazi kwita ku bikorwaremezo, yagize ati "Abahawe aya macumbi babanze bige kuyafata neza ubwabo, tutazumva haruwo yasenyukiyeho bikadusubiza inyuma, tukumva umwe wari wahawe inzu ngo yasenyutse yasubiye aho yari ari habi. Ikindi kandi mwahawe amazi, mwige kuyakoresha icyo yagenewe, muyafate neza ndetse na mwe ubwanyu mwifata neza mugira isuku."

title: Amajyaruguru: Urugaga rw’abagore bibumbiye muri RPF inkotanyi bashoje ukwezi k’umuryango bubakira abatishoboye
article_text:
Amajyaruguru: Urugaga rw’abagore bibumbiye muri RPF inkotanyi bashoje ukwezi k’umuryango bubakira abatishoboye  

 
 Abagore bari muri RPF inkotanyi mu ntara yâAmajyaruguru, basoje ukwezi k’umuryango bari barahariye ibikorwa byo gufasha abatishoboye babubakira inzu zo kubamo ndetse banabagenera ibikoresho bitandukanye. Basoreje mu karere ka Gicumbi mu murenge wa bwisige aho batashye inzu y’umukecuru Nyirabukeye Elevania w’imyaka isaga 97 utagiraga aho kuba. 

Inzu nshya ya Nyirabukeye Elevania Ni nyuma yo kuzenguruka uturere tugize iyi ntara bubakira umugore umwe mu karere ndetse bakabaha imyenda, ibyo kurya ndetse n’ibikoresho byo mu rugo bitandukanye. Nyirabukeye Elevania avuga ko yari yarimuwe aho yari atuye akajyana gucumbikishwa kuko inzu yabagamo yari yarasenyutse inkuta ebyiri asa nurara hanze. Agira ati "Ndashimira abagore bo muri FPR bantekereje bakabona ko nkwiye gusaza neza, ubu niyo napfa mfite aho baza kunkura. Ubundi inzu yari igiye kungwaho banjyana mu baturanyi ngo babe bancumbikiye, none ubu nabonye iyajye bampaye n’ibyo kurya, ibitenge byo kwambara nta kibazo rwose ubu ngiye kongera kuba inkumi, ndabashimiye rero ntakindi narenzaho". 

Nyirabukeye mu nzu yubakiwe Mukangango Donathila ahagarariye urugaga rw’abagore mu karere ka Gicumbi, avuga ko batoranije uriya mukecuru kuko yari ababaye Kandi ko yari abikwiye. Yagize ati "Uriya mukecuru inzu yabagamo yari ifite inkuta zasenyutse ariho aba n’umwuzukuruwe utwite, ukabona birababaje! Twashyizemo ingufu turitanga kugirango umukecuru nk’uriya abone aho kuba. Twanamuhaye n’ibuhumbi ijana byo kuzatangiza umushinga umuteza imbere we n’uriya mwuzukuruwe babana". Guverineri w’intara y’amajyaruguru Gatabazi JMV avuga ko ko aba bagore Ari abo gushimirwa kuko bari gufasha Leta gukemura ibibazo by’abatagira aho kuba. 

Guverineri Gatabazi ashyikiriza amafaranga Nyirabukeye Guverineri Gatabazi yagize ati, "Muri iyi ntara turacyafite abantu benshi bafite amazu yashaje cyangwa se bamwe batanayafite, iki gitekerezo rero cy’abagore bibumbiye mu muryango wa RPF inkotanyi bagize cyo kubakira bagenzi babo bakanabagurira ibikoresho byo mu rugo, barakoze Kandi baritanze, n’abandi bose bajye bareberaho, bagiye bakora nka bo ibyo bibazo byakemuka tutiriwe tugora Leta kuko natwe ubwacu turashoboye".  Aba bagore bamaze kubaka inzu eshanu muri iyi ntara aho buri karere bagiye batoranyamo umugore umwe ukennye kandi utagira inzu bakamwubakira bakanamuha ibikoresho byo munzu, ibyo kurya, imyambaro ndetse n’amafranga ibihumbi ijana byo gutangira umushinga, ibi bikorwa byose bikaba byarabatwaye asaga miriyoni 28. Intara yâAmajyaruguru kuri ubu ifite amazu agera kuri 370 igomba kubaka bitarenze uku kwezi kwa 12 kuko bihaye intego ko bagomba kugera muri 2020 nta muntu nâumwe ugifite ikibazo cyaho kuba.

title: Imyaka 25 irenga nyuma ya Jenoside abafatiwe ku ngufu muri âburendeâ baracyahungabana
article_text:
Imyaka 25 irenga nyuma ya Jenoside abafatiwe ku ngufu muri âburendeâ baracyahungabana  

 Abagore nâabakobwa bafatiwe ku ngufu mu cyitwaga âburendeâ ahahoze segiteri Winteko ubu akaba ari mu karere ka Rusizi, nyuma yâimyaka irenga 25 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda ibaye, baracyahungabanywa nâibikomere bahavanye; bakaba basaba ko bagenerwa ubujyanama bwâihungabana buhoraho, atari ubugaragara gusa mu gihe cyâicyunamo. Izina âburendeâ ryari ryarahawe inzu bakusanyirizagamo abagore nâabakobwa bo mu bwoko bwâAbatutsi mu gihe cya Jenoside, mu gihe babaga bamaze kwica abagabo babo na basaza babo; iyo abicanyi barangizaga akazi babaga biriwemo ko kwica Abatutsi, nimugoroba bajyaga kuri burende bagatoranyamo abagore nâabakobwa bo kujya kurara bafata ku ngufu. 

Aha niho hari ingo zakoreahejwe nka âburendeâ hakurya yâumuhanda hari ibiro byâakagari ka Kabahinda Mukabatsinda Patricia wo mu mudugudu wa Winteko, akagari ka Kabatsinda, mu murenge wa Mururu, ni umwe mu bagore bari muri burende, atangaza ko iryo zina ryahimbwe nâabicaga muri icyo gihe kuko ubusanzwe nta ryari rihari. Gasarabwe Jean Damascene ni umwe mu barokokeye ku Winteko, agira ati, âBurende zari inzu ebyiri zegeranye, ziri hagati yâahitwaga burigade nâahahoze bariyeri imwe yari ku masangano yâimihanda, umwe uturuka Nyakarenzo nâundi uturuka Nyakanyinya, aha niho bafatiraga Abatutsi babaga barimo guhunga berekeza kuri Stade Kamarampaka, bakabajyana kuri bariyeri yo kuri burigade aho Rukeratabaro nâabandi bafatanyaga babaga bari, bakabacira urubanza; abagabo nâabana bâabahungu baricwaga naho abagore nâabakobwa bakajyanwa muri burende.â Mukabatsinda akomeza avuga ko aba bicanyi babaga bafite urutonde rwâabo bari buze gutwara uwo munsi, yagize ati, âbatwicishaga inzara, nijoro bakaza gutwara abo barara basambanya ku ngufu, bahoraga bagaruka.â Si ugufatwa ku ngufu gusa baranicwaga Nyirahitimana Claudine yari kumwe nâabakobwa be bane, bari bakiri bato cyane, avuga ko kuwa 7 Mata 1994 aribwo umugabo we yafashwe, baramukubita cyane ariko ntiyahita apfa, yaje gupfa hashize iminsi. Nkâuko akomeza abivuga, Nyirahitimana nâabana be bane bagiye kwihisha mu bihuru, hashize iminsi umunani barabavumbura babajyana muri burende. Agira ati, âBarazaga bagafata abakobwa nâabagore bakiri bato bakajya kubasambanya ku ngufu; hari umukobwa umwe witwaga Clodetta yari umukobwa usenga cyane, baje kumutwara aranga avuga ko aho gukora ibyaha yahitamo gupfa. Yari kumwe na nyina, bamukubise ubuhiri, bamuteragura inkota, nyina arataka cyane ngo bamurekere umwana; uyu mubyeyi bamukubise ferabeto (fer a beton) bamuteragura inkota, bigeze mu gicuku nibwo yapfuye.â Nyirahitimana akomeza asobanura ubuzima bwo muri burende, ati, âBaraje badutegeka guterura umurambo tuwujyana mu cyobo cyari aho hafi, iryo joro twarakubiswe, hageraga igihe bakaza bakarara badukubita.â

title: Rutonde: Ibuka irasaba Leta ubufasha ku irangizwa ry’imanza za Gacaca

Rutonde: Ibuka irasaba Leta ubufasha ku irangizwa ry’imanza za Gacaca  

 
 Zimwe mu mbogamizi zagaragajwe nâabaturage bâAkagali ka Rutonde mu murenge wa Shyorongi ubwo basuraga urwibutso rwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi rwa Kigali tariki ya 1 Gicurasi 2019, harimo n’imitungo itagaruzwa yâimanza za Gacaca. Abaturage bâAkagari ka Rutonde 321 nibo basuye uru rwibutso bahagarariye bagenzi babo mu byiciro bitandukanye birimo amadini nâamatorero, abikorera ndetse nâurubyiruko, nyuma yo gusura uru rwibutso mu bice byarwo byose, bavuze ko hari amateka mashya bahakuye, ndetse n’isomo kuko ibyo bahaboneye batajyaga babibona mu nzibutso ziherereye mu karere ka Rulindo. Perezida wa Ibuka mu Kagali ka Rutonde, Munyanshoza Dieudonne yashimiye ubuyobozi bwabateguriye iki gikorwa cyo gusura urwibutso ariko agaragaza nâikibazo cyâimanza zaciwe n’Inkiko Gacaca, yagize ati âTurasaba Leta ubufasha hakarangizwa imanza zaciwe na Gacaca, ndetse nâabahamwe nâibyaha bagakurikiranwa cyane cyane abakiri hanze bidegembyaâ. Umuyobozi wâAkagali ka Rutonde, Uhoranimana Jean Jacques Roger yavuze ko basuye urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali kugirango abaturage bigire ku mateka, bashobore guhangana nâingengabitekerezo ndetse nâamacakubiri, bimakaze ubumwe nâurukundo, no gukangurira abakiri bato kwirinda ibishobora kubasubiza mu bihe bigoye igihugu cyanyuzemo.

title: Bamwe mu bashinzwe ibikorwa by’amatora ntibasobanukiwe neza imikoranire nâitangazamakuru
article_text:
Bamwe mu bashinzwe ibikorwa by’amatora ntibasobanukiwe neza imikoranire nâitangazamakuru  

 

Abanyarwanda ku murongo w’itora mu matora rusange y’abadepite (Site ya Mukamira muri Nyabihu) Gukumira abanyamakuru kwa hato na hato ku biro bimwe byâitora bigaragaza ko bamwe mu babishinzwe batasonuriwe bihagije imikoranire nâitangazamakuru, ibi bikagira ingaruka ku kubura kwa bimwe mu byakabaye bigize inkuru. Mu itora rusange ryâabadepite kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 3 Nzeri 2018, hari bamwe mu bayobora ibiro byâitora bavuze ko bitemewe gufata amafoto mu cyumba cyâitora, abandi bakabanza kubaza ababakuriye, bigaragaza ko bo nta makuru ahagije baba bafite ku mikoranire nâitangazamakuru. Nzabonimpa Stanislas wari ukuriye site yâitora ya GS Mukamira muri Nyabihu, yabanje kwanga ko umunyamakuru yinjira mu cyumba cyâitora kureba uko itora rigenda, yagize ati âReka mbanze mbazeâ, hashize akanya agaruka agira ati âMbajije udukuriye mu murenge ambwiye ko byemewe nta kibazo wakwinjiraâ. Nsengumuremyi Edson ushinzwe ibikorwa byâamatora mu karere ka Nyabihu, we yatsembye ahakanira umunyamakuru ko bitemewe gufata amafoto, yagize ati âNtago byemewe gufata amafoto mu cyumba cyâitora, urinjira ukareba warangiza ugasohokaâ. Igika cya kabiri cy’ingingo ya 97 y’Amabwiriza nimero 03/2018 yo ku wa 9/07/2018 ya komisiyo y’igihugu y’amatora ivuga ko "Ntawemerewe gufotora mu bwihugiko cyangwa gukoresha telefone", ariko ntiribuza gufotora mu cyumba cy’itora. Byanashimangiwe kandi tariki 29 Kanama 2018 na Moise Bokasa ushinzwe itumanaho muri iyi komisiyo, abwira abanyamakuru ko umunyamakuru yemerewe gufotora mu cyumba cy’itora ahabujijwe ari mu bwihugiko.

Uwase Saidathi Solange, ni umubyeyi uvuga ko we n’umugabo we barenganye, bakaba bari mu kaga gakomeye baterwa n’uko banze kubeshyera umusirikare mukuru mu ngabo z’u Rwanda, ndetse n’aho bashatse kugaragaza ikibazo cyabo bakaba barasanze uwabarenganyije ashobora kuba abyitambikamo. Nyuma yo kubona uburyo Perezida ashishikajwe no kurenganura abaturage ndetse ntahweme guhana abayobozi bakuru barenganya abaturage, yahisemo kumwandikira Ibaruwa ifunguye abinyujije ku Kinyamakuru Ukwezi, aho yizeye ko Umukuru w’igihugu urangwa no kwanga akarengane azakurikirana ikibazo cye akabarenganura. Ibaruwa ifunguye yanditse murayisanga hasi muri iyi nkuru: Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda, mubyeyi wacu, nejejwe no kubandikira ngirango mungirire impuhwe munkemurire ikibazo kuko kugeza ubu nabuze uwanyumva mu bayobozi bose nakigejejeho bambwira ngo mfitanye ikibazo na RIB. Ikibazo cyanjye giteye gutya: Umuyobozi Mukuru muri RIB ushinzwe kugenza no gukurikirana ibyaha yasabye umugabo wanjye nanjye ubwanjye kwemeza ko umutungo dufite atari uwacu ahubwo ari uw’umu General umwe wo mu gihugu cyacu ubarizwa mu ngabo za RDF, atubwira ko nitutabyemeza ibyacu babifunga natwe bakadufunga. Twagerageje kugaragaza uburyo twageze kubyo dufite dushingiye mbere nambere mu mpanuro muha Abanyarwarwanda ndetse n’amahirwe mwadushyiriyeho yuzuye igihugu cyacu, ariko twatangajwe n’uko koko amavuriro twari dufite yafungiwe umunsi umwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko nk’uko n’ ababikoze ubwabo babyemera. Amasezerano twari dufitanye n’ibigo by’ubwishingizi yahise afungwa hatitawe ku masezerano, amafaranga bari bafitiye ayo mavuriro arafatirwa, business nshya twari dufite zimwa amahirwe y’amasoko ku buryo bw’akarengane, umugabo wanjye arafungwa nk’uko bari babitubwiye, kugeza n’ubu ibyacu byose birafunze. Iyo dusabye ko twarenganurwa, MINISANTE, RSSB n’Urwego rw’ Umuvunyi batubwira ko tubanza tugakemura ikibazo twagiranye na RIB, nyamara iyo twegereye RIB ntibasha kudusobanurira ikibazo gihari, ahubwo kugeza mu kwezi gushize twari tugisabwa kwisubiraho ngo tubeshyere uwo muyobozi. Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika ibi byaduteje igihombo kinini, ndetse natwe twagiteje abandi, amazu atishyurwa yakorerwamo n’ayo mavuriro agiye kumara umwaka afungiraniyemo imiti nayo imaze kwangirika hafi ya yose ishobora no kuzateza ingaruka abaturage begeranye nayo, imanza zitandukanye na ba nyiri ayo mazu badusaba kubishyura tukanakuramo n’ibikoresho tudafite n’aho tubijyana, ndetse tutanemerewe no kubikura mu mazu birimo kuko ababidukopye babifatiriye bitegereje gutezwa cyamunara turamutse tutishyuwe n’ibigo by’ubwishingizi ngo natwe twishyure. Ibyo byiyongeraho cyamunara za banki twafashemo inguzanyo zitandukanye n’ibindi biteye agahinda. Icyifuzo: hashize amezi atandatu twandikiye Minisitiri w’Intebe ntiyadusubije, namwe ubwanyu twarabandikiye ariko dutekereza ko batatumye zibageraho kuko nzi neza ko mwanga akarengane, ndetse uburyo mumaze igihe mugaragaza ko hari abayobozi bamwe bashyigikirana mu makosa bagahemukira abaturage nyamara mwe mukabirwanya, nibyo byanteye imbaraga zo kumva ko kubandikira muri ubu buryo byatuma mumenya ikibazo cyacu. None nifuza ko mwadukurikiranira iki kibazo mwasanga koko ibyo twanze kwemerera uwo mukozi wa RIB ari ukuri cyangwa hari amakosa yaba yarabaye umuryango wanjye ukayagiramo uruhare muzaduhane mwihanukiriye, ntimuzigere muduha imbabazi, ariko nimusanga natwe dufite ukuri ibihombo twateje abaturega ubu bizishyurwe nuwabyangije kuko sindenganya inzego z’igihugu bahagarariye kuko nizera ntashidikanya ko atari zo zabatumye, nkaba nifuza ko mwaturenganura ,abadukopye ibikoresho, abakozi bakorera company zacu zitandukanye, ba nyir’amazu bakarenganurwa, ndetse n’ubwo nizeye ubutabera bw’igihugu cyacu mukaba mwagira uruhare mu gukurikirana ubutabera umugabo wanjye arimo guhabwa, ibyinshi ntavugiye aha nabisobanura kurushaho mumpaye umwanya dore ko bankumiriye kenshi kubageraho ndetse n’umugabo wanjye aho afungiye yasabye inzego zitandukanye ko zamwumva akazisobanurira akarengane ke abura uwamwegera, kandi amakuru atandukanye yatanga ashobora kugira akamaro ku nzego zitandukanye z’igihugu. Nasoza mbahamiriza ko nishimira imikorere y’inzego z’igihugu cyacu na RIB ubwayo nk’u Rwanda rushishikajwe no guhashya ibyaha, ariko nkumva ko umukozi runaka ashobora gukora amakosa ku giti cye yitwaje urwego ahagarariye, kandi nzi neza ntashidikanya ko ibyo mubimenye mudashobora kubyihanganira. Ndabashimiye uburyo mubyumvise mubyeyi w’Abanyarwanda! Uwase Saidathi Solange

title: Perezida Kagame na Museveni bagiye kongera guhurira mu nama yiga ku mubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda
article_text:
Perezida Kagame na Museveni bagiye kongera guhurira mu nama yiga ku mubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda

 
Abakuru b’ibihugu birimo u Rwanda, Uganda, Repubulika ya Demukarasi ya Congo na Angola bagiye kongera guhurira I Luanda muri Angola mu nama yiga ku mutekano mu karere ibi ibihugu biherereyemo by’umwihariko ikibazo cy’umubano utifashe neza hagati y’ u Rwanda na Uganda.
 Abakuru b’ibihugu birimo u Rwanda, Uganda, Repubulika ya Demukarasi ya Congo na Angola bagiye kongera guhurira I Luanda muri Angola mu nama yiga ku mutekano mu karere ibi ibihugu biherereyemo by’umwihariko ikibazo cy’umubano utifashe neza hagati y’ u Rwanda na Uganda. Iyo nama izaba ejo ku Cyumweru tariki 2 Gashyantare 2020 nk’uko byatangajwe n’umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga ushinzwe ubutwererane muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba amb. Olivier Nduhungirehe. Yagize ati “Inama ya 3 y’ibihugu bine ku mubano wa Uganda n’u Rwanda izabera I Luanda ku Cyumweru tariki 2 Gashyantare 2020 bigizwemo uruhare na Perezida wa Angola João Lourenço na Perezida Félix Antoine Tshisekedi wa DRC”. Mu kwezi kwa 7 umwaka ushize nibwo abakuru b’ibihugu Perezida Paul Kagame w’ u Rwanda na Yoweli Museveni wa Uganda bahuriye I Luanda muri Angola bashyira umukono ku masezerano agamije kugarura umwuka mwiza hagati y’ibihugu byombi. Ayo masezerano yari ahagarikiwe na Perezida Tshisekedi, na Perezida João Lourenço. Nyuma y’uko hasinywe aya masezerano I Kigali habereye inama y’intumwa z’u Rwanda n’iza Uganda igamije kwiga kwishyirwamubikorwa ryayo, ikurikiyeho ibera muri Uganda ariko birangira hari ibyo impande zombi zitumvikanaho u Rwanda rutangaza ko iki kibazo kigiye gusubizwa abakuru b’ibihugu bari barashyizeho komisiyo yo kwiga ku ishyurwa mu bikorwa by’aya masezerano. Uganda iherutse kurekura abanyarwanda 9 yari ifunze binyuranyije n’amategeko. Ni igikorwa u Rwanda rwashimye ariko ruvuga ko intambwe isigaye ari ndende kuko ngo Abanyarwanda Uganda ifunze muri ubwo buryo barenga 100.

title: Amarenga yo gusubira muri gereza kuri Victoire Ingabire wemeye ko FDU Inkingi iri mu mutwe wa P5
article_text:
Amarenga yo gusubira muri gereza kuri Victoire Ingabire wemeye ko FDU Inkingi iri mu mutwe wa P5

 
Victoire Umuhoza wari umaze igihe kirekire ari umuyobozi w’ishyaka rya FDU Inkingi ariko akaba aherutse kurivamo agashinga irindi, yiyemereye ko iri shyaka riri mu mutwe witwa P5 uhuriwemo n’amashyaka atanu arwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda arimo n’irya RNC rya Kayumba Nyamwasa wahungiye muri Africa y’epfo. Ni mu gihe kandi hari ibimenyetso byinshi bica amarenga ko Ingabire Victoire ashobora gusubira muri gereza kubera ibyaha bikomeye arimo gukurikiranwaho.
 Victoire Umuhoza wari umaze igihe kirekire ari umuyobozi w’ishyaka rya FDU Inkingi ariko akaba aherutse kurivamo agashinga irindi, yiyemereye ko iri shyaka riri mu mutwe witwa P5 uhuriwemo n’amashyaka atanu arwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda arimo n’irya RNC rya Kayumba Nyamwasa wahungiye muri Africa y’epfo. Ni mu gihe kandi hari ibimenyetso byinshi bica amarenga ko Ingabire Victoire ashobora gusubira muri gereza kubera ibyaha bikomeye arimo gukurikiranwaho. Hashize iminsi Ingabire Victoire Umuhoza yitaba Urwego rw’Ubugenzacyaha RIB kugirango abazwe ibyaha bitandukanye akurikiranyweho. Ubuheruka ikinyamakuru cyamenye ni kuwa Gatatu tariki 13 Ugushyingo 2019, icyo gihe umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza akaba yarabwiye ikinyamakuru Ukwezi ko n’ubwo ibikubiye mu iperereza batabitangaza, ibyaha Victoire Ingabire akurikiranyweho birimo icyo kurema umutwe witwaje intwaro, ubwicanyi, ubwinjiracyaha mu bwicanyi, ubujura n’ibindi. RIB kandi yari imaze iminsi itangaje ko Ingabire Victoire yahamagajwe kugirango abazwe ku bijyanye n’aho ahuriye n’igitero cyagabwe mu karere ka Musanze mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi gushize k’Ukwakira, kigahitana abantu 14, abandi 18 bagakomereka. Ingabire Victoire nawe yemereye ikinyamakuru Ukwezi ko amaze igihe yitaba uru rwego ariko avuga ko ibyaha akurikiranyweho atabyemera ndetse ko adashobora gukora Politiki yica abaturage. Hashize igihe havugwa iby’ubufatanye bw’amashyaka arwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda yibumbiye mu mutwe witwa P5 arimo RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa, n’ishyaka FDU Inkingi rikaba ribarizwamo. Ubwo bufatanye mu bikorwa bihungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda ninabwo bivugwa ko bwagize uruhare mu gitero cyishe abaturage i Musanze. Ingabire Victoire yemeye ko FDU Inkingi iri muri P5 ariko abajijwe byinshi n’umunyamakuru ku bikorwa by’uyu mutwe, ashimangira ko byabazwa umuvugizi wa P5. Yagize ati: "Kuba FDU iri muri P5 ntabwo nigeze mbihakana, FDU iri muri P5... Ntabwo ndi umuvugizi wa P5 bityo ndagirango ibyo bibazo bya P5, ibya RNC, ibya Sankara wabibaza abo bireba." Uretse kuba Ingabire Victoire arimo gukurikiranwa n’Ubugenzacyaha, na Perezida wa Repubulika ubwo yakiraga indahiro z’abayobozi bashya kuri uyu wa Kane, n’ubwo atavuze amazina yaciye amarenga y’uko we (Ingabire) n’abandi bashaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda, bagiye gushyirirwaho imbaraga zidasanzwe mu kurinda umutekano w’igihugu. Perezida Kagame ati: "Hari bamwe nshaka kuburira bihisha inyuma y’ibintu bitandukanye, bakihisha inyuma ya Politiki, Demukarasi, Ubwisanzure kandi natwe ibyo ari inshingano zacu za mbere kumenya ko hari demukarasi n’ubwisanzure... Hanyuma abihisha inyuma y’ibyo ugasanga barashyigikirwa n’abantu bari hanze, bakaryoherwa... Muraza kutubona... Ntushobora kuba uri hano mu mahoro n’umutekano twishyuye imyaka myinshi igiciro cy’amaraso ngo nurangiza uduhungabanye... Tuzagushyira aho ukwiye kuba uri.... Abantu bagize uruhare mu mahano ya Jenoside, bagakomeza kuzana izo politiki n’ingengabitekerezo, bakajya muri gereza hanyuma bakavamo ku bw’imbabazi hanyuma bagatangira kongera gukina iyo mikino nanone... Tuzagushyira aho wagakwiye kuba ubarizwa hanyuma abo basakuza kuri ibyo tuzareba icyo bazakora" Si ubwa mbere Ingabire Victoire aburiwe ko natitonda azisanga yasubiye muri gereza kuko no mu mpera z’umwaka ushize yaburiwe na Perezida Paul Kagame nyuma y’igihe gito ahawe imbabazi. Gusa uyu mugore avuga ko adafite ubwoba kuko yiteguye kuba yakongera gufungwa. REBA VIDEO UKO INGABIRE VICTOIRE ABIVUGA HANO:

title: Abafite ubumuga barasaba kugira umusenateri ubahagarariye
article_text:
Abafite ubumuga barasaba kugira umusenateri ubahagarariye

 
Abanyarwanda bafite ubumuga bashima intambwe imaze guterwa na Leta y’ u Rwanda mu kubahiriza uburenganzira bwabo, gusa bavuga ko hari ibindi bigikeneye gushyirwamo imbaraga nko kugira umusenateri ubahagarariye no kugira Minisitiri ubahagarariye.
 Abanyarwanda bafite ubumuga bashima intambwe imaze guterwa na Leta y’ u Rwanda mu kubahiriza uburenganzira bwabo, gusa bavuga ko hari ibindi bigikeneye gushyirwamo imbaraga nko kugira umusenateri ubahagarariye no kugira Minisitiri ubahagarariye. Perezida w’ inama y’ igihugu y’ abafite ubumuga Niyomugabo Romalis yabitangarije mu karere ka Nyamagabe kuri uyu wa 03 Ukuboza 2019, ahizihirijwe umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ abafite ubumuga. Yagize ati "Ubu turahagarariwe mu nteko, tukaba dufite n’ inama y’ igihugu y’ abantu bafite ubumuga, ariko twigiye imbere tukajya muri Sena, tukajya muri guverinoma, n’ ahandi henshi hafatirwa ibyemezo, ijwi ryacu riba ryigiye imbere kandi n’ ubuvugizi buba bwiyongereye, ibyo rero twifuza ko byagera n’ ahandi. Aho twamaze kugera niyo wareba mu Nteko Ishinga amategeko y’ Umuryango wa Afurika y’ iburasirazuba EALA naho usanga ijwi ry’ abafite ubumuga riri hejuru kubera ko dufitemo wa muntu uduhagarariye". Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’ ubutegetsi bw’ igihugu ushinzwe Imibereho y’ Abaturage, Nyirarukundo Ingatienne avuga ko hari ibigenda bihinduka mu mibereho y’ abafite ubumuga birimo kuba batakigaragara ku muhanda basabiriza ari benshi. Nyirarukundo yavuze ko inzu zitorohereza abafite ubumuga zikigaragara gusa ngo inyinshi ni izubatswe kera ati " Ntabwo twazikubita hasi zose ariko inzu zigenda zubakwa zishyirwamo inzira z’ abafite ubumuga. Byaratangiye cyane cyane ku zikenerwa cyane nk’ inzu ku Leta n’ amavuriro". Yakanguriye abafite ubumuga gufata iya mbere mu gusaba ko uburenganzira bwabo bwubahirizwa ati "Nimwebwe ba mbere mugomba guhaguruka mugaharanira uburenganzira bwanyu kuko uburenganzira buraharanirwa. Umuntu ukwimye uburenganzira bwawe nk’ umuntu ufite ubumuga ugomba kumubwira ngo simfite urugingo ariko mfite igihugu. Mugomba kubivuga uguhaye serivise mbi akabibazwa kandi akabihanirwa". 

Nyirarukundo Ingatienne Nyirarukundo yavuze ko muri gahunda ya guverinoma y’ imyaka 7 irimo gushyirwa mu bikorwa kuva muri 2017- 2024, abafite ubumuga naho batekerejweho. Yatanze urugero kuri gahunda y’ uburezi budaheza asaba ababyeyi ko bagomba gukora ibishoboka byose umwana babyaye afite ubumuga akajyanwa ku ishuri, mwarimu akaba ariwe ugaragaza ko iryo shuri ridafite ubushobozi bwo kwigisha uwo mwana. Mu bindi harimo korohereza abafite ubumuga kubona ubwisungane mu kwivuza no kubona insimburangingo. Ati "Turaharanira kugira ngo bigerweho kandi ibiganiro biragenda neza". Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo y’ igihugu y’ uburenganzira bwa muntu Nirere Madeline yavuze ko kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ abafite ubumuga ari ishema ku Rwanda. Ati "Kwizihiza uyu munsi ni ishema ku gihugu cyacu. Itegeko nshinga rivuga ko abanyarwanda bose bavuka bangana ko kubavangura ari icyaha gihanwa n’ amategeko." Yashimye abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu avuga ko kimwe n’ abandi banyarwanda bose bafite ubumuga guverinoma y’ u Rwanda izakomeza guharanira ko bagira imibereho myiza binyuze mu ngamba Leta igenda ifata zirimo no gushyiraho inzego zihagarariye abafite ubumuga. Ati " Izo ngamba zose ntidushidikanya ko zahinduye imibereho y’ abafite ubumuga. Abafite ubumuga barashoboye kuko aba afite ubumuga ku rugingo rumwe ariko ahandi ingingo zikora". Mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’ abafite ubumuga, bamwe muri bo bahawe insimburangingo zigizwe n’ amagare y’ abafite ubumuga n’ inkoni zera zifasha abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona bakabasha kugenda. Umuyobozi w’ ihuriro ry’ abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona Dr Kanimba Donatille asaba ko Leta y’ u Rwanda yashyira umukono ku masezerano ya Marrakesh atanga uburenganzira bwo gusemura ibihangano bigashyirwa mu majwi no mu nyandiko y’ abatabona izwi nka ’Braille’. Mu Rwanda habarurwa abantu barenga ibihumbi 400 bafite ubumuga butandukanye, biganjemo abafite ubumuga bw’ ingingo. 

Niyomugabo Romalis Perezida wa NCPD

title: Amb. Uwihanganye yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Singapore
article_text:
Amb. Uwihanganye yatanze impapuro zimwemerera guhagararira u Rwanda muri Singapore 

 
Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu uherutse kugirirwa ikizere na Perezida w’ u Rwanda Paul Kagame akamugira ambasaderi yashyikirije Perezida wa Singapore impapuro zimwemerera u Rwanda muri iki gihugu.
 Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu uherutse kugirirwa ikizere na Perezida w’ u Rwanda Paul Kagame akamugira ambasaderi yashyikirije Perezida wa Singapore impapuro zimwemerera u Rwanda muri iki gihugu. Mu kwezi kwa 7 uyu mwaka nibwo Perezida Kagame yakoze impinduka muri guverinoma y’ u Rwanda Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu wari Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’ ibikorwaremezo ahindurirwa imirimo agirwa ambasaderi muri Singapore. Uyu munyapolitiki yamamaye nka MC Henri Jado ubwo yakoraga kuri Radio Salus. Mu butumwa yashyize kuri Twitter kuri uyu wa 31 Ukwakira 2019 yavuze ko anejejwe no kuba yashyikirije Perezida wa Singapore Halimah YACOB impapuro zimwemerera kuba ambasaderi w’ u Rwanda muri Singapore. 
 Undi washyikirije Perezida Halimah YACOB impapuro zo guhagararira igihugu cye muri Singapore ni Umushinwa Lui Tuck Yew. Ambasaderi Uwihanganye aherutse kuvuga ko yatunguwe n’ ibyo Singapore imaze kugeraho mu myaka 50 ishize gusa ngo afite ikizere ko u Rwanda nirukomeza umuvuduko ruriho narwo ruzabigeraho. Yagize ati "Aho nicaye mu biro byanjye bishya bya Ambasade y’ u Rwanda muri Singapore, ndabasha kureba ubwiza n’iterambere by’iki gihugu. Ndibaza ukuntu babigezeho mu myaka 50 gusa. Nta butunzi kamere igihugu gifite, ubugari bwacyo bungana na Kigali, rero u Rwanda nirukomeza icyerekezo rurimo ndetse no gukora cyane, u Rwanda ruzabigeraho, mureke dukore” Amafoto

title: Ngoma: Abakozi 6 b’ akarere basezeye akazi
article_text:
Ngoma: Abakozi 6 b’ akarere basezeye akazi  

 
Abakozi 6 b’ akarere ka Ngoma mu Ntara y’ Iburasirazuba barimo abayobozi bane bakora ku karere banditse basaba guhagarika akazi bavuga ko babitewe n’ impamvu zabo bwite.
 Abakozi 6 b’ akarere ka Ngoma mu Ntara y’ Iburasirazuba barimo abayobozi bane bakora ku karere banditse basaba guhagarika akazi bavuga ko babitewe n’ impamvu zabo bwite. Kuri uyu wa 30 Ukwakira 2019 nibwo akarere ka Ngoma kakiriye amabaruwa y’ aba bayobozi n’ abakozi 6. Barimo Jean d’Amour Rubwiriza, wari Director of Business Development and Employment (BDE), Judith Murekatete, Umuyobozi ushinzwe uburezi (DDE). Jean Bosco Sibomana wari umukozi ushinzwe itumanaho no kumenyekanisha akarere , Public Relations, Media and Communications Officer, na Uyiringiye Phenias wari umujyanama wa Komite Nyobozi. Abandi basezeye ni Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’ Umurenge wa Rukumberi Arcade Muragijemungu, n’ Umunyamabanga Nshibwabikorwa w’ Akagari ka Musya mu murenge wa Rurenge Christine Uwingeneye. Umuyobozi w’ Akarere wungirije ushinzwe iterambere ry’ ubukungu Cyriaque Nyiridandi Mapambano yavuze ko kuba umukozi wa Leta yasezera akazi ari ibintu bisanzwe. Ati “Hari igihe avuga ko yabonye akazi ahandi kandi biremewe ko ava ku kazi akajya ku kandi.” Mampambano avuga ko umukozi ashobora kubona akazi kamunaniye agasezera akabyita impamvu ze bwite. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Karenge mu karere ka Rwamagana Bizumuremyi Pierre Celestin na we yaraye ashyikirije akarere ibaruwa asezera ku kazi.

title: Dr Ngirente ahagarariye u Rwanda mu muhango wo gusezera kuri Mugabe
article_text:
Dr Ngirente ahagarariye u Rwanda mu muhango wo gusezera kuri Mugabe 

 
Abaperezida n’ abanyacyubahiro batandukanye batangiye kugera I Harare muri Zimbabwe mu muhango wo kunamira Robert Mugabe wahoze ari Perezida w’ iki gihugu uherutse gupfa.
 Abaperezida n’ abanyacyubahiro batandukanye batangiye kugera I Harare muri Zimbabwe mu muhango wo kunamira Robert Mugabe wahoze ari Perezida w’ iki gihugu uherutse gupfa. Mu baperezida barenga 10 bategerejwe muri uyu muhango wo gusezera kuri Robert Mugabe bamwe bafata nk’ intwari y’ Afurika, ntabwo harimo Perezida w’ u Rwanda Paul Kagame. Robert Mugabe yapfuye tariki 6 Nzeri 2019, abaperezida batandukanye barimo Kenyatta wa Kenya, na Magufuli wa Tanzania banyujije ubutumwa ku rubuga rwa Twitter yagaragaza ko Afurika ibuze umuntu ukomeye. U Rwanda rurahagararirwa na Minisitiri w’ Intebe Mu butumwa , Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’ ububanyi n’ amahanga ushinzwe Afurika y’ Iburasirazuba yashyize kuri Twitter yavuze ko u Rwanda ruhagararirwa na Minisitiri w’ Intebe Edouard Ngirente mu muhango wo gusezera bwa nyuma kuri Mugabe. Yagize ati “Uyu munsi ndaba ndi I Harare mu kiriyo cya Robert Mugabe wahoze ari Perezida wa Zimbabwe watabarutse tariki 6 Nzeri 2019. Ndaherekeza nyakubahwa Minisitiri w’ Intebe Edouard Ngirente uhagararira guverinoma y’ u Rwanda muri uyu muhango”. 

Abo mu muryango wa Robert Mugabe Abakuru b’ ibihugu bategerejwe muri Zimbabwe mu muhango wo gusezera kuri Robert Mugabe harimo Nana Akufo Addo wa Ghana, Edgar Lungu wa Zambia, King Letsie wa Lesotho, Peter Mutharika wa Malawi, Idriss Deby wa Tchad, Masisi wa Botswana, Xi Jiping w’ u Bushinwa, Filipe Nyusi wa Mozambique, Minisitiri w’ Intebe w’ u Buhinde Narendra Modi, Felix Tshisekedi wa RDC n’ uwo yasimbuye Joseph Kabila, Denis Sassou Nguesso wa Congo Brazaville, Abandi barimo Magufuli wa Tanzania n’ abo yasimbuye Kikwete na Mkapa, Paul Biya wa Cameroun, Salva Kiir wa Sudan y’ Epfo, Alexandre Lukashenko, Uhuru Kenyatta wa Kenya, Alassane Ouattra wa Cote d’ Ivoire, Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda, Halimah Jacob wa Singapore, Raul Castro wahoze ari Perezida wa Cuba, George Weah wa Liberia na Ellen Johnson Serlef yasimbuye. Umurambo wa Robert Mugabe wageze muri Zimbabwe ku wa Gatatu ukuwe muri Singapore aho yapfiriye. Ku wa Kane umuryango we watangaje ko azashyingurwa ku ivuko ariko kuri uyu wa Gatanu umuvugizi w’ umuryango Leo Mugabe yisubuyeho avuga ko Robert Mugabe azashyingurwa mu irimbi ry’ intwari. Leo Mugabe yavuze ko abahagarariye umuryango wa Mugabe na guverinoma basuye aho Mugabe azashyingurwa bagasanga kuhategura bizatwara iminsi 30.

title: Ikarita y’ itora yavanweho, ikifuzo cya Depite Habineza cyatewe utwatsi
article_text:
Ikarita y’ itora yavanweho, ikifuzo cya Depite Habineza cyatewe utwatsi 

 
Abagize Inteko ishinga amategeko y’ u Rwanda bemeje ko ikarita y’ itora ikurwaho igasimburwa n’ irangamuntu y’ ikoranabuhanga, gusa ingingo isaba umukandida wigenga gusinyirwa n’ abantu 12 muri buri karere yo yagunyeho.
 Abagize Inteko ishinga amategeko y’ u Rwanda bemeje ko ikarita y’ itora ikurwaho igasimburwa n’ irangamuntu y’ ikoranabuhanga, gusa ingingo isaba umukandida wigenga gusinyirwa n’ abantu 12 muri buri karere yo yagunyeho. Kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 22 Nyakanga 2019, nibwo abadepite batoye itegeko ngenga rigenga amatora, ryavanyweno IKARITA y’ITORA kuko INDANGAMUNTU ikoze mu ikoranabuhanga rishobora gutuma hamenyekana ko utora cyangwa utorwa ari kuri lisiti y’itora bityo iyo karita ikaba itagikenewe. Mu zindi ngingo zavuguruwe mu itegeko ngenga rigenga amatora mu Rwanda harimo izijyanye n’imigendekere y’amatora ku bijyanye n’itora ry’Abajyanama b’Umujyi wa Kigali hakurikijwe amavugururwa ateganijwe. Izindi ngingo abadepite bifuje ko zavugururwa ariko ntibikunde, harimo ijyanye n’abantu basabwa ku mukandida ushaka kwiyamamariza kuba Perezida wa Repubulika cyangwa umudepite, aho umukandida wigenga asabwa abantu 600 mu gihugu bamusinyiye, naho umutwe wa politike wo ugasabwa abantu 200 gusa. Depite Frank Habineza yagize ati “Abakandida bigenga basabwa abantu 12 muri buri karere, naho umutwe wa Politike wo ugasabwa abantu 200 mu gihugu cyose, ko umutwe wa politike ariwo ukomeye kurusha umukandida wigenga kubera iki umukandida wigenga udafite ubushobozi nk’umwute wa Politike bamusaba abantu 600 mu gihugu?, twumva hari ikintu cyakagombye guhinduka kugira ngo abo bantu nabo bagire amahirwe yo kwiyamamaza”. Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu Prof Shyaka Anastase wari witabiriye inteko rusange, yavuze ko bitakumvikana uburyo umuntu ushaka guhagararira abantu miliyoni 12 mu gihugu, yabura abantu 600. Yavuze ko uramutse wabuze abantu 12 kandi ushaka guhagararira miliyoni 12, cyaba ari ikibazo. Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda nta mudepite cyangwa Perezida wa Repubulika uratorwa atavuye mu ishyaka. Abakandida bigenga bariyamamaza ariko ntawe uratsinda amatora.

title: Huye: Abakora muri VUP ntibishimiye gukatwa kugahato amafaranga ya Ejo Heza
article_text:
Huye: Abakora muri VUP ntibishimiye gukatwa kugahato amafaranga ya Ejo Heza

 
Abakora akazi ka VUP ubusanzwe gahabwa abatishoboye kugira ngo bakore biteze imbere barinubira kuba muri iyi minsi bari kujya guhembwa bagategekwa gutanga amafaranga 1250 mu bwizigamire bw’igihe kirere bwiswe Ejo Heza.
 Abakora akazi ka VUP ubusanzwe gahabwa abatishoboye kugira ngo bakore biteze imbere barinubira kuba muri iyi minsi bari kujya guhembwa bagategekwa gutanga amafaranga 1250 mu bwizigamire bw’igihe kirere bwiswe Ejo Heza. Mu kwezi kwa 12 umwaka wa 2018 mu mwiherero w’abayobozi bakuru b’u Rwanda nibwo Perezida Kagame yatangije ubu bwizigame bw’igihe kirere bwiswe Ejo Heza. Icyo bugamije ni ukugira ngo Abanyarwanda bage bagira amasaziro meza. Aba baturage bo mu murenge wa Mukura mu karere ka Huye bavuga ko batanze kwizigamira ahubwo ngo ikibazo bafite ni uko nta mibereho myiza bafite uyu munsi. Umwe mu bakora muri VUP bari gutegekwa gutanga aya mafaranga ku gahato yabwiye UKWEZI ko amaze imyaka 6 mu bukode kuko inzu ye yasenywe n’ibiza akabura ubushobozi bwo kubaka indi. Agira ati “Wateganyiriza umuryango utarigeze kubaho neza noneho bigashoboka koko, njyewe mbona Ejo Heza ari uko umuntu bamugirira neza agihumeka, noneho n’uwo murambo bakazawugirira neza n’Imana yazabahemba”. Uyu mukecuru asaba Leta kumwubakira inzu yo kubamo akava mu bukode bityo akabona ubuzima bwiza uyu munsi akabona uko ateganyiriza Ejo Heza kuko ngo amafaranga abona uyu munsi ntabwo aba amuhagije kuko akuramo ayo kwishyura ubukode bw’inzu abamo. Uyu mukecuru w’imyaka irenga 60 ibyo avuga anabishingira ku kuba umuntu utanze ubwizigame muri Ejo Heza iyo apfuye umuryango we uhabwa miliyoni, ukanahabwa ibihumbi 250 byo gushyingura, ibi ngo kuri we ni ukugoboka uwapfuye kandi umuntu agomba kubaho neza akiri muzima. Ikibazo aba bakozi ba VUP bahurizaho kuri aya mafaranga ngo ni uko kuri bo kuyatanga ari itegeko kuko ngo utayatanze bamwirukana. Umwe mu bagore twaganiriye yagize ati “Ejo Heza baratubwiye ngo nimfa umwana wanjye bazamuha isanduka bampambe, utayigiyemo barabirukana guhera ejobundi bamye babirukana n’ejo biriwe babicarije kuruhande uwabashije kurayatanga nyine yarakoze utarayatanze baramwirukanye”. Aba bakozi bavuga ko icyo babona cyaba cyiza ari uko batakomeza gutegekwa kwishyura Ejo Heza, umuntu akajya ayatanga bijyanye n’ubushobozi bwe. Icyo abenshi bahurizaho ni ukuba kuri iyi nshuro kubakata amafaranga 1250 ya Ejo Heza ku mibyizi icumi bari bahembwe byarabagoye cyane kuko bamaze iminsi badafite ibyo kurya bihagije kubera icyorezo cya covid-19. 
 Ubu bari guhembwa ariko ngo baherukaga guhembwa mbere y’uko iki cyorezo kigera mu Rwanda kandi ngo ntabwo bigeze bahabwa ubufasha ubwo aribwo bwose muri iki gihe cya coronavirus. Covid-19 yageze mu Rwanda tariki 14 Werurwe 2020. Bavuga ko bari bakeneye ko Leta yabaguriza kugira ngo babone amafaranga yo kurya ariko nabyo ngo ntabwo byakozwe bituma bafata amadeni menshi arinabyo byabaye intandaro yo kubangamirwa bikomeye no gukatwa kugahato Ejo Heza y’ amafaranga 1250. Umunyamanga Nshingwabikorwa w’ Umurenge wa Mukura Ngabo Fidèle avuga ko kujya muri Ejo Heza ari amahitamo y’umuntu atari itegeko ngo niba hari abari gusabwa gutanga ubwizigame ku gahato byaba ari amakosa. Yagize ati “Gahunda ya Ejo Heza ntabwo ari itegeko ni gahunda ijyamo umuntu ubishatse kuko birumvikana ni amafaranga ye aba agomba kwizigama. Sinzi wenda niba hari uwaba yarirukanywe, icyo ntabwo nkizi, nta n’ufite uburenganzira bwo kwirukana abantu muri VUP, ni ubwa mbere mbyumvise ubwo nanjye ndakurikirana ndebe” Yongeyeho ati “Kwirukana muri VUP utatanze ubwizigame muri Ejo Heza biramutse bikorwa byaba ataribyo. Icyo dukora twebwe ni ugushishikariza abaturage kwizigamira kuko byanze bikunze kugira ngo uzagire ejo heza ugomba kugira icyo wigomwa uyu munsi”. Ngabo avuga ko nk’ubuyobozi bagiye gukomeza ubukangurambaga kugira abaturage basobanukirwe neza Ejo Heza gusa ngo muri iyi minsi biragoye kuko guhuriza abantu benshi hamwe bitemewe kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus. Uyu muyobozi avuga ko abaturage batangaje ko aya mafaranga umuntu ayahabwa ari uko yapfuye bafite kuri Ejo Heza amakuru atuzuye. Ati “Hari impamvu zigera muri eshatu zituma uwatanze amafaranga muri Ejo Heza agobokwa nayo. Zirimo igihe ukeneye amafaranga y’ishuri yo kurihira umwana wawe, igihe ukeneye kubaka inzu, igihe ugeze mu zabukuru utakibasha gukora nabwo hari amafaranga ugenerwa buri kwezi noneho n’iyo upfuye hari amafaranga umuryango wawe uhabwa iyo wizigamiye muri Ejo Heza”.

title: Batatu barimo umugabo wa Rose Mary Museminali batawe muri yombi
article_text:
Batatu barimo umugabo wa Rose Mary Museminali batawe muri yombi

 
Abanyarwanda batatu barimo umugabo wa Rose Mary Museminali, John Museminali batawe muri yombi bakekwaho gushaka gutorokesha Col.Tom Byabagamba wahoze mu barinda Perezida wa Repubulika.
 Abanyarwanda batatu barimo umugabo wa Rose Mary Museminali, John Museminali batawe muri yombi bakekwaho gushaka gutorokesha Col.Tom Byabagamba wahoze mu barinda Perezida wa Repubulika. Ni mu gihe mu byumweru bibiri bishize, igisirikare cy’u Rwanda cyatangaje ko Byabagamba akurikiranyweho ibyaha bishya birimo ruswa no gushaka gutoroka gereza. Umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza yemereye bimwe mu binyamakuru bikorera mu Rwanda ko aba bagabo batatu bafunze. Muri aba bagabo batatu bafashwe bakekwaho gushaka gutorokesha Tom Byabagamba uzwi ni umugabo w’umuvandimwe w’umugore we (musanzire we). Uwo ni John Museminali, umucuruzi akaba n’umugabo wa Rose Mary Museminali uva inda imwe na Mary Baine umugore wa Tom Byabagamba. Rose Mary Museminali yahoze ari Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Rwanda (2005 -2009), Mary Baine we yabaye umukuru w’ikigo cy’u Rwanda gishinzwe imisoro n’amahoro (2006 - 2011). Mu mpera za 2019, Col Byabagamba na muramu we Jenerali Frank Rusagara bakatiwe n’urukiko rw’ubujurire gufungwa imyaka 15 no kwamburwa impeta za gisirikare. Col Byabagamba yari akurikiranyweho gushaka kugirira nabi umukuru w’igihugu no gusuzugura ibendera ry’igihugu. Col. Byabagamba wahoze akuriye abashinzwe umutekano wa Perezida Paul Kagame BBC yatangaje ko yaba afungiye mu kigo cya gisirikare i Kanombe gusa aya makuru nta rwego rwa Leta rurayemeza.

title: IWAWA bati ‘Dukubitwa inkoni ziruta imvura y’ amahindu, bamwe bahakura ubumuga’
article_text:
IWAWA bati ‘Dukubitwa inkoni ziruta imvura y’ amahindu, bamwe bahakura ubumuga’ 

 
Abanyeshuri bagororerwa ku kirwa cya Iwawa kijyanwaho abakuwe mu buzererezi bavuga ko barembejwe n’ inkoni bakubitwa n’ abanyeshuri bagenzi babo ku itegeko ry’ abayobozi bigatuma bamwe muri bo bahakura ubumuga burimo ubudakira. Abahamugariye bagirwa inama yo kugana inkiko.
 Abanyeshuri bagororerwa ku kirwa cya Iwawa kijyanwaho abakuwe mu buzererezi bavuga ko barembejwe n’ inkoni bakubitwa n’ abanyeshuri bagenzi babo ku itegeko ry’ abayobozi bigatuma bamwe muri bo bahakura ubumuga burimo ubudakira. Abahamugariye bagirwa inama yo kugana inkiko. Mbuto Meshake ukomoka mu karere ka Rubavu wajyanywe Iwawa mu kwezi kwa 5/2018 afite ubumuga abaganga bamubwiye ko butazakira. Avuga ko inkoni yakubitiwe IWAWA arizo zamuteye ubwo bumuga. Gusa raporo ya muganga yemeza ko ubumuga Mbuto afite yabukuye IWAWA nubwo itemeza ko yabutewe n’ inkoni yakubitiweyo. Umwe mu bavuye Iwawa yabwiye Radio one ati “Inkoni zibayo, utarajyayo sinamwifuriza kujyayo”. Bavuga ko habayo umuyobozi umeze nk’ umusirikare witwa RCM ubategeka kujya mu Kivu bakiyinika, bakazamukamo bakuruza inda bakubitwa. Iki kibazo abanyeshuri bagororerwa Iwawa baherutse kukigeza ku Munyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’ Ubutegetsi bw’ Igihugu ushinzwe imibereho myiza y’ abaturage, Nyirarukundo Ignatienne ubwo yabasuraga mu mpera z’ icyumweru gishize. Umwe muri abo banyeshuri yagize ati “Nyakubahwa Minisitiri, ubu undeba mpagaze hano n’ ikibando ntabwo ari ubusaza, ahangaha haba ikintu kitwa inkoni nyinshi cyane ziruta imvura y’ amahindu, ubu twicaye aha ngaha harimo abanyeshuri benshi bafite ibisare by’ inkoni. Tukiza dushyika hariya kuri marine tuhasanga abantu bitwango RP bahagarariwe na bamwe mu bayobozi bagakubita abantu nta kintu na kimwe bitayeho.”. Yakomeje agira ati “Badukubita kuva marine,kugera mu rya kabiri, kuva mu rya kabiri kugera hano twicaye”. Nyirarukundo yibajije niba umuntu yakubita abantu 3000, uyu munyeshuri ahita amurondorera urutonde rw’ abanyeshuri bafite sima bashyizweho no kwa mugana kubera kuvunagurwa n’ izo nkoni. Ati “Abakubiswe hano banahaguruka bakaza bafite ibisima, abandi bari I Gisenyi(ku bitaro)”. Umuyobozi w’ Ikigo cy’ igihugu cy’ igororamuco Bosenibamwe Aimé asa n’ ukingira ikibaba abayobozi bategeka abanyeshuri gukubita bagenzi babo agashyira ikosa kuri abo banyeshuri. Yagize ati “Ibi by’ abanyeshuri bakoreshwa gukubita bagenzi babo bigomba gukosorwa bihagarare burundu. Uzabyongera ubwo uzajya Mageragere ntabwo waje hano kugira ngo bagukoreshe kugubita bagenzi bawe. Abayobozi bari hano Leta yarabizeye ni abahanga, unaniranye hari ubundi buryo bamugenza bitari ukumukubita ngo bamuvune igufwa, sibyo?”. Hashize iminsi mike uwayoboraga iki kigo atawe muri yombi we n’ abandi bayobozi babiri bakoranaga bakurikiranyweho kunyereza imitungo.

article_text:
Imodoka ya sosiyete y’ Abashinwa yaguye mu Kivu irimo 10 babiri barapfa

 
Abantu babiri bapfuye n’ ubu imirambo yabo iracyashakishwa nyuma y’ uko imodoka y’Ikigo cy’Abashinwa kirimo gukora umuhanda wa Marine ugana ku ruganda rwa Bralirwa, yataye umuhanda ikagwa mu Kivu ubwo yari ihuye n’ ikamyo mu ikorosi.
 Abantu babiri bapfuye n’ ubu imirambo yabo iracyashakishwa nyuma y’ uko imodoka y’Ikigo cy’Abashinwa kirimo gukora umuhanda wa Marine ugana ku ruganda rwa Bralirwa, yataye umuhanda ikagwa mu Kivu ubwo yari ihuye n’ ikamyo mu ikorosi. Iyi mpanuka yabereye mu Mudugudu wa Tagaza, Akagari ka Rubona, mu Murenge wa Nyamyumba saa 9: 20 mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 22 Ukwakira 2019. Mu bantu 10 bari bayirimo umunani babashije kurokoka, babiri bitaba Imana. Ingabo zishinzwe umutekano wo mu mazi (Marine) zirimo gushakisha babiri bataraboneka, mu gihe batatu bakomeretse bajyanwe kuvurirwa mu bitaro bya Gisenyi nk’ uko byatangajwe n’ umuvugizi wa Polisi y’ u Rwanda mu Ntara y’ Iburenerazuba CIP Kayigi Emmanuel. CIP Kayigi avuga ko iyi mpanuka ishobora kuba yatewe n’ umuvuduko mwinshi wa PIK UP y’ iyi sosiyete. Imodoka zombi ari iyi kamyo n’ iyi pick up ni iza sosiyete yitwa China State zari mu kazi. CIP Kayigi avuga ko imodoka aho yaguye hagaragara ariko batarabasha kuyikura mu mazi. Asaba abatwara ibinyabiziga kubahiriza amategeko y’ umuhanda.

title: Nyamasheke: Abana 2 bo mu muryango umwe baguye mu cyobo gicukurwamo zahabu barapfa
article_text:
Nyamasheke: Abana 2 bo mu muryango umwe baguye mu cyobo gicukurwamo zahabu barapfa

 
Abana babiri bafite ababyeyi bava inda imwe baguye mu cyobo gicukurwamo zahabu barapfa. Abacukuye ibyo byobo biri mu mirima y’ abaturage bivugwa ko babicukuye mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko bahise batoroka.
 Abana babiri bafite ababyeyi bava inda imwe baguye mu cyobo gicukurwamo zahabu barapfa. Abacukuye ibyo byobo biri mu mirima y’ abaturage bivugwa ko babicukuye mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko bahise batoroka. Kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 28 Nyakanga 2019, nibwo Mugabonake Elia w’ imyaka 10 na murumuna we Ishimwe Frank w’ imyaka 9 bitabye Imana nyuma yo kugwa mu gisimu cyaresemo amazi. Icyo gisimu giherereye mu Mudugudu wa Wimpundu, Akagari ka Ntendezi, Umurenge wa Ruharambuga, mu karere ka Nyamasheke Intara y’ Iburengerazuba. Havugimana Pierre, nyirarume w’ aba bana yabwiye Ukwezi ko aba bana baguye muri iki gisimu ubwo barimo bakina. Yagize ati “Kumwe abana baba bagenda baramanutse bagera ahantu hari ibisimu, abana bari gukina ntabwo baba bazi ibyo aribyo baguye mu gisimu kirimo amazi bapfiramo. Ni ibyobo bicukurwamo zahabu biri mu mirima y’ abaturage, baracukura bazibura bakimukira hirya yaho bakabisiga birangaye”. Umwana umwe ni uwa Mukashyaka Elevanie undi ni uwa Nyiratabaro Immaculee. Mukashyaka Elevanie arasaba ubuyobozi ko bwakurikirana nyiri isambu n’ abacukuragamo zahahu bakabafasha kubona amafaranga yo gushyingura aba bana. Yagize ati “Nyiri isambu n’ abacukuragamo bakagombye kudufasha kubera ko turi gutanga amafaranga kandi ntayo dufite amafaranga yo kuvana imirambo ku bitaro bya Bushenge twayagujije. Ubu turi gushaka andi yo kudufasha gushyingura”. Aba bacukuzi bacukuye ibi byobo bakora badafite uburenganzira. Uyu muryango usaba ko abo bacukuzi babuzwa gucukura cyangwa bakajya basiba ibyobo bacukura. 
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’ Umurenge wa Ruharambuga Anne Marie yavuze ko aya makuru yayamenye ariko ko ntacyo yayavugaho kuko akiri kubikurikirana. Ntaganira Josue Michel , Umuyobozi w’ akarere ka Nyamasheke wungirije ushinzwe ubukungu n’ iterambere yabwiye Ukwezi ko bari gushakisha abacukuye ibyo bisimu ndetse ko basabye ko hazakorwa umuganda wo gusiba ibyo bisimu. Yagize ati “Twasabye umuganda wihuse wo gutaba icyobo, kugira ngo aho hantu hatazateza izindi mpanuka, ikindi kandi ni ibwirizwa ryishwe kuko abantu bacukuye bagomba gusiga batabye aho bacukuye” Visi Meya Ntaganira yavuze ko ubuyobozi bw’ akarere bufatanyije n’ inzego z’ umutekano bari gushakisha abantu bacukuraga ibyo byobo kuko bahise batoroka. Ibi byobo bimaze guhitana abana bane kuko uretse Mugabonake Elia na Ishimwe Frank byigeze guhitana abandi bana babiri.

title: Kigali: Ikamyo itwara peterole yaturitse bayisudira ihitaha babiri

Kigali: Ikamyo itwara peterole yaturitse bayisudira ihitaha babiri 

 
Abantu babiri bahitanywe n’ iturika ry’ ikamyo itwara amavuta yasudirwaga n’ abakanishi mu mujyi wa Kigali mu karere ka Kicukiro I Gikondo. Ababibonye bavuga ko iyi mpanuka yatewe n’ uburangare bw’ abakanishi.
 Abantu babiri bahitanywe n’ iturika ry’ ikamyo itwara amavuta yasudirwaga n’ abakanishi mu mujyi wa Kigali mu karere ka Kicukiro I Gikondo. Ababibonye bavuga ko iyi mpanuka yatewe n’ uburangare bw’ abakanishi. Iyi mpanuka yabaye kuri uyu wa 18 Nyakanga 2019, mu masaha y’ igicamunsi. Imodoka yasudirwaga ifite plaque RAD413A. Uretse babiri bapfuye hari undi wakomeretse. Abapfuye ni umushoferi w’ iyi kamyo Gakwandi Jean Claude w’imyaka 47 wari hejuru y’ itanki yereka umukanishi ahari imyenge, undi wapfuye ni Kamudra Mitanyurwa w’imyaka 59, wari ufite ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda n’ubwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yahiriye muri iki kigega umurambo we uhita ujyanwa ku bitaro bya Kacyiru. Kumudra niwe wasudiraga. Uwakomeretse ni Nahayo Emmanuel umukozi wo mu igaraje wahise ajyanwa kuvurirwa mu bitaro bya CHUK. Abaturage bavuga ko iyi mpanuka yatewe n’ uburangare bw’ abakanishi kuko ubundi mbere yo gusudira ikigega cy’ imodoka itwara essence babanzaga kucyoza n’ amazi kugira ngo ibishashi by’ umuriro bidateza inkongi.

Mu busitani bw’ ibitaro bya Ruhengeli hatoraguwe umurambo w’ umugore 

 
Abakozi b’ ibitaro bya Ruhengeli ejo ku wa Kabili babonye umurambo w’ umugore w’ imyaka 32 mu busitani bw’ ibi bitaro ahetse umwana w’ imyaka 2.
 Abakozi b’ ibitaro bya Ruhengeli ejo ku wa Kabili babonye umurambo w’ umugore w’ imyaka 32 mu busitani bw’ ibi bitaro ahetse umwana w’ imyaka 2. Uyu murambo wa Clementine Mukandoli wabonetse tariki 24 Nzeri 2019 mu masaha ya mu gitondo. Umuyobozi w’ ibitaro bya Ruhengeli Dr Muhire Philbert avuga ko uyu mubyeyi yari yagiye mu bitaro gusura umuturanyi we urwaje nyina. Avuga ko nk’ ibitaro byabateye impungenge ku bijyanye n’ umutekano agahakana amakuru y’ uko uyu mubyeyi yaba yararembye ntabone ubuvuzi. Ibitaro bifatanyije n’ urwego rw’ ubugenzacyaha RIB bakoze isuzuma rikorerwa imirambo ngo hamenyekanye icyateye urupfu. Mukandoli akomoka mu murenge wa Nkotsi mu karere ka Musanze, mbere y’ uko apfa hari abarwaza bavuga ko bari bamubonye atembera mu bitaro. Dr Muhire avuga ko umwana uyu mugore yari ahetse ntacyo yabaye. Ni ubwa mbere hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko mu bitaro bya Ruhengeli hapfiriye umuntu aguye mu busitani. Ikimaze iminsi kivugwa n’ ikibazo cy’ abarwaza barara hanze ahantu bavuga ko bashobora kuhandurira indwara.

title: Kigali: Abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu bari gupimwa indwara zibibasira
article_text:
Kigali: Abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu bari gupimwa indwara zibibasira 

 
Abagera ku 120 nibo bamaze kwitabira ubukangurambaga bugamije kurinda abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu buri kubera mu bitaro bya Gisirikare I Kanombe.
 Abagera ku 120 nibo bamaze kwitabira ubukangurambaga bugamije kurinda abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu buri kubera mu bitaro bya Gisirikare I Kanombe. Bari gupimwa indwara z’ amaso na Kanseri y’ uruhu kuko arizo ndwara zikunzwe kwibasira abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu. Col. Dr. Chrysostome Kagimbana, Muganga w’indwara z’uruhu ku bitaro bya Gisirikari bya Kanombe, yabwiye Kigali Today ko abantu bafite ubumuga bw’uruhu bagomba kwirinda izuba igihe cyose, ndetse n’igihe hatariho izuba ariko hashyushye, bakambara ibituma umubiri wabo utangirika. 
 Yagize ati “Umucanga n’amazi iyo bishyushye bizamura imirasire ishobora gutwika uruhu rw’umuntu usanzwe ufite ubumuga bw’uruhu bikaba byamutera kanseri y’uruhu ndetse bikaba byakwangiza n’amaso ye bikamutera ubumuga bwo kutabona.”. Abantu 120 bitabiriye iki gikorwa biganjemo abo mujyi wa Kigali. Ibi bitaro birasaba n’ abandi bafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu kubigana bagahabwa inama, bagapimwa indwara z’ uruhu ndetse bakanahabwa amavuta arinda uruhu rwabo. Ibi byose babikorerwa ku buntu. Col. Dr. Kagimbana asaba abafite ubumuga bw’ uruhu kwambara ingofero kuko irinda mu maso, amatwi n’ijosi ku buryo ibyo bice by’umubiri bidahura n’imirasire ngo yinjire mu mubiri. 
 Abagira inama yo kwambara indorerwamo zirinda amaso yabo kwangizwa n’ imirasire y’ izuba. Imibare y’Ishami ry’ umuryango w’ Abibumbye ryita ku buzima igaragaza ko buri mwaka abantu bari hagati ya miliyoni 2-3 badafite uruhu rwirabura bafatwa na kanseri y’ uruhu, mugihe abafite uruhu rwirabura bafatwa na kanseri y’ urufu ari ibihumbi 130 ku buri mwaka.

title: Minisititiri Gashumba yamaze impungenge abagabo batinya kwifungisha ngo bibangamira akabariro
article_text:
Minisititiri Gashumba yamaze impungenge abagabo batinya kwifungisha ngo bibangamira akabariro 

 
Abagabo bamwe batinya kwifungisha burundu bavuga ko byabagiraho ingaruka zirimo no kunanirwa gutera akabariro, gusa Minisitiri w’ Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba avuga ko kwifungisha burundu kubagabo bitabuza umugabo gukomeza gutera akabariro nk’ uko bisanzwe.
 Abagabo bamwe batinya kwifungisha burundu bavuga ko byabagiraho ingaruka zirimo no kunanirwa gutera akabariro, gusa Minisitiri w’ Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba avuga ko kwifungisha burundu kubagabo bitabuza umugabo gukomeza gutera akabariro nk’ uko bisanzwe. Hitimana Emmanuel wo mu murenge wa Karama mu karere ka Nyagatare yavuze ko afite ingero enye z’ abagabo bagenzi be bifungishije burundu bakagira ikibazo mu gutera akabariro. Yagize ati “Umugabo yaraboneje yabyumvikanye n’ umugore we ko nta kizahinduka mu rugo, nyuma yaho icyabayeho umugore we yamuzaniye umwana. Umugore akajya amubwira ngo ntacyo ukimaze”. Hitimana asobanura ko kuba uyu mugabo abwirwa ko nta cyo amaze ari uko gutera akabariro atakibishobora nka mbere. Zikamirwa Juvenal, avuga ko abagabo batinya kuboneza urubyaro batinya ko byabagiraho ingaruka. Yagize ati “Abagabo baracyaseta ibirenge mu kuboneza urubyaro. Abagabo ngo babaca niba ari umutsi, noneho bakabitinya kubera ko byabagiraho ingaruka” Tumushime Eugenie, Umujyanama w’ ubuzima wo mu murenge wa Karama, Akagari ka Kimanza Umudugudu wa Kiyovu yabwiye Ikinyamakuru UKWEZI abagabo basonukiwe n’ akamaro ko kuboneza urubyaro. Yagize ati “Abagabo nabo baritabira bagafasha abagore babo kubabwira ngo bage kuboneza urubyaro.” 

Minisitiri Gashumba avuga ko umugabo wifungishije burundu nta ngaruka bimugiraho mu bijyanye no gutera akabariro Mu bukangurambaga ‘Baho neza’ bwatangirijwe mu karere ka Nyagatare kuri uyu wa 23 Mata 2019, Minisitiri w’ Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba yashishikarije abaturage kuboneza urubyaro, ababwira ko n’ abayobozi baruboneza kuko badashobora gusaba abaturage gukora ikintu nabo batagikora. Minisitiri Gashumba yamaze impungenge abagabo batinya kujya kwifungisha burundu bakeka ko bizabagiraho ingaruka. Yagize ati “Abavuga ko umugabo waboneje urubyaro baba bamukonnye ni impuha ntabwo aribyo. Umugabo waboneje urubyaro nawe aba yiyumvishemo gahunda yo kunganira umugore we”. Yongeyeho ati “Ni uburyo buhari, ntacyo bubatwara barakomeza bakubaka urugo neza. Barakomeza bakaba abagabo mu rugo bafite imbaraga, bafite urukundo. Ni umugabo nk’ undi ntacyo aba bahindutseho”. 
 Mu bikorwa biteganyijwe mu bukangurambaga ‘Baho neza’ harimo gushishikariza abaturage kugira isuku, kuboneza urubyaro, gutanga ibinini by’inzoka ku bana bafite umwaka umwe kugeza kumyaka 15, ndetse no gutanga ifu ya Ongera ku bana bafite kuva amezi 6 kugeza ku myaka 5. Imibare itangwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko muri 2005 ubwitabire mu kuboneza urubyaro bwari ku 10 %. Muri 2010 bwarazamutse cyane bugera kuri 45%, muri 2015 bukaba bwari bugeze kuri 48%.

title: Aba 12  ni bamwe mu bihangange twabuze muri 2018 [AMAFOTO]
article_text:
Aba 12  ni bamwe mu bihangange twabuze muri 2018 [AMAFOTO]

 
Umwaka wa 2018 waranzwe n’ amarira n’ ibyishimo. Bimwe mu byarijije abantu ni ukubura bimwe mu bihangane mu nzego zitandukanye birimo abanyempano, abagiraneza, n’ abanyapolitiki.
 Umwaka wa 2018 waranzwe n’ amarira n’ ibyishimo. Bimwe mu byarijije abantu ni ukubura bimwe mu bihangane mu nzego zitandukanye birimo abanyempano, abagiraneza, n’ abanyapolitiki. 
 Mwozey Radio, Umunya-Uganda wari warigaruriye imitima y’ abakunzi ba muzika kubera impanuro n’ ubuhanga bwo kuririmba yitabye Imana muri 2018, mu kwezi kwa 2 ku itariki ya mbere afite imyaka 33 y’ amavuko. 
 Donald Moffat  wavutse tariki 26 Ukuboza 1930 akamamara kubera filime yakinnye zirimo iyitwa ‘The Thing’ yo mu 1982, yatabarutse tariki 20 Ukuboza 2018. 
  Ethel Ayler wakinaga filime yitabye Imana ku myaka 88 tariki 18 Ugushyingo 2018. Niwe wakinnye iyitwa “The Cosby Show” (1984-92). 

Winnie Madikizela Mandela  wigeze kuba umugore wa Nelson Mandela yitabye Imana tariki 2 Mata 2018 afite imyaka 81. Azahora yibukwa cyane by’ umwihariko n’ Abanya Afurika y’ Epfo kubera uruhare yagize mu kubohora iki gihugu afatanije n’ umugabo we Nelson Mandela. 
 Penny Marshall,  witabye Imana azize diabete tariki 17 Ukuboza 2018, yari umukinnyi wa filime akaba n’ umuyobozi w’ amafilime. Yayoboye iyitwa ‘Big’ mu 1988. Niwe mugore wa mbere wayoboye filime. ‘Big’ yinjije miliyoni 100 z’ amadorali y’ Amerika. 
 Nancy Wilson, wamamaye mujyana ya Jazz ndetse akanahabwa igihembo cya Grammy muri iyi njyana yitabye Imana tariki 13 Ukuboza 2018 afite imyaka 81.  Umuzingo w’ indirimbo ze wakunzwe cyane ni ‘Turned to Blue’. 
 George H.W. Bush arazwi cyane kuko yarwanye intambara ya 2 y’ Isi, aba Perezida wa 41 wa Leta zunze ubumwe za Amerika. Yitabye Imana muri uyu mwaka wa 2018 tariki 30 Ugushyingo afite imyaka 94. Kimwe muri byinshi yibukirwaho ni uko yakundaga abana be cyane. 
 Al Matthews ni umukinnyi wa filime z’ ibivejuru witabye Imana tariki 22 Nzeli 2018. Niwe wakinnye  "Superman III" (1983), "Tomorrow Never Dies" (1997) na "The Fifth Element" (1997). Uretse kuba yarakinnye izi filime yigeze no kuba umusirikare wa U.S mu ngabo zirwanira mu mazi. 
 Tran Dai Quang wari Perezida wa Vietman yitabye Imana tariki 21 Nzeli 2018 aguye mu bitaro bya gisirikare. Indwara yamuhitanye yagizwe ibanga gusa yapfuye amaze imyaka 2 arahiriye kuba Perezida. 
 Kofi Annan, ni Umunya-Ghana wabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni. Yitabye Imana tariki 18 Kanama 2018 afite imyaka 80. Ni umwe mu bahawe igihembo cy’ amahoro kitiriwe Nobel kandi yibukirwa ku muhate yari afite wo kurandura HIV/AIDS muri Afurika. 
 Aretha Franklin, yitabye Imana tariki 16 Kanama 2018. Yari umuririmbyi ukomeye mu njyana ya Rock, ndetse bamuhimbaga umwamikazi wa Roho, yaririmbye mu muhango w’ irahira rya Barack Obama ubwo yagirwaga Perezida wa US. 
 Patricia Morison yari umuririmbyi akaba n’ umukinnyi wa filime, yitabye Imana tariki 20 Gicurasi 2018 azwi cyane kubera igihangano cye  "Kiss Me, Kate" cyo 1948. Yazize izabukuru ageze ku myaka  103. 
 Abanyarwanda ntabwo bazibagirwa ko tariki 17 Ukuboza 2018 , aribwo umukecuru wo mu karere ka Ruhango witwa Zula Karuhimbi wahishe abantu 150 mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994, yatabarutse azize izabukuru nyuma y’uko yari amaze igihe yarituwe yaranubakiwe inzu nziza.
