title: “Hari abitiranya indwara yo ‘kuvura kw’amaraso’ n’amarozi kubera ubukana n’ibimenyetso byayo”
article_text:
“Hari abitiranya indwara yo ‘kuvura kw’amaraso’ n’amarozi kubera ubukana n’ibimenyetso byayo”

 
Abahanga mu buvuzi bw’indwara yo kuvura kw’amaraso (Blood Clots) bavuga ko hari abantu benshi bayirwara ntibayimenye kubera  ibimenyetso byayo, ahubwo bakayitiranya n’amarozi.
 Abahanga mu buvuzi bw’indwara yo kuvura kw’amaraso (Blood Clots) bavuga ko hari abantu benshi bayirwara ntibayimenye kubera  ibimenyetso byayo, ahubwo bakayitiranya n’amarozi. Aba baganga b’inzobere  bavuga ko ari byiza ko abantu bayimenya kuko ari indwara yica vuba ariko kandi  ikaba ikira neza iyo uyirwaye  abimenye akajya kwa muganga. Ibi byagarutsweho mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize ubwo u Rwanda rwifatanyaga n’isi mu kuzirikana ububi n’ubukana bw’iyi  ndwara ihitana abantu kubera kutayimenya ngo bayivuze. Inzobere z’abaganga zatangaje ko iyi ndwara yibasira cyane abagore batwite mu gihe cyo kubyara, abantu bamaze igihe kinini baryamye mu bitaro, yibasira kandi ababazwe nyuma yo gukora impanuka bakavunika amagufa manini, abicara amasaha menshi, abafite umubyibuho ukabije gusa ngo biranashokoka ko yafata umuntu wese ntacyo ishingiyeho. Iyi ndwara ngo ni ikibumbe cy’amaraso kijya mu mutsi waba ujyana cyangwa uvana amaraso mu mutima kakawufunga ntiyongere gutembera ajya mu bihaha, akenshi kikaba gikunze gufata mu maguru ku muntu wabazwe, ku bagore bagiye kubyara cyangwa ababazwe mbere yo kubyara, akaguru kakabyimba cyane. Iyo umuntu yamaze kurwara iyi ndwara, uretse kubyima amaguru, atangira no kunanirwa guhumeka neza, akababara cyane, umutima ugatera cyane  kubera kugenda gake kw’amaraso biba byatewe n’uko umuyoboro ujyana amaraso mu bihaha uyavana mu mutima uba yafunze. Prof. Emile Rwamasirabo uri mu bavura indwara yo kuvura kw’amaraso avuga ko indwara zitandura zirimo n’iyi yo kuvura kw’amaraso ziri kugenda ziyongera kubera guhindura imibereho. Ati “Kera abantu ntabwo bayirwaraga kubera imibereho y’icyo gihe. Abantu bose bagendaga n’amaguru,waba ufite ubushobozi ukagenda ku igare bigatuma umubiri utagira ibindi bintu bitari ngombwa.” Avuga ko indwara zo kuvura kw’amaraso zigenda ziba nyinshi gusa hakaba hari ikibazo cy’uko abantu batarayimenya. 
Inzobere z’abaganga zagaragaje ko indwaya yo kuvura kw’amaraso ivurwa igakira Abahamga benshi mu by’ubuvuzi bw’indwara zo kuvura kw’amaraso bavuga ko abantu batarayimenya bityo bikaba bituma bayitiranya n’amarozi kubera ibinyeyetso n’ubukana bwayo. Asiimwe Christine wakize iyi ndwara akaza no gushinga umuryango w’abarwaye iyo ndwara nyuma yo kumenya ububi bwayo ndetse n’uko ivurwa igakira, avuga ko hari gukorwa ubukangurambaga bwo gusobanurira abanyarwanda iyi ndwara, kugira ngo bayimenye maze abazajya bagaragaraho ibimenyetso byayo bihutire kwa muganga hakiri kare. Christine avuga ko umuntu umwe mu bantu bane afite ibyago byo kwicwa n’indwara yo kuvura kw’amaraso. Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyita ku buzima (RBC), Prof Condo Jeannine, avuga ko iyo ndwara ishobora kwirindwa. Yagize atiti “Abantu bagize siporo umuco, bakirinda kumara amasaha menshi bicaye, ugize ikibazo akareba umuganga byihuse, babasha kwirinda iyo ndwara kandi nta mafaranga bisaba. Tugiye gukomeza ubukangurambaga ngo abantu bamenye ibiyiranga kuko ivurwa igakira”.  
 Abaganga bavuga ko hari  abataramenya iyi ndwara bayitiranya n’amarozi kubera ibimenyetso byayo birimo kubyimba zimwe mu ngingo z’umubiri

title: Huye: Abaganga 3 n’abiganjemo abiga muri Kaminuza banze gutererwa umuti urwanya malariya
article_text:
Huye: Abaganga 3 n’abiganjemo abiga muri Kaminuza banze gutererwa umuti urwanya malariya 

 
Abantu bajijutse bakabaye bafasha abandi guhindura imyumvire nibo bari kwangisha abandi igikorwa cyo gutera umuti wica imibu itera malaria. 
Umurenge wa Tumba wo mu karere ka Huye ufite urutonde rw’ abanze iki gikorwa barimo abaganga batatu n’ abandi biganjemo abanyeshuri biga muri Kaminuza y’ u Rwanda ishami rya Huye.
 Abantu bajijutse bakabaye bafasha abandi guhindura imyumvire nibo bari kwangisha abandi igikorwa cyo gutera umuti wica imibu itera malaria. 
Umurenge wa Tumba wo mu karere ka Huye ufite urutonde rw’ abanze iki gikorwa barimo abaganga batatu n’ abandi biganjemo abanyeshuri biga muri Kaminuza y’ u Rwanda ishami rya Huye. Uyu murenge uvuga ko hari abagerekaho agasuzuguro no gushaka kurwanya abatera iyi miti. Ibi byatumye abantu babiri bo muri uyu murenge batabwa muri yombi gusa umwe yararekuwe. Mu nama ya nyuma y’ umuganda rusange wo ku wa Gatandatu tariki 26 Mutarama 2019 , urutonde rw’ abigometse kuri iki gikorwa cyo gutera umuti rwasomewe mu ruhame , Umunyamabanga Nshingwa bikorwa w’ Umurenge wa Tumba Migabo Vitar avuga ko bagiye kubaza inzego zibakuriye abo bigometse bakazafatirwa ibihano. Abo baganga barimo uwo ku bitaro bya Kibilizi, uwo ku Kigo Nderabuzima cya Rango n’ uwo ku bitaro bya Kabutare. Gitifu Migabo yavuze ko bibabaje kuba abantu basobanutse bakabaye bafasha abandi guhindura imyumvire aribo bigometse. 

Gitifu Migabo Vitar Yagize ati “Ni abantu ahubwo bakabaye bari kuvuga nk’ ibi ndimo mvuga ndetse banabindusha. Hari aho bagiye gutera baranga ari abanyeshuri bo muri Kaminuza, ubuyobozi bw’ umurenge tujyayo turigisha aho bagaragaje inyumvire ya cyana dushyiraho n’ igitsure” Yakomeje agira ati “Kubona umuntu w’ umuganga ku bitaro yanga ko bamuterera umuti, urumirwa ukabura uko wifata gusa, iyo ubonye umuntu wiga muri Kaminuza yanga ko bamuterera umuti urwanya malariya uramureba ukumirwa” Ntibyadushobokeye kuvugana n’ abaganga banze iki gikorwa, gusa amakuru twamenye ni uko umwe mu baganga yabwiye abatera imiti ko ngo ‘munkurire uwo mwanda mu rugo’. Umubyeyi wo mu Kagari ka Rango B waganiriye na UKWEZI yavuze ko iyo iyi miti irwanya malariya yatewe mu mazu malaria igabanuka, yongeraho ko abanga ko babaterera baba bafite imyumvire mibi. Yagize ati “Nk’ ubu uwakugeza Rango ngo urebe abarwayi ba malariya ni benshi, ariko igihe bari barateye imiti Malariya yari yaragabanutse. Abo banga ko babaterera imiti bafite ikibazo cy’ imyumvire mibi hari n’ abo numvise bavuga ngo iriya miti yongera imbaragasa mu nzu ariko njye ntazo nigeze mbona” 

Kubwimana Jacqueline yasohoye ibikoresho ngo bongere bamuterere kuko yasanze bifite umumaro Kubwimana Jacqueline wo mu kagari ka Kimana na Mujawimana Eugenie baturanye bavuga ko umwaka ushize babatereye umuti, imibu igapfa ariko nyuma y’ iminsi bakabona imbaragasa, ibiheri n’ ibinyenzi bibaye byinshi mu mazu yabo. Bavuga ko bitaba impamvu yo kwanga ko babaterera dore ko ubwo umunyamakuru yasuraga aba baturage yasanze basohoye ibikoresho byabo biteguye ko abatera imiti bahagera bakabaterera. Mujawimana ati “None abo banga ko babaterera imiti babona Leta itwanga kuburyo yatuzanira ibitugirira nabi?” Samuel Ibingira, wiga mu mwaka wa Kane wa Kaminuza mu ishami rya Business Information Technology yavuze ko nyuma y’ uko bamutereye umuti abona ntacyahindutse uretse ibikuta byanduye. Yongeyeho ko bagarutse atakwemera ko bongera kumuterera uyu muti. Yagize ati “Nta minsi myinshi irashira bantereye nta kintu mbona cyahindutse kuko imibu iracyaturya nk’ uko yaturyaga, icyo navuga cyahindutse ni ukutwanduriza ibikuta by’ amazu no kongera umunuko mu nzu. Iyo menya ko ariko bizagenda simba naremeye ko banterera banagarutse sinabyemera” Dr Aimable Mbituyumeremyi, Umuyobozi w’ Ishami ry’ Ikigo cy’ Igihugu cy’ Ubuzima rishinzwe kurwanya malariya  avuga ko iyi miti yica imibu nta ngaruka igira, agasaba abatera imiti kujya babanza gusobanurira abaturage neza mbere y’ uko batangira iki gikorwa. Yagize ati “Iyi miti tumaze imyaka 10 tuyitera nta ngaruka igira k’ ubuzima bw’ abantu. Abavuga ko yongera ibiheri , imbaragasa n’ ibinyenzi ahubwo twe twavuga ko ibyica n’ ibyari byihishe bigapfupfunya ku buryo abaturage bakwiye kubyishimira” 
 Umukozi ushizwe igikorwa cyo gutera imiti mu murenge wa Tumba avuga ko mu zindi mbogamizi bahura nazo ari uko hari abanyeshuri baba bashaka ibicupa byavuyemo iyi miti ngo bage kubikoreraho ubushakashatsi. Indi mbogamizi ngo ni abaturage baba bashaka ibi bicupa ngo bage babipfunyikiramo abana igikoma. Iyo abatera imiti bimanye bino bicupa kuko baziko uriya muti wica bituma hari abaturage banga iki gikorwa. Cyubahiro Beatus , umukozi wa RBC ukuriye iki gikorwa mu karere ka Huye, Nyanza na Gisagara yabwiye UKWEZI ko hari ababyaga bagashaka impamvu zabo bwite n’ ababyaga kuko badafite umwanya abo ngo batererwa mu mpera z’ icyumweru. Biteganyijwe ko iki gikorwa kimaze ibyumweru bibiri gitangiye kizasozwa tariki 5 Gashyantare.

title: Impunzi z’Abanyekongo zafataga imboga nk’ibiryo by’amatungo ariko ubu barazivuga imyato
article_text:
Impunzi z’Abanyekongo zafataga imboga nk’ibiryo by’amatungo ariko ubu barazivuga imyato

 
Abanyekongo bahungiye mu Rwanda bagatuzwa mu nkambi ya Nyabiheke iri mu karere ka Gatsibo mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda, mu myaka yashize bakunze kwibasirwa n’ikibazo cy’imirire mibi yatumaga abana bagwingira bakanagaragaza ibindi bimenyetso by’imirire mibi, kimwe mu byateraga ibi kikaba ari ubujiji kuko mu myumvire yabo bumvaga ko nta muntu warya imboga ahubwo ngo ari ibyatsi byagenewe amatungo.
 Abanyekongo bahungiye mu Rwanda bagatuzwa mu nkambi ya Nyabiheke iri mu karere ka Gatsibo mu Burasirazuba bw’u Rwanda, mu myaka yashize bakunze kwibasirwa n’ikibazo cy’imirire mibi yatumaga abana bagwingira bakanagaragaza ibindi bimenyetso by’imirire mibi, kimwe mu byateraga ibi kikaba ari ubujiji kuko mu myumvire yabo bumvaga ko nta muntu warya imboga ahubwo ngo ari ibyatsi byagenewe amatungo. Inkambi ya Nyabiheke yatujwemo impunzi z’Abanyekongo bavuga Ikinyarwanda, ubu icumbikiye abagera ku 14.622. Ni inkambi yabayeho kuva mu mwaka wa 2005, bivuga ko ubu imaze imyaka isaga 13, abenshi mu bagize izi mpunzi bakaba ari urubyiruko. Ikibazo cyo kugwingira kw’abana no kugaragaza izindi ngaruka z’imirire mibi, cyari giteye inkeke mu myaka ishize ariko ubu gikomeje kuvugutirwa umuti, ubu abatuye muri iyi nkambi bakaba bavuga imyato umushinga NEC (Nutrition Education and Counseling) w’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga wita ku burenganzira bw’umwana, Plan International Rwanda. 
 Uturima tw’igikoni twagize uruhare rukomeye mu kurwanya imirire mibi mu nkambi ya Nyabiheke Umushinga NEC, wagiye uhugura abatuye muri iyi nkambi ku bijyanye no kurwanya imirire mibi, ndetse bakabafasha no kubishyira mu bikorwa. Gilbert, ni umugabo ufite umugore n’abana babiri, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ukwezi ko bashima ibyo bagejejweho na NEC kuko ubu n’abagabo bamenye ko bagomba kugira uruhare mu kurwanya imirire mibi, bagafata iyambere mu gukora uturima tw’igikoni tubafasha kubona imboga bifashisha mu gutegura amafunguro, bityo amafaranga bakaziguze bakayagura ibindi biribwa byunganira izo mboga mu kugira ifunguro ryuzuye. Ashimangira ko ibyo bigishijwe, byatumye banamenya ko nta murimo umugabo atakora ngo yumve ko uhariwe abagore gusa. 
 Uyu mugabo atewe ishema no gufasha umugore we kurwanya imirire mibi mu muryango we Nyirarukundo Elina, we avuga ko nyuma yo gufashwa kubona akarima k’igikoni, umushinga NEC wanabigishije kwibumbira mu makoperative bakorora inkwavu, nazo zikaba zarabunganiye cyane mu kwikura mu bukene no kurwanya imirire mibi. Yitangaho urugero kuko abana babiri b’impanga yabyaye bari bugarijwe n’ikibazo cy’imirire mibi ariko NEC ikaba yaramugobotse ubu bakaba bameze neza kandi babasha kubona indyo yuzuye. 
 Nyirarukundo Elina ashima cyane ibyo bagejejweho n’ubworozi bw’inkwavu babifashijwemo na NEC Mahirwe Aimable ushinzwe iby’imirire mu mushinga wa NEC, we avuga ko izi mpunzi z’Abanyekongo mbere zitabashaga kwiyumvisha uburyo abantu barya imboga kuko bo bazifataga nk’ibyatsi bigaburirwa amatungo, ariko ngo n’ubwo byabagoye kubibumvisha, byatanze umusaruro ufatika kandi bikemura ikibazo cy’imirire mibi mu buryo bugaragara. 
 Umukozi wa Plan International Rwanda avuga ko byabagoye kumvisha impunzi ibyo kurya imboga Ibi binashimangirwa na André Vuganeza, umuyobozi w’iyi nkambi ya Nyabiheke. Avuga ko buri muturage muri iyi nkambi ubu abasha kubona imboga kandi ibi bikaba byarakemuye byinshi ku buzima rusange bw’izi nkambi. Ashimangira ko abatuye muri iyi nkambi basaga ibihumbi 14, iyo bahuriraga mu isoko n’abaturage bagiye kugura imboga byatumaga bazibona zihenze kubera ubwinshi bw’abazishakaga ariko ubu bakaba bazihingira hanyuma amafaranga baziguraga akagurwa ibindi bibafasha kunoza imirire yabo, nawe agashimira umushinga NEC ku gikorwa cy’indashyikirwa wakoze. 
 Vuganeza André, umuyobozi w’inkambi ya Nyabiheke REBA VIDEO UKO BOSE BABISOBANURA HANO: Umushinga NEC wa Plan International Rwanda watangiye muri 2014, ukaba ukorera mu nkambi zose ziri mu Rwanda, aho ufasha impunzi kurwanya ikibazo cy’imirire mibi binyuze mu kubigisha gutegura indyo yuzuye no kubabumbira mu mashyirahamwe yo kwizigama.

title: Abaganga b’indwara z’uruhu baraburira abiharaje kwisiga amavuta ya mukorogo
article_text:
Abaganga b’indwara z’uruhu baraburira abiharaje kwisiga amavuta ya mukorogo 

 
Abaganga b’inzobere mu kuvura indwara z’uruhu ndetse n’abahanga mu byerekeye imiti ( Pharmacien )  bahuriye i Kigali mu nama yari igamije kungurana ibitekerezo ku buryo bwo gukumira no kurwanya indwara z’uruhu, bakomoza ku bubi bw’uruvangitirane rw’amavuta bamwe baharaye gukoresha yamenyekanye nka ’Mukorogo’.
 Abaganga b’inzobere mu kuvura indwara z’uruhu ndetse n’abahanga mu byerekeye imiti ( Pharmacien )  bahuriye i Kigali mu nama yari igamije kungurana ibitekerezo ku buryo bwo gukumira no kurwanya indwara z’uruhu, bakomoza ku bubi bw’uruvangitirane rw’amavuta bamwe baharaye gukoresha yamenyekanye nka ’Mukorogo’. Iyi nama yabaye kuwa Gatanu tariki 29 Kanama 2018, yahuriyemo n’abaganga ndetse n’abaganga mu by’imiti  baturutse hirya no hino mu gihugu, yateguwe ku bufatanye na KIPHARMA –SEBAPHARMA. Ingingo nyamukuru y’utuntu nama nyunguranabitekerezo yari iyo kwiga ku buryo bwo kwita ku ruhu no kuvura indwara zitandukanye zifata uruhu zikarwangiza. Hanagarutswe kandi ku bantu biharaje guhindura uruhu rwabo bakoresheje uruvangitirane rw’imiti inyuranye, ibintu Abahanga mu by’imiti ndetse n’abaganga b’uruhu bavuze ko bigira ingaruka zikomeye ku bisiga ayo mavuta. Dr Gahongayire Francoise, impuguke mu bijyanye n’indwara z’uruhu, yavuze ko abisiga za mukorogo babikora byabanje kugenzura ngo bamenye ziba zakozwe mu buhe buryo, cyane ko aba ari imiti ivangwavangwa ishobora kugira ingaruka nyinshi kandi zikomeye ku mubiri w’uwayikoresheje . Yanavuze ko n’ubwo benshi bisiga ayo mavuta ya mukorogo bashaka guhindura uruhu rwabo, ngo ari uko baba batamenye ko bashobora kwegera abaganga bakabagira inama ndetse bakanababwira amavuta yabugenewe bashobora gukoresha bahindura uruhu kandi ntabagireho ingaruka. Yagize ati “Si mbona impamvu ushaka guhinduka, simbona impamvu ushaka kuba umuzungu kandi uwo muzungu nta n’ubwo uzanaba we kuko kenshi uzasanga ibyo bintu azajya gukoresha, wenda ubwa mbere ibyumweru bibiri cyangwa bitanu azaba koko yishimiye kuba yarahindutse atagifite urwo rukara. Ariko nyuma yaho ahubwo aba mubi kurushaho, nshobora kukwemeza ko hari abantu batakiva mu nzu kubera mukorogo bisize.” Umuhanga mu by’imiti uyobora Umuryango Nyarwanda ugamije kurushaho kuzamura ubuzima rusange bw’abaturage Organization for public healthy improvement  (OPHI) Uwambajineza Tito, yavuze ko aya mavuta ya mukorogo ari ibintu bikorwa n’abantu ahanini baba batabifitiye ubumenyi buhagije. Yagize ati “Ibya mukorogo ni ibintu bikorwa n’abantu badasobanukiwe icyo umuti aricyo, kubera ko iyo uri umuhanga mu by’imiti uba uzi ngo niba ari imiti ugiye kuvanga, urayivanga ku ruhe rwego, urashyiramo niba wenda nabyita nk’ubukana." Yunzemo ati "Ubukana bw’uyu muti nimbuvanga n’ubwuyu burakemura ikibazo umuntu afite? Ibyo ngibyo rero bikorerwa inyingo ukanabyemererwa n’inzego zigiye zitandukanye ntabwo ari ibintu ujya ahantu hihishe ukavangavanga ugahereza abantu.” Uwambajineza yavuze ko hari igihe abakora mu mwuga wa farumasi cyangwa abandi bahanga mu by’imiti baha abaturage imiti batabanje kumenya iyo bakeneye, by’umwihariko iyi y’uruhu avuga ko rugira ibyiciro bitandukanye birimo uruhu ruba rwumye, urw’amavuta n’uruhu rukakaye cyane. 
Abahanga mu by’imiti ndetse n’inzobere z’abaganga n’indwara z’uruhu bagarutse ku ngaruka z’amavuta ya mukorogo

title: Muhima: Abaganga barashinjwa kurangarana umubyeyi wabyaye bigatuma umwana apfa
article_text:
Muhima: Abaganga barashinjwa kurangarana umubyeyi wabyaye bigatuma umwana apfa

 
Abaganga bo ku bitaro bya Muhima biherereye mu murenge wa Muhima, akarere ka Nyarugenge mu Mujyi wa Kigali barashyirwa mu majwi ko barangaranye umubyeyi waje kubyarira kuri ibi bitaro aza kubyara umwana wapfuye abaganga bafata umurambo bawuryamisha iruhande rwa  nyina aho kuwujyana mu buruhukiro ‘Morge’
 Abaganga bo ku bitaro bya Muhima biherereye mu murenge wa Muhima, akarere ka Nyarugenge mu Mujyi wa Kigali barashyirwa mu majwi ko barangaranye umubyeyi waje kubyarira kuri ibi bitaro aza kubyara umwana wapfuye abaganga bafata umurambo bawuryamisha iruhande rwa  nyina aho kuwujyana mu buruhukiro ‘Morge’ Ibi byabaye mu mpera z’iki Cyumweru aho uyu mubyeyi yageze kuri ibi bitaro kuwa Gatandatu nyuma aza kubagwa ku Cyumweru ariko ngo kubera uburangare bw’abaganga byaje kumuviramo kuba uwo yari amaze kwibaruka yarahise yitaba Imana ngo umurambo aho kuwujyana muri morge bawuryamisha iruhande rwa nyina. Uwari urwaje uyu mubyeyi yavuze ko kuva ubwo yageraga kuri ibi bitaro yagaragaraga nk’uwazahaye cyane ndetse ngo baje no kumenya ko uwo yari yibarutse yavutse ari muzima nyuma aza kwitaba Imana bitewe n’umunaniro. Yakomeje avuga ko bashenguwe cyane no kuba baragiye mu cyumba uyu mubyeyi yari arwariyemo basanga uwo mwana witabye Imana amuryamye hafi ngo babajije abaganga bamubwira ko urufunguzo rwo muri ‘Morge’ hari undi muganga warutahanye. Umuyobozi w’Ibitaro bya Muhima, Rutagengwa William yabwiye ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com ko ikibazo gihari ari umuntu wo mu muryango w’uyu mubyeyi wagiye avuga ibintu atazi naho ngo umubyeyi we ntabwo yigeze arangaranwa kandi ngo kuba umuntu yabyara umwana agapfa hari impamvu ibisobanura iri ‘Medical’ Yagize ati “Umubyeyi yaraje baramukurikirana igihe kiragera babona ko ari ngombwa ko bamubaga, baramubaga, umwana avamo apfuye, ni ibintu bibaho, umubyeyi umwana baramumwereka bamujyana muri Morge, umubyeyi bamuha maraso, ari mu bitaro ameze neza twavuganye mu gitondo n’abanyamakuru bavuganye” UMVA HANO DR ABISOBANURA: Bamwe mu barwayi bavuga ko ibi bitaro bifite imikorere itari myiza ari naho bahera bavuga ko inzego zifite ubuzima mu nshingano zagakwiye kujya zikora ubugenzuzi kenshi kugira ngo bakemure ikibazo cy’imitangire mibi ya serivisi muri ibi bitaro bya Muhima.

title: Rwamagana: Abapfakazi n’inshike za Jenoside barabyinira ku rukoma nyuma yo kugabirwa
article_text:
Rwamagana: Abapfakazi n’inshike za Jenoside barabyinira ku rukoma nyuma yo kugabirwa

 
Abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 batuye mu murenge wa Gishali ho mu karere ka Rwamagana, nyuma y’uko borejwe inka na Jali Holding Company, bavuga ko batozongera kugura ifumbire ndetse n’amata.
 Abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 batuye mu murenge wa Gishali ho mu karere ka Rwamagana, nyuma y’uko borejwe inka na Jali Holding Company, bavuga ko batozongera kugura ifumbire ndetse n’amata. Kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 5 Nyakanga 2018 abakozi ba Jali Holding Company bagabiye inka  abacitse ku icumu bari mu miryango itandukanye igera ku 10 ituye mu murenge wa Gishali ,inka  bahawe zose zikaba zihaka kuburyo biteguye ko zizahita zibabyarira mu gihe cya vuba. Abahawe inka bavuga ko ubuzima bwabo bugiye guhinduka kuko batazongera kugura amata. 
 Abakozi ba Jali Holding Company mu gikorwa cyo kugabira incike n’abapfakazi ba Jenoside Uwitwa Musabyimana Beatty aganira n’ikinyamakuru Ukwezi.com yavuze ko ubuzima bubi yari arimo bugiye guhinduka. Uyu yagize ati “Ndishimye cyane kuba mbonye inka uyu munsi, iyi nka igiye kumfasha ibintu byinshi harimo kubona ifumbire kuko byari ikibazo, kubona amata nabyo byari ikibazo kuko nayaguraga ubu amafaranga nakoreshaga ngura amata ngiye kuyakoresha ibindi nkomeze kwiteza imbere byanga bikunda ubuzima bugiye guhinduka “. Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rwamagana, Mbonyumuvunyi Radjab, yashimiye Jali Holding Company yafashije abacitse ku icumu kuko imibereho yabo igiye guhinduka. Uyu muyobozi aganira n’abanyamakuru yagize ati “Ubu imibereho igiye guhinduka kuko babonye amata n’ifumbire, umusaruro ugiye kwiyongera ndetse banasagurire n’isoko bitume bava mu cyiciro kimwe cy’ubuzima bajye mu kindi ndetse bagiye no kwiyubakamo icyizere “. 
 Umuyobozi wa Jali Holding Company, Col. Twahirwa Dodo, yibukije abacitse ku icumu ko urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu mu ntambara rwarangiye ariko basigaranye urwo kwiteza imbere. Mu magambo ye yagize ati “Ibyabaye byinshi muri Jenoside narabibonaga n’amaso yanjye, twahuye n’abantu benshi bafite ibikomere, abo batemye abandi tukabakura mu myobo, uyu munsi rero tugomba kugira ishyaka ryo gufata mu mugongo abarokotse m urugambo rwo kwiyubaka kuko iyi nka abonye ni umusingi uzamufasha kwiteza imbere akava mu buzima bubi n’ubwigunge yari arimo“. 
 Umuyobozi wa Jali Holding Company, Col. Twahirwa Dodo Jali Holding Company yabyawe na impuzamashyirahamwe ya za koperative zitwara abagenzi mu mujyi wa Kigali no mu Ntara izwi nka RFTC, buri mwaka bafasha abacitse ku icumu  yaba mu kububakira amazu ndetse no kubafasha mu bundi buryo bwo kubateza imbere.

title: Abana batanu b’umunyarwanda uba muri Amerika bahiriye mu nzu bose barapfa - Amafoto
article_text:
Abana batanu b’umunyarwanda uba muri Amerika bahiriye mu nzu bose barapfa - Amafoto

 
Abana batanu b’umunyarwanda Emmanuel Mugabo uba muri Leta ya Carolina y’amajyaruguru, bahiriye mu nzu bose barapfa kuwa Gatandatu tariki 12 Gicurasi 2018, ubu inshuti n’abagize uyu muryango bakaba barimo gukusanya inkunga yo gushyingura abo bana bishwe n’inkongi.
 Abana batanu b’umunyarwanda Emmanuel Mugabo uba muri Leta ya Carolina y’amajyaruguru, bahiriye mu nzu bose barapfa kuwa Gatandatu tariki 12 Gicurasi 2018, ubu inshuti n’abagize uyu muryango bakaba barimo gukusanya inkunga yo gushyingura abo bana bishwe n’inkongi. Umuryango wa Mugabo Emmanuel usanzwe utuye ahitwa Greensboro muri Carolina y’Amajyaruguru ho muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, amakuru agera ku kinyamakuru Ukwezi.com akaba ashimangira ko bahaba nk’impunzi ariko uyu mugabo akaba yaravukiye muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru. Inkongi y’umuriro yafashe inzu uyu muryango wabagamo ubwo Mugabo Emmanuel n’abana be batanu bari bari mu rugo kuwa Gatandatu tariki 12 Gicurasi 2018, mu gihe nyina w’aba bana we yari yagiye ku kazi. Abana babiri bahise bapfa ako kanya batatu bajyanwa kwa muganga barembye ariko nabo nyuma bashiramo umwuka nk’uko byaje gutangazwa n’ibitaro bya Brenner Children’s Hospital bavugirwagamo. Inkongi y’umuriro yahitanye aba bana, yahoshejwe n’abashinzwe umutekano ariko ntibabasha kuramira ubuzima bwabo Mugabo Emmanuel nawe yari yakomerekejwe n’inkongi y’umuriro ariko nyuma yo gukurikiranwa n’abaganga we ubu yamaze kuva mu bitaro bya Moses Cone Hospital kuko yamaze koroherwa mu gihe we n’umugore we bakirwana n’intimba yo kubura abana babo bose uko ari batanu. Guhera mu ntangiriro z’iki cyumweru, inshuti n’abavandimwe b’uyu muryango batangiye gushakisha uko haboneka inkunga yabafasha mu bikorwa byo gushyingura aba bana bishwe n’inkongi no gufata mu mugongo ababyeyi babo. Ku rubuga rwa GoFundMe ubu hamaze kuboneka asaga 15.000 by’amadolari, mu gihe hifuzwa asaga 50.000.

title: Ababyeyi b’inaha babura abana babo bagatuza, babura inkoko induru zikavuga - IP Hitayezu
article_text:
Ababyeyi b’inaha babura abana babo bagatuza, babura inkoko induru zikavuga - IP Hitayezu

 
Hitayezu Faustin, Komanda wa sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Mushishiro mu karere ka Muhanga, avuga ko bibabaje cyane kuba abaturage bo mu mirenge ya Mushishiro, Kibangu na Rugendabari ari nayo mirenge sitasiyo ya Polisi ayobora igenzura, bigira ntibindeba mu burere n’uburezi bw’abana babo bikagera n’aho babura abana babo bakituriza nyamara baramuka babonye ijoro rije inkoko yabo itarataha, ibintu bigacika kugeza aho bazenguruka umusozi wose babaririza.
 Hitayezu Faustin, Komanda wa sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Mushishiro mu karere ka Muhanga, avuga ko bibabaje cyane kuba abaturage bo mu mirenge ya Mushishiro, Kibangu na Rugendabari ari nayo mirenge sitasiyo ya Polisi ayobora igenzura, bigira ntibindeba mu burere n’uburezi bw’abana babo bikagera n’aho babura abana babo bakituriza nyamara baramuka babonye ijoro rije inkoko yabo itarataha, ibintu bigacika kugeza aho bazenguruka umusozi wose babaririza. Ibi uyu mupolisi yabigarutseho ubwo yari kumwe n’itsinda ry’Intumwa za Minisiteri y’Uburezi ririmo gukora ubukangurambaga bugamije kuzamura ireme ry’uburezi. Iri tsinda ririmo kuzenguruka mu bigo bitandukanye mu karere ka Muhanga, ryagiye rigaragarizwa ibibazo bitandukanye bidindiza ireme ry’uburezi. Mu mashuri yasuwe mu mirenge itandukanye y’akarere ka Muhanga, harimo aho abayobozi b’ibigo bagaragaje ko gahunda yo kugaburira ku ishuri abana bo mu cyiciro rusange cy’amashuri yisumbuye, ikomeje kudindira bitewe n’imyumvire ya bamwe mu babyeyi banga gutanga umusanzu mu burezi bw’abana babo, ugasanga abana bamwe barabwirirwa bakigana na bagenzi babo bariye ku ishuri. By’umwihariko mu murenge wa Kibangu, kuri uyu wa Kabiri hasuwe ibigo bibiri birimo G.S Kibangu na G.S Murehe B. Muri G.S Kibangu, ikibazo cy’inda z’imburagihe n’icy’abana benshi bata ishuri, biri mu byatinzweho n’izo ntumwa za MINEDUC. Muri G.S Murehe B, ho byagaragaye ko hari abana bo mu mashuri yisumbuye babwirirwa bakigana na bagenzi babo bavuye ku ishuri, ndetse naho abana bata ishuri bakaba bakiri benshi. 
 Aha IP Hitayezu yari kumwe n’intumwa za Minisiteri y’Uburezi muri G.S Kibangu Uruhare rw’ababyeyi batita ku burezi bw’abana babo kandi ntibanabakurikirane kugeza ubwo n’umwana ava mu ishuri cyangwa akarara mu gasozi ari mu ngeso mbi ababyeyi ntibabikurikirane, nibyo IP Faustin Hitayezu yahereyeho avuga ko inzego z’umutekano n’inzego z’ubuyobozi bw’ibanze, bazafatanya guhana ababyeyi bigira ntibindeba, kuko ngo abenshi usanga badashishikazwa no gukurikirana abana babyaye nyamara bagakurikirana amatungo yabo magufi, aho ngo umuturage abura inkoko ye induru zikavuga yabura umwana akituriza.

title: Intumwa za MINEDUC zababajwe n’uko abanyeshuri babwirirwa bakigana n’abagaburiwe ku ishuri
article_text:
Intumwa za MINEDUC zababajwe n’uko abanyeshuri babwirirwa bakigana n’abagaburiwe ku ishuri

 
Abagize itsinda ry’intumwa za Minisiteri y’uburezi mu karere ka Muhanga mu ntara y’Amajyepfo, bababajwe cyane no kumva ko hari ibigo usangamo umubare munini w’abanyeshuri biga muri gahunda y’uburezi bw’imyaka 9 cyangwa 12, biga nyuma ya saa sita batafashe ifunguro rya kumanywa kandi bakigana na bagenzi babo baba bagaburiwe ku ishuri.
 Abagize itsinda ry’intumwa za Minisiteri y’uburezi mu karere ka Muhanga mu ntara y’Amajyepfo, bababajwe cyane no kumva ko hari ibigo usangamo umubare munini w’abanyeshuri biga muri gahunda y’uburezi bw’imyaka 9 cyangwa 12, biga nyuma ya saa sita batafashe ifunguro rya kumanywa kandi bakigana na bagenzi babo baba bagaburiwe ku ishuri. Guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 2 Gicurasi 2018, mu turere twose tw’u Rwanda hatangiye ubukangurambaga ku ireme ry’uburezi mu mashuri, buzarangira tariki 15 Gicurasi 2018. Itsinda ririmo gukora ubukangurambaga mu karere ka Muhanga, batangajwe kandi bababazwa n’uko kimwe mu bibazo bigaragara nk’ibidindiza ireme ry’uburezi, harimo kuba abana benshi biga amasomo y’igicamunsi batariye. Iki kibazo kandi kibangamiye cyane abarimu n’abanyeshuri by’umwihariko. Ikigo cya Groupe Scolaire Gitarama giherereye mu mujyi wa Muhanga, gifite uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka 12. Abana biga mu mashuri yisumbuye ni 1084, nyamara Mukanyandwi Fausta ukiyobora avuga ko abana babasha kugaburirwa ku ishuri kumanywa basaga 400. Ikindi gice kinini cy’abanyeshuri batagaburirwa, kigizwe n’abiga nyuma ya saa sita batigeze barya, hakabamo n’abandi bacye bajya kurya iwabo abandi bagapfunyika. 
 Itsinda ry’intumwa za MINEDUC mu karere ka Muhanga, aha ni mu kigo cya G.S Gitarama Mukanyandwi Fausta avuga ko abagaburirwa ku ishuri ari abishyura amafaranga y’u Rwanda 5000 ku kwezi, hamwe na bacye bafite icyemezo cy’uko bari mu cyiciro cya mbere cy’ubudehe. Avuga ko ku bufatanye na komite z’ababyeyi, ntako batagize ngo bakangurire ababyeyi kwishyurira abana babo ariko ngo byarananiranye. Mukanyandwi Fausta ati: "Utabonye ayo mafaranga tumusaba ko yazana ibiribwa bidatetse ku kigo tukabiheraho tugaburira abana, ariko ababyeyi baratubwira ngo uwabona ibishyimbo cyangwa ibijumba azana ubwo yabona n’amafaranga. Tunabemerera kwishyura ayo mafaranga mu byiciro byinshi bishoboka ariko ababyeyi bakatugaragariza ko batishoboye. Hari uvuga ko afite abana batanu, kandi ko mu rugo iyo abashije kubona ikiro cy’ubugari bagisaranganya, ko atabona ibyo atangira buri wese ku ishuri." 
 Mukanyandwi Fausta, umuyobozi w’urwunge rw’amashuri rwa Gitarama Uyu muyobozi avuga ko gahunda ya "Nkunganire" Leta itangamo amafaranga yo gufatanya n’ababyeyi kugaburira abana, igena amafaranga 56 ku munsi kuri buri mwana. Iyo aya mafaranga yatanzwe na Leta, ngo muri iki kigo abanyeshuri boss bagaburirwa ku ishuri ku manywa mu gihe cy’iminsi 12, yashira abataratanze amafaranga bakongera bakajya babwirirwa. 
 Abagize intumwa za MINEDUC bafatanyije na Polisi n’abashinzwe uburezi mu karere no mu mirenge Iki kigo cya G.S Gitarama, nicyo kigo cyonyine gifite uburezi bw’ibanze bw’imyaka 12 mu murenge wa Nyamabuye giherereyemo. Ibi bituma abanyeshuri benshi bakora urugendo rurerure bajya ku ishuri, kuburyo bitabakundira kujya kurya iwabo kumanywa ngo basubire ku ishuri, bagahitamo kwiga amasomo y’igicamunsi bayura. Umwe mu banyeshuri twaganiriye yagaragaje agahinda ke agira ati: "Mu ishuri tuba tuziranye, abatarya turiyizi n’abarya tuba tubazi, wanasinzira mu ishuri abandi barimo kwiga bagenzi bawe bakakuvuganira mwarimu nawe akakumva akihangana. Hari n’ubwo amasomo ya nyuma ya saa sita yose arangira nta kintu numva kubera inzara, na mbere ya saa sita usanga dutangira kubitekerezaho ukibaza uti noneho inzara ndayikizwa n’iki uyu munsi? Gusa ntibakabeshye ngo ni imyumvire y’ababyeyi bacu, turi bakuru natwe ntitwakwemera ko batwicisha inzara tubona bafite ubushobozi, tuba tubona ko batishoboye." 
 Abarezi nabo bivugira ko babangamirwa cyane no kwigisha abana bazi ko abenshi muri bo babwiriwe Iki kibazo kandi cyanagaragaye mu kigo cya G.S Kivumu nacyo giherereye mu karere ka Muhanga, gusa ho imibare yagaragajwe n’ubuyobozi yerekana ko ababwirirwa bakajya mu ishuri batabonye ifunguro ari bo bacye, ariko itsinda rya MINEDUC ryagaragaje ko n’abo bacye bahangayikishije. Uwari uhagarariye Polisi mu karere ka Muhanga muri ubu bukangurambaga, yagaragaje ko kuba umwana yiga yabwiriwe bishobora kuba intandaro yo kuba abakobwa bashukwa bagaterwa inda zitateguwe, kuba hari abakwiheba bakishora mu biyobyabwenge n’ibindi bigira uruhare mu kudindiza ireme ry’uburezi, cyane ko nko muri G.S Gitarama ibi byagiye bihagaragara mu minsi yashize. 
 Uwari uhagarariye Polisi muri iki gikorwa yanenze kuba abana bamwe biga batariye. Aha yari kumwe n’ushinzwe uburezi mu karere ka Muhanga Abagize iri tsinda rya MINEDUC muri rusange bagaragaje ko bababajwe no kumva ko abana benshi biga amasomo y’igicamunsi batariye ndetse basaba ko ku bufatanye n’ababyeyi hamwe n’izindi nzego hashakwa umuti w’iki kibazo mu buryo bwihuse.

title: Menya uko watandukana no kubabara mu ngingo na za Rubagimpande zizengereza benshi
article_text:
Menya uko watandukana no kubabara mu ngingo na za Rubagimpande zizengereza benshi 

 
Abantu benshi muri iki gihe usanga bataka ububabare mu ngingo zitandukanye, ugasanga umuntu guhaguruka ndetse no kwicara ni ikibazo gikomeye. Ibi bikunze kwibasira cyane cyane abageze mu za bukuru, nyamara n’abakiri bato ntizibatinya, ni uburwayi bwagera kuri buri wese.
 Abantu benshi muri iki gihe usanga bataka ububabare mu ngingo zitandukanye, ugasanga umuntu guhaguruka ndetse no kwicara ni ikibazo gikomeye. Ibi bikunze kwibasira cyane cyane abageze mu za bukuru, nyamara n’abakiri bato ntizibatinya, ni uburwayi bwagera kuri buri wese. N’ubwo hari imiti myinshi itangwa mu kuvura izi ndwara, ndetse na siporo ikaba imwe mu miti myiza yo guhangana n’ubu burwayi, hari ibyo kurya no kunywa byagaragaye ko byifitemo ubushobozi bwo guhangana n’ubu burwayi .Muri iyi nkuru rero tugiye kurebera hamwe bimwe mu biribwa byagufasha guhangana n’ububabare mu ngingo ndetse na za Rubagimpande. 1. Amafi ya salmon: Aya mafi azwiho kuba akungahaye ku binure bya omega-3. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe n’ikigo cy’Abanyamerika cyandika ku byo kurya bivura bwagaragaje ko abantu bakunze kurya ubu bwoko bw’amafi badakoresha cyane imiti igabanya uburibwe ikanabyimbura, kubera ko bya binure bya omega-3 byakoze akazi kari gukorwa n’iyo miti. Ibi binure bigabanya uburibwe bikanabyimbura. 2. Umutobe w’amacunga:  Umutobe w’amacunga kimwe n’indi mitobe myinshi ituruka ku mbuto ni isoko nziza ya vitamin C. Iyi vitamin igira uruhare mu gukomera kw’amagufa, kandi kuyibura bigira ingaruka ku kwisana k’umubiri, amagufa n’amenyo.uyu mutobe rero ni ingenzi cyane. 3. Pome: Uru rubuto rukungahaye ku kinyabutabire cya quercetin. Iki kinyabutabire kikaba kizwiho kugabanya uburibwe no kubyimbura, ndetse pome ikora kimwe na ibuprofen cyangwa diclofenac, imiti izwiho kurwanya uburibwe no kubyimbirwa. Quercetin iboneka cyane mu gice cy’inyuma, niyo mpamvu ari byiza kuyiryana n’igishishwa. 4. Imineke : Imineke ni isoko nziza ya potassium ukaba umunyungugu wongerera amagufa gukomera; irimo kandi magnesium, ikaba izwiho guhangana n’ibibazo binyuranye by’imitsi. Iyi magnesium izwiho gutuma amagufa abamo imyunyungugu ihagije, kandi abarwayi b’imitsi baba bafite amagufa adafite imyunyungugu. Kurya imineke rero kuri bo ni ingenzi. 5. Ibinyampeke byuzuye: Iyo tuvuze impeke zuzuye tuba tuvuga za zindi zitabanje kunyuzwa mu nganda zizigira umweru. Izi mpeke rero zizwiho kurwanya kubyimbirwa kuko zibuza poroteyine yitwa C-reactive gukora, ikaba ari imwe mu mpamvu zo kurwara indwara zo kurwara imitsi. Izo mpeke twavuga ingano, ibigori, amasaka, umuceri, uburo. Hari n’ibindi byinshi bifasha mu kurwanya ububabare mu ngingo ndetse na za Rubagimpande,twavugamo nka Tofu,Tangawizi,tungurusumu,Icyinzari,…… Ese wari uzi ko hari inyunganiramirire zagufasha niba ufite ibibazo byo kubabara mu ngingo ndetse na za rubagimpande? Ni byiza gukoresha ibyo kurya kugira ngo wirinde indwara zifata mu ngingo ndetse n’ububabare,ubu rero habonetse inyunganiramirire zikoze mu bimera zivura ndetse zikanarinda kubabara mu ngingo ugatandukana na za rubagimpande ndetse no kubabara mu ngingo zitandukanye. Izi nyunganiramirire kandi zifasha abantu bafite ibibazo by’amagufa bitandukanye. Izi nyunganiramirire zirizewe ku rwego mpuzamahanga kuko zifite ubuziranenge butangwa n’ibigo bikomeye ku isi nka FDA (Food and Drug Administration).Muri izi nyunganiramirire twavugamo nka: Calcium capsules,Deep sea Fish oil Capsules (Omega-3).Kuding plus tea,Chitosan capsules,…… Twabibutsa ko izi nyunganiramirire nta ngaruka zigira ku muntu wazikoresheje. Uramutse uzikeneye, wahamagara kuri 0789433795/0726355630 cyangwa ukaba wagana Horaho Life aho ikorera kwa Rubangura muri Etage ya 3, mu muryango wa 302.Ndetse wanasura urubuga rwabo arirwo www.horahoclinic.rw.

title: Mu buryo busekeje, Abanyarwanda bihanije Radio y’Abafaransa bakoresheje Twitter - Amafoto
article_text:
Mu buryo busekeje, Abanyarwanda bihanije Radio y’Abafaransa bakoresheje Twitter - Amafoto

 
Abanyarwanda batandukanye bakoresha urubuga rwa Twitter, bagaragaje ko batishimiye amakosa yakozwe na Radio Mpuzamahanga y’Abafaransa (RFI), yakoresheje ifoto mu buryo bwo kwangiza isura y’u Rwanda n’iy’ingabo zarwo zibungabunga amahoro, maze bihaniza mu buryo busekeje ariko bugaragaza mu by’ukuri amakosa y’ubunyamwuga bucye yakozwe na RFI.
 Abanyarwanda batandukanye bakoresha urubuga rwa Twitter, bagaragaje ko batishimiye amakosa yakozwe na Radio Mpuzamahanga y’Abafaransa (RFI), yakoresheje ifoto mu buryo bwo kwangiza isura y’u Rwanda n’iy’ingabo zarwo zibungabunga amahoro, maze bihaniza mu buryo busekeje ariko bugaragaza mu by’ukuri amakosa y’ubunyamwuga bucye yakozwe na RFI. Kuwa Mbere tariki 26 Gashyantare 2018, Radio Mpuzamahanga y’Abafaransa (RFI), yafashe ifoto y’abasirikare babiri b’Abanyarwanda babungabunga amahoro muri Sudani y’Epfo, ishyirwa ku nkuru ivuga iby’ubusambanyi n’ihohoterwa rikorwa n’abapolisi bo muri Ghana, nyamara aba basirikare b’u Rwanda banambaye impuzankano igaragaraho n’ibendera ry’u Rwanda, ibintu abantu batandukanye barimo n’abayobozi bakuru b’igihugu bagaragaje ko bibabaje cyane ndetse bakagaragaza ko bimaze kuba akamenyero. Iyi niyo foto yakoreshejwe nyamara haravugwaga abapolisi bo muri Ghana Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Ubutwererane n’Umuryango w’Ibihugu bya Afurika y‘Iburasirazuba, Amb. Olivier Nduhungirehe, abigarukaho yagize ati: "RFI, abirabura bose barasa? Niko bimeze? Ubu bibaye inshuro byibuze ya gatatu, mukoresha amafoto y’abasirikare b’u Rwanda bari mu ngabo z’Umuryango w’Abibumbye zibungabunga amahoro, mukayakoresha mushaka kugaragaza ibikorwa by’ubusambanyi n’ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina byakozwe n’abandi bantu"  Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Ubutwererane n’Umuryango w’Ibihugu bya Afurika y‘Iburasirazuba, Louise Mushikiwabo, we mu magambo y’icyongereza, tugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda yagize ati: "Inyuguti ya ’I’ yo muri RFI igaragaza ikigarasha... Biyemeje gusya batanzitse iyo bageze ku Rwanda, bigaragaza ko bakora amakosa kenshi bisa n’aho ari ku bw’impanuka, igihe cyose bashaka kuganisha ku Rwanda..." Uretse aba bayobozi, hari n’abandi Banyarwanda benshi bagaragaje mu buryo busekeje, bakoresheje icyitwa Hashtag #TweetLikeRFI berekana uburyo umuntu waramuka akoresheje Twitter nk’uko RFI iyikoresha, yajya atangaza amakuru adafite aho ahuriye n’amafoto yakoreshejwe. Ibi byakuruye benshi biganjemo Abanyarwanda, bagenda batangaza amakuru menshi ari kumwe n’amafoto bitajyanye, kuburyo uretse kuba ari ukwerekana uburemere bw’amakosa yakozwe na RFI, binasetsa cyane buri wese ubisoma ari nabyo byatumye abantu benshi bakomeje gukoresha cyane iyi Hashtag.

title: Abakozi 10 b’ibitaro batawe muri yombi bakekwaho kunyereza umutungo wa miliyoni 800
article_text:
Abakozi 10 b’ibitaro batawe muri yombi bakekwaho kunyereza umutungo wa miliyoni 800

 
Abakozi 10  b’ibitaro bya Kirehe, Huye na Nyamasheke batawe muri yombi ku italiki ya 11 Gicurasi bakekwaho gukoresha nabi imitungo y’ibitaro bakoreraga.
 Abakozi 10  b’ibitaro bya Kirehe, Huye na Nyamasheke batawe muri yombi ku italiki ya 11 Gicurasi bakekwaho gukoresha nabi imitungo y’ibitaro bakoreraga. Abakekwa, barimo abahoze bayobora  cyangwa bakiyobora ibitaro, abacungamari, abashinzwe abakozi n’abagenzuzi, bakaba bakekwaho kunyereza no gukoresha  nabi agera kuri miliyoni 800 z’amafaanga y’u Rwanda. Batanu muri abo bafashwe bagikorwaho iperereza ku bitaro bya Kirehe, barimo uwahoze abiyobora,  Dr. Jean Nepomscene Uwiringiyemungu, Zophonie Gapingi Hakizimana wari ushinzwe abakozi, umucungamari witwa Mukantagara Angelique, umugenzuzi witwa Niyonzima Tadeyo ndetse n’ushinzwe imirire witwa Dukuzeyezu Diogene.v Bivugwa ko  amafaranga yaburiwe irengero ku bitaro bya Kirehe hakoreshejwe impapuro mpimbano. Ku bitaro bya Kibogora mu karere ka Nyamasheke,  abakozi batatu babyo barimo umuyobozi wabyo, Dr. Nsabimana Damien, ushinzwe ubuyobozi witwa Kadogo Aimable ndetse n’umucungamari witwa Izabiriza Bernadette, ubu bose  bafungiye kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Ruharambuga. Hagati aho kandi, ku bitaro bya Nyanza, uwahoze ari umucungamari wabyo witwa Mukamana Damarce nawe yatawe muri yombi  hamwe n’undi wahoze ari umucungamari muri ibyo bitaro witwa  Umutesi Placidie,  nyuma y’igenzura ryakozwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima kuri ibyo bitaro. Umuvugizi mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, Assistant Commissioner of Police (ACP) Celestin Twahirwa yagize ati:”Kurwanya no gukumira ibijyanye na ruswa no kunyereza ibya rubanda,  ni bimwe mu bigize akazi kacu ka buri munsi.” Yongeyeho ati:” Dukurikirana kandi tukarwanya ibyaha byose , iyo hatanzwe amakuru, biciye mu igenzura cyangwa mu bundi buryo bwose harimo n’abaduha amakuru, ko hari ufite aho ahuriye na ruswa cyangwa ibindi byaha, dutabara byihuse.” ACP Twahirwa yavuze ko kurwanya ruswa biri mu byo Polisi ishyize imbere ari nayo mpamvu yashyizeho umutwe wihariye wo kurwanya ruswa n’ibyaha bimunga umutungo . Yarangije agira ati:” Turimo gukorana n’izindi nzego zirimo izishinzwe igenzuramutungo  kugira ngo hatazagira inyereza narimwe ridakurikiranwa.”

title: Kwibuka26: Danny Vumbi na Bruce Melodie basohoye indirimbo ihumuriza Abanyarwanda bakoze kuva 2019
article_text:
Kwibuka26: Danny Vumbi na Bruce Melodie basohoye indirimbo ihumuriza Abanyarwanda bakoze kuva 2019

 
Abahanzi Danny Vumbi na Bruce Melodie basohoye indirimbo yabo nshya bise ‘Kwibuka twiyubaka’ ikaba igamije gufasha Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994.
 Abahanzi Danny Vumbi na Bruce Melodie basohoye indirimbo yabo nshya bise ‘Kwibuka twiyubaka’ ikaba igamije gufasha Abanyarwanda muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994. Mugihe nk’iki usanga abahanzi mu ngeri zitandukanye bakunze kuririmba abandi bagategura imivugo batanga ubutumwa bwo kwibuka no guhumuriza Abarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ari nako batanga ubutumwa bushishikariza buri wese kurwanya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside ngo ibyabaye mu Rwanda bitazongera ukundi. Tariki 07 Mata buri mwaka ni umunsi u Rwanda n’isi muri rusange bitangira icyumweru cyo kwibuka inzirakarengane z’Ababatutsi zazize Jenoside muri Mata 1994. Danny Vumvi na Bruce Melodie mu ndirimbo yabo bavuga ko u Rwanda rwanyuze mu mateka asharira agatera intimba mu mitima ya benshi, ariko abatakaje ababyeyi n’abavandimwe babo muri Jenoside bakaba bafite umuryango wabo ariwo ‘u Rwanda’ rubazirikana. Bati ”Twabuze abo twakundaga igihugu kitubera umuryango, kitubera ababyeyi, kitubera abavandimwe, kitubera inshuti none ubu turi u Rwanda rwisannye. Turi inkingi itanyeganyezwa duhanze amaso ejo hari imbere mu ntambwe idasubira inyuma.” Iyi ndirimbo ‘Kwibuka twiyubaka’ imara iminota 4 n’amasegonda 19 aba bahanzi bayihaye izina ry’insanganyamatsiko y’uyu mwaka ivugango ‘Twibuke twiyubaka’ ikaba ikoze mu buryo bw’amajwi n’amagambo. Iyi ndirimbo yakozwe muri 2019 ntiyashyirwa ku mugaragaro bakaba bariyemeje kuyivugurura ngo ikoreshwe muri ibi bihe byo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26. Muri uyu mwaka igikorwa cyo kwibuka cyabaye mu buryo budasanzwe aho Abaturarwanda bari kwibukira mu rugo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyatumye ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi bigagarikwa mu rwego rwo kwirinda kwanduzanya. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MH0ouG5M5LQ

title: Wizkid yatumiwe n’ umuryango wa Perezida awukorera ‘Private Concert’ yishyurwa akayabo abaturage bashonje
article_text:
Wizkid yatumiwe n’ umuryango wa Perezida awukorera ‘Private Concert’ yishyurwa akayabo abaturage bashonje

 
Wizkid, umwe mu bahanzi bakunzwe cyane muri Nigeria bari no mu batunze amafaranga menshi yatumiwe mu gitaramo kihariye n’ umuryango wa Perezida wa Cameroon Paul Biya.
 Wizkid, umwe mu bahanzi bakunzwe cyane muri Nigeria bari no mu batunze amafaranga menshi yatumiwe mu gitaramo kihariye n’ umuryango wa Perezida wa Cameroon Paul Biya. Icyatumye bimenyekana ni amafoto y’ umukobwa wa Perezida Biya ari kumwe na Wizikid wagiye ahagaragara akwirakwira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Uwo mukobwa yari yambaye akagabutura k’ ikoboyi gakufi cyane, umupira w’ ingofero w’ irosa yanisize ibirungo nyongerabwiza. Muri iki gitaramo Brenda Biya wari wagize isabukuru y’ amavuko na nyina Chantal Biya barirekuye babyinana n’ uyu musitari wo muri Nigeria barangije bamwishyura miliyoni 72 z’ ama-CFA ahanywe n’ ibihumbi 109 by’ amayero ni ukuvuga miliyoni zirenga 100 mu mafaranga y’ u Rwanda. Abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bo muri Cameroon bavuga ko ibyo uyu muryango wa Perezida wakoze ari ugusesagura mu gihe kuko ngo muri ½ cy’ abatuye Cameroon inzara iranuma. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere uyu muryango wari utumiye abahanzi ngo bawukorere igitaramo kihariye mu rugo rwa Perezida kuko Singuila yagikoreyeyo ku isabukuru ya Brenda Biya. Mbere ya  Singuila, Koffi Olomidé nawe yakoreye igitaramo muri uru rugo gusa amafaranga agenda kuri iki gitaramo kihariye kibera mu rugo rwa Perezida yari ataratangazwa.

title: Bwa mbere umunyafurika yatorewe kuba Miss w’ Isi ati ‘ubwiza bw’ abasa nanjye bwari bwarirengajijwe’
article_text:
Bwa mbere umunyafurika yatorewe kuba Miss w’ Isi ati ‘ubwiza bw’ abasa nanjye bwari bwarirengajijwe’

 
Zozibini Tunzi wari nyampinga wa Afurika y’ Epfo mu ijoro ryakeye yatorewe kuba nyampinga w’ Isi, ahita avuga ijambo rigaragaza ko ubwiza bw’ Abanyafurika bwari bumaze imyaka myinshi bwirengagizwa.
 Zozibini Tunzi wari nyampinga wa Afurika y’ Epfo mu ijoro ryakeye yatorewe kuba nyampinga w’ Isi, ahita avuga ijambo rigaragaza ko ubwiza bw’ Abanyafurika bwari bumaze imyaka myinshi bwirengagizwa. Yagize ati “Nakuriye ahantu umugore usa nanjye, ufite uruhu n’ umusatsi nk’ ibyanjye atashoboraga kubonwa ko ari mwiza. Ntekereza ko uyu munsi igihe kigeze ngo ibyo bintu bihagarare. Ndasaka ko abana bareba uburanga bwanjye bakireba mu maso mu maso bakanyibonamo”. Ababaye ibisonga bya Zozibini ni Miss wa Mexico na Miss Puerto Rico. Sofía Aragón wari uhagarariye Mexico ati "Iyo udakoresheje ubwiza bwawe mu cyerekezo kikuganisha aheza, ubwiza bwawe buba ari umutako udafite umumaro”. Madison Anderson wari uhagarariye Puerto Rico, we ati "Guhagarara ku gatuti ka Miss Universe ntabwo ari inzozi. Ni umusaruro uva mu bwitange no kudacika intege".

title: Rubavu: Ibihumbi 500, urusha abandi kuririmba azabitwara ahite akorana indirimbo na Riderman
article_text:
Rubavu: Ibihumbi 500, urusha abandi kuririmba azabitwara ahite akorana indirimbo na Riderman

 
Abahanzi bakizamuka bakorera ibikorwa byabo mu karere ka Rubavu bashyiriweho irushanwa rigamije guteza imbere umuziki wabo.
 Abahanzi bakizamuka bakorera ibikorwa byabo mu karere ka Rubavu bashyiriweho irushanwa rigamije guteza imbere umuziki wabo. Umuhanzi uzatwara iri rushanwa akazahembwa amafaranga ibihumbi 500,gukorana indirimbo n’umuhanzi Riderman ndetse no kuba ambassadeur. Umuhanzi uzaza ku mwanya wa kabiri azahabwa ibihumbi 200 000 naho  uzaza ku mwanya wa gatatu ahabwe ibihumbi 100 000. Niyigena Sano Francois uyobora umuryango witwa Easy and Possible ari nawe wateguye aya marushanwa avuga ko kiriya gikorwa ari uburyo bwo gufasha abahanzi bakiri bato bo mu karere ka Rubavu kuzamura urwego rwabobakabasha kumenyekana mu gihugu. Ati’’Umuhanzi wa mbere azajya ahembwa igihembo cy’ibihumbi Frw 500 agakorana indirimboamajwi n’amashusho n’umuhanzi Riderman uri ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda ibyo byose bakishyurwa n’ikigo kitwa Little Paris,umwaka azamara ari ambassadeur uzarangira haraho ageze kuko azajya ahuzwa n’abahanzi bakomeye bazajya baza kuririmba mu bitaramo dutegura’’. Maurice Darcourt umuyobozi wa Little Paris ari nawe muterankunga wiri rushanwa arashishikariza urubyiruko kugaragaza impano zabo zigatera imbere. Ati’’Twe gahunda dufite ni ukuzamura muzika mu karere ka Rubavu kuko dufite umushinga wo kuzana abahanzi bakomeye muri afurika bityo n’umuhanzi uzaba yatsinze iri rushanwa kuko azaba ari ambassadeur wacu azajya aririmbana nabo’’ 
 Ibisabwa ngo umuhanzi yinjire mu irushanwa Buri muhanzi wese ushaka kwinjira muri iri rushanwa agomba kuba yujuje ibi bintu bikurikira:  Kuba akorera umuziki mu karere ka Rubavu  Kuba ari umuhanzi ukizamuka  Kuba ufite indirimbo 3 z’amajwi (Recorded) Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu nibwo abahanzi uko ari 24 batangarijwe muri Little Paris ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu mu birori byari biyobowe na Mc Tino wateye imbaraga aba bahanzi abasaba kwitinyuka no guharanira gutungwa n’umuziki,hanagaragaye kandi umuhanzi Davis D. Nyuma yo kuririmba abagize akanama nkemurampaka bazajya bakuramo abahanzi babiri buri cyumweru muri buri tsinda. Mu gihe hazaba hasigaye abahanzi batandatu mu byiciro byose uko ari bitandatu, hazakorwa igitaramo kinini kizatumirwamo abahanzi bakomeye hano mu Rwanda baririmbane nabo batandatu bambere. Muri abo batandatu hazavamo abahanzi batatu hasigare batatu batsinze. Gutora bizatangira kuwa Gatanu tariki 31 Mutarama 2020. Umuhanzi uzaba uwa mbere azahembwa ibihumbi magana atanu, anahembwe gukorana indirimbo na Riderman, gusinya amasezerano na Little Paris y’ubufatanye. Umuhanzi wa kabiri azahembwa ibihumbi magama abiri y’amanyarwanda.

title: ’Muge mwubaha ababyeyi banyu’ Charly abwira abanyeshuri i Karongi
article_text:
’Muge mwubaha ababyeyi banyu’ Charly abwira abanyeshuri i Karongi

 
Abahanzi babakobwa Charly na Nina bakunzwe cyane  mu ndirimbo zitandukanye mu Rwanda batangije  ubukangurambaga bwibutsa abana babakobwa ko ejo hazaza ari ahabo  basuye abanyeshuri bo kuri Groupe Scolaire Nyamabuye iherereye mu karere ka Karongi.
 Abahanzi babakobwa Charly na Nina bakunzwe cyane  mu ndirimbo zitandukanye mu Rwanda batangije  ubukangurambaga bwibutsa abana babakobwa ko ejo hazaza ari ahabo  basuye abanyeshuri bo kuri Groupe Scolaire Nyamabuye iherereye mu karere ka Karongi. Kuri uyu wambere tariki 24 Kamena 2019 Charly na  Nina Basuye abanyeshuri bo muri Groupe Scoliare Nyamabuye iri mu Murenge wa Rubengera Akarere ka Karongi Intara y’Iburengerazuba basangiza abakobwa bagenzi babo uko bakirinda ibibarangaza bigatuma bata ishuri . Charly yasabye aba bana gukomeza kumvira ababyeyi ndetse n’abarimu yagize ati” ndabasaba gukomeza kugira ikinyabupfura kuko nicyo kizabafasha gukomeza kwiga ,kuko iyo utumvira inama za mwarimu ishuri rirakubihira ukarivamo”. Yakomeje asaba aba bana bakobwa gukomeza kumvira ababyeyi yagize ati” mujye mwubaha ababyeyi banyu cyane kuko nibo babaha amafaranga y’ishuri bajye bayabaha bishimye kandi namwe murusheho kwiga neza kugirango bishime “. 
 Charly yasabye abakobwa kwirinda ababashukisha amafaranga ahubwo abasaba gukomeza kugira ikinyabupfura  Yabibukije ko igihe cyose bakanga kumvira inama z’ababyeyi byaborohera kumva inama z’ababashuka babashukisha amafaranga n’utundi tuntu bigatuma bava mu ishuri hakiri kare wenda babateye inda bagacikiriza amasomo . Ufitamahoro Siphon Umuyobozi wa Groupe Scoliare Nyamabuye  aganira n’ikinyamakuru Ukwezi  yavuze ko yishimye cyane yagize ati ‘’n’inkunga baduhaye gushikariza abana kwirinda inda zitateguwe n’ubutumwa bwiza cyane ,hano ntago bakunda guhagarika ishuri cyane ariko bijya bibaho wenda bitewe n’ikibazo cy’amakimbirane mu muryango bigatuma abura umwitaho agahagarika ishuri ,ariko hari n’abarihagarika kumpamvu zindi “. 
 Ufitamahoro Siphon Umuyobozi wa Groupe Scoliare Nyamabuye yashimiye aba bahanzi asaba n’abandi bahanzi kwegera urubyiruko Muri iki gikorwa  b’abakobwa bagira umwanya wo kwerekana ibihangano ku nsanganyamatsiko ubukangurambaga bwibandaho n’umwanya w’ibiganiro.nyuma aba bahanzi bataramira abanyeshuri . 
 bukangurambaga mu mashuri yisumbuye bwo kurwanya icyorezo cya virusi itera SIDA, inda zitateguwe, imirire mibi ndetse n’ihohoterwa rikorerwa mu ngo 
 Abarimu nabo bari bateye ingabo mu bitugu Charly na Nina muri ubu bukangurambaga batangije  
 Abanyeshuri bari bishimiye kubona aba bahanzi bajyaga babona kuri television amaso kuyandi .

title: Gaga Daniel ukina filime ari umugome ngo yahuriye n’ umugore utwite muri super market yitura hasi
article_text:
Gaga Daniel ukina filime ari umugome ngo yahuriye n’ umugore utwite muri super market yitura hasi 

 
Abakunda kureba filime nyarwanda bazi umugabo wakinnye mu mafilime atandukanye yitwa Ryangombe, Rwasibo, Ngenzi, Nkuba n’ ayandi. Muri aya mafilime yose uyu mugabo akina ari umuntu w’ umugome, ndetse ngo binamugiraho ingaruka mu buzima busanzwe n’ ubwo ubusanzwe muri kamereye atari umugome.
 Abakunda kureba filime nyarwanda bazi umugabo wakinnye mu mafilime atandukanye yitwa Ryangombe, Rwasibo, Ngenzi, Nkuba n’ ayandi. Muri aya mafilime yose uyu mugabo akina ari umuntu w’ umugome, ndetse ngo binamugiraho ingaruka mu buzima busanzwe n’ ubwo ubusanzwe muri kamereye atari umugome. Mu buzima busanzwe uyu mugabo wandika amafilime nyarwanda, akaba umukinnyi wayo n’ umuyobozi  wayo yitwa Gaga Daniel. Ngo iyo barimo gutanga role muri filime iri gukinwa bamuha gukina ari umugome ariko ngo n’ izindi role arazishoboye. Gaga avuga ko kubera gukina filime ari umugome bituma abantu bamutinya. Ngo yigeze kujya mu isoko rya Kimironko abantu bakajya bamuhunga, aho ageze hose bamukubita amaso bakihinda. Si aha gusa ngo byanamubayeho ku Kisimenti aho yagiye muri Supermaket agahuriramo n’ umugore utwite yamukubita amaso agahita agwa hasi. Ati “Hano Kisimeti muri alimentation imwe ntari buvuge, nagiyemo ngiye guhaha nkubitana n’ umudamu wari utwite inda iri hafi kuvuka. Ambonye amanuka pole pole yicara hasi, urumva sinari kumuhumuriza, umuntu wagize ubwoba gutyo ntabwo wamuhumuriza noneho yahwera kandi urumva aratwite arakuriwe byabaye ngombwa ko nsha kuruhande ndagenda negera abashinzwe hariya ndababwira nti nimurebe uriya muntu yagize ikibazo.” Avuga ko abakora mu isoko bo yabasobanuriye ko uwo muntu ariwe yatinye. Ati “Urumva guhaha kwanjye kwarahagaze biba ngombwa ko njya guhahira ahandi mpunze umuntu umwe.” 
 Gaga avuga ko uko iminsi igenda ishira abantu bamutinya bagenda bagabanuka bakabona ko nubwo akina ari umugome mu buzima busanzwe ari umwana mwiza. Mu kiganiro Gaga yagiranye na Televiziyo ikorera kuri interinete X Large yavuze ko umwuga wa sinema ari umwuga mwiza arimo amafaranga asaba abashoramari kuwugana n’ ababyeyi bakorohereza abana bakawiga. Yagize ati “Sinema irimo amafaranga abashoramari nibaze bashoremo amafaranga kuko sinema ni ikintu kigari kitakuzura. Abana nibakunde sinema bayige ibyo kwiga birahari ushobora kuba umukinnyi, ushobora kwandika, ushobora kuyobora filime cyangwa gukamera. Ariko babanze babyige apana guhuduka ngo nabonye Ryangombe akina numva nabishora”. 
  “Ababyeyi bareke abana bage muri filime ariko babahe inama bababe hafi kuko umwana iyo ashaka ikintu ushobora kumureka akakijyamo nabi” Ntiyemeranya n’ abavuga ko filime zisobanuye zitesha agaciro filime ahubwo ngo zihumura abantu amaso zikabakundisha filime zikoze neza. Muri filime zakinwemo na Gaga zenda kujya ahagaragara harimo iyitwa 600 handred soliders , igaragaza uko abasirikare 600 babohoye abatutsi bari bahungiye muri CND. Iyi filime ishingiye ku nkuru yabayeho.

title: Aaron yavuze icyari cyamurakaje ku munsi w’ ubukwe bwe na Josée ufite ubumuga bw’ ubugufi
article_text:
Aaron yavuze icyari cyamurakaje ku munsi w’ ubukwe bwe na Josée ufite ubumuga bw’ ubugufi 

 
. Aaron ni umunyonzi wize ubwubatsi ndetse avuga ko afite impano y’ ubuhanzi
.Aaron yasobanuye impamvu k’ umunsi w’ ubukwe yari arakaye
.Aoron , na Josée na nyirabukwe bafite icyizere ko Josee azabyara nubwo byavuzwe ko afite imyaka 50.
 . Aaron ni umunyonzi wize ubwubatsi ndetse avuga ko afite impano y’ ubuhanzi
.Aaron yasobanuye impamvu k’ umunsi w’ ubukwe yari arakaye
.Aoron , na Josée na nyirabukwe bafite icyizere ko Josee azabyara nubwo byavuzwe ko afite imyaka 50. Inkuru mpamo y’ urukuko rudasanzwe rwa Ndayiteye Aaron na Mukeshimana Josée irakomeje, ibyumweru bibiri bigiye gushyira babana nk’ umugore n’ umugabo nyuma yo gusezererana imbere y’ amategeko n’ imbere y’ Imana muri ADEPR Taba, mu karere ka Huye.  Bavuga ko babanye neza bigashimangirwa n’ abaturanyi babo banabizeza gukomeza kubaba hafi. Aaron na Josée batuye ahitwa  Gahenerezo kuri metero nk’ `1 500 uvuye muri gare routiere ya Huye. Bavuga ko urukundo rwabo rwarwanyijwe n’ abo mu miryango yabo ndetse n’ inshuti ariko rugakomeza. By’ umwihariko Aaron yabwiye UKWEZI ko hari ‘umusore yabwiye ngo azamwambarire amutera utwatsi’. 

Iyi nzu niyo Aaron na Mukeshimana Josée batuyemo,barayikodesha Havuzwe ko Aaron yashatse Josée amukurikiyeho amafaranga ndetse ngo yamuhaye  miliyoni 17 gusa bombi barabihakana bakanagaragaza ibimenyetso. Aaron ati “Ijambo akunda kumbwira nkumva riranshimishije, akunda kumbwira ko ankunda, abavuga ngo namukurikiyeho amafaranga si byo kuko iyi nzu tubamo turayikodesha, iyo aba yarampaye amafaranga tuba twarubatse, tukagura n’ imodoka” Akomeza avuga ko kuba akundana n’ umugore we bitamutera isoni, kuko ngo niyo bagiye kujya ahantu amuterura akamwicaza kuri moto, akabona abantu bashungereye we akumva ntapfunwe bimuteye. Josée ati “Naramubwiye nti niba unkurukiyeho amafaranga rwose igendere nta mafaranga mfite” Ndayitegeye Aaron w’ imyaka 26 avuga ko yaryamye akabona mu iyerekwa ko Mukeshimana Josée ariwe uzamubera umugore, kuva ubwo akajya ajya kumusura ku kazi bakaganira urukundo rukavuka ubwo nyuma y’ umwaka n’ igice bagakora ubukwe. Mukeshimana Josée avuga ko afite imyaka 35 y’ amavuko gusa ngo ku irangamuntu ye nyina yaribeshye bandikisha igihe kitari cyo, niho inkuru zavuye bavuga ko afite imyaka 50. Aaron yarwaye bitunguranye k’ umunsi w’ ubukwe bwe 
 Tariki 10 Mutarama nibwo Josée na Aaron basezeranye imbere y’ amategeko, tariki 12 basezerana imbere y’ Imana. Buri buke bajya gusezerana Aaron yafashwe n’ uburwayi budasanzwe aragagara baramusengera arazanzamuka, bukeye nabwo yongera kurwara umunsi w’ ubukwe wageze. Umuhango wo gusaba no gukwa wari uteganyijwe kuba saa tatu za mugitondo ariko watangiye saa saba ku mpamvu bavuga ko zatewe nubwo burwayi. Mukeshimana avuga ko uko gukererwa kw’ imihango yo gusaba no gukwa bitamuteye ubwoba ngo abe yakeka ko bamubenze kuko ngo yari abizi ko Aaron arwaye ndetse yaraye amwiboneye. 

Mu rugo rwabo bafashanya umwe umwe yaba atetse undi akaba akora isuku mu nzu Bamwe mu batashye ubu bukwe batashye bavuga ko Aaron atari yishimiye umugore we kuko atigeze na rimwe agaragara aseka k’ umunsi w’ ubukwe bwe. Aaron ati “Kudaseka si uko ntarinishimiye umugeni wanjye ahubwo nari ndwaye .” Aba bageni bavuga ko bafite icyizere cyo kuzabyara. Josée avuga ko atabyaye yabyihanganira kuko urubyaro rutangwa n’ Imana gusa Aaron we iyo abajijwe uko yakwitwara babuze urubyaro avuga ko ‘ntacyo afite yabivugaho ngo yabona icyo abivugaho ari uko byabaye’. 

Nyirabukwe wa Josee ati ’Josee azabyara na Sara yarabyaye Nyiramucyo Seraphine, nyina wa Aron uvuga ko atigeze aca intege urukundo rw’ umuhungu wa Josée avuga ko afite icyizere ko umukazana we azabyara kuko na ngo Sara(uvugwa muri bibiliya) yabyaye afite imyaka 90. Yagize ati “Numva mfite icyizere ko azabyara kuko na Sara yabyaye afite imyaka 90” Josée na Aron bahuriza ku kuba hari inshuti na bamwe bo mu miryango yabo banze kubashyigikira mu rukundo rwabo. Mujawamariya Ancille, Umuturanyi wabo avuga ko kuba umukobwa afite ubumuga bw’ ubugufi bidakwiye kuba impamvu yo kumubuza kubana n’ uwo yakunze. 

Mujawamariya Ancille, umuturanyi Yagize ati “Urukundo ni urukundo niyo yaba acitse ukuguru ntibyababuza kubana neza. Ni ukuri Josee turamushyigikiye tuzamusura icyo azakenera tugifite tuzakimuha, ni ukuri turabifuriza urugo rwiza” Mukeshimana Josée akora muri Musée I Butare naho Ndayitegeye Aaron ni umunyonzi ariko yize ubwubatsi ndetse afite impano y’ ubuhanzi mu minsi iri imbere nabona ubushobozi azasohora indirimbo. Aaron anafite indirimbo y’ urukundo yahimbiye Mukeshimana Josée.

Koffi Olomide yakoze ku nganzo ye ahagurutsa Jammeh na Perezida Nguema

 
Yahya Jammeh, wahoze ari Perezida wa Gambia ubu uri mu buhungiro muri Guinée Equatoriale na Perezida w’ iki gihugu Theodore Obiang Nguema-Mbasogo bafashwe amashusho baceza mu gitaramo baririmbirwa na Koffi Olomide.
 Yahya Jammeh, wahoze ari Perezida wa Gambia ubu uri mu buhungiro muri Guinée Equatoriale na Perezida w’ iki gihugu Theodore Obiang Nguema-Mbasogo bafashwe amashusho baceza mu gitaramo baririmbirwa na Koffi Olomide. Byabereye mu gitaramo cyo kwishimira isozwa ry’ umwaka wa 2018 cyateguwe n’ ibiro bya Perezida wa Guinée Equatoriale bigatumira umunyabigwi Koffi Olomide n’ itsinda rimufasha gucuranga. Amashusho agaragaza Perezida Nguema na Jammeh baceza yashyizwe kuri konti ya instragram ya Koffi Olomide. Aya mashusho yerekana Perezida Nguema ahaguruka agakata umuziki , agakomeza agasanga Koffi ku rubyiniro bakawubyina, hanyuma na Jammeh akabasangayo bagafatanya. Perezida Jammeh wayoboye Gambia imyaka irenga 20 akavaho atsinzwe mu matora ya 2016, agahungira muri Guinée Equatoriale yaherukaga kugaragara mu ruhame muri Werurwe 2018. Nubwo bivugwa ko Jammeh ashobora kuzahamagazwa n’ ubutabera kubera ibyaha bya ruswa, Africanews yatangaje ko Perezida Nguema yavuze ko nibiba atazubahiriza ubwo busabe.

Mama Beni wo muri City Maid yasezeranye mu mategeko n’umukunzi we (Amafoto)

 
Uwineza Nicole uzwi ku izina rya Mama Beni muri filime ikunzwe cyane mu Rwanda y’uruhererekane ya City Maid, yasezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’umukunzi we Sebera Eric.
 Uwineza Nicole uzwi ku izina rya Mama Beni muri filime ikunzwe cyane mu Rwanda y’uruhererekane ya City Maid, yasezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’umukunzi we Sebera Eric. Aba bombi basezeranye imbere y’amategeko kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 27 Ukuboza 2018 mu muhango wabereye ku Biro by’Umurenge wa Remera mu Karere ka Gasabo. Maman Beni [Uwineza Nicole] ni umwe mu bakinnyi ba filime nyarwanda  bamaze kwigarurira imitima ya benshi bitewe n’imikinire ye muri filime ya City Maid ica kuri televiziyo y’u Rwanda. Urukundo rwa Mama Beni  na Sebera Eric rwatangiye kugaragara mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka nyuma y’uko uyu musore yari amaze  gutandukana na Saphine Kirenga yari rarambitse impeta, nawe uzwi cyane muri filimi nyarwanda. Biteganyijwe ko Sebera Eric azajya gusaba no gukwa uwo yihebeye Uwineza Nicole kuri uyu Gatandatu tariki 29 Ukuboza mu muhango uzabera i Rwamagana iwabo w’umukobwa, hanyuma basezerane imbere y’Imana bukeye bwaho ku Cyumweru tariki 30 Ukuboza 2018.

title: Rutamu na Rugimbana Théogène bamaze kuva kuri Radio bakoreraga, bagiye guhuza imbaraga
article_text:
Rutamu na Rugimbana Théogène bamaze kuva kuri Radio bakoreraga, bagiye guhuza imbaraga

 
Abanyamakuru Rugimbana Théogène na Rutamu Elie Joe bakunzwe na benshi mu Rwanda kubera ubuhanga n’impano bafite mu kogeza imikino y’umupira w’amaguru, hari amakuru yizewe agera ku kinyamakuru Ukwezi.com ashimangira ko bagiye kuva ku maradiyo bakoreraga bakajya guhuriza imbaraga ahandi.
 Abanyamakuru Rugimbana Théogène na Rutamu Elie Joe bakunzwe na benshi mu Rwanda kubera ubuhanga n’impano bafite mu kogeza imikino y’umupira w’amaguru, hari amakuru yizewe agera ku kinyamakuru Ukwezi.com ashimangira ko bagiye kuva ku maradiyo bakoreraga bakajya guhuriza imbaraga ahandi. Rutamu Elie Joe na Rugimbana Théogène, bombi bamamariye kuri Radio Flash FM, ariko baza kuhava bajya gukorera izindi Radio. Rutamu yabanje kujya ku Isango Star nyuma aza kujya kuri Radio Rwanda ari naho yari ari kugeza ubu, mu gihe Rugimbana we yakoreraga Radio 10, ariko bombi n’ubwo bataratangira gukorera ibitangazamakuru byabo bishya, bamaze gusezera ndetse mu minsi micye bakaba bitegura kubishyira ahagaragara. Kakoza Nkuriza Charles uzwi nka KNC, niwe wamaze kugirana amasezerano mashya n’aba banyamakuru b’imikino, bakaba bagomba gutangira akazi kabo kuri Radio 1 na TV1 mu minsi micye, ariko ahanini bakaba bifuzwa ngo bazogeze imikino y’igikombe cy’u Burayi kizabera mu Bufaransa guhera muri Kamena uyu mwaka. Biteganyijwe ko iyi mikino y’amakipe y’ibihangange i Burayi, izatangira tariki 10 Kamena 2016, ikazarangira tariki 10 Nyakanga 2016, KNC akaba yarifuje ko aba banyamakuru bazamufasha kogeza iyi mikino bityo nawe akarushaho kwiyongerera abakunzi no kuzamura ikigero cy’amatangazo yo kwamamaza yajyaga abona. Nyuma y’imikino y’iki gikombe, aba banyamakuru bazakomeza kongera imbaraga mu biganiro bya siporo kuri Radio 1 na TV1.

title: Abakinnyi Meddie Kagere na Migi bashobora kwangirwa gusubira muri Tanzania
article_text:
Abakinnyi Meddie Kagere na Migi bashobora kwangirwa gusubira muri Tanzania

 
Abanyarwanda babiri bakina muri shampiyona ya Tanzania, Meddie Kagere na Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste uzwi nka Miggie bamaze kubwirwa ko batazemererwa gusubira muri iki gihugu nyuma y’uko shampiyona yaho ibaye ihagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Covid-19 bakaza mu Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu.
 Abanyarwanda babiri bakina muri shampiyona ya Tanzania, Meddie Kagere na Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste uzwi nka Miggie bamaze kubwirwa ko batazemererwa gusubira muri iki gihugu nyuma y’uko shampiyona yaho ibaye ihagaritswe kubera icyorezo cya Covid-19 bakaza mu Rwanda kuri uyu wa Gatandatu. Aba bari baje mu Rwanda gufata akaruhuko no gusura imiryango yabo nyuma yo guhabwa impushya n’abaperezida b’amakipe bakinamo ubwo shampiyona yari ihagaritswe ariko umuyobozi w’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF) akaba yavuze ko batigeze bemerera abayobozi b’amakipe gutanga impushya ku bakinnyi b’abanyamahanga gutaha mu bihugu byabo kuko nta wamenya niba batazazana Coronavrus ubwo bazaba bagarutse mu gihugu. Umuyobozi w’Ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru muri Tanzania (TFF), Wellace Karia avugana n’ ikinyamakuru ‘Mwanaspoti’ cyo muri Tanzania yagize ati ”Twibukije abayobozi b’amakipe ko nta kiruhuko twatanze kuko hari amakuru numvise ko bamwe baba hari abakinnyi bagiye guha uruhushya ngo babe bisubiriye mu bhugu bakomokamo, ikintu gitandukanye na gahunda za Leta.” Yakomeje agira ati ”Nibabareka bakagenda turahita tubwira ubuyobozi ntibuzabemerere kugaruka mu gihugu no mugihe iminsi 30 twihaye izaba ishize kuo nta wamenya uko bazaba bahagaze.” Wellace Karia yakomeje avuga ko batihaye ukwezi kumwe konyine ahubwo bagomba kumara igihe kinini birinze ahubwo ko ukwezi bagufashe kugirango Covid-19 idakomeza gukwirakwira bityo ibikorwa bisanzwe bikongera bigakorwa harimo na shampiyona.


Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste Migi na Meddie Kagere babwiwe ko bashobora kutazemererwa gusubira muri Tanzania kubera gutinya Coronavirus nyuma y’uko bagarutse mu Rwanda Yavuze ko kurekura abakinnyi bakajya mu bihugu byabo hatazwi ingamba ibyo bihugu byafashe bashobora kugaruka bikarangira banduje abandi bityo ko byaba ari nko kwikinisha. Usibye Meddie Kagere ukina muri Simba SC na Migi wo muri KMC, shampiyona ya Tanzania ikinamo abandi bakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda nka Haruna Niyonzima na Sibomana Ptrick Papy ba Yanga Africans hakaba hariyo n’umutoza Thierry Hitimana utoza Namungo FC iri ku mwanya wa kane ku rutonde rw’agateganyo naho Meddie Kagere akaba ariwe rutahizamuuyoboye abandi mu bitego.


Umunyarwanda Meddie Kagere niwe mukinnyi ukunzwe n’abafana benshi muri Tanzania

Rayon Sports yagaruye Sarpong mu kibuga mu gihe igiye gukina idafite abakinnyi bayo 4 bakomeye

 
Abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bagiye kongera kubona Michael Sarpong mu kibuga mu mukino igiye gukina  w’umunsi wa 22 wa shampiyona ibura abakinnyi 4 ngenderwaho bitewe n’ibibazo by’imvune bafite. Ni umukino iraza kuba yakiramo ikipe ya Musanze FC kuri sitade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo ku isaaha ya saa 15h00’.
 Abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bagiye kongera kubona Michael Sarpong mu kibuga mu mukino igiye gukina  w’umunsi wa 22 wa shampiyona ibura abakinnyi 4 ngenderwaho bitewe n’ibibazo by’imvune bafite. Ni umukino iraza kuba yakiramo ikipe ya Musanze FC kuri sitade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo ku isaaha ya saa 15h00’. Rayon Sports imaze igihe gito isinyishije umutoza mukuru Cassa Mbungo Andre araba ari umukino wa kabiri uyu mutoza atoje dore ko yanatangiye neza ubwo yatsindiraga Etincelles FC kuri sitade Umuganda ibitego 1-2. Michale Sarpong kuva yagaruka muri Rayon Sports avuye mu gihugu cy’Ubushinwa yari atari yakina umukino n’umwe kubera ko nta myitozo ihagije yaherukaga gukora ariko ubu Cassa Mbungo Andre yongeye kumugarura kugirango amufashe kuziba icyuho cy’abakinnyi bafite ibibazo nka rutahizamu Drissa Dagnogo. Mu bakinnyi bandi iyi kipe itaraba ifite harimo Omar Sidibe utaranakinnye umukino uheruka, Bizimana Yannick na Mugheni Fabrice bombi bavunikiye i Rubavu ku mukino wa Etincelles gusa Mugheni Fabrice we yari ari no mu batemerewe gukona kuko afite amakarita atatu y’umuhondo. title: Umupfakazi w’igihangange Kobe Bryant yavuze ku rupfu rw umugabo we
article_text:
Umupfakazi w’igihangange Kobe Bryant yavuze ku rupfu rw umugabo we 

 
Vanessa Bryant kuri uyu wa Gatatu yavuze ku nshuro ya mbere ku rupfu rw’umugabo Kobe Bryant n’umukobwa we Gianna bishwe n’impanuka ya kajugujugu ati umuryango ushegeshwe burundu n’ibi byago.
 Vanessa Bryant kuri uyu wa Gatatu yavuze ku nshuro ya mbere ku rupfu rw’umugabo Kobe Bryant n’umukobwa we Gianna bishwe n’impanuka ya kajugujugu ati umuryango ushegeshwe burundu n’ibi byago. Vanessa, muri 2001 nibwo yashyingiranywe na Kobe, mu butumwa yashyize kuri Instagram yagaragaje agahinda afite atangira avuga ko yabuze amagambo abivugamo. Yanditse ati "Dushenguwe bikomeye no kubura bitunguranye umugabo wanjye Kobe –umubyeyi wari igitangaza ku bana, n’umukobwa wanjye mwiza Gianna – umukobwa wari umunyagikundiro, akaba umuhanga bitangaje ku bavandimwe be Natalia, Bianka na Capri". Ibi yabitangaje nyuma y’iminsi 3 umugabo we Bryant n’umukobwa we w’imyaka 13 bapfiriye mu mpanuka ya Sikorsky S-76 yabereye mu misozi yo mu majyaruguru ya Los Angeles. Iyi mpanuka yahitanye abandi bantu 7. Iyi kajugujugu yari igiye kuri Bryant’s Mamba Sports Academy aho Gianna yari mu bagomba gukina irushanwa rya  basketball. Vanessa yakomeje agira ati “Sinabona amagambo asobanura agahinda mfite aka kanya”. Yahise ahindura ifoto ye kuri instagram ashyiraho iya Bryant na Gianna ati “Nkomezwa ni uko namenye ko mujyanye mwakundanaga. Twari twagize umugisha wo kubana namwe, twizera ko tuzabana iteka ariko mudukuwemo hakiri kare”. Vanessa na Kobe Bryant bahuye bwa mbere ubwo Vanessa yari afite imyaka 17, icyo gihe hari mu ifatwa ry’amashusho yamurikiyemo imideli yiga mu mashuri yisumbuye. Basezeranye gushinga urugo muri 2001, bashyingiranwa nyuma y’amezi yakurikiyeho. Bari bafitanye abana bane, Natalia w’imyaka 17 , Giana wari ufite imyaka 13, na Bianka w’imyaka 3 na Capri w’amezi 7. Ababyeyi ba Kobe ntabwo bamutahiye ubukwe kuko yashyingiranywe n’umunyamerika w’umuzungu aho gushyingiranwa n’ umunyafurika uba muri Amerika. Muri 2003, Kobe yashyinjwe gusambanyiriza umukobwa w’imyaka 19 muri hoteli, mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru Vanessa yicaye iruhande rwa Bryant Kobe mu rwego rwo guhamya ko bakundana. Bryant Kobe ni icyamamare mu mukino w’intoki wa Basketball muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika izwi nka ‘NBA’. Yitabye Imana kuri iki cyumweru aguye mu mpanuka y‘indege yafashwe n’inkongi y’umuriro ubwo yari igeze mu gace ka Calabasas mu mujyi wa Los Angeles.

Kigali: Abagore batwite bakoze siporo yabo y’ umwihariko [AMAFOTO] 

 
Abagore barenga 100 bitabiriye siporo y’ umwihariko yagenewe abagore batwite bavuga ko iyi siporo yabashimishije cyane. Dr Nyirinkwaya avuga ko iyi siporo ari ngombwa ku mugore wese utwite.
 Abagore barenga 100 bitabiriye siporo y’ umwihariko yagenewe abagore batwite bavuga ko iyi siporo yabashimishije cyane. Dr Nyirinkwaya avuga ko iyi siporo ari ngombwa ku mugore wese utwite. Iyi siporo yabereye mu mugi wa Kigali yateguwe n’ umuryango utegamiye kuri leta witwa "Children and Youth Organisation". Umuyobozi w’ uyu muryango Mukasa Nelson avuga ko abagore batwite bakeneye kumenya ko nabo bagomba gukora siporo. Agira ati “Ntibakwiye kumva ko bagomba kwicara amezi icyenda...akajya ku kazi akicara yarangiza akajya mu rugo akicara, bigira ingaruka nyinshi kuri we na wa mwana uri mu nda ntabwo aba ameze neza". Mukasa wakoresheje aba bagore siporo avuga ko hari abagore benshi ndetse n’abagabo bumva ko umugore agitwita atagomba gukora siporo. Dr Jean Nyirinkwaya, umuganga w’indwara z’abagore mu mujyi wa Kigali avuga ko ahubwo gukora siporo abisaba abagore bose batwite akurikirana. Ati "Umubyeyi utwite ntagomba kumva ko abaye indembe, oya. Agomba gukora imyitozo nko kugenda n’amaguru, kurambura umubiri, koga, kuko nta ngaruka zigira". Uwizeyimana Libérée atwite inda y’amezi umunani, yari amaze gukora urugendo no kurambura umubiri hamwe n’abandi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ndananiwe cyane kuko ntabwo nari nsanzwe ngenda urugendo rungana gutya ariko byamfashije no gukorana n’abandi,ni ibintu byiza". Mukasa avuga ko hariho imyumvire ko umugore utwite umubiri we uba ntacyo ushoboye, ibi ngo bigatuma nawe ashobora kubyumva gutyo kandi bikamugiraho ingaruka. Ati: " Twasanze rero nubwo yaba atwite akwiye kugira ubwisanzure kandi akumva ko ashoboye nk’abandi. Abagabo nabo bakwiye guhindura imyumvire ku mugore utwite". Mukasa avuga ko imyitozo babakoresha yoroheje kandi nta ngaruka igira yaba ku utwite inda ntoya cyane cyangwa ifite inda nkuru.

title: Abafatabuguzi ba StarTimes bagiye kuryoherwa n’imikino ya UEFA Europa League
article_text:
Abafatabuguzi ba StarTimes bagiye kuryoherwa n’imikino ya UEFA Europa League

 
Abakoresha ifatabuguzi rya StarTimes, bagiye kwirebera mu buryo bwa Live imikino ya UEFA Europa League izatangira mu matsinda kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Nzeri 2019, amakipe akomeye nka Manchester United,  Arsenal, Porto, Borussia Mönchengladbach na Lazio akaba azahatanira umwanya wo gukomeza mu cyiciro kizakurikiraho.
 Abakoresha ifatabuguzi rya StarTimes, bagiye kwirebera mu buryo bwa Live imikino ya UEFA Europa League izatangira mu matsinda kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Nzeri 2019, amakipe akomeye nka Manchester United,  Arsenal, Porto, Borussia Mönchengladbach na Lazio akaba azahatanira umwanya wo gukomeza mu cyiciro kizakurikiraho. Mu mikino ikomeye iteganyijwe, harimo nk’uwo ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza izacakiranamo na Eintracht Frankfurt yo mu Budage, Arsenal ikaba ifite akazi ko kongera gushimangira ko ihagaze neza n’ubwo umwaka ushize w’imikino yageze ku mukino wa nyuma w’iki gikombe ariko ntibashe kucyegukana. Ikipe Manchester United yatwaye iki gikombe muri 2017 nayo izaba isabwa kongera kugarurira icyizera abakunzi bayo, umukino wayo wa mbere ikaba izakina n’ikipe ya Astana no muri Kazakhstan. Andi makipe nka Seville, AS Roma, CSK Moscow, Porto, Standard Liege, Celtic, Dynamo Kiev n’andi atandukanye azaba ahatana mu matsinda yayo, ashakisha itike izayerekeza mu cyiciro gikurikiyeho kizagerwamo n’abazaba bitwaye neza muri aya matsinda.

title: Umuherwe yasezeranyije Nigeria akayabo kuri buri gitego izatsinda Algeria
article_text:
Umuherwe yasezeranyije Nigeria akayabo kuri buri gitego izatsinda Algeria

 
Williams Ekong yishimira igitego yatsinze Afurika y’ Epfo ku munota wa nyuma agahesha Nigeria itike yerekeza muri 1/2
Ikipe y’ igihugu ya Nigeria ‘Super Eagles’ Dangote yayisezeranyije ibihumbi 50 by’ amadorali y’ Amerika kuri buri gitego izatsinda Algeria.
 Williams Ekong yishimira igitego yatsinze Afurika y’ Epfo ku munota wa nyuma agahesha Nigeria itike yerekeza muri 1/2 Ikipe y’ igihugu ya Nigeria ‘Super Eagles’ Dangote yayisezeranyije ibihumbi 50 by’ amadorali y’ Amerika kuri buri gitego izatsinda Algeria. Ni nyuma y’ uko iyi kipe ikatishije itike ya kimwe cya kabiri cy’ igikombe cy’ Afurika cy’ ibihugu mu mukino yatsinzemo Afurika y’ Epfo ibitego 2-1. Aya madorali Umuhererwe Aliko Dangote yemereye Super Eagles aje yiyongera ku yo iyi kipe yemerewe n’ undi muherwe wo muri Nigeria witwa Femi Otedola. Otedola yemereye ikipe ya Nigeria ibihumbi 25 ngo itsinde Desert Foxes ya Algeria muri kimwe cya 2. Uyu mukino uteganyijwe tariki 14 Nyakanga 2019, muri sitade mpuzamahanga ya Cairo, mu gihugu cya Misiri ahari kubera iri rushanwa. Iyi sitade yakira abantu ibihumbi 75. 

Umuherwe Aliko Dangote yategeye ikipe ya Nigeria ibihumbi 50 by’ amadorali kuri buri gitego izatsinda Algeria Amakipe ane asigaye muri iri rushanwa ni Senegal (Teranga lions), Nigeria (Super Eagles), Algeria (The Foxes) na Tunisia (Carthage Eagles). Uko amakipe azahura demi finale  Nigeria izahura na Algeria ku Cyumwery tariki 14 Nyakanga 2019.
Senegal ihure na Tunisia , ku Cyumweru tariki 14 Nyakanga 2019
Izatsinzwe zihatanira umwanya wa 3 tariki 17 Nyakanga 2019 naho izizatsinda rizahurira ku mukino wa nyuma 19 Nyakanga 2019

Abafana ba Arsenal mu Rwanda bahaye inzu abasaza n’abakecuru barokotse Jenoside batunganya ibihumyo

 
Abafana ba Arsenal mu Rwanda bahaye inzu  abasaza n’abakecuru basigajwe iheruruheru na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 batuye mu murenge wa Kinyinya .
 Abafana ba Arsenal mu Rwanda bahaye inzu  abasaza n’abakecuru basigajwe iheruruheru na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994 batuye mu murenge wa Kinyinya . Kuri uyu wa gatandatu tariki 6 Nyakanga 2019 abafana ba Arsenal baba muri fans club yitwa RAFC(Rwanda Arsenal  fans club ) bahaye inzu abasaza n’abakecuru   batuye mu murenge wa Kinyinya Akarere ka Gasabo bibumbiye muri koperative yitwa twiyubake kinyinya . Iyi koperative igizwe n’abakecuru n’abasaza bacitse ku icumu batuye mu murenge wa Kinyinya akagari ka Gasharu batuye mu mudugudu w’abacitse ku icumu . Sezibera John uyobora iyi koperative twiyubake Kinyinya avuga ko mbere inzu bakoreragamo yasenyutse bamara hafi imyaka 2 badakora  ubu bakaba bishimira iyi nzu shya bahawe yagize ati” inzu yacu yambere yarasenyutse twari tumaze imyaka 2 nta nzu dufite yo gukoreramo twarahagaze  ,ariko ubu tugiye kongera gukora neza kuko twari mu bibazo  ntakintu dufite ‘’. Sezebera avuga ko ubu iyi nzu shya bahawe ishobora kujyamo imigina y’ibihumyo  ihumbi 5000 ndetse ubu bakaba bafite imigina 7600  bahawe kandi avuga ko ibibazo byakemutse  ngo bagiye kujya basarura neza bagurishe ,avuga ko bo bagura imigina ikoze kuko batazi kuyikorera bakayitunganya mbere yo kuyigurisha  . 
 Abafana ba Arsenal bahaye ab bakecuru n’abasaza nyuma y’imyaka 2 bari bamaze badafite aho bakorera . Apolo Munanura umuyobozi wa Rwanda Arsenal fans club avuga ko iki ari  igikorwa ngarukamwaka kuko bamaze imyaka 5 bakora ibi bikorwa yagize ati”  iki gikorwa ni igikorwa dukora ngaruka mwaka kuri twe twumva ari inshingano gufasha abatishoboye muri uyu mwaka wa 2019 twahisemo kubaka inzu tuyubakira aba bakecuru n’abasaza inzu yabo yari yarasenyutse  twabubakiye rero inzu tuzabaha n’imigina 1500 ,ubundi iyo dukoze igikorwa nk’iki abo  tugikoreye baba babaye abanyamuryango bacu nabo”. Munanura akomeza avuga ko bazatunganya neza iyi nzu bashyiraho imiferege ndetse n’imireko ndetse babegereze n’amazi hafi yabo,avuga kandi ko bazanabaha indi migina 1500 kugirago bajye basarura iyi migina buri munsi . 
 Munanura Apolo uyobora Rwanda Arsenal fan club avuga ko iki ari igkorwa iyi fan club ikora buri mwaka  Iyi koperative twiyubake Kinyinya igizwe n’abasaza n’abakecuru 28 ikaba yaratangiye muri 2012 bagura imigina y’ibihumyo bakayitunganya mbereyo kuyijyana ku isoko . Rwanda Arsenal fan club igizwe n’abanyamuryango 1200 baba hirya no hino mu gihugu buri mwaka bafasha abacitse ku icumu mubikorwa bitandukanye . 
 Abagize iyi koperative bagura imigina y’ibihumyo bakayitunganya ikavamo ibihumyo mbere yo kuyigurisha.  
 Abakecuru n’abasaza bagize iyi koperative ibyishimo byari byose nyuma yo kongera kubona inzu  
 Iyi nzu bahawe ifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira  imigina y’ibihumyo ibihumyo 5000 biteganyijwe ko izashyirwaho imireko ndetse n’imiferege  . 
 
 Iyi ni migina y’ibihumyo mbere yuko itunganwa ngo ibone gucuruzwa
