title: Inkomoko y’insigamugani “Bamuterereye ku wa Kajwiga”
article_text:
Inkomoko y’insigamugani “Bamuterereye ku wa Kajwiga”

 Uyu mugani bawuca iyo babonye umuntu ufashe undi akamuniga akamunegekaza; ni bwo bagira bati "naka bamutereye ku wa Kajwiga". Wakomotse kuri Kajwiga k’I Munyiga mu Buganza(Kibungo), kuri ubu ni mu Karere ka Rwamagana, Intara y’u Burasirazuba; byabayeho ahasaga umwaka w’i 1700. Kajwiga uwo yabyirutse ku ngoma ya Kigeli Ndabarasa, abyirukana ubuhanga bwo gukirana; arusha abandi bose bo mu karere k’u Buganza n’u Rukaryi n’u Bwanacyambwe. Amaze kuba icyamamare mu Buganza n’ahandi, abasore b’i Mukarange basaba umwami Ndabarasa ngo bazarushanwe gukirana , Ndabarasa ntiyatindiganya , aramutmiza araza. Amubwira ko amutumiriye gukirana n’abasore b’I Mukarange. Kajwiga abyumvise araseka kuko yabonaga ko nta wamuhangara; ati`` Wenda bazaze bose uko batuye I Mukarange’’. Nuko bararikira abasore b’i Mukarange kwitegura kurushanwa na Kajwiga. Igihe kigeze basesekara ibwami. Ndabarasa ati: ”Nimuhogi tujye ku karubanda aho abantu bose babarora”. Baragenda no ku karubanda. Bahageze ruranzikana; umusore w’I Mukarange batoranije mu bandi agisumirana na Kajwiga, Kajwiga aramwesa. Hakurikiyeho undi Kajwiga amukubita aramuvuna. Abandi basore b’I Mukarange babibonye baratinya bareguka. Kajwiga atsinda atyo. Amaze gutsinda abasore b’i Mukarange noneho aba ikimenamutwe mu gihugu , bituma abyimbamo ikuzo ry’urugomo; umusore wese bahuye akamuhata ngo bakirane, yabyanga, Kajwiga akamufata ku gituna (ku ngufu) akamukubita. Akomeza kubigira atyo, bukeye abantu bakuru bajya kumuregera Ndabarasa, bati “ Kajwiga yacuye ibintu mu gihugu; umusore bahuye wese arakubita”. Mbese baramuvuga bagerekaho no kumuhimbira, bati “ Ndetse uretse n’abasore , n’umusaza n’umukecuru bahuye arakubita, avuga ko u Rwanda rwose abarusha amaboko’’. Ndabarasa atumiza Kajwiga aramuhana, amubuza kugira urugomo rungana rutyo. Undi arataha, ariko ntiyacogora ku rugomo rwe. Nuko abasore bo muri utwo turere babibonye batyo, bajya inama yo kuzihanira Kajwiga ; bukeye bamutegera ku ibuga bashoye inka, bamwiyenzaho baramutuka. Bamututse ararakara abasatira yariye Karungu yuzuye agasuzuguro.Bashoka bamusumira bati “ Ntihagire umukubita ,mureke tumunige gusa”. Bamutura hasi baramunigagura , abakuru bari aho barabitarura barebera ayo bamugirira. Urufuzi rumaze kumurenga, atangiye no guta ibitabapfu, abakuru bamubavuvunura mu nzara yashegeshwe. Bajya kumwondora, amaze gukira acukira aho ntiyongera uwo agirira urugomo. Ni aho hakomotse urwiganwa, babona abantu bafashe undi bakarwana bakamuniga bakiyamirira bati ‘’Noneho naka bamutereye ku wa Kajwiga’’ nkuko abasore b’i Mukarange batereye Kajwiga ku munigo. title: Inkomoko y’insigamigani: Kugenda nk’Abagesera
article_text:
Inkomoko y’insigamigani: Kugenda nk’Abagesera

 Uyu mugani bawuca iyo babonye umuntu uvuye mu bo bari kumwe akanyonyomba adasezeye ni bwo bavuga ngo naka agenda nk’abagesera. Wakomotse ku munyabugesera witwaga Muganza wiyahuye muri Cyohoha, i Bugesera (ubu ni mu Karere ka Bugesera) ahayinga umwaka w’i 1400. Umwami Cyilima Rugwe amaze gucyura umugore wa Nsoro Bihembe witwaga Nyanguge nyina wa Kigeli Mukobanya ari bwo mu Rwanda bahimbye  umugani uvuga ngo ``Umwami uraguza yatsinze uraguza’’ bavuga ko Nsoro yahugiye mu gisoro na we Rugwe agahora araguriza gutsinda u Bugesera). Nsoro umwami w’u Bugesera yari afite umugaragu we w’umutoni akitwa Muganza . Bukeye u Rwanda rumaze gutsinda u Bugesera , Muganza aracika acikira I Burundi. Ahageze bamufata nabi ajya I Karagwe. Agezey o bamufata nabi nk’I Burundi na ho arahava. Mu nzira agenda, ngo aribaza ati 11mbigenje nte?’’ ko ninjya mu Rwanda bazanyica kuko nari umutoni wa Nsoro!Apfa  kwihangana asubira I Bugesera agezeyo ahasanga umunyarwanda wahagabanye witwaga Gasigwa, akoma yombi  ati11nyagasani mutware w’I Bugesera nje kugukeza uzandeme amaboko n’amaguru. Nuko Gasigwa aramwemerera, Muganza agumya kumuhakwaho kugeza igihe amugabiriye inka eshatu z’umuriro . Amaze kuzibona yongera kwibaza ati``Ubu ko ngiye guhakwa ibututsi kandi nari umugaragu w’ibwami bizamera bite?. Ubwo yavugaga ko yari umugaragu wa Nsoro. Yegera Gasigwa aramubwira ati`` naragushimye ko wampaye inka y’umuriro, none ndagusaba ko uzansohoza no kuri Cyilima. Gasigwa abaza Muganza ati " Ese wabonye ko njye naguhatse nabi?Muganza ati``icyo mbigusabira ni uko wamungezaho nkishingana, kuko mu Bugesera bampiga bavuga ngo ko nari umutoni wa Nsoro. Gasigwa ati``nzamugushyikiriza ". Bukeye basanga Cyilima i Kigali. Bagezeyo, Gasigwa abwira Cyilima ati " Nkuzaniye Muganza uyu wahozeari umutoni wa Nsoro yansabye kumukuzanira ngo mwibonanire  ngo hari icyo ashaka kukubwira " . Bahamagaza Muganza , Gasigwa aramusohoza ati " Nguyu Muganza wansabye ko nzamukugezaho ukamushingana mu Bugesera kuko bamwanga bamuhora ko yari umutoni  wa Nsoro ". Rugwe yumvise ko Muganza yari umutoni wa Nsoro biramushimisha kuko namuhaka akamutonesha azamuyoborera u Bugesera. Yari azi imico yabwo. Cyilima abwira Gasigwa ati " Taha na we Gasigwa turamugumanye ". Gasigwa asubira mu Bugesera, Muganza asigara i Kigalikwa Cyilima Rugwe. Arahakwaubuhake buranoga, Rugwe aramutonesha kugirango azamuyoborere u Bugesera. Haciyeho iminsi Cyilima atumizaho Gasigwa ngo aze amwitabe. Gasigwa araza n’i Kigali , Rugwe ati``nshakira inka ijana n’imisozi ijana ubimpere Muganza.Gasigwa ati " Ni byo gupfa nzajya kubimuha’’ Rugwe ati``bizapfa ubusa bite?’’. Gasigwa ati nuko wabinyaze Nsoro none ukaba ubisubije mwene wabo’’. Ibyo Gasigwa yabivugishijwe n’ishyari kuko yari yabonye Rugwe atonesha Muganza . Cyilima abwira Gasigwa ati``ntacyo bitwaye nzaba mbyirebera " . Ubwo Muganza abona inka n’imisozi akomeza n’ubutoni bwe . Gasigwa abonye atonnye Muganza atonnye cyane ishyari riramushengura akeka ko bazamugabira n’ibyo arimo. Nuko kuva ubwo, Gasigwa agandisha ya misozi Muganza yagabanye. Muganza yatumiza ingemu akazibura.Bukeye inzara imaze kumurembya n’abo bari kumwe, Gasigwa yoshya bagenzi ben’abagaragu ba Cyilima ngo bazabwire Muganza bamukangisha ko Cyilima agiye kumutanga akamukurikiza Nsoro. Muganza amaze kubyumva ashya ubwoba n’abo bari kumwe . Ni ko gucika ijoro ryose ajya kwiyahura muri Cyohoha.. Bukeye muri iyo minsi , Cyilima abaza abo bari kumwe ati``ko ntakibona Muganza aba he?Abandi bati ``YARATASHYE’’. Cyilima ati ``agataha atamennye? Abandi bati ``ni ko Abagesera bagenda’’. Ni yo nkomokoy’iyo babonye umuntu unyonyombye adasezeye bavuga ngo ``Agiye nk’Abagesra’’!Byaturutse kuri Muganza uwo bateye ubwoba akagenda adasezeye akiyahura muri Cyohoha. title: Miss Rwanda 2018: Bakamiye mu kadobo ka ‘Omo’, abantu bagwa mu kantu
article_text:
Miss Rwanda 2018: Bakamiye mu kadobo ka ‘Omo’, abantu bagwa mu kantu

 Abakobwa bari mu mwiherero bazatoranywamo uzambikwa ikamba rya nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2018 bakamiye mu kadobo kavamo  ‘Omo’ , biba ikiganiro ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, abenshi bagwa mu kantu. Abakobwa 20 nibo bari mu mwiherero ubategura kuzahatana tariki 24 Gashyantare 2018. Umwiherero bari kuwukorera muri Hotel Golden Tulip mu Bugesera. Mu mwiherero bahererwamo inyigisho zizibanda ahanini ku muco, ubumenyi bw’Isi, amateka y’u Rwanda, ubukungu, kwihangira imirimo, kumenya guhanga udushya n’ibindi bitandukanye. Kuri iki cyumweru tariki 28 Gashyantare 2018, nibwo abategura irushanwa banyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga amafoto agaragaza abo bakobwa  bagaragaza ubuhanga bafite mu gukama inka. Icyatunguye benshi ni uko abo bakobwa bakamiraga mu tudobo tuvamo isabuni ya ‘Omo’ aho gukamira mu cyansi nkuko bisanzwe mu muco nyarwanda. Benshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga babinenze, bibaza niba koko abo bakobwa bigishwa ibijyanye n’umuco mu gihe bigishirizwa gukamira mu tudobo tuvamo isabuni. Ubusanzwe irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda ritegurwa na Rwanda Inspiration Back up ariko ikanafatanya n’ Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC) . RALC ninayo itanga isoko ry’abapiganirwa gutegura iryo rushanwa. Icyibazwaga na benshi ni uruhare RALC yaba igira mu gutegura irushanwa ariko ibyigirwamo bikaba bihabanye n’umuco nyarwanda. Mu gotaranya abakobwa 35 bari guhagararira Intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali mu majonjora y’ibanze ninaho umwe mu bakobwa yavugiye ko Inka z’inyambo zigira amaboko aho kuvuga amahembe. Ubwo abategura iri rushanwa bajyaga i Kayonza gushakisha abakobwa bazahagararira intara y’Iburasirazuba mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2018 umwe mu bakobwa bahiyamamarije witwa Irebe Natacha yavuze ko iwabo ari Iburasirazuba i Buganza iwabo w’Igaju n’Inyambo. Akivuga gutya byateye abari bagize akanama nkemurampaka bakusabye gusobanura no gutandukanya ibyo yari amaze kuvuga. Ashaka gutandukanya Igaju n’inyambo Irebe Natacha yagize ati " Inyambo ni za nka zimwe zifite amaboko…" Akimara kuvuga gutya abagize akanama nkemurampaka bamwibukije ko ari amahembe nawe yungamo avuga ko ari amahembe. Tariki 24 Gashyantare 2018 nibwo hazaba ibirori byo gutora umukobwa uzaba wahize abandi . Bizabera muri Kigali Convention Centre. Uzegukana ikamba azahita anahabwa imodoka Suzuki Baleno ifite agaciro ka Miliyoni 18.

title: Inkomoko y’imvugo ’Si we kamara’
article_text:
Inkomoko y’imvugo ’Si we kamara’

 Uyu mugani bawuca iyo babonye umuntu wangirira gukora ibyo abandi bashobora. Ni bwo bagira bati “Si we kamara, nimumwihorere abandi bazarukemura.” Wakomotse ku mugaragu wa Muvunyi wa Karema witwaga Kamara, mu ipfa ry’Ibisumizi bya Ruganzu, mu mwaka wa 1500. Kamara uwo yabayeho ku Ngoma ya Ruganzu Ndori, yari umugaragu wa Muvunyi wa Karema (akaremajwe n’ibyuma wari intwari mu Bisumizi). Yabyirukanye nabyo, ibitero Ruganzu yateje byose, na we yabitabayemo, yari intwari nka shebuja. Nuko mu gitero cya nyuma cya Ruganzu cyo mu Musaho wa Rubengera ari cyo yaguyemo yishwe na Bitibibisi, umurambo we uhekwa n’Ibisumizi, bagenda babwira rubanda ko Ruganzu aberanye (arwaye), ntibababwire ko yatanze. Bamujyana iwe ku Mwugariro (Kigeme-Gikongoro). Bamutungukanye ku munyanzoga we Rusenge, na we bamubwira ko Ruganzu arwaye. Rusenge abaha inzoga baranywa, bamaze gusinda havamo umwe mu Bisumizi abwira Rusenge ko Ruganzu yatanze. Rusenge yumvise ko Shebuja yapfuye, agwa mu kantu ,biramubabaza cyane aca munsi y’urugo, hari igiti cy’umuvumu akimanikamo arapfa. Ibisumizi bigumya kumutegereza baramubura. Bamwe bararyama abandi basigara baraririye umurambo wa Ruganzu. Mu gitondo babona Rusenge aho yimanitse. Bahera ko biremerwa (bikorera) umugogo wa Ruganzu bawujyana i Butangampundu, barawutabaza (barawuhamba). Bamaze kuwutabaza bashyira nzira, bataha ku Ruyenzi. Mu gitondo bafashamo, bataha mu Ruhango rwa Mutakara na Nyamagana, bukeye bahava ku gasusuruko. Ubwo bajyaga kwa Ruganzu i Ruhashya, bageze mu Butansinda bwa Kigoma na Muyange bahura n’ingemu kwa Ruganzu babagemuriye ; Baricara baranywa. Bamaze gusinda havamo umwe ati « Kandi ba sha, burya Rusenge aturusha ubugabo ! » Abandi bati “Kuki?” ati “Kuko twabyirukanye na Ruganzu tukiri bato, akaduhaka, akaduha inka n’imisozi tugakira, none uwo yahaye inzoga akaba ari we wamwiyahuriye tugasigara!” Ubwo bose batera hejuru bati “Koko Rusenge aturusha ubugabo!” Nuko bamaze kubyishyiramo, bajya inama y’uko babigenza, bati “Reka twicemo amatsinda abiri, rimwe rihagarare hakurya hariya i Kigoma, irindi rigume hano i Muyange, maze tujye duhurira muri iki gikombe, turwane twicane dushire.” Inama barayinoza banywa za nzoga hutihuti, bazimaze barambara, bararwana. Bageza hagati bagahagarara, itsinda rimaze gushogosha rikivanga n’irisigayemo benshi, bakongera bakitoranya bakarwana, bityo bityo, ku ndunduro, abarimo Muvunyi na Kamara bica abo mu itsinda bahanganye barabamara hasigara igice cyabo gusa. Nabwo barongera bicamo ibindi bice bibiri, na none ikirimo Muvunyi na Kamara kimara ikindi. Bongera kwicamo kabiri, birongera biba gutyo. Noneho haza gusigara Muvunyi na Kamara bombi basa. Muvunyi abwira Kamara ati “Ubu ngiye kwiyahura maze unsonge, nurangiza utahe ujye kutubika!” Ubwo ariyahura. Kamara abonye shebuja apfuye amaze no kumusonga, yanga kugenda asize intumbi za ba shebuja zandagaye aho, asanga birimo ububwa. Nuko akoranya intumbi zose azihamba mu myobo y’inyaga yari aho, amaze kuzihamba na we ariyahura, amaze gusaba umwe mu batwa b’insigarizi ku musonga. Uwo mutwa na we amaze gusonga Kamara na we ariyahura, Ibisumizi bishira gutyo. Ruganzu abikwa n’indorerezi zaje zigemuye. Kuva ubwo rero uwo murimo w’ubutwari Kamara yakoze umubyarira ishimwe ryamamara mu Rwanda, babona umuntu wangiriye gukora ikintu, bati “Nakireke si we Kamara!” Ubwo baba bafatiye kuri Kamara umugaragu wa Muvunyi wahambye Ibisumizi byose wenyine. Ibi tubikesha igitabo Ibirari by’insigamigani, igitabo cya mbere cy’icapiro ry’Ingoro y’Umurage w’u Rwanda.

title: Inkomoko y’imvugo ’Nyir’amaguru yirukiye nyir’umugisha’
article_text:
Inkomoko y’imvugo ’Nyir’amaguru yirukiye nyir’umugisha’

 Uyu mugani bawuca iyo babonye umuntu wiremyemo amahate ahirimbana ubudahwema, ibintu byamara gutengamara hakagororerwa undi, utarushye nka we ; ni bwo bavuga ngo ’Nyir’amaguru yirukiye Nyir’umugisha’. Wakomotse kuri Kibibi na Ruzigana, bari abagaragu ba Mukobanya, ahayinga umwaka w’i 1400. Ku ngoma ya Cyilima Rugwe, hadutse umugabo w’umugoyi witwa Mulinda, agaba ingabo ze zitera u Rwanda, ubwo yashakaga kurwigarurira. Anesha Kabagali n’ Amarangara n’i Nduga, acumbika mu Mizi ya Kabare munsi ya Kamonyi. Atuma kuri Cyilima, ati : "Muhe umukobwa wawe Nyabarondo, n’inka yawe Munono n’ingoma yawe Cyimumugizi mubone gukiranuka !" Rubanda rumaze kumva ubwo butumwa, beguka kuri Rugwe asigara wenyine ; ni bwo agiye kwihisha mu gisura cyari mu ibanga rya Kamonyi, akimaramo iminsi. Cyilima Rugwe amaze gusumbirizwa, atuma ku muhungu we Mukobanya wari i Bumbogo bwa Mbirima, ati "U Rwanda rwatsinzwe ; rwatsinzwe na Mulinda w’Umugoyi ; yanesheje Kabagali, Marangara, Nduga na Rukoma none acumbitse mu Mizi ya Kabare ku Kamonyi, ati kandi yantumyeho amananiza, ambwira ngo mwoherereze inka yanjye Munono, n’ingoma yanjye Cyimumugizi, n’umukobwa wanjye Nyabarondo, ati none abigenze ate ?" Intumwa ya Rugwe iragenda ibwira Mukobanya ubutumwa. Mukobanya ariyumvira, asubiza iyo ntumwa, ati genda umumbwirire uti "Tanga Nyabarondo ni umukwobwa wawe, utange na Munono warayoroye ; naho Cyimumugizi si ubuteto ; uti "Ahubwo izamuca mu mubyimba !" Nuko intumwa ya Cyilima, irahindukira imubwira ubutumwa bwa Mukobanya. Ikimara guhaguruka i Bumbogo, Mukobanya abwira ingabo ze z’ Abambogo ko i Bwami bamerewe nabi. Bahera ko bambuka Nyabarongo batabaye Cyilima Rugwe ku Kamonyi mu gisura yari yihishemo. Ubwo Mulinda na Mukobanya bahuriye i Kinyambi cya Rugalika, Mukobanya arahamutsinda. Ubwo rubanda rw’ i Nkuruzuzu na bo bica Nkuba ya Nyabakonjo mu Bwanacyambwe. Abo bavuye i Bwanacyambwe bambukira mu cyambu cyo munsi ya Gihinga kitwaga Rutare, bateranira mu bitwa bya Kamonyi barara bavuga amacumu. Ku wundi munsi barara inkera yo gutera u Bugoyi. Ni bwo Kibibi yahize n’undi mugabo witwaga Ruzigana, ati "Nitugera i Bugoyi tuzabutsinda, ariko umubisha wa mbere ni uwanjye." Ruzigana ati "Urirarira ; nitugera i Bugoyi koko ibyo uvuze ko tuzabutsinda ni koko, ariko ibyo ubeshye ni uko uvuze ko umubisha wa mbere ari uwawe, ati "Umubisha w’ibanze ni uwanjye." Mukobanya agumya kwumva imihigo yabo bombi, na we, ati "Ubugoyi tuzabutsinda koko nta we ubishidikanya ; ati "None rero wowe Kibibi na Ruzigana, uzabanza kwica umubisha ni we nzabugabira". Ni bwo bageze ingabo zijyana na Mukobanya (yari akiri Umututsi atarima (ataraba Umwami) akigira ku rugamba. Ingabo ziboneza iya Kibuye, zambukira i Kilinda. Bageze mu rugabano rwa Bugoyi, bahura n’Abagoyi. Kibibi abirohamo, yirukana Umugoyi aramutota Ruzigana agumana na Mukobanya. Ubwo Kibibi yica wa mubisha yatose. Abagoyi bararakara bakubita Abanyarwanda inshuro. Mukobanya aratsikira. Umugoyi agiye kumutera, Ruzigana amurasa inkumbi amutsinda imbere ya Mukobanya ariko Kibibi yishe kare ; yabanje. Nuko u Bugoyi buratsindwa ; bafata umuhungu wa Mulinda witwaga Rushema, bamuzanira Mukobanya aramutanga. Bwije barara inkera y’imihigo. Kibibi ati "Ibanze ni irya njye mu Bugoyi !" Abahungu bose bati "Ntabeshya, ibanze ni irye ! Ni we waroboye Umugoyi hagati y’ingamba zombi, amwirukana tureba, amutsinda mu rubuga. Mukobanya aranga ati "Ibanze ni irya Ruzigana warashe Umugoyi wa mbere inkumbi ati "U Bugoyi ni ubwe !" Abahungu barumirwa. Ni bwo Kibibi bamwise Nyir’amaguru, kuko yirukanye Umugoyi akamwica mbere, ariko u Bugoyi bugahabwa Ruzigana wishe nyuma kandi ari byo bahigiye. Ubwo rero Kibibi yirukiye Ruzigana wagabanye u Bugoyi ! Kwirukira nyir’umugisha = Kuruhira abandi . Hifashishijwe igitabo cy’Ibirari by’insigamigani

title: Uganda yarekuye Abanyarwanda 7 barimo uwo yahereyeho gukorera iyicarubozo
article_text:
Uganda yarekuye Abanyarwanda 7 barimo uwo yahereyeho gukorera iyicarubozo

 Abanyarwanda 7 barimo René Rutagungira wabimburiye abandi gukorerwa iyicarubozo n’inzego z’umutekano za Uganda ashinjwa ubutasi, barekuwe n’Urukiko rwa Gisirikare rwa Uganda. Kuri uyu wa Kabiri taliki ya 07 Mutarama 2019, nibwo aba Banyarwanda bashinjwaga n’inzego z’umutekano z’iki gihugu ibikorwa by’ubutasi barekuwe ku mugaragaro n’urukiko rukuru rwa Makindye mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa kabiri. Ibinyamakuru byo muri Uganda bivuga ko aba banyarwanda barekuwe n’Urukiko rukuru rwa Gisirikare rwa Makindye, nyuma y’aho ubushinjacyaha buhagaritse ibirego bwabashinjaga birimo gutunga intwaro mu buryo butemewe. Uganda imaze igihe kinini ita muri yombi abanyarwanda bari ku butaka bwayo,ikabafunga mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko. Uku guhohotera abanyarwanda no gufasha imitwe ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda nibyo byatumye umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda uzamo agatotsi gusa Leta y’u Rwanda yavuze ko Uganda nihagarika ibi bintu bibiri umubano uzongera kugaruka. Muri Werurwe umwaka ushize, nibwo Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yasabye abaturage bayo guhagarika kujya muri Uganda kubera impungenge z’umutekano wabo, nyuma y’ubuhamya bw’abarengaga 800 bari bamaze iminsi birukanwa ku butaka bw’icyo gihugu bavuga ndetse banagaragaza ihohoterwa n’iyicarubozo bakorewe. Kuri Twitter,Abanyarwanda basabye ko Uganda yarekura abanyarwanda bose ifungiye muri gereza zitazwi gusa banashimye ko yatangiye kuva ku izima ikarekura bamwe nyuma y’igihe ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bubiyisaba. Ntabwo Uganda yatangaje amazina y’abarekuwe bose.

title: Abadepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda bagiye kwegera abaturage mu tugari twose tw’igihugu
article_text:
Abadepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda bagiye kwegera abaturage mu tugari twose tw’igihugu

 Abadepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda bagiye kwegera abaturage mu tugari twose tw’igihugu aho bazaba bareba iterambere ry’ibikorwaremezo by’ibanze n’ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga. Nyuma y’umunsi umwe basoje igihembwe gisanzwe, abadepite batangaje ko hagati y’Ukuboza 2019 na Mutarama 2020 bazaba bari mu bikorwa byo kureba uko ibikorwaremezo bigezwa ku baturage kuva ku rwego rw’utugari. Bazasura Umujyi wa Kigali ku matariki ya 5, 7 na 13 Ukuboza 2019 bajye mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba kuva ku wa 9 kugeza ku wa 13 Ukuboza 2019. Ku wa 7 kugeza ku wa 11 Mutarama 2020 ni mu Majyepfo naho Iburengerazuba ni tariki 13 kugeza ku wa 17 umwaka utaha mu gihe bazasoreza mu Majyaruguru hagati ya tariki ya 20 na 25 Mutarama 2020. Abadepite bazasura ibikorwaremezo birimo imihanda, amazi, amashanyarazi n’ubundi buryo bwo gucana abaturage bagezwaho banasure ibikorwaremezo by’ikoranabuhanga. Muri izi ngendo, hateganyijwe ibiganiro abadepite bazagirana n’abaturage ku birebana n’uruhare rwabo mu bibakorerwa, kumenya no kuganira ku buryo abagize umuryango Nyarwanda bita ku bibazo byabo. Ni ingendo zigamije gukomeza kubaka umuco w’ubufatanye hagati y’abayobozi n’abaturage babatora, kubakangurira kugira uruhare mu bibakorerwa, kumenya no kubahiriza amategeko no gushyira hamwe mu kwishakamo ibisubizo. Guteza imbere ibikorwaremezo ni imwe mu nkingi z’icyerekezo 2020 u Rwanda ruri kwinjiramo, ikaba n’imwe muri gahunda zizitabwaho mu cyerekezo 2050. Itegeko Ngenga rigena imikorere y’Umutwe w’Abadepite, riteganya ko Abadepite basura abaturage nibura kabiri mu mwaka, hagamijwe kumenya no kugenzura ibikorwa bya Guverinoma, kugira inama abaturage no kumenya ibibazo bafite. Inkuru ya Protais Mbarushimana.

title: Village Urugwiro, inyubako y’amateka akomeye mu Rwanda
article_text:
Village Urugwiro, inyubako y’amateka akomeye mu Rwanda

 Village Urugwiro, ni inyubako yubashywe kuva icyubakwa kugeza n’ubu. Benshi tuyirebera kure kubera icyubahiro tuyigomba nk’ibiro bicurirwamo icyerecyezo gitumye u Rwanda ruba ubukombe, ikaba isoko y’amahoro aduhesha ibikombe mu mahanga. Ni inyubako y’amateka kuko abagera kuri 50 % by’Abanyarwanda bariho bavutse iriho, iganje ku Kacyiru, mu Karere ka Gasabo mu Mujyi wa Kigali aho imaze imyaka 44. Yubatswe mu 1975 n’Umuryango wahuzaga Ibihugu bya Afurika cyane cyane ibyakolonijwe n’u Bufaransa n’ibikoresha Igifaransa, Organization Commune Africaine et Malgache (OCAM). Uwo muryango kuri ubu wazimye, u Rwanda rwawinjiyemo mu 1965. Mu 1975, nibwo rwari kwakira inama yawo yagombaga kwitabirwa n’abakuru b’ibihugu bagera kuri 15. Byari ihurizo rikomeye ku gihugu nk’u Rwanda cyari gifite hoteli nke zitwa ko zikomeye nka Mille Collines na Diplomate zari zigezweho icyo gihe ariko zifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abashyitsi baringaniye. Muri icyo gihe u Rwanda rwiteguraga kwakira inama, inyubako za mbere za Village Urugwiro zubatswe ku mafaranga ya OCAM nkuko Rucagu Boniface, umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye yabibwiye IGIHE. Inama ya OCAM irangiye, inyubako za Village Urugwiro zeguriwe Leta y’u Rwanda nayo izihinduramo hoteli yakiraga abifite muri ibyo bihe. Nubwo Village Urugwiro yabaye hoteli, mu gihe u Rwanda rwabaga rwakiriye inama zikomeye yakomezaga kwifashishwa mu kwakira abashyitsi ba Leta. Urugero ni tariki 21 na 22 Gicurasi 1979 ubwo u Rwanda rwakiraga inama ya Gatandatu ihuza u Bufaransa na Afurika yanitabiriwe na Perezida wari uyoboye u Bufaransa icyo gihe, Valéry Marie René Georges Giscard d’Estaing. Mbere y’uko iyo nama iba, u Bufaransa bwari bwatanze amafaranga yo kwagura Village Urugwiro no kuyivugurura kugira ngo ijye ku rwego rwo kwakira inama ikomeye nk’iyo, nkuko biri mu nyandiko z’ibanga za Ambasade ya Amerika mu Rwanda muri icyo gihe, zashyizwe hanze na WikiLeaks. Uwo mwaka ni nabwo hubatswe hoteli Novotel Umubano (Marasa Umubano Hotel kuri ubu) nabwo ku mafaranga yatanzwe n’u Bufaransa. Rucagu avuga ko nyuma yo kwagura Village Urugwiro, yasigaye igizwe n’inyubako (appartments) zisaga 20 zirimo amacumbi agezweho, ibyumba by’inama n’ibindi. Amacumbi y’abadepite, ibiro bidahoraho bya Perezida Juvénal Habyarimana amaze gufata ubutegetsi mu 1973, yahise asesa Inteko Ishinga Amategeko. Yongeye kuyisubizaho mu 1981, abadepite ba mbere 70 b’inzibacyuho batangira imirimo mu 1982. Kubera ubuke bw’amacumbi muri Kigali, Leta yemereye buri mudepite icumbi muri Village Urugwiro dore ko abenshi babaga baturuka mu bice bya kure badashobora gukora bataha iwabo. Mu 1983 habaye amatora y’abadepite, Rucagu Boniface aba umwe muri bo ubwo yatangiraga imirimo mu 1984 na we ahabwa icumbi muri Village Urugwiro. Umudepite yahabwaga icumbi gusa, ibyo kurya akimenya. Rucagu avuga ko mu badepite 70, abasaga 40 babaga muri Village Urugwiro kuko babaga baturuka mu bice bya kure. Uwabaga yifitiye inzu i Kigali, yayibagamo Leta ikamugenera amafaranga y’icumbi. Rucagu ati “Uwabaga yifitiye inzu ye bamuhaga amafaranga ariko babanje kubyanga bavuga bati kuki mushaka kurara mu nzu zanyu kandi twarabageneye iza Leta, baraburana ariko byaje gukemuka nyuma.” Icyo gihe abadepite babamo, inzu zasagukaga zakomezaga kuba ibyumba bya hoteli bisanzwe, abashaka kubiraramo bakaza kwishyura. Nubwo hari hoteli n’amacumbi y’abadepite, Perezida Habyarimana na we yahashyize ibiro ariko akajya abizamo rimwe na rimwe kuko ibiro nyamukuru byari mu mujyi rwagati, ahubatse Ibiro by’Umujyi wa Kigali ubu. Rucagu ati “Iruhande rw’izo nzu haruguru y’ahahoze reception niho hari Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu. Muri izo nzu zose ahagana ku rwinjiriro yari yarafashemo inzu y’ibiro bye, izindi zose zikomeza kuba hoteli. Yari ibiro bya kabiri yazagamo nka rimwe cyangwa kabiri mu kwezi.” Buri nyubako (apartment) muri izo zari zigize Hotel Village Urugwiro yabaga ifite icyiciro runaka ibarizwamo. Rucagu wahabaye mu gihe cy’imyaka 10 ari umudepite, avuga ko buri nyubako yabaga ifite ibyumba bitatu, ni ukuvuga A, B na C. Icyumba A, cyabaga gifite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose birimo uruganiriro, uburiri, ubwiherero, igikoni, harimo frigo n’ibindi, kikaba kigenewe Umukuru w’Igihugu mu gihe habaye inama cyangwa undi muntu wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wakirayemo. Hafi y’icyo cyumba nyamukuru, habaga ikindi bise B, kikararamo umuganga w’umuntu mukuru waraye muri A. Ni ukuvuga ko niba haraye Perezida, muri B hararaga umuganga we naho muri C hakarara abarinzi be. Mu gihe habaga habaye inama zikomeye, abadepite bari barahawe amacumbi muri Village Urugwiro basabwaga kuvamo bakazagaruka inama yarangiye. Rucagu ati “Batumenyeshaga mbere y’ukwezi, tukavamo bakahakoropa, bakahasukura bakavanamo umwanda wose, tukazagaruka baragiye. Ubwo mu mirimo y’Inteko twariyeranjaga.” Village Urugwiro yakomeje kuba hoteli kugeza mu 1994 muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Jenoside imaze guhagarikwa, muri Nyakanga uwo mwaka Leta y’Ubumwe imaze kurahira Village Urugwiro aho kuba ibiro bidahoraho by’Umukuru w’Igihugu, yahindutse Ibiro byuzuye by’iminsi yose by’Umukuru w’Igihugu kugeza ubu.

title: 4 682 nibo basabye gusubirishamo imanza za Gacaca
article_text:
4 682 nibo basabye gusubirishamo imanza za Gacaca

  CNLG irasaba ko izindi nzego z’ubutabera zibishinzwe zafasha ikibazo cy’abasubirishamo imanza kikarangira, bitewe nuko ngo abenshi mu basubirishamo babikora nkana, kandi  ari  ba ruharwa bakatiwe ibihano biri  hagati y’imyaka 30 na burundu,  cyane  ko bamwe muri bo bazi neza ko hari  bamwe  mu bari kubatangaho amakuru batagihari.  Dr. Bizimana Jean Damascene yabivugiye mu Nteko, tariki 7 Gashyantare 2018 ubwo we na bamwe mu bayobozi barimo umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe itegeko nshinga n’andi mategeko Uwizeyimana Evode, intumwa y’ubushinjacyaha bukuru n’abandi bayobozi muri Minisiteri y’Ubutabera, MINIJUST, bari imbere y’abadepite bagize Komisiyo ya politiki, mu rwego rwo gusuzuma zimwe mu ngingo zavugururwa zirebana n’Inkiko Gacaca. Abadepite n’abayobozi bari imbere ya komisiyo basanga abifuza gukomeza gusubirishamo imanza za Gacaca kandi  zararangiye ari ikibazo cyagombye kwitonderwa, kuko ngo bwaba ari  bumwe mu buryo bwo gutesha agaciro no gupfobya umusaruro Inkiko Gacaca zagezeho nk’uko byagarutsweho na bamwe mu badepite. Ku birebana n’icyo kibazo,  Umunyamabanga wa leta Uwiringiyimana Evode, umwe mu batanze ibitekerezo, avuga ko ari byo koko ikibazo gikwiye kwitonderwa cyane ko gifite umwihariko wacyo, atanga ingero  z’umuntu ushobora kwitwaza ko  yakatiwe n’Inkiko Gacaca adahari, kandi akaba asaba guhabwa undi mwanya ngo yisobanure. Akomeza  agira ati “Abashobora kwifuza gusubirishamo imanza twabisigira  gusa  umwihariko w’umuntu ushobora kuvuga ngo uwo yarezwe ko yishe imyaka 10 ishize,  nyuma y’igihe runaka bigaragaye ko noneho uwo bivugwa ko yishe  abonetse kuko yiberaga mu kindi gihugu, ariko ataratorotse ubutabera, icyo gihe ni we wenyine wahabwa amahirwe yo gusubirishamo urubanza rwe  kandi bigakorwa n’inkiko zibifitiye ububasha.” source: imvahonshya

title: Nyarugenge: Abacururizaga Nyabugogo barishimira kuba bimuriwe muri Gare ya Nyabugogo
article_text:
Nyarugenge: Abacururizaga Nyabugogo barishimira kuba bimuriwe muri Gare ya Nyabugogo

 Abacururizaga Nyabugogo ahazwi nko kwa Mutanga baravuga ko bishimira kuba bimuriwe muri Gare ya Nyabugogo aho byatumye bahana intera zasabwe na leta ngo batanduzanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Nubwo aba bacuruzi bishimiye iyi gahunda, gusa banenze ko ntaburyo bwo gukaraba intoki buhari. Umwe mu bacuruzi waganiriye na Radiotv10 yagize ati:"Twishimiye ko batujyanye ahantu dushobora kwisanzura duhana intera twasabwe na leta ariko turanenga ko nta buryo bwo gukaraba intoki twashyiriwe ho" uyu mucuruzi yakomeje agira ati: "Birashoboka ko umuguzi hari ibyo ashobora gukora byatuma twandura bityo turifuza ko hashyirwaho uburyo bwo gukaraba intoki." Uyu mwanzuro wafashwe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ubucucike bw’abantu bwari bukigaragara muri soko ryo kwa Mutangana bigatuma abantu batabasha kwirinda Coronavirus. Leta y’u Rwanda yafashe umwanzuro wo guhagarika inama n’amateraniro ahuza abantu benshi nyuma y’aho umuntu wa mbere urwaye Coronavirus agaragaye mu Rwanda kuwa 14 Werurwe 2020. title: Rusizi: Abahinzi ba kawa bakorana na sosiyete CBC bahawe amafaranga y’inyongera ku ikawa bagemuye

Rusizi: Abahinzi ba kawa bakorana na sosiyete CBC bahawe amafaranga y’inyongera ku ikawa bagemuye

 Abahinzi ba kawa bo mu mirenge ya Gikundamvura, Butare na Nyakabuye mu karere ka Rusizi bishimiye amafaranga y’inyongera bahawe kuri buri kilo cya Kawa bagemuye kuri sosiyete itunganya ikanacuruza kawa CBC (Coffee Business Center). Ni amafaranga bahawe kuri uyu 26 Gashyantare ku ruganda Imena Coffee ruherereye mu Kagari ka Mpinga mu Murenge wa Gikundamvura. Abayahawe bavuze ko bishimira gukorana na sosiyete CBC isanzwe ikorera i Masoro mu cyanya cyahariwe inganda mu mujyi wa Kigali. Musengimana Jean Damascène, Umuyobozi mukuru wa sosiyete itunganya ikanacuruza kawa, CBC yavuze ko amafaranga bahaye abahinzi yuzuza ayo bahawe mbere babisabwe n’umushoramari bakorana wo muri Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika, mu rwego rwo gushishikariza abahinzi kongera ubwiza n’umusaruro wa kawa. Ati “Hari igiciro twari twaramuguriyeho cyatanzwe na NAEB, yarayishyuwe akigera ku uruganda, ayo tugiye kubaha ni inyongera kubera umufatanyabikorwa Family Peter Rogers ihagarariwe na Peter Rogers, watanze igiciro cyiza akanasaba ko abahinzi bazahabwa inyongera ku kiro bazanye ku ruganda. Ni akanya keza kugira ngo nshimire iyo sosiyete ya Peter Rogers kubera icyo gikorwa cyiza kugira ngo kawa yacu ikomeze itere imbere. ”

title: Bugesera: RAB irasaba abahinzi gukoresha ifumbire mu buhinzi bwa soya
article_text:
Bugesera: RAB irasaba abahinzi gukoresha ifumbire mu buhinzi bwa soya

 Abahinzi ba Soya bo mu Murenge wa Mwogo mu Karere ka Bugesera barasabwa gukoresha ifumbire mu buhinzi bwabo bwa soya. N’ubwo hari bamwe bishimiye umusaruro batangiye kubona mu gihingwa cya soya kubera ko bamenye gukoresha ifumbire, hari abagifite imyumvire y’uko ibinyamisogwe bidasaba ifumbire nk’ibinyampeke nyamara hakaba n’abandi bagereranya ifumbire n’indyo yuzuye umuntu aha umwana. Habanabakize Valens na Mukandepandanse Violette batuye mu Murenge wa Mwogo bamenye ibyiza byo gukoresha ifumbire ndetse  bagashima n’Ikigo k’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, RAB cyatumye babona ifumbire n’imbuto y’indobanure none umusaruro ukaba wariyongereye. Habanabakize agira ati: “Umuntu uhinga iki kinyamisogwe cya soya ntakoreshe ifumbire nta musaruro abona. Byarigaragaje ku turima tw’intangarugero twakozwe ko ahari ifumbire haboneka umusaruro naho aho itari umusaruro ikabura”. Akomeza avuga ko gukoresha ifumbire abigereranya na soya yahinganywe ifumbire n’itarayihinganywe bimeze nk’umwana ugaburirwa nabi n’umwana ugaburirwa neza, akemeza ko umusaruro uva aho bahinganye ifumbire wikuba inshuro 3 ugereranyije n’aho batashyize ifumbire. Mukandepandanse avuga ko mu gukoresha ifumbire neza bavanga iy’imborera ndetse n’imvaruganda kugira ngo umusaruro wiyongere. Ati “Ahantu ifumbire yageze hatandukana n’ahantu hatageze ifumbire byanga bikunda kuko iyo n’umuturage ansanze mu murima wange ntacyo yirirwa ambaza kuko ahita yibonera itandukaniro urebye imirima irimo ifumbire n’aho itari usanga itandukanye”. Agira inama abaturage ko gukoresha ifumbire mvaruganda ndetse n’imborera ukabikoresha ku binyamisogwe ubasha kubona umusaruro ushimishije ku kigero wifuza. Ku ruhande rw’ikigo RAB gishinzwe iterambere ry’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi baragira inama abahinzi ba soya kujya bakoresha ifumbire kuko umusaruro wikuba gatatu mu gihe uyikoresheje neza ukanatera imbuto y’indobanure. Dr Rurangwa Edouard ni umushakashatsi muri Kigo k’Igihugu gishinzwe ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, RAB, muri  Progaramu ya Soya akaba anakuriye n’ishami rya soya  avuga ko bereka abahinzi akamaro ko gukoresha ifumbire zitandukanye kuko ahari ifumbire umusaruro wiyongera. Agira ati “Tumaze igihe dukorana n’abahinzi ba soya. Dukora akarima k’ishuri nk’akarima ntangarugero aho twereka abahinzi akamaro ko gukoresha ifumbire mu guhinga soya. Hari aho tudashyira ifumbire n’imwe, ahandi tugashyiramo ifumbire ya Dap hakaba aho dushyira ifumbire y’imborera, aho twavanze izo fumbire ndetse naho twakoresheje Rizobiyumu( Rhizobium )”. Yakomeje avuga ko ahari ifumbire umusaruro wiyongereye cyane, aho zivanze ugasanga umusaruro wiyongereye kurushaho ku buryo aho usanga hatari ifumbire usanga abaturage nabo ubwabo bivugira ko zagwingiye kubera ko zitabonye ibizitunga. Umuhinzi wa Soya iyo akoresheje ifumbire mvaruganda n’imborera umusaruro wikuba inshuro eshatu kurusha utayikoresha ku buryo abo mu Murenge wa Mwogo biyemeje kujya bakoresha iyo fumbire kugira ngo bazabone umusaruro urenze uwo bajyaga babona. Cleophas Mutabaruka wari uhagarariye Agoronome w’Umurenge wa Mwogo avuga ko icyo bashinzwe ari ukwigisha abaturage ku buryo babona umusaruro ushimishije cyane ku gihingwa nka Soya. Agira ati “Mbere abaturage bajyaga bahinga soya idatanga umusaruro uhagije ariko urebye soya ihari kuri ubu aho bakoresheje inyongeramusaruro ndetse n’imbuto nziza yateguwe, babonye umusaruro ushimishije kuko hari imbuto nziza zateguwe zagaragaje ko umuhinzi uzihinze zibyara umusaruro”. Akomeza avuga ko icyo bashinzwe ari ukwigisha abaturage babavana ahantu habi babageza aheza. Kuri ubu Ikigo k’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, RAB, mu Ishami ry’igihingwa cya Soya harimo kugerageza imbuto y’indobanure mu gihugu kugira ngo abahinga soya bazabone imbuto inatanga umusaruro.

title: Rusizi: “ABIYITAHO” bakeneye ubaha isoko ry’imipira yambarwa
article_text:
Rusizi: “ABIYITAHO” bakeneye ubaha isoko ry’imipira yambarwa

 Abafite ubumuga butandukanye 37 barimo abatabona 20 n’abafite ubumuga bukomatanyije, (batumva cyangwa ngo bavuge) n’abatabasha kugenda 17, banze gusabiriza bakora Koperative iboha imyenda itandukanye, bayita “ABIYITAHO”, bavuga ko nubwo bamwe bavuye mu bwigunge, bakeneye ubuvugizi kugira ngo babone isoko ryo kuboha imipira, n’ababagurira iyo baboshye. Ishyirahamwe ryabo ryatangiye mu mwaka wa 2014 rigizwe n’abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona 15, ariko muri Nyakanga 2019, nibwo babaye Koperative iboha imyenda itandukanye, irimo imipira y’imbeho n’ibindi. Abagize iyi Koperative bakorera mu Mudugudu wa Murambi, mu Kagari ka Giheke mu Murenge wa Giheke, bavuga ko nubwo baboha imyenda batarabona isoko ryagutse kuri bimwe mu byo baboha bigatuma batiteza imbere. NYIRANDAYAMBAJE Godiberte umwe mu banyamuryango yagize ati “Tubura abaduha akazi ngo tubabohere, n’ibyo tuboshye ntitubona ababigura bahagije.” NGABONZIZA Canesion na we agira ati “Kuva nagera muri iyi Koperative navuye mu bwigunge, ariko ntabwo tubona abaduha akazi ko kubabohera.” MUKARURANGWA Josephine na we yagize ati “Aho dukorera ni hato kandi turahakodesha, kubona amafaranga yo kwishyura ubukode biratugora kubera ko tutabona abaduha akazi, turasaba ubuyobozi kudufasha.” RENZAHO Faustin ni Umuhuzabikorwa w’Inama y’Igihugu y’abantu bafite Ubumuga mu Karere ka Rusizi, ndetse  ni Umujyana mu nama Njyanama y’Akarere ka Rusizi, avuga ko hari gahunda yo gufasha Koperative harimo n’iriya y’abafite ubumuga bishyize hamwe. Ati “Dufite gahunda yo gufasha Korerative zikora neza, ntabwo ari iy’abafite ubumuga gusa, tubatera inkunga ya milliyoni 1Frw buri mwaka, kuri buri Koperative.” Koperative “ABIYITAHO” iri mu zikora neza, Renzaho Faustin abasaba gutegura umushinga wo kwagura aho bakorera, ngo numara gusuzumwa bashobora kuwutera inkunga. Renzaho avuga ko kuba iriya Koperative igorwa no gushaka amafaranga y’ubukode, ngo Akarere ka Rusizi hirya no hino mu Mirenge kahafite inzu, akabasaba ko bazikoreramo, imwe muri zo iri mu Murenge wa Giheke, ngo icyo bisaba ni ukuvugana n’ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge nabwo bukabimenyesha Akarere hagafatwa ikemezo. Yabwiye Umuseke ko hatangiye gukorwa ubuvugizi ngo abagize iriya Koperative babone ababaha isoko ryo kuboha imipira. Ati “Ibigo by’amashuri biri mu Karere ka Rusizi bambara imipira y’imbeho, twatekereje kubahuza n’ibyo bigo tukabashakira amasoko ku buryo bagirana amasezerano bakajya babaha imipira bakenera.” Koperative yabo nubwo ibafasha kubona aho bahurira, nta mitungo ihambaye baragira kubera imbogamizi yo kubura ubaha amasoko yo kuboha imipira, cyangwa kubagurira iyo baba baboshye.

title: Ibiceri byacu barabigumana ngo babuze uko batugarurira-Abagenzi
article_text:
Ibiceri byacu barabigumana ngo babuze uko batugarurira-Abagenzi

 Abakora ingendo zo mu ntara barataka ibihombo baterwa n’ababaha amatike y’urugendo ku modoka zitwara abagenzi. Aba bavuga ko mu gihe urugendo rufite nk’ikiguzi cy’amafaranga 1030 y’u Rwanda iyo utanze 1100 bagusubiza nk’amafaranga 50 yakabaye 70. Ni ikibazo bavuga ko kibabangamiye kuko ngo iyo bo babuzeho ayo mafaranga batabemerera kubakatira amatike y’urugendo. Nyirasafari Rose waganiriye na Radiotv10 yavuze ko ibi bintu bibabangamira cyane. Yagize ati:"...ibi bintu biraduhombya cyane ariko bo bikabungura. Ni gute basigarana amafaranga yacu ariko ku munsi ukurikiye ntibibuke ko hari ayo basigaranye ngo uyahereho?" Nteziryayo Samson nawe ntiyanyuranyije n’ibyo mugenzi we yari amaze gutangaza maze asaba ko iki kibazo cyahagurukirwa kuko kimaze iminsi myinshi. Yagize ati:’...iki kibazo kimaze imyaka myinshi ariko ntigikemuka, twibaza impamvu bongeraho turiya duceri ikatuyobera. Turasaba inzego za leta kugihagurukira mu maguru mashya naho ubundi twarahombye twarashize." Uretse abagenzi bavuga ko babangamiwe no kudasubizwa amafaranga yitwa ko ari mato nyamara bo badashobora kuyasonerwa ,"abatwara aba bagenzi bo nubwo batemera ko amajwi, amashusho ndetse n’amazina yabo bigaragazwa, bavuga ko iki kibazo bakizi ariko ngo nibo bahomba kuko basonera abagenzi ibiceri birenga
kugiciro cyagenwe." Ubuyobozi bw’amakompanyi y’imodoka zitwara abagenzi mu Rwanda nabwo buvuga ko iki kibazo bukizi ariko ngo "ikigo RURA nicyo gifite igikombe kivugutiyemo umuti w’iki kibazo."


Ikigo cy’igihugu ngenzuramikorere RURA kibinyujije ku rukuta rwa Twitter cyadusubije ko gisaba abakata amatike kugarurira abagenzi amafaranga yuzuye hagendewe ku biciro byashyizeho. Ubuyobozi bw’ikigo RURA buvuga ko bugiye gukurikirana iki kibazo gusa ngo umugenzi wahura niki kibazo yahamagara kuri nimero ya 3988 bakamufasha. Gusa ni ikibazo gisa nigifite uburemere ku bukungu kuko niba buri minota 30 buri kompanyi y’imodoka zitwara abagenzi ihagurutsa imodoka zirenze imwe,buri modoka itwaye abarenga 25 ,mugihe buri mugenzi yaba atasubijwe igiceri cya 20 yaba angana n’amafaranga ibihumbi 3000 mu masaha 12 gusa abagenzi baba bahombye ku modoka imwe gusa . Bivuze ko imodoka imwe ishobora guhombya abagenzi amafaranga angana n’ibihumbi 90 ku kwezi akaba akarenga milliyoni ku mwaka ubariye ku modoka imwe gusa. Mugihe ikigo RURA kibarura agence zigera kuri 47 zifite imodoka ibihumbi 2948 zitwara abagenzi mu ntara nkuko bigaragara muri raporo y’iki kigo iheruka ya 2019. Iki kibazo kandi abo twaganiriye batubwiye ko kitihariwe n’abagenzi gusa ngo kuko no kwa muganga kihagaragra. Inkuru ya Vedaste Kubwimana.

title: Kiyovu Sports: Karekezi biravugwa ko ashobora gusimbura Ruremesha
article_text:
Kiyovu Sports: Karekezi biravugwa ko ashobora gusimbura Ruremesha

 Abantu bakomeje guhwihwisa aamakuru avuga ko umutoza Karekezi Olivier ashobora kuza gutoza mu ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports, maze agasimbura Ruremesha Emmenuel, usanzwe ari umutoza mukuru w’iyi ipe. Ruremesha Emmanuel yageze mu ikipe ya Kiyovu Sports mu mwaka wa 2019, ubwo yungiriza Buruchaga wageze mu Rwanda avuye ku mugabane w’i Burayi mu gihugu cy’u Bubiligi ndetse wanakiniye iyo kipe. Buruchaga ntiyigeze ahirwa n’uwo mwaka muri Kiyovu Sports yagiriyemo ibihe byiza nk’umukinnyi, kuko yatakaje imikino myinshi, biza kumuviramo gutandukana n’iyi kipe nyuma yo guhindurirwa inshingano n’iyi kipe, umwanya we ugahabwa uwari umwungirije ari we Ruremesha Emmanuel. Buruchaga yahinduriwe inshingano mbere yo gukina umunsi wa 15 wa shampiyona, ubwo Kiyovu Sport yagombaga kujya mu karere ka Huye gukina na Mukura VS mu mukino wa shampiyona, ndetse iyi kipe yagiye iyobowe na Ruremesha ikaza kuhakura amanota atatu imbumbe nyuma yo kuhatsindira Mukura VS. Amakuru ari kuvugwa, akaba avuga ko iyi kipe ya Kiyovu Sport yatangiye ibiganiro bucece n’uwahoze ari umutoza w’ikipe ya Rayon Sports FC ari we Karekezi Olivier ngo aze kuba umusimbura wa Ruremesha Emmanuel nk’umutoza mukuru muri iyi kipe, maze Ruremesha agirwe umutoza wungirije Karekezi Olivier.

title: Abakinnyi ba Manchester United biyemeje gukora igikorwa cyananiye bagenzi babo bo muri Premier League
article_text:
Abakinnyi ba Manchester United biyemeje gukora igikorwa cyananiye bagenzi babo bo muri Premier League

 Abakinnyi b’ikipe ya Manchester United biyemeje kuba aba mbere muri Premier League bemeye kugabanya umushahara wabo kugira ngo batange inkunga ifasha abaganga bo mu Bwongereza bavura Coronavirus batamerewe neza. Nkuko ikinyamakuru The Sun kibitangaza,abakinnyi ba Manchester United biyemeje kugabanya 30 % by’umushahara wabo ukajya gufasha abaganga ba National Health Service [NHS] bafite akazi kenshi kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Amakuru avuga ko kapiteni wa Manchester United Harry Maguire yaganiriye na bagenzi be bakinana bemeranya ko bagabanya uyu mushahara wabo kuri iki kigero kugira ngo haboneke ubufasha bwo guha abaganga. The Sun yavuze ko Harry Maguire uhembwa ibihumbi 190 by’amapawundi ku cyumweru,yegerewe n’umuyobozi wa United, Ed Woodward,amusaba ko yaganiriza bagenzi be ku byerekeye kuba batanga ubufasha ku mishahara yabo ugahabwa NHS birangira nabo babyemeye ndetse ngo baraza kubitangaza ku mugaragaro mu minsi mike. Abakinnyi n’abatoza ba United babereye icyitegererezo abandi bakinnyi bo mu yandi makipe bo banze no kugabanya n’ipawundi rimwe ku mushahara wabo nkuko ibinyamakuru byo mu Bwongereza byabitangaje mu ntangiriro z’iki cyumweru. Aba bakinnyi nibatangira gutanga aya mafaranga bazafasha [NHS] kwinjiza nibura miliyoni 8 z’amapawundi muri iki gihe iyakeneye cyane. Manchester United niyo kipe ihemba umushahara uri hejuru kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza aho mu mwaka ushize yahembye miliyoni 332 z’amapawundi. Muri Espagne ho, abakinnyi ba FC Barcelona bemeye gukatwa umushahara wabo ku kigero cya 70 % ndetse babwiye perezida Josep Maria Bartomeu ko biteguye gukusanya amafaranga yo guhemba abandi bakozi bahembwa make kugira ngo bo bajye bahembwa 100%. Abakozi basanzwe ba FC Barcelona bari banze gukatwa imishahara yabo ku kigero cya 70% cyane ko bahabwa 3.7% by’ingengo y’imari ya FC Barcelona mu bijyanye n’umushahara mu gihe abakinnyi bo batwara 61%. Mu mwaka w’imikino ushize,FC Barcelona niyo kipe yinjije amafaranga menshi ku isi angina na miliyoni 840.8 z’amayero (£726m) gusa ni nayo ihemba amafaranga menshi kurusha izindi ku isi aho Messi wenyine yinjiza miliyoni 35 z’amayero ku mwaka mu gihe Antoine Griezmann we ageze kuri miliyoni 17 z’amayero ku mwaka.

title: Coronavirus: Abakinnyi ba Juventus n’umutoza Maurizio Sarri bemeye kumara amezi 4 badahembwa
article_text:
Coronavirus: Abakinnyi ba Juventus n’umutoza Maurizio Sarri bemeye kumara amezi 4 badahembwa

 Abakinnyi b’ikipe ya Juventus n’umutoza wabo Maurizio Sarri bemeye ko imishahara yabo ihagarikwa mu gihe cy’amezi ane mu kurinda ikipe yabo igihombo cya miliyoni zigera kuri 90 z’ama-euro kubera iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Imikino yose mu gihugu cy’Ubutaliyani yarahagaritswe kugeza nibura ku itariki ya gatatu y’ukwezi gutaha kwa kane. Ni cyo cyibasiwe cyane na coronavirus i Burayi, aho abarwayi barenga 92,000 barwaye indwara y’ubuhumekero ya Covid-19 iterwa n’iyo virusi. Abarenga 10,000 imaze kubica muri icyo gihugu naho abarenga 12,000 barayikize, nkuko imibare ya Kaminuza ya Johns Hopkins yo muri Amerika ibigaragaza. Abo bakinnyi ba Juventus bemeye kwigomwa umushahara barimo nka rutahizamu Cristiano Ronaldo ukomoka muri Portugal n’umukinnyi wo hagati wo muri Wales, Aaron Ramsey. Ntabwo bazahembwa umushahara wabo w’uku kwezi kwa gatatu, ukwa kane, ukwa gatanu n’ukwa 6 Mu gihe umupira w’amaguru waba wongeye gusubukurwa muri iki gihugu, ubuyobozi bwa Juventus buvuga ko buzongera kubisuzuma "bushyize mu gaciro". Mu itangazo ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe yegukanye igikombe cya shampiyona y’Ubutaliyani mu myaka umunani ishize bwasohoye, bwagize buti: "Juventus yifuzaga gushimira abakinnyi n’umutoza ku bwitange bwabo muri iki gihe gikomereye buri wese". Abakinnyi bo mu yandi makipe amwe akomeye y’i Burayi, barimo aba Bayern Munich na Borussia Dortmund yo mu Budage, na bo bemeye kugabanyirizwa umushahara. BBC

title: Perezida Rayon Sports yatabaje abakunzi ba Rayon Sports gutanga inkunga ngo idasenyuka
article_text:
Perezida Rayon Sports yatabaje abakunzi ba Rayon Sports gutanga inkunga ngo idasenyuka 

 Abafana ba Rayon Sports bakusanyije amafaranga arenga miliyoni 1 Frw mu gikorwa cyatangajwe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikipe cyo gushyigikira iyi kipe mu gihe itari gukina. Ejo hashize umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate yatanze ubutumwa busaba abakunzi b’iyi kipe kwitanga uko bifite kugira ngo ikipe yabo idasenywa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahagaritse ibikorwa byinshi bihuza abantu benshi birimo n’umupira w’amaguru. Kuva hatangazwa iyi ntabaza ya Sadate, abafana b‘iyi kipe bamaze gutanga miliyoni 1 y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda. Mu butumwa yanyujije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Sadate yavuze  ko abakunzi ba Rayon Sports bamaze  gutanga arenga miliyoni 1 abasaba gukomeza gufasha iyi kipe. Yagize ati “Nyuma y’uko ejo mbasabye gutera inkunga Équipe yanyu ariyo yacu, duhereye ku giceri cy’ijana ndagira ngo mbamenyeshe ko mwakoze igikorwa gikomeye kuko mwegeranyije amafaranga 1.045.752frw mwikomere amashyi kadi igikorwa kirakomeje turashaka kugera kuri 20 millions.” Ubusanzwe Rayon Sports amafaranga yayo menshi ikoresha mu bikorwa byayo bya buri munsi iyakura mu bafana bayo bababitanga ndetse n’abaza kuyishyigikira ku kibuga mu mikino iba yakiriye. Kugeza ubu ntabwo bizwi igihe shampiyona izasubukurirwa, abantu bakaba bakomeje gukangurirwa kwirinda aho bishoboka bakaguma mu rugo, mu kurinda ikwirakwiza rya COVID-19.

title: Hamenyekanye akayabo abakinnyi ba Liverpool bazahabwa nibatwara Premier League
article_text:
Hamenyekanye akayabo abakinnyi ba Liverpool bazahabwa nibatwara Premier League 

 Abakinnyi b’ikipe ya Liverpool ihagaze neza kurusha izindi zose mu Bwongereza bemerewe kuzahabwa akayabo ka miliyoni 4 z’amapawundi bazagabana nk’agahimbazamusyi kuko batwaye igikombe cya shampiyona iyi kipe imaze imyaka 30 itazi. Liverpool yatangiye Premier League y’uyu mwaka iri ku mwanya wa mbere ndetse kugeza n’ubu ntiratsindwa na rimwe.Yaherukaga gutwara Shampiyona mu mwaka w’imikino 1989/90. Jurgen Klopp n’abahungu be bafite amahirwe menshi yo kugabana aka gahimbazamusyi kuko Babura imikino mike ngo batware iki gikombe hakiri kare. Abakinnyi barimo Virgil Van Dijk, Sadio Mane, Henderson, Alisson ana Mohamed Salah bashobora kuzahabwa irindi shimwe kubera ko bagaragaye mu mikino myinshi. Mu mwaka ushize,abakinnyi ba Liverpool bahawe agahimbazamusyi ka miliyoni 7 z’amapawundi ubwo batwaraga Champions League batsinze Tottenham ku mukino wa nyuma. Jurgen Klopp n’abatoza bamwungirije bo bazahabwa agahimbazamusyi kabo ku ruhande.

title: Imodoka zikoresha Gaz Méthane zishobora kwinjira ku isoko ry’u Rwanda
article_text:
Imodoka zikoresha Gaz Méthane zishobora kwinjira ku isoko ry’u Rwanda

 Abacuruza imodoka zikoresha Gaz Méthane mu Burusiya, barifuza kwagurira ibikorwa byabo mu Rwanda nka kimwe mu bihugu bifite iyo Gaz mu kiyaga cya Kivu, kandi cyatangiye no kuyibyaza umusaruro. Kompanyi yitwa IPS (Integrated Project Solutions), yamaze kugaragariza Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Burusiya, Dr Mujawamariya Jeanne d’Arc, ubushobozi n’ubwiza bw’izo modoka zishobora kuzafasha u Rwanda gukemura ikibazo cy’ubwikorezi rusange bw’abantu. Imodoka (Bus) abo bakozi bitwaje kugira ngo berekane ireme ry’izo bifuza gushyira ku isoko ry’u Rwanda, iri mu bwoko bwa Vihr (Вихрь) ikaba ifite intebe 24, umwanya w’abagenzi bagenda bahagaze bagera kuri 57 ndetse n’umwanya ushobora kugendamo umuntu ufite ubumuga umwe uri mu kagare. Ifite ibyuma (amortisseurs) zituma yigira hasi kugira ngo ufite ubumuga abashe kwinjizwa no kugezwa mu mwanya wamugenewe bitagoranye. Ifite kandi ikigega itwaramo gaz kiyibashisha kunywa igera kuri litiro 1300, bityo iyo yuzuye ikaba ishobora gukora ibilometero biri hagati ya 450 na 520 itarakenera kunywesha indi. Zifite kandi ubushobozi bwo kugenda mu misozi, dore ko uruganda ruzikora rwakoze inyigo y’imihanda yo mu Rwanda rukaba ruhamya ko izi modoka zayishobora. Ubusanzwe zikoreshwa mu bice bimwe na bimwe by’u Burusiya, zikaba zifite umwihariko wo kudasohora imyuka ihumanya ikirere nk’izikoresha ibikomoka kuri peteroli. Igihe izi modoka zizaba zinjiye ku isoko ry’u Rwanda, abazikora bizabasaba kubaka sitasiyo za Gaz methane, aho izi modoka zizajya zinywesha. Biteguye kuzubaka muri Rusizi, Rubavu na Kigali bafatiye ku burebure bw’umuhanda uhuza iyo mijyi uko ari itatu. Ambasaderi Mujawamariya yashimye uko izi modoka zikozwe ndetse n’ibisobanuro yazihaweho cyane cyane agaciro kahawe abazigendamo hatibagiranye abafite ubumuga. Ibi bikaba biri mu murongo w’u Rwanda wo kwita no kurengera abafite ubumuga. U Rwanda ruri ku isonga mu kurwanya imyuka ihumanya ikirere, kurinda abaturage barwo indwara ziterwa n’ihumana ry’ikirere no kubungabunga ibidukikije. Abikorera baramutse bayobotse ubwo buryo bwo gukoresha Gaz méthane mu gutwara abantu n’ibintu, bishobora kubyara igisubizo gikomatanye mu kurwanya ikwirakwizwa ry’imyuka ihumanya ikirere ndetse no kubona umuti w’ikibazo cy’ubwikorezi rusange cyane cyane mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Izi modoka kandi zaba ziyongera kuri moto zikoresha amashanyarazi mu mwanya w’ibikomoka kuri peteroli, zatangiye zatangiye kugeragerezwa mu Rwanda.

title: NYUMA Y’IGENZURA FACEBOOK YAKOZE  YAHAGARITSE PROGRAME (APPS)ZIGERA KURI 400 ZAYAMAMARIZAGAHO
article_text:
NYUMA Y’IGENZURA FACEBOOK YAKOZE  YAHAGARITSE PROGRAME (APPS)ZIGERA KURI 400 ZAYAMAMARIZAGAHO

 YAHAGARITSE AMASEZERANO NA APPLE NYUMA Y’IGENZURA FACEBOOK YAKOZE  INAHAGARIKA PROGRAME (APPS)ZIGERA KURI 400 ZAYAMAMARIZAGAHO Kuruyu wa gatatu Taliki ya 22 kanama 2018 I SAN FRANCISCO (BLOOMBERG) -urubuga  nkoranyambaga Facebook Inc rw’atangaje ko nyuma y’igenzura  rya za programme ibihumbi bya za mudasobwa na telephone ziyamamarizwaho ,yahagaritse izigera kuri 400 murizo. Nyuma y’ubutumwa busaga miliyoni 85 bwa’abakoresha facebook ku giti cyabo na za company ,bayitangarije ko bajya bakira amakuru batasabya ndetse na za programme za telephone na mudasobwa zizenguruka zitujuje ibisabwa ,bikanabatera impungenge zo kuba bakibwa amakuru,Facebook inc ishami ryayo rya SAN FRANCISCO i BLOOMBERG  hifashishijwe programme ya mudasobwa bise myPersonality,yanatangiye gukoreshwa kuva 2012 ishingiye kubibazo yagiye ibaza company zishyira kandi zigakora izo programme,yasanze hari izitabyujuje,hashingiwe no kubitero by’ikoranabuhanga byayigaragayeho mu kwezi kwa werurwe 2018 ,ifata umwanzuro wo kuzihagarika burundu binyuze mugashami kayo gashinzwe politiki y’ubujyanama n’umutekano Cambridge Analytica,ibi bikaba byaratangajwe  numuyobozi wa Facebook Chief Executive Officer Mark Zuckerberg ubwo yabitangazaga nkubuhamya anatangaza ko kuruyu wa gatatu bahagarika imikoranire bari bafitanye na Apple  bahagarika programme yayo yitwa Onavo kuko  Apple Inc yahisemo guhindura amasezerano bari baragiranye;ikaba iyishinja ko iyi programme inkora ubutasi bw’amakuru bitandukanye nibyitwa Cookies ikaba yohereza bene ayo makuru kubacuruzi nabo bakohereza ibyitwa Ads tubona by’amamaza cyane muburyo butubahirije amasezerano. Abanyarwanda muri rusange turasabwa kumenya neza amakuru yacu dukwiye gushyira kuri bene izi mbuga,ejo tutazaba turirira mu myotsi

title: ABAFITE UBUMUGA BWO KUTABONA BATANZE MUTUEL DE SANTE50 KUBATISHOBOYE
article_text:
ABAFITE UBUMUGA BWO KUTABONA BATANZE MUTUEL DE SANTE50 KUBATISHOBOYE

 ABAFITE UBUMUGA BWO KUTABONA BATANZE MITUWERI 50 KUBATISHOBOYE BO MU MURENGE WA MUHIMA  Mugihe bimenyerewe ko abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona arabo gufashwa, Kuruyu wa gatandatu taliki ya 11 kanama ahagana muma saa yine ,ubwo urubyiruko rwa Muhima rw’izihizaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe urubyiruko, abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona bahakoreye igikorwa kindashyikirwa,ubwo bashyikirizaga ubuyobozi bw’akagali ka AMAHORO ibahasha irimo mutuel de sante zigera kuri mirongo itanu igikorwa cy’abanjirijwe n’umuganda .        byatunguye benshi,kandi bibakora kumutima n’amaranga mutima menshi ;nikiniga kinshi abaganiriye na hafiyawe.com                           Vce Mayor ushinzwe imiberehomyiza mu karere ka Nyarugenge ‘yashimiye byimazeyo ishyirahamwe ryabo kandi anavuga ko igikomeye arukugira umutima muzima Mukiganiro cyiza twagiranye na Dr Patrick Subi uhagarariye abafite ubumuga rwo kutabona,yagize ati “igisobanuro nuko ,igihe cyarareze aho twavugaga ko abantu batabona bafite ubumuga ,bakwiye gusabirizabagomba kugirirwa impuhwe bagafashwa,ubungubu igihe cyuko abafite ubumugauwariwe wese ariga akisanzura baranakora “asoza asaba ko bahabwa ubushobozi bwo kwigira kuko niyi nkunga bayikesha ababashije kwiga  ubu akaba ari abakozi bitunze bakanatunga nimiryango yabo yongeye kubazwa icyo yabwira abanyarwanda bacyumva ko utabona akwiye guhezwa,avuga ko bene abo basigaye inyuma,atanga urugero rw’umuganda bakoranye nabandi (bahinze,bayora ibyatsi babirunda aho ibindi biri)asaba ko  bahabwa ubushobozi bwo kwigira ibindi barashoboye.     Hanatanzwe kandi ikiganiro ku matora,ushinzwe ibikorwa by’amatora mu murenge wa Muhima Rwishyura John yibukije abari bateraniye aho uko amatora amatora azakorwa nibyingenzi bisabwa umuturage mukuzuza inshingano ze ku munsi w’itora na mbere yayo.

title: Arsene Wenger Wahoze Atoza Arsenal Yatangaje Ko Amaze Kwanga Akazi Kenshi K’amakipe Yo Mu Bwongereza Amusaba Kuyatoza.
article_text:
Arsene Wenger Wahoze Atoza Arsenal Yatangaje Ko Amaze Kwanga Akazi Kenshi K’amakipe Yo Mu Bwongereza Amusaba Kuyatoza.

  Uyu musaza w’imyaka 69 ukomoka mu gihugu cy’ubufaransa, yamaranye na arsenal imyaka 22 yose ari umutoza wayo aza kuyihesha ibikombe bitatu bya shampiona y’ubwongereza harimo n’icya Golden Trophy yatwaye muri 2004 adatsinzwe umukino n’umwe. Kuri we atangaza ko igihango afitanye na arsenal kitatuma ajya gutoza indi kipe mu gihugu cy’ubwongereza. Avuga ko ari umu arsenal kandi bimuri mu maraso bityo byamugora kwemera akazi ko gutoza mu bwongereza cyane cyane mu makipe atandatu yaho ya mbere. Arsene wenger yavuye muri arsenal mu mpera z’umwaka w’imikino wa 2017/18 ndetse kuva ubwo ntanakandi kazi k’ubutoza arongera gukora. Yavuze ko nubwo amaze amezi arega 17 ntakazi afite atari uko yakabuze ahubwo ko hari amakipe menshi yamuhaye akazi yo mu myanya 6 ya mbere mu bwongereza akayangira bitewe n’icyo we yita igihango afitanye na arsenal yahoze atoza. Mu magambo ye yagize ati “ndi umu arsenal cyane ariko na none nkaba n’umunyamwuga sinahagarika akazi. Nafashe umwanzuro wo kuva mu gihugu cy’ubwongereza kubera ko niyumva muri arsenal cyane nari mfite amahirwe menshi yo gukomeza gukorera mu bwongereza ariko narabyanze .Sinshaka kubabwira ayo makipe yanshatse ayariyo kubera hari abantu bakora muri ayo makipe naba mbangamiye.” Wenger wamaranye na arsenal imyaka 22 kuri ubu ari gukora nk’umusesenguzi kuri television ya beIN SPORTS. Uyu musaza yatsindiye ibikombe bitatu bya shampiona y’ubwongereza premier league ndetse n’ibikombe birindwi bya FA Cups. Wenger kandi mu mwaka wa 2003-2004 niwe wayoboye ikipe yiswe invincibles yarangije shampiona idatsinzwe umukino n’umwe, icyo gihe yahawe igikombe cya zahabu ikaba ari nayo kipe yonyine igifite muri premier league. Arsene Wenger kandi yafashije arsenal kurangiza mu myanya ine ya mbere mu gihe cy’imyaka 20 yikurikiranya ariko mu myaka ibiri ye ya nyuma byaramunaniye arangiza ku mwanya wa 5 nuwa 6. Arsene Wenger azajya yibukirwa kuba ariwe wagize uruhare rwo kubaka stade nshya ya arsenal emirates akayivana aho bakiniraga kera highburry.

title: YAHISEMO KWIYEGURIRA IMANA NJYE MPITAMO KURONGORA
article_text:
YAHISEMO KWIYEGURIRA IMANA NJYE MPITAMO KURONGORA

 YAHISEMO KWIYEGURIRA IMANA NJYE MPITAMO KURONGORA,aya namagambo yavuzwe numwe mubavandimwe akaba ninshuti ikomeye ya Padiri Aloys MUNYANSANGA ubwo y’izihizaga isabukuru ye y’imyaka 25 ahawe ubusaseridoti Kuriki cyumweru taliki 19 Kanama 2018 muri paruwasi ya cyeza abereye PADIRI MUKURU ho muntara y’amajyepfo,habereye umuhango wo kw’izihiza imyaka 25 Aloys MUNYANSANGA amaze ahawe ubupadiri,akaba yarimitswe mu mwaka wi 1993 muri paruwasi ya Kibangu ahahoze ari muri Kimine NYAKABANDA, UBWO HABURAGA amezi make gusa ngo mu Rwanda habe Genocide yakorewe abatutsi. Murugendo rutamworoheye namba kuko mu mwaka wi 1994 Genocide yatangiraga ,nawe yiciwe umuryango hafi ya wose kuko ababyeyi n’abavandimwe be bahashiriye,gusa ntiyacitse intege kuko yakomeye kumasezerano yari yariyemeje yo kwiyegurira Imana.     uyu muhango ukaba watangijwe n’igitambo cya Misa,wanitabiriye n’ingeri zose z’abanyarwanda haba abatuye mu Rwanda ndetse no mumahanga,bagaragayemo abo nzego nkuru za Kiliziya Gatorika , abo muri Guverinoma,mu Ntego ishinga amategeko ,abayobozi mu nzego bwite za leta(Executif) b’imirenge itandukanye abayobozi bakuru baza paruwasi anasaseridoti bakomoka mumiryango itandukanye abaturage benshi baturutse imihanda yose nabandi.                                ubwo hatangwaga umwanya ngo abitabiriye uyu muhango bagire icyo bavuga ,bose bagarukaga kumwete,ubwitange gushyira mu gaciro,gukora nkuwikorera,by’umwihariko ubutwari bwamuranze bwo guhuza no kurenganura abagiriwe ihohoterwa,nubwo bwose byari mubihe bikomeye kandi afite n’ibikomere. Akaba arimwe mu mpamvu zatumye anahabwa impano zikomeye harimo n’inka y’amurikiwe muruhame ndetse nintama yo kuziba imbere.                                                                                                                                                                   yashimiye abitabiriye iyi sabukuru ,by’umwihariko ababyeyi be muburyo bw’umubiri bamubaye hafi cyane,aboneraho gusaba abachristo umusanzu munini wo kubyarira Kiriziya abageni (abasaseridoti),avyga ko yaba ari inkunga ikomeye cyane kuri Kiriziya n’isi yose.

article_text:
ABAFITE UBUMUGA BWO KUTABONA BATANZE MUTUEL DE SANTE50 KUBATISHOBOYE

 ABAFITE UBUMUGA BWO KUTABONA BATANZE MITUWERI 50 KUBATISHOBOYE BO MU MURENGE WA MUHIMA  Mugihe bimenyerewe ko abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona arabo gufashwa, Kuruyu wa gatandatu taliki ya 11 kanama ahagana muma saa yine ,ubwo urubyiruko rwa Muhima rw’izihizaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wahariwe urubyiruko, abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona bahakoreye igikorwa kindashyikirwa,ubwo bashyikirizaga ubuyobozi bw’akagali ka AMAHORO ibahasha irimo mutuel de sante zigera kuri mirongo itanu igikorwa cy’abanjirijwe n’umuganda .        byatunguye benshi,kandi bibakora kumutima n’amaranga mutima menshi ;nikiniga kinshi abaganiriye na hafiyawe.com                           Vce Mayor ushinzwe imiberehomyiza mu karere ka Nyarugenge ‘yashimiye byimazeyo ishyirahamwe ryabo kandi anavuga ko igikomeye arukugira umutima muzima Mukiganiro cyiza twagiranye na Dr Patrick Subi uhagarariye abafite ubumuga rwo kutabona,yagize ati “igisobanuro nuko ,igihe cyarareze aho twavugaga ko abantu batabona bafite ubumuga ,bakwiye gusabirizabagomba kugirirwa impuhwe bagafashwa,ubungubu igihe cyuko abafite ubumugauwariwe wese ariga akisanzura baranakora “asoza asaba ko bahabwa ubushobozi bwo kwigira kuko niyi nkunga bayikesha ababashije kwiga  ubu akaba ari abakozi bitunze bakanatunga nimiryango yabo yongeye kubazwa icyo yabwira abanyarwanda bacyumva ko utabona akwiye guhezwa,avuga ko bene abo basigaye inyuma,atanga urugero rw’umuganda bakoranye nabandi (bahinze,bayora ibyatsi babirunda aho ibindi biri)asaba ko  bahabwa ubushobozi bwo kwigira ibindi barashoboye.     Hanatanzwe kandi ikiganiro ku matora,ushinzwe ibikorwa by’amatora mu murenge wa Muhima Rwishyura John yibukije abari bateraniye aho uko amatora amatora azakorwa nibyingenzi bisabwa umuturage mukuzuza inshingano ze ku munsi w’itora na mbere yayo.

title: Gisagara : Abarenga 1000 mu ruganda rwa Nyiramugengeri  bafite impungenge za Coronavirus
article_text:
Gisagara : Abarenga 1000 mu ruganda rwa Nyiramugengeri  bafite impungenge za Coronavirus

 Abakozi bagera ku 1200 mu ruganda Hakan Peat Power Plant rutunganya amashanyarazi  aturutse kuri nyiramugengeri , mu karere ka Gisagara bavuga ko bafite impungenge z’icyorezo cya COVID 19 gishobora kubibasira  kuko bagikora akazi mu bucucike kandi nta buryo buhari bwo kubarinda.  Uruganda Hakan Peat Power Plant rukorera mu murenge wa Mamba mu karere ka Gisagara. Rubabarurirwamo  abakozi basaga igihumbi na Magana abiri (1200), bakorera mu makampani arenga ane anyuranye.  Impungenge zabo zishingira ahanini ku bwinshi bwabo, bavanze abanyarwanda n’abahinde. Mu gihe Leta yamaze guhagarika ahantu hose hahurirwa n’abantu benshi nk’amashuri n’insengero, bo bibaza impamvu imirimo y’uru ruganda itaba ihagaze ngo hirindwe icyorezo cya Coronavirus. Buri gitondo  bahurira ku kazi, bagatonda umurongo bagapimwa umuriro n’ibindi. Umwe mu bakozi b’uru ruganda ati”turuta ishuri, turuta urusengero, turuta isoko; ariko turacyakora. Uretse no kuba twakwandurira kuri iyo mirongo, duhurira muri resitora imwe , twirirwa duhererekanya ibikoresho kuri shantiye, ubwiherero ni bumwe, ibikombe tunywesha amazi ntabwo buri wese yatunga icye. Ni ibibazo bikomeye”.  Batinya abahinde  Muri urwo ruganda habamo abanyarwanda  ndetse n’abahinde babakoresha bagera kuri 200. Zimwe mu ngamba ngo bafashe  nuko buri gitondo bapimwa umuriro , abagaragaje umuriro mwinshi  bakabanza gishyirwa mu kato, “ikizu cy’ibibati”; nyuma bakongera gupimwa bamwe bakarekurwa bagasubira mu kazi, naho abafite ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus bakajyanwa ku bitaro bya Gakoma biri muri aka karere. Ku bahinde ngo abenshi baje mu Rwanda bakubutse mu biruhuko bisoza umwaka iwabo, babanza kwishyira mu kato  aho bacumbitse, ariko ngo nta makuru abandi bakozi bahabwa niba hari abarwaye barimo cyangwa ntabo,ngo gusa bashiduka runaka baramubuze mu kazi, ari naho kenshi  impungenge zabo zishingira . Umwe mu bakozi avuga ko hari abahinde batanu bakiri mu kato no ku bitaro bya Gakoma, kandi ngo harimo ukorora cyane.  Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Gisagara  Rutaburingoga Jerome yabwiye Valuenews ko iki kibazo bakiganiriyeho n’ abakoresha b’aba bakozi .Ati “twaganiriye ku buryo bwo kwirinda no kurinda abakozi kandi nabo babigizemo uruhare, aho bapimwa umuriro ugaragaje ibimenyetso akaba yafashwa n itsinda ry’abaganga  n’abakozi bashinzwe gukurikirana umunsi ku wundi iki cyorezo “ Ikindi ngo nuko  bitewe n’abanyamahanga  baba muri ako kazi, abaje bose kuva COVID yatangira kugaragara mu Rwanda  bahise bashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri kugira ngo harebwe niba nta kibazo bafite babone kugaruka mu kazi . Coronavirus ikigera mu Rwanda, habanje gukwirakwizwa umwirondoro w’umuhinde byavugwagaho ko ari we wa mbere uyigaragaweho mu Rwanda. Uwo muhinde nubwo byabeshyujwe, yari umwe mu bakora muri uru ruganda, iki kikaba kimwe mu bitera abandi bakozi impungenge.

title: COVID 19: Haracyari abinangira gukaraba intoki bagiye mu bandi
article_text:
COVID 19: Haracyari abinangira gukaraba intoki bagiye mu bandi

    Muri tumwe mu tubari n’ahandi hahurira abantu beshi, haracyagararagara abantu badashaka kubahiriza mabwiriza ajyanye no kwirindan icyorezo cya Coronavirus bakanga gukaraba. Nubwo biterwa n’uko baba bameze (abasinzi, abiyita ko bakomeye ), ariko ntibyababuza kuyikwirakwiza babaye bafite aho bahuriye n’uyifite. Ikiri kugaragara ni uko bamwe bakarabywa ku ngufu, abandi bakaba bari n’ahatari izo za kandagira ukarabe.   Gusa kubera ubunyangamugayo buvanze n’ubwoba bwa bamwe; hari aho usanga buri wese wakarabye acunga ko nta wundi wakwivanga mu bakarabye atabikoze. Bamwe mu bashinzwe umutekano w’ahahurira abantu benshi, baributsa, bagakarabya ku ngufu; cyangwa ukomeje kwinangira bakamukumira ngo atangiza abandi bakiriya.

title: Abagore barwaye Sida barinubira gufungishwa urubyaro ku ngufu
article_text:
Abagore barwaye Sida barinubira gufungishwa urubyaro ku ngufu

 Abagore bagera kuri 50 bafite ubwandu bw’agakoko gatera Sida, bavuga ko abaganga babafungishije urubyaro ku ngufu, nyuma yo kubasinyisha ibyo batasomye, uwanze gusinya bakanga kumuvura. Raporo ya Komisiyo y’Uburinganire bw’abagore n’abagabo muri Africa y’epfo, ivuga ko abatanze ubuhamya bagera kuri 48, nyuma yo gutabazwa n’imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bw’abagore. Iyi Komisiyo yatangiye iperereza muri 2015, ariko raporo yo yasohotse kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 24 Gashyantare, nk’uko Jeune Afrique ibitangaza. Ngo buri mugore watanze ubuhamya yabanzaga kurahira, ko ibyo agiye kuvuga ari ukuri.   Abagore bose bafungishijwe urubyaro ku ngufu bari  abiraburakazi, kandi benshi muri bo barwaye Sida, dore ko muri iki gihugu abagera kuri 13.5% bose bafite ubu bwandu. Nk’uko Keketso Maema uyobora Komisiyo y’uburinganire muri Africa y’epfo, ngo abaganga bahengeraga umugore agiye ku bise ngo abyare, bakamusinyisha inyandiko atabasha gusoma. Nyuma nibwo baje kumenya ko yabaga ari iyo kwemera gufungirwa urubyaro ntibazongere kwibaruka ukundi. Abakoze iperereza bavuga ko abaganga babwiraga umugore uri ku gise ko natemera gusinya atari buvurwe. Ninaho abagore bamwe babwiye abakoze iperereza ko babisinyishijwe bari mu gihe cy”ububabare bukomeye”, aho batashoboraga no kumva ibikubiye muri iyo nyandiko, bityo bagapfa gusinya. Iyi Komisiyo ivuga ko uburenganzira bw’aba bagore bwakandagiwe bikabije, harimo no guhabwa ubuvuzi butujuje ireme. Ngo hari n’abavuga ko abaganga babimye imiti, nubwo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yaho yahawe iyi raporo ariko igahitamo kutagira icyo iyivugaho. Africa y’epfo iri mu bihugu bya mbere bifite abarwayi benshi ba Sida, kuko bakabakaba miliyoni 8. Ibarurishamibare rya Leta ritangaza ko mu 2019, abagera kuri 13,5% by’abaturage bose(ubariyemo abagore n’abana, abazungu n’abirabura, kavukire n’abimukira) barwaye Sida.

title: “saa 15:00 niyo saha nziza yo gutera akabariro ku bashakanye”
article_text:
“saa 15:00 niyo saha nziza yo gutera akabariro ku bashakanye” 

 Yifashishije ‘science’ umwanditsi akaba n’inzobere mu bijyanye n’ubuzima bwa muntu yagaragaje isaha nyayo ibereye gutera akabariro (gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina) ku bashakanye. Alisa Vitti, inzobere mu kubaza ibibazo akaba yarananditse igitabo kitwa ‘WomanCode’ avuga ko isaha nziza yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina waba umugabo cyangwa umugore ari 15:00. Uvuga ko muri ayo masaha umugabo cyangwa umugore aba afite ubushake bwo gutera akabariro dore ko umusemburo witwa  ‘Prolactin’ ugira  uruhare mu mikorerwe y’intanga ku bagabo no ku bagore uba wavubuye ku mpande zombi. Akomeza avuga ko undi musemburo witwa ‘Follicle-stimulating hormone’ utuma hakorwa amasohoro ku bagabo, naho ku bagore ugatuma hakorwa igi rikura uba uri gukora neza muri ayo masaha. Uyu mwanditsi yongeyeho ko ku ruhande rw’abagabo, indi isaha nziza yo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina ari mu gitindo cya kare. Ibi ngo bigaterwa nuko iyo umugabo aryamye, umubiri we uvura cyane umusemburo ‘testostérone’ utera ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Ubushake ku mugabo ngo bwongera kuba bwinshi ku gicamunsi ku ndetse no ku mugore ibi akaba aribyo ashingiraho avuga ko saa 15:00 ari isaha nziza yo gutera akabariro ku bashakanye.

title: 10 Gicurasi 1994: Leta y’abicanyi yigambye ubufasha bw’u Bufaransa
article_text:
10 Gicurasi 1994: Leta y’abicanyi yigambye ubufasha bw’u Bufaransa 

 U Bufaransa bwari bwiteguye gukomeza gushyigikira ingabo z’u Rwanda (FAR), bwirengagije ubwicanyi Abatutsi bakorerwaga na Leta ya Theodore Sindikubwabo, Guverinoma ye n’ingabo za Leta.
 U Bufaransa bwashyigikiye u Rwanda mu rwego rwa politiki mpuzamahanga Raporo yavugaga ibijyanye n’ubufasha bw’u Bufaransa bwahaga u Rwanda mu rwego rwa politiki mpuzamahanga; kuba hari abasirikare b’Abafaransa ku butaka bw’u Rwanda, nk’umutwe w’abatoza ba gisirikare baje « gukubita ingabo mu bitugu » abasirikare ba Leta y’u Rwanda ; uburyo hakoreshwa ingabo z’amahanga, zaba iza Leta cyangwa abacanshuro, byabaga bica amarenga yuko hanakoreshwa abasirikare b’abacanshuro baza kurwana intambara ariko bakabihemberwa amafaranga, ibyo bikaba byaravugwaga ariko ntabwo tubitindaho kubera amakuru adahagije tubifiteho. Huchon yagiraga inama u Rwanda gukora ibishobotse byose  kugirango rwerekane ishusho nziza mu maso y’amahanga kandi bakegeka kuri FPR ubwicanyi bwose bwakorerwaga mu Rwanda : « (…) General Huchon yanyumvishije ko abasirikare b’Abafaransa bafite inzitizi nyinshi zo kudufasha kubera ibivugwa n’ibinyamakuru bisa nkaho bibogamiye kuri FPR yashoboye kubyigarurira; ko niba nta gikozwe kugirango duhindure ishusho igihugu gifite mu mahanga, abayobozi ba politiki n’aba gisirikare b’u Rwanda nibo bazaryozwa ubwicanyi bwo mu Rwanda. Yabigarutseho kenshi ». RTLM yamamazaga ubufasha bw’Abafaransa igakomeza gushishikariza kwica Abatutsi Iyo nama General Huchon yahaye Ephrem Rwabalinda, uyu yarayizirikanye cyane kuko mu gusoza raporo ye y’ubutumwa yanditse ibikurikira : “Kwerekana isura nziza y’Igihugu mu mahanga ni igikorwa kigomba kuzirikanwa cyane. Ibikoresho by’itumanaho nzanye bizadufasha kugira imishyikirano n’ibihugu by’amahanga”. Yakomeje avuga ko u Bufaransa bwatangiye gushyira mu bikorwa ubufasha bwagombaga guha Leta y’inzibacyuho n’ingabo zayo : “Urwego rushamikiye kuri Perezida Mitterrand rushinzwe ubufatanye mu bya gisirikare rurimo rurategura ibikorwa byo kudutabara .” Rwabalinda amaze kugaruka mu Rwanda (yavuye mu Bufaransa tariki ya 13 Gicurasi), habaye impinduka mu binyamakuru byari bishamikiye ku bahezanguni bari bashyigikiye Jenoside, haboneka ubushake bwo kugabanya ishusho mbi yaterwaga na Jenoside. Ariko, muri uko kwezi kwa Gicurasi 1994, ntabwo higeze haba impinduka ku byakorwaga na Guverinoma y’abicanyi yari ishyigikiye Jenoside. Abatutsi bakomeje kwicwa. RTLM yakomeje gushishikariza kwica Abatutsi, ndetse bishyirwamo ingufu nyinshi mu byumweru byakurikiyeho : abicanyi bitwaje intwaro bari kuri za bariyeri bashishikarijwe gukomeza « akazi », imvugo yuko Abatutsi biyahura irakwirakwizwa, ko ndetse aribo ba nyirabayazana b’ubwicanyi bwose. Raporo ya Rwabalinda yerekana ko yandikiwe tariki ya 16 Gicurasi 1994 i Gitarama, mu gihe Guverinoma y’inzibacyuho yari yarahimukiye. Tariki ya 18 Gicurasi 1994, Habimana Kantano, umunyamakuru wa RTLM, yatangaje ko u Bufaransa bwongeye gufasha u Rwanda, ari nako atanga inama yo guhisha ibimenyetso by’ubwicanyi : « Hari inkuru nziza ku Banyarwanda. Amakuru atangiye kuba meza koko. U Bufaransa bwongeye kuduha ubufasha bukomeye kandi bunizeza kuzabwongera. Ariko kugira ngo ubwo bufasha bukomeze kutugeraho, burasaba ko nta ntumbi z’abantu zigomba kongera kuboneka ku mihanda, kandi ko nta muntu ugomba kongera kwica undi, hari abamurebera bisekera aho kumujyana mu butegetsi ». Biragaragara ko inkuru yerekanye n’ubufasha bw’Abafaransa mu bya gisirikare  yaba yaratanzwe na Rwabalinda, cyane ko hasabwe ku mugaragaro guhisha ubwicanyi bwerekanaga ko harimo hakorwa Jenoside, nkuko General Huchon yari yabigiriye inama Rwabalinda. Twakwibutsa ko muri iyi minsi umuryango JAMBO ASBL ukorera mu Bubirigi, ugizwe ahanini n’urubyiruko rukomoka ku babyeyi bakoze Jenoside, aho rukora ibikorwa byo guhakana Jenoside no gukwirakwiza ingengabitekerzo ya Jenoside, uwo muryango uyobowe uyu munsi na Robert Mugabowindekwe, umuhungu wa Lt Col Éphrem Rwabalinda. Leta y’abicanyi yakomeje kwakira ubufasha bwa gisirikare bw’U Bufaransa, ibishyigikiwemo n’abasirikare b’icyo gihugu, kandi byemejwe n’abayobozi b’Abafaransa, barangajwe imbere na Perezida Mitterrand. Dr Bizimana Jean Damascène, Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Komisiyo y’Igihugu yo kurwanya Jenoside, CNLG Ubwanditsi

title: Muri ibi bihe hari abakozi batemerewe kujyana imodoka mu kazi kubera ubwinshi bwazo
article_text:
Muri ibi bihe hari abakozi batemerewe kujyana imodoka mu kazi kubera ubwinshi bwazo

 Abakorera ibigo bitandukanye bitanga serivisi z’ibanze zikenewe muri ibi bihe baributswa na Polisi y’u Rwanda ko bagomba kugenda mu modoka rusange bajya cyangwa bava mu kazi, uzafatwa yatwaye imodoka ye azahanwa bikomeye.


 CP Kabera yibukije Abaturarwanda bose ko gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo ikomeje kugeza tariki ya 30  Ibi ni bimwe mu bikubiye mu butumwa, Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda CP John Bosco Kabera, yagejeje ku banyarwanda mu makuru ya Televisiyo Rwanda yo ku wa 19 Mata 2020. CP Kabera yibukije Abaturarwanda bose ko gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo ikomeje kugeza tariki ya 30 nkuko biherutse kwemezwa n’inama idasanzwe y’Abaminisitiri yateranye mu mpera z’iki cyumweru. Avuga ku bijyanye n’abakozi bajya mu kazi muri ibi bihe, yagize ati “Ibigo bifite abakozi benshi nk’amabanki, ibigo by’itumanaho cyangwa amasosiyete y’itumanaho n’ibindi bigo bifite abakozi benshi byemerewe gukora akazi nkuko bigaragara mu mabwiriza, abakozi babyo bagomba kugenda mu modoka za rusange, hubahirizwa intera hagati yabo cyangwa intambwe hagati yabo.” Urugero: Niba imodoka isanzwe itwara abantu 30, igomba gutwara abantu 15. Abakozi b’ibi bigo bazongera kugaragara ko batwara ibinyabiziga byabo bazafatwa bahanwe ku buryo bukomeye. Imodoka ntoya nukuvuga amavatiri, kamyoneti cyangwa amajipe z’abantu ku giti cyabo ntizigomba gutwara abantu barenze babiri mu gihe bibaye ngombwa. Urugero: bagiye guhaha, kubikuza n’izindi serivisi za ngombwa. Amakamyoneti n’amakamyo agemura ibiribwa cyangwa ibindi bintu bya ngombwa ntagomba kurenza abantu babiri. Nukuvuga umushoferi na komvuwayeri (convoyeur) we”. Yongeyeho ko “Hari ibigo byabwiwe ko abakozi babyo batajyana imodoka zabo mu kazi kubera ubwinshi bwazo.” Yakomeje avuga ko Polisi yihanangiriza abantu bose bafite umuco wo kuyibeshya ko bagiye gukora ingendo za ngombwa, abagisengera mu matsinda, abasurana mu ngo zabo, abishyira hamwe bagashaka uburyo banywa inzoga, abakorera siporo hanze ko bazakomeza gufatwa bagafungwa bagacibwa amande ndetse abafite ibinyabiziga bigafatirwa kugeza igihe gahunda yo kurwanya icyorezo cya coronavus irangiriye. Polisi kandi irashimira abaturarwanda bagize iyi gahunda iyabo cyane cyane abakangurira bagenzi babo kuguma mu rugo, abatanga amakuru bayaha polisi mu kazi kayo ka buri munsi, uburyo batanga amakuru y’abantu barenga kuri aya mabwiriza kandi dushishikariza abantu bose ko aya mabwiriza bayagira ayabo. Abaturarwanda bakaba bagirwa inama yo gukora gahunda y’icyumweru maze serivisi bakeneye bagasohoka bakazibonera icyarimwe bityo bikabarinda gusohoka mu ngo zabo buri munsi. Yasoje ubu butumwa agira ati “Turabibutsa ko kwirinda coronavirusi ur’ukuyirinda abawe ndetse n’abaturarwanda muri rusange”. Src: Iriba.news

title: COVID-19: Ibiciro bya peteroli byahanantutse, idolari riratumbagira
article_text:
COVID-19: Ibiciro bya peteroli byahanantutse, idolari riratumbagira 

 Zimwe mu ngaruka nshya za COVID-19 zitangiye kwigaragaza, aho ibicio bya lisansi na mazutu byahanantutse bwa mbere mu mateka bikagera munsi y’idolari. Ibi byatumye idolari naryo ritumbagira  kuva kuri uyu wa mbere rica ku iyero. Abakozi ntibakijya ku kazi, imodoka n’indege biraparitse, amakamyo n’amabisi nta kiva aho ari. Imihanda irera deee, gahunda ni Guma mu rugo. Kuba ukwezi kurenga gushize ibinyabiziga bitajya mu muhanda, nta kindi byari gusiga usibye guta agaciro ka peteroli. Ku isoko rya Amerika, igiciro cy’akagunguru ka Lisansi cyagiye munsi y’idolari, kamanutseho amadolari 38 kuri uyu wa mbere. Ibigega bya Lisansi biracyuzuye, abayikoreshaga ntabo. Amasezerano n’abakiriya bayo muri Amerika agomba kurangira none, kandi igihari. Icyihutirwa ni ukugabanuka kw’ibiciro, ariko nanone bigaha amahirwe idolari rya America kuzamuka cyane. Ejo satanu z’ijoro, idolari,ryari risanzwe munsi y’iyero, ryari rimaze kurirengaho 0,20%. Uko inkuru ya Le Figaro ibivuga, ngo ubukungu bw’isi ntibushobora kuzahuka  ubw’Amerika bukiri hasi, ngo kuko idolari ari ryo ribitse ubudahangarwa bw’icyo gihugu cy’igihangange. Inzobere mu by’ubukungu, Kathy Lien wa BK Asset Management muri  America ivuga ko “Ubushake bwa Prerezida  Trump ari bwo kongera ishoramari kurushaho mu kwezi gutaha kwa gatanu, inganda nshya zigafungura zisanga izari zisanzwe. Ibi rero bikazatuma amadovize y’ibihugu bifite ubukungu buringaniye kandi bushingiye ku biciro bya Peteroli ahungabana, cyane nk’irubule ry’abarusiya, ikorone rya Norvege, ipeso rya Mexique ndeste n’idolari rya Canada. Abaguzi basakiwe Le Figaro ikomeza ivuga ko idolari rya Canada rishobora guhanantuka bitarenze iki cyumweru nk’uko amakuru ku bukungu abivuga. Ibi ngo bizaterwa n’ubucuruzi budandaza buzagabanuka kubera COVID-19. Ibi binemezwa n’ikigega Mpuzamahanga cy’imari (FMI) ko byose ari ingaruka za COVID-19. Ariko kandi, guhanantuka kw’ibiciro bya Peteroli ku isoko ry’America gusa ntibuvuga ko ibindi bihugu bizadamarara, kuko ku rwego rw’isi naho igiciro cyagabanutseho 6%, akagunguru kakagura hafi amadolari 26. Ibi ntibisanzwe ko haba itandukaniro ringana ritya ku masoko yombi, kuko ubusanzwe byabaga bigendana. Ubu harimo intera y’amadolari ane ku kagunguru, ariko umushakashatsi Francis Perrin , anavuga amasoko yombi afite amasezerano azarangira vuba , kandi nta cyizere cyo kubona abandi  bakiriya mbere y’uko COVID-19 iva mu nzira. Magingo aya bose barashaka abaguzi babasha kumara vuba Peteroli ibitse mu bigega, ariko ntibyoroshye nyine kubera Guma mu rugo. Ibi biratuma bagabanya ibiciro ngo babashe kurangiza iri mu bigega, habone kujyamo indi; ku buryo banifuza kwishyura uwabasha kuyikuramo ngo ibigega biboneke.

Ingamba zo kugabanya ibiciro hose Mu bihe bisanzwe iyo imodoka zigenda abakoresha Peteroli baba ari benshi, ariko ubu ibihugu biyicuruza birasabwa kumanura ibiciro. Uyu ni umwanzuro wamaze gufatirwa hamwe n’ibihugu 23 bigize umuryango 0PEP, ihuza ibihugu bisarura bikanacuruza Peteroli, biyobowe na Arabiya Sawudite n’Uburusiya. Aya masezerano azatangira mu kwezi gutaha kwa gatanu, arareba utugunguru miliyoni 10 ku munsi gusa, tungana na 10% y’umusaruro wa Peteroli ku isi yose. Ikigo mpuzamahanga cy’ingufu(lAgence internationale de l’énergie -AIE) kivuga ko muri uku kwezi kwa kane utugunguru twakoreshejwe ku isi twamanutseho 29 buri munsi ugereranije na mbere. Nabyo ni ubwa mbere bibaye. Karegeya Omar
