title: Abapolisi b’u Rwanda bari mu butumwa bw’amahoro bibutse abazize Jenoside
article_text:
Abapolisi b’u Rwanda bari mu butumwa bw’amahoro bibutse abazize Jenoside 

 Abapolisi b’u Rwanda aho bari mu mahanga mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro bifatanyije n’abandi Banyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri Mata 1994  ku wa Kabiri tariki ya 07 Mata .
 Amabendera yamanuwe agezwa muri kimwe cya kabiri mu guha agaciro inzirakarengane zazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi Buri mwaka tariki ya 07 Mata Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda ku Isi yose batangira icyumweru cyahariwe kwibuka inzirakarengane z’Abatutsi barenga miriyoni bazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Kuri iyi nshuro ya 26 umuhango wo kwibuka wabereye mu gihugu cya Centrafrique, Sudani y’Epfo no mu gace ka Abyei ahari abapolisi b’u Rwanda bari mu butumwa bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye (Loni) bugamije kubungabunga amahoro muri ibyo bihugu. Uyu muhango wabaye hazirikanwa ingamba ziriho muri iki gihe zo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Koronavirusi (COVID-19) aho byabaye mu buryo budasanzwe abantu birinda kwegerana ari benshi. Habaye umunota wo guceceka ndetse n’amabendera arururutswa kugera muri kimwe cya Kabiri mu rwego rwo guha agaciro inzirakarengane z’Abatutsi bazize Jenoside yo muri Mata 1994. Abari mu butumwa bw’amahoro bakurikiye imihango yo kwibuka ndetse n’ijambo rya Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda Paul Kagame kuri tereviziyo y’u Rwanda aho bari mu mahanga. Mu butumwa bw’Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, Antonio Guterres yavuze ko ubwicanyi bwateguwe ndetse n’ibindi byaha byakorewe Abatutsi  byasigiye Isi isomo rikomeye. Yagize ati:  “Turimo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi muri Mata 1994. Uyu munsi, twongeye kwiyemeza kurinda abaturage b’abasiviri, twirinda ko Jenoside yazongera kuba ahandi ku Isi.” Yakomeje avuga ko ari inshingano za buri muntu mu gushimangira uburenganzira bw’ikiremwa muntu  n’agaciro ka buri muntu hubahirizwa amategeko. Ati: “Ubu turimo kwibuka inzirakarengane z’Abatutsi turwanya urwango mu buryo bwose rwagaragaramo. Duterwa imbaraga n’umurava w’abarokotse ubwo bugome ndetse duterwa imbaraga n’umurava w’abakoze uko bashoboye bagahagarika ubwo bwicanyi.” Yashimiye Abanyarwanda bose bari mu butumwa bw’Umuryango w’Abibumbye bwo kubungabunga amahoro hirya no hino ku Isi, avuga ko serivisi batanga zikomoka ku bwitange bwabo  bikaba bitanga ikizere cy’amahoro aho bari hose. U Rwanda rufite abapolisi barenga 1000 mu butumwa bwo kubungabunga amahoro hirya no hino ku Isi. Ubwanditsi : Indatwa.org

title: Abantu 4 bakize COVID-19 mu Rwanda bamaze gusezererwa
article_text:
Abantu 4 bakize COVID-19 mu Rwanda bamaze gusezererwa 

 Abantu bane bari abarwayi   b’icyorezo cya Koronavirusi COVID19 bamaze gusezererwa uyu munsi ku Cyumweru tariki 05 Mata, nyuma y’aho ibizamini byabo byerekanye ko nta Koronavirusi ikirangwa mu mubiri wabo.
 Abakize bavurirwaga mu kigo gifasha abanduye icyorezo cya koronavirusi giherereye i Kanyinya mu Karere ka Nyarugenge. Abarwayi ba COVID-19 mu Rwanda bari bamaze kugera ku 102. Bivuze ko imibare yamaze guhinduka kubera abarwayi 4 basezerewe kuri iki Cyumweru bityo hakaba hasigaye abarwayi 98. Umwe mu bakize asezera ku baganga bamwitayeho, yiteguye gusubira mu muryango Kuva mu Rwanda hagaragara icyorezo cya COVID19, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe ingamba zirimo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa rya Koronavirusi. Abanyarwanda basabwe kuguma mu rugo, kugira isuku by’umwihariko gukaraba intoki inshuro nyinshi hakoreshejwe isabune n’amazi meza, kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa ndetse no gusiga metero imwe hagati y’abantu babiri hakiyongeraho no kudasuhuzanya. Nkuko bitangazwa n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (WHO/OMS),  kugeza ubu Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika ni zo ziri ku isonga mu kugira umubare munini w’abagaragaweho COVID-19, zigakurikirwa na Espagne, u Butaliyani, u Budage, u Bufaransa Indatwa.org

title: Drogba na Eto’o baramagana ibyo kugeragereza urukingo rwa Covid 19 muri Afurika
article_text:
Drogba na Eto’o baramagana ibyo kugeragereza urukingo rwa Covid 19 muri Afurika 

 Abakinnyi bubatse amateka mu mupira w’amaguru bakomoka muri Afurika; Didier Drogba na Samuel Eto’o Fils bamaganye bivuye inyuma ibyo kugeragereza urukingo rwa Coronavirus ku banyafurika.
 Izi mpaka zavutse ubwo Jean Paul Mira, umuganga ushinzwe abarwayi barembye cyane mu bitaro byitwa, “Cochin”  biri ku murwa mukuru, Paris na Dogiteri Camillle Locht ushinzwe ubushakashatsi mu byerekeye ubuzima bw’abantu mu kigo, “Inserm Health Research Group” bombi batangaje kuri televiziyo y’u Bufaransa ko kugerageza inkingo z’icyorezo cya coronavirus mu bihuhu byo muri Afurika kitaba ari igitekerezo kibi. Ikigo, “Inserm Medical Research Group”  kivuga ko abavuga gutyo bumvise nabi ibyatangajwe na muganga, Jean-Paul Mira n’umushakashatsi Camille Locht. Muganga Jean-Paul Mira yavuze ko kugeragereza uru rukinfo muri Afurika kitaba ari ikintu kibi kuko ngo nta bikoresho byo kwikingira bihari, kandi nta n’imiti ihari. Yatangaje ko ibyo byaba nkuko biriho bikorwa mu bindi bice ku bijyanye n’ubushakashatsi buri gukorwa kuri Sida. Yavuze ko bagira ubushakashatsi ku bakora umwuga w’uburaya ku bijyanye na Sida kubera bari mu bantu bashobora kwandura kurusha abandi iyo ndwara kubera ko batikingira. Abantu batari bake bahise bandika ku mbuga nkorangambaga bagaragaza akababaro kabo. Bakomoza ko ari ugusuzugura ab’uruhu rwirabura, bahasaba ko byamaganwa. Abo barimo Didier Drogba na Samuel Eto’o bahoze ari abakinyi bakomeye mu mupira w’amaguru, bakaba bombi baturuka muri Afurika. Didier Drogba yavuze ko Abanyafurika badakwiye kuba ibikoresho byo kugeragerezaho izo nkingo. Avuga ko ibyatangajwe na Jean-Paul Mira na Camille Locht biteye isoni. Nyamara ikigo cy’ubushakashatsi mu bijyanye n’ubuzima, “Inserm Medical Research Group” kimenyesha ko igerarezwa ry’inkingo zishobora gukingira coronavirus zigiye kubera mu bihugu by’i Burayi no muri Australia. Ico kigo kivuga ko iryo geragezwa ryabera muri Afurika, ngo ryanabera icyarimwe no mu Burayi ndetse no muri Amerika. Icyo kigo kimenyesha ko Afurika itakwibagirana cyangwa ngo ikumirwe mu bushakashatsi kubera ko Covid 19 yakwirakwiriye ku Isi hose. Mu Rwanda byavuzwe ko rwakiriye ubusabe bw’ikigo LEAF Pharmaceuticals cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika kinafite ibiro mu Rwanda, gishaka gutangira ubushakashatsi ku muti wongera umwuka mu mubiri w’uwanduye Coronavirus. Ni umuti ushobora gufasha mu kongera umwuka mu bice by’umubiri (tissus), aho kwiringira imashini gusa zabigenewe (intensive care unit (ICU) ventilators). Umuyobozi wa LEAF Pharmaceuticals, Dr Clet Niyikiza yabwiye Televiziyo Rwanda kuri ko magingo aya ikigo cye kiri muri 17 biri gushaka umuti n’urukingo bya Coronavirus muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. U Rwanda ruvuga ko iki kigo cyamaze gusaba uburenganzira bwo gukorera ubu bushakashatsi mu Rwanda, harebwa uburyo uwo muti ukora. Kugeza ubu ngo impande zombi ziracyaganira. Indatwa.org

title: Tunisia: Abakozi 150 b’uruganda bishyize mu kato ngo bakore udupfukamunwa
article_text:
Tunisia: Abakozi 150 b’uruganda bishyize mu kato ngo bakore udupfukamunwa 

 Abakozi bo mu ruganda rwo muri Tunisia bishyize mu kato ngo bakore ibikoresho byo kwikingira mu maso (masques/masks) 50,000 buri munsi ndetse n’ibindi bikoresho by’ubwirinzi mu buvuzi.
Tunisia: Abakozi 150 b’uruganda bishyize mu kato ngo bakore udupfukamunwa 
 Abo bakozi 150, biganjemo abagore, bishyize mu kato mu kwezi gushize kwa kabiri mu ruganda ruzwi ku izina rya ‘Consomed’. Umukuru wabo Hamza Alouini yabwiye BBC ko bariguterwa imbaraga no gukunda igihugu cyabo, muri iki gihe Tunisia n’isi biri mu rugamba rwo kurwanya icyorezo cya coronavirus. Bwana Alouini yabwiye ikiganiro Focus on Africa cya BBC ati: “Nitudakora abaganga bacu ntabwo bazabona uko birinda iyi virusi”. “Ndikugerageza gukora uko nshoboye ku bw’igihugu cyanjye cyose – ku bitaro, igisirikare, polisi, kuri buri wese”.

title: Waba uzi abantu bafite ibyago byo kwandura coronavirus kurusha abandi ndetse n’icyo basabwa gukora?
article_text:
Waba uzi abantu bafite ibyago byo kwandura coronavirus kurusha abandi ndetse n’icyo basabwa gukora? 

 Virusi ya Corona ishobora kwanduza umuntu uwo ari we wese, ariko abantu bafite indwara zimwe na zimwe ndetse n’abasaza bafite ibyago byinshi byo kwandura iyi ndwara.
Waba uzi abantu bafite ibyago byo kwandura coronavirus kurusha abandi ndetse n’icyo basabwa gukora?  Niba urwaye igihe kinini ushobora kubangamirwa naya makuru. Ariko ninde ufite ibyago byo kwandura? Benshi mu bafite ibyago byo kwandura ni abantu bafite imyaka 70, abafite ubumuga bw’ubwonko ndetse nabantu bari munsi yimyaka 70 niba bafite ibimenyetso bikurikira. Indwara y’ibihaha nka asima, kubabara mu gatuza, kudahumeka neza no kugira umuriro mwinshi. Indwara z’umutima n’imitsi, Indwara y’impyiko Indwara y’umwijima Guhangayika mu mutwe Diyabete Indwara zifata ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri nka VIH na kanseri Abanywa ibiyobyabwenge Abagore batwite Ese urwaye asima yakora iki? Ikigo cy’ubuzima cy’Ubwongereza cyagiriye inama abantu barwaye asima gukoresha impemu zisanzwe, nkuko bisanzwe. Umuntu agomba kumenya neza ko impemu ziwe zimukikije buri munsi kabone niyo yaba adafite ibimenyetso bya asima. Niba usanze waranduye virusi ya corona, hamagara abashinzwe ubuzima. Ese ndamutse nkuze cyane nakora iki? Inama yatanzwe na muganga kubaturage, hatitawe ku myaka – ni ukuba kure yabandi kugirango wirinde kwandura. Ibi bivuze ko umuntu atagomba kujya ahantu hateraniye abantu kugirango yifatanye nabo. Ibi ni ingenzi cyane cyane kubarengeje imyaka 70 kimwe nabafite iyi ndwara kuko bafite ibyago byo kwandura. Nakora iki niba mfite uburwayi bukomeye? Umuntu wese ufite ibyago byo kwandura indwara nkubukonje busanzwe butera umuriro agomba gufata ingamba zo kwirinda ubwandu. Abantu bagaragaza ibimenyetso by’ubwandu – nkabafite inkorora cyangwa ibicurane, bagomba kuguma murugo. Niba ibimenyetso byashize kandi umuntu akaba atameze neza, bagomba kubonana na muganga. Nakora iki ndwaye diyabete? Abantu barwaye diyabete yo mu bwoko bwa 1 na 2 bafite ibyago byinshi byo kwandura virusi ya corona. Niba urwaye diyabete ukaba uhura nibimenyetso nko gukorora n’umuriro mwinshi kimwe no kunanirwa guhumeka ugomba guhora usuzuma uko umeze. Niba ufite kimwe muri ibyo bimenyetso ugomba kuguma murugo iminsi irindwi, ugakomeza gufata imiti. Niba utabonye ibimenyetso bya virusi ya corona ukaba ushaka kubonana na muganga ugomba guhamagara cyangwa ukamuhamagara kumurongo aho kujya imbona nkubone. Ese abagore batwite bakwiye guhangayika? Nta kimenyetso cyerekana ko abagore batwite n’abana babo bafite ibyago byo kwandura virusi ya corona ariko leta yabasabye gufata ingamba z’ubuzima bwabo. Kimwe nabandi bantu bagomba gufata ingamba zo kwirinda kwandura. Abashinzwe ubuzima bavuga ko bashyizwe ku rutonde rw’abantu bafite ibyago byo kwandura virusi.

Ariko ninde ufite ibyago byo kwandura? title: Koronavirusi: Hashimangiwe akato k’iminsi 14 ku bagenderera ibihugu bya EAC
article_text:
Koronavirusi: Hashimangiwe akato k’iminsi 14 ku bagenderera ibihugu bya EAC 

 Abaminisitiri b’Ubuzima, ab’Ubucuruzi, abashinzwe Ubutwererane bw’Ibiguhugu bigize Umuryango w’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC), n’Abanyamabanga ba Leta muri Minisiteri z’Ububanyi n’Amahanga,  bashimangiye ko abagenderera ibihugu bigize uwo muryango bagomba gupimwa no gushyirwa mu kato k’iminsi 14 mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Koronavirusi (COVID-19).
Ibihugu bya EAC byiyemeje korohereza ibicuruzwa no gufasha abagizweho ingaruka n’ifungwa ry’imipaka Itangazo rikubiyemo imyanzuro y’iyo nama yakorewe ku ikoranabuhanga (video conference) ryerekana ko yakozwe hagamijwe gusangira amakuru n’ubumenyi bihari ku cyorezo cya COVID-19, gufata ingamba zo kugikumira no kwirinda ko cyakomeza gukwirakwira, ndetse no gutegura gahunda ihamye yo guhangana n’ingaruka z’iki cyorezo mu bihugu bya EAC. Iyo nama yayobowe na Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Rwanda akaba n’Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Abaminisitiri b’Ubuzima muri EAC Dr Ngamije Daniel, yemeje ko hashyirwaho hakanashyigikirwa komite yihariye ikurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro yafashwe. Abo bayobozi bateranye mu gihe ibihugu bine muri bitandatu bagaragayemo abarwayi 96 kugeza ubu (Uganda 14; Kenya 28; u Rwanda 41 na Tanzania 13), aho u Burundi na Sudani y’Epfo  bitaratangaza umurwayi n’umwe. Indi myanzuro yafashwe irimo guhagarika inama z’imbonankubone, hakimakazwa ikoranabuhanga mu guhanahana amakuru no koroshya urujya n’uruza rw’ibicuruzwa byambuka imipaka. Buri kamyo itwaye ibicuruzwa ntigomba kurenza abantu batatu kandi bazajya bapimirwa ku mupaka mbere yo kwambuka, mu gihe bafite ibimenyetso byo kwandura bashyirwe mu kato ariko ibyo batwaye bishakirwe uko byagezwa ku cyerekezo cyabyo bikimara guterwa imiti yica virusi. Ba nyiri ibicuruzwa barasabwa kumenyekanisha ingendo nyambukamipaka mbere yo kuzikora kandi bakajya bahagarara gusa ahabugenewe mu kwirinda ko bagira uruhare mu ikwirakwizwa ry’icyorezo. Za Ambasade z’ibihugu zasabwe gufasha abagizweho ingaruka n’ifungwa ry’imipaka bakabona uburyo bagera mu cyerekezo cyabo mu karere. Ibihugu byanasabwe gufasha ibigo n’inganda gutunganya ibiribwa n’ibikoresho nkenerwa bihagije cyane cyane ibyifashishwa mu isuku no mu guhangana na COVID-19. Imibare itangwa n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (WHO) yerekana ko kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 26 Werurwe 2020,  abamaze kwandura COVID-19 ari 472,907 , abayikize ni 114,775, na ho abo imaze gutwara ubuzima ni 21,315. title: PAC yanenze WASAC yatanze amasoko ya miliyari 10 idakurikije amategeko
article_text:
PAC yanenze WASAC yatanze amasoko ya miliyari 10 idakurikije amategeko 

 Abadepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko banenze uburyo imikorere idahwitse yakunze kuranga Ikigo gishinzwe gukwirakwiza amazi, isuku n’isukura (WASAC) yagize ingaruka mu bijyanye no gukwirakwiza amazi ndetse no gushyira mu bikorwa indi mishinga.  
 Ibi byagaragajwe ubwo Komisiyo ishinzwe gukurikurana imikoreshereze y’imari n’umutungo by’igihugu (PAC) yumviraga mu ruhame ibisobanuro by’iki kigo ku bibazo bikomeye by’imicungire y’imari n’imikoreshereze y’umutungo w’Igihugu. Amwe mu makosa yagaragajwe na raporo y’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’Imari ya Leta ya Leta ya 2017/2018 harimo kuba iki kigo gishinzwe gukwirakwiza amazi, isuku n’isukura cyaragiye gishyira abakozi mu myanya hadakurikijwe ibisabwa, amasoko asaga miliyari 10 yatanzwe hadakurikijwe amategeko, igihombo cy’amafaranga y’u Rwanda asaga miliyari ndetse n’inganda za Nzove zidatanga amazi yari yitezwe. Abadepite bagize  PAC banenze imikorere mibi yaranze iki kigo. Depite Uwineza Belline yagize ati ’’Icyizere muduha ku kanama gatanga amasoko, ko tutazongera guhura n’ibyo bibazo twumvise mu mitangire y’amasoko ni iyihe?’’ Na ho Depite Ntezimana Jean Claude yagize ati ’’Tuzi twese ibibazo by’amazi, ndetse na bamwe muri twe twasize mu ngo zacu nta yarimo, kandi ibyo ni byo byatugejeje no ku bibazo by’ibiciro by’amazi, kugeza ubu kidashimishije. Muri raporo ya AG hari aho tubona ko amazi atunganywa agurishwa amenshi amenekera mu butaka ntituyabone.’’ Perezida wa PAC, Dr Ngabitsinze Jean Chrysostome asanga minisiteri ireberera iki kigo ikwiye gufata ingamba zifatika ku gucyemura ibi bibazo. Ati "Uretse no kuba badashyira mu bikorwa inama bagiriwe na AG, iyo urebye raporo ijyanye n’imicungire usanga bafite agahomamunwa, ndetse n’imishinga iyishamikiyeho ni ibibazo bikomeye hari n’ibijyanye no gushyira abakozi mu myanya nta bizamini byakozwe. Rero ni ikigo navuga ko ari icya mbere mu bakoresha nabi amafaranga, ariko icyo dushima ni uko ubuyobozi bwa minisiteri bufite ubushake bwo kureba uburyo byakemuka.’’ Umuyobozi Mukuru wa WASAC,  Muzola Aimé yemeye amakosa atandukanye yakozwe ariko akagaragaza ko hari ingamba zafashwe ngo atazasubira. Yagize ati ’’Urebye kwiyemeza dufite, ndetse n’abakozi bakaba bahari, twiyemeje kubirangiza. Ku bijyanye n’inganda za Nzove amatiyo agomba kujyana amazi yose ntabwo yari ahari, ariko ubu twabonye inguzanyo yo gukora imiyoboro y’ayo mazi. Umushinga nurangira amazi yose agomba kuva muri izo nganda azakwirakwizwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali.’’ Ikigo WASAC cyashyize mu bikorwa inama z’Umugenzuzi Mukuru w’imari ya Leta ku kigero cya 28%. Ku bijyanye n’umushinga LV WATSAN II, wagombaga gukora ibijyanye n’isukura mu turere twa Nyanza, Nyagatare na Kayonza, ucunzwe nabi, abadepite banenze uburyo imodoka zaguzwe muri uwo mushinga kuva muri 2015 zabuze icyo zikora, kuko habayeho agasigane hagati ya WASAC n’utwo turere. Gusa, ubuyobozi bwa WASAC bwavuze ko hagiye kukosorwa ibitaragenze neza muri uwo mushinga.

title: Kudakoresha ikoranabuhanga, intandaro yo guhomba kwa zimwe muri SACCO
article_text:
Kudakoresha ikoranabuhanga, intandaro yo guhomba kwa zimwe muri SACCO 

 Abagana Koperative zo kuzima no kugurizanya zizwi nk’imirenge SACCO bakomeje kuzamura amajwi bavuga ko batabona serivisi zinoze kubera kudakoresha ikoranabuhanga.

 Kimwe mu byo banenga ni uko badashobora kubitsa no kubikuza aho ari ho hose mu gihugu. Ubuyobozi bw’ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere ry’amakoperative bwabwiye itangazamakuru rya Flash ko idindira ry’umushinga wo gushyira ikoranabuhanga muri za SACCO waturutse kuri Kompanyi y’Abanyakenya yatsindiye iryo soko ariko ikaza kunanirwa. Iterambere ry’ikoranabuhanga mu bihe bya none niryo abagana koperative zo kuzigama no kugurizanya imirenge SACCO baheraho, bashengurwa no kuba magingo aya badashobora kubitsa, kubikuza cyangwa kubona izindi servisi ubu zitangwa n’ibindi bigo by’imari byifashishije ikoranabuhanga. Kamango Romeo akorana n’umurenge SACCO Kimihurura yagize ati “Iyo ufite ikoranabuhanga ni nka Banki ugendana ushobora kubikuza, ushobora guhererekanya amafaranga kuri telefoni, kugura ikarita n’izindi serivisi nko kwishyura amazi n’umuriro.” Uwifashije Drocelle nawe afite Konti muri SACCO ya Kimihurura we ati “Nyine byaba ngombwa ko ahongaho haba hari konti nakenera kubikuza  nkabikuza bitabaye ngombwa ko njya aho nafungurije konti.” Imbogamizi zituruka ku kudakoresha ikoranabuhanga mu mirenge SACCO zinashimangirwa n’abacungamutungo b’abaya ma koperative. Kuba badashobora kugenzura imari mu buryo bwihuse no kuba badahaza ibyifuzo by’abakiliya ni zimwe muri zo. Nsengiyumva Simon  ni umucungamutungo wa SACCO icyerekezo Kinyinya. Ati “Kuba tudakoresha ikoranabuhanga bitubereye imbogamizi kuko ntabwo ubona neza ishusho y’umutungo umunsi ku munsi cyangwa isaha ku yindi kandi n’abanyamuryango ntibabikunze aho bari hose hari SACCO.” Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere ry’amakoperative kivuga ko nyirabayazana w’idindira ry’umushinga wo gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu mirenge SACCO, rifite umuzi kuri Kompanyi y’Abanyakenya yari yahawe isoko mu myaka 4 ishize ariko ntishobore gukora ibyo yari yiyemeje. Prof HARERIMANA Jean Bosco ayobora Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere ry’amakoperative. Yagize ati “Guhera mu mwaka wa 2015 kugera iki gihe, hatanzwe isoko ritsindirwa na Kompanyi yo muri Kenya hanyuma biza kugaragara ko yabeshye itashoboye kugera kubyo yari yatubwiye kuko bari bavuze ko mu myaka ibiri izaba yagejeje ikoranabuhanga ku mirenge SACCO yose.” Nyuma y’amakosa y’iyo Kompanyi y’Abanyakenya leta yafashe icyemezo cyo gukoresha abahanga mu ikoranabuhanga b’Abanyarwanda ngo ngo abe ari bo bazafasha gushyiraho uburyo imirenge SACCO izakoresha ikoranabuhanga,gusa nan’ubu nta gihe kizwi Imirenge SACCO izaba yatangiye gukoresha ikoranabuhanga. Prof HARERIMANA Jean Bosco. Yagize ati “Mu kwezi kwa Gatanu itsinda rya MINECOFIN  na RCA ndetse na Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu bahuriye hamwe kugira ngo bakore Porogaramu ya mudasobwa kandi koko isubiza ikibazo cy’ikoranabuhanga muri SACCO,uyu munsi hari ikipe yagiye kuturebera igihe bizatwara.” Ikigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe iterambere ry’amakoperative cyemera ibihombo by’imirenge SACCO bituruka ku kuba idakoresha ikoranabuhanga. Birimo amakosa akorwa n’abakozi mu kwandika imibare ku mafishi baba abayakora nkana cyangwa abibeshya. Tito DUSABIREMA / Flash Tv

title: Amagare: Twafatanyije nk’ikipe  ni yo mpamvu natsinze-Nsengimana
article_text:
Amagare: Twafatanyije nk’ikipe  ni yo mpamvu natsinze-Nsengimana

 1.Nsengimana Bosco 5h09’41” 2. Byukusenge Patrick 5h12’30”
3. Ruhumuriza Abraham 5h12’30”
4. Bintunimana Emile  5h12’48”
5. Ndayisenga Valens 5h12’48” Nsengimana Bosco ukinira ikipe ya Benediction  y’i Rubavu akaba akinira n’ikipe  y’igihugu mu gusiganwa ku magare ni we wegukanye intera ya Rwamagana-Huye mu irushanwa risanzwe riba buri kwezi “Rwanda Cycling Cup 2015″.

 Nsengimana Bosco amaze kwambikwa umwambaro wa Skol nk’uwegukanye intera ya Rwamagana-Huye (Foto Bugingo)  Uyu wari umunsi wa kabiri w’isiganwa risa n’iritegura Tour du Rwanda 2015, ku wa Gatandatu taliki 17 Ukwakira 2015, abasiganwa bari bahagurutse Nyagatare basoreza Rwamagana  izaba ari intera ya mbere muri Tour du Rwanda 2015. Umunsi wa kabiri abakinnyi bava mu makipe yose yo mu Rwanda bagera kuri 32 bahagurutse Rwamagana basoreza Huye ku ntera y’ibilometero 179, Nsengimana Bosco wegukanye  intera ya Rubavu-Musanze muri Kanama 2015 yongeye kwerekana ko akomeye maze yegukana iyi ntera   akoresheje amasaha 5, iminota 9 n’amasegonda 41. Yakurikiwe na Byukusenge Patrick nawe ukinira Benediction Club wahagereye rimwe na Ruhumuriza Abraham  ukomoka muri aka karere aho bakoresheje amasaha 5, iminota 12 n’amasegonda 30. Bintunimana wari wegukanye intera ya Nyagatare-Rwamagana yaje ari uwa 4 aho yahagereye rimwe na Ndayisenga Valens wari wabaye uwa kabiri aho bakoresheje amasaha 5, iminota 12 n’amasegonda 48. Nsegimana Bosco nyuma yo kwegukana  iyi ntera, yagize ati ” Twafatanyije nk’ikipe ni yo mpamvu natsinze”. yakomeje avuga ko ubundi Ndayisenga Valens ari we mukinnyi bacungaga cyane kuko ari we ukomeye kandi bagendanye akaza kumucika akabasha   kugera I Huye ari uwa mbere. Ndayisenga Valens akaba avuga ko ikipe ye ari bake ugereranyije na Bediction Ati ” Nka Nsengimana ntabwo yigeze avunika cyane kuko abakinnyi benshi be bamukoreye ariko njye  n’abakinnyi banjye babiri twakoze cyane ku buryo byageze aho turananirwa”. Abakinnyi barishimira imyiteguro ya Tour du Rwanda 2015 Aya marushanwa arimo gutegura Tour du Rwanda 2015, abakinnyi basanga ari imyiteguro myiza. Nsengimana ati “Ku myiteguro duhagaze neza tugomba gutwara Tour du Rwanda 2015″.Ndayisenga Valens wegukanye Tour du Rwanda 2014 yagize ati ” Kugeza ubu tugeze ahantu heza tuyitegura abakinnyi bose barazamutse,  nibakunda bagakora nk’uko bari gukora ubu tuzabona umusaruro mwiza muri Tour du Rwanda 2015.”  SRC:Imvaho

title: Amavubi: Umutoza yahamagaye abakinnyi 23 bazajya muri Maroc
article_text:
Amavubi: Umutoza yahamagaye abakinnyi 23 bazajya muri Maroc

 Yitegura amarushanwa ya CHAN  azabera mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro za 2016,  n’indi mikino nyafurika iri imbere, Amavubi arajya i Rabat ho muri Maroc mu mwiherero w’iminsi 10. Abakinnyi 23 bazitabira uyu mwiherero umutoza yatangaje amazina yabo. Muri ba myugariro, habayemo impinduka ku bari bahamagawe mu mikino iheruka kuko hiyongereyemo Tubanze James wa Rayon sports, harimo kandi na Abouba Sibomana ukinira Gor Mahia iherutse gutwara igikombe cya Shampiyona muri Kenya. 
Abo hagati na ba rutahizamu nta mpinduka nini zabonetsemo, gusa umusore wa AS Kigali, Murengezi Rodrigue umaze gutsinda ibitego 4 mu mikino itatu gusa Shampiyona y’ikiciro cya mbere imaze yongewe muri uru rutonde. Abakinnyi bakina hanze bari bitabiriye umukino wa Ghana bose ntibazagaragara muri uyu mwiherero. Iyi kipe itozwa na Johnny McKinstry biteganyijwe ko izagera muri Maroc tariki 04 Ukwakira ikamarayo iminsi icumi mu myitozo n’imikino ya gicuti na Burkina Faso na Maroc cyangwa Tunisia. Urutonde rw’abakinnyi bose hamwe bahamagawe Abazamu: Eric Ndayishimiye (Rayon) na Olivier Kwizera (APR); Abugarira: Michel Rusheshangoga (APR), Fitina Omborenga (Kiyovu), Abouba Sibomana (Gor Mahia, Kenya), Celestin Ndayishimiye (Mukura VS), Abdul Rwatubyaye (APR), Salomon Nirisarike (Sint Truiden, Belgium), Faustin Usengimana (APR) na James Tubane (Rayon Sports); Abo hagati: Jean Baptista Mugiraneza (Azam, Tanzania), Yannick Mukunzi (APR), Djihad Bizimana (APR), Mohammed Mushimiyimana (Police), Haruna Niyonzima (Young Africans, Tanzania), Hegman Ngomirakiza (Police), Jean Claude Iranzi (APR), Innocent Habyarimana (Police), Jacques Tuyisenge (Police) na Murengezi Rodrigue (AS Kigali) Abataha izamu: Quentin Rushenguziminega (Lausanne Sport, Swiss), Isaie Songa (Police), na Ernest Sugira (AS Kigali). title: Agaciro Cup:Rayon isezerewe na Sunrise kuri Penaliti
article_text:
Agaciro Cup:Rayon isezerewe na Sunrise kuri Penaliti

 23 Kamena 2015- Kuri Stade Amahora ikipe ya Sunrise FC yo mu Buganza  yasezere ikipe ya Rayon sport FC y’i Nyanza nyuma yo kuyitsinda Penaliti 2-0 ihita inakatisha itike yo kuzakina umukino wa nyuma n’ikipe ya Police FC mu irushanwa ry’Agaciro Development Found. 
 Ikipe ya Rayon sport FC yabanje mu Kibuga  Ni umukino muri rusange ikipe ya Sunrise nubwo itahabwaga amahirwe mbere yawo ariko  ibifashijwemo na Segawa Mike ukina hagati asatira ,yatangiye irusha bikomeye ikipe ya Rayon sport FC ari nako yotsa igitutu abinyuma b’iyi ikipe yambara ubururu n’umweru.Ariko mu minota igana kuyanyuma y’umukino nibwo Rayon sport FC yabaye  nk’iyinjira mu mukino nayo itangira guhungabanya abanyima b’ikipe ya Sunrise ariko biranga biba ibyubusa. Iminota 90 isanzwe  y’umukino yaje kurangira  amakipe yombi anganya ubusa ku busa, hitabazwa penaliti, Sunrise  FC iza kubasha ku injiza  ebyiri muri enye yateye mu gihe ikipe ya Rayon sport FC yateye enye ariko  ntibashe kugira nimwe yerekeza mu nshundura. 
 Ikipe ya Sunrise FC yabanje mu kibuga  Mutuyimana Moussa bita Kasereka Fabrice, wahoze mu  ikipe ya Police FC  nkumwe mubari bitezwe bikomeye n’abakunzi b’ikipe ya Rayon sport FC,bashije kubanza  mu kibuga kuri uyu mukino we wa mbere muri Rayon Sports FC  nyuma yo kuyerekezamo mu cyumweru gishize. Sunrise FC  izahura ku mukino wa nyuma na Police FC yaraye isezereye Musanze FC iyitsinze ibitego 2-1. Biteganijwe ko umukino wa nyuma   uzakinwa ku cyumweru tariki 30/08/2015.  Kubaho Aimee / Indatwa.net

title: Iki gihembwe cy’ihinga kigiye kubera igisubizo abahinzi-RAB
article_text:
Iki gihembwe cy’ihinga kigiye kubera igisubizo abahinzi-RAB 

 Abahinzi bo mu duce dutandukanye barakangurirwa guhinga ubuso bunini kuko ngo hari icyizere ko muri iki gihembwe cy’ihinga 2019 B kizarangwa n’imvura nyinshi. 
Umuyobozi Mukuru Wungirije ushinzwe ubuhinzi mu Kigo cy’igihugu gishinzwe Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi RAB, Dr. Bucagu Charles, yasabye abahinzi guhinga ku butaka bunini mu gihembwe cy’ihinga 2019 B kuko ngo hazagwa imvura nyinshi biryo ibyo bahinze bikera neza. Ibi yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 12 Gashyantare 2019, mu nama itegura igihembwe cy’ihinga 2019 B, ihuza RAB n’abafatanyabikorwa mu bucuruzi bw’inyongeramusaruro. Dr. Bucagu uhamya ko igihembwe cya mbere cy’ihinga cyagenze neza nubwo hari uduce tutabonye imvura ihagije, yagize ati, “Muri iki gihembwe k’ihinga 2019 B gitangiye, icyo dushaka cyane cyane gukangurira abahinzi hirya no hino mu gihugu, ni ukugira ngo ahantu hose hatigeze hahingwa hahingwe, ubutaka bwose bushoboka buhingwe muri iki gihembwe kuko iki gihembwe kizagira imvura ihagije ku bice byinshi by’igihugu, bisaba y’uko bwa butaka bwose ari ubutarahinzwe mu gihembwe gishize ari n’ubuzagomba guhingwa bwose tubuhinge, dukoreshe imbuto n’ifumbire.” Ku bacuruzi b’inyongeramusaruro bavuga ko hari igihe imbuto n’ifumbire bibageraho bitinze bikadindiza abahinzi, Dr.Bucagu yababwiye ko hari igisubizo, ati, “Kuri ubu nta mbuto izatumizwa hanze nk’uko byari bisanzwe kuko dufite imbuto ihagije mu gihugu.” Yakomeje avuga ko ifumbire itumizwa hakiri kare kandi igashyitswa mu bubiko bw’abashinzwe kuyigeza ku baturage mbere y’uko ihinga rigera kuko iyo imvura igiye umuturage ahita atangira gutera, ati “Barangure hakiri kare, kandi barangura ari uko abaturage babahaye amakuru y’ibyo bifuza kuko iyo imvura iguye umuhinzi ahita amanuka akajya gutera kuko ni uruhererekane.” Nkuko bisanzwe igihembwe cy’ihinga cya B gitangira mukwezi kwa Gashyantare hagati kikarangira mu matariki ya nyuma y’ukwezi kwa Gicurasi. title: 2010-2017: Abacuruzi barishimira aho Kagame abagejeje
article_text:
2010-2017: Abacuruzi barishimira aho Kagame abagejeje

 Bamwe mu bacuruzi bo mu Mujyi wa Kigali, bavuga ko hari iterambere bamaze kwigezaho muri manda ya 2 ya Perezida Paul Kagame iri hafi gusozwa, babikesha inama ze. Urugaga nyarwanda rw’Abikorera, PSF, rwo rutangaza ko ishingiro ry’iterambere ry’abacuruzi rituruka ku kuba u Rwanda rufite Perezida wumva ubucuruzi.
 
 Benjamin Gasamagera, Umuyobozi mukuru w’urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda (Foto Kayitare J. P)  Uwiragiye Myriam akorera ubucuruzi mu isoko rya Nyarugenge mu Mujyi wa Kigali, avuga ko yatangiye ubucuruzi bw’imitako n’ibindi byose bijyana no kwambika abageni akiri muri Kaminuza mu mwaka wa gatatu kubera impanuro n’inama yajyaga yumva mu mvugo zitandukanye za Perezida Kagame. Ati “Kuri Jye, Perezida Kagame ni ejo heza hanjye, ni umutekano wanjye, mbaho nta bwoba, sinibaza ngo ejo ndabyuka nsange ibintu byazambye nta ho gusohokera, kuba ndi hano nkora ubu bucuruzi ndabimukesha kuko kenshi yakanguriye urubyiruko kwihangira imirimo, ibi nabigendeyeho ntangira ubucuruzi nkiri mu wa 3 wa Kaminuza ubu narangije umwaka wa 4 mu icungamari kandi niyumvamo gukomeza kuba rwiyemezamirimo wiyemeje guharanira iterambere.” Uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 25 akomeza ahanura bagenzi be bashobora kuba bararangije amashuri. Ati ”Hari abakobwa nkanjye bumva ko bahitamo kwikorera kuruta gutekereza akazi ko mu biro, abo ndabasaba rwose gutinyuka bakumva ko akazi atari uko wicaye muri biro, nanjye naratangiye kandi ndi ahashimishije.” Aboneraho kubwira urubyiruko muri rusange ko amahirwe ahari bagomba kuyabyaza umusaruro, ati ”Leta yashyizeho ikigega BDF kugira ngo urubyiruko rufite ikibazo cy’ingwate rubashe kugera ku nguzanyo byoroshye aho basabwa gusa 25% by’ingwate asigaye 75% Leta ikabishingira.” Undi mucuruzi ukorera muri Mateus we atangaza ko icyo yishimira muri iyi manda ya 2 Perezida Kagame ari hafi gusoza ari iyoroherezwa mu kwishyura imisoro hakurwaho inzitizi zabatwaraga igihe. Ati “Nishimira kandi mushimira ko imiyoborere myiza ye yatumye nk’abacuruzi ubu hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga twishyura imisoro umuntu bitamusabye guhaguruka aho ari, nkoresha telefoni yanjye byose bigatungana bitewe na E-banking amafaranga nkayohereza kuri konti y’Ikigo cy’imisoro n’amahoro mu gihe mbere byadusabaga kujya gutonda ku kigo cy’imisoro n’amahoro bikadutwara umwanya munini.”
 Uyu mucuruzi kandi avuga ko muri rusange inzitinzi ku bucuruzi zakuweho. Ati “Mbere wajyaga kuzana umuzigo uvuye hanze ukagenda kuri Magerwa igihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri ariko ubu umunsi umwe, ibiri ntirenga utawuvanyeyo. Ibi mu bucuruzi bivuze inyungu kuko biduha umwanya wo gucuruza ku gihe bikanaba imvano y’inyungu tubona.” Umuyobozi Mukuru (Chairman) w’urugaga nyarwanda rw’Abikorera, PSF, Gasamagera Benjamin, avuga ko ishingiro ry’iterambere ry’abacuruzi rituruka ku kuba u Rwanda rufite Perezida wumva ubucuruzi. Yagize ati ”Ni amahirwe kuba u Rwanda ruyobowe na Perezida Kagame, yumva ubucuruzi. Ibi ni na byo shingiro ry’iterambere ry’urugaga rw’abikorera n’abikorera.” Avuga ko u Rwanda ruri mu cyerekezo cyiza cy’aho ubukungu buyobowe n’abikorera , bikaba “bivuze iterambere ry’ubukungu rishingiye ku bikorera, bishingiye kandi ku mahirwe ahari yorohereza ishoramari bitera abikorera gukomeza gukorera mu bukungu busangiwe, ni ukuvuga abakire mu bakire.” Uyu muyobozi kandi anavuga ko nta ko bisa kuba muri ubwo bukungu, ati ”Birumvikana iyo uteye imbere mu bandi nabo bateye imbere biba byiza cyane. Ibi biruta kuba umukire mu bakene ari na yo mpamvu nk’urugaga dukomeje gukangurira abikorera kuzamukira hamwe biteza imbere.” Asoza asaba abikorera kurushaho guharanira ko ingano y’ibyoherezwa ku masoko yo hanze yiyongera. Ati ”Birumvikana iyo ibyoherezwa hanze byiyongereye kuruta ibihatumizwa, aba ari iterambere. Amafaranga asohoka ku bicuruzwa aba make ugereranyije n’ayinjira imbere mu gihugu.” Gasamagera yizeza abikorera ko urugaga nyarwanda rw’Abikorera ruzakomeza kurushaho kubashyigikira harebwa icyatuma bakomeza gutera imbere.

title: Rwabusoro: Barinubira ko birukanwe aho bacururizaga nta ngurane
article_text:
Rwabusoro: Barinubira ko birukanwe aho bacururizaga nta ngurane

 Abahoze bacururiza mu gasanteri kwa Rwabusoro bimuriwe mu isoko rishya barasaba ko bafashwa kubona ibibanza mu isoko rishya bubakiwe kuko bavuye imbokoboko aho bakoreraga. Ni nyuma y’uko ubuyobozi bugaragaza ko aho ako gasanteri kari gaherereye hari mu gishanga ku buryo byateraga amazi kwinjira mu mazu yabo. 
Mu mpera z’umwaka ushize wa 2015, abahakoreraga ubucuruzi basabwe kuhimuka, bakajya gukorera ruguru gatoya ahimuriwe isoko, hanamaze kubakwa amazu y’ubucuruzi makeya. Ba nyir’amazu y’ubucuruzi ntibishimiye uyu mwanzuro bifuza guhabwa byibura ibibanza mu isantere nshyashya, n’amabati yo gusakara inzu bahubaka kuko ngo gufunga amazu yabo byabateye ubukene. Ignace Niyibizi ngo nyuma ya jenoside yasigaranye na mama we wari ushaje, bimukira i Busoro aje gucuruza. Avuga ko muri 2002 yagurishije amasambu bari basigaranye, agura inzu y’ubucuruzi aho. Ubu atuye muri Nyaruguru, ariko ubukene ngo ni bwose.” Innocent Nshimiyimana, kimwe na bamwe muri bagenzi be, inzu yari yayiguze na Leta. Ati  “Nayiguze muri cyamunara hashakwa inyishyu y’ib yangijwe muri jenoside. Kuki Leta itamfasha ari yo yangushije mu gihombo kirenga miliyoni eshanu?”
Abari bafite amazu y’ubucuruzi i Busoro, banababazwa n’uko muri 2014 basabwe kuyavugurura. Albert Gabiro ati “Nkimara gushyiramo amatajeri mashyashya, ni bwo haje urwandiko runsaba guhagarika ubucuruzi. Badufungishije amaduka tutagaruje ibyo twayatanzeho.”  Iki kibazo bakigaragarije Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu, Francis Kaboneka, ubwo yabagendereraga tariki 20/7/2016. Babwiwe ko abatishoboye bo bazashakirwa ubufasha. Ibi na byo ntibyabashimishije kuko ngo ku bagera kuri 63 birukanwe muri iriya santere, abatishoboye batarenga 10 kandi bo ntibacuruzaga. Elisabeth Uwamariya ngo wari uhafite imiryango 14 yo gucururizamo agira ati “barimo baravuga ngo ntibazaduha ibibanza, nyamara aha hepfo, abafite imashini zisya babahaye iby’ubuntu nta n’ibibanza bagiraga i Busoro. Twe nta n’ubushobozi bwo kwigurira imashini tugifite.” Hari abagituye i Busoro kuko ngo nta bushobozi bwo gucumbika, nyamara amashanyarazi yarahakuwe. Ibi byarabababaje kuko bari bayizaniye buri wese atanze 160.000.

Sehene Ruvugiro Emmanuel / Pax Press

title: Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda na Uganda baratakambira Leta ya Kenya ngo ibishyure imitungo yabo
article_text:
Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda na Uganda baratakambira Leta ya Kenya ngo ibishyure imitungo yabo

 Abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda no muri Uganda bakomeje kotsa igitutu leta ya kenya ngo ibishyure imitungo yabo ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 47.5 z’amadorali y’Amerika yangirikiye mu mvururu zakurikiye amatora ya perezida wa kenya muri 2008.
Akanama gashinzwe ubucuruzi muri Afurika y’Uburasirazuba kahaye urwandiko perezida wa Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta ku gutinda kwishyura abashoramari bo mu Rwanda no muri Uganda baburiye ibiciruzwa byabo bari banyujije muri kenya, igihe habaga imvururu zakurikiye amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu wa Kenya, zanahitanye abasaga 1000, abandi bagahunga. Abacuruzi batangiye guhura n’ingaruka zikomeye Aba bacuruzi bavuga ko bagomba kwishyurwa vuba na bwangu kuko abari babagurije amafaranga baranguje ibyo bicuruzwa batangiye kubishyuza, ubu bakaba bari mu bibazo bikomeye. Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa remezo n’ubwikorezi mu kanama k’ubucuruzi k’umuryango w’Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Rusagara Jean Bosco yabwiye The East African ko imitungo ya bamwe mu bacuruzi bahomebejwe n’imvururu zo muri Kenya, yatangiye gufatirwa n’abari babagurije amafaranga ndetse ko bashobora kubafungira ubucuruzi bwabo burundu. Aba bacuruzi bongeye kwibutsa kenya kubishyura, mu gihe ibihugu bidakora ku nyanjya bikomeje gukeka ko amatora y’umwaka utaha nayo ashobora kurangwa n’imvururu. Uku gutinya kongera guhombera mu mvururu za nyuma y’amatora zije nyuma y’imyigaragambyo yo gukuraho komisiyo ishinzwe amatora muri Kenya. Ikigo cy’ubwishingizi cya Africa Trade Insurer Agency (ATI) nacyo mu byumweru bibiri bishize cyaneze leta ya kenya kutishyura umyenda wa miliyoni 15 z’amadorali y’Amerika ibarimo. Akanama k’umuryango w’Afurika yunze ubumwe gashinzwe ubukungu kavuga nk’uko ingaruka z’imvururu zabaye muri Kenya zagize ingaruka ku karere kose, Kenya yari ikwiye kuba yarishyuye abanyamahanga nk’uko yishyuye Abanyakenya. Visi perezida wa Kenya William Ruto yavuze ko muri Gashyantare 2016 abantu 28,924 bagarutse mu byabo ibintu byatwaye miliyoni 175 z’amadorali y’Amerika.  Indatwa.net

title: 70% electrification target on track - REG
article_text:
70% electrification target on track - REG

 REG’s Chief Executive Officer, Jean-Bosco Mugiraneza (C) addressing the media in Kigali Kigali, 30th June 2016 - Rwanda Energy Group (REG) has insisted it will meet the 2018 target to ensure at least 70 per cent of national households are connected to electricity.  
With 600,000 customers of REG currently connected to power, across the country are contributing 24 per cent to the overall target of 70 per cent households targeted by 2018. The 2018 connection target includes 48 per cent on grid and 22 per cent off grid power generation. REG has recorded generation capacity increase of 89.5 megawatts over the last two years of its establishment, bringing the current total installed capacity to 190 megawatts, with the Government projecting 563 megawatts power generation in the next two years. Despite some skepticism about the 70 per cent target of connectivity, REG Chief Executive Officer, Jean Bosco Mugiraneza is confident that there are “quite a number of projects in the pipeline” to make the target feasible within the set timeframe. “We will use both on-grid and off-grid solutions to achieve this target,” he said. “We are signing many contracts with investors to roll out solar systems in rural areas, and this is really working out.” REG’s Chief Executive Officer, Jean-Bosco Mugiraneza (C) speaks to media as Maj. Eng Jean Claude Kalisa, Managing director EUCL (L) and Emanuel Kamanzi MD EDCL (R) Mugiraneza was, yesterday, addressing journalists on the status of energy in the country, in Kigali. “On-grid generation, we are halfway our target, then off-grid we have to multiply efforts; that’s why we are signing contracts with investors. The 2018 target is still on, that’s why we have to change strategies and increase efforts to make it feasible,” he said. Current electrification rates stand at, 100 per cent of hospitals, 85 per cent of health centers, 92 per cent of administrative sector offices and 45 per cent of primary and secondary schools. Emmanuel Kamanzi, the managing director of Energy Development Corporation Ltd (EDCL), said electrification targets will be met but the main focus should rather be on how to match electricity supply with demand. “We need to put infrastructure in place to close the power deficits and increase transmission lines,” Kamanzi said. To enhance domestic and regional electricity access, interconnection lines are under construction to allow power trade/ exchange in the region. These include 220KV line Mirama-Shango of 93.2 kilometres connecting Rwanda with Uganda, 220KV Line Shango-Rubavu-Goma-Karongi of 180km connecting Rwanda with DR Congo, 220KV line Rusumo-Bugesera-Shango connecting Rwanda with Burundi. It is expected that by 2018, the power-exchange project will be possible through 220KV power transmission infrastructure with all neighboring countries. “When you look at the pipeline projects, we are saying that we should even move a bit slower to commit more. Because we may sign up as many as we can, you may not be able to consume all the power you have. We need to have supply that meets the demand requirements,” Kamanzi said. Kamanzi argued that once people relocate to stay along transmission lines, it will be easier for the utility to reach as many households as possible at minimum cost. Gishoma peat plant in testing phase During the press conference, REG’s Mugiraneza also confirmed that Gishoma Peat Power Plant is now in its testing phase. The plant is currently generating 10.85 megawatts. “The testing of Gishoma Peat Power Plant, which will generate 15 megawatts in total, has been going on since June 10, with CIMERWA (cement manufacturer) using the load,” said Mugiraneza. Gishoma peat to power plant is the first power plant of its kind in Africa.  Source : REG

title: Abaguzi barakangurirwa kwaka inyemezabuguzi ya EBM
article_text:
Abaguzi barakangurirwa kwaka inyemezabuguzi ya EBM

 Abaguzi b’ibicuruzwa n’ababigurisha barasabwa kwaka no gutanga inyemezabuguzi itangwa n’imashini y’ikoranabuhanga ya EBM, kugira ngo uruhare rwabo mu iterambere ry’igihugu rugaragare. Babisabwe n’ubuyobozi bw’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’imisoro n’amahoro (Rwanda Revenue Authority) ubwo bahembaga abatsinze muri tombora ya (EBM), mu karere ka Rusizi kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 17 Werurwe 2016.
Mbera Emmy, umuhuzabikorwa w’umushinga (EBM) muri RRA yatangaje ko iki gikorwa kigamije gushishikariza abaguzi kwaka inyemezabuguzi kugira ngo umusoro ku nyongeragaciro (TVA) wiyongere kuko utawutanze aba ahombya igihugu. Yagize ati: “Mu gihe uguze ikintu ntiwake inyemezabuguzi nta gihamya yemeza ko wa musoro ku nyongeragaciro ucibwa abacuruzi ko wageze mu isanduku ya Leta, kubera ko igihe cyose watse inyemezabuguzi haba hari icyizere nta gushidikanya ko wa musoro wageze muri Leta.” Bamwe mu baturage bo muri aka karere bavuga ko bamaze kumenyera umuco wo kwaka inyemezabuguzi, mu gihe abandi bavuga ko batarabisobanukirwa. Francine Nyiransabimana avuga ko kwaka inyemezabuguzi bimaze kuba umuco kubera kwirinda ingaruka bashobora guhura nazo. Ati: “Bisigaye byarabaye nk’umuco kuko hari igihe ugenda ugahura n’abantu bafite imodoka niba ari Rwanda Revenue simbizi bakakubaza bati uwo muceri uwuguriye he? Ati nywuguriye mu mangazini aya n’aya, bakakubaza bati fagitiri irihe wayibura bakaba bawukwambura hari nabo bawutwaye.” Uwase Claudine we avuga ko iyo bagiye kugura ibicuruzwa nta fagitiri bajya baka, kuko ngo babona atari ngombwa bitewe n’uko batari basobanukiwe akamaro kabyo. Ariko yongeraho ko aho babimenyeye bagiye kujya bayaka. Abasabwa kugura imashini za EBM no kuzikoresha ni abanditse ku musoro ku nyongeragaciro bafite byibuze igicuruzo cya miliyoni 20Frw ku umwaka. Ubu abasabwa gukoresha imashini za EBM bamaze kugera ku ikigereranyo cya 85%.  Ubukungu

title: BURERA: Akarere kagiye kwiyuzuriza hoteli ya miliyoni 350
article_text:
BURERA: Akarere kagiye kwiyuzuriza hoteli ya miliyoni 350

 Uyu mwaka urasiga Akarere ka Burera kiyujurije hoteli ku nkengero  z’ikiyaga cya Burera ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 350. Iyo hoteli yitwa ‘Burera Beach Resort Hotel’, iri kubukwa ahazwi nko ‘Mu Gitare’ ni  mu Murenge wa Kagogo ku nkengera z’Ikiyaga cya Burera.
 Uruhererekane rw’ibirunga, igishanga cy’Urugezi n’ibiyaga bya Burera na Ruhondo ni byo byanya bikomeje gusurwa n’abakerarugendo mu Karere ka Burera, aka karere kagaragaza ko ubukerarugendo bugenda burashaho gutera imbere. 
 ‘Burera Beach Resort Hotel’ iri kubakwa mu Murenge wa Kagogo ku nkengera z’ikiyaga cya Burera(Ifoto/Umurengezi R) Icyakora, ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Burera ntibwahwemye kugaragaza impungenge mu iyakirwa ry’abo banyamahanga basigira igihugu by’umwihariko ako karere amadovise. Aha, mu bitekerezo by’ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Burera cyo kimwe n’abafatanyabikorwa b’ako karere bagiye bahuriza ku kuvuga ko hakenewe hoteli ariko icyo gitekerezo ntigishyirwe mu bikorwa kubera ngo amikoro macye. Sembagare Samuel, umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Burera, yabwiye Izuba dukesha iyi nkuru ati "Nk’Akarere byabaye ngombwa ko twubaka hoteli” kubera ko "kugeza ubu muri urwo rwego rw’amahoteli tugira aho abatugana bacumbika habiri gusa.” Agaruka ku mvano y’iyubakwa ry’iriya hoteli, Sembagare ahamya ko ifitanye isano n’ubukerarugendo bukomeje gufata ‘isura nziza’ mu karere abereye umuyobozi ariko ngo hakaba hakiri imbogamizi mu bijyanye n’amacumbi yakira ba mukerarugendo. Virunga Lodge na Hotel Montana Vista niho hantu honyine kugeza ubu hifashishwa mu kwakira abasura akarere ka Burera gusa ubuyobozi bw’ako karere buvuga ko aho hantu hadahagije mu rwego rwo guha serivisi inoze abasura ibyiza nyaburanga bigaragara muri ako karere. Sembagare akomeza agira ati "Abasura urugezi, ibirunga bya Muhabura n’ibiyaga bya Burera na Ruhondo babura aho bacumbika bakajya mu Karere ka Musanze n’ahandi, rero kubaka iriya hoteli ni mu rwego rwo guha serivisi nziza abatugana by’umwihariko abagenzwa no gusura ibyiza nyaburanga byacu.” 
 Meya Sembagare asobanura ko ‘Burera Beach Resort Hotel’ yubatswe mu ntumbero yo guha serivisi nziza Abakerarugendo basura akarere ka Burera(Ifoto/Umurengezi R)
 Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Burera ahishura ko ubwo  ‘Burera Beach Resort Hotel’ izaba yuzuye yitezweho kuba umusemburo w’iterambere ry’abaturage binyuze mu rujya n’uruza rw’Abacyerarugendo bazajya basura ako karere bagakenera kuruhuka. Ati "Iriya hoteli izadufasha cyane; mu rwego rw’umuco birumvikana ba Mukerarugendo bazacyenera kuririmbirwa kandi ibyo bizakorwa n’abaturage bacu, abakora imitako bazahabwa rugari ndetse n’abandi bakora ibikorwa bitandukanye by’ubukorikori.” Abaturage biteze impinduka nyinshi mu mibereho yabo Mu makuru atangwa n’ingeri zitandukanye z’abatuye akarere ka Burera bahuriza ku gushimangira ko biteguhiye guhindurirwa imibereho na hoteli igiye kuzura mu karere kabo, abo baturage bagaragaza ko biteguye gutangiza ibikorwa by’amajyambere bizajya bibinjiriza amafaranga kubera abacyerarugendo bazajya babasura. ‘Burera Beach Resort Hotel’ iri kubakwa n’akarere ka Burera kubufatanye na sosiyete y’Abayapani ya ‘Noghuchi Holdings LTD’, iyi sosiyete isanzwe n’ubundi ifatikanya n’akarere mu bikorwa by’iterambere bitandukanye birimo n’iyubakwa ry’udukiriro. Amakuru atangwa n’ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Burera agaragaza ko hari abashoramali umunani bamaze kugura ibibanza ku nkengero z’ibiyaga bya Ruhondo na Burera aho ngo buri umwe ateganya kuhazamura ihoteli, ahereye kuri ibyo, umuyobozi w’akarere ka Burera ahamya ko ako karere gakomeje gukora ibyo gashoboye byose ngo korohereze abashoramali gukorera ibikorwa birambye muri Burera. 
 Imirimo yo kubaka igeze kuru  Meya Sembagare agira ati "Mperutse gukoresha inama abashoramali bagera kuri makumyabiri bafite ibibanza baguze; umunani bariteguye bagiye kubaka, buri wese azubaka ihoteli, bazakikiza biriya biyaga. Nk’akarere ibyo twasabwaga byose twarangije kubikora; twamaze gukata imihanda, amashanyarazi n’amazi birahari ahasigaye umwanya ni uw’abashoramali, bahawe ikaze!” Abaturage b’akarere ka Burera bashishikarizwa guharanira kubyaza umusaruro iriya hoteli iri kubakwa n’ubuyobozi bwabo, ababishoboye basabwa gushyira imbere kwihugura mu by’amahoteli kugira ngo bazabashe guhabwamo akazi. Ubwo twatunganyaga iyi nkuru imirimo yo kubaka ‘Burera Beach Resort Hotel’ yari igeze mu isakara, iyi hoteli ifatwa by’umwihariko nk’umuhigo w’akarere ka Burera biteganyijwe ko izuzura mu Ukuboza uyu mwaka(2015), ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Burera buvuga ko izuzura itwaye amafaranga y’u Rwanda asatira miliyoni 350  Bakunzi Fidel / Indatwa.net

title: Nyabihu:Bashinja rwiyemezamirimo gusondeka umuhanda Musanze-Vunga
article_text:
Nyabihu:Bashinja rwiyemezamirimo gusondeka umuhanda Musanze-Vunga

 Abakoresha umuhanda Musanze -Vunga  barishimira cyane ko nyuma y’uko uyu muhanda wubatswe kuwugendamo byoroshye bigatuma urugendo n’amafaranga bishyuraga imodoka nabyo bigabanyuka, ariko ngo bafite impungenge ko ushobora kwangirika vuba kuko babona warasondetswe. 

Bamwe mu baganiriye n’Ikinyamakuru Imvaho Nshya dukesha iyi nkuru, bavuga ko mbere uyu muhanda w’ibirometero 22 imodoka yawugendaga amasaha atatu, ariko ngo ubu iminota 45 gusa baba bawurangije kandi bakanishyura amafaranga make. Shyirambere Augustin, umwe mu bamaze igihe kirekire bakoresha uyu muhanda agira ati “Mbere twajyaga dukoresha igihe kirekire uyu muhanda utarakorwa aho imodoka zatinyaga no kuhayoboka haba mu gutwara abagenzi ndetse n’ibicuruzwa, imodoka twagiraga aha gusa imodoka ya bisi ya ONATRACOM, ariko aho umaze gukorerwa ubu urugendo rusa n’aho rwagabanyutse, kandi ubu aho twagenderaga amafaranga 1000, dusigaye twishyura 600, ikindi kandi n’imodoka muri uyu muhanda zariyongereye.” N’ubwo aba baturage bishimira ibyiza by’uyu muhanda, ku rundi ruhande ngo bafite impungenge z’uko ushobora gusenyuka utanamaze umwaka, kuko abawubatse batashyizeho umuyoboro utwara amazi, bigatuma yose ayoboka mu muhanda andi agasenyera abaturage. Shyirambere yakomeje agira ati “Tukaba nanone tugifite ikibazo ko nta miyoboro ku ruhande yo kugira ngo amazi ajye akomeza kugenda atuzuye mu muhanda ngo agere n’ubwo asenyera abaturage, aha kandi urabona ko kubera amazi kwiroha mu muhanda harimo ibinogo, bigenda biwucukura, bityo ugasenyuka ibi bikaba biri mu bibazo dufite, kuko rwiyemezamirimo tubona hari ibyo atujuje”. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Shyira, Kanamugire Nöel avuga ko iki kibazo bakizi kandi bamaze kukimenyesha ubuyobozi bw’akarere. Yagize ati “Uyu muhanda koko byagaragaye ko hari ibikiburamo, bityo rero natwe tukaba twarabimenyesheje ubuyobozi bw’akarere ka Nyabihu kugira ngo harebwe uko wakubakwa ku buryo burambye, kandi burinda isuri mu mirima no mu ngo z’abaturage”.

title: U Rwanda ruzajya rwohereza ibirayi muri Zambia na Sudani y’Epfo
article_text:
U Rwanda ruzajya rwohereza ibirayi muri Zambia na Sudani y’Epfo

 Abahinzi b’ibirayi barasabwa gukora iyo bwabaga ngo bongere umusaruro kuko ibirayi byo mu Rwanda byenda kuzajya bigurishwa mu bihugu birimo Zambia  na Sudani y’Epfo. 

Minisitiri w’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda, Francois Kanimba yabwiye abahinzi n’abacuruzi bari mu nama yateguwe n’Ishami ry’ubuhinzi ry’ Urugaga rw’Abikorera  ko bakeneye gushyira ingufu mu buhinzi bw’ibirayi kugira ngo bashobore guhaza isoko ryo mu mahanga nk’uko ikinyamakuru The New Times kibitangaza. Yagize ati” Ni ngombwa cyane ko mutangira guhingira isoko ryo mu mahanga nibwo muzunguka bijyanye n’ingufu muba mwatakaje. Kanimba yavuze ko Leta y’u Rwanda na PSF bigiye gushyiraho isoko ryihariye ry’ibirayi mu mujyi wa Kigali kugira ngo byorohereze abahinzi. Iryo soko rizubakwa  mu murenge wa Gisozi ni ryo rizajya rirangurirwamo ibirayi mu mujyi wa Kigali. Rizanoroshya kubyohereza mu mahanga kuko ari ho bizajya bikusanyirizwa. Ushinzwe ibikorwa mu rugaga rw’Abikorera Yvette Mukarwema yavuze ko iryo soko rizavanaho imbogamizi zari ziriho zirimo kudahuza ibiciro no guhendwa kubera abakomisiyoneri. Mu mwaka ushize nibwo guverinoma n’Ihuriro ry’Abahinzi b’Ibirayi bumvikanye uburyo bwo kunoza ubucuruzi bw’ibirayi mu gihugu kugira ngo igihombo abahinzi bahura nacyo kigabanuke. Mu Rwanda ibirayi  byera mu ntara y’Amajyaruguru n’iy’Uburengerazuba . Ni kimwe mu bihingwa Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi  yasanze bikwiye gushyirwamo ingufu.

title: Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kaniga yatawe muri yombi
article_text:
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kaniga yatawe muri yombi

 Abakozi 8 b’Akarere ka Gicumbi barimo n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kaniga batawe muri yombi bakwekwaho gukoresha amafaranga ya VUP mu nyungu zabo. 
  
Umunyamabanaga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kaniga ukurikiranweho gukoresha amafaranga ya VUP mu nyungu ze (Ifoto/Kigali today)
  Aba Bayobozi bafungiwe kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ya Byumba iherereye mu Karere ka Gicumbi. Aba bagabo bakurikiranweho icyaha cyo kwiha inguzanyo y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda  agera kuri miriyoni 7 batayemerewe kuko aba agenewe abakene nk’uko bitangazwa na polisi. VUP ni gahunda ya Leta igamije gukura abatishoboye mu bukene akaba ariyo mpamvu hagenda hatangwa amafaranga azamura ibikorwa bikorwa mu rwego rwo kuzamura abatishoboye. Aba bagabo batawe muri yombi ku itariki ya 2 Werurwe umwaka wa 2015. Mu bafunganwe n’uyu Munyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kaniga,  harimo Abanyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa babiri b’Utugari, uwari uhagarariye ikigo nderabuzima cya Mulindi, umu Agoronome, Umuyobozi wa SACCO ya Rubaya, Umucungamari wayo n’ushinzwe inguzanyo muri iyo SACCO, bose hamwe bakaba 9. Nkuko bitangazwa na Polisi mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru,  ivuga ko aba Bayobozi  bakurikiranweho gukoresha amafaranga ya VUP  mu nyungu zabo bwite bagahinga ingano kuri hegitari 20. CIP Hakizimana akomeza avuga ko bakiri mu iperereza kugira ngo barekane uko icyaha cyakozwe ndetse n’abagikoze, nyuma bakazashyikirizwa ubugenzacyaha kugira ngo baryozwe ibyo bakoze. CAP avuga ko Abayobozi batagakwiye guharanira inyungu zabo ngo birengagize abo bashinzwe kureberera. CIP Hakizimana akomeza avuga ko baramutse bahamwe n’iki cyaha bahanwa n’ingingo ya 325 iri mu gitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda, kigena  igifungo cyo kuva ku myaka 7 kugeza ku myaka 10 bagatanga n’ihazabu yikubye kabiri kugeza kuri  gatanu y’ayo yanyereje.

title: 2015: Nta bwoba bw’uko ifaranga ry’u Rwanda rizata agaciro
article_text:
2015: Nta bwoba bw’uko ifaranga ry’u Rwanda rizata agaciro

 

John Rwangombwa, Guverineri wa Banki nkuru y’igihugu asobanura uko ifaranga ryifashe (Ifoto/Mukamana J) Guverineri wa Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu (BNR) aratanga icyizere ko nta hungabana ry’ifaranga rizabaho muri uyu mwaka wa 2015. Avuga ko ibyo abishingira ku buryo ifaranga ry’u Rwanda n’ubukungu byifashe mu myaka 2 ishize. Ibi Guverineri John Rwangombwa yabitangaje mu gihe yasobanuraga uko Politique y’ifaranga ndetse n’urwego rw’ubukungu rwifashe mu Rwanda. Akoresheje ibigereranyo by’imyaka ya 2013 na 2014, yagaragaje ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buhagaze neza kandi n’ifaranga ry’u Rwanda rikaba ritarahungabanye ugereranyije n’amafaranga y’ibindi bihugu. John Rwangombwa asobanura ko BNR yashyize ingufu mu kurinda ubusugire bw’agaciro k’ifaranga ry’u Rwanda by’umwihariko ririndwa guhungabana, ugereranyije n’amafaranga y’amanyamahanga mu gihe ubukungu ku isi yose butari bwifashe neza. Ati "Uretse idolari rya Amerika ryagize uburemere mu mezi make ashize, ifaranga ry’u Rwanda ryakomeje kugumana agaciro ugereranyije n’andi mafaranga yo ku mugabane w’Uburayi; ndetse n’amafaranga yo mu bihugu bigize umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, ifaranga ry’u Rwanda ryakomeje kwihagararaho mu mwaka wa 2014. Guverineri Rwagombwa yongeyeho ko "Ibi akenshi byaratewe n’uburyo banki nkuru yagiye ifasha ibigo by’imari n’amabanki kubona amafaranga y’amahanga bityo agaciro kayo ntigakomeze kuzamuka ngo bigire ingaruka ku ifaranga ry’u Rwanda.” Umuyobozi wa Banki nkuru y’igihugu avuga ko n’urwego rw’ubukugu rutahungabanye ugereranyije n’uburyo rwari rumeze mu myaka ibiri ishize. Ibi akabisobanura avuga ko uru rwego rugizwe ahanini na banki z’ubucuruzi, ibigo by’imari, amakoperative nka SACCO, ndetse na Banki y’iterambere zikaba zaragiye zifasha mu gutanga inguzanyo ku bikorera. Yakomeje abisobanura muri aya magambo: "Uburyo amabanki atanga inguzanyo ku bikorera bwarazamutse ku kigero cya 19 % mu Kuboza 2014 ugereranyije n’uko byari bimeze mu Kuboza 2013. Ni ukuvuga ngo inguzanyo zatanzwe ku kigero cya 56.1%. Ibi bituma ifaranga ryihagararaho ndetse bikarinda n’ubusugire bw’ubukungu bw’igihugu” Gusa uyu muyobozi agaragaza ko hakiri imbogamizi y’uko ibiciro by’ibijyanwa hanze bikiri hasi ugeranyije n’ibyinjira mu Rwanda, byo bishobora kuzamuka muri uyu mwaka wa 2015. Ibi bikaba bishobora kugira ingaruka cyane ku mafaranga y’u Rwanda, aho agaciro karyo gashobora kugabanuka ndetse bikagira n’ingaruka ku biciro by’ibicuruzwa ku masoko. Rwangombwa akaba avuga ko bazakomeza gukora ibishoboka ku buryo politike y’ifaranga ry’u Rwanda itazahungabana ugereranyije na politike y’ifaranga ku rwego rw’ubukungu mpuzamahanga muri uyu mwaka wa 2015.  Izuba rirashe

title: Muri Esipanye Kubera ubushomeri bakora isuku muri restaurent bagahabwa ifunguro
article_text:
Muri Esipanye Kubera ubushomeri bakora isuku muri restaurent bagahabwa ifunguro

 Abantu badafite ubushobozi bwo kuba bakwigaburira mu gihugu cya Esipanye bahabwa ifunguro maze bakagira amasaha yo gukora mu nzu y’uburiro  (restaurent) akazi gatandukanye ariko ntibarihe ibyo kurya.


Abakora aka kazi bavuga ko babiterwa no kuba muri iki gihe akazi kabuze cyane bigatuma abantu baba abakene cyane kuburyo no kubona icyo kurya bigoye. 
Julia Gonzalez ni umwe mu bakora ako kazi, avuga ko hashize imyaka 2 nta kazi afite kuko mu ruganda yakoreragamorwaje guhagarara bigatuma bamwirukana  bituma aza gukora akazi ko mu kikoni ngo arebe ko bwakwira n’ejo bugacya. Nyiri iyi nzu y’uburiro (restaurent) avuga ko ibi ari byiza ari we n’abo bantu bunguka kuko abona amafaranga nabo bakabona ifunguro. Xavier Casas ni umwe mu bafite resitora ikora ako kazi yemeza ko kuri ubu nta bakozi ahemba akigira kuko bose bakorera ubuntu kuko baba bashaka gukomeza ubuzima bwabo bwa buri munsi. Avuga ko ubu we ibura ry’akazi yabyungukiyemo kuko amafaranga akoresha ayunguka cyane akuyemo abakozi ba mukorera ariko na none agasanga ari kimwe mu musanzu atanga ku bashomeri mu gihe igihugu cya esipanye kiri mu bihe bibi by’ubukungu. Si igihugu cya Esipanye cyugarijwe ni ikibazo cy’ubukungu gusa kuko ari isi muri rusange ariko Umugabane w’Uburayi ukaba wugarijwe n’iki kibazo cyane. Muri uyu mwaka wa 2013, umubare w’abashomeri uri kugenda wiyongera cyane kuko ubu abagera kuri miliyoni 6 n’ibihumbi maganabiri nta kazi bafite kandi nyuma y’umwaka umwe gusa abagera kuri miliyoni 3 n’igicea  muri izo esheshatu n’ibihumbi magana biri nta kazi baza bari babona. title: 14-05-2013  Muri 2013 ubukungu buzakomeza kuzamuka kuri 7.5%- Minisitiri Gatete
article_text:
14-05-2013  Muri 2013 ubukungu buzakomeza kuzamuka kuri 7.5%- Minisitiri Gatete  

 Miliyari igihumbi magana atandatu makumyabiri n’arindwi  niyo mafaranga ateganyijwe mu mbanzirizamushinga y’ingengo y’imari y’igihe giciriirtse u Rwanda ruzakoresha mu mwaka wa 2013/2014. Ugereranije n’ingengo y’imari ivuguruye iheruka ya 2012/2013, ingengo y’imari 2013/2014 yiyongereho Miliyari mirongo irindwi na zirindwi. igice kinini cy’ingengo y’imari 2013/2014 ni amafaranga azaturuka mu misoro aho azaba arenga gato Miliyari magana inani na cumi n’esheshatu naho arenga  Miliyari magana ane mirongo irindwi azaturuka mu nkunga zo hanze. Muri rusange nubwo mu  mumbanziriza mushinga y’i ngengo y’imari amafaranga yiyongereye ariko izagaragaramo icyuho kingana na Miliyali magana abiri mirongo cyenda na zirindwi. ibi ni  ibashyizwe ahagaragara na Minisitiri w’Imari n’igenamigambi  Gatete Claver ubwo yashyikirizaga Inteko ishinga Amategeko imitwe yombi iteranye imbanziriza munshinga y’ingengo y’imari ngo bayitangeho ibitekerezo hari kuri uyu wa kabiri ku gicamunsi. Minisitiri w’Imari n’igenamigamb mu bisobanuro yashyikirije Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, yavuze ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda bwazamutse ku gipimo  8% mu ngengo y’imari igana ku musozo.  Muri 2013 ubukungu buzakomeza kuzamuka kuri 7.5% bishingiye ku musaruro uzava muri serivisi, ubuhinzi n’ubworozi n’inganda naho kuva 2015 na 2016 umuvuduko w’ubukungu uzaba ari 7%. Muri iyi ngengo y’imari y’igihe giciriritse Abadepite n’Abasenateri bagaragarijwe ko izashingira kuri gahunda y’imbaturabukungu ya kabiri no kurwanya ubukene kandi ishyirwe muri gahunda zitandukanye aho imishinga y’iterambere  n’ibikorwaremezo yagenewe 50% by’ingengo y’imari yose. Abagize Inteko Ishinga amategeko batanze ibitekerezo kandi basobanuza kuri bimwe mu bivugwa mu mbanzirizamushinga y’ingengo y’imari  yabamurikiwe. Ibibazo birebana n’ibyoherezwa mu mahanga, umuvuduko w’ubukungu uzagabanuka mu myaka iza ugereranije na 2012/2013, itangwa ry’inguzanyo mu ma banki, iterambere ry’ubumenyingiro mu rubyiruko na gahunda zari zarahagaze ubwo inkunga zakurwagaho ni bimwe mubyo bagarutsweho. Asubiza ibibazo by’Abadepite n’Abasenateri, Minisitiri Gatete Claver yavuze ko kuba umuvuduko w’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda uzamanukaho hagati ya 1 na 0.5% atari ikibazo giteye impungenge. Ngo ugereranije n’ibibazo byo guhagarikirwa inkunga n’ ihungabana ry’ubukungu ku isi,  ngo uwo muvuduko si mubi kandi ngo ubukungu buzakomeza kumera neza,  cyane ko inkunga zari zarahagaze zongewe gutangwa bishimishije n’umwuka kuri ubu ukaba ari mwiza. Imbanzirizamushinga y’ingengo y’imari 2013/2014 yashikirijwe Inteko Ishinga Amategeko izakomeza  gusuzumirwa muri Komisiyo y’Umutwe w’Abadepite ibifite mu nshingano ari nako  izarushaho kunononsorwa no gutangwaho ibitekerezo  mu gihe hazaba hategerejwe ku yemezwa ku buryo ndakuka mu kwezi kwa Kamena. ORINFOR

title: 17:40 Ihangana ridasanzwe mu matora ya nyuma y’ubutumwa bugufi muri Miss Rwanda
article_text:
17:40 Ihangana ridasanzwe mu matora ya nyuma y’ubutumwa bugufi muri Miss Rwanda

 Kuri uyu wa Kane i saa kumi n’ebyiri z’umugoroba nibwo hafungwa amatora anyuze mu butumwa bugufi, SMS, bikarangirana n’igikorwa cyo gusezerera abakobwa batabashije kubona amahirwe yo gukomeza mu irushanwa rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2019.  Ubwo twandikaga iyi nkuru, Mwiseneza Josiane niwe wari uyoboye n’amajwi arenga 61,174, akurikiwe na Ricca Michaella Kabahenda ufite amajwi arenga 59,177, Bayera Nisha Keza afite arenga ibihumbi 52,592, Uwicyeza Pamella afite arenga ibihumbi 42,005 na Niyonsaba Josiane ufite arenga ibihumbi 40,197. Nibwo bwa mbere muri aya matora habonetsemo umubare w’amajwi yikubye inshuro kabiri ugeranyije n’andi yabanje. Ricca Michaella Kabahenda yatunguranye aba uwa kabiri mu gihe nta na rimwe yigeze aza muri batanu ba mbere. Kuri uyu mugoroba haramenyekana abakobwa 15 bazagera mu cyiciro cya nyuma. Aba ni nabo basinya imihigo bavuga ibyo bazakora mu gihe cy’umwaka wose. Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2018 azatorwa ku wa 26 Mutarama 2019 mu birori bizabera i Rusororo mu nyubako ya Intare Conference Arena.

title: Umunezero wa MC Tino wamuritse alubumu ‘Umurima’ mu minsi ibiri
article_text:
Umunezero wa MC Tino wamuritse alubumu ‘Umurima’ mu minsi ibiri 

 Yavuze ko kumurika alubumu ‘Umurima’ yitiriye indirimbo ye, bitari ibintu byoroshye kuko byose byatangiye ari inzozi yari asangiye n’inshuti magara, Papito. 
 Mc Tino yagaragaje akanyamuneza yushije ikivi cyo kumurika alubumu ’Umurima’.  Igitaramo MC Tino yamurikiyemo alubumu cyabaye ku mugoroba w’uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 08 Ukuboza, 2019 gisozwa mu rucyerera rw’iki Cyumweru tariki 09 Ukuboza 2018 ahagana saa kumi z’urucyerera (4h :00’). Cyaranzwe n’ubwitabire bwiyongeraga uko amasaha yicumaga, cyarimo urubyiruko rwayobotswe na manyina, itabi n’ibindi byasemburaga kubyina batitangira. Mc Tino avuga ko kumara iki gihe cyose byerekana imbaraga n’ibyuya yabize agira ngo imfura ye (alubumu) izakirwe neza n’abakunzi be. Mu ijwi rimeze nk’irisaraye yavuze ko mu gitondo cyo ku wa Gatandatu yazindukiye aho yamurikiye alubumu kugeza ku mugoroba, ashyira mu mpamvu zatumye ananirwa bikomeye nyuma yo kuva ku rubyiniro. Yagize ati «….Wabibonye nishimye, nakoze indirimbo zanjye zose mu buryo bwa live….Wari uhari […..] wakumva wishimye cyane. Iyi show twayiyangiye ari ibintu by’ibikino, urabizi ‘status’ kandi byabaye….Ndashimira buri wese wagize uruhare kugira ngo bigende neza,” Yavuze ko kumurika alubumu bitandukanye no gukora igitaramo kuko atari ukubyuka ngo ugiye kuririmbira mu gace runaka ahubwo ko bisa kwitegura no kunoza buri kimwe cyose gisabwa. Ashingiye ku isomo yakuye mu kumurika alubumu ‘Umurima’, Mc Tino yabwiye n’abandi bahanzi Nyarwanda gutinyuka kuko ‘ntakidashoboka’. Ati “Icyo nabwira abahanzi byose birashoboka, batinyuke. Hari abahanzi hano hanze bafite imizigo baturusha kure ariko bagira intinyi ngira ngo,. Nanjye natangiye turi abantu batatu, njyewe, Papito na Pac,” Mc Tino yavuze kandi yanyuzwe n’urukundo yeretswe na bagenzi b’abahanzi yatumiye. Avuga ko n’abahanzi bashyizwe ku rupapuro rwamamaza iki gitaramo batabashije kuboneka bamuhaye ibisobanuro hakiri kare by’uko bataboneka. Ati “Ndabakunda bose. Hari n’abo ntatumiye baje nka Safi, Anita Pendo n’abandi….Njyewe birandenze. “Urban Boys bansobanuriye bari i Musanze. TBB mama wabo ararwaye ari Faisal. Rafiki yari afite igitaramo ‘Coga Night,” Avuga ko ibisobanuro yahawe n’aba bahanzi byamunyuze kuko nawe hari igihe ajya atumirwa ahantu nabashe kuboneka agatanga impamvu,” Muri iki gitaramo MC Tino yaririmbye mu buryo bw’umwimerere afashwe byihariye na Sympony Band, hiyongeraho kandi umuhanzi Uncle Austin nawe waririmbye mu buryo bwa Live. Muri iki gitaramo yahaye urugari amaraso mashya mu muziki Nyarwanda barimo: Babou Tight King, Mr Hu, Cyomoro, True Boy n’abandi. Ni igitaramo kandi cyaririmbyemo ab’amazina amaze kumenyakana nka :Bull Dogg wishimiwe mu buryo bukomeye, Kid Gaju watanze amataratara ye, Gabiro Guitar, Dj Pius n’abandi. Alubumu ‘Umurima’ Mc Tino yayikubiyeho indirimbo cumi n’ebyiri (12), yayimuritse icyenda muri zo ziri hanze. Ni mu gihe eshatu (3) nshya yazimuritse uyu munsi. Alubumu, ni urugendo rushya rw’umuziki wa Mc Tino nyuma y’uko yiyomoeye ku itsinda rya TBB yamenyekaniyemo.

title: Charly na Nina bagiye gukorana igitaramo na Davido
article_text:
Charly na Nina bagiye gukorana igitaramo na Davido

 Abahanzi, Charly na Nina batumiwe mu gitaramo i Buruseli mu Bubiligi, igitaramo bazahuriramo n’abahanzi b’ibyamamare nka Davido na Ali Kiba, kuwa 8 Nyakanga 2017. Iki gitaramo cyateguwe n’Abanyarwanda, bagize itsinda rya “Team Rwanda Production”  basanzwe batumira abahanzi nyarwanda. 
Abinyujije ku rubuga rwa Instagram, Charlotte Rulinda ari we Charly yavuze ko ari ubwa mbere bagiye gukorana igitaramo n’abahanzi babiri bakomeye bo ku mugabane wa Afurika. Yagize ati “Twatangiye ibitaramo bizenguruka u Burayi, u Bubiligi mutwitegure ku wa 8 Nyakanga 2017 tuzataramana bwa mbere n’abahanzi bakomeye ku mugabane wa Afurika Ali Kiba na Davido turi ku rubyiniro rumwe ahitwa Birmingham Palace.” Charly na Nina kuri ubu bari muri Nigeria, aho bivugwa ko bamaze gukorana indirimbo n’umuhanzi waho ukomeye witwa Esegine Allen uzwi cyane ku izina rya Orezi wamamaye ku ndirimbo yitwa ‘Rihanna’ yahimbye muri 2013. Aba bahanzi bahise banatangaza ko mu minsi ya vuba bagiye gushyira hanze indirimbo nshya bise “Mfata” yakorewe muri Uganda na Producer (utunganya indirimbo) Eliar Khis usanzwe ukorera muri Swangz Ave agakorera n’abahanzi barimo Radio na Weasel. Charly na Nina baherukaga muri iki gihugu cy’u Bubiligi muri Werurwe aha nyine kuri Birmingham Palace. Ni nabwo bari bakoze ibitaramo bikomeye ku mugabane w’u Burayi mu bihugu by’u Bufaransa, i Geneva muri Switzerland no mu Busuwisi. Mu minsi ishize ho aba bahanzi bari i Bujumbura mu Burundi naho mu bitaramo.

article_text:
Urutonde rw’abahanzi bazasusurutsa Rwanda Day mu Buholandi

 Abahanzi Teta, King James, Masamba, Muyango, Julienne Gashugi, Sofia, Meddy, Ben Kayiranga, Thierry Haguma, Nyiratunga Alponsine n’abandi bazasusurutsa abazitabira Rwanda Day izaba ku itariki ya 3 Nzeri 2015 mu Buholandi. Teta, King James, Masamba, Muyango, Joulienne Gashugi na Sofia bazaturuka mu Rwanda naho Meddy azaba yaturutse muri Amerika. 
Abahanzi bazaturuka mu Rwanda bazifatanya na bagenzi babo bakorera umuziki ku Mugabane w’u Burayi barimo Ben Kayiranga, Thierry Haguma, Nyiratunga Alponsine n’itorero ry’ababyina injyana ya kinyarwanda. “Rwanda Day”, ni umunsi uhuza Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga n’inshuti z’u Rwanda, hakaganirwa ku iterambere ry’igihugu. Kuva mu mwaka wa 2011, Rwanda Day imaze kubera i Chicago, Boston na Atlanta muri USA, i Paris mu Bufaransa, i Toronto muri Canada, n’i Londres mu Bwongereza. King James ukunzwe mu ndirimbo z’urukundo ategerejwe mu Buholandi
Muri Rwanda Day izabera mu Buholandi, Perezida wa Repuburika Paul Kagame azaganira n’Abanyarwanda n’inshuti z’u Rwanda, hagamijwe iterambere ry’igihugu. Iherutse ni iyabereye mu Mujyi wa Atlanta muri Amerika ndetse muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka nabwo habaye igikorwa gisa n’iki cyahurije hamwe urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda ruba mu Rwanda n’urutuye mu mahanga, baganira ku ruhare rwabo mu iterambere ry’igihugu, igikorwa cyiswe Rwanda Youth Forum.

title: Anne Kansiime yatsindiye igihembo muri Comedy nyafrica
article_text:
Anne Kansiime yatsindiye igihembo muri Comedy nyafrica

 Uyu mugore wo muri Uganda umaze kumenyekana henshi muri Africa yatsindiye igikombe bita Nollywood & African People’s Choice Award (NAFCA) yahataniraga na bagenzi be bo muri Nigeria Basket Mouth na Klint Da Drunk bakaba bahataniraga gutsinda icyiciro bita Favourite Comedian. 
 Anne Kansiime ari mu  banyarwenya icumi ba mbere muri Africa kugeza ubu  BBC iherutse gushyira Kansiime mu banyarwenya icumi ba mbere muri ku Isi ubu akaba ari gushima abafana be kuba baramubaye hafi mu kazi ke bakamutora. Yifashe ifoto kuri  Instagram ayoherereza abafana be abashimira kumuba hafi. Abafana be yita Ninjas yababwiye ko abahoza ku mutima kandi ko atazabatenguha na rimwe. Iki gihembo cye ngo azagifata muri Nzeri uyu mwaka ku italiki ya 12 mu muhango uzabera Los Angeles mu nzu mberabyombi yitwa The Orpheum Theatre Broadway. Iki gihembo giterwa inkunga na USA mu rwego rwo guteza imbere cinema nyafurika nk’uko Daily nation ibyandika. Kansiime amaze imyaka umunani akora umwuga wo gutera urwenya akaba yaranabiherewe ibihembo bitandukanye birimo AIRTEL Women of Substance Awards 2014, BEFFTA (The Black Entertainment, Film, Fashion, Television & Arts Award) 2013 Best Comedian, Lagos International Festival 2013 (Best Actress), Social Media Awards (Favorite Celebrity) na African Social Awards Malaysia (ASAM) 2013. title: Zari na we yahamije ko abanyarwandakazi ari beza
article_text:
Zari na we yahamije ko abanyarwandakazi ari beza 

 Zari umugore w’umuhanzi ukomeye mu gihugu cya Tanzania, Diamond, yahamije ko abanyarwandakazi ari beza cyane.


Ubwo yanyuraga kuri tapi itukura, kimwe mu bibazo yabajijwe n’icyuko yizanye mu Rwanda wenyine ntazane n’umukunzi we Diamond yenda kubyarira imfura. Zari yagize ati “ Yarabishakaga cyane ko twazana ariko bitewe na gahunda afite muri Nigeriya ntibyakunze. Ku munsi w’ejo(yavugaga uyu munsi ku cyumweru tariki 28 Kamena)agomba kwerekeza muri Nigeriya aho afite na gahunda yo gukorana indirimbo n’umuhanzi Flavour.”


Igitaramo kirangiye,ubwo yabahabwaga ijambo ngo agire icyo avuga kuburyo yabonye imigendekere yacyo , Zari yavuze ko yishimiye uburyo cyari giteguye ndetse n’uburyo abaririmbyi baririmbye(Performance). Gusa ntiyasoje ijambo rye atagarutse ku bwiza bw’abanyarwandakazi bukunda kugarukwaho n’abanyamahanga benshi basura u Rwanda. Ati “ Mu byukuri nasanze abakobwa b’abanyarwandakazi ari beza, bafite ubwiza karemano.”
Muri iki gitaramo n’umuhanzi Bebe Cool witwaye neza cyane yavuze ko mu Rwanda ariho ubwiza bukomoka muri Afrika, na we yemeza ko abanyarwandakazi ari beza cyane ndetse abatura zimwe mu ndirimbo ze yaririmbye mu  joro  ryakeye zirimo’Come to me ‘ yakoranye na Alpha Rwirangira, na’ Love you everyday’ ikunzwe muri iki gihe.

title: Urukundo hagati ya King James na Princess Priscillah rugeze aharyoshye
article_text:
Urukundo hagati ya King James na Princess Priscillah rugeze aharyoshye

 Abahanzi King James na Princess Priscillah bakunze kuvugwaho n’abanyarwanda benshi ko bakundana ndetse ko banafitanye gagunda yo kuzabana nk’umugore n’umugabo, ibimenyetso byinshi bikaba bikomeje kwerekana ko baba bafitanye umubano wihariye n’ubwo bo ubwabo baterura ngo bagire icyo babivugaho ariko hari ibimenyetso byivugira.

 Kuva Princess Priscillah akiri mu Rwanda, mu bitangazamakuru no ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hakunze gucicikana ibimenyetso byerekana ko aba bahanzi bakundana cyane ariko bo byabageraho bakanga kubyerura n’ubwo batahagarikaga amarenga yerekana ko umubano wabo uzira amakemwa, gusa biragaragara ko urukundo rwabo noneho rugeze aharyoshye.

 Kuva uyu mukobwa yakwerekeza muri Amerika, nabwo King James yakomeje kwerekana ko amuhozaho umutima kuko yahise ahimba indirimbo yise « Ndagutegereje » byagaragaye ko ari Priscillah yari ategereje kuko avugamo uburyo akumbuye umukunzi we, maze ibintu biza kurushaho kuvugisha benshi ubwo King James yafataga indege akajya gukorera amashusho y’iyi ndirimbo muri Amerika asanzeyo Priscillah, ndetse uyu mukobwa ninawe ugaragara mu mashusho y’iyi ndirimbo arimo kugirana ibihe byiza na King James ku mazi (beach) ya Miami.

 Nyuma y’uko King James akoze indirimbo abantu bakabona ko ari Priscillah yaba yari yayigeneye, uyu mukobwa wari umaze igihe adakora indirimbo nawe mu minsi ishize yaje gukora iyitwa « Icyo mbarusha », iyi kugeza ubu hakaba hari ibimenyetso bigaragaza ko icyo Priscillah yavugaga arusha abandi bakobwa b’urungano rwe ari uko akundana na King James.

 Abinyujije ku rubuga rwa facebook, iyi ndirimbo igisohoka King James yanditse amagambo y’icyongereza avuga ko ari mu rukundo n’iyi ndirimbo ya Princess Priscillah yitwa ‘Icyo mbarusha’, abantu batandukanye bakaba barasubije uyu muhanzi ko akwiye kwerura akavuga ko ari mu rukundo na nyirayo aho kuvuga ko ari mu rukundo n’indirimbo, basobanura ko aya ari amarenga y’urukundo rwe n’uyu muhanzikazi. Mu minsi micye ishize King James yagiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu ihuriro ry’urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda, ahurirayo na Princess Priscillah maze avuyeyo ahita ahimba indirimbo yitwa "Ndagukunda" yumvikanamo amagambo y’imitoma ihambaye, ndetse na King James ubwe yahise yemeza ko iyi ndirimbo yayituye by’umwihariko umukunzi we, ariko yirinda kuvuga izina rye. Gusa amakuru dukesha inshuti za hafi z’aba bombi, ni uko nta wundi mukunzi King James afite utari Priscillah.  SRC:Umuryango

title: 60% by’amatike y’igitaramo cya Stromae yari yaramaze kugurwa
article_text:
60% by’amatike y’igitaramo cya Stromae yari yaramaze kugurwa

 Abateguraga igitaramo cya Stromae baratangaza ko batunguwe no kubona uburyo Stromae akunzwe, kuko mbere ho icyumweru kimwe gusa ngo igitaramo cye kibe i Kigali amatike yari amaze kugurwa ku kigero cya 60%.


 Kimwe mu byapa bimanitse mu Mujyi wa Kigali byamamazaga igitaramo cya Stromae, igitaramo cyasubitswe (Ifoto/Irakoze R.)  Judo Kanobana, uyobora Positive Production yateguraga iki gitaramo,  avuga ko abari baraguze aya matike bose bari gusubizwa amafaranga yabo kuko kitakibaye. Mu kiganiro n’Abanyamakuru cyabaye kuri uyu wa 17 Kamena, Kanobana yagize ati "yego twarababaye, Abanyarwanda barababaye, abafana barababaye ariko byatweretse ko uyu muhanzi akunzwe cyane, kandi ko ibitaramo bikomeye nk’ibi, amaserukiramuco, ibirori by’imyidagaduro bikunzwe kandi ko bifite ireme.” Ati "Ubu 60% by’amatike yose yari yamaze kugurishwa, abandi baramaze kutumenyesha ko twayababikira (booking).” Avuga ku burwayi Stromae yahuye nabwo, Kanobana yagize ati "yanyoye imiti yo kwirinda malaria imumerera nabi imugiraho ingaruka, imugwa nabi ahita asubira iwabo.” Judo avuga ko hari icyizere ko nakira bazongera kuganira nawe, bakareba niba bishoboka ko iki gitaramo cyasubizwaho mu mezi yandi ari imbere. Ibi ariko ntibikuraho ko abaguze amatike bose ubu bari gusubizwa amafaranga bari baratanze. Judo agira ati "Abajyanama be turavugana buri munsi, ubu badusabye ko abaguze amatike bose tubanza kubasubiza amafaranga yabo, ariko wenda nakira tuzongera tukaganira kuko na nyir’ubwite hose aho yacaga yavugaga ko igitaramo gikomeye yifuzaga gukora ari icy’i Kigali mu Rwanda.” Stromae aririmbira aho akomoka byari byafashwe nk’ikintu kidasanzwe, aho byari byitezwe ko bizahuruza abantu baturutse ku yindi migabane barenga igihumbi (1000). Hari hitezwe kandi abanyamakuru babigize umwuga barenga Magana abiri (200) bakorera ibitangazamakuru bikomeye ku Isi, barimo ba gafotozi makumyabiri (20) bari ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Stromae yari kuzazanana n’itsinda ry’abantu bagera kuri mirongo itatu, bose bari kuzamara hafi icyumweru muri Hoteli Des Mille Colline.  Inkuru ya Irakoze R/Izuba

title: Abahanzi bari muri Guma Guma basusurukije abanyarusizi
article_text:
Abahanzi bari muri Guma Guma basusurukije abanyarusizi

 Abahanzi 10 bahatanira irushanwa rya Primus Guma Guma Superstar ku nshuro ya gatanu (PGGSS5) batangiye gutaramira abakunzi babo mu Ntara  Akarere kabimburiye utundi ni Rusizi. Igitaramo cya mbere cyabaye kuri uyu wa gatandatu tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2015. Abahanzi mbere yo kuririmba batomboye nimero bagomba gukoresha ku rubyiniro, Senderi Interinational Hit niwe waje ku mwanya wa mbere akurikirwa n’abandi nk’itsinda rya Active, Jules Sentore, Itsinda rya Dream Boys, Bruce Melodie, Paccy, Itsinda rya TNP, Rafiki na Bull Dogg. Indirimbo zashimishije abari bitabiriye iki gitaramo ni :Nk’umusaza ya Bull Dogg, Baramushaka ya Knowless, Ntundize ya Bruce Melodie, Bagambe ya Rafiki n’izindi. Ikinyamakuru Izuba Rirashe cyagereye bamwe mu bahanzi  bavuga uburyo bakiriwe mu Karere ka Rusizi. Tizzo umwe basore bagize itsinda rya Active yavuze ko yishimiye uburyo abanyarusizi basigaye bazi izina Active ati "ukurikije uko byari bimeze muri PGGSS ku nshuro ya kane ubona ko bamaze kutumenya, bikaba bitwereka ko ejo hacu ari heza muri muzika nyarwanda”. Bruce Melodie yishimiye uburyo yakiriwe i  Rusizi, anatangwaza n’uburyo indirimbo ze zizwi ku buryo bamufasha kuziririmba ati "ni ukuri nabanje kugira ubwoba mbonye uburyo banyishimiye gusa byanyeretse ko nshobora kwegukana PGGSS ku nshuro ya 5”.


Paccy ni ubwa mbere agiye mu irushanwa rya PGGSS, ariko afite gahunda yo kuzayegukana ati "nkurikije ukuntu abantu banyishimiye ku munsi wa mbere, ubutaha nzaba namaze kumenyera urubyiniro”. Mushyoma Joseph bita Boubou umuyobozi wa East African Promoters (EAP) isosiyete itegura iri rushnwa yavuze ko akurikije umwaka ushize ubwitabire bw’abantu bwiyongereye ati "urebye abantu babaye benshi kandi ni nacyo kintu tuba twifuza kuko bitwereka ko abahanzi bacu hari izina bamaze kugira mu Rwanda”.


Ibitaramo by’ubu byiswe "Serukana na Guma Guma” mu rwego rwo kubwira abantu kwitabira ibitaramo abahanzi bakora.


Rwigizankana Martin ni umwe mu bari bitabiriye igitaramo yabwiye Izuba Rishe ko ysihmiye uburyo EAP na Bralirwa babazanira abahanzi ndetse avuga ko ashyigikiye umuraperi Bull Dogg kuko amakunda cyane. Akanama (jury) nkemurampaka muri aya marushanwa azabera mu Ntara zose z’u Rwanda  kagizwe na: Aimable Twahirwa, Tonzi ndetse na Lion Imanzi. Inkuru ya Izuba rirashe

title: Urban Boys bamaze gusezera mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star
article_text:
Urban Boys bamaze gusezera mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star

 Abahanzi bo mu itsinda rya Urban Boys basezeye mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star ya gatanu mu gihe bari barashyizwe ku rutonde rw’abahanzi 15 bazatoranywamo abahanzi 10 bazazenguruka igihugu muri aya marushanwa, aya makuru akaba yamaze kwemezwa n’ubuyobozi bwa Super Level aba bahanzi babarizwamo hanasobanurwa impamvu yabyo. 
 Urban Boys bamaze gusezera mu marushanwa ya Primus Guma Guma Super Star Ubusabe bwabo babunyujije mu nyandiko, mu ibaruwa bandikiye ubuyobozi bwa Bralirwa ari nayo itegura aya marushanwa ifatanyije na EAP, bakaba bagaragaje ko gusezera kwabo gushingiye ku gihembo gitangwa buri kwezi mu bitaramo bine baba bakomeza, icyo gihembo bakaba babona ko kidahagije. Ubusanzwe buri kwezi abahanzi bahabwa miliyoni imwe y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, muri buri kwezi hakaba haba harimo ibitaramo bine bityo umuhanzi urimo akabara ko aba agomba guteganya imyenda n’ibindi nkenerwa ku bitaramo, kugirango abashe kujya ku rubyiniro agaragara neza cyane ko nabyo biri mu bihabwa amanota. 
 Nk’uko twabisobanuriwe na Richard uyobora Super Level ari naho Urban Boys bakorera muzika yabo, ngo nk’itsinda ry’abantu batatu kuba bahabwa miliyoni y’amafaranga mu kwezi kuba kurimo ibitaramo bine, babona hatarebwa ku kibazo cy’abahanzi bari mu itsinda baba bagomba kwambara no kubona ibindi bakeneye ngo bajye ku rubyiniro bameze neza, ibyo bigatandukana n’umuhanzi uri mu itsinda uba agomba kwimenya ari umwe, bityo ayo mafaranga atangwa ngo bitegure akaba yari akwiye kongerwa ku bahanzi bari mu itsinda.
