title: Bahanzi isoko ry’ibihangano byanyu ryarushaho gutera imbere…Dore ibanga
article_text:
Bahanzi isoko ry’ibihangano byanyu ryarushaho gutera imbere…Dore ibanga

 Abahanzi baributswa ko hari uburyo barushaho kubyaza umusaruro ibihangano byabo bakarushaho gutera imbere no guteza imbere igihugu cyabo. Ubwo buryo bukubiye mu Gitabo cyanditswe mu mpera z’umwaka ushize wa 2019, kitwa “Marketing Strategies for the Promotion of Cultural and Creative Industries in Rwanda” cyanditswe n’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco, (RALC). Abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda mu byiciro bitandukanye bakora ibihangano byiza ndetse bishobora gukundwa na buri wese wabyumva, wabireba cyangwa wabisoma ariko ntibimenyekane ku isoko ryagutse ryo mu Rwanda no mu mahanga. Ibi bituma abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda badakura umusaruro ukwiye mu bihangano byabo bikanatuma na bo ubwabo badatera imbere cyangwa ngo bateze imbere igihugu cyabo mu buryo bukwiye. Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco (RALC) yashyize hanze igitabo gikubiyemo uburyo abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda bashobora kwigobotora ibi bibazo byose. Iki gitabo kitwa “Marketing Strategies for the Promotion of Cultural and Creative Industries in Rwanda”, kigaruka ku bibazo byihariye bya buri kiciro cy’ubuhanzi mu Rwanda ndetse n’uburyo abahanzi bashobora kubivamo bakarushaho gukamirwa n’ibihangano byabo. Ni igitabo cyuzuye impanuro zafasha abahanzi mu byiciro binyuranye gukarishya ubumenyi bwo kurushaho kubyaza umusaruro ibihangano byabo byaba ibyo muri Muzika, Sinema, Ubugeni n’Ubukorikori, Ikinamico, Urwenya, Imbyino, Ubwiza n’Imideri, Ubwanditsi ndetse n’Ubusizi. Iki gitabo cyanditswe ku bufatanye n’impuguke mu by’Ubukungu, kinagaruka ku ngamba zo gushakira isoko ibikorwa by’ubuhanzi mu Rwanda bikarushaho kubyara umusaruro wafasha abahanzi kuva ku rwego rumwe bakagera ku rundi. Niyomugaba Jonathan umukozi w’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco avuga ko iki gitabo ari nk’imfashanyigisho ikwiye kwifashishwa n’abahanzi kugira ngo bahange ibihangano bibyara inyungu. Ati “Gikubiyemo ingamba zafasha umuhanzi gutekereza mu gihe ahanga, agatekereza abo ahangira, agatekereza isoko kuko hari igihe usanga umuhanzi ahanga ibimurimo n’amarangamutima ye, ariko ntatekereze abo ahangira cyangwa abazabigura, ese bizakundwa bite? Ese bizinjiza? Iki gitabo kirasubiza ibi bibazo byose.” Avuga ko muri iki gitabo hakubiyemo n’uburyo umuhanzi yarushaho kumenyekanisha ibihangano bye ndetse n’uburyo ashyikirana n’abakunda ibihangano bye. Ati “Ese iyo abantu bamaze kumukunda arekera aho cyangwa akomeza kubigarurira ku buryo batamucika.” Avuga ko iki gitabo kireba abahanzi mu byiciro byose ku buryo abazakigenderaho bazaba binjiye mu rubuga rwo gucuruza ibihangano byabo kandi akaba ari bo bagena ikiguzi cyabyo. Ati “Niba ari umunyamuzika, niba ari umunyasinema; turashaka kumujyana ku isoko ahinduke umucuruzi ave mu buhanzi, yego igihangano cyasohotse cyanwa ari kugitekereza atekereze nk’umucuruzi ave mu kuvuga ngo bazampa ayo bashaka, ahubwo acuruze ase nk’utegetse icyo agomba kubona mu gihangano ke.”   Leta n’abandi bose bafasha umuhanzi barabwirwa Iki gitabo “Marketing Strategies for the Promotion of Cultural and Creative Industries in Rwanda” kinagaruka ku ruhare rw’Inzego n’abandi bantu bose bagira uruhare mu kuzamura urwego rw’Ubuhanzi. Niyomugaba ati “Hari n’igihe usanga umuhanzi afite itsinda rinini ry’abamufasha gucuruza, aha rero tugaragaza inama zafasha abo bose; umuhanzi ubwe, abamufasha, inzego za Leta, inzego z’abikorera, abashoramari kuko n’abashoramari barakenewe muri uru ruganda.” Avuga ko ku ruhande rwa Leta hari ubushake bwo gufasha abahanzi haba mu gushyiraho politiki zabateza imbere ndetse no kubatera inkunga mu buryo bw’ubushobozi. Ati “Noneho igisigaye ni ugufatanya na ba bahanzi kugira ngo ubwo bushake bugaragazwa na gahunda za Leta buge mu ngiro habeho imikoranire.” Niyomugaba avuga ko abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda nibagendera ku mpanuro zikubiye muri kiriya gitabo, bizabafasha guhanga ibihango by’umwimerere kandi bifite ireme ku buryo byo ubwabyo bizicuruza haba ku isoko ryo mu Rwanda, mu Karere ndetse no ku Isi hose. Ati “Nk’ubu mu Rwanda twumva indirimbo nyinshi z’Igiswahili, z’Igifaransa n’iz’Icyongereza yewe n’izo muri Afurika y’Epfo mu ndimi tuba tutazi namba ariko tukazikunda, dukundamo iki? Dukundamo cya kintu umuntu yahanze ategurira abazamureba, ikintu kirambye gikomeye gikurura.” Niyomugaba avuga ko kugeza ubu, ubuhanzi bugira uruhare rwa 5% mu musaruro w’igihugu ariko ko hifuzwa ko iki gipimo kizamuka kikaba cyagera kuri 20% kandi ko bishoboka kuko hari ingero z’ibihugu byabigezeho haba muri Afurika ndetse no mu bihugu byateye imbere. Hasanzwe hariho izindi ngamba zigamije guteza imbere ubuhanzi n’inganda ndangamuco zirimo gufasha abahanzi kwibumbira hamwe ndetse no gutera inkunga ibikorwa by’ubuhanzi. Muri Nzeri 2018, Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco yatangije gahunda yo GUTERA INKUNGA IMISHINGA ishingiye ku muco w’u Rwanda ifasha guhanga imirimo mishya 1 000 buri mwaka. Muri iyi gahunda, buri mwaka habaho igikorwa cyo gutoranya imishinga y’ubuhanzi ishobora gutanga imirimo ku bantu benshi igaterwa inkunga, ubundi abahawe ubushobozi bakazishyura mu gihe runaka bemeranywaho kugira ngo n’abandi bifuza gutangiza imishinga babone ubushobozi. Martin NIYONKURU
UMUSEKE.RW

article_text:
Abakina umukino w’amagare bakomorewe gukora imyitozo

   Itangazo ryasohowe na Minisiteri y’imikino ryemereye Ishyirahamwe ry’umukino w’amagare mu Rwanda, Rwanda Cycling Association,  gusubukura imyitozo mu mukino wo gusiganwa ku magare. Rivuga ko guhera ku wa Mbere taliki 08, Kamena, 2020, abakina umukino w’amagare bemerewe gukora imyitozo. Bibukijwe kuzambara agapfukamunwa, kwitwaza umuti wica udukoko mu biganza kandi bagahana intera. Risaba abakora umukino wo gusiganwa ku magare kubahiriza amabwiriza yose yatanzwe na Minisiteri y’intebe kandi rikavuga ko nyuma y’iminsi 15 hazakorwa isuzuma mu bakinnyi kugira ngo harebwe niba nta zindi ngamba zafatwa. Umukino w’amagare ni umwe mu mikino ikundwa kurusha iyindi mu Rwanda bitewe n’uburyo abakinnyi bayo bahesheje ishema u Rwanda mu mikino yo kuruzenguruka basiganwa ku magare.   Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA UMUSEKE.RW

title: Kimenyi Yves yarekanywe ku mugaragaro muri Kiyovu Sports
article_text:
Kimenyi Yves yarekanywe ku mugaragaro muri Kiyovu Sports

 Yves Kimenyi wari umaze iminsi bihwihwiswa ko yarangije kwemerera Kiyovu Sports kuyibera umunyezamu,  kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yerekanywe ku mugaragaro arimo ahererekanya amasezerano y’imikoranire hagati ye Kiyovu Sports.  Nta gihe kinini gishize bivugwa ko yasinye na Kiyovu ariko yaba we cyangwa abayobozi ba Kiyovu bakabihakana. Kimenyi Yves afatwa nk’umuzamu w’umuhanga kurusha abandi mu Rwanda. Uretse kurinda amazamu ya Rayon Sports, yari asanzwe ari umuzamu w’ikipe y’igihugu, Amavubi. Mu ntangiriro za 2020 yari ari mu banyezamu 14 bo mu bihugu bigize Umuryango w’Africa y’i Burasirazuba, EAC, bahataniraga igihembo cy’umunyazamu uhiga abandi, kikaba cyari butangwa n’imwe muri televiziyo zo muri uyu muryango. Kiyovu Sports na Police FC niyo makipe yaguze abakinnyi benshi muri iki gihe kandi abenshi bakomeye bavanywe muri Rayon Sports. UMUSEKE.RW

title: (VIDEO) Uwambajimana “Kawunga”  arakomanga ku muryango ugaruka muri Rayon Sports
article_text:
(VIDEO) Uwambajimana “Kawunga”  arakomanga ku muryango ugaruka muri Rayon Sports

    Myugariro wahoze mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports, Uwambajimana Leon bakunda kwita “Kawunga” ubu nta kipe afite nyuma yo kurangiza amasezerano muri Sunrise FC,  ashobora kugaruka muri Rayon Sports iri mu biganiro na we. Mu kiganiro kihariye n’uyu mukinnyi ndetse n’ushinzwe ku mashakira amakipe, Nduwayezu Emmy bahaye UMUSEKE bavuze ko ibiganiro bitagenze neza muri Kiyovu SC nay o yamwifuzaga, avuga ko hari amahirwe menshi yo kugaruka muri Rayon Sports. Nduwayezu Emmy ushinzwe gushakira ikipe ‘Kawunga’, ati: ’’Twari tumaze iminsi mu biganiro na Kiyovu SC, uyu munsi twari gushyira umukono ku masezerano, gusa ntabwo byakunze kuko ibyo baduhaga ntabwo byatunyuze.” Tumubakijije niba ntayindi kipe batangiye ibiganiro yatubwiye ko hari amakipe menshi, ku isonga Rayon Sports ikaba iri mu zishobora kurara zimusinyishije. Ati: ’’Nyuma yo kuganira na Kiyovu SC, ubu ibiganiro tubifatanye n’andi makipe arimo Rayon Sports, bishora kurangira nkasinya, kuko iriya ni ikipe nziza buri wese yakwifuza kujyamo ngo ayikinire kubera abafana ifite.” Amakuru twamenye ni uko hari umuntu watangiye kwegera abakinnyi bamwe na bamwe ngo abagurire Rayon Sports nyuma y’ibibazo iriya kipe irimo byo kutumvikana kw’abayobozi bariho n’abahoze bayiyobora. Uwambajimana Leon yifuzwa na Kiyovu ngo ayikinire nyuma yo kugira umwaka mwiza w’imikino muri Sunrise FC, ngo byari kuba mahwi ikamwongera kuri Babua Samson wayijemo, akaba yari aziranye cyane mu kibuga n’uyu ‘Kawunga’. Mu yandi makipe amushaka arimo Mukura VS, na Musanze FC. Leon yigaragaje cyane mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports muri 2013 akaba akibukirwa ku gitego yatsinze ku munota wa karindwi Rayon Sports itsinda Panthère du Ndé yo muri Cameroon 1-0 mu mikino yo ku mugabane wa Africa. Jean Paul MUGABE

title: Ibitekerezo bya Moses ku guhangana n’ingaruka za Covid-19 mu bucuruzi
article_text:
Ibitekerezo bya Moses ku guhangana n’ingaruka za Covid-19 mu bucuruzi

  *Moses Turahirwa yishimira ko yambitse Perezida Paul Kagame,
 *Kuba 70% by’abakiriya babo bahoraho byatumye badashegeshwa cyane na Covid-19
*Mu myaka 5 ishije abinyujije mu nzu y’imideli ya Moshions bahuguye abarenga 15.  Moses Turahirwa washinze inzu y’Imideli ya Moshions atangaza ko mu gihe cyo kuguma mu rugo hirindwa icyorezo cya Covid-19 ubucuruzi bwe kimwe n’abandi busa naho bwahungabanye icyakora bakabifashwa no kuba barizigamiye mu bihe byatambutse. Turahirwa yatangarije Umuseke ko icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyazanye impinduka nyinshi mu bucuruzi. Ati “Mu gihe cya Covid-19 sinavuga ko abantu benshi bari bashishikajwe no kugura imyenda dukora kuko abantu ntabwo bavaga mu nzu, abenshi bagura imyenda bigendanye n’uko bafite ibirori cyangwa bagiye kwambara imyenda bitewe n’aho bagiye.” Yakomeje avuga ko ikoranabuhanga  ryabafashije kwegerana n’abakiriya babagana muri kiriya gihe cyo kuguma mu rugo hirindwa icyorezo cya Covid-19. Ati “70% ku ijana by’abakiriya batugana ni abahoraho. Muri bo harimo abayobozi b’igihugu mu nzego zitandukanye n’abakiriya bandi.” Ikoranabuhanga dusanzwe turikoresha mu bucuruzi bwacu by’umwihariko mu kwegerana n’abakiriya bacu, turikoresha iyo turimo kwamamaza ibikorwa byacu biciye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga. Ubu turikubaka uburyo bwo kujya ducuruza imyenda dukora ku rubuga rwacu. Ni ibintu dutekereza ko mu mezi abiri bizaba birangiye gukorwa ku buryo wabasha kugura ibicuruzwa byacu aho waba uri hose ku Isi. Yakomeje avuga ko isomo yakuye muri ibi bihe bya Covid-19 by’umwihariko nk’umucuruzi, ni uguhora witeguye kuko hashobora kuza ibishobora kugukura mu bucuruzi mu gihe gito. Zimwe mu ntego Moshions bagezeho harimo kuba bafite abakiriya bahoraho kandi benshi bagera kuri 70%. Turahirwa ati “Icyo bivuze kuba dufite abakiriya biganjemo Abayobozi b’Igihugu mu nzego zitandukanye, bitwereka ko ibikorwa byacu bishyigikiwe kandi byishimirwa n’izo nzego. Burya binadufasha gukora cyane ndetse tukarushaho gukorana ubushishozi imyambaro yacu.” Turahirwa uvuga ko ubuhanzi mu Rwanda buri gutera imbere cyane atangaza ko ahawe ubushobozi afite ibyo yahindura. Ati “Mpahwe amahirwe yo kugira ibyo nahindura mu buhanzi ntekereza ko nashyira imbaraga mu gushishikariza urubyiruko gukurikira impano zabo, ngashyiraho gahunda yo gukurikirana izo mpano, numva byafasha abakiri bato kumenya impano zabo kare.” Muri Moshions bamaze guhugura mu bijyanye n’ubudozi no guhanga imyambaro abagera kuri 15. Turahirwa yemeza ko mu myaka 5 ishize yageze ku nzozi yahoraga arota ubwo yari atangiye kwinjira mu bijyanye no guhanga imideli. Ati “Muri iyi myaka yose nambitse abantu batandukanye barimo Perezida Paul Kagame n’umufasha we Mme Jeanette Kagame, nambitse abayobozi mu nzego zitandukanye ndetse nambitse n’ibyamamare nka Sonia Rolland wabaye Nyampinga w’U Bufaransa mu 2000, Umukinnyi wa firimi w’Umunyarwanda, Nshuti Gatwa n’abandi benshi.” Turahirwa kandi asanga abantu batari bakwiye kurebera Made in Rwanda mu ishusho imwe kuko ngo ifite amashami menshi ariko cyane mu bijyanye n’imyambarire harimo ingeri nyinshi hari abakora imyenda yambarwa n’abafite ubushobozi buke, ariko nanone hari abakora imyenda yambarwa n’abafite ubushobozi bwinshi bityo kuri we asanga buri Munyarwanda wese afite ikiciro yisangamo. Robert Kayihura
UMUSEKE.RW

title: Shaddy Boo, Meddy na Knowless mu bari guhatanira ibihembo ‘E.A
article_text:
Shaddy Boo, Meddy na Knowless mu bari guhatanira ibihembo ‘E.A

 Abanyarwanda 27 bari guhatanira ibihembo bya East Africa Fashion Awards mu byiciro bitandukanye. Muri bo harimo umuhanzi Meddy, Knowless, Charly na Nina n’impirimbanyi kuri Social Media Shaddy Boo. Abategura ibi bihembo bavuga ko mu gutoranya ababihataniram bagendeye ku bikorwa buri umwe yakoze ndetse ko babonye mu Rwanda hari umubare munini w’abazamuye urwego rwabo mu bijyanye no guhanga imideri, kurimba, gufotora, gushabika  mu bishamikiye ku mideli n’ibindi. Mu banyarwanda bari guhatanira ibi bihembo harimo umunyamakuru wa CNBC Africa ‘Makeda’ usanzwe anayobora ibirori bitandukanye. Makeda ari guhatana mu byiciro bibiri birimo icya ‘Most stylish Female Host of the Year’ n’icya ‘most female media personality of the year’. Ibi byiciro abihuriyeho n’undi munyamakuru wa RBA ‘Christelle Kabagire’. Abandi banyarwanda bari guhatana harimo umunywamakuru wa RBA, Friday James uri guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Most stylish male media personality of the year’. Harimo kandi Sonia Mugabo uri guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Emerging fashion designer of the year’. Souvorov Beauty na Milly Beauty bombi bari guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Makeup Artist of the year’ hakaba na Ryan Stylish uri guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Fashion Stylist of the year’ Video y’indirimbo ya Davis D yitwa Dede iri guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Fashionable Video of the year’. Igitaramo cya Kigali Fashion Week n’icya Collective RW biri guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Fashion week of the year’. Inzu y’imideli ya House of Tayo iri guhatana mu cyiciro cya ‘Male fashion designer of the year’. Iki kiciro bagihuriyemo n’indi nzu y’imideli ya Moshions. Mu kindi kiciro cya ‘female fashion designer of the year’ harimo abitwa Uzi Collection na Haute Baso naho uwitwa Lee Charm we ari guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘most stylish male social media icon of the year’ mu gihe uwitwa Joxy Parker n’undi witwa Umuhoza Liliane bombi bari guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘female stylish female social media icon of the year’. Ibi bihembo kandi bigaragaramo uwitwa Sacha Kaate na Shaddy Boo bombi bari guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘female fashionist of the year’. Umuhanzi Meddy we ari guhatana mu kiciro cya ‘Most stylish male artiste of the year’ Charly na Nina ndetse na Butera Knowless barahatana mu kiciro cya ‘most stylish female artiste of the year’ . Umunyamideri Kabano Franco arahatana mu kiciro cya ‘fashion entrepreneur of the year’, Fred Lyon arahatana mu kiciro cya ‘male fashionista of the year’ naho uwitwa Ssanduina we ahatanye mu kiciro cya ‘female model of the year’. Amwe mu mafoto y’abanyarwanda bari guhatanira ibi bihembo: Robert KAYIHURA

title: 2019 umwaka wa Fashion mu Rwanda…Abakomeye barimbye Imideri y’Abanyarwanda
article_text:
2019 umwaka wa Fashion mu Rwanda…Abakomeye barimbye Imideri y’Abanyarwanda

 2019, umwaka waranzwe n’iterambere ry’abari mu ruganda rw’imideri mu Rwanda  cyane inzu z’imideri kuko zagurishije cyane ndetse n’ibyo bakora bimenyekana ku rwego mpuzamahanga kuruta mu myaka yabanje. Bamwe mu bayobozi n’ibyamamare bikomeye ku Isi barimbye imideri yakozwe n’abanyarwanda. Iri terambere ryagaragajwe n’izi nzu z’imideri ahanini byagizwemo uruhare na Politike yo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda izwi nka ‘Made in Rwanda’ mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo na Leta bashishikarijwe kurimba ibikorerwa mu Rwanda. Ubu muri za Minisiteri n’ibigo bya Leta hari amabwiriza asaba abakozi kwambara imyambaro ikorerwa mu Rwanda nibura rimwe mu cyumweru. Ibyamamare bitandukanye ku Isi byasuye u Rwanda bagaragaje ikirezi batewe no kurimba imyambaro yakozwe n’Abana b’Abanyarwanda. Harimo nk’icyamamare Ne-Yo warimbye umukenyero wakozwe n’inzu y’imideri izwi nka Uzi. Abayobozi bakomeye nka Perezida Kagame Paul na Madamu Jeannette Kagame bagaragaye mu bikorwa bitandukanye bambaye imyenda yakozwe n’inzu y’imideri yo mu Rwanda. Inzu 5 z’imideri zigaragaje muri 2019 n’abo zambitse   Moshions Iyi ni inzu y’imideri yashinjwe n’uwitwa Moses Turahirwa. Umwaka ushize yagaragaje iterambere ndetse n’imideri bakora yarambawe cyane. Iriya mideri yakozwe na Moshions yambawe n’abantu batandukanye barimo  abo mu muryango wa Nyakubahwa Kagame Paul ndetse na we ubwe akaba yarahisemo kurimba iriya mideri ubwo yavugaga ijambo risoza umwaka wa 2019. Madamu Jennette Kagame na we yambaye imideri y’iyi nzu by’umwihariko mu nama ya ICASA yayambaye iminsi ibiri yikurikiranya. Imideri ya Moshions kandi yambawe n’ikibumbano gifite amateka akomeye mu Bubiligi kizwi nka manneken pis ndetse ayambika n’igisamuntu cyangwa robot yenda gukora nk’abantu izwi cyane ku isi ikaba ifite n’ubwenegihugu bwa Arabie Saoudite yitwa Sophia yari yitabiriye Transform Africa Summit  2019.   Uzuri K&Y  Iyi nzu y’imideri yashinzwe mu 2013 n’abakobwa babiri barimo uwitwa Kevine na Ysolde bombi bakaba bakora inkweto bifashije ibikoresho bitandukanye birimo n’amapine y’imodoka. Umwaka ushize iriya nzu ikora inkweto yarigaragaje cyane by’umwihariko inkweto bakora zashimwe n’abatundukanye barimo na Perezida Kagame Paul mu gikorwa cya ‘Youth Entrepreneurship Town Hall’   Uzi Collections  Iyi nzu y’imideri yashinzwe na Remera Nathalie hamwe na Rwema Laurene mu 2015 bombi basanzwe bakora imideri itandukanye ariko cyane iyiganjemo ikozwe mu bitenge. Umwaka ushize bambitse abantu batandukanye by’umwihariko batoranywa kuba ari bo bahanzi b’imideri bambika abari bitabiriye igikorwa cyo kwita izina abana b’ingagi cyari kibaye ku nshuro ya 15. Muri kiriya gikorwa, umuhanzi w’ikirangirire w’Umunyamerika, Ne-Yo yambaye imyenda yakozwe n’iyi nzu.   Tanga Designs  Iyi ni inzu y’imideri yashinzwe n’uwitwa Niyitanga Olivier by’umwihariko akaba akora imideri yiganjemo iyambarwa n’abakoze ubukwe. Umwaka ushize bambitse umubare munini w’abakobwa mu birori by’ubukwe bw’abo. Undi mwihariko w’iyi nzu y’imideri ni uko imideri myinshi bakora ahanini bayirimbisha imitako yunganira umuderi bakoresheje intoki.   Ktsobe Iyi nzu yashinzwe n’uwitwa Sarah Legrand, bakora ibikoresho byose by’imirimbo y’abagore n’abagabo birimo amaherena, inigi zo mu ijosi, impeta n’ibindi. Umwaka ushize imirimbo yabo yambawe n’abantu batundukanye barimo n’ibyamamare binyuranye ku isonga hari uwitwa umuhanzi Liliane Mbabazi uri mubakomeye muri Uganda na Jidenna uheruka gutaramira mu Rwanda. Robert KAYIHURA

title: RUSIZI: Abamotari bo muri COMOGIRU nta bufasha na buke Koperative
article_text:
RUSIZI: Abamotari bo muri COMOGIRU nta bufasha na buke Koperative

 Abanyamuryango ba Koperative COMOGIRU y’abamotari muri iki gihe batari gukora, bavuga ko kuva Coronavirus yakwaduka mu Rwanda imirimo imwe n’imwe igahagarara n’uwabo urimo, ntabufasha babonye buturutse muri Koperative yabo kandi bayitangamo imisanzu.             Abamotari ntibaremererwa gutwara abagenzi kandi ni wo mwuga bakuragamo amafaranga yo kubatunga, abo muri COMOGIRU bavuga ko ubwo Leta yafataga ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwizwa rya Coronavirus, bumvaga izindi Koperative ziha ubufasha abanyamuryango bazo. Umwe utashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa yagize ati “Iyi Koperative nyimazemo imyaka isaga icumi, buri kwezi ntanga Frw 5000, nibaza ngo amafaranga dutanga buri kwezi ajyahe?” Avuga ko nubwo bahagaritswe kubera Coronavirus, Koperative yo yakomeje kubara ariya mafaranga batanga ku kwezi ku buryo tariki 1 Kamena 2020 nibatangira gukora bazashyiraho abantu bo kujya kwishyuza. Yagize ati “Niyo wagenda ukamara imyaka n’imyaka imisanzu urayibazwa.” Abandi bamotari bavuga ko na bo Koperative yabo yabatereranye, bakavuga ko niba harimo abadatanga imisanzu bitabareba, ariko abayitanga bakwiye gufashwa. Umwe ati “Buri kwezi ntanga imisanzu, ntabwo nsiba na rimwe ndibaza igituma batatwibuka twebwe tuyitanga,  turasaba ko batubwira ikibazo gihari.”  Ku ruhande rw’ubuyobozi bwa Koperative, NKURUNZIZA Emmanuel uyiyobora avuga ko mu Ukuboza 2019 Koperative yatanze ubwasisi. Ati “Ibyago bya Coronavirus byatugwiririye nta bundi bwizigame bafite, dufite ideni rya Banki tugomba kwishyura,  nta nubwo bose batanga umisanzu 100/100.” Yavuze ko batabimye amafranga bayafite, ingarukaka za Coronavirus zibageraho ngo na we zimugeraho, yabasabye ko muri iki gihe bari mu rugo batekereza ibindi bazakora mu gihe bazaba bemerewe gukora byafasha buri wese akishimira kuba muri Koperative. Umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus yagaragaye mu Rwanda tariki 14 Werurwe 2020, bwa mbere ingamba zikomeye zahagaritse imirimo n’ingendo zasohowe n’Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe tariki 21 Werurwe ziza koroshya tariki 30 Mata 2020, ndetse imirimo imwe n’imwe yongera gusubukurwa tariki 4 Gicurasi 2020, ku Bamotari bo baracyari muri Guma mu Rugo kugeza tariki 1 Kamena 2020. MUHIRE Donatien

title: Rulindo: Abacururiza mu isoko rya Base basoreshejwe amezi ngo ntibayakozemo
article_text:
Rulindo: Abacururiza mu isoko rya Base basoreshejwe amezi ngo ntibayakozemo

 Abacuruzi bo mu isoko rya Base bavuga ko batewe impungenge n’umusoro w’ukwezi kwa 3 n’ukwa 4 baciwe, bakavuga ko muri ayo mezi batakoze, barasaba ko basonerwa bagatangira kubarirwa bahereye igihe ingamba za Guma mu Rugo zoroherejwe bakemererwa gucuruza. Mu gihe cy’amezi agera kuri abiri mbere y’uko horoshywa gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo, ibikorwa byinshi by’ubucuruzi byarahagaze; ariko abacuruzi ngo bakomeje kubarirwa umusoro ndetse n’amande y’ubukererwe kandi batarakoraga. Abacururiza mu isoko rya Base basaba ko basonerwa umusoro w’ariya mezi batakoze ndetse n’amande y’ubukererwe baciwe. Murwanashyaka Theogene umucuruzi muri iri soko, ati “Nyuma y’aho ibikorwa byacu bikomorewe twagiye kumenyekanisha umusoro dusanga hari amafaranga dusabwa y’ukwezi kwa 3 n’ukwa 4; ikirenzeho ni uko twasanze hariyongereyeho n’ibihano kubera ubukererwe. Iki ni ikibazo kuba twararyaga tudakora, hanyuma tukanisanga tugomba kwishyura amafaranga twishyuraga ari uko twakoze.” Iyandokoye Gilbert ukomoka mu Karere ka Burera, na we acururiza mu isoko rya Base, avuga ko iki kibazo bakigejeje ku mukozi w’Umurenge ushinzwe imisoro n’amahoro ariko ntiyagira igisubizo abaha, ngo banongeye kumuhamagara ntiyabitaba. Bakaba basaba ubuvugizi kugira ngo iki kibazo gikemuke kuko bakibara nk’igihombo. Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Base, Mwumvinezayimana Fiacre avuga ko iki kibazo bakigejejweho kandi ko hari intambwe bateye mu kugikorera ubuvugizi. Yagize ati “Iki kibazo twakigejejweho, gusa nanone Gitifu ntabwo yakwizeza abaturage ko azabakuriraho umusoro. Icyo tuzakora ni ugukomeza kubavugira kuko iki ni ikibazo kigaragara.” Akomeza avuga ko Akarere kabasabye gutanga urutonde rw’abatarakoze muri biriya bihe kuko nk’abacuruzaga ibyo kurya ntibarimo. Ati “Urwo rutonde twararukoze, igisigaye ni ugutegereza umwanzuro w’inzego zibishinzwe kandi turizera ko hazaboneka igisubizo kiza.” Ku rundi ruhande, aba baturage bashimira ubuyobozi ko bwabashyiriyeho Radio yumvikanira muri iyi (Centre) ya Base, iyi radio ikaba inyuzwaho ubutumwa bwo kwirinda no kurwanya ikwirakwizwa rya Covid-19, ndetse ikanatangaza aho ibicuruzwa biherereye. Iri soko ryagabanijwemo ibice bibiri kugira ngo hubahirizwe intera hagati y’umucuruzi n’undi. Thierry NDIKUMWENAYO

title: Rusizi: Abahinga igishanga cya Cyunyu bacibwa amafaranga y’ubukode atagira ‘inyemezabwishyu’
article_text:
Rusizi: Abahinga igishanga cya Cyunyu bacibwa amafaranga y’ubukode atagira ‘inyemezabwishyu’

 Abahinzi mu gishanga cya Cyunyu mu Karere ka Rusizi bishyura amafaranga y’ubukode bw’imirima bavuga ko bakwa menshi kandi bakayishyura uwitwa BAHENDA batazi kuko ahagarariwe n’uwitwa ‘Gerant’, ngo babwirwa ko baba muri Koperative kandi bo bemeza ko batayizi, amafaranga batanga ntibajya bahabwa inyemezabwishyu.   UGIRIBAMBE Jeanette umwe mu bahinzi yagize ati “Kera hano hakitwa Cyangugu, hari umugabo wari muri Njyanama y’Umujyi wa Cyangugu yasabye ko bamuha igishanga akakigira urwuri, nyuma hasohotse itegeko ryo gukura inzuri mu bishanga nibwo baduhamagaye abashaka kwatisha turahinga.” Uyu avuga ko amaze imyaka ine ahinga muri kiriya gishanga, ngo yatangiye yishyura Frw 8000 ku buso bungana na Are imwe (metero 10 x metero 10), ubu yishyura amafaranga 15000 kuri buriya buso akayatanga ku mwaka, ariko avuga ko ari umurengera. Abahinzi bavuga ko iyo bishyuye badahabwa inyemezabwishyu kandi ko batishyura amafaranga angana. MATESO Felicien na we ni umwe muri abo bahinzi yagize ati “Iki gishanga hano duhinga bahitirira Bahenda, iyo akihaguha wishyura make kubera ko haba hameze nabi, wamara kuhatunganya akagenda yongera amafaranga. Kuri Are imwe natangiye nishyura Frw 8000, yabonye hamaze gutungana yongeza ibiciro ahantu umuntu yishyuraga Frw 10000 harazamutse hagera ku Frw 30,000.” Uyu avuga ko uwitwa BAHENDA byitwa ko igishanga ari ike atamuzi, ngo akoresha uwo bita Gerant (niko bamwita), iyo ngo bamubajije inyemezabwishyu ngo ahita ashaka uko umuhinzi uyibajije yirukanwa mu gishanga. Umwaka ushize mu kwezi kwa gatatu babajije ushinzwe Amakoperative na Agronome bababwira ko bagiye kugikurikirana ikibazo cyabo. Abahinzi bahinga hariya bagera kuri 80 bifuza ko aho kwishyura amafaranga umuntu batazi na koperative itazwi, bafashwa kugira Koperative izwi bakishyura amafaranga bazi uwo bayahaye. Ushinzwe Amakoperative mu Karere ka Rusizi, NSENGIYUMVA Emmanuel avuga ko iyo Koperative batayizi kimwe na BAHENDA bivugwa ko ari nyiri igishanga cya Cyunyu. Yagize ati “Koperative BAHENDA ntayo nzi mu makoperative dufite.” Umuseke waje kumenya ko uhagariye Rwiyemezamirimo BAHENDA, ari uwitwa NGENDAHAYO Valens (Gerant), avuga ko muri kiriya Gishanga nta Koperative ibamo. Yagize ati “Ntabwo ari Ishyirahamwe cyangwa Koperative, Umuhinzi araza tukavugana niba azajya aduha imibyizi y’abahinzi cyangwa tukumvikana ko tuzajya tugabana ibyeze, ntanyemezabwishyu kubera ko hakora ubwumvikane nta yandi mafaranga y’ikirenga.” MUHIRE Donatien

title: Rusizi: Abahinzi basaba gukemura ikibazo k’imyuzure baterwa n’umugezi wa Cyunyu
article_text:
Rusizi: Abahinzi basaba gukemura ikibazo k’imyuzure baterwa n’umugezi wa Cyunyu

 Abahinzi bibumbiye muri Kopetative ebyiri z’abahinzi KOIGA na COVELEMENT Amizero mu Mirenge ya Gihundwe na Kamembe bavuga ko amazi menshi atembera mihanda yiroha mu mugezi wa Cyunyu wakuzura agasubira mu mirima akabangiriza. Bariya bahinzi bahinga igishanga cya Gacamahembe bavuga ko amazi aturuka mu mihanda yiroha mu mugezi wa Cyunyu yamara kuzura igishanga akangiza ibyo bahinze umusaruro bari biteze ukagabanuka. Ntirabampa Ismael Perezida wa Coperative KOAIGA agira ati “Kubera amazi aturuka mu mihanda  yirunda  mu mugezi wa cyunyu ukuzura amazi ntatembe,  turasaba ubuyobozi bw’Akarere kudufasha bakadukorera ikiraro kuko ingufu zacu zabaye nke”.  Mukarugina Marianne na we ayobora COVELEMENT AMIZERO agira ati “Ubushobozi bwo gucira imiferege ariya mazi bwararangiye, twagiye tugerageza ariko biratunaniye. Ubuyobozi budufashe,  batwubakire ikiraro cya Cyunyu amazi ajye atemba.” Avuga ko igihe kuzurirwa kw’igishanga byaba bihagaze umusaruro wabo waba mwinshi. Cooperative KOIGA ifite abanyamuryango 48 bahinga Ha 8,  COVELEMENT igizwe n’abanyamuryango 42 bahinga Ha 6. Muri izi Hegitari zose harimo ebyiri n’igice badahinga kubera amazi. Ubuyobozi bw’Akarere ka Rusizi buvuga ko abo bahinzi basabwa kwandika bagaragaza uko ikibazo giteye n’ibikenewe. NSENGIYUMVA Emmanuel ni Umukozi w’akarere  ushinzwe Amakoperative yagize ati “Inama nabaha ni uko bakwandikira Akarere icyo kibazo kigasuzumwa.”  MUHIRE Donatien

title: Iburasirazuba: Abacuruzi bahombye, PSF igiye kubahuza n’ibigo by’imari ngo bibazahure
article_text:
Iburasirazuba: Abacuruzi bahombye, PSF igiye kubahuza n’ibigo by’imari ngo bibazahure

 Abacuruzi bo mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba bavuga ko bahuye n’igihombo kubere icyorezo cya COVID-19, Urugaga rw’Abikorera (PSF) muri iriya Ntara rugiye kubahuza n’ibigo by’imari kugira ngo bibafashe kuzahura ubucuruzi bwabo. Bamwe mu bacuruzi bo mu ntara y’Iburasiruzuba bagizweho ingaruka n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 bavuga ko bakwiye gufashwa kugira ngo ubucuruzi bwabo busubire ku murongo. Bavuga ko mu bihe bya Guma mu rugo, amafaranga yose bari bafite bayakoresheje mu mibereho kandi bakarya ntacyo binjije ndetse ko n’ubu bafunguriwe batari kubona abakiliya nk’uko bisanzwe. Umwe muri aba bacuruzi utifuje ko atangazwa, avuga ko amafaranga ari kunguka muri ibi bihe ari 1/3 cy’ayo yungukaga mu bihe bisanzwe. Ati “Nacuruzaga ibihumbi ijana [100 000 Frw] ku munsi none ubu no kubona mirongo itatu [30 000Frw] ntibyoroshye.” Undi ucuruza imbuto mu karere ka Rwamagana yabwiye Umuseke ko nta baguzi ari kubona muri ibi bohe none ibicuruzwa bye biri kwangirika. Ati “Mu byo ncuruza harimo nk’imbuto zangirika byoroshye kandi abaguzi ari bacye hakiyongeraho uburyo bwo kujya kurangura buhenze ugereranyije na mbere.” Umuyobozi w’urwego rw’abikorera mu Ntara y’i Burasirazuba [PSF], Ndungutse Jean Bosco avuga  ko bagiye gukora ubuvugizi kuri za banki n’ibigo by’imari kugira ngo bifashe bariya bacuruzi bahuye n’igihombo. Ati “Ikintu tugiye gukora ni ukubasubizamo imbaraga bakumva ko nubwo habayeho iki cyorezo bitagomba kubahagarikira akazi, ikindi tugomba gukora ni ukubwira amabanki, ibigo by’imari kubihanganira ahubwo bakaba babaguriza amafaranga y’igishoro bakongera gukora.”  Ubuyobozi bw’urwego rw’abikorera mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba buvuga ko buzakomeza gufasha abahakorera ubucuruzi gukorera hamwe kuko ari byo byabagoboka mu gihe habayeho ibihe bidasanzwe nk’ibi bikoma mu nkokora ubucuruzi bwabo. Camarade UWIZEYE
UMUSEKE.RW

title: Rusizi: Imirimo yongeye gukorwa ariko ngo ‘Amadolari’ ava hakurya ntarambuka
article_text:
Rusizi: Imirimo yongeye gukorwa ariko ngo ‘Amadolari’ ava hakurya ntarambuka

 Abakorera mu Mujyi wa Rusizi bakora imirimo imaze ukwezi n’igice idakora kubera ingamba Leta yafashe mu rwego rwo kwirinda Coronavirus, bavuga ko bishimiye kuba bongeye gusubira gukora ko nubwo bitahita bigenda neza ngo babone abakiliya nk’uko byari bisanzwe, ngo imipaka izageraho ifungure abakiliya benshi baturuka muri RD.Congo bongere bagaruke. Bemeza ko gufungura ari intambwe ikomeye ko hari ubwo hazaterwa n’indi imipaka igafungurwa. Kamuzinzi Godefroid umwe mu bafite hotel mu Mugi wa Rusizi yagize ati “Ni intambwe nziza yatewe, byadushimishije, nubwo bigaraga ko akazi katafungutse kose, ariko iyi ntambwe twayishimye.” Yavuze ko gufungura hotel zabo bidahita bibaha inyungu kubera ko imipaka ifunze, ariko ngo barabasha gukora  isuku bategereze igihe bizafungurirwa byose. Undi ucuruza imyenda yavuze ko banyuzwe n’uko basubiye gucuruza. Yagize ati “Iki kemezo twacyakiriye neza, gutinda mu rugo byaribitangiye kumera nabi ariko kuva dusubiye gukora, ikizere kirahari ko bizagenda neza.” RUGAMBA Theophille uhagarariye Abikorera (PSF) mu Karere ka Rusizi mu butumwa yatanze yavuze ko abikorera badakwiriye kwiheba ko nta mafaranga ariho. Yagize ati “Birumvikana ingaruka za Coronavirus zigomba kugira ingaruka ku bikorera, ariko kuba hatewe intambwe hagafungurwa ibikorwa bimwe, buhoro buhoro bizagenda neza, bakomeze ingamba zo gukomeza kwirinda Covid-19”.   Aka karere kari ku mupaka uhuza u Rwanda na RD.Congo abaza kuhahahira abenshi baturuka hakurya bazanye amadolari. MUHIRE Donatien
UMUSEKE.RW/Rusizi

title: Bugesera: IKAWA y’ibitumbwe irafasha abahinzi guhangana na Covid-19 badasabirije
article_text:
Bugesera: IKAWA y’ibitumbwe irafasha abahinzi guhangana na Covid-19 badasabirije

 Abahinzi bo mu Murenge wa Juru bavuga ko kugurisha ikawa y’ibitumbwe biboroheye muri ibi bihe by’ikumira ry’ubwandu bushya bw’icyorezo cya Covid-19, kuko umusaruro bakuramo ubafasha kubona amafaranga bigatuma bahangana n’ibihe bikomeye byatewe n’icyorezo cya coronavirus kibasiye Isi. Aba bahinzi bemeza ko kugeza nta kibazo kiragaragara kijyanye n’imibereho gishamikiye ku kuba bimwe mu bikorwa byarahagaze, ngo ibi bihe byahuriranye n’uko ikawa bahinze ziri mu mwero wazo. Mberimana Leonard wo mu Mudugudu wa Kinihira mu Kagari ka Rwinume, ni umwe mu bahinzi ba kawa bibumbiye muri Cooperative COTEMUKA. Avuga ko muri iyi minsi imirimo y’ubuhinzi yakomeje nk’ibisanzwe, bityo ko bo bari kubona amafaranga yo gukemura ibindi bibazo by’ibanze ku muturage, mu mibereho ye ya buri munsi bayakuye mu musaruro wa kawa. Kugurisha ikawa bikorwa hubahirizwa amabwiriza agamije gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus itera Covid-19. Agira ati “Umusaruro wa kawa wabonetse, abahinzi bawukusanyiriza hamwe bakawugeza kuri koperative aho abashoramari bawusanga bakawujyana ku ruganda.” Yadutangarije ko bishimira kuyigurisha ari igitumbwe kuko amafaranga babona abafasha guhaha ibindi biribwa bitunga Umuryango, kandi bigabanyiriza umuhinzi imvune zo ‘guhera ikawa’. Umuyobozi w’iyi Koperative y’abahinzi ba Kawa yitwa COTEMUKA, ikorera mu kagari ka Rwinume, Nzigira Pascal, yemeza ko umusaruro wa kawa uri kugoboka abaturage muri rusange, ahanini bigaturuka ku kuba nta kindi gihingwa bafite kigeze igihe k’isarura. Ati “Bitewe n’uko nta wundi musaruro w’ubuhinzi dufite muri aya mezi, mu kugurisha ikawa y’ibitumbwe ni ho hantu abahinzi turi gukura amafaranga yo guhahira ingo zacu, bigatuma n’abandi bayabonaho kuko amafaranga iyo yasohotse uyahawe si we agumaho wenyine.” Agoronome ushinzwe gukurikirana ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi mu Murenge wa Juru, Nzabonitegeka Ildephonse, avuga ko ubuyobozi buri gukurikirana ibikorwa by’abahinzi mu gihe basarura KAWA, bubafasha kugurisha umusaruro wabo mu buryo bworoshye kandi ku giciro cyagenwe, ndetse no kubakurikirana ngo na nyuma ya Covid-19 batazicwa n’inzara. Ati “Abahinzi muri rusange by’umwihariko abafite Kawa nta kibazo k’imibereho bafite kandi biri gutanga akazi no ku bandi batayihinze bigatuma na bo babona amafaranga. Tubafasha kubona aho bagurishiriza umusaruro wabo kugira ngo udapfa ubusa, tukanabafasha kwita ku bindi bihingwa bitarageza igihe cyo gusarurwa.” Kuva mu mpera z’Ukwezi kwa gatatu kugeza ubu uyu mwaka, ni bwo ibikorwa byo gusarura kawa y’ibitumbwe byatangiye ku bahinzi bo mu Murenge wa Juru. Kugeza ubu hamaze gusarurwa igera kuri toni 26,4 abahinzi bakaba bagurisha ikiro kimwe ku giciro cyemejwe kingana na 216frw/kg, kandi ibikorwa byo gusarura birakomeje. Ubu umusaruro wa kawa y’ibitumbwe ugurishirizwa kuri site ebyiri, imwe iherereye ahitwa mu Gatesanya mu Kagari ka Juru nestse n’indi y’ahitwa mu Kabagore mu Kagari ka Rwinume, aho umusaruro uvanwa ukajya gutunganirizwa ku ruganda rwa RTC -Shyara. Dieudonne NSHIMIYIMANA

title: Gicumbi: Miliyoni 35Frw bemerewe na MINALOC amaze ukwezi ku Murenge
article_text:
Gicumbi: Miliyoni 35Frw bemerewe na MINALOC amaze ukwezi ku Murenge

 Abagera ku 1325 baturuka mu Tugari 9 tugize Umurenge wa Byumba bavuga ko basabwe gukora imishinga igamije kubateza imbere, gusa bamwe muri bo bavuga ko imishinga yabo bayikoze, inemezwa n’itsinda ryashyizweho n’Umurenge rishinzwe gukurikirana uburyo yateguwe. Buri muturage yemerewe kugurizwa amafaranga ibihumbi 100 (Frw), bavuga ko bifashishije inzobere zikabakorera inyigo ituma imishinga bakoze itazahomba. Ngo bababwira ko mbere yo kubaha ariya mafaranga hazakurikiraho amahugurwa atuma imishinga yabo idahomba. Abaturage bashima Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu yatekereje ku bushobozi bafite, dore ko ari abo mu kiciro cya mbere n’ icya kabiri cy’Ubudehe, ikabaha inguzanyo ya Frw 100, 000 bazungukira Frw 2000 mu myaka ibiri. Bavuga ko ayo mafaranga yabo yoherejwe akagera ku Murenge ndetse ahamaze ukwezi ariko bakaba batarayahabwa. Abagera kuri 293 imishinga yabo yaremewe, batuye mu Tugari dutanu, ari two: Nyarutarama, Gacurabwenge, Gisuna, Nyamabuye na Kivugiza, bavuga ko babonye ariya mafaranga bayabyaza umusaruro. Umwe muri bo ati: ”Muri iyi minsi guca inshuro na byo byarahagaze, abenshi muri twe twakoze imishinga y’ubworozi, no gucuruza ubuconsho, ese ko abahabwa inkunga ya VUP batekerejweho, kandi ko amafaranga yabo bayahembwa kuki twe batareka tugacuruza ibiribwa, ntitwicwe n’inzara?” Ubuyobozi buvuga ko amafaranga yageze ku Murenge wa Byumba, gusa ko bagomba gutegereza iminsi bazahererwaho uburenganzira bwo gukora, kubera ingamba zo gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus bityo bakazayaha abo yagenewe. Gakwerere Kazungu ashinzwe ishoramari n’iterambere ry’umurimo mu Murenge wa Byumba (BDA) avuga ko  amafaranga yageze kuri konti y’Umurenge wa Byumba tariki 10 Werurwe 2020. Igihe cyagenwe cyo kuba abantu bagumye mu ngo mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus ni tariki 19 Mata 2020, ngo hafashwe ingamba zo gukomeza gukora, bazahita bahugura abakoze imishinga babone kubaha amafaranga bagenewe. Ayo mahugurwa ngo muri iki gihe hariho ziriya ngamba ntashobora gukorwa kuko guhuriza hamwe abantu benshi ntibyemewe. Ati: ”Tumaze gukurikirana imishinga y’abagera kuri 293 bo mu Tugari dutanu, hasigaye utugari 4 tuzajonjora muri uku kwezi, hazakurikireho amahugurwa y’uko bakoresha imishinga, iminsi yateganyijwe gukumira coronavirus niramuka yongerewe, tuzagisha inama turebe ikindi cyakorwa.” Umunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa w’ umurenge wa Byumba Nshimiyimana Valens akurira inzira ku murima abaturage bavuga ko ariya mafaranga yabafasha kwikenura muri iki gihe, ko atari ayo kurya. EVENCE NGIRABATWARE
UMUSEKE.RW/GICUMBI

title: 2019-Q4: Ibiciro by’ibiribwa byazamutseho 20%
article_text:
2019-Q4: Ibiciro by’ibiribwa byazamutseho 20%

 Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda (BNR) iratangaza ko mu gihembwe cya kane cy’umwaka wa 2019 izamuka ry’ibiciro ku masoko ryavuye kuri 2,4% rikagera kuri 6% (ni ukuvuga ko izamuka ryiyongeraho 3,6%). BNR ivuga ko iri zamuka rikabije ryatewe n’izamuka ry’ibiciro ry’ibiribwa ryazamutseho 20%. Ibi bikubiye mu myanzuro y’inama y’akanama ka Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda gashinzwe ukutajegajega kw’urwego rw’imari y’igihugu yateranye ejo hashize. Guverineri wa Banki Nkuru y’u Rwanda, John Rwangombwa avuga ko icyagaragaye muri iyi nama ari uko umuvuduko w’izamuka ry’ibiciro mu gihembwe cya kane cya kane (4) cya 2019 warushijeho kuzamuka ugera kuri 6% uvuye kuri 2,4% wari wazamutseho mu gihembwe cya gatatu (3). Avuga ko ibi byatewe n’izamuka ry’ibiciro ry’ibiribwa ryakabije kuzamuka muri kiriya gihembwe cyaranzwe n’ibura ry’ibiribwa ku masoko. Ati “Byatewe ahanini n’umusaruro utaragenze neza mu gihembwe cya kane kubera imvura yaje itinze, iba nyinshyi, ari ukuza itinze no kuza ikaba nyinshi byagize ingaruka ku bihingwa bimwe na bimwe bijya ku masoko.” Avuga na none iri hinduka rikomeye ryatewe no kuba mu gihembwe cya kane cya 2018 cyo cyari cyaranzwe no kurumbuka kw’imyaka bigatuma n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa bimanuka. Ati “Iyo rero uhereye hasi ikintu icyo ari cyo cyose cyakwiyongeraho kigaragaza ko byazamutse cyane.” John Rwangombwa avuga ko iteganya rya BNR rigaragaza ko izamuka ry’ibiciro ku masoko rizaguma mu mpuzandengo isa nk’iri hejuru ijya kuba hejuru gato ya 5% kuko n’ubundi ibiribwa bikomeje kubura ku masoko. Ati “Kuko ibipimo byari hasi cyane mu gice cya mbere cy’umwaka wa 2019  ariko na none n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa turabona bizakomeza kuba biri hejuru gato.” Avuga ko iri zamuka ry’Ibiciro ku masoko rya 6% ridakanganye ariko ko ryatumye BNR ifata ikemezo cyo “kudahindura igipimo cy’urwunguko rwa Banki nkuru y’igihugu kugira ngo dukomeze gushyigikira uko amabanki atanga imyenda ku bikorera.” Guverineri wa BNR avuga ko iyi Banki n’ubundi yari yagumushijeho urwunguko rwayo kuri 5% kandi “ko byatanze umusaruro ku myenda yatanzwe ku bikorera bigatuma imyenda yatanzwe n’amabanki yazamutseho 20%.”   Ibitumizwa hanze byazamutseho 10,6% BNR kandi ivuga ko muri kiriya gihembwe cya kane cya 2019, ibitumizwa hanze byazamutseho 10,6% bitewe n’ibikoresho by’inganda n’ibiri gukoreshwa mu kubaka ikibuga k’indege ndetse n’izindi nyubako ndetse n’ibiri gushorwamo imari biri gutumizwa mu mahanga. Guverineri Rwangombwa avuga ko iki kinyuranyo cya 8% cyatumye ifaranga ry’u Rwanda rita agaciro ho 4,9% rigereranyijwe n’idolari rya America. Ati “Uyu mwaka na none ifaranga rishobora guta agaciro nka 4,7%. Ariko muri rusange iyo turebye uko ubukungu buhagaze ari izamuka ry’ibiciro uko rizaba rimeze ari uguta agaciro kw’ifaranga rya 4,7% iyi shusho itwereka ko ubukungu bw’u Rwanda buzaba buhagaze neza muri 2020.”   Ibyerekeye Imari muri 2019: Umutungo mbumbe wa za Banki zamutse kuri 12,5% Ku bijyanye n’imari, BNR ivuga ko mu mwaka wose wa 2019 umutungo mbumbe w’ibijyanye n’uru rwego wazamutse kuri 13,2% ukaba warabaye Miliyaridi 5 268 Frw. Imari shingiro ya za Banki yazamutse kuri 12,5% ugereranyije n’umwaka wa 2018 igera kuri Miliyaridi 3 476 mu gihe imari shingiro y’urwego rw’Ubwishingizi yazamutse kuri 13% ikagera kuri Miliyaridi 510. Naho mu rwego rw’Ibigo by’imari iciriritse (Microfinance), imari shingiro yarwo yazamutse kuri 14,7% kuko yageze kuri Miliyaridi 321 Frw mu gihe umutungo w’ubwizigamire bw’abageze mu zabukuru wazamutse kuri 15% kuko wageze kuri Miliyaridi 891 Frw. John Rwangombwa avuga ko ibi ari inkuru ishimishije ku bukungu bw’u Rwanda kuko inzego zose zibugize zikomeje kuzamuka ku buryo ntacyapfa kuzihungabanya Ati “Bifite amafaranga yakenerwa mu bintu ibyo ari byo byose kuko ni ibigo bikorera abandi bantu baza kubibitsamo cyangwa baza kwizigamamo.” BNR kandi igaragaza ko inguzanyo zitishyurwa na zo zikomeje kumanuka kuko zavuye kuri 7,6% mu mpera za 2017 zikagera kuri 6,4% muri 2018 mu gihe mu Ukuboza 2019 zageze kuri 4,9%. Martin NIYONKURU
UMUSEKE.RW

title: Ntabwo tuzi iherezo ry’ibi bihe bihinduka buri munsi - Madamu Jeannette Kagame
article_text:
Ntabwo tuzi iherezo ry’ibi bihe bihinduka buri munsi - Madamu Jeannette Kagame

 Uyu munsi, u Rwanda rwifatanyije n’Isi yose mu kwizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Imiryango ku nsanganyamstiko igira iti: ‘Twubake Umuryango ushoboye kandi Utekanye’. Madamu Jeannette Kagame yongeye gushimangira akamaro k’umuryango agaragaza ko mu bihe biteye urujijo, nk’icyorezo cya Koronavirusi u Rwanda n’Isi yose bihanganye na cyo, umuryango usigara ari isoko y’ingufu z’abawugize ku nsanganyamstiko igira iti: ‘Twubake Umuryango ushoboye kandi Utekanye’. Mu nyandiko ye yatangaje kuri uyu munsi, Madamu Jeannette Kagame yagize ati:” Icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyaduteye urujijo no guhangayika. Ntabwo tuzi iherezo ry’ibi bihe bihinduka buri munsi. Icyakora hari ikintu kimwe kidahinduka: akamaro k’umuryango n’inshingano za buri wese zo kurinda no kwita ku bawugize. Uyu munsi, ubwo twizihiza Umunsi Mpuzamahanga w’Umuryango, mfashe uyu mwanya kugira ngo nongere gushimangira inshingano dufite ku miryango yacu ndetse no ku muryango mugari, zo kubungabunga ubusugire n’ubuzima bw’abawugize. Iyo usubije amaso inyuma ukareba intambwe igihugu cyacu kimaze gutera mu guhashya iki cyorezo, ndetse no guhangana n’ingaruka zacyo ku buzima bwa buri muntu – by’umwihariko abababaye cyane muri twe – nta kindi umuntu yakora kitari ugushima ibirimo gukorwa kandi bizanakomeza. Iyi nzira Igihugu cyacu cyahisemo yo kurwanya iki cyorezo igomba kugendana n’inshingano buri wese afite yo kuyikomeza no kwiyumvisha iteka akamaro idufitiye. Tugomba kwita ku kintu cy’ingenzi kizatugeza ku ntsinzi: Kwitwararika (self-discipline). Urugamba rwo kurwanya Koronavirusi ntirurarangira, bityo rero ntidukwiye kwirara. Amahitamo njye nawe dukora buri munsi niyo yerekana uburyo igihugu cyacu kizasohoka muri ibi bihe bitoroshye. N’ubwo amabwiriza atangwa n’inzego z’ubuzima ari ingenzi, hari indi myifatire myiza ndetse n’ibikorwa byubaka umuryango muri rusange dushobora kwitoza, bikazadufasha no mu bihe biri imbere. Ubusabane no gushyira hamwe mu muryango: Mu Rwanda, gahunda ya “Guma mu rugo”, yatumye benshi dukorera mu rugo, ndetse n’amashuri azongera gufungura mu kwezi kwa Nzeri. Kumenya umwanya ugenera akazi n’izindi nshingano zo mu rugo, n’ubusanzwe ntabwo byoroha ariko bigoye kurushaho iyo bigomba gukorerwa ahantu hamwe. Ariko mureke turebe no ku nyungu zirimo, dutekereze uko ibi bihe byadufasha kongera gushyigikirana no gushyira hamwe nk’umuryango. Ndabashishikariza gutekereza kuri aya mahirwe dufite yo kongera ubusabane mu miryango yacu. Uyu mwanya twawukoresha mu gukina, kurera no kwigisha, gusangizanya inkuru zitandukanye – hagati y’abakuru n’abato. Ibi bizadusigira urwibutso rwiza rurema urukundo n’ubusabane, ndetse bizadufasha no kugabanya kwiheba no guhangayika bishobora guterwa n’ibi bihe. Ba umurinzi wa mugenzi wawe. Twese twiyemeze kurushaho kugira umutima utekereza ku bandi kandi ukamenya kwihanganirana. Umuti uwariwo wose twashakira iki cyorezo, uzagira akamaro bitewe n’ukwitwararika kwa buri wese, kwihangana ndetse n’umutima w’impuhwe tugaragariza abacu. Ibi bihe turimo, bidukomereye twese, biradusaba kwitoza kurangwa n’ ineza n’amahoro, kugira ngo imiryango yacu n’abo tugomba kwitaho bagire kandi babeho mu mutuzo. Guhoberana mu muco wacu ubundi ni uburyo twari dusanzwe dukoresha mu bihe bikomeye cyangwa se by’ubusabane. Muri ibi bihe ntabwo dushobora guhoberana nkuko dusanzwe tubimenyereye, ariko amarangamutima y’urukundo n’urugwiro abidutera turacyayafite, icyo dusabwa ni ukwiga kuyagaragariza abacu mu bundi buryo. Dushobora gukoresha ibikorwa by’ubugiraneza n’ibindi bibereka ko tubazirikana. Uwo utabashije gusura muvugishe kuri telephone cyangwa umwoherereze ubutumwa. Kuko udashobora gutumira abawe cyangwa inshuti iwawe ngo musangire, ushobora gutegura ifunguro ryiza ukariboherereza iwabo mu rugo. Ni ngombwa ko abagize umuryango bafatanya imirimo yose yo mu rugo. Ntabwo bikwiye ko umubyeyi w’umugore ariwe uharirwa igice kinini cy’imirimo yo mu rugo. Tuzirikane cyane imiryango irimo umubyeyi umwe, haba mu miryango yacu cyangwa aho dutuye. Aba babyeyi bakeneye kwitabwaho by’umwihariko. Muri iki gihe twibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ndongera kandi gusaba Abanyarwanda gukomeza kwita ku barokotse Jenoside. Tube maso dukurikirane cyane ahashobora kugaragara ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina cyangwa ubusumbane ubwo ari bwo bwose. Ntibikwiye ko umuntu aburira amahoro n’umutekano mu muryango we. Niba wahuye n’iki kibazo cyangwa hari uwo uzi wahohotewe, ihutire gusaba ubufasha n’inama ku biro bikwegereye bya Isange One Stop Centre, cyangwa uhamagare ku murongo utishyurwa 112. Gira neza, wikomereze: Uburyo bwiza bwo gusabana nk’umuryango ni ugufasha abandi. Nk’uko dukunze kubivuga mu muco wacu «Umuturanyi akurutira umuvandimwe uri kure » Ushobora gufasha abaturanyi bari mu zabukuru bibana, imiryango uzi yatakaje imirimo yayitungaga cyangwa se ugafasha imiryango ifite abana bafite ubumuga. Kora igishoboka cyose kugirango ufashe abavandimwe n’abaturanyi bawe bageze mu zabukuru, ntibavunwe no kujya kwishakashakira iby’ibanze, dore ko ari nabo bazahazwa cyane n’iki cyorezo. Teganyiriza ahazaza. Mu gihe tukiri mu rugo, tugomba kongera imbaraga mu kwihugura no kwiga kugeza igihe amashuri azongera gufungura mu kwezi kwa Nzeri. Rinda abana bawe kudindira, ugena umwanya muhuriyeho wo gusoma. Ushobora guha abana bawe umukoro wo gutekereza no kwiyandikira inkuru zabo no gukina imikino ibigisha imibare, iboneka kuri murandasi, cyangwa se bakoresheje amakayi yabo. Mubyaze umusaruro ubumenyi buri kuri radio, televisiyo na murandasi, muhereye ku masomo yateguwe n’ikigo cy’uburezi (REB) http://elearning.reb.rw, mu rwego rwo gukomeza gukarishya ubwenge bw’abana. Muzirikane kandi no gushaka umwanya wa buri munsi wo gukora imyitozo ngororamubiri. Rubyiruko namwe abakiri bato, ndabasaba gukoresha ubumenyi mufite mwegeranya kandi mutanga amakuru y’ukuri ku ndwara ya Covid-19 n’uburyo yakwirindwa kugira ngo mubashe kurinda imiryango yanyu n’abo mubana. Iki ni igihe cyo gufata inshingano nshya. Ibi bihe turimo ntibikwiye kuduhungabanya.  Nidukomeza kwitwararika mu bikorwa byacu byose, tukazirikana guhana intera hagati y’umuntu n’undi, tugakaraba intoki ndetse tukambara udupfukamunwa uko bikwiye;  Tugakomeza kandi guharanira kubaka umuryango utekanye ndetse n’umuryango mugari nyarwanda utamenerwamo muri iki gihe kitoroshye; Nizeye ntashidikanya ko igihugu cyacu kizasohoka muri ibi bihe cyemye kandi gikomeye kurusha mbere. Madamu Jeannette Kagame

title: COVID-19: Perezida Magufuri na Nkurunziza babuze mu nama yahuzaga Abaperezida ba EAC
article_text:
COVID-19: Perezida Magufuri na Nkurunziza babuze mu nama yahuzaga Abaperezida ba EAC

 Abaperezida 4 bagize EAC  kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki ya 12 Gicurasi 2020, bahuriye  mu nama yabaye mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga  biga ku cyorezo cya COVID 19   n’ingamba  zo kukirwanya.  Perezida Pombe  Magufuri wa Tanzaniya na Petero  Nkurunziza  w’uburundi uhangayikishijwe n’amatora  mu gihugu cye nti bitabiriye iy’Inama , gusa  Perezida Museveni we avuga ko gukoresha amatora muri k’igihe cya coronavirus yugarije Isi byaba  ari ubusazi    .   Iy’inama yitabiriwe na  Paul Kagame ,  Perezida Kaguta Museveni,  Perezida  Kenyatta na   Perezida  Salva Kiir .  Perezida Kagame yagaragaje icyuho kikiri mu mikoranire y’ibihugu bigize Umuryango mu EAC  mu kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19 . Perezida w’ u Rwanda yagize ati: “Muri EAC, haracyakenewe uburyo bwo kurwanya icyorezo  tukemera no gufata inshingano ziremereye muri ibi bihe.  Ntidukwiye gukora uko dushoboye mu bihugu byacu gusa, ahubwo dukeneye no guhanahana amakuru, tukumvikana n’uburyo ubucuruzi bwakorwamo mu Karere.” Perezida Museveni, Kenyatta na Kiir bashimiye Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda Paul Kagame ku buryo yateguye akanayobora neza inama yabaye mu mutuzo, basaba ko inama nk’izi zabaho kenshi. Imyanzuro y’inama y’Abakuru b’Ibihugu  1 .  Abakuru b’Ibihugu bagarutse ku miterere y’icyorezo cya COVID19 mu Karere bashimira abaminisitiri b’Ubuzima, ab’Ubucuruzi, Ubwikorezi ndetse n’ab’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, ku bwitange bashyize mu gushyiraho amabwiriza yo guhangana n’icyo cyorezo. 2 . Abakuru b’Ibihugu bashyikirijwe imyanzuro y’inama iherua gukorwa n’abo baminisitiri, bashimira ibihugu bigize EAC, Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (WHO) na Africa CDC ku mbaraga bakomeje gushyira mu guhangana na COVID19, uruhare bifite mu ntambwe imaze guterwa mu kugihashya no kwirinda ikwirakwizwa ryacyo mu Karere k’Umuryango w’Afurika y’Iburasirazuba. 3 . Abakuru b’Ibihugu bemeranyijwe uburyo buhuriyeho bwo kwemeza no gusangira amakuru kuri COVID-19. Banasubiyemo gahunda ihuriweho n’ibihugu bya EAC yo guhangana na COVID-19, basaba ba Minisitiri b’Ubuzima, ab’ubucuruzi, Ubwikorezi n’Ubutwererane guharanira ko iyo gahunda yuzuzanya na gahunda zashiriweho kurwanya icyorezo muri buri gihugu. 4 . Abakuru b’Ibihugu kandi bemeje ko gusangira amakuru muri bihe bigoye ari ingenzi, cyane cyane muri ibi bihe bya COVID-19, basaba abo baminisitiri gushyiraho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga bufasha gukurikirana abashoferi n’ababaherekeza bugahita bukoreshwa n’ibihugu bigize Umuryango. Banagarutse ku mbaraga buri gihugu kigize Umuryango gikomeje gushyira mu guhangana n’imbogamizi zabonetse mu bucuruzi bwambuka imipaka n’uburyo Ubunyamabanga bwa EAC bwabyitwayemo bukurikirana imikorere y’imipaka ya buri gihugu. 5 . b’Ibihugu banagarutse ku nzego z’ubukungu z’ingenzi zakubiswe n’icyorezo zikaba zigenda biguru ntege, nk’ubuhinzi, ubucuruzi, inganda n’ibizikomokaho, ubukerarugendo n’amahoteri ndetse n’imyidagaduro. Basabye buri gihugu kigize Umuryango kwimakaza ibikorerwa mu Karere bikenewe cyane muri ibi bihe nk’ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi birimo udupfukamunwa, imiti yica udukoko mu ntoki, amasabune, ibikoresho birinda mu maso, imyambaro y’abaganga yabugenewe, ibyo kurya byongerewe agaciro n’imashini zitanga umwuka. 6 . Abakuru b’Ibihugu biyemeje gufasha abahinzi gukomeza ubuhinzi bwabo muri ibi bihe by’icyorezo na nyuma ya cyo, gushyigikira inganda zibyongerera agaciro nk’imwe mu ngamba zo kugabanya ibiribwa bitumizwa mu mahanga,  baniyemeza gushyiraho ibigega byihariye bigoboka abacuruzi bato n’abaciriritse ngo bigobotore ingaruka za COVID-19. 7. Abakuru b’Ibihugu bashyizeho ba Minisitiri b’Ubuzima, Ubwikorezi n’abashinzwe Ubutwererane muri EAC guhagararira gahunda zose zo guhangana n’icyorezo barangajwe imbere na ba Minisitiri b’Ubuzima. Abo baminisitiri basabwe guhita bashyiraho ingamba zo gupima no kwemerera abashoferi gukora ingendo mbere y’uko bahaguruka aho bavuye kandi bagapimwa buri byumweru bibiri. Imiterere y’uko byifashe ikajya imenyeshwa Abakuru b’Ibihugu. 8 . Abakuru b’Ibihugu bashimiye abafatanyabikorwa mu iterambere bakomeje gufasha ibihugu bigize EAC, by’umwihariko muri ibi bihe by’icyorezo. 9 . Abakuru b’Ibihugu bemeje inama zibahuza ku buryo buhoraho ,bagenzura uko ingamba zishyirwa mu bikorwa, bashimangira ko hakenewe ubworoherane mu kubahiriza amabwiriza ya EAC mu bihe bidasanzwe. Ruhumuriza Richard /MUHABURA.RW

title: COVID19: Abanyarwanda batuye mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi batanze inkunga yo gufasha imbabare mu Rwanda
article_text:
COVID19: Abanyarwanda batuye mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi batanze inkunga yo gufasha imbabare mu Rwanda

 Abanyarwanda batuye mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi bifatanyije n’igihugu cyabo muri iki gihe cya Gahunda ya guma mu rugo    mu rwego rwo guhashya  icyorezo cya Coronavirus  bakaba baratanze umusanzu ungana n’ibihumbi Mirogwitatu   by’amayero  [30, 457 EUR ] iyo nkunga ikaba  ingana  n’amafaranga y’u Rwanda  Miriyoni mirongwitatu . Iki gikorwa  Abanyarwanda batuye mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi [Diaspora Rwanda Belgique] bagitangije mu gihe u Rwanda ruri guhangana no guhagarika gukwirakwira kwa virusi ya Corona, icyorezo cyugarije Isi aho buri wese asabwa kuguma mu rugo hirindwa ingendo zitari ngombwa . ku bwibyo mu gihugu cy’u Rwawanda  hakaba habarirwa abaturage ba tari bake ba cyeneye impfashanyo y’ibiribwa cyane ko abenshi bari abakozi banyakabyizi.  SOMA INKURU BIFITANYE ISANODiasipora Rwanda Belgique: Urubyiruko  rwatangije ubukangurambaga bwo gufasha Abanyarwanda   Mu gihe gishize  Umuyobozi wa Diyasipora Nyarwanda mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi Bwana  Gilles Bazambanza yari yashimiye  abanyarwanda batuye mu Gihugu cyu bubirigi  bari bamaze kwitanga anabonera ho  gukangurira abandi kwi hutisha icyo gikorwa  kugira ngo iyo nkunga ibe yabasha kugera kubo yageneye vuba . 

 Umunyarwandakazi  utuye  mu gihugu cy’u Bubiligi witwa  Madame Marie Goretti Mukunde ya bwiye Umunyamakuru wa MUHABURA ko bishimiye  uburyo abanyarwanda bitabiriye igikorwa cyo gufasha abavandimwe babo batuye mu Rwanda bahuye n’ingaruka z’icyorezo cya COVID19. Madame Marie Goretti Mukunde yagize ati:’’ Abanyarwanda batuye mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi bifatanyije n’igihugu cyabo muri iki gihe cya Gahunda ya Guma murugo mu rwego rwo guhashya  icyorezo cya Coronavirus  bakaba baratanze umusanzu wabo kandi ukaba wa ramaze koherezwa mu Rwanda, mu by’ukuri twishimiye uburyo abanyarwanda batuye mu gihugu cyu Bubirigi ba byitabiriye .  SOMA INKURU BIFITANYE ISANODiaspora  COVID19 : Abanyarwanda batuye mu Bubiligi  batangije gahunda yo kugobaka u Rwanda Madame Mukunde yakomeje avuga ko yumvaga kutagira icyo bakora byari kuba ari ubugwali  yagize ati:" Abanyarwanda babyitabiranye umurava  ariko cyane cyane bafite ishyaka ku gihugu cyabo. buri wese yumvaga kudatabara ari ubugwali" Kugeza ubu Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko mu bantu 150 banduye- kuva uwa mbere agaragaye ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020- ‘‘abakize ari 84  abakirwaye akaba ari  66 mu gihe nta n’umwe urapfa.’’ Minisante igaragaza ko abarwayi bose bavurirwa ahantu habugenewe kandi bari koroherwa usibye umwe uri ‘kongererwa umwuka mu rwego rwo kwirinda ko aremba.’basabwe gutanga amakuru kugira ngo inzego z’ubuzima zikomeze gukurikirana abahuye n’abanduye ngo bitabweho. Minisante ivuga ko “Umuntu wese uhisha cyangwa wanga gutanga amakuru arebana n’abahuye n’umurwayi wa Coronavirus cyangwa agahisha ibimenyetso byayo aba ashyize ubuzima bwa benshi mu kaga kandi abihanirwa n’amategeko.’’ Abanyarwanda bose basabwe gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi, kuguma mu rugo no kwambara udupfukamunwa, nk’uburyo bubafasha kurushaho kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus. 
 Ruhumuriza Richard /MUHABURA.RW

title: COVID-19 Kigali :  Abantu 42 bakize   Coronavirus   bamaze gusezererwa
article_text:
COVID-19 Kigali :  Abantu 42 bakize   Coronavirus   bamaze gusezererwa

 Abantu cumi na barindwi ( 17) bari barwaye Coronavirus basezerewe mu bitaro mu gihe umubare w’abanduye mu Rwanda wageze ku 127 nyuma y’uko Umuntu umwe asanganywe ubwandu mu bipimo 901 byafashwe mu masaha 24 ashize. Kuva umurwayi wa mbere w’icyorezo cya COVID-19  abonetse mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, hamaze gutahurwa abantu 127 bayirwaye, muri bo abantu 42 barasezerewe nyuma yo gusuzumwa bagasangwa nta bwandu bafite mu maraso yabo, mu gihe nta n’umwe uritaba Imana. Itangazo rya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ryo kuri  uyu wa mbere  rivuga ko mu ’bamaze gusezererwa harimo  cumi na barindwi ( 17)  bakize mu masaha 24 ashize.’ Rikomeza rigaragaza ko umurwayi wa bonetse  kuri uyu wa 13 Mata 2020, ari "Umuntu uherutse gukorera ingendo mu mahanga ’’ 
 Minisante ivuga ko “Akaba yarahise ashyirwa  mu kato kandi hakomeje gushakishwa abantu bose bahuye nawe  kugira ngo basuzumwe ndetse bitabweho n’inzego z’ubuzima. Umuntu wese uhisha cyangwa wanga gutanga amakuru arebana n’abahuye n’umurwayi wa Coronavirus cyangwa agahisha ibimenyetso byabo, aba ashyize ubuzima bwa benshi mu kaga kandi abihanirwa n’amategeko.” Abarwayi bose bavurirwa ahantu habugenewe kandi barimo koroherwa, ndetse abenshi ubu nta bimenyetso bya Coronavirus bagaragaza, kandi nta n’umwe urembye. 
 Denis Fabrice Nsengumuremyi/ MUHABURA.RW

title: Hari imiryango tugisangamo amakimbirane kugeza n’ubwo bamwe mu bashakanye bicana -Dr Bayisenge
article_text:
Hari imiryango tugisangamo amakimbirane kugeza n’ubwo bamwe mu bashakanye bicana -Dr Bayisenge

 Abagore bihangiye imirimo barahamya ko kwivana mu bukene bishoboka mu gihe bumvise akamaro ko kwizigamira no kudategereza amaramuko ku bagabo babo. Minisitiri w’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango avuga ko n’ubwo hakiri inzitizi zikoma mu nkokora iterambere ry’umugore hakenewe ubukangurambaga  kugira ngo umugore ahore ku ruhembe rw’iterambere. Hari abagore bahamya ko bahoze mu bukene bukabije abandi bateze amaramuko ku bagabo babo, ariko ngo aho bahinduriye imyumvire bagatangira kwizigamira amafaranga make make, kandi bagakorana n’ibigo by’imari ubuzima bwabo bwatangiye guhinduka. Gasaro Judith utuye mu Karere ka Nyarugenge yagize ati “Nk’ubu iyi sabune turayigurisha, dufite na banki dukorana nazo, amafaranga akatuzamura, tugakemura ibibazo byo mu rugo mu gihe umugabo atarabona amafaranga. Ku bwanjye mbona umudamu ubu yamaze kumenya ko afite imbaraga agomba gukoresha, agashakishiriza hirya no hino adategereje ko umutware we hari icyo amufasha.’’ Mukarusagara Julienne, umunyabukorikori mu Karere Ka Kicukiro ati “Dutekereza ko hari icyo twakora kugira ngo twiteze imbere, ni bwo duhuje ibitekerezo dukora umushinga wo gufuma ibitambaro, ubu tugeze ku bikorwa bitubyarira amafaranga. Kera ntarajya mu bwizigame sinari nzi ko na rya 100 ryangirira akamaro, ariko ubu nigurira igitenge, nigurira ibikoresho by’umwna na mituweli nkayibona.’’ Mu kwizihiza umunsi mpuzamahanga w’umugore, hirya no hino habaye ibikorwa byo kumurika ibyo abagore bagezeho, kuremera abatishoboye borozwa inka, abandi bahabwa ibikoresho binyuranye bigizwe n’imashini zidoda, ibyo gutekesha n’ibindi. Minisitiri w’uburinganire n’iterambere ry’umuryango Dr Bayisenge Jeannette avuga ko umuryango nyarwanda ucyugarijwe n’ibibazo bisaba ingamba zihamye. Yagize ati ’’Hari imiryango tugisangamo amakimbirane kugeza n’ubwo bamwe mu bashakanye bicana, ibyo bigatuma habaho kugwingira kw’abana. Ikindi haracyari abana b’abakobwa baterwa inda bakiri bato, kuko bibangamira za ndoto z’umukobwa bikamubuza amahirwe. Ingamba ni ugukomeza gushishikariza abagore kwigirira icyizere, bivana mu bukene banyuze mu bigo by’imari, abakobwa bagashishikarizwa kwiga amashuri y’ubumenyi ngiro, ku bakobwa bagiterwa inda, hagakurikiranwa ababigizemo uruhare kandi abo bakobwa bagahabwa ubufasha.’’ Imibare igaragazwa n’inama y’igihugu y’abagore yerekana ko Mu bijyanye n’ikoreshwa ry’imari, mu 2012 abagore bakoranaga n’ibigo by’imari bari 36% mu gihe mu 2016 bageze kuri 63%. Mu 2012 kandi abari batunze ubutaka bari 24%, mu gihe muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 bageze ku gipimo cya 62%. Mu buyobozi bw’inzego z’ibanze muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 abayobozi b’uturere bageze kuri 33,% na ho abayobozi bungirije bashinzwe imibereho myiza bageze ku gipimo cya 82,8%, mu gihe abagore bari mu nama njyanama z’uturere ari 45,2%. title: PDI yirukanye burundu Dr Isaac Munyakazi uherutse kwirukanwa muri guverinoma
article_text:
PDI yirukanye burundu Dr Isaac Munyakazi uherutse kwirukanwa muri guverinoma

 Abagize Biro Politiki y’ishyaka  Ntangarugero muri Demokorasi PDI birukanye burundu Dr Isaac Munyakazi wahoze ari Umunyambanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi. Bavuga ko amakosa yo kurya ruswa yakoze batayihanganira. Abagize Biro Politiki y’ishyaka  Ntangarugero muri Demokorasi PDI bavuga ko bitandukanije n’umuntu wese ugaragaraho imikorere mibi akishora mu bikorwa bimunga umutungo w’igihugu birimo na Ruswa. Ibi babigarutseho kuri iki Cyumweru  mu nama ya Biro Politiki y’iri shyaka ubwo bareberaga hamwe imikorere n’iterambere ry’iri shyaka ndetse banasuzuma n’ubwegure bw’uwari Visi Perezida wa II w’iri shyaka Dr Isaac Munyakazi ukurikiranweho icyaha cya ruswa cyanatumye ava ku mirimo yari ashinzwe nk’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi ushinzwe amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye. Abagize biro bavuga ko bitandukanije n’ibyaha yakoze ku giti cye ndetse bagasaba ko yakirukanwa muri iri shyaka kuko basanga batakihanganira amakosa yakoze. Bakaba bahise bemeza ko Dr Isaac Munyakazi yirukanwa burundu muri iri shyaka kuko basanga amakosa yakoze batayihanganira. Perezida w’Ishyaka PDI Mussa Fazil Harelimama avuga ko iki ari icyaha nk’ishyaka batagomba kwihanganira   by’umwihariko uyu Dr Isaac Munyakazi yari mu bayobozi bakuru b’iri shyaka. Mu izina ry’abayoboke b’ishyaka Ntangarugero muri Demokarasi umuyobozi waryo Moussa Fazil asaba imbabazi Abanyarwanda n’igihugu muri rusange kubera amakosa akomeye yakozwe n’ umuyoboke wabo, wari n’umuyobozi mu nzego nkuru z’igihugu Ubwo yafunguraga Umwiherero wa 17 w’abayobozi, Perezida Paul Kagame yavuze ko impamvu Dr Isaac Munyakazi yakuwe muri Guverinoma  ari uko yariye ruswa y’amafaranga ibihumbi 500 y’u Rwanda, aho ngo yashyize mu myanya  10 ya mbere ishuri ryari ryaje mu myanya ya nyuma. title: Abakoresha gare ya Nyabugogo na Kimironko barifuza ko yavugururwa
article_text:
Abakoresha gare ya Nyabugogo na Kimironko barifuza ko yavugururwa

 Abakoresha gare ya Nyabugogo na Kimironko mu Mujyi wa Kigali barifuza ko ivugururwa ry’imyubakire muri uyu mujyi ridakwiye gusiga izi gare kuko ngo zitakijyanye n’icyerekezo igihugu kiganamo. Ubuyobozi bw’umujyi wa Kigali bwo bwavuze ko hari imishinga ikiri mu nyigo izasubiza ibyifuzo by’abazikoresha. Abakoresha izi gare za Nyabugogo na Kimironko bavuga ko impinduka mu myubakire zigaragara mu hirya no hino mu Mujyi wa Kigali, zidakwiye kuzisiga inyuma na zo zitavuguruwe. Bagaragaza ko nko muri gare ya Nyabugogo hagaragaramo akajagari kandi ngo n’iyo mvura yaguye ihateza imyuzure. Mukamana Marie Clarisse utuye mu Mujyi wa Kigali avuga ko gare nshya zikwiye kubakwa kuko kuri ubu abona gutega imodoka harimo akajagari. Yagize ati ’’Icyo dusaba ni uko bavugurura bakatwubakira gare ijyana n’icyerekezo 2050, kuko iyi gare ntijyanye n’icyerekezo tuganamo. Ubuyobozi nibuhagurukire guca akajagari. Kandi icyaca aka kajagari ni uko bakubaka gare, abantu bakajya bamenya aho bategera, nta we ubakurubanye.’’ Nsaguye Dieudonne avuga ko gare ya Nyabugogo ikunze kwibasirwa n’amazi y’imvura bigateza ibibazo. Ati ’’Iyi gare ikintu mbona bayikorera, bitewe n’imvura igwa amazi agatemberamo akaba menshi n’ubutoya bwayo n’umubyigano w’imodoka, mbona bayubaka mu buryo bw’igorofa, imodoka zimwe zikajya ziarika hasi izindi hejuru.’’ Umuyobozi bw’Umujyi wa Kigali Rubingisa Pudence avuga ko hari umushinga wo kuvugurura gare ya Nyabugogo Umujyi wa Kigali ufatanyamo n’abashoramari, hakazitabwa no ku nzira z’abagenzi zo mu kirere. Gusa ntabwo uyu muyobozi atangaza igihe nyakuri uyu mushinga uzatangirira gushyirwa mu bikorwa n’ubwo inigo yawo yatangiye. Ati ’’Hari umushinga munini turimo gukorana n’abashoramari bo mu Rwanda, aho tuzatanga ubutaka na bo bazane amafaranga bashoremo imari kugira ngo tuhubake gare iteganywa n’icyo igisushanyo mbonera giteganya.Turanateganya kuzashyiraho ibiraro 3 bihuza gare n’amashyirahamwe abantu bazajya bambukiraho mu kirere badakoresheje umuhanda wo hasi kuko ubundi abantu ni benshi bateza impanuka, ariko na gare ikazamurwa ikaba gare y’icyitegererezo. Batangiye no gukora inyigo.’’ Umujyi wa Kigali uvuga ko hari n’undi mushinga uzaherekeza uyu, ugamije gukora imiyoboro y’amazi aturuka mu mugezi wa Mpazi, ikayajyana mu wa Nyabugogo kugira ngo atazakomeza kubangamira iyi gare. Uretse Gare ya Nyabugogo, iya Kimironko na yo iri mu zemejwe kuvugururwa na Sosiyeti y’ishoramari Gasabo Investment Company. Ni Umushinga w’iyi gare yonyine uzatwara ingengo y’imari ikabakaba miliyoni 15 z’amadolari. Gasana Francis ushinzwe komite ya tekiniki muri Gasabo Investment Company ati “Tuzaba dufite gare nini ariko ikoze mu buryo atari imodoka ziza guparika ngo zihagume, kuko Kimironko nta mwanya munini tuhafite, azaba ari gare ifite interneti, irimo aho bafatira amafunguro, n’aho abantu baruhukira.’’ Biteganyijwe iyi gare izatangira kuvugururwa muri uyu mwaka wa 2020. Yatangiye gukoreshwa mu 2001 n’imodoka zituruka mu duce tunyuranye tw’umujyi wa Kigali. Mu giye iya Nyabugogo yo yatangiye mu 1998 nk’amasangano y’imodoka zitwara abagenzi bava cyangwa bajya mu mujyi wa Kigali. MUHABURA.RW

title: Ababyeyi barasabwa gushakira umwana iminota 15 ku munsi bakamufasha gusoma ibitabo
article_text:
Ababyeyi barasabwa gushakira umwana iminota 15 ku munsi bakamufasha gusoma ibitabo

 Mu gihe hakigaragara abana barangiza amashuri batazi gusoma no kwandika ahanini bitewe no kudatozwa gusoma ibitabo bakiri bato,ababyeyi barakangurirwa kwishyiramo umuco wo gutoza abana babo gusoma ibitabo kuko ubumenyi bakuramo bubafasha no mu buzima buzaza ndetse no mu iterambere ry’igihugu. Kugira ngo iki kibazo gicike,ihuriro rya Soma Rwanda  ku bufatanye na Minisiteri y’uburezi ‘MINEDUC’, bateguye ubukangurambaga bugamije gushishikariza buri muntu wese kugira uruhare mu gukundisha abana umuco wo gusoma ibitabo. Iyi gahunda yiswe ’Mumpe Urubuga Nsome’ yatangijwe kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 5 Gashyantare 2020 mu gihugu hose akazamara umwaka,itangirizwa mu karere ka Burera mu kigo cy’amashuri abanza cya SOZI. Ku rwego rw’akarere ka Gasabo,iyi gahunda yatangijwe no guhemba abanyeshuri 37 bahize abandi mu mu marushanwa ya"Andika Rwanda", abagera kuri 17 nibo bitabiriye kuko abandi bagiye ku mashuri.Ibyo bitabo byanditswe n’Abanyeshuri, abana b’Abanayrwanda bikaba aribyo bizajya byifashishwa mu ghusoma. Umuyobozi wungirije w’akarere ka Gasabo ushinzwe imibereho myiza,Madamu Nyirabahire Languida, avuga ko ababyeyi badakwiye gufata umwanya wose ngo bawuharire imirimo n’ibindi bikorwa ahubwo ko bagomba gufata byibura iminota 15 ku munsi yo gufasha abana gusoma. Ati:”Byaragaragaye!ubona rimwe na rimwe abana bose bari mu ishuri ariko ukabona bamwe rwose utamenya ko batangiy no kwiga ukabona batazi gusoma cyangwa yenda bakajyana inyuguti bafatiye aho ngaho mu ishuri ariko mu buzima busanzwe mu rugo nabo baturanye batagira uwo muco wo gusoma”. Avuga ko nk’ubuyobozi ndetse na USAID Soma-umenye,batangije ubu bukangurambaga bitewe n’uko byagaragaye ko bikiri ikibazo kubona umwana wiga azi gusoma neza igitabo runaka kiri ku rugero rw’umwaka yigamo. Ati:”Muri ako kazi kenshi bavuga ko bafite,umwana arahenze n’igihe kirahenze ariko umuntu agenda agereranya ibintu bifrusha ibindi uburemere.Umwana rero arahenze muri ka kazi kenshi bafite iminota 15 bagomba kuyishakira umwana kugira ngo bamwigishe gusoma”. Mugabe Claude Richard,umubyeyi wo mu karere ka Gasabo,avuga ko bidakwiye ko ababyeyi batererana abana babo mu myigire kuko ubumenyi bakura mu gusoma ari wo murage usigayeho kuri iki gihe. Ati”Ntabwo numva ko umwana wabyaye akamara, igihe akagera igihe cyo kwiga wamuburira umwanya wo kugira ngo umufashe mu myigire ye.Nta butaka dufite ngo tuvuge ngo tuzaraga abana bacu.Ni ukuvuga ko umurage mwiza w’umubyeyi yagahaye umwana we muri iki gihe ari ukumufasha kwiga”. Avuga ko kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho biva mu bufatanye bw’umubyeyi na mwarimu mu gukurikirana umwana haba ku ishuri ndetse n’igihe ageze mu rugo. Ati “Uruhare rw’ishuri ni ugushishikariza umwana kumenya ndetse no kwita ku bitabo bahabwa.Nanjye nk’umubyeyi umwana yagera mu rugo nkamukurikirana nkamufasha mu myigireye ndetse no gusoma”. Muri uyu mwaka wahariwe ubukangurambaga bwo gusoma,MINEDUC irasaba Abayobozi b’ibigo by’amashuri guha abana urubuga rwo gusomera ibitabo igihe bari ku ishuri bakanabibatiza bakajya kubisomera mu rugo ndetse bakagenzura ko babigarura ku ishuri.Ababyeyi barasabwa kujya bafasha abana gusoma igihe bari mu rugo byibura iminota 15 buri munsi ndetse no gufata neza ibitabo baba bahawe. 
 Yanditswe na Habarurema Djamali

title: Imiryango y’abavanywe muri Congo iri kwigishwa kubana n’abandi
article_text:
Imiryango y’abavanywe muri Congo iri kwigishwa kubana n’abandi

 Abantu 1,991 bagize imiryango y’abari mu mitwe y’inyeshyamba irwanya u Rwanda muri DR Congo bazanywe mu kwezi gushize bari gutozwa kubana neza n’abo bazasanga mbere yo koherezwa aho bakomoka nk’uko abategetsi babivuga. Aba ubu bari mu nkambi y’agateganyo ya Nyarushishi mu karere ka Rusizi mu burengerazuba bw’u Rwanda.Aha i Nyarushishi hari abana basaga 1, 000 bari munsi y’imyaka 10 n’abagore bagera kuri 800, abagabo bivugwa ko bahoze ari inyeshyamba bajyanywe mu kigo kiri i Mutobo mu karere  ka Musanze cyakira abari abasirikare. Gusa hano i Nyarushishi hari n’abagabo bagera ku 100 nk’uko abahashinzwe babivuga.
Hano hari ibikorwa byinshi, byiganjemo cyane cyane kubavura no gukurikirana ubuzima bw’abana, bisa n’aho Leta yikanga indwara z’ibyorezo urebye ingufu zashyizwe mu buvuzi. Aha i Nyarushishi abariyo bagomba kuhamara amezi atatu batozwa uburere mboneragihugu no kuzabana n’abandi neza nibasubizwa aho bakomoka.Ibi biremezwa na komisiyo ya Leta y’u Rwanda yo gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe abari abasirikare ishinzwe aba bantu. Bamwe muri bo baracyibaza ibibazo bitandukanye ku mibereho yabo nibagera aho bakomoka, abandi bavuga ko batahazi cyangwa ntaho bafite. Umugore umwe yavuze  ko ari umunyecongo ufite ababyeyi bombi b’abanyecongo ariko washakanye n’umugabo w’umunyarwanda. Avuga ko uwo mugabo we atari mu bafashwe n’ingabo boherejwe mu Rwanda, akibaza aho azerekeza igihe cyo kuva  hano. Aha bari  baherwamo inyigisho z’amateka n’izindi bagomba guhabwa mbere yo kuva hano , Francis Musoni umunyamabanga mukuru wa komisiyo yo gusubiza mu buzima busanzwe abari abasirikare avuga ko ibibazo byihariye nk’iki cy’uyu mugore bizigwa by’umwihariko. Musoni avuga ko muri aba bantu harimo abakekwaho uruhare muri jenoside ko muri bo hari batanu(5) bamaze gufatwa bagafungwa kandi ko igikorwa cy’igenzura gikomeje. Aba bantu bahunze imirwano y’inyeshyamba n’ingabo za leta ya DR Congo mu ntara ya Kivu y’Epfo mu bitero by’ingabo bigamije kurandura iyo mitwe. Abandi bantu babarirwa mu bihumbi baracyari muri Congo mu bigo byakiriye imiryango yahunze iyi mirwano. Umuvugizi w’ingabo za DR Congo muri Kivu y’Epfo Kapiteni Dieudonné Kasereka yavuze ko "ibikorwa bya gisirikare biri gukorwa hose mu burasirazuba bikorwa n’igisiriakre cya leta cyonyine".Yavuze ko mu mirwano y’ingabo n’inyeshyamba abaturage batatanye, bagafata inyeshyamba. Leta ya DR Congo na Leta y’u Rwanda zombi zahakanye ko hari ingabo z’u Rwanda zaba ziri gufatanya n’iza Congo muri ibyo bitero ku mitwe yitwaje intwaro. Chief editor \Muhabura.rw

title: Amashuri yigenga abanza yemerewe gukomeza kwigisha mu ndimi z’amahanga
article_text:
Amashuri yigenga abanza yemerewe gukomeza kwigisha mu ndimi z’amahanga

 Abahagarariye amashuri abanza yigenga bishimiye imyanzuro yavuye mu biganiro byahuje Minisiteri y’Uburezi (MINEDUC) n’amashuri abanza yigenga. Ni ibiganiro byabereye mu mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 02 Ukuboza 2019. Ni ibiganiro byibanze ahanini ku itegurwa ry’umwaka w’amashuri utaha wa 2020 ndetse n’uburyo bwo kunoza ireme ry’uburezi hanaganirwa n’aho gahunda yo kwigisha mu Kinyarwanda ihagaze. Ababyitabiriye kandi bagarutse ku ngingo yerekeranye n’imyigishirize y’indimi mu mashuri abanza, by’umwihariko bagaragaza imbogamizi z’uko bari baherutse gusabwa kwigisha amasomo mu kinyarwanda guhera mu mashuri y’incuke kugeza mu mwaka wa gatatu w’amashuri abanza, mu gihe amenshi muri ayo mashuri yari amenyereye kwigisha mu cyongereza. Minisitiri w’Uburezi, Dr Eugene Mutimura, yabamenyesheje ko mu rwego rwo kwirinda impinduka za hato na hato, ayo mashuri yemerewe gukomeza gutanga amasomo mu rurimi rw’icyongereza, ariko n’izindi ndimi bakajya bazigisha abanyeshuri. Yagize ati “Dushingiye ku byo mwasabye, ni byiza ko tutahuzagurika. Ni byiza ko twakwigisha mu rurimi rw’icyongereza kuva mu mwaka wa mbere w’amashuri abanza (P1) kugeza mu mwaka wa gatandatu w’amashuri abanza(P6).” Ati “Icya kabiri, ni byiza ko twakora uko dushoboye kose kubera icyuho dufite tuzi mu ndimi zose muri rusange ari zo ikinyarwanda, icyongereza n’igifaransa, ariko icyongereza gifite akarusho kuko ari rwo rurimi amasomo agomba gutangwamo (medium of instruction) kuva mu wa mbere kugeza mu wa gatandatu w’amashuri abanza. Ariko ikinyarwanda na cyo kigomba kwigishwa cyane kuva mu wa mbere kugeza mu wa gatandatu w’amashuri abanza nk’uko bisabwa, ndetse ngira ngo biranakomeza mu mashuri yisumbuye.” Abitabiriye ibiganiro bahagarariye ibigo bishimiye ibyavuye muri ibyo biganiro
Minisitiri Mutimura yasabye abahagarariye ibigo by’amashuri abanza yigenga ko bagomba kwibuka ko umunyeshuri iyo ageze mu mwaka wa kane w’amashuri abanza agomba gutangira kwiga igifaransa, abibutsa ko abanyeshuri basoje umwaka wa gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye bazajya bakora ikizamini cy’ururimi rw’Igifaransa. Minisitiri Mutimura ati “Ibyo rero bisaba ko atari urwego rwacu gusa rwa politiki rubibasaba, rubibakangurira, runabibahamo umurongo, icyo tubasaba ni uko munoza imyigishirize y’izo ndimi mu mashuri.” Ubwo yabagezagaho ubwo butumwa, ababugezwagaho ntibahwemaga kumukomera mu mashyi, bagaragaza ko banyuzwe n’ibyo babwiwe. Nsengiyumva Eliphaz wari uhagarariye ishuri riri i Nyanza mu Murenge wa Busasamana mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo yavuze ko kwigisha ururimi rw’ikinyarwanda ari byiza ariko ngo nishimiye ko bemerewe kwigisha indimi z’amahanga kuko ari amarembo yagutse abageza ku kubona ibyo abandi babatanze. Akomeza agira ati" Ibyo bizafasha abana bacu kumenya ibiri hanze bakore ubuvumbuzi n’ubushakashatsi, ubutabire n’ibindi, kuko biri mu ndimi z’amahanga. Tutabyigishije neza rero twagumana ibyo dusanzwe dufite gusa, ariko udushyashya ntitutubone kuko imiryango yo kumenya ibyo abandi bagezeho dukeneye yaba ifunze". Kubera iyo mpamvu ngo ibyo babishimiye abayobozi ba Minisiteri y’Uburezi bari barangajwe imbere na Minisitiri. Naho uwitwa Rudasingwa Pierre wari uhagarariye ishuri riherereye Gatenga mu Karere ka Kicukiro yavuze ko ataribo barose inama iba kuko bari bafite byinshi bagombaga gusobanuza bigendanye n’amakuru yagiye acicikana yo kwigisha mu Kinyarwanda ariko ngo amatsiko arashize. Akomeza agira ati"Umwanzuro uvuyemo ni mwiza uradushimishije kuko batwemereye gukomeza kwigisha nk’uko twari dusanzwe twigisha, tugashyira imbaraga mu kinyarwanda, indimi z’amahanga na zo tukazigisha, tukava mu mwaka wa mbere kugeza mu wa gatandatu twigisha mu cyongereza.” Kuba bamwe mu banyarwanda bafite imiryango mu mahanga ndetse abenshi bakaba bakunze kujyayo gushakirayo imibereho,abari bahagarariye ibigo muri iyi nama bagaragaje ko kwigisha abana bato indimi z’amahanga bizabafasha kwisanzura no gushakisha imibereho mu bindi bihugu ubwo bazaba bakuze.

title: Ngoma:Abahinzi n’aborozi bakiriye neza gahunda y’ubwishingizi bw’ibihingwa n’amatungo
article_text:
Ngoma:Abahinzi n’aborozi bakiriye neza gahunda y’ubwishingizi bw’ibihingwa n’amatungo

 Abahinzi n’aborozi bo mu karere ka Ngoma barishimira gahunda y’ubwishingizi bw’ibihingwa n’amatungo aho bavuga ko ibihombo bajyaga bahura nabyo bapfushije imyaka cyangwa amatungo bitazongera kubaho ukundi kuko bazajya bishyurwa cyangwa bagashumbushwa. Ibi ni bimwe mu byo bagaragaje ubwo hatangizwaga gahunda y’ubwishingizi bw’ibihingwa n’amatungo mu murenge wa Murama mu karere ka Ngoma yatangijwe na minisiteri y’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi [MINAGRI]. Ni gahunda yakiriwe neza n’abaturage kuko bamwe bemeza ko igihombo bagiraga ku bihingwa n’amatungo bitazongera kubageraho bitewe n’uko bazajya babishinganisha byagira ikibazo nko gupfa bakabishyura ntagusigara amara masa nk’uko byari bisanzwe. Ntakirutimana Suede ukora umwuga w’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi Ati"Reba nk’iyi sezo duhinze mu gihe cy’itumba, ubundi iyo haguye imvura mbi ubwo ku muceri turahomba ntawujya mu murima.Ikingenzi rero navuga ngo biziye igihe kuko ni nk’uko umuntu ajya mu bwishingizi bwo kwivuza,ni ukuvu ngo rero duhuye n’icyo cyorezo hari icyo byadufasha bitewe n’ubwo bwiteganyirize twagiyemo." Mukurarindi Wenceslas wo mudugudu wa Rukizi akagari ka Gitaraga umurenge wa Murama we avuga ko bazajya bahinga batizeye kuburiramo burundu kubera ko bazaba bashinganishije imyaka (ibihingwa) yabo. Ati "Twahingaga imyaka nk’ibigori bigatwarwa n’isuri noneho umuhinzi akabihomba, ariko inyungu dufitemo ni uko tuzajya duhinga nk’ibyo bigori hazamo nka nkongwa kubera ko tuzaba turi mu bwishingizi reta ikabasha kudutera inkunga tukongera tukabona imyaka yadutungira imiryango yacu  ". Akomeza avuga ko kuba barahuraga n’ibihombo mu bworozi bwabo aho inka yapfaga umuturage akaba arahombye,bizera ko ibyo bitazongera kubaho nk’uko byari bisanzwe. Ati "Naho ku bworozi bw’amatungo twagiraga ikibazo tugapfusha nk’inka indwara iyihitanye ubwo umuturage akaba arahombye ariko kubera ko tugiye kujya mu bwishingizi,inka yacu izajya igira ikibazo nipfa Leta yongere idushumbushe indi dukomeze twiteze imbere ". Umuyobozi w’ungirije w’akarere ka Ngoma ushinzwe iterambere ry’ubukungu, Mapambano N.Cyriaque,avuga ko iyi gahunda itangirijwe mu murenge wa Murama izakomereza no mu yindi mirenge yose igize aka karere. Asaba abaturage kumva ko iyi gahunda ari iyabo bagafatanya n’ubuyobozi kuyishyira mu bikorwa dore ko amafaranga akenerwa atari menshi haba ku muturage cyangwa koperative. Ati "Icyo tubasaba ni ukugira ngo iyi gahunda tuyijyanemo nk’ubuyobozi cyane ko inyungu ari izabo.Kuba ari inyungu ari iz’umuturage,kuba tubasaba ko ibyo tubabwira babyumva vuba, tubakangurira kugira ngo bitegure bashake amafaranga kuko nta n’ubwo ari na menshi.Usanga ari amafaranga make cyane ku buryo nta muturage yananira cyangwa koperative runaka". Intumwa ya MINAGRI,Nirere Marion,avuga Leta yagiye gutekereza kuri iyi gahunda y’ubwishingizi bw’ibihingwa n’amatungo kubera ko mu gihugu hagendaga hagaragara abaturage bahombaga imyaka n’amatungo byabo ugasanga bigize ingaruka ku gihugu. Ati "Iyi gahunda tujya kuyitangira muri minisiteri y’ubuhinzi n’ubworozi ntabwo ari ibintu byapfuye kwizana.Ni ibintu twakoze tugendeye ku mibare yagendaga igaragara hirya no hino mu gihugu y’ibibazo abahinzi n’aborozi bahuraga nabyo. Murabizi ko dutanga nkunganire mu nyongeramusaruro ariko no buryo bwo kugira ngo abantu batekane kandi umutekano tuzi ko utangirira mu nda [……],Umutekano iyo wabuze mu nda ntabwo biba byoroshye.Twebwe rero nka minisiteri y’ubuhinzi  n’ubworozi leta yatugiriye ikizere cyo kugira ngo umutekano wo mu nda aritwe bwe tuwureberera"
